old testamentpage 1 genesis first book moses, called genesis beginning god created heaven earth. earth without form, void; darkness [was] upon face deep. spirit god moved upon face waters. god said, let light: light. god saw light, [it was] good: god divided light darkness. god called light day, darkness called night. evening morning first day. god said, let firmament midst waters, let divide waters waters. god made firmament, divided waters [were] firmament waters [were] firmament: so. god called firmament heaven. evening morning second day. god said, let waters heaven gathered together unto one place, let dry [land] appear: so. god called dry [land] earth; gathering together waters called seas: god saw [it was] good. god said, let earth bring forth grass, herb yielding seed, [and] fruit tree yielding fruit kind, whose seed [is] itself, upon earth: so. earth brought forth grass, [and] herb yielding seed kind, tree yielding fruit, whose seed [was] itself, kind: god saw [it was] good. evening morning third day. god said, let lights firmament heaven divide day night; let signs, seasons, days, years: let lights firmament heaven give light upon earth: so. god made two great lights; greater light rule day, lesser light rule night: [he made] stars also. god set firmament heaven give light upon earth, rule day night, divide light darkness: god saw [it was] good. evening morning fourth day. god said, let waters bring forth abundantly moving creature hath life, fowl [that] may fly earth open firmament heaven. god created great whales, every living creature moveth, waters brought forth abundantly, kind, every winged fowl kind: god saw [it was] good. god blessed them, saying, fruitful, multiply, fill waters seas, let fowl multiply earth. evening morning fifth day. god said, let earth bring forth living creature kind, cattle, creeping thing, beast earth kind: so. god made beast earth kind, cattle kind, every thing creepeth upon earth kind: god saw [it was] good. god said, let us make man image, likeness: let dominion fish sea, fowl air, cattle,and earth, every creeping thing creepeth upon earth. god created man [own] image, image god created him; male female created them. god blessed them, god said unto them, fruitful, multiply, replenish earth, subdue it: dominion fish sea, fowl air, every living thing moveth upon earth. god said, behold, given every herb bearing seed, [is] upon face earth, every tree, [is] fruit tree yielding seed; shall meat. every beast earth, every fowl air, every thing creepeth upon earth, wherein [there is] life, [i given] every green herb meat: so. god saw every thing made, and, behold, [it was] good. evening morning sixth day. thus heavens earth finished, host them. seventh day god ended work made; rested seventh day work made. god blessed seventh day, sanctified it: rested work god created made. [are] generations heavens earth created, day lord god made earth heavens, every plant field earth, every herb field grew: lord god caused rain upon earth, [there was] man till ground. went mist earth, watered whole face ground. lord god formed man [of] dust ground, breathed nostrils breath life; man became living soul. lord god planted garden eastward eden; put man formed. ground made lord god grow every tree pleasant sight, good food; tree life also midst garden, tree knowledge good evil. river went eden water garden; thence parted, became four heads. name first [is] pison: [is] compasseth whole land havilah, [there is] gold; gold land [is] good: [is] bdellium onyx stone. name second river [is] gihon: [is] compasseth whole land ethiopia. name third river [is] hiddekel: [is] goeth toward east assyria. fourth river [is] euphrates. lord god took man, put garden eden dress keep it. lord god commanded man, saying, every tree garden thou mayest freely eat: tree knowledge good evil, thou shalt eat it: day thou eatest thereof thou shalt surely die. lord god said, [it is] good man alone; make help meet him. ground lord god formed every beast field, every fowl air; brought [them] unto adam see would call them: whatsoever adam called every living creature, [was]genesis page 2 name thereof. adam gave names cattle, fowl air, every beast field; adam found help meet him. lord god caused deep sleep fall upon adam slept: took one ribs, closed flesh instead thereof; rib, lord god taken man, made woman, brought unto man. adam said, [is] bone bones, flesh flesh: shall called woman, taken man. therefore shall man leave father mother, shall cleave unto wife: shall one flesh. naked, man wife, ashamed. serpent subtil beast field lord god made. said unto woman, yea, hath god said, ye shall eat every tree garden? woman said unto serpent, may eat fruit trees garden: fruit tree [is] midst garden, god hath said, ye shall eat it, neither shall ye touch it, lest ye die. serpent said unto woman, ye shall surely die: god doth know day ye eat thereof, eyes shall opened, ye shall gods, knowing good evil. woman saw tree [was] good food, [was] pleasant eyes, tree desired make [one] wise, took fruit thereof, eat, gave also unto husband her; eat. eyes opened, knew [were] naked; sewed fig leaves together, made aprons. heard voice lord god walking garden cool day: adam wife hid presence lord god amongst trees garden. lord god called unto adam, said unto him, [art] thou? said, heard thy voice garden, afraid, [was] naked; hid myself. said, told thee thou [wast] naked? hast thou eaten tree, whereof commanded thee thou shouldest eat? man said, woman thou gavest [to be] me, gave tree, eat. lord god said unto woman, [is] [that] thou hast done? woman said, serpent beguiled me, eat. lord god said unto serpent, thou hast done this, thou [art] cursed cattle, every beast field; upon thy belly shalt thou go, dust shalt thou eat days thy life: put enmity thee woman, thy seed seed; shall bruise thy head, thou shalt bruise heel. unto woman said, greatly multiply thy sorrow thy conception; sorrow thou shalt bring forth children; thy desire [shall be] thy husband, shall rule thee. unto adam said, thou hast hearkened unto voice thy wife, hast eaten tree, commanded thee, saying, thou shalt eat it: cursed [is] ground thy sake; sorrow shalt thou eat [of] days thy life; thorns also thistles shall bring forth thee; thou shalt eat herb field; sweat thy face shalt thou eat bread, till thou return unto ground; wast thou taken: dust thou [art,] unto dust shalt thou return. adam called wife's name eve; mother living. unto adamalso wife lord god make coats skins, clothed them. lord god said, behold, man become one us, know good evil: now, lest put forth hand, take also tree life, eat, live ever: therefore lord god sent forth garden eden, till ground whence taken. drove man; placed east garden eden cherubim, flaming sword turned every way, keep way tree life. adam knew eve wife; conceived, bare cain, said, gotten man lord. bare brother abel. abel keeper sheep, cain tiller ground. process time came pass, cain brought fruit ground offering unto lord. abel, also brought firstlings flock fat thereof. lord respect unto abel offering: unto cain offering respect. cain wroth, countenance fell. lord said unto cain, art thou wroth? thy countenance fallen? thou doest well, shalt thou accepted? thou doest well, sin lieth door. unto thee [shall be] desire, thou shalt rule him. cain talked abel brother: came pass, field, cain rose abel brother, slew him. lord said unto cain, [is] abel thy brother? said, know not: [am] brother's keeper? said, hast thou done? voice thy brother's blood crieth unto ground. [art] thou cursed earth, hath opened mouth receive thy brother's blood thy hand; thou tillest ground, shall henceforth yield unto thee strength; fugitive vagabond shalt thou earth. cain said unto lord, punishment [is] greater bear. behold, thou hast driven day face earth; thy face shall hid; shall fugitive vagabond earth; shall come pass, [that] every one findeth shall slay me. lord said unto him, therefore whosoever slayeth cain, vengeance shall taken sevenfold. lord set mark upon cain, lest finding kill him. cain went presence lord, dwelt land nod, east eden. cain knew wife; conceived, bare enoch: builded city, called name city, name son, enoch. unto enoch born irad: irad begat mehujael: mehujael begat methusael: methusael begat lamech. lamech took unto two wives: name one [was] adah, name zillah. adah bare jabal: father dwell tents, [of have] cattle. brother's name [was] jubal: father handle harp organ. zillah, also bare tubal- cain, instructer every artificer brass iron: sister tubal-cain [was] naamah. lamech said unto wives, adah zillah, hear voice; ye wives lamech, hearken unto speech: slain man wounding, young man hurt. cain shall avenged sevenfold, trulypage 3 genesis lamech seventy sevenfold. adam knew wife again; bare son, called name seth: god, [said she,] hath appointed another seed instead abel, cain slew. seth, also born son; called name enos: began men call upon name lord. [is] book generations adam. day god created man, likeness god made him; male female created them; blessed them, called name adam, day created. adam lived hundred thirty years, begat [a son] likeness, image; called name seth: days adam begotten seth eight hundred years: begat sons daughters: days adam lived nine hundred thirty years: died. seth lived hundred five years, begat enos: seth lived begat enos eight hundred seven years, begat sons daughters: days seth nine hundred twelve years: died. enos lived ninety years, begat cainan: enos lived begat cainan eight hundred fifteen years, begat sons daughters: days enos nine hundred five years: died. cainan lived seventy years, begat mahalaleel: cainan lived begat mahalaleel eight hundred forty years, begat sons daughters: days cainan nine hundred ten years: died. mahalaleel lived sixty five years, begat jared: mahalaleel lived begat jared eight hundred thirty years, begat sons daughters: days mahalaleel eight hundred ninety five years: died. jared lived hundred sixty two years, begat enoch: jared lived begat enoch eight hundred years, begat sons daughters: days jared nine hundred sixty two years: died. enoch lived sixty five years, begat methuselah: enoch walked god begat methuselah three hundred years, begat sons daughters: days enoch three hundred sixty five years: enoch walked god: [was] not; god took him. methuselah lived hundred eighty seven years, begat lamech: methuselah lived begat lamech seven hundred eighty two years, begat sons daughters: days methuselah nine hundred sixty nine years: died. lamech lived hundred eighty two years, begat son: called name noah, saying, [same] shall comfort us concerning work toil hands, ground lord hath cursed. lamech lived begat noah five hundred ninety five years, begat sons daughters: noah five hundred years old: noah begat shem, ham, japheth. came pass, men began multiply face earth, daughters born unto them, sons god saw daughters men [were] fair; took wives chose. lord said, spirit shall always strive man, also [is] flesh: yet days shall hundred twenty years. giants earth days; also that, sons god came unto daughters men, bare [children] them, [became] mighty men [were] old, men renown. god saw wickedness man [was] great earth, [that] every imagination thoughts heart [was] evil continually. repented lord made man earth, grieved heart. lord said, destroy man created face earth; man, beast, creeping thing, fowls air; repenteth made them. noah found grace eyes lord. [are] generations noah: noah man [and] perfect generations, [and] noah walked god. noah begat three sons, shem, ham, japheth. earth also corrupt god, earth filled violence. god looked upon earth, and, behold, corrupt; flesh corrupted way upon earth. god said unto noah, end flesh come me; earth filled violence them; and, behold, destroy earth. make thee ark gopher wood; rooms shalt thou make ark, shalt pitch within without pitch. [is fashion] thou shalt make [of:] length ark [shall be] three hundred cubits, breadth fifty cubits, height thirty cubits. window shalt thou make ark, cubit shalt thou finish above; door ark shalt thou set side thereof; [with] lower, second, third [stories] shalt thou make it. and, behold, i, even i, bring flood waters upon earth, destroy flesh, wherein [is] breath life, heaven; [and] every thing [is] earth shall die. thee establish covenant; thou shalt come ark, thou, thy sons, thy wife, thy sons' wives thee. every living thing flesh, two every [sort] shalt thou bring ark, keep [them] alive thee; shall male female. fowls kind, cattle kind, every creeping thing earth kind, two every [sort] shall come unto thee, keep [them] alive. take thou unto thee food eaten, thou shalt gather [it] thee; shall food thee, them. thus noah; according god commanded him, he. lord said unto noah, come thou thy house ark; thee seen righteous generation. every clean beast thou shalt take thee sevens, male female: beasts [are] clean two, male female. fowls also air sevens, male female; keep seed alive upon face earth.genesis page 4 yet seven days, cause rain upon earth forty days forty nights; every living substance made destroy face earth. noah according unto lord commanded him. noah [was] six hundred years old flood waters upon earth. noah went in, sons, wife, sons' wives him, ark, waters flood. clean beasts, beasts [are] clean, fowls, every thing creepeth upon earth, went two two unto noah ark, male female, god commanded noah. came pass seven days, waters flood upon earth. six hundredth year noah's life, second month, seventeenth day month, day fountains great deep broken up, windows heaven opened. rain upon earth forty days forty nights. selfsame day entered noah, shem, ham, japheth, sons noah, noah's wife, three wives sons them, ark; they, every beast kind, cattle kind, every creeping thing creepeth upon earth kind, every fowl kind, every bird every sort. went unto noah ark, two two flesh, wherein [is] breath life. went in, went male female flesh, god commanded him: lord shut in. flood forty days upon earth; waters increased, bare ark, lift earth. waters prevailed, increased greatly upon earth; ark went upon face waters. waters prevailed exceedingly upon earth; high hills, [were] whole heaven, covered. fifteen cubits upward waters prevail; mountains covered. flesh died moved upon earth, fowl, cattle, beast, every creeping thing creepeth upon earth, every man: whose nostrils [was] breath life, [was] dry [land,] died. every living substance destroyed upon face ground, man, cattle, creeping things, fowl heaven; destroyed earth: noah remained [alive,] [were] ark. waters prevailed upon earth hundred fifty days. god remembered noah, every living thing, cattle [was] ark: god made wind pass earth, waters asswaged; fountains also deep windows heaven stopped, rain heaven restrained; waters returned earth continually: end hundred fifty days waters abated. ark rested seventh month, seventeenth day month, upon mountains ararat. waters decreased continually tenth month: tenth [month,] first [day] month, tops mountains seen. came pass end forty days, noah opened window ark made: sent forth raven, went forth fro, waters dried earth. also sent forth dove him, see waters abated face ground; dove found rest sole foot, returned unto ark, waters [were] face whole earth: put forth hand, took her, pulled unto ark. stayed yet seven days; sent forth dove ark; dove came evening; and, lo, mouth [was] olive leaf pluckt off: noah knew waters abated earth. stayed yet seven days; sent forth dove; returned unto more. came pass six hundredth first year, first [month,] first [day] month, waters dried earth: noah removed covering ark, looked, and, behold, face ground dry. second month, seven twentieth day month, earth dried. go forth ark, thou, thy wife, thy sons, thy sons' wives thee. bring forth thee every living thing [is] thee, flesh, [both] fowl, cattle, every creeping thing creepeth upon earth; may breed abundantly earth, fruitful, multiply upon earth. noah went forth, sons, wife, sons' wives him: every beast, every creeping thing, every fowl, [and] whatsoever creepeth upon earth, kinds, went forth ark. noah builded altar unto lord; took every clean beast, every clean fowl, offered burnt offerings altar. lord smelled sweet savour; lord said heart, curse ground man's sake; imagination man's heart [is] evil youth; neither smite every thing living, done. earth remaineth, seedtime harvest, cold heat, summer winter, day night shall cease. god blessed noah sons, said unto them, fruitful, multiply, replenish earth. fear dread shall upon every beast earth, upon every fowl air, upon moveth [upon] earth, upon fishes sea; hand delivered. every moving thing liveth shall meat you; even green herb given things. flesh life thereof, [which is] blood thereof, shall ye eat. surely blood lives require; hand every beast require it, hand man; hand every man's brother require life man. whoso sheddeth man's blood, man shall blood shed: image god made man. you, ye fruitful, multiply; bring forth abundantly earth, multiply therein. god spake unto noah, sons him, saying, i, behold, establish covenant you, seed you; every living creature [is] you, fowl, cattle, every beast earth you; go ark, every beast earth. establish covenant you; neither shall flesh cut waters flood; neither shall flood destroy earth.page 5 genesis god said, [is] token covenant make every living creature [is] you, perpetual generations: set bow cloud, shall token covenant earth. shall come pass, bring cloud earth, bow shall seen cloud: remember covenant, [is] every living creature flesh; waters shall become flood destroy flesh. bow shall cloud; look upon it, may remember everlasting covenant god every living creature flesh [is] upon earth. god said unto noah, [is] token covenant, established flesh [is] upon earth. sons noah, went forth ark, shem, ham, japheth: ham father canaan. [are] three sons noah: whole earth overspread. noah began [to be] husbandman, planted vineyard: drank wine, drunken; uncovered within tent. ham, father canaan, saw nakedness father, told two brethren without. shem japheth took garment, laid [it] upon shoulders, went backward, covered nakedness father; faces [were] backward, saw father's nakedness. noah awoke wine, knew younger son done unto him. said, cursed [be] canaan; servant servants shall unto brethren. said, blessed [be] lord god shem; canaan shall servant. god shall enlarge japheth, shall dwell tents shem; canaan shall servant. noah lived flood three hundred fifty years. days noah nine hundred fifty years: died. [are] generations sons noah, shem, ham, japheth: unto sons born flood. sons japheth; gomer, magog, madai, javan, tubal, meshech, tiras. sons gomer; ashkenaz, riphath, togarmah. sons javan; elishah, tarshish, kittim, dodanim. isles gentiles divided lands; every one tongue, families, nations. sons ham; cush, mizraim, phut, canaan. sons cush; seba, havilah, sabtah, raamah, sabtechah: sons raamah; sheba, dedan. cush begat nimrod: began mighty one earth. mighty hunter lord: wherefore said, even nimrod mighty hunter lord. beginning kingdom babel, erech, accad, calneh, land shinar. land went forth asshur, builded nineveh, city rehoboth, calah, resen nineveh calah: [is] great city. mizraim begat ludim, anamim, lehabim, naphtuhim, pathrusim, casluhim, (out came philistim,) caphtorim. canaan begat sidon firstborn, heth, hivite, arkite, sinite, arvadite, zemarite, hamathite: afterward families canaanites spread abroad. border canaanites sidon, thou comest gerar, unto gaza; thou goest, unto sodom, gomorrah, admah, zeboim, even unto lasha. [are] sons ham, families, tongues, countries, [and] nations. unto shem also, father children eber, brother japheth elder, even [children] born. children shem; elam, asshur, arphaxad, lud, aram. children aram; uz, hul, gether, mash. arphaxad begat salah; salah begat eber. unto eber born two sons: name one [was] peleg; days earth divided; brother's name [was] joktan. joktan begat almodad, sheleph, hazar-maveth, jerah, obal, abimael, sheba, ophir, havilah, jobab: [were] sons joktan. dwelling mesha, thou goest unto sephar mount east. [are] sons shem, families, tongues, lands, nations. [are] families sons noah, generations, nations: nations divided earth flood. whole earth one language, one speech. came pass, journeyed east, found plain land shinar; dwelt there. said one another, go to, let us make brick, burn throughly. brick stone, slime morter. said, go to, let us build us city tower, whose top [may reach] unto heaven; let us make us name, lest scattered abroad upon face whole earth. lord came see city tower, children men builded. lord said, behold, people [is] one, one language; begin do: nothing restrained them, imagined do. go to, let us go down, confound language, may understand one another's speech. lord scattered abroad thence upon face earth: left build city. therefore name called babel; lord confound language earth: thence lord scatter abroad upon face earth. [are] generations shem: shem [was] hundred years old, begat arphaxad two years flood: shem lived begat arphaxad five hundred years, begat sons daughters. arphaxad lived five thirty years, begat salah: arphaxad lived begat salah four hundred three years, begat sons daughters. salah lived thirty years, begat eber: salah lived begat eber four hundred three years, begat sons daughters. eber lived four thirty years, begat peleg: eber lived begat peleg four hundred thirty years, begat sons daughters. peleg lived thirty years, begat reu: peleg lived begat reu two hundred nine years, begatgenesis page 6 sons daughters. reu lived two thirty years, begat serug: reu lived begat serug two hundred seven years, begat sons daughters. serug lived thirty years, begat nahor: serug lived begat nahor two hundred years, begat sons daughters. nahor lived nine twenty years, begat terah: nahor lived begat terah hundred nineteen years, begat sons daughters. terah lived seventy years, begat abram, nahor, haran. [are] generations terah: terah begat abram, nahor, haran; haran begat lot. haran died father terah land nativity, ur chaldees. abram nahor took wives: name abram's wife [was] sarai; name nahor's wife, milcah, daughter haran, father milcah, father iscah. sarai barren; [had] child. terah took abram son, lot son haran son's son, sarai daughter law, son abram's wife; went forth ur chaldees, go land canaan; came unto haran, dwelt there. days terah two hundred five years: terah died haran. lord said unto abram, get thee thy country, thy kindred, thy father's house, unto land shew thee: make thee great nation, bless thee, make thy name great; thou shalt blessing: bless bless thee, curse curseth thee: thee shall families earth blessed. abram departed, lord spoken unto him; lot went him: abram [was] seventy five years old departed haran. abram took sarai wife, lot brother's son, substance gathered, souls gotten haran; went forth go land canaan; land canaan came. abram passed land unto place sichem, unto plain moreh. canaanite [was] land. lord appeared unto abram, said, unto thy seed give land: builded altar unto lord, appeared unto him. removed thence unto mountain east bethel, pitched tent, [having] bethel west, hai east: builded altar unto lord, called upon name lord. abram journeyed, going still toward south. famine land: abram went egypt sojourn there; famine [was] grievous land. came pass, come near enter egypt, said unto sarai wife, behold now, know thou [art] fair woman look upon: therefore shall come pass, egyptians shall see thee, shall say, [is] wife: kill me, save thee alive. say, pray thee, thou [art] sister: may well thy sake; soul shall live thee. came pass, that, abram come egypt, egyptians beheld woman [was] fair. princes also pharaoh saw her, andcommended pharaoh: woman taken pharaoh's house. entreated abram well sake: sheep, oxen, asses, menservants, maidservants, asses, camels. lord plagued pharaoh house great plagues sarai abram's wife. pharaoh called abram, said, [is] [that] thou hast done unto me? didst thou tell [was] thy wife? saidst thou, [is] sister? might taken wife: therefore behold thy wife, take [her,] go thy way. pharaoh commanded [his] men concerning him: sent away, wife, had. abram went egypt, he, wife, had, lot him, south. abram [was] rich cattle, silver, gold. went journeys south even bethel, unto place tent beginning, bethel hai; unto place altar, made first: abram called name lord. lot also, went abram, flocks, herds, tents. land able bear them, might dwell together: substance great, could dwell together. strife herdmen abram's cattle herdmen lot's cattle: canaanite perizzite dwelled land. abram said unto lot, let strife, pray thee, thee, herdmen thy herdmen; [be] brethren. [is] whole land thee? separate thyself, pray thee, me: [thou wilt take] left hand, go right; [thou depart] right hand, go left. lot lifted eyes, beheld plain jordan, [was] well watered every where, lord destroyed sodom gomorrah, [even] garden lord, like land egypt, thou comest unto zoar. lot chose plain jordan; lot journeyed east: separated one other. abram dwelled land canaan, lot dwelled cities plain, pitched [his] tent toward sodom. men sodom [were] wicked sinners lord exceedingly. lord said unto abram, lot separated him, lift thine eyes, look place thou art northward, southward, eastward, westward: land thou seest, thee give it, thy seed ever. make thy seed dust earth: man number dust earth, [then] shall thy seed also numbered. arise, walk land length breadth it; give unto thee. abram removed [his] tent, came dwelt plain mamre, [is] hebron, built altar unto lord. came pass days amraphel king shinar, arioch king ellasar, chedorlaomer king elam, tidal king nations; [that these] made war bera king sodom, birsha king gomorrah, shinab king admah, shemeber king zeboiim, king bela, zoar. joined together vale siddim,page 7 genesis salt sea. twelve years served chedorlaomer, thirteenth year rebelled. fourteenth year came chedorlaomer, kings [were] him, smote rephaims ashteroth karnaim, zuzims ham, emims shaveh kiriathaim, horites mount seir, unto el-paran, [is] wilderness. returned, came en-mishpat, [is] kadesh, smote country amalekites, also amorites dwelt hazezon- tamar. went king sodom, king gomorrah, king admah, king zeboiim, king bela (the [is] zoar;) joined battle vale siddim; chedorlaomer king elam, tidal king nations, amraphel king shinar, arioch king ellasar; four kings five. vale siddim [was full of] slimepits; kings sodom gomorrah fled, fell there; remained fled mountain. took goods sodom gomorrah, victuals, went way. took lot, abram's brother's son, dwelt sodom, goods, departed. came one escaped, told abram hebrew; dwelt plain mamre amorite, brother eshcol, brother aner: [were] confederate abram. abram heard brother taken captive, armed trained [servants,] born house, three hundred eighteen, pursued [them] unto dan. divided them, servants, night, smote them, pursued unto hobah, [is] left hand damascus. brought back goods, also brought brother lot, goods, women also, people. king sodom went meet return slaughter chedorlaomer, kings [were] him, valley shaveh, [is] king's dale. melchizedek king salem brought forth bread wine: [was] priest high god. blessed him, said, blessed [be] abram high god, possessor heaven earth: blessed high god, hath delivered thine enemies thy hand. gave tithes all. king sodom said unto abram, give persons, take goods thyself. abram said king sodom, lift mine hand unto lord, high god, possessor heaven earth, [take] thread even shoelatchet, take thing [is] thine, lest thou shouldest say, made abram rich: save young men eaten, portion men went me, aner, eshcol, mamre; let take portion. things word lord came unto abram vision, saying, fear not, abram: [am] thy shield, [and] thy exceeding great reward. abram said, lord god, wilt thou give me, seeing go childless, steward house eliezer damascus? abram said, behold, thou hast given seed: and, lo, one born house mine heir. and, behold, word lord [came] unto him, saying, shall thine heir; shall come forth thine bowels shall thine heir. brought forth abroad, said, looknow toward heaven, tell stars, thou able number them: said unto him, shall thy seed be. believed lord; counted righteousness. said unto him, [am] lord brought thee ur chaldees, give thee land inherit it. said, lord god, whereby shall know shall inherit it? said unto him, take heifer three years old, goat three years old, ram three years old, turtledove, young pigeon. took unto these, divided midst, laid piece one another: birds divided not. fowls came upon carcases, abram drove away. sun going down, deep sleep fell upon abram; and, lo, horror great darkness fell upon him. said unto abram, know surety thy seed shall stranger land [that is] theirs, shall serve them; shall afflict four hundred years; also nation, shall serve, judge: afterward shall come great substance. thou shalt go thy fathers peace; thou shalt buried good old age. fourth generation shall come hither again: iniquity amorites [is] yet full. came pass, that, sun went down, dark, behold smoking furnace, burning lamp passed pieces. day lord made covenant abram, saying, unto thy seed given land, river egypt unto great river, river euphrates: kenites, kenizzites, kadmonites, hittites, perizzites, rephaims, amorites, canaanites, girgashites, jebusites. sarai abram's wife bare children: handmaid, egyptian, whose name [was] hagar. sarai said unto abram, behold now, lord hath restrained bearing: pray thee, go unto maid; may may obtain children her. abram hearkened voice sarai. sarai abram's wife took hagar maid egyptian, abram dwelt ten years land canaan, gave husband abram wife. went unto hagar, conceived: saw conceived, mistress despised eyes. sarai said unto abram, wrong [be] upon thee: given maid thy bosom; saw conceived, despised eyes: lord judge thee. abram said unto sarai, behold, thy maid [is] thy hand; pleaseth thee. sarai dealt hardly her, fled face. angel lord found fountain water wilderness, fountain way shur. said, hagar, sarai's maid, whence camest thou? whither wilt thou go? said, flee face mistress sarai. angel lord said unto her, return thy mistress, submit thyself hands. angel lord said unto her, multiply thy seed exceedingly, shall numbered multitude. angel lord said unto her, behold, thou [art] child, shalt bear son, shalt call name ishmael; lord hath heard thy affliction. wild man; hand [will be] every man, every man's hand him;genesis page 8 shall dwell presence brethren. called name lord spake unto her, thou god seest me: said, also looked seeth me? wherefore well called beer-lahai-roi; behold, [it is] kadesh bered. hagar bare abram son: abram called son's name, hagar bare, ishmael. abram [was] fourscore six years old, hagar bare ishmael abram. abram ninety years old nine, lord appeared abram, said unto him, [am] almighty god; walk me, thou perfect. make covenant thee, multiply thee exceedingly. abram fell face: god talked him, saying, me, behold, covenant [is] thee, thou shalt father many nations. neither shall thy name called abram, thy name shall abraham; father many nations made thee. make thee exceeding fruitful, make nations thee, kings shall come thee. establish covenant thee thy seed thee generations everlasting covenant, god unto thee, thy seed thee. give unto thee, thy seed thee, land wherein thou art stranger, land canaan, everlasting possession; god. god said unto abraham, thou shalt keep covenant therefore, thou, thy seed thee generations. [is] covenant, ye shall keep, thy seed thee; every man child among shall circumcised. ye shall circumcise flesh foreskin; shall token covenant betwixt you. eight days old shall circumcised among you, every man child generations, born house, bought money stranger, [is] thy seed. born thy house, bought thy money, must needs circumcised: covenant shall flesh everlasting covenant. uncircumcised man child whose flesh foreskin circumcised, soul shall cut people; hath broken covenant. god said unto abraham, sarai thy wife, thou shalt call name sarai, sarah [shall] name [be. ] bless her, give thee son also her: yea, bless her, shall [a mother] nations; kings people shall her. abraham fell upon face, laughed, said heart, shall [a child] born unto hundred years old? shall sarah, ninety years old, bear? abraham said unto god, ishmael might live thee! god said, sarah thy wife shall bear thee son indeed; thou shalt call name isaac: establish covenant everlasting covenant, [and] seed him. ishmael, heard thee: behold, blessed him, make fruitful, multiply exceedingly; twelve princes shall beget, make great nation. covenant establish isaac, sarah shall bear unto thee set time next year. left talking him, god went abraham. abraham took ishmael son, born house, bought money, every male among men abraham's house; ye shall pass on: therefore ye come servant. said, do, thou hast said. abraham hastened tent unto sarah, said, make ready quickly three measures fine meal, knead [it,] make cakes upon hearth. abraham ran unto herd, fetcht calf tender good, gave [it] unto young man; hasted dress it. took butter, milk, calf dressed, set [it] them; stood tree, eat. said unto him, [is] sarah thy wife? said, behold, tent. said, certainly return unto thee according time life; and, lo, sarah thy wife shall son. sarah heard [it] tent door, [was] behind him. abraham sarah [were] old [and] well stricken age; [and] ceased sarah manner women. therefore sarah laughed within herself, saying, waxed old shall pleasure, lord old also? lord said unto abraham, wherefore sarah laugh, saying, shall surety bear child, old? thing hard lord? time appointed return unto thee, according time life, sarah shall son. sarah denied, saying, laughed not; afraid. said, nay; thou didst laugh. men rose thence, looked toward sodom: abraham went bring way. lord said, shall hide abraham thing do; seeing abraham shall surely become great mighty nation, nations earth shall blessed him? know him, command children household him, shall keep way lord, justice judgment; lord may bring upon abraham hath spoken him. lord said, cry sodom gomorrah great, sin grievous; go now, see whether done altogether according cry it, come unto me; not, know. men turned faces thence, went toward sodom: abraham stood yet lord. abraham drew near, said, wilt thou also destroypage 9 genesis righteous wicked? peradventure fifty righteous within city: wilt thou also destroy spare place fifty righteous [are] therein? far thee manner, slay righteous wicked: righteous wicked, far thee: shall judge earth right? lord said, find sodom fifty righteous within city, spare place sakes. abraham answered said, behold now, taken upon speak unto lord, [am but] dust ashes: peradventure shall lack five fifty righteous: wilt thou destroy city [lack of] five? said, find forty five, destroy [it. ] spake unto yet again, said, peradventure shall forty found there. said, [it] forty's sake. said [unto him,] oh let lord angry, speak: peradventure shall thirty found there. said, [it,] find thirty there. said, behold now, taken upon speak unto lord: peradventure shall twenty found there. said, destroy [it] twenty's sake. said, oh let lord angry, speak yet once: peradventure ten shall found there. said, destroy [it] ten's sake. lord went way, soon left communing abraham: abraham returned unto place. came two angels sodom even; lot sat gate sodom: lot seeing [them] rose meet them; bowed face toward ground; said, behold now, lords, turn in, pray you, servant's house, tarry night, wash feet, ye shall rise early, go ways. said, nay; abide street night. pressed upon greatly; turned unto him, entered house; made feast, bake unleavened bread, eat. lay down, men city, [even] men sodom, compassed house round, old young, people every quarter: called unto lot, said unto him, [are] men came thee night? bring unto us, may know them. lot went door unto them, shut door him, said, pray you, brethren, wickedly. behold now, two daughters known man; let me, pray you, bring unto you, ye [is] good eyes: unto men nothing; therefore came shadow roof. said, stand back. said [again,] one [fellow] came sojourn, needs judge: deal worse thee, them. pressed sore upon man, [even] lot, came near break door. men put forth hand, pulled lot house them, shut door. smote men [were] door house blindness, small great: wearied find door. men said unto lot, hast thou besides? son law, thy sons, thy daughters, whatsoever thou hast city, bring [them] place: destroy place, cry waxen great face lord; lord hath sent us destroy it. lotwent out, spake unto sons law, married daughters, said, up, get place; lord destroy city. seemed one mocked unto sons law. morning arose, angels hastened lot, saying, arise, take thy wife, thy two daughters, here; lest thou consumed iniquity city. lingered, men laid hold upon hand, upon hand wife, upon hand two daughters; lord merciful unto him: brought forth, set without city. came pass, brought forth abroad, said, escape thy life; look behind thee, neither stay thou plain; escape mountain, lest thou consumed. lot said unto them, oh, so, lord: behold now, thy servant hath found grace thy sight, thou hast magnified thy mercy, thou hast shewed unto saving life; cannot escape mountain, lest evil take me, die: behold now, city near flee unto, little one: oh, let escape thither, ([is] little one?) soul shall live. said unto him, see, accepted thee concerning thing also, overthrow city, thou hast spoken. haste thee, escape thither; cannot thing till thou come thither. therefore name city called zoar. sun risen upon earth lot entered zoar. lord rained upon sodom upon gomorrah brimstone fire lord heaven; overthrew cities, plain, inhabitants cities, grew upon ground. wife looked back behind him, became pillar salt. abraham gat early morning place stood lord: looked toward sodom gomorrah, toward land plain, beheld, and, lo, smoke country went smoke furnace. came pass, god destroyed cities plain, god remembered abraham, sent lot midst overthrow, overthrew cities lot dwelt. lot went zoar, dwelt mountain, two daughters him; feared dwell zoar: dwelt cave, two daughters. firstborn said unto younger, father [is] old, [there is] man earth come unto us manner earth: come, let us make father drink wine, lie him, may preserve seed father. made father drink wine night: firstborn went in, lay father; perceived lay down, arose. came pass morrow, firstborn said unto younger, behold, lay yesternight father: let us make drink wine night also; go thou in, [and] lie him, may preserve seed father. made father drink wine night also: younger arose, lay him;genesis page 10 perceived lay down, arose. thus daughters lot child father. firstborn bare son, called name moab: [is] father moabites unto day. younger, also bare son, called name benammi: [is] father children ammon unto day. abraham journeyed thence toward south country, dwelled kadesh shur, sojourned gerar. abraham said sarah wife, [is] sister: abimelech king gerar sent, took sarah. god came abimelech dream night, said him, behold, thou [art but] dead man, woman thou hast taken; [is] man's wife. abimelech come near her: said, lord, wilt thou slay also righteous nation? said unto me, [is] sister? she, even said, [is] brother: integrity heart innocency hands done this. god said unto dream, yea, know thou didst integrity thy heart; also withheld thee sinning me: therefore suffered thee touch her. therefore restore man [his] wife; [is] prophet, shall pray thee, thou shalt live: thou restore [her] not, know thou thou shalt surely die, thou, [are] thine. therefore abimelech rose early morning, called servants, told things ears: men sore afraid. abimelech called abraham, said unto him, hast thou done unto us? offended thee, thou hast brought kingdom great sin? thou hast done deeds unto ought done. abimelech said unto abraham, sawest thou, thou hast done thing? abraham said, thought, surely fear god [is] place; [is] betwixt thee? bury therefore thy dead. abraham hearkened unto ephron; abraham weighed ephron silver, named audience sons heth, four hundred shekels silver, current [money] merchant. field ephron, [was] machpelah, [was] mamre, field, cave [was] therein, trees [were] field, [were] borders round about, made sure unto abraham possession presence children heth, went gate city. this, abraham buried sarah wife cave field machpelah mamre: [is] hebron land canaan. field, cave [is] therein, made sure unto abraham possession buryingplace sons heth. abraham old, [and] well stricken age: lord blessed abraham things. abraham said unto eldest servant house, ruled had, put, pray thee, thy hand thigh: make thee swear lord, god heaven, god earth, thou shalt take wife unto son daughters canaanites, among dwell: thou shalt go unto country, kindred, take wife unto son isaac. servant said unto him, peradventure woman willing follow unto land: must needs bring thy son unto land whence thou camest? abraham saidgenesis page 12 unto him, beware thou thou bring son thither again. lord god heaven, took father's house, land kindred, spake unto me, sware unto me, saying, unto thy seed give land; [are] days years abraham's life lived, hundred threescore fifteen years. abraham gave ghost, died good old age, old man, full [of years;] gathered people. sons isaac ishmael buried cave machpelah, field ephron son zohar hittite, [is] mamre; field abraham purchased sons heth: abraham buried, sarah wife. came pass death abraham, god blessed son isaac; isaac dwelt well lahai-roi. [are] generations ishmael, abraham's son, hagar egyptian, sarah's handmaid, bare unto abraham: [are] names sons ishmael, names, according generations: firstborn ishmael, nebajoth; kedar, adbeel, mibsam, mishma, dumah, massa, hadar, tema, jetur, naphish, kedemah: [are] sons ishmael, [are] names, towns, castles; twelve princes according nations. [are] years life ishmael, hundred thirty seven years: gave ghost died; gathered unto people. dwelt havilah unto shur, [is] egypt, thou goest toward assyria: [and] died presence brethren. [are] generations isaac, abraham's son: abraham begat isaac: isaac forty years old took rebekah wife, daughter bethuel syrian padan-aram, sister laban syrian. isaac intreated lord wife, [was] barren: lord intreated him, rebekah wife conceived. children struggled together within her; said, [it be] so, [am] thus? went enquire lord. lord said unto her, two nations [are] thy womb, two manner people shall separated thy bowels; [the one] people shall stronger [the other] people; elder shall serve younger. days delivered fulfilled, behold, [there were] twins womb. first came red, like hairy garment; called name esau. came brother out, hand took hold esau's heel; name called jacob: isaac [was] threescore years old bare them. boys grew: esau cunning hunter, man field; jacob [was] plain man, dwelling tents. isaac loved esau, eat [his] venison: rebekah loved jacob. jacob sod pottage: esau came field, [was] faint: esau said jacob, feed me, pray thee, red [pottage;] [am] faint: therefore name called edom. jacob said, sell day thy birthright. esau said, behold, [am] point die: profit shall birthright me? jacob said, swear day; sware unto him: sold birthright unto jacob. jacob gave esau bread pottage lentiles; eat drink, rose up, went way: thus esau despised [his] birthright. famine land, beside first famine days abraham. isaac went unto abimelech king philistines unto gerar. lord appeared unto him, said, go egypt; dwell land shall tell thee of: sojourn land, thee, bless thee; unto thee, unto thy seed, give countries, perform oath sware unto abraham thy father; make thy seed multiply stars heaven, give unto thy seed countries; thy seed shall nations earth blessed; abraham obeyed voice, kept charge, commandments, statutes, laws. men place asked [him] wife; said, [is] sister: feared say, [she is] wife; lest, [said he,] men place kill rebekah; [was] fair look upon. came pass, long time, abimelech king philistines looked window, saw, and,genesis page 14 behold, isaac [was] sporting rebekah wife. abimelech called isaac, said, behold, surety [is] thy wife: saidst thou, [is] sister? isaac said unto him, said, lest die her. abimelech said, [is] thou hast done unto us? one people might lightly lien thy wife, thou shouldest brought guiltiness upon us. abimelech charged [his] people, saying, toucheth man wife shall surely put death. isaac sowed land, received year hundredfold: lord blessed him. man waxed great, went forward, grew became great: possession flocks, possession herds, great store servants: philistines envied him. wells father's servants digged days abraham father, philistines stopped them, filled earth. abimelech said unto isaac, go us; thou art much mightier we. isaac departed thence, pitched tent valley gerar, dwelt there. isaac digged wells water, digged days abraham father; philistines stopped death abraham: called names names father called them. isaac's servants digged valley, found well springing water. herdmen gerar strive isaac's herdmen, saying, water [is] ours: called name well esek; strove him. digged another well, strove also: called name sitnah. removed thence, digged another well; strove not: called name rehoboth; said, lord hath made room us, shall fruitful land. went thence beer-sheba. lord appeared unto night, said, [am] god abraham thy father: fear not, [am] thee, bless thee, multiply thy seed servant abraham's sake. builded altar there, called upon name lord pitched tent there: isaac's servants digged well. abimelech went gerar, ahuzzath one friends, phichol chief captain army. isaac said unto them, wherefore come ye me, seeing ye hate me, sent away you? said, saw certainly lord thee: said, let oath betwixt us, [even] betwixt us thee, let us make covenant thee; thou wilt us hurt, touched thee, done unto thee nothing good, sent thee away peace: thou [art] blessed lord. made feast, eat drink. rose betimes morning, sware one another: isaac sent away, departed peace. came pass day, isaac's servants came, told concerning well digged, said unto him, found water. called shebah: therefore name city [is] beer-sheba unto day. esau forty years old took wife judith daughter beeri hittite, bashemath daughter elon hittite: griefof mind unto isaac rebekah. came pass, isaac old, eyes dim, could see, called esau eldest son, said unto him, son: said unto him, behold, [here am] i. said, behold now, old, know day death: therefore take, pray thee, thy weapons, thy quiver thy bow, go field, take [some] venison; make savoury meat, love, bring [it] me, may eat; soul may bless thee die. rebekah heard isaac spake esau son. esau went field hunt [for] venison, [and] bring [it. ] rebekah spake unto jacob son, saying, behold, heard thy father speak unto esau thy brother, saying, bring venison, make savoury meat, may eat, bless thee lord death. therefore, son, obey voice according command thee. go flock, fetch thence two good kids goats; make savoury meat thy father, loveth: thou shalt bring [it] thy father, may eat, may bless thee death. jacob said rebekah mother, behold, esau brother [is] hairy man, [am] smooth man: father peradventure feel me, shall seem deceiver; shall bring curse upon me, blessing. mother said unto him, upon [be] thy curse, son: obey voice, go fetch [them. ] went, fetched, brought [them] mother: mother made savoury meat, father loved. rebekah took goodly raiment eldest son esau, [were] house, put upon jacob younger son: put skins kids goats upon hands, upon smooth neck: gave savoury meat bread, prepared, hand son jacob. came unto father, said, father: said, [am] i; [art] thou, son? and, behold, hath taken away blessing. said, hast thou reserved blessing me? isaac answered said unto esau, behold, made thy lord, brethren given servants; corn wine sustained him: shall unto thee, son? esau said unto father, hast thou one blessing, father? bless me, [even] also, father. esau lifted voice, wept. isaac father answered said unto him, behold, thy dwelling shall fatness earth, dew heaven above; thy sword shalt thou live, shalt serve thy brother; shall come pass thou shalt dominion, thou shalt break yoke thy neck. esau hated jacob blessing wherewith father blessed him: esau said heart, days mourning father hand; nation company nations shall thee, kings shall come thy loins; land gave abraham isaac, thee give it, thy seed thee give land. god went place talked him. jacob set pillar place talked him, [even] pillar stone: poured drink offering thereon, poured oil thereon. jacob called name place god spake him, bethel. journeyed bethel; little way come ephrath: rachel travailed, hard labour. came pass, hard labour, midwife said unto her, fear not; thou shalt son also. came pass, soul departing, (for died) called name ben-oni: father called benjamin. rachel died, buried way ephrath, [is] bethlehem. jacob set pillar upon grave: [is] pillar rachel's grave unto day. israel journeyed, spread tent beyond tower edar. came pass, israel dwelt land, reuben went lay bilhah father's concubine: israel heard [it.] sons jacob twelve: sons leah; reuben, jacob's firstborn, simeon, levi, judah, issachar, zebulun: sons rachel; joseph, benjamin: sons bilhah, rachel's handmaid; dan, naphtali: sons zilpah, leah's handmaid; gad, asher: [are] sons jacob, born padan-aram. jacob came unto isaac father unto mamre, unto city arbah, [is] hebron, abraham isaac sojourned. days isaac hundred fourscore years. isaac gave ghost, died, gathered unto people, [being] old full days: sons esau jacob buried him. [are] generations esau, [is] edom. esau took wives daughters canaan; adah daughter elon hittite, aholibamah daughter anah daughter zibeon hivite; bashemath ishmael's daughter, sister nebajoth. adah bare esau eliphaz; bashemath bare reuel; aholibamah bare jeush, jaalam, korah: [are] sons esau, born unto land canaan. esau took wives, sons, daughters, persons house, cattle, beasts, substance, got land canaan; went country face hisbrother jacob. riches might dwell together; land wherein strangers could bear cattle. thus dwelt esau mount seir: esau [is] edom. [are] generations esau father edomites mount seir: [are] names esau's sons; eliphaz son adah wife esau, reuel son bashemath wife esau. sons eliphaz teman, omar, zepho, gatam, kenaz. timna concubine eliphaz esau's son; bare eliphaz amalek: [were] sons adah esau's wife. [are] sons reuel; nahath, zerah, shammah, mizzah: sons bashemath esau's wife. sons aholibamah, daughter anah daughter zibeon, esau's wife: bare esau jeush, jaalam, korah. [were] dukes sons esau: sons eliphaz firstborn [son] esau; duke teman, duke omar, duke zepho, duke kenaz, duke korah, duke gatam, [and] duke amalek: [are] dukes [that came] eliphaz land edom; [were] sons adah. [are] sons reuel esau's son; duke nahath, duke zerah, duke shammah, duke mizzah: [are] dukes [that came] reuel land edom; [are] sons bashemath esau's wife. [are] sons aholibamah esau's wife; duke jeush, duke jaalam, duke korah: [were] dukes [that came] aholibamah daughter anah, esau's wife. [are] sons esau, [is] edom, [are] dukes. [are] sons seir horite, inhabited land; lotan, shobal, zibeon, anah, dishon, ezer, dishan: [are] dukes horites, children seir land edom. children lotan hori hemam; lotan's sister [was] timna. children shobal [were] these; alvan, manahath, ebal, shepho, onam. [are] children zibeon; ajah, anah: [was that] anah found mules wilderness, fed asses zibeon father. children anah [were] these; dishon, aholibamah daughter anah. [are] children dishon; hemdan, eshban, ithran, cheran. children ezer [are] these; bilhan, zaavan, akan. children dishan [are] these: uz, aran. [are] dukes [that came] horites; duke lotan, duke shobal, duke zibeon, duke anah, duke dishon, duke ezer, duke dishan: [are] dukes [that came] hori, among dukes land seir. [are] kings reigned land edom, reigned king children israel. bela son beor reigned edom: name city [was] dinhabah. bela died, jobab son zerah bozrah reigned stead. jobab died, husham land temani reigned stead. husham died, hadad son bedad, smote midian field moab, reigned stead: name city [was] avith. hadad died, samlahpage 21 genesis masrekah reigned stead. samlah died, saul rehoboth [by] river reigned stead. saul died, baal-hanan son achbor reigned stead. baal-hanan son achbor died, hadar reigned stead: name city [was] pau; wife's name [was] mehetabel, daughter matred, daughter mezahab. [are] names dukes [that came] esau, according families, places, names; duke timnah, duke alvah, duke jetheth, duke aholibamah, duke elah, duke pinon, duke kenaz, duke teman, duke mibzar, duke magdiel, duke iram: [be] dukes edom, according habitations land possession: [is] esau father edomites. jacob dwelt land wherein father stranger, land canaan. [are] generations jacob. joseph, [being] seventeen years old, feeding flock brethren; lad [was] sons bilhah, sons zilpah, father's wives: joseph brought unto father evil report. israel loved joseph children, [was] son old age: made coat [many] colours. brethren saw father loved brethren, hated him, could speak peaceably unto him. joseph dreamed dream, told [it] brethren: hated yet more. said unto them, hear, pray you, dream dreamed: for, behold, [were] binding sheaves field, and, lo, sheaf arose, also stood upright; and, behold, sheaves stood round about, made obeisance sheaf. brethren said him, shalt thou indeed reign us? shalt thou indeed dominion us? hated yet dreams, words. dreamed yet another dream, told brethren, said, behold, dreamed dream more; and, behold, sun moon eleven stars made obeisance me. told [it] father, brethren: father rebuked him, said unto him, [is] dream thou hast dreamed? shall thy mother thy brethren indeed come bow thee earth? brethren envied him; father observed saying. brethren went feed father's flock shechem. israel said unto joseph, thy brethren feed [the flock] shechem? come, send thee unto them. said him, [am] i. said him, go, pray thee, see whether well thy brethren, well flocks; bring word again. sent vale hebron, came shechem. certain man found him, and, behold, [he was] wandering field: man asked him, saying, seekest thou? said, seek brethren: tell me, pray thee, feed [their flocks. ] man said, departed hence; heard say, let us go dothan. joseph went brethren, found dothan. saw afar off, even came near unto them, conspired slay him. said one another, behold, dreamer cometh. come therefore, let us slay him, cast pit, say, evil beast hath devoured him: shall see become dreams. reuben heard [it,] delivered hands; said, let us kill him. reuben said unto them, shed blood, [but] cast pit wilderness, lay hand upon him; might rid hands, deliver father again. came pass, joseph come unto brethren, stript joseph coat, [his] coat [many] colours [was] him; took him, cast pit: pit [was] empty, [there was] water it. sat eat bread: lifted eyes looked, and, behold, company ishmeelites came gilead camels bearing spicery balm myrrh, going carry [it] egypt. judah said unto brethren, profit [is it] slay brother, conceal blood? come, let us sell ishmeelites, let hand upon him; [is] brother [and] flesh. brethren content. passed midianites merchantmen; drew lifted joseph pit, sold joseph ishmeelites twenty [pieces] silver: brought joseph egypt. reuben returned unto pit; and, behold, joseph [was] pit; rent clothes. returned unto brethren, said, child [is] not; i, whither shall go? took joseph's coat, killed kid goats, dipped coat blood; sent coat [many] colours, brought [it] father; said, found: know whether [be] thy son's coat no. knew it, said, [it is] son's coat; evil beast hath devoured him; joseph without doubt rent pieces. jacob rent clothes, put sackcloth upon loins, mourned son many days. sons daughters rose comfort him; refused comforted; said, go grave unto son mourning. thus father wept him. midianites sold egypt unto potiphar, officer pharaoh's, [and] captain guard. came pass time, judah went brethren, turned certain adullamite, whose name [was] hirah. judah saw daughter certain canaanite, whose name [was] shuah; took her, went unto her. conceived, bare son; called name er. conceived again, bare son; called name onan. yet conceived, bare son; called name shelah: chezib, bare him. judah took wife er firstborn, whose name [was] tamar. er, judah's firstborn, wicked sight lord; lord slew him. judah said unto onan, go unto thy brother's wife, marry her, raise seed thy brother. onan knew seed his; came pass, went unto brother's wife, spilled [it] ground, lest give seed brother. thing displeased lord: wherefore slew also. said judah tamar daughter law, remain widow thy father's house, till shelah son grown: said, lestgenesis page 22 peradventure die also, brethren [did.] tamar went dwelt father's house. process time daughter shuah judah's wife died; judah comforted, went unto sheepshearers timnath, friend hirah adullamite. told tamar, saying, behold thy father law goeth timnath shear sheep. put widow's garments her, covered vail, wrapped herself, sat open place, [is] way timnath; saw shelah grown, given unto wife. judah saw her, thought [to be] harlot; covered face. turned unto way, said, go to, pray thee, let come unto thee; (for knew [was] daughter law.) said, wilt thou give me, thou mayest come unto me? said, send [thee] kid flock. said, wilt thou give [me] pledge, till thou send [it? ] said, pledge shall give thee? said, thy signet, thy bracelets, thy staff [is] thine hand. gave [it] her, came unto her, conceived him. arose, went away, laid vail her, put garments widowhood. judah sent kid hand friend adullamite, receive [his] pledge woman's hand: found not. asked men place, saying, [is] harlot, [was] openly way side? said, harlot [place. ] returned judah, said, cannot find her; also men place said, [that] harlot [place. ] judah said, let take [it] her, lest shamed: behold, sent kid, thou hast found her. came pass three months after, told judah, saying, tamar thy daughter law hath played harlot; also, behold, [is] child whoredom. judah said, bring forth, let burnt. [was] brought forth, sent father law, saying, man, whose [are, am] child: said, discern, pray thee, whose [are] these, signet, bracelets, staff. judah acknowledged [them,] said, hath righteous i; gave shelah son. knew more. came pass time travail, that, behold, twins [were] womb. came pass, travailed, [the one] put [his] hand: midwife took bound upon hand scarlet thread, saying, came first, came pass, drew back hand, that, behold, brother came out: said, hast thou broken forth? [this] breach [be] upon thee: therefore name called pharez. afterward came brother, scarlet thread upon hand: name called zarah. joseph brought egypt; potiphar, officer pharaoh, captain guard, egyptian, bought hands ishmeelites, brought thither. lord joseph, prosperous man; house master egyptian. master saw lord [was] him, lord made [that] prosper hand. joseph found grace sight, served him: hemade overseer house, put hand. came pass time [that] made overseer house, had, lord blessed egyptian's house joseph's sake; blessing lord upon house, field. left joseph's hand; knew ought had, save bread eat. joseph [a] goodly [person,] well favoured. came pass things, master's wife cast eyes upon joseph; said, lie me. refused, said unto master's wife, behold, master wotteth [is] house, hath committed hath hand; [there is] none greater house i; neither hath kept back thing thee, thou [art] wife: great wickedness, sin god? came pass, spake joseph day day, hearkened unto her, lie her, [or] her. came pass time, [joseph] went house business; [there was] none men house within. caught garment, saying, lie me: left garment hand, fled, got out. came pass, saw left garment hand, fled forth, called unto men house, spake unto them, saying, see, hath brought hebrew unto us mock us; came unto lie me, cried loud voice: came pass, heard lifted voice cried, left garment me, fled, got out. laid garment her, lord came home. spake unto according words, saying, hebrew servant, thou hast brought unto us, came unto mock me: came pass, lifted voice cried, left garment me, fled out. came pass, master heard words wife, spake unto him, saying, manner thy servant me; wrath kindled. joseph's master took him, put prison, place king's prisoners [were] bound: prison. lord joseph, shewed mercy, gave favour sight keeper prison. keeper prison committed joseph's hand prisoners [were] prison; whatsoever there, doer [of it. ] keeper prison looked thing [that was] hand; lord him, [that] did, lord made [it] prosper. came pass things, [that] butler king egypt [his] baker offended lord king egypt. pharaoh wroth two [of] officers, chief butlers, chief bakers. put ward house captain guard, prison, place joseph [was] bound. captain guard charged joseph them, served them: continued season ward. dreamed dream them, man dream one night, man according interpretation dream, butler baker king egypt, [were] bound prison.page 23 genesis joseph came unto morning, looked upon them, and, behold, [were] sad. asked pharaoh's officers [were] ward lord's house, saying, wherefore look ye [so] sadly day? said unto him, dreamed dream, [there is] interpreter it. joseph said unto them, [do] interpretations [belong] god? tell [them,] pray you. chief butler told dream joseph, said him, dream, behold, vine [was] me; vine [were] three branches: [was] though budded, [and] blossoms shot forth; clusters thereof brought forth ripe grapes: pharaoh's cup [was] hand: took grapes, pressed pharaoh's cup, gave cup pharaoh's hand. joseph said unto him, [is] interpretation it: three branches [are] three days: yet within three days shall pharaoh lift thine head, restore thee unto thy place: thou shalt deliver pharaoh's cup hand, former manner thou wast butler. think shall well thee, shew kindness, pray thee, unto me, make mention unto pharaoh, bring house: indeed stolen away land hebrews: also done nothing put dungeon. chief baker saw interpretation good, said unto joseph, also [was] dream, and, behold, [i had] three white baskets head: uppermost basket [there was] manner bakemeats pharaoh; birds eat basket upon head. joseph answered said, [is] interpretation thereof: three baskets [are] three days: yet within three days shall pharaoh lift thy head thee, shall hang thee tree; birds shall eat thy flesh thee. came pass third day, [which was] pharaoh's birthday, made feast unto servants: lifted head chief butler chief baker among servants. restored chief butler unto butlership again; gave cup pharaoh's hand: hanged chief baker: joseph interpreted them. yet chief butler remember joseph, forgat him. came pass end two full years, pharaoh dreamed: and, behold, stood river. and, behold, came river seven well favoured kine fatfleshed; fed meadow. and, behold, seven kine came river, ill favoured leanfleshed; stood [other] kine upon brink river. ill favoured leanfleshed kine eat seven well favoured fat kine. pharaoh awoke. slept dreamed second time: and, behold, seven ears corn came upon one stalk, rank good. and, behold, seven thin ears blasted east wind sprung them. seven thin ears devoured seven rank full ears. pharaoh awoke, and, behold, [it was] dream. came pass morning spirit troubled; sent called magicians egypt, wise men thereof: pharaoh told dream; [there was] none could interpret unto pharaoh. spake chief butler unto pharaoh, saying, remember faults day: pharaoh waswroth servants, put ward captain guard's house, [me] chief baker: dreamed dream one night, he; dreamed man according interpretation dream. [there was] us young man, hebrew, servant captain guard; told him, interpreted us dreams; man according dream interpret. came pass, interpreted us, was; restored unto mine office, hanged. pharaoh sent called joseph, brought hastily dungeon: shaved [himself,] changed raiment, came unto pharaoh. pharaoh said unto joseph, dreamed dream, [there is] none interpret it: heard say thee, [that] thou canst understand dream interpret it. joseph answered pharaoh, saying, [it is] me: god shall give pharaoh answer peace. pharaoh said unto joseph, dream, behold, stood upon bank river: and, behold, came river seven kine, fatfleshed well favoured; fed meadow: and, behold, seven kine came them, poor ill favoured leanfleshed, never saw land egypt badness: lean ill favoured kine eat first seven fat kine: eaten up, could known eaten them; [were] still ill favoured, beginning. awoke. saw dream, and, behold, seven ears came one stalk, full good: and, behold, seven ears, withered, thin, [and] blasted east wind, sprung them: thin ears devoured seven good ears: told [this] unto magicians; [there was] none could declare [it] me. joseph said unto pharaoh, dream pharaoh [is] one: god hath shewed pharaoh [is] do. seven good kine [are] seven years; seven good ears [are] seven years: dream [is] one. seven thin ill favoured kine came [are] seven years; seven empty ears blasted east wind shall seven years famine. [is] thing spoken unto pharaoh: god [is] sheweth unto pharaoh. behold, come seven years great plenty throughout land egypt: shall arise seven years famine; plenty shall forgotten land egypt; famine shall consume land; plenty shall known land reason famine following; [shall be] grievous. dream doubled unto pharaoh twice; [it is] thing [is] established god, god shortly bring pass. therefore let pharaoh look man discreet wise, set land egypt. let pharaoh [this,] let appoint officers land, take fifth part land egypt seven plenteous years. let gather food good years come, lay corn hand pharaoh, let keep food cities. food shall store land seven years famine, shall land egypt; land perish famine. thing good eyes pharaoh, eyes servants. pharaoh said unto servants, find [such one] [is,]genesis page 24 man spirit god is? pharaoh said unto joseph, forasmuch god hath shewed thee this, [there is] none discreet wise thou [art: ] thou shalt house, according unto thy word shall people ruled: throne greater thou. pharaoh said unto joseph, see, set thee land egypt. pharaoh took ring hand, put upon joseph's hand, arrayed vestures fine linen, put gold chain neck; made ride second chariot had; cried him, bow knee: made [ruler] land egypt. pharaoh said unto joseph, [am] pharaoh, without thee shall man lift hand foot land egypt. pharaoh called joseph's name zaphnath-paaneah; gave wife asenath daughter poti- pherah priest on. joseph went [all] land egypt. joseph [was] thirty years old stood pharaoh king egypt. joseph went presence pharaoh, went throughout land egypt. seven plenteous years earth brought forth handfuls. gathered food seven years, land egypt, laid food cities: food field, [was] round every city, laid same. joseph gathered corn sand sea, much, left numbering; [it was] without number. unto joseph born two sons years famine came, asenath daughter poti- pherah priest bare unto him. joseph called name firstborn manasseh: god, [said he,] hath made forget toil, father's house. name second called ephraim: god hath caused fruitful land affliction. seven years plenteousness, land egypt, ended. seven years dearth began come, according joseph said: dearth lands; land egypt bread. land egypt famished, people cried pharaoh bread: pharaoh said unto egyptians, go unto joseph; saith you, do. famine face earth: joseph opened storehouses, sold unto egyptians; famine waxed sore land egypt. countries came egypt joseph buy [corn;] famine sore lands. jacob saw corn egypt, jacob said unto sons, ye look one upon another? said, behold, heard corn egypt: get thither, buy us thence; may live, die. joseph's ten brethren went buy corn egypt. benjamin, joseph's brother, jacob sent brethren; said, lest peradventure mischief befall him. sons israel came buy [corn] among came: famine land canaan. joseph [was] governor land, [and] [it was] sold people land: joseph's brethren came, bowed [with] faces earth. joseph saw brethren, knew them, made strange unto them, spake roughly unto them;and said unto them, whence come ye? said, land canaan buy food. joseph knew brethren, knew him. joseph remembered dreams dreamed them, said unto them, ye [are] spies; see nakedness land ye come. said unto him, nay, lord, buy food thy servants come. [are] one man's sons; [are] true [men,] thy servants spies. said unto them, nay, see nakedness land ye come. said, thy servants [are] twelve brethren, sons one man land canaan; and, behold, youngest [is] day father, one [is] not. joseph said unto them, [is it] spake unto you, saying, ye [are] spies: hereby ye shall proved: life pharaoh ye shall go forth hence, except youngest brother come hither. send one you, let fetch brother, ye shall kept prison, words may proved, whether [there any] truth you: else life pharaoh surely ye [are] spies. put together ward three days. joseph said unto third day, do, live; [for] fear god: ye [be] true [men,] let one brethren bound house prison: go ye, carry corn famine houses: bring youngest brother unto me; shall words verified, ye shall die. so. said one another, [are] verily guilty concerning brother, saw anguish soul, besought us, would hear; therefore distress come upon us. reuben answered them, saying, spake unto you, saying, sin child; ye would hear? therefore, behold, also blood required. knew joseph understood [them;] spake unto interpreter. turned them, wept; returned again, communed them, took simeon, bound eyes. joseph commanded fill sacks corn, restore every man's money sack, give provision way: thus unto them. laded asses corn, departed thence. one opened sack give ass provender inn, espied money; for, behold, [was] sack's mouth. said unto brethren, money restored; and, lo, [it is] even sack: heart failed [them,] afraid, saying one another, [is] [that] god hath done unto us? came unto jacob father unto land canaan, told befell unto them; saying, man, [who is] lord land, spake roughly us, took us spies country. said unto him, [are] true [men;] spies: [be] twelve brethren, sons father; one [is] not, youngest [is] day father land canaan. man, lord country, said unto us, hereby shall know ye [are] true [men;] leave one brethren [here] me, take [food for] famine households, gone: bring youngest brother unto me: shall know ye [are] spies, [that] ye [are] true [men: so] deliver brother, ye shall traffick land.page 25 genesis came pass emptied sacks, that, behold, every man's bundle money [was] sack: [both] father saw bundles money, afraid. jacob father said unto them, ye bereaved [of children:] joseph [is] not, simeon [is] not, ye take benjamin [away:] things me. reuben spake unto father, saying, slay two sons, bring thee: deliver hand, bring thee again. said, son shall go you; brother dead, left alone: mischief befall way ye go, shall ye bring gray hairs sorrow grave. came pass, eaten corn brought egypt, father said unto them, go again, buy us little food. judah spake unto him, saying, man solemnly protest unto us, saying, ye shall see face, except brother [be] you. thou wilt send brother us, go buy thee food: thou wilt send [him,] go down: man said unto us, ye shall see face, except brother [be] you. israel said, wherefore dealt ye ill me, tell man whether ye yet brother? said, man asked us straitly state, kindred, saying, [is] father yet alive? ye [another] brother? told according tenor words: could certainly know would say, bring brother down? judah said unto israel father, send lad me, arise go; may live, die, we, thou, [and] also little ones. surety him; hand shalt thou require him: bring unto thee, set thee, let bear blame ever: except lingered, surely returned second time. father israel said unto them, [it must be] now, this; take best fruits land vessels, carry man present, little balm, little honey, spices, myrrh, nuts, almonds: take double money hand; money brought mouth sacks, carry [it] hand; peradventure [was] oversight: take also brother, arise, go unto man: god almighty give mercy man, may send away brother, benjamin. bereaved [of children,] bereaved. men took present, took double money hand, benjamin; rose up, went egypt, stood joseph. joseph saw benjamin them, said ruler house, bring [these] men home, slay, make ready; [these] men shall dine noon. man joseph bade; man brought men joseph's house. men afraid, brought joseph's house; said, money returned sacks first time brought in; may seek occasion us, fall upon us, take us bondmen, asses. came near steward joseph's house, communed door house, said, sir, came indeed first time buy food: came pass, came inn, opened sacks, and, behold, [every] man's money [was] mouth hissack, money full weight: brought hand. money brought hands buy food: cannot tell put money sacks. said, peace [be] you, fear not: god, god father, hath given treasure sacks: money. brought simeon unto them. man brought men joseph's house, gave [them] water, washed feet; gave asses provender. made ready present joseph came noon: heard eat bread there. joseph came home, brought present [was] hand house, bowed earth. asked [their] welfare, said, [is] father well, old man ye spake? [is] yet alive? answered, thy servant father [is] good health, [is] yet alive. bowed heads, made obeisance. lifted eyes, saw brother benjamin, mother's son, said, [is] younger brother, ye spake unto me? said, god gracious unto thee, son. joseph made haste; bowels yearn upon brother: sought [where] weep; entered [his] chamber, wept there. washed face, went out, refrained himself, said, set bread. set himself, themselves, egyptians, eat him, themselves: egyptians might eat bread hebrews; [is] abomination unto egyptians. sat him, firstborn according birthright, youngest according youth: men marvelled one another. took [and sent] messes unto him: benjamin's mess five times much theirs. drank, merry him. commanded steward house, saying, fill men's sacks [with] food, much carry, put every man's money sack's mouth. put cup, silver cup, sack's mouth youngest, corn money. according word joseph spoken. soon morning light, men sent away, asses. [and] gone city, [and] [yet] far off, joseph said unto steward, up, follow men; thou dost overtake them, say unto them, wherefore ye rewarded evil good? [is] [it] lord drinketh, whereby indeed divineth? ye done evil doing. overtook them, spake unto words. said unto him, wherefore saith lord words? god forbid thy servants according thing: behold, money, found sacks' mouths, brought unto thee land canaan: steal thy lord's house silver gold? whomsoever thy servants found, let die, also lord's bondmen. said, also [let] [be] according unto words; found shall servant; ye shall blameless. speedily took every man sack ground, opened every man sack. searched, [and] began eldest, left youngest: cup foundgenesis page 26 benjamin's sack. rent clothes, laded every man ass, returned city. judah brethren came joseph's house; [was] yet there: fell ground. joseph said unto them, deed [is] ye done? wot ye man certainly divine? judah said, shall say unto lord? shall speak? shall clear ourselves? god hath found iniquity thy servants: behold, [are] lord's servants, we, [he] also cup found. said, god forbid so: [but] man whose hand cup found, shall servant; you, get peace unto father. judah came near unto him, said, oh lord, let thy servant, pray thee, speak word lord's ears, let thine anger burn thy servant: thou [art] even pharaoh. lord asked servants, saying, ye father, brother? said unto lord, father, old man, child old age, little one; brother dead, alone left mother, father loveth him. thou saidst unto thy servants, bring unto me, may set mine eyes upon him. said unto lord, lad cannot leave father: [if] leave father, [his father] would die. thou saidst unto thy servants, except youngest brother come you, ye shall see face more. came pass came unto thy servant father, told words lord. father said, go again, [and] buy us little food. said, cannot go down: youngest brother us, go down: may see man's face, except youngest brother [be] us. thy servant father said unto us, ye know wife bare two [sons: ] one went me, said, surely torn pieces; saw since: ye take also me, mischief befall him, ye shall bring gray hairs sorrow grave. therefore come thy servant father, lad [be] us; seeing life bound lad's life; shall come pass, seeth lad [is] [with us,] die: thy servants shall bring gray hairs thy servant father sorrow grave. thy servant became surety lad unto father, saying, bring unto thee, shall bear blame father ever. therefore, pray thee, let thy servant abide instead lad bondman lord; let lad go brethren. shall go father, lad [be] me? lest peradventure see evil shall come father. joseph could refrain stood him; cried, cause every man go me. stood man him, joseph made known unto brethren. wept aloud: egyptians house pharaoh heard. joseph said unto brethren, [am] joseph; doth father yet live? brethren could answer him; troubled presence. joseph said unto brethren, come near me, pray you. came near. said, [am] joseph brother, ye sold egypt. therefore grieved, angry yourselves, ye sold hither: god send preserve life. two years [hath] famine [been] land: yet [there are] five years, [there shall] neither [be] earing harvest. god sent preserve posterity earth, save lives great deliverance. [it was] [that] sent hither, god: hath made father pharaoh, lord house, ruler throughout land egypt. haste ye, go father, say unto him, thus saith thy son joseph, god hath made lord egypt: come unto me, tarry not: thou shalt dwell land goshen, thou shalt near unto me, thou, thy children, thy children's children, thy flocks, thy herds, thou hast: nourish thee; yet [there are] five years famine; lest thou, thy household, thou hast, come poverty. and, behold, eyes see, eyes brother benjamin, [it is] mouth speaketh unto you. ye shall tell father glory egypt, ye seen; ye shall haste bring father hither. fell upon brother benjamin's neck, wept; benjamin wept upon neck. moreover kissed brethren, wept upon them: brethren talked him. fame thereof heard pharaoh's house, saying, joseph's brethren come: pleased pharaoh well, servants. pharaoh said unto joseph, say unto thy brethren, ye; lade beasts, go, get unto land canaan; take father households, come unto me: give good land egypt, ye shall eat fat land. thou art commanded, ye; take wagons land egypt little ones, wives, bring father, come. also regard stuff; good land egypt [is] yours. children israel so: joseph gave wagons, according commandment pharaoh, gave provision way. gave man changes raiment; benjamin gave three hundred [pieces] silver, five changes raiment. father sent [manner;] ten asses laden good things egypt, ten asses laden corn bread meat father way. sent brethren away, departed: said unto them, see ye fall way. went egypt, came land canaan unto jacob father, told him, saying, joseph [is] yet alive, [is] governor land egypt. jacob's heart fainted, believed not. told words joseph, said unto them: saw wagons joseph sent carry him, spirit jacob father revived: israel said, [it is] enough; joseph son [is] yet alive: go see die. israel took journey had, came beer-sheba, offered sacrifices unto god father isaac. god spake unto israel visions night, said, jacob, jacob. said, [am] i. said, [am] god, god thy father: fear go egypt; make thee great nation: go thee egypt; also surely bring thee [again:]page 27 genesis joseph shall put hand upon thine eyes. jacob rose beer-sheba: sons israel carried jacob father, little ones, wives, wagons pharaoh sent carry him. took cattle, goods, gotten land canaan, came egypt, jacob, seed him: sons, sons' sons him, daughters, sons' daughters, seed brought egypt.
