blood [shall be] upon them. man shall take sister, father's daughter, mother's daughter, see nakedness, see nakedness; [is] wicked thing; shall cut sight people: hath uncovered sister's nakedness; shall bear iniquity. man shall lie woman sickness, shall uncover nakedness; [is] jubile; shall holy unto you: ye shall eat increase thereof field. year jubile ye shall return every man unto possession. thou sell [ought] unto thy neighbour, buyest ought thy neighbour's hand, ye shall oppress one another: according number years jubile thou shalt buy thy neighbour, [and] according unto number years fruits shall sell unto thee: according multitude years thou shalt increase price thereof, according fewness years thou shalt diminish price it: [according] number [of years] fruits doth sell unto thee. ye shall therefore oppress one another; thou shalt fear thy god: [am] lord god. wherefore ye shall statutes, keep judgments, them; ye shall dwell land safety. land shall yield fruit, ye shall eat fill, dwell therein safety. ye shall say, shall eat seventh year? [am] lord god, brought forth land egypt, ye bondmen; broken bands yoke, made go upright. ye hearken unto me, commandments; ye shall despise statutes, soul abhor judgments, ye commandments, [but] ye break covenant: also unto you; even appoint terror, consumption, burning ague, shall consume eyes, cause sorrow heart: ye shall sow seed vain, enemies shall eat it. set face you, ye shall slain enemies: hate shall reign you; ye shall flee none pursueth you. ye yet hearken unto me, punish seven times sins. break pride power; make heaven iron, earth brass: strength shall spent vain: land shall yield increase, neither shall trees land yield fruits. ye walk contrary unto me, hearken unto me; bring seven times plagues upon according sins. also send wild beasts among you, shall rob children, destroy cattle, make number; [high] ways shall desolate. ye reformed things, walk contrary unto me; also walk contrary unto you, punish yet seven times sins. bring sword upon you, shall avenge quarrel [my] covenant: ye gathered together within cities, send pestilence among you; ye shall delivered hand enemy. beside ram atonement, whereby atonement shall made him. every offering holy things children israel, bring unto priest, shall his. every man's hallowed things shall his: whatsoever man giveth priest, shall his. speak unto children israel, say unto them, man's wife go aside, commit trespass him, man lie carnally, hid eyes husband, kept close, defiled, [there be] witness her, neither taken [with manner; shall pour oil upon it, put frankincense thereon; [is] offering jealousy, offering memorial, bringing iniquity remembrance. priest shall bring near, set lord: priest shall take holy water earthen vessel; dust floor tabernacle priest shall take, put [it] water: priest shall set woman lord, uncover woman's head, put offering memorial hands, [is] jealousy offering: priest shall hand bitter water causeth curse: priest shall charge oath, say unto woman, man lain thee, thou hast gone aside uncleanness [with another] instead thy husband, thou free bitter water causeth curse: thou hast gone aside [to another] instead thy husband, thou defiled, man lain thee beside thine husband: priest shall charge woman oath cursing, priest shall say unto woman, lord make thee curse oath among thy people, lord doth make thy thigh rot, thy belly swell; water causeth curse shall go thy bowels, make [thy] belly swell, [thy] thigh rot: woman shall say, amen, amen. priest shall write curses book, shall blot [them] bitter water: shall cause woman drink bitter water causeth curse: water causeth curse shall enter her, [and become] bitter. priest shall take jealousy offering woman's hand, shall wave offering lord, offer upon altar: priest shall take handful offering, [even] memorial thereof, burn [it] upon altar, afterward shall cause woman drink water. hath made drink water, shall come pass, [that,] defiled, done trespass husband, water causeth curse shall enter her, [and become] bitter, belly shall swell, thigh shall rot: woman shall curse amongher people. woman defiled, clean; shall free, shall conceive seed. [is] law jealousies, wife goeth aside [to another] instead husband, defiled; spirit jealousy cometh upon him, jealous wife, shall set woman lord, priest shall execute upon law. shall man guiltless iniquity, woman shall bear iniquity. speak unto children israel, say unto them, either man woman shall separate [themselves] vow vow nazarite, separate [themselves] unto lord: shall separate [himself] wine strong drink, shall drink vinegar wine, vinegar strong drink, neither shall drink liquor grapes, eat moist grapes, dried. days separation shall eat nothing made vine tree, kernels even husk. days vow separation shall razor come upon head: days fulfilled, separateth [himself] unto lord, shall holy, [and] shall let locks hair head grow. days separateth [himself] unto lord shall come dead body. shall make unclean father, mother, brother, sister, die: consecration god [is] upon head. days separation [is] holy unto lord. man die suddenly him, hath defiled head consecration; shall shave head day cleansing, seventh day shall shave it. eighth day shall bring two turtles, two young pigeons, priest, door tabernacle congregation: priest shall offer one sin offering, burnt offering, make atonement him, sinned dead, shall hallow head day. shall consecrate unto lord days separation, shall bring lamb first year trespass offering: days shall lost, separation defiled. [was] dedication altar, anointed. moses gone tabernacle congregation speak him, heard voice one speaking unto mercy seat [was] upon ark testimony, two cherubims: spake unto him. speak unto aaron, say unto him, thou lightest lamps, seven lamps shall give light candlestick. aaron so; lighted lamps thereof candlestick, lord commanded moses. work candlestick [was of] beaten gold, unto shaft thereof, unto flowers thereof, [was] beaten work: according unto pattern lord shewed moses, made candlestick. take levites among children israel, cleanse them. thus shalt thou unto them, cleanse them: sprinkle water purifying upon them, let shave flesh, let wash clothes, [so] make clean. let take young bullock meat offering, [even] fine flour mingled oil, another young bullock shalt thou take sin offering. thou shalt bring levites tabernacle congregation: thou shalt gather whole assembly children israel together: thou shalt bring levites lord: children israel shall put hands upon levites: aaron shall offer levites lord [for] offering children israel, may execute service lord. levites shall lay hands upon heads bullocks: thou shalt offer one [for] sin offering, [for] burnt offering, unto lord, make atonement levites. thou shalt set levites aaron, sons, offer [for] offering unto lord. thus shalt thou separate levites among children israel: levites shall mine. shall levites go service tabernacle congregation: thou shalt cleanse them, offer [for] offering. [are] wholly given unto among children israel; instead open every womb, [even instead of] firstborn children israel, taken unto me. firstborn children israel [are] mine, [both] man beast: day smote every firstborn land egypt sanctified myself. taken levites firstborn children israel. given levites [as] gift aaron sons among children israel, service children israel tabernacle congregation, make atonement children israel: plague among children israel, children israel come nigh untonumbers page 84 sanctuary. moses, aaron, congregation children israel, levites according unto lord commanded moses concerning levites, children israel unto them. levites purified, washed clothes; aaron offered [as] offering lord; aaron made atonement cleanse them. went levites service tabernacle congregation aaron, sons: lord commanded moses concerning levites, unto them. [is it] [belongeth] unto levites: twenty five years old upward shall go wait upon service tabernacle congregation: age fifty years shall cease waiting upon service [thereof,] shall serve more: shall minister brethren tabernacle congregation, keep charge, shall service. thus shalt thou unto levites touching charge. lord spake unto moses wilderness sinai, first month second year come land egypt, saying, let children israel also keep passover appointed season. fourteenth day month, even, ye shall keep appointed season: according rites it, according ceremonies thereof, shall ye keep it. moses spake unto children israel, keep passover. kept passover fourteenth day first month even wilderness sinai: according lord commanded moses, children israel. certain men, defiled dead body man, could keep passover day: came moses aaron day: men said unto him, [are] defiled dead body man: wherefore kept back, may offer offering lord appointed season among children israel? moses said unto them, stand still, hear lord command concerning you. speak unto children israel, saying, man posterity shall unclean reason dead body, [be] journey afar off, yet shall keep passover unto lord. fourteenth day second month even shall keep it, [and] eat unleavened bread bitter [herbs. ] shall leave none unto morning, break bone it: according ordinances passover shall keep it. man [is] clean, journey, forbeareth keep passover, even soul shall cut among people: brought offering lord appointed season, man shall bear sin. stranger shall sojourn among you, keep passover unto lord; according ordinance passover, according manner thereof, shall do: ye shall one ordinance, stranger, born land. day tabernacle reared cloud covered tabernacle, [namely,] tent testimony: even upon tabernacle itwere appearance fire, morning. alway: cloud covered [by day,] appearance fire night. cloud taken tabernacle, children israel journeyed: place cloud abode, children israel pitched tents. commandment lord children israel journeyed, commandment lord pitched: long cloud abode upon tabernacle rested tents. cloud tarried long upon tabernacle many days, children israel kept charge lord, journeyed not. [so] was, cloud days upon tabernacle; according commandment lord abode tents, according commandment lord journeyed. [so] was, cloud abode even unto morning, [that] cloud taken morning, journeyed: whether [it was] day night cloud taken up, journeyed. [whether were] two days, month, year, cloud tarried upon tabernacle, remaining thereon, children israel abode tents, journeyed not: taken up, journeyed. commandment lord rested tents, commandment lord journeyed: kept charge lord, commandment lord hand moses. make thee two trumpets silver; whole piece shalt thou make them: thou mayest use calling assembly, journeying camps. shall blow them, assembly shall assemble thee door tabernacle congregation. blow [but] one [trumpet,] princes, [which are] heads thousands israel, shall gather unto thee. ye blow alarm, camps lie east parts shall go forward. ye blow alarm second time, camps lie south side shall take journey: shall blow alarm journeys. congregation gathered together, ye shall blow, ye shall sound alarm. sons aaron, priests, shall blow trumpets; shall ordinance ever throughout generations. ye go war land enemy oppresseth you, ye shall blow alarm trumpets; ye shall remembered lord god, ye shall saved enemies. also day gladness, solemn days, beginnings months, ye shall blow trumpets burnt offerings, sacrifices peace offerings; may memorial god: [am] lord god. came pass twentieth [day] second month, second year, cloud taken tabernacle testimony. children israel took journeys wilderness sinai; cloud rested wilderness paran. first took journey according commandment lord hand moses. first [place] went standard camp children judah according armies: host [was] nahshon son amminadab.page 85 numbers host tribe children issachar [was] nethaneel son zuar. host tribe children zebulun [was] eliab son helon. tabernacle taken down; sons gershon sons merari set forward, bearing tabernacle. standard camp reuben set forward according armies: host [was] elizur son shedeur. host tribe children simeon shelumiel son zurishaddai. host tribe children gad eliasaph son deuel. kohathites set forward, bearing sanctuary: [the other] set tabernacle came. standard camp children ephraim set forward according armies: host [was] elishama son ammihud. host tribe children manasseh [was] gamaliel son pedahzur. host tribe children benjamin [was] abidan son gideoni. standard camp children dan set forward, [which was] rereward camps throughout hosts: host [was] ahiezer son ammishaddai. host tribe children asher [was] pagiel son ocran. host tribe children naphtali [was] ahira son enan. thus [were] journeyings children israel according armies, set forward. moses said unto hobab, son raguel midianite, moses' father law, journeying unto place lord said, give you: come thou us, thee good: lord hath spoken good concerning israel. said unto him, go; depart mine land, kindred. said, leave us not, pray thee; forasmuch thou knowest encamp wilderness, thou mayest us instead eyes. shall be, thou go us, yea, shall be, goodness lord shall unto us, unto thee. departed mount lord three days' journey: ark covenant lord went three days' journey, search resting place them. cloud lord [was] upon day, went camp. came pass, ark set forward, moses said, rise up, lord, let thine enemies scattered; let hate thee flee thee. rested, said, return, lord, unto many thousands israel. [when] people complained, displeased lord: lord heard [it;] anger kindled; fire lord burnt among them, consumed [them were] uttermost parts camp. people cried unto moses; moses prayed unto lord, fire quenched. called name place taberah: fire lord burnt among them. mixt multitude [was] among fell lusting: children israel also wept again, andsaid, shall give us flesh eat? remember fish, eat egypt freely; cucumbers, melons, leeks, onions, garlick: soul [is] dried away: [there is] nothing all, beside manna, [before] eyes. manna [was] coriander seed, colour thereof colour bdellium. [and] people went about, gathered [it,] ground [it] mills, beat [it] mortar, baked [it] pans, made cakes it: taste taste fresh oil. dew fell upon camp night, manna fell upon it. moses heard people weep throughout families, every man door tent: anger lord kindled greatly; moses also displeased. moses said unto lord, wherefore hast thou afflicted thy servant? wherefore found favour thy sight, thou layest burden people upon me? conceived people? begotten them, thou shouldest say unto me, carry thy bosom, nursing father beareth sucking child, unto land thou swarest unto fathers? whence flesh give unto people? weep unto me, saying, give us flesh, may eat. able bear people alone, [it is] heavy me. thou deal thus me, kill me, pray thee, hand, found favour thy sight; let see wretchedness. lord said unto moses, gather unto seventy men elders israel, thou knowest elders people, officers them; bring unto tabernacle congregation, may stand thee. come talk thee there: take spirit [is] upon thee, put [it] upon them; shall bear burden people thee, thou bear thyself alone. say thou unto people, sanctify morrow, ye shall eat flesh: ye wept ears lord, saying, shall give us flesh eat? [it was] well us egypt: therefore lord give flesh, ye shall eat. ye shall eat one day, two days, five days, neither ten days, twenty days; [but] even whole month, come nostrils, loathsome unto you: ye despised lord [is] among you, wept him, saying, came forth egypt? moses said, people, among [am, are] six hundred thousand footmen; thou hast said, give flesh, may eat whole month. shall flocks herds slain them, suffice them? shall fish sea gathered together them, suffice them? lord said unto moses, lord's hand waxed short? thou shalt see whether word shall come pass unto thee not. moses went out, told people words lord, gathered seventy men elders people, set round tabernacle. lord came cloud, spake unto him, took spirit [was] upon him, gave [it] unto seventy elders: came pass, [that,] spirit rested upon them, prophesied, cease. remained two [of the] men camp, name one [was] eldad, name medad: spiritnumbers page 86 rested upon them; [were] written, went unto tabernacle: prophesied camp. ran young man, told moses, said, eldad medad prophesy camp. joshua son nun, servant moses, [one] young men, answered said, lord moses, forbid them. moses said unto him, enviest thou sake? would god lord's people prophets, [and] lord would put spirit upon them! moses gat camp, elders israel. went forth wind lord, brought quails sea, let [them] fall camp, day's journey side, day's journey side, round camp, two cubits [high] upon face earth. people stood day, [that] night, next day, gathered quails: gathered least gathered ten homers: spread [them] abroad round camp. flesh [was] yet teeth, ere chewed, wrath lord kindled people, lord smote people great plague. called name place kibroth-hattaavah: buried people lusted. [and] people journeyed kibroth- hattaavah unto hazeroth; abode hazeroth. miriam aaron spake moses ethiopian woman married: married ethiopian woman. said, hath lord indeed spoken moses? hath spoken also us? lord heard [it. ] (now man moses [was] meek, men [were] upon face earth.) lord spake suddenly unto moses, unto aaron, unto miriam, come ye three unto tabernacle congregation. three came out. lord came pillar cloud, stood door tabernacle, called aaron miriam: came forth. said, hear words: prophet among you, [i[ lord make known unto vision, [and] speak unto dream. servant moses [is] so, [is] faithful mine house. speak mouth mouth, even apparently, dark speeches; similitude lord shall behold: wherefore ye afraid speak servant moses? anger lord kindled them; departed. cloud departed tabernacle; and, behold, miriam [became] leprous, [white] snow: aaron looked upon miriam, and, behold, [she was] leprous. aaron said unto moses, alas, lord, beseech thee, lay sin upon us, wherein done foolishly, wherein sinned. let one dead, flesh half consumed cometh mother's womb. moses cried unto lord, saying, heal now, god, beseech thee. lord said unto moses, father spit face, ashamed seven days? let shut camp seven days, let received [again. ] miriam shut camp seven days: people journeyed till miriam brought [again. ] afterward people removed hazeroth, pitched wilderness paran. send thou men, may search land canaan, give unto children israel: every tribe fathers shall ye send man, every one ruler among them. moses commandment lord sent wilderness paran: men [were] heads children israel. [were] names: tribe reuben, shammua son zaccur. tribe simeon, shaphat son hori. tribe judah, caleb son jephunneh. tribe issachar, igal son joseph. tribe ephraim, oshea son nun. tribe benjamin, palti son raphu. tribe zebulun, gaddiel son sodi. tribe joseph, namely, tribe manasseh, gaddi son susi. tribe dan, ammiel son gemalli. tribe asher, sethur son michael. tribe naphtali, nahbi son vophsi. tribe gad, geuel son machi. [are] names men moses sent spy land. moses called oshea son nun jehoshua. moses sent spy land canaan, said unto them, get [way] southward, go mountain: see land, [is;] people dwelleth therein, whether [be] strong weak, many; land [is] dwell in, whether [be] good bad; cities [they be] dwell in, whether tents, strong holds; land [is,] whether [be] fat lean, whether wood therein, not. ye good courage, bring fruit land. time [was] time firstripe grapes. went up, searched land wilderness zin unto rehob, men come hamath. ascended south, came unto hebron; ahiman, sheshai, talmai, children anak, [were.] (now hebron built seven years zoan egypt.) came unto brook eshcol, cut thence branch one cluster grapes, bare two upon staff; [they brought] pomegranates, figs. place called brook eshcol, cluster grapes children israel cut thence. returned searching land forty days. went came moses, aaron, congregation children israel, unto wilderness paran, kadesh; brought back word unto them, unto congregation, shewed fruit land. told him, said, came unto land whither thou sentest us, surely floweth milk honey; [is] fruit it. nevertheless people [be] strong dwell land, cities [are] walled, [and] great: moreover saw children anak there. amalekites dwell land south: hittites, jebusites, amorites, dwell mountains: canaanites dwell sea, coast jordan. caleb stilled people moses, said, let us go once, possess it; well able overcome it. men went said, able go people; stronger we. brought evil report land searched untopage 87 numbers children israel, saying, land, gone search it, land eateth inhabitants thereof; people saw [are] men great stature. saw giants, sons anak, [which come] giants: sight grasshoppers, sight. congregation lifted voice, cried; people wept night. children israel murmured moses aaron: whole congregation said unto them, would god died land egypt! would god died wilderness! wherefore hath lord brought us unto land, fall sword, wives children prey? better us return egypt? said one another, let us make captain, let us return egypt. moses aaron fell faces assembly congregation children israel. joshua son nun, caleb son jephunneh, [which were] searched land, rent clothes: spake unto company children israel, saying, land, passed search it, [is] exceeding good land. lord delight us, bring us land, give us; land floweth milk honey. rebel ye lord, neither fear ye people land; [are] bread us: defence departed them, lord [is] us: fear not. congregation bade stone stones. glory lord appeared tabernacle congregation children israel. lord said unto moses, long people provoke me? long ere believe me, signs shewed among them? smite pestilence, disinherit them, make thee greater nation mightier they. moses said unto lord, egyptians shall hear [it,] (for thou broughtest people thy might among them;) tell [it] inhabitants land: [for] heard thou lord [art] among people, thou lord art seen face face, [that] thy cloud standeth them, [that] thou goest them, daytime pillar cloud, pillar fire night. [if] thou shalt kill [all] people one man, nations heard fame thee speak, saying, lord able bring people land sware unto them, therefore hath slain wilderness. now, beseech thee, let power lord great, according thou hast spoken, saying, lord [is] longsuffering, great mercy, forgiving iniquity transgression, means clearing [the guilty,] visiting iniquity fathers upon children unto third fourth [generation. ] pardon, beseech thee, iniquity people according unto greatness thy mercy, thou hast forgiven people, egypt even now. lord said, pardoned according thy word: [as] truly [as] live, earth shall filled glory lord. men seen myglory, miracles, egypt wilderness, tempted ten times, hearkened voice; surely shall see land sware unto fathers, neither shall provoked see it: servant caleb, another spirit him, hath followed fully, bring land whereinto went; seed shall possess it. (now amalekites canaanites dwelt valley.) morrow turn you, get wilderness way red sea. lord spake unto moses unto aaron, saying, long [shall bear with] evil congregation, murmur me? heard murmurings children israel, murmur me. say unto them, [as truly as] live, saith lord, ye spoken mine ears, you: carcases shall fall wilderness; numbered you, according whole number, twenty years old upward, murmured me, doubtless ye shall come land, [concerning] sware make dwell therein, save caleb son jephunneh, joshua son nun. little ones, ye said prey, bring in, shall know land ye despised. [as for] you, carcases, shall fall wilderness. children shall wander wilderness forty years, bear whoredoms, carcases wasted wilderness. number days ye searched land, [even] forty days, day year, shall ye bear iniquities, [even] forty years, ye shall know breach promise. lord said, surely unto evil congregation, gathered together me: wilderness shall consumed, shall die. men, moses sent search land, returned, made congregation murmur him, bringing slander upon land, even men bring evil report upon land, died plague lord. joshua son nun, caleb son jephunneh, [which were] men went search land, lived [still. ] moses told sayings unto children israel: people mourned greatly. rose early morning, gat top mountain, saying, lo, [be here,] go unto place lord hath promised: sinned. moses said, wherefore ye transgress commandment lord? shall prosper. go up, lord [is] among you; ye smitten enemies. amalekites canaanites [are] you, ye shall fall sword: ye turned away lord, therefore lord you. presumed go unto hill top: nevertheless ark covenant lord, moses, departed camp. amalekites came down, canaanites dwelt hill, smote them, discomfited them, [even] unto hormah. speak unto children israel, say unto them, ye come land habitations, give unto you, make offering fire untonumbers page 88 lord, burnt offering, sacrifice performing vow, freewill offering, solemn feasts, make sweet savour unto lord, herd, flock: shall offereth offering unto lord bring meat offering tenth deal flour mingled fourth [part] hin oil. fourth [part] hin wine drink offering shalt thou prepare burnt offering sacrifice, one lamb. ram, thou shalt prepare [for] meat offering two tenth deals flour mingled third [part] hin oil. drink offering thou shalt offer third [part] hin wine, [for] sweet savour unto lord. thou preparest bullock [for] burnt offering, [for] sacrifice performing vow, peace offerings unto lord: shall bring bullock meat offering three tenth deals flour mingled half hin oil. thou shalt bring drink offering half hin wine, offering made fire, sweet savour unto lord. thus shall done one bullock, one ram, lamb, kid. according number ye shall prepare, shall ye every one according number. born country shall things manner, offering offering made fire, sweet savour unto lord. stranger sojourn you, whosoever [be] among generations, offer offering made fire, sweet savour unto lord; cause [him] come near unto him: even [him] hath chosen cause come near unto him. do; take censers, korah, company; put fire therein, put incense lord morrow: shall [that] man lord doth choose, [shall be] holy: [ye take] much upon you, ye sons levi. moses said unto korah, hear, pray you, ye sons levi: [seemeth but] small thing unto you, god israel hath separated congregation israel, bring near service tabernacle lord, stand congregation minister unto them? hath brought thee near [to him,] thy brethren sons levi thee: seek yepage 89 numbers priesthood also? cause [both] thou thy company [are] gathered together lord: [is] aaron, ye murmur him? moses sent call dathan abiram, sons eliab: said, come up: [is it] small thing thou hast brought us land floweth milk honey, kill us wilderness, except thou make thyself altogether prince us? moreover thou hast brought us land floweth milk honey, given us inheritance fields vineyards: wilt thou put eyes men? come up. moses wroth, said unto lord, respect thou offering: taken one ass them, neither hurt one them. moses said unto korah, thou thy company lord, thou, they, aaron, morrow: take every man censer, put incense them, bring ye lord every man censer, two hundred fifty censers; [i have] [done them] mine mind. men die common death men, visited visitation men; [then] lord hath sent me. lord make new thing, earth open mouth, swallow up, [appertain] unto them, go quick pit; ye shall understand men provoked lord. came pass, made end speaking words, ground clave asunder [was] them: earth opened mouth, swallowed up, houses, men [appertained] unto korah, [their] goods. they, [appertained] them, went alive pit, earth closed upon them: perished among congregation. israel [were] round fled cry them: said, lest earth swallow us [also. ] came fire lord, consumed two hundred fifty men offered incense. lord spake unto moses, saying, speak unto eleazar son aaron priest, take censers burning, scatter thou fire yonder; plague begun. aaron took moses commanded, ran midst congregation; and, behold, plague begun among people: put incense, made atonement people. stood dead living; plague stayed. died plague fourteen thousand seven hundred, beside died matter korah. aaron returned unto moses unto door tabernacle congregation: plague stayed. speak unto children israel, take every one rod according house [their] fathers, princes according house fathers twelve rods: write thou every man's name upon rod. thou shalt write aaron's name upon rod levi: one rod [shall be] head house fathers. thou shalt lay tabernacle congregation testimony, meet you. shall come pass, [that] man's rod, shall choose, shall blossom: make cease murmurings children israel, whereby murmur you. moses spake unto children israel, every one princes gave rod apiece, prince one, according fathers' houses, [even] twelve rods: rod aaron [was] among rods. moses laid rods lord tabernacle witness. came pass, morrow moses went tabernacle witness; and, behold, rod aaron house levi budded, brought forth buds, bloomed blossoms, yieldednumbers page 90 almonds. moses brought rods lord unto children israel: looked, took every man rod. lord said unto moses, bring aaron's rod testimony, kept token rebels; thou shalt quite take away murmurings me, die not. moses [so:] lord commanded him, he. children israel spake unto moses, saying, behold, die, perish, perish. whosoever cometh thing near unto tabernacle lord shall die: shall consumed dying? lord said unto aaron, thou thy sons thy father's house thee shall bear iniquity sanctuary: thou thy sons thee shall bear iniquity priesthood. thy brethren also tribe levi, tribe thy father, bring thou thee, may joined unto thee, minister unto thee: thou thy sons thee [shall minister] tabernacle witness. shall keep thy charge, charge tabernacle: shall come nigh vessels sanctuary altar, neither they, ye also, die. shall joined unto thee, keep charge tabernacle congregation, service tabernacle: stranger shall come nigh unto you. ye shall keep charge sanctuary, charge altar: wrath upon children israel. i, behold, taken brethren levites among children israel: [they are] given [as] gift lord, service tabernacle congregation. therefore thou thy sons thee shall keep priest's office every thing altar, within vail; unto thee given reason anointing, thy sons, ordinance ever. shall thine holy things, [reserved] fire: every oblation theirs, every meat offering theirs, every sin offering theirs, every trespass offering theirs, shall render unto me, [shall be] holy thee thy sons. holy [place] shalt thou eat it; every male shall eat it: shall holy unto thee. [is] thine; heave offering gift, wave offerings children israel: given unto thee, thy sons thy daughters thee, statute ever: every one clean thy house shall eat it. best oil, best wine, wheat, firstfruits shall offer unto lord, given thee. [and] whatsoever first ripe land, shall bring unto lord, shall thine; every one clean thine house shall eat [of] it. every thing devoted israel shall thine. every thing openeth matrix flesh, bring unto lord, [whether be] men beasts, shall thine: nevertheless firstborn man shalt thou surely redeem, firstling unclean beasts shalt thou redeem. redeemed month old shalt thou redeem, according thine estimation, money five shekels, shekel thesanctuary, [is] twenty gerahs. firstling cow, firstling sheep, firstling goat, thou shalt redeem; [are] holy: thou shalt sprinkle blood upon altar, shalt burn fat [for] offering made fire, sweet savour unto lord. flesh shall thine, wave breast right shoulder thine. heave offerings holy things, children israel offer unto lord, given thee, thy sons thy daughters thee, statute ever: covenant salt ever lord unto thee thy seed thee. lord spake unto aaron, thou shalt inheritance land, neither shalt thou part among them: [am] thy part thine inheritance among children israel. and, behold, given children levi tenth israel inheritance, service serve, [even] service tabernacle congregation. neither must children israel henceforth come nigh tabernacle congregation, lest bear sin, die. levites shall service tabernacle congregation, shall bear iniquity: [it shall be] statute ever throughout generations, among children israel inheritance. tithes children israel, offer [as] heave offering unto lord, given levites inherit: therefore said unto them, among children israel shall inheritance. lord spake unto moses, saying, thus speak unto levites, say unto them, ye take children israel tithes given inheritance, ye shall offer heave offering lord, [even] tenth [part] tithe. [this] heave offering shall reckoned unto you, though [it were] corn threshingfloor, fulness winepress. thus ye also shall offer heave offering unto lord tithes, ye receive children israel; ye shall give thereof lord's heave offering aaron priest. gifts ye shall offer every heave offering lord, best thereof, [even] hallowed part thereof it. therefore thou shalt say unto them, ye heaved best thereof it, shall counted unto levites increase threshingfloor, increase winepress. ye shall eat every place, ye households: [is] reward service tabernacle congregation. ye shall bear sin reason it, ye heaved best it: neither shall ye pollute holy things children israel, lest ye die. lord spake unto moses unto aaron, saying, [is] ordinance law lord hath commanded, saying, speak unto children israel, bring thee red heifer without spot, wherein [is] blemish, [and] upon never came yoke: ye shall give unto eleazar priest, may bring forth without camp, [one] shall slay face: eleazar priest shall take blood finger, sprinkle blood directly tabernacle congregation seven times: [one] shall burn heifer sight; skin, flesh, blood, dung, shall burn:page 91 numbers priest shall take cedar wood, hyssop, scarlet, cast [it] midst burning heifer. priest shall wash clothes, shall bathe flesh water, afterward shall come camp, priest shall unclean even. burneth shall wash clothes water, bathe flesh water, shall unclean even. man [that is] clean shall gather ashes heifer, lay [them] without camp clean place, shall kept congregation children israel water separation: [is] purification sin. gathereth ashes heifer shall wash clothes, unclean even: shall unto children israel, unto stranger sojourneth among them, statute ever. toucheth dead body man shall unclean seven days. shall purify third day, seventh day shall clean: purify third day, seventh day shall clean. whosoever toucheth dead body man dead, purifieth himself, defileth tabernacle lord; soul shall cut israel: water separation sprinkled upon him, shall unclean; uncleanness [is] yet upon him. [is] law, man dieth tent: come tent, [is] tent, shall unclean seven days. every open vessel, hath covering bound upon it, [is] unclean. whosoever toucheth one slain sword open fields, dead body, bone man, grave, shall unclean seven days. unclean [person] shall take ashes burnt heifer purification sin, running water shall put thereto vessel: clean person shall take hyssop, dip [it] water, sprinkle [it] upon tent, upon vessels, upon persons there, upon touched bone, one slain, one dead, grave: clean [person] shall sprinkle upon unclean third day, seventh day: seventh day shall purify himself, wash clothes, bathe water, shall clean even. man shall unclean, shall purify himself, soul shall cut among congregation, hath defiled sanctuary lord: water separation hath sprinkled upon him; [is] unclean. shall perpetual statute unto them, sprinkleth water separation shall wash clothes; toucheth water separation shall unclean even. whatsoever unclean [person] toucheth shall unclean; soul toucheth [it] shall unclean even. came children israel, [even] whole congregation, desert zin first month: people abode kadesh; miriam died there, buried there. water congregation: gathered together moses aaron. people chode moses, spake, saying, would god died brethren died lord! ye brought congregation lord wilderness, cattle die there? wherefore ye made us come egypt, bring us unto evil place? [is] place seed, figs, vines, pomegranates; neither [is] water drink. moses aaronwent presence assembly unto door tabernacle congregation, fell upon faces: glory lord appeared unto them. take rod, gather thou assembly together, thou, aaron thy brother, speak ye unto rock eyes; shall give forth water, thou shalt bring forth water rock: thou shalt give congregation beasts drink. moses took rod lord, commanded him. moses aaron gathered congregation together rock, said unto them, hear now, ye rebels; must fetch water rock? moses lifted hand, rod smote rock twice: water came abundantly, congregation drank, beasts [also. ] lord spake unto moses aaron, ye believed not, sanctify eyes children israel, therefore ye shall bring congregation land given them. [is] water meribah; children israel strove lord, sanctified them. moses sent messengers kadesh unto king edom, thus saith thy brother israel, thou knowest travail hath befallen us: fathers went egypt, dwelt egypt long time; egyptians vexed us, fathers: cried unto lord, heard voice, sent angel, hath brought us forth egypt: and, behold, [are] kadesh, city uttermost thy border: let us pass, pray thee, thy country: pass fields, vineyards, neither drink [of] water wells: go king's [high] way, turn right hand left, passed thy borders. edom said unto him, thou shalt pass me, lest come thee sword. children israel said unto him, go high way: cattle drink thy water, pay it: only, without [doing] thing [else,] go feet. said, thou shalt go through. edom came much people, strong hand. thus edom refused give israel passage border: wherefore israel turned away him. children israel, [even] whole congregation, journeyed kadesh, came unto mount hor. lord spake unto moses aaron mount hor, coast land edom, saying, aaron shall gathered unto people: shall enter land given unto children israel, ye rebelled word water meribah. take aaron eleazar son, bring unto mount hor: strip aaron garments, put upon eleazar son: aaron shall gathered [unto people,] shall die there. moses lord commanded: went mount hor sight congregation. moses stripped aaron garments, put upon eleazar son; aaron died top mount: moses eleazar came mount. congregation saw aaron dead, mourned aaron thirty days, [even] house israel.numbers page 92 [when] king arad canaanite, dwelt south, heard tell israel came way spies; fought israel, took [some] prisoners. israel vowed vow unto lord, said, thou wilt indeed deliver people hand, utterly destroy cities. lord hearkened voice israel, delivered canaanites; utterly destroyed cities: called name place hormah. journeyed mount hor way red sea, compass land edom: soul people much discouraged way. people spake god, moses, wherefore ye brought us egypt die wilderness? [there is] bread, neither [is any] water; soul loatheth light bread. lord sent fiery serpents among people, bit people; much people israel died. therefore people came moses, said, sinned, spoken lord, thee; pray unto lord, take away serpents us. moses prayed people. lord said unto moses, make thee fiery serpent, set upon pole: shall come pass, every one bitten, looketh upon it, shall live. moses made serpent brass, put upon pole, came pass, serpent bitten man, beheld serpent brass, lived. children israel set forward, pitched oboth. journeyed oboth, pitched ije-abarim, wilderness [is] moab, toward sunrising. thence removed, pitched valley zared. thence removed, pitched side arnon, [is] wilderness cometh coasts amorites: arnon [is] border moab, moab amorites. wherefore said book wars lord, red sea, brooks arnon, stream brooks goeth dwelling ar, lieth upon border moab. thence [they went] beer: [is] well whereof lord spake unto moses, gather people together, give water. israel sang song, spring up, well; sing ye unto it: princes digged well, nobles people digged it, [the direction of] lawgiver, staves. wilderness [they went] mattanah: mattanah nahaliel: nahaliel bamoth: bamoth [in] valley, [is] country moab, top pisgah, looketh toward jeshimon. israel sent messengers unto sihon king amorites, saying, let pass thy land: turn fields, vineyards; drink [of] waters well: [but] go along king's [high] way, past thy borders. sihon would suffer israel pass border: sihon gathered people together, went israel wilderness: came jahaz, fought israel. israel smote edge sword, possessed land fromarnon unto jabbok, even unto children ammon: border children ammon [was] strong. israel took cities: israel dwelt cities amorites, heshbon, villages thereof. heshbon [was] city sihon king amorites, fought former king moab, taken land hand, even unto arnon. wherefore speak proverbs say, come heshbon, let city sihon built prepared: fire gone heshbon, flame city sihon: hath consumed ar moab, [and] lords high places arnon. woe thee, moab! thou art undone, people chemosh: hath given sons escaped, daughters, captivity unto sihon king amorites. shot them; heshbon perished even unto dibon, laid waste even unto nophah, [reacheth] unto medeba. thus israel dwelt land amorites. moses sent spy jaazer, took villages thereof, drove amorites [were] there. turned went way bashan: og king bashan went them, he, people, battle edrei. lord said unto moses, fear not: delivered thy hand, people, land; thou shalt thou didst unto sihon king amorites, dwelt heshbon. smote him, sons, people, none left alive: possessed land. children israel set forward, pitched plains moab side jordan [by] jericho. balak son zippor saw israel done amorites. moab sore afraid people, [were] many: moab distressed children israel. moab said unto elders midian, shall company lick [that are] round us, ox licketh grass field. balak son zippor [was] king moabites time. sent messengers therefore unto balaam son beor pethor, [is] river land children people, call him, saying, behold, people come egypt: behold, cover face earth, abide me: come therefore, pray thee, curse people; [are] mighty me: peradventure shall prevail, [that] may smite them, [that] may drive land: wot thou blessest [is] blessed, thou cursest cursed. elders moab elders midian departed rewards divination hand; came unto balaam, spake unto words balak. said unto them, lodge night, bring word again, lord shall speak unto me: princes moab abode balaam. god came unto balaam, said, men [are] thee? balaam said unto god, balak son zippor, king moab, hath sent unto me, [saying, ] behold, [there is] people come egypt, covereth face earth: come now, curse them; peradventure shall able overcome them, drive out. god said unto balaam, thou shalt go them; thou shalt curse people: [are] blessed.page 93 numbers balaam rose morning, said unto princes balak, get land: lord refuseth give leave go you. princes moab rose up, went unto balak, said, balaam refuseth come us. balak sent yet princes, more, honourable they. came balaam, said him, thus saith balak son zippor, let nothing, pray thee, hinder thee coming unto me: promote thee unto great honour, whatsoever thou sayest unto me: come therefore, pray thee, curse people. balaam answered said unto servants balak, balak would give house full silver gold, cannot go beyond word lord god, less more. therefore, pray you, tarry ye also night, may know lord say unto more. god came unto balaam night, said unto him, men come call thee, rise up, [and] go them; yet word shall say unto thee, shalt thou do. balaam rose morning, saddled ass, went princes moab. god's anger kindled went: angel lord stood way adversary him. riding upon ass, two servants [were] him. ass saw angel lord standing way, sword drawn hand: ass turned aside way, went field: balaam smote ass, turn way. angel lord stood path vineyards, wall [being] side, wall side. ass saw angel lord, thrust unto wall, crushed balaam's foot wall: smote again. angel lord went further, stood narrow place, [was] way turn either right hand left. ass saw angel lord, fell balaam: balaam's anger kindled, smote ass staff. lord opened mouth ass, said unto balaam, done unto thee, thou hast smitten three times? balaam said unto ass, thou hast mocked me: would sword mine hand, would kill thee. ass said unto balaam, [am] thine ass, upon thou hast ridden ever since [i was] thine unto day? ever wont unto thee? said, nay. lord opened eyes balaam, saw angel lord standing way, sword drawn hand: bowed head, fell flat face. angel lord said unto him, wherefore hast thou smitten thine ass three times? behold, went withstand thee, [thy] way perverse me: ass saw me, turned three times: unless turned me, surely also slain thee, saved alive. balaam said unto angel lord, sinned; knew thou stoodest way me: therefore, displease thee, get back again. angel lord said unto balaam, go men: word shall speak unto thee, thou shalt speak. balaam went princes balak. balak heard balaam come, went meet unto city moab, [is] theborder arnon, [is] utmost coast. balak said unto balaam, earnestly send unto thee call thee? wherefore camest thou unto me? able indeed promote thee honour? balaam said unto balak, lo, come unto thee: power say thing? word god putteth mouth, shall speak. balaam went balak, came unto kirjath- huzoth. balak offered oxen sheep, sent balaam, princes [were] him. came pass morrow, balak took balaam, brought high places baal, thence might see utmost [part] people. balaam said unto balak, build seven altars, prepare seven oxen seven rams. balak balaam spoken; balak balaam offered [every] altar bullock ram. balaam said unto balak, stand thy burnt offering, go: peradventure lord come meet me: whatsoever sheweth tell thee. went high place. god met balaam: said unto him, prepared seven altars, offered upon [every] altar bullock ram. lord put word balaam's mouth, said, return unto balak, thus thou shalt speak. returned unto him, and, lo, stood burnt sacrifice, he, princes moab. took parable, said, balak king moab hath brought aram, mountains east, [saying,] come, curse jacob, come, defy israel. shall curse, god hath cursed? shall defy, [whom] lord hath defied? top rocks see him, hills behold him: lo, people shall dwell alone, shall reckoned among nations. count dust jacob, number fourth [part] israel? let die death righteous, let last end like his! balak said unto balaam, hast thou done unto me? took thee curse mine enemies, and, behold, thou hast blessed [them] altogether. answered said, must take heed speak lord hath put mouth? balak said unto him, come, pray thee, unto another place, whence thou mayest see them: thou shalt see utmost part them, shalt see all: curse thence. brought field zophim, top pisgah, built seven altars, offered bullock ram [every] altar. said unto balak, stand thy burnt offering, meet [the lord] yonder. lord met balaam, put word mouth, said, go unto balak, say thus. came him, behold, stood burnt offering, princes moab him. balak said unto him, hath lord spoken? took parable, said, rise up, balak, hear; hearken unto me, thou son zippor: god [is] man, lie; neither son man, repent: hath said, shall [it?] hath spoken, shall make good? behold, received [commandment] bless: hath blessed; cannot reverse it. hath beheld iniquity jacob, neither hath seen perverseness israel: lord god [is] him, shout king [is] among them. god brought egypt; hath strength unicorn. surely [there is] enchantmentnumbers page 94 jacob, neither [is there] divination israel: according time shall said jacob israel, hath god wrought! behold, people shall rise great lion, lift young lion: shall lie eat [of] prey, drink blood slain. balak said unto balaam, neither curse all, bless all. balaam answered said unto balak, told thee, saying, lord speaketh, must do? balak said unto balaam, come, pray thee, bring thee unto another place; peradventure please god thou mayest curse thence. balak brought balaam unto top peor, looketh toward jeshimon. balaam said unto balak, build seven altars, prepare seven bullocks seven rams. balak balaam said, offered bullock ram [every] altar. balaam saw pleased lord bless israel, went not, times, seek enchantments, set face toward wilderness. balaam lifted eyes, saw israel abiding [in tents] according tribes; spirit god came upon him. took parable, said, balaam son beor hath said, man whose eyes open hath said: hath said, heard words god, saw vision almighty, falling [into trance,] eyes open: goodly thy tents, jacob, [and] thy tabernacles, israel! valleys spread forth, gardens river's side, trees lign aloes lord hath planted, [and] cedar trees beside waters. shall pour water buckets, seed [shall be] many waters, king shall higher agag, kingdom shall exalted. god brought forth egypt; hath strength unicorn: shall eat nations enemies, shall break bones, pierce [them] arrows. couched, lay lion, great lion: shall stir up? blessed [is] blesseth thee, cursed curseth thee. balak's anger kindled balaam, smote hands together: balak said unto balaam, called thee curse mine enemies, and, behold, thou hast altogether blessed [them] three times. therefore flee thou thy place: thought promote thee unto great honour;
