beside continual burnt offering, meat offering, drink offering. sixth day eight bullocks, two rams, [and] fourteen lambs first year without blemish: meat offering drink offerings bullocks, rams, lambs, [shall be] according number, manner: one goat [for] sin offering; beside continual burnt offering, meat offering, drink offering. seventh day seven bullocks, twonumbers page 98 rams, [and] fourteen lambs first year without blemish: meat offering drink offerings bullocks, rams, lambs, [shall be] according number, manner: one goat [for] sin offering; beside continual burnt offering, meat offering, drink offering. eighth day ye shall solemn assembly: ye shall servile work [therein: ] ye shall offer burnt offering, sacrifice made fire, sweet savour unto lord: one bullock, one ram, seven lambs first year without blemish: meat offering drink offerings bullock, ram, lambs, [shall be] according number, manner: one goat [for] sin offering; beside continual burnt offering, meat offering, drink offering. [things] ye shall unto lord set feasts, beside vows, freewill offerings, burnt offerings, meat offerings, drink offerings, peace offerings. moses told children israel according lord commanded moses. moses spake unto heads tribes concerning children israel, saying, thing lord hath commanded. man vow vow unto lord, swear oath bind soul bond; shall break word, shall according proceedeth mouth. woman also vow vow unto lord, bind [herself] bond, [being] father's house youth; father hear vow, bond wherewith hath bound soul, father shall hold peace her: vows shall stand, every bond wherewith hath bound soul shall stand. father disallow day heareth; vows, bonds wherewith hath bound soul, shall stand: lord shall forgive her, father disallowed her. husband, vowed, uttered ought lips, wherewith bound soul; husband heard [it,] held peace day heard [it:] vows shall stand, bonds wherewith bound soul shall stand. husband disallowed day heard [it;] shall make vow vowed, uttered lips, wherewith bound soul, none effect: lord shall forgive her. every vow widow, divorced, wherewith bound souls, shall stand her. vowed husband's house, bound soul bond oath; husband heard [it,] held peace her, [and] disallowed not: vows shall stand, every bond wherewith bound soul shall stand. husband hath utterly made void day heard [them; then] whatsoever proceeded lips concerning vows, concerning bond soul, shall stand: husband hath made void; lord shall forgive her. every vow, every binding oath afflict soul, husband may establish it, husband may make void. husband altogether hold peace day day; establisheth vows, bonds, [are] upon her: confirmeth them, held peace day heard [them. ] shall ways make void hath heard [them;] shall bear iniquity. [are] statutes, lord commanded moses, man wife, betweenthe father daughter, [being yet] youth father's house. avenge children israel midianites: afterward shalt thou gathered unto thy people. moses spake unto people, saying, arm unto war, let go midianites, avenge lord midian. every tribe thousand, throughout tribes israel, shall ye send war. delivered thousands israel, thousand [every] tribe, twelve thousand armed war. moses sent war, thousand [every] tribe, phinehas son eleazar priest, war, holy instruments, trumpets blow hand. warred midianites, lord commanded moses; slew males. slew kings midian, beside rest slain; [namely,] evi, rekem, zur, hur, reba, five kings midian: balaam also son beor slew sword. children israel took [all] women midian captives, little ones, took spoil cattle, flocks, goods. burnt cities wherein dwelt, goodly castles, fire. took spoil, prey, [both] men beasts. brought captives, prey, spoil, unto moses, eleazar priest, unto congregation children israel, unto camp plains moab, [are] jordan [near] jericho. moses, eleazar priest, princes congregation, went forth meet without camp. moses wroth officers host, [with] captains thousands, captains hundreds, came battle. moses said unto them, ye saved women alive? behold, caused children israel, counsel balaam, commit trespass lord matter peor, plague among congregation lord. therefore kill every male among little ones, kill every woman hath known man lying him. women children, known man lying him, keep alive yourselves. ye abide without camp seven days: whosoever hath killed person, whosoever hath touched slain, purify [both] captives third day, seventh day. purify [your] raiment, made skins, work goats' [hair,] things made wood. eleazar priest said unto men war went battle, ordinance law lord commanded moses; gold, silver, brass, iron, tin, lead, every thing may abide fire, ye shall make [it] go fire, shall clean: nevertheless shall purified water separation: abideth fire ye shall make go water. ye shall wash clothes seventh day, ye shall clean, afterward ye shall come camp. lord spake unto moses, saying, take sum prey taken, [both] man beast, thou, eleazar priest, chief fathers congregation: divide preypage 99 numbers two parts; took war upon them, went battle, congregation: levy tribute unto lord men war went battle: one soul five hundred, [both] persons, beeves, asses, sheep: take [it] half, give [it] unto eleazar priest, [for] heave offering lord. children israel's half, thou shalt take one portion fifty, persons, beeves, asses, flocks, manner beasts, give unto levites, keep charge tabernacle lord. moses eleazar priest lord commanded moses. booty, [being] rest prey men war caught, six hundred thousand seventy thousand five thousand sheep, threescore twelve thousand beeves, threescore one thousand asses, thirty two thousand persons all, women known man lying him. half, [which was] portion went war, number three hundred thousand seven thirty thousand five hundred sheep: lord's tribute sheep six hundred threescore fifteen. beeves [were] thirty six thousand; lord's tribute [was] threescore twelve. asses [were] thirty thousand five hundred; lord's tribute [was] threescore one. persons [were] sixteen thousand; lord's tribute [was] thirty two persons. moses gave tribute, [which was] lord's heave offering, unto eleazar priest, lord commanded moses. children israel's half, moses divided men warred, (now half [that pertained unto] congregation three hundred thousand thirty thousand [and] seven thousand five hundred sheep, thirty six thousand beeves, thirty thousand asses five hundred, even children israel's half, moses took one portion fifty, [both] man beast, gave unto levites, kept charge tabernacle lord; lord commanded moses. officers [were] thousands host, captains thousands, captains hundreds, came near unto moses: said unto moses, thy servants taken sum men war [are] charge, lacketh one man us. therefore brought oblation lord, every man hath gotten, jewels gold, chains, bracelets, rings, earrings, tablets, make atonement souls lord. moses eleazar priest took gold them, [even] wrought jewels. gold offering offered lord, captains thousands, captains hundreds, sixteen thousand seven hundred fifty shekels. ([for] men war taken spoil, every man himself.) moses eleazar priest took gold captains thousands hundreds, brought tabernacle congregation, [for] memorial children israel lord. children reuben children gad great multitude cattle: saw land jazer, land gilead, that, behold, place [was] place cattle; children gad children reuben came spake unto moses,and eleazar priest, unto princes congregation, saying, ataroth, dibon, jazer, nimrah, heshbon, elealeh, shebam, nebo, beon, [even] country lord smote congregation israel, [is] land cattle, thy servants cattle: wherefore, said they, found grace thy sight, let land given unto thy servants possession, [and] bring us jordan. moses said unto children gad children reuben, shall brethren go war, shall ye sit here? wherefore discourage ye heart children israel going land lord hath given them? thus fathers, sent kadesh-barnea see land. went unto valley eshcol, saw land, discouraged heart children israel, go land lord given them. lord's anger kindled time, sware, saying, surely none men came egypt, twenty years old upward, shall see land sware unto abraham, unto isaac, unto jacob; wholly followed me: save caleb son jephunneh kenezite, joshua son nun: wholly followed lord. lord's anger kindled israel, made wander wilderness forty years, generation, done evil sight lord, consumed. and, behold, ye risen fathers' stead, increase sinful men, augment yet fierce anger lord toward israel. ye turn away him, yet leave wilderness; ye shall destroy people. came near unto him, said, build sheepfolds cattle, cities little ones: go ready armed children israel, brought unto place: little ones shall dwell fenced cities inhabitants land. return unto houses, children israel inherited every man inheritance. inherit yonder side jordan, forward; inheritance fallen us side jordan eastward. moses said unto them, ye thing, ye go armed lord war, go armed jordan lord, hath driven enemies him, land subdued lord: afterward ye shall return, guiltless lord, israel; land shall possession lord. ye so, behold, ye sinned lord: sure sin find out. build cities little ones, folds sheep; hath proceeded mouth. children gad children reuben spake unto moses, saying, thy servants lord commandeth. little ones, wives, flocks, cattle, shall cities gilead: thy servants pass over, every man armed war, lord battle, lord saith. concerning moses commanded eleazar priest, joshua son nun, chief fathers tribes children israel:numbers page 100 moses said unto them, children gad children reuben pass jordan, every man armed battle, lord, land shall subdued you; ye shall give land gilead possession: pass armed, shall possessions among land canaan. children gad children reuben answered, saying, lord hath said unto thy servants, do. pass armed lord land canaan, possession inheritance side jordan [may be] ours. moses gave unto them, [even] children gad, children reuben, unto half tribe manasseh son joseph, kingdom sihon king amorites, kingdom og king bashan, land, cities thereof coasts, [even] cities country round about. children gad built dibon, ataroth, aroer, atroth, shophan, jaazer, jogbehah, beth-nimrah, beth- haran, fenced cities: folds sheep. children reuben built heshbon, elealeh, kirjathaim, nebo, baal-meon, (their names changed,) shibmah: gave names unto cities builded. children machir son manasseh went gilead, took it, dispossessed amorite [was] it. moses gave gilead unto machir son manasseh; dwelt therein. jair son manasseh went took small towns thereof, called havoth-jair. nobah went took kenath, villages thereof, called nobah, name. [are] journeys children israel, went forth land egypt armies hand moses aaron. moses wrote goings according journeys commandment lord: [are] journeys according goings out. departed rameses first month, fifteenth day first month; morrow passover children israel went high hand sight egyptians. egyptians buried [their] firstborn, lord smitten among them: upon gods also lord executed judgments. children israel removed rameses, pitched succoth. departed succoth, pitched etham, [is] edge wilderness. removed etham, turned unto pi-hahiroth, [is] baal- zephon: pitched migdol. departed pi-hahiroth, passed midst sea wilderness, went three days' journey wilderness etham, pitched marah. removed marah, came unto elim: elim [were] twelve fountains water, threescore ten palm trees; pitched there. removed elim, encamped red sea. removed red sea, encamped wilderness sin. took journey wilderness sin, encamped dophkah. departed dophkah, encamped alush. removed alush, encamped rephidim, water people drink. departed rephidim, pitched wilderness sinai. removed desert sinai, pitched kibroth-hattaavah. departed kibroth- hattaavah, encamped hazeroth. departed hazeroth, pitched rithmah. departed rithmah, pitched rimmon- parez. departed rimmon-parez, pitched libnah. removed libnah, pitched rissah. journeyed rissah, pitched kehelathah. went kehelathah, pitched mount shapher. removed mount shapher, encamped haradah. removed haradah, pitched makheloth. removed makheloth, encamped tahath. departed tahath, pitched tarah. removed tarah, pitched mithcah. went mithcah, pitched hashmonah. departed hashmonah, encamped moseroth. departed moseroth, pitched bene-jaakan. removed bene-jaakan, encamped hor-hagidgad. went hor-hagidgad, pitched jotbathah. removed jotbathah, encamped ebronah. departed ebronah, encamped ezion-gaber. removed ezion-gaber, pitched wilderness zin, [is] kadesh. removed kadesh, pitched mount hor, edge land edom. aaron priest went mount hor commandment lord, died there, fortieth year children israel come land egypt, first [day] fifth month. aaron [was] hundred twenty three years old died mount hor. king arad canaanite, dwelt south land canaan, heard coming children israel. departed mount hor, pitched zalmonah. departed zalmonah, pitched punon. departed punon, pitched oboth. departed oboth, pitched ije-abarim, border moab. departed iim, pitched dibon- gad. removed dibon-gad, encamped almon-diblathaim. removed almon-diblathaim, pitched mountains abarim, nebo. departed mountains abarim, pitched plains moab jordan [near] jericho. pitched jordan, beth- jesimoth [even] unto abel-shittim plains moab. lord spake unto moses plains moab jordan [near] jericho, saying, speak unto children israel, say unto them, ye passed jordan land canaan; ye shall drive inhabitants land you, destroy pictures, destroy molten images, quite pluck high places: ye shall dispossess [the inhabitants] land, dwell therein: given land possess it. ye shall divide land lot inheritance among families: [and] ye shall give inheritance, fewer ye shall give less inheritance: every man's [inheritance] shall place lot falleth; according tribes fathers ye shall inherit. ye drive inhabitants land you; shall come pass, ye let remain [shall be] pricks eyes, thorns sides, shall vex land wherein ye dwell. moreoverpage 101 numbers shall come pass, [that] shall unto you, thought unto them. command children israel, say unto them, ye come land canaan; (this land shall fall unto inheritance, [even] land canaan coasts thereof:) south quarter shall wilderness zin along coast edom, south border shall outmost coast salt sea eastward: border shall turn south ascent akrabbim, pass zin: going forth thereof shall south kadesh-barnea, shall go hazar-addar, pass azmon: border shall fetch compass azmon unto river egypt, goings shall sea. [as for] western border, ye shall even great sea border: shall west border. shall north border: great sea ye shall point mount hor: mount hor ye shall point [your border] unto entrance hamath; goings forth border shall zedad: border shall go ziphron, goings shall hazar- enan: shall north border. ye shall point east border hazar-enan shepham: coast shall go shepham riblah, east side ain; border shall descend, shall reach unto side sea chinnereth eastward: border shall go jordan, goings shall salt sea: shall land coasts thereof round about. moses commanded children israel, saying, [is] land ye shall inherit lot, lord commanded give unto nine tribes, half tribe: tribe children reuben according house fathers, tribe children gad according house fathers, received [their inheritance;] half tribe manasseh received inheritance: two tribes half tribe received inheritance side jordan [near] jericho eastward, toward sunrising. lord spake unto moses, saying, [are] names men shall divide land unto you: eleazar priest, joshua son nun. ye shall take one prince every tribe, divide land inheritance. names men [are] these: tribe judah, caleb son jephunneh. tribe children simeon, shemuel son ammihud. tribe benjamin, elidad son chislon. prince tribe children dan, bukki son jogli. prince children joseph, tribe children manasseh, hanniel son ephod. prince tribe children ephraim, kemuel son shiphtan. prince tribe children zebulun, elizaphan son parnach. prince tribe children issachar, paltiel son azzan. prince tribe children asher, ahihud son shelomi. prince tribe children naphtali, pedahel son ammihud. [are they] lord commanded divide inheritance unto children israel land canaan. lord spake unto moses plains moab jordan [near] jericho, saying, commandthe children israel, give unto levites inheritance possession cities dwell in; ye shall give [also] unto levites suburbs cities round them. cities shall dwell in; suburbs shall cattle, goods, beasts. suburbs cities, ye shall give unto levites, [shall reach] wall city outward thousand cubits round about. ye shall measure without city east side two thousand cubits, south side two thousand cubits, west side two thousand cubits, north side two thousand cubits city [shall be] midst: shall suburbs cities. among cities ye shall give unto levites [there shall be] six cities refuge, ye shall appoint manslayer, may flee thither: ye shall add forty two cities. [so] cities ye shall give levites [shall be] forty eight cities: [shall ye give] suburbs. cities ye shall give [shall be] possession children israel: [them have] many ye shall give many; [them have] ye shall give few: every one shall give cities unto levites according inheritance inheriteth. speak unto children israel, say unto them, ye come jordan land canaan; ye shall appoint cities cities refuge you; slayer may flee thither, killeth person unawares. shall unto cities refuge avenger; manslayer die not, stand congregation judgment. cities ye shall give six cities shall ye refuge. ye shall give three cities side jordan, three cities shall ye give land canaan, [which] shall cities refuge. six cities shall refuge, [both] children israel, stranger, sojourner among them: every one killeth person unawares may flee thither. smite instrument iron, die, [is] murderer: murderer shall surely put death. smite throwing stone, wherewith may die, die, murderer: murderer shall surely put death. [if] smite hand weapon wood, wherewith may die, die, [is] murderer: murderer shall surely put death. revenger blood shall slay murderer: meeteth him, shall slay him. thrust hatred, hurl laying wait, die; enmity smite hand, die: smote [him] shall surely put death; [for] [is] murderer: revenger blood shall slay murderer, meeteth him. thrust suddenly without enmity, cast upon thing without laying wait, stone, wherewith man may die, seeing [him] not, cast [it] upon him, die, [was] enemy, neither sought harm: congregation shall judge slayer revenger blood according judgments: congregation shall deliver slayer hand revenger blood, congregation shall restore city refuge, whither fled: shall abide unto death high priest, anointed holy oil. slayer shall time come without border city refuge, whither fled; revenger bloodnumbers page 102 find without borders city refuge, revenger blood kill slayer; shall guilty blood: remained city refuge death high priest: death high priest slayer shall return land possession. [things] shall statute judgment unto throughout generations dwellings. whoso killeth person, murderer shall put death mouth witnesses: one witness shall testify person [to cause him] die. moreover ye shall take satisfaction life murderer, [is] guilty death: shall surely put death. ye shall take satisfaction fled city refuge, come dwell land, death priest. ye shall pollute land wherein ye [are:] blood defileth land: land cannot cleansed blood shed therein, blood shed it. defile therefore land ye shall inhabit, wherein dwell: lord dwell among children israel. chief fathers families children gilead, son machir, son manasseh, families sons joseph, came near, spake moses, princes, chief fathers children israel: said, lord commanded lord give land inheritance lot children israel: lord commanded lord give inheritance zelophehad brother unto daughters. married sons [other] tribes children israel, shall inheritance taken inheritance fathers, shall put inheritance tribe whereunto received: shall taken lot inheritance. jubile children israel shall be, shall inheritance put unto inheritance tribe whereunto received: shall inheritance taken away inheritance tribe fathers. moses commanded children israel according word lord, saying, tribe sons joseph hath said well. thing lord doth command concerning daughters zelophehad, saying, let marry think best; family tribe father shall marry. shall inheritance children israel remove tribe tribe: every one children israel shall keep inheritance tribe fathers. every daughter, possesseth inheritance tribe children israel, shall wife unto one family tribe father, children israel may enjoy every man inheritance fathers. neither shall inheritance remove [one] tribe another tribe; every one tribes children israel shall keep inheritance. even lord commanded moses, daughters zelophehad: mahlah, tirzah, hoglah, milcah, noah, daughters zelophehad, married unto father's brothers' sons: [and] married families sons manasseh son joseph, inheritance remained tribe family father. [are] commandments judgments, lord commanded hand moses unto children israel plains moab jordan [near] jericho.page 103 deuteronomy fifth book moses, called deuteronomy [be] words moses spake unto israel side jordan wilderness, plain red [sea,] paran, tophel, laban, hazeroth, dizahab. ([there are] eleven days' [journey] horeb way mount seir unto kadesh-barnea.) came pass fortieth year, eleventh month, first [day] month, [that] moses spake unto children israel, according unto lord given commandment unto them; slain sihon king amorites, dwelt heshbon, og king bashan, dwelt astaroth edrei: side jordan, land moab, began moses declare law, saying, lord god spake unto us horeb, saying, ye dwelt long enough mount: turn you, take journey, go mount amorites, unto [the places] nigh thereunto, plain, hills, vale, south, sea side, land canaanites, unto lebanon, unto great river, river euphrates. behold, set land you: go possess land lord sware unto fathers, abraham, isaac, jacob, give unto seed them. spake unto time, saying, able bear alone: lord god hath multiplied you, and, behold, ye [are] day stars heaven multitude. (the lord god fathers make thousand times many ye [are,] bless you, hath promised you!) alone bear cumbrance, burden, strife? take wise men, understanding, known among tribes, make rulers you. ye answered me, said, thing thou hast spoken good [for us] do. took chief tribes, wise men, known, made heads you, captains thousands, captains hundreds, captains fifties, captains tens, officers among tribes. charged judges time, saying, hear [the causes] brethren, judge righteously [every] man brother, stranger [that is] him. ye shall respect persons judgment; [but ]ye shall hear small well great; ye shall afraid face man; judgment [is ]god's: cause hard you, bring [it ]unto me, hear it. commanded time things ye do. departed horeb, went great terrible wilderness, ye saw way mountain amorites, lord god commanded us; came kadesh-barnea. said unto you, ye come unto mountain amorites, lord god doth give unto us. behold, lord thy god hath set land thee: go [and] possess [it,] lord god thy fathers hath said unto thee; fear not, neither discouraged. ye came near unto every one you, said, send men us, shall search us land, bring us word way mustgo up, cities shall come. saying pleased well: took twelve men you, one tribe: turned went mountain, came unto valley eshcol, searched out. took fruit land hands, brought [it] unto us, brought us word again, said, [it is] good land lord god doth give us. notwithstanding ye would go up, rebelled commandment lord god: ye murmured tents, said, lord hated us, hath brought us forth land egypt, deliver us hand amorites, destroy us. whither shall go up? brethren discouraged heart, saying, people [is] greater taller we; cities [are] great walled heaven; moreover seen sons anakims there. said unto you, dread not, neither afraid them. lord god goeth you, shall fight you, according egypt eyes; wilderness, thou hast seen lord thy god bare thee, man doth bear son, way ye went, ye came place. yet thing ye believe lord god, went way you, search place pitch tents [in,] fire night, shew way ye go, cloud day. lord heard voice words, wroth, sware, saying, surely shall one men evil generation see good land, sware give unto fathers, save caleb son jephunneh; shall see it, give land hath trodden upon, children, hath wholly followed lord. also lord angry sakes, saying, thou also shalt go thither. [but] joshua son nun, standeth thee, shall go thither: encourage him: shall cause israel inherit it. moreover little ones, ye said prey, children, day knowledge good evil, shall go thither, unto give it, shall possess it. [as for] you, turn you, take journey wilderness way red sea. ye answered said unto me, sinned lord, go fight, according lord god commanded us. ye girded every man weapons war, ye ready go hill. lord said unto me, say unto them, go up, neither fight; [am] among you; lest ye smitten enemies. spake unto you; ye would hear, rebelled commandment lord, went presumptuously hill. amorites, dwelt mountain, came you, chased you, bees do, destroyed seir, [even] unto hormah. ye returned wept lord; lord would hearken voice, give ear unto you. ye abode kadesh many days, according unto days ye abode [there. ] turned, took journey wilderness way red sea, lord spake unto me: compassed mount seir many days. lord spake unto me, saying, ye compassed mountain long enough: turn northward. command thou people, saying, ye [are] pass coast brethren children esau, dwell seir; shall afraid you: take yedeuteronomy page 104 good heed unto therefore: meddle them; give land, no, much footbreadth; given mount seir unto esau [for] possession. ye shall buy meat money, ye may eat; ye shall also buy water money, ye may drink. lord thy god hath blessed thee works thy hand: knoweth thy walking great wilderness: forty years lord thy god [hath been] thee; thou hast lacked nothing. passed brethren children esau, dwelt seir, way plain elath, ezion-gaber, turned passed way wilderness moab. lord said unto me, distress moabites, neither contend battle: give thee land [for] possession; given ar unto children lot [for] possession. emims dwelt therein times past, people great, many, tall, anakims; also accounted giants, anakims; moabites call emims. horims also dwelt seir beforetime; children esau succeeded them, destroyed them, dwelt stead; israel unto land possession, lord gave unto them. rise up, [said i,] get brook zered. went brook zered. space came kadesh-barnea, come brook zered, [was] thirty eight years; generation men war wasted among host, lord sware unto them. indeed hand lord them, destroy among host, consumed. came pass, men war consumed dead among people, lord spake unto me, saying, thou art pass ar, coast moab, day: [when] thou comest nigh children ammon, distress not, meddle them: give thee land children ammon [any] possession; given unto children lot [for] possession. (that also accounted land giants: giants dwelt therein old time; ammonites call zamzummims; people great, many, tall, anakims; lord destroyed them; succeeded them, dwelt stead: children esau, dwelt seir, destroyed horims them; succeeded them, dwelt stead even unto day: avims dwelt hazerim, [even] unto azzah, caphtorims, came forth caphtor, destroyed them, dwelt stead.) rise ye up, take journey, pass river arnon: behold, given thine hand sihon amorite, king heshbon, land: begin possess [it,] contend battle. day begin put dread thee fear thee upon nations [that are] whole heaven, shall hear report thee, shall tremble, anguish thee. sent messengers wilderness kedemoth unto sihon king heshbon words peace, saying, let pass thy land: go along high way, neither turn unto right hand left. thou shalt sell meat formoney, may eat; give water money, may drink: pass feet; (as children esau dwell seir, moabites dwell ar, unto me;) shall pass jordan land lord god giveth us. sihon king heshbon would let us pass him: lord thy god hardened spirit, made heart obstinate, might deliver thy hand, [appeareth] day. lord said unto me, behold, begun give sihon land thee: begin possess, thou mayest inherit land. sihon came us, people, fight jahaz. lord god delivered us; smote him, sons, people. took cities time, utterly destroyed men, women, little ones, every city, left none remain: cattle took prey unto ourselves, spoil cities took. aroer, [is] brink river arnon, [from] city [is] river, even unto gilead, one city strong us: lord god delivered unto us: unto land children ammon thou camest not, unto place river jabbok, [nor] unto cities mountains, unto whatsoever lord god forbad us. turned, went way bashan: og king bashan came us, people, battle edrei. lord said unto me, fear not: deliver him, people, land, thy hand; thou shalt unto thou didst unto sihon king amorites, dwelt heshbon. lord god delivered hands og also, king bashan, people: smote none left remaining. took cities time, city took them, threescore cities, region argob, kingdom og bashan. cities [were] fenced high walls, gates, bars; beside unwalled towns great many. utterly destroyed them, unto sihon king heshbon, utterly destroying men, women, children, every city. cattle, spoil cities, took prey ourselves. took time hand two kings amorites land [was] side jordan, river arnon unto mount hermon; ([which] hermon sidonians call sirion; amorites call shenir;) cities plain, gilead, bashan, unto salchah edrei, cities kingdom og bashan. og king bashan remained remnant giants; behold, bedstead [was] bedstead iron; rabbath children ammon? nine cubits length thereof, four cubits breadth it, cubit man. land, [which] possessed time, aroer, [is] river arnon, half mount gilead, cities thereof, gave unto reubenites gadites. rest gilead, bashan, [being] kingdom og, gave unto half tribe manasseh; region argob, bashan, called land giants. jair son manasseh took country argob unto coasts geshuri maachathi; called name, bashan- havoth-jair, unto day. gave gilead unto machir. unto reubenites unto gadites gave gilead even unto river arnon half valley, border even unto riverpage 105 deuteronomy jabbok, [which is] border children ammon; plain also, jordan, coast [thereof,] chinnereth even unto sea plain, [even] salt sea, ashdoth-pisgah eastward. commanded time, saying, lord god hath given land possess it: ye shall pass armed brethren children israel, [that are] meet war. wives, little ones, cattle, ([for] know ye much cattle,) shall abide cities given you; lord given rest unto brethren, well unto you, [until] also possess land lord god hath given beyond jordan: [then] shall ye return every man unto possession, given you. commanded joshua time, saying, thine eyes seen lord god hath done unto two kings: shall lord unto kingdoms whither thou passest. ye shall fear them: lord god shall fight you. besought lord time, saying, lord god, thou hast begun shew thy servant thy greatness, thy mighty hand: god [is there] heaven earth, according thy works, according thy might? pray thee, let go over, see good land [is] beyond jordan, goodly mountain, lebanon. lord wroth sakes, would hear me: lord said unto me, let suffice thee; speak unto matter. get thee top pisgah, lift thine eyes westward, northward, southward, eastward, behold [it] thine eyes: thou shalt go jordan. charge joshua, encourage him, strengthen him: shall go people, shall cause inherit land thou shalt see. abode valley beth- peor. therefore hearken, israel, unto statutes unto judgments, teach you, [them,] ye may live, go possess land lord god fathers giveth you. ye shall add unto word command you, neither shall ye diminish [ought] it, ye may keep commandments lord god command you. eyes seen lord baal-peor: men followed baal- peor, lord thy god hath destroyed among you. ye cleave unto lord god [are] alive every one day. behold, taught statutes judgments, even lord god commanded me, ye land whither ye go possess it. keep therefore [them;] [is] wisdom understanding sight nations, shall hear statutes, say, surely great nation [is] wise understanding people. nation [is so] great, [hath] god [so] nigh unto them, lord god [is] [things that] call upon [for? ] nation [is so] great, hath statutes judgments [so] righteous law, set day? take heed thyself, keep thy soul diligently, lest thou forget things thine eyes seen, lest depart thy heart days thy life: teach thy sons, thy sons' sons; [specially] day thou stoodest lord thy god horeb, lord said unto me,gather people together, make hear words, may learn fear days shall live upon earth, [that] may teach children. ye came near stood mountain; mountain burned fire unto midst heaven, darkness, clouds, thick darkness. lord spake unto midst fire: ye heard voice words, saw similitude; [ye heard] voice. declared unto covenant, commanded perform, [even] ten commandments; wrote upon two tables stone. lord commanded time teach statutes judgments, ye might land whither ye go possess it. take ye therefore good heed unto yourselves; ye saw manner similitude day [that] lord spake unto horeb midst fire: lest ye corrupt [yourselves,] make graven image, similitude figure, likeness male female, likeness beast [is] earth, likeness winged fowl flieth air, likeness thing creepeth ground, likeness fish [is] waters beneath earth: lest thou lift thine eyes unto heaven, thou seest sun, moon, stars, [even] host heaven, shouldest driven worship them, serve them, lord thy god hath divided unto nations whole heaven. lord hath taken you, brought forth iron furnace, [even] egypt, unto people inheritance, [ye are] day. furthermore lord angry sakes, sware go jordan, go unto good land, lord thy god giveth thee [for] inheritance: must die land, must go jordan: ye shall go over, possess good land. take heed unto yourselves, lest ye forget covenant lord god, made you, make graven image, [or] likeness [thing,] lord thy god hath forbidden thee. lord thy god [is] consuming fire, [even] jealous god. thou shalt beget children, children's children, ye shall remained long land, shall corrupt [yourselves,] make graven image, [or] likeness [thing,] shall evil sight lord thy god, provoke anger: call heaven earth witness day, ye shall soon utterly perish land whereunto ye go jordan possess it; ye shall prolong [your] days upon it, shall utterly destroyed. lord shall scatter among nations, ye shall left number among heathen, whither lord shall lead you. ye shall serve gods, work men's hands, wood stone, neither see, hear, eat, smell. thence thou shalt seek lord thy god, thou shalt find [him,] thou seek thy heart thy soul. thou art tribulation, things come upon thee, [even] latter days, thou turn lord thy god, shalt obedient unto voice; (for lord thy god [is] merciful god;) forsake thee, neither destroy thee, forget covenant thy fathers sware unto them. ask days past, thee, since day god created man upon earth,deuteronomy page 106 [ask] one side heaven unto other, whether hath [any thing] great thing [is,] hath heard like it? [ever] people hear voice god speaking midst fire, thou hast heard, live? hath god assayed go [and] take nation midst another [nation,] temptations, signs, wonders, war, mighty hand, stretched arm, great terrors, according lord god egypt eyes? unto thee shewed, thou mightest know lord [is] god; [there is] none else beside him. heaven made thee hear voice, might instruct thee: upon earth shewed thee great fire; thou heardest words midst fire. loved thy fathers, therefore chose seed them, brought thee sight mighty power egypt; thy manservant thy maidservant may rest well thou. remember thou wast servant land egypt, [that] lord thy god brought thee thence mighty hand stretched arm: therefore lord thy god commanded thee keep sabbath day. honour thy father thy mother, lord thy god hath commanded thee; thy days may prolonged, may go well thee, land lord thy god giveth thee. thou shalt kill. neither shalt thou steal. neither shalt thou bear false witness thy neighbour. neither shalt thou desire thy neighbour's wife, neither shalt thou covet thy neighbour's house, field, manservant, maidservant, ox, ass, [thing] [is] thy neighbour's. words lord spake unto assembly mount midst fire, cloud, thick darkness, great voice: added more. wrote two tables stone, delivered unto me. came pass, ye heard voice midst darkness, (for mountain burn fire,) ye came near unto me, [even] heads tribes, elders; [and] thy son asketh thee time come, saying, [mean] testimonies, statutes, judgments, lord god hath commanded you? thou shalt say unto thy son, pharaoh's bondmen egypt; lord brought us egypt mighty hand: lord shewed signs wonders, great sore, upon egypt, upon pharaoh, upon household, eyes: brought us thence, might bring us in, give us land sware unto fathers. lord commanded us statutes, fear lord god, goodalways, might preserve us alive, [it is] day. shall righteousness, observe commandments lord god, hath commanded us. lord thy god shall bring thee land whither thou goest possess it, hath cast many nations thee, hittites, girgashites, amorites, canaanites, perizzites, hivites, jebusites, seven nations greater mightier thou; [is] cursed thing. commandments command thee day shall ye observe do, ye may live, multiply, go possess land lord sware unto fathers. thou shalt remember way lord thy god led thee forty years wilderness, humble thee, [and] prove thee, know [was] thine heart, whether thou wouldest keep commandments, no. humbled thee, suffered thee hunger, fed thee manna, thou knewest not, neither thy fathers know; might make thee know man doth live bread only, every [word] proceedeth mouth lord doth man live. thy raiment waxed old upon thee, neither thy foot swell, forty years. thou shalt also consider thine heart, that, man chasteneth son, [so] lord thy god chasteneth thee. therefore thou shalt keep commandments lord thy god, walk ways, fear him. lord thy god bringeth thee good land, land brooks water, fountains depths spring valleys hills; land wheat, barley, vines, fig trees, pomegranates; land oil olive, honey; land wherein thou shalt eat bread without scarceness, thou shalt lack [thing] it; land whose stones iron, whose hills thou mayest dig brass. thou hast eaten art full, thou shalt bless lord thy god good land hath given thee. beware thou forget lord thy god, keeping commandments, judgments, statutes, command thee day: lest [when] thou hast eaten art full, hast built goodly houses, dwelt [therein; ye shall pour upon earth water. thou mayest eat within thy gates tithe thy corn, thy wine, thy oil, firstlings thy herds thy flock, thy vows thou vowest, thy freewill offerings, heave offering thine hand: thou must eat lord thy god place lord thy god shall choose, thou, thy son, thy daughter, thy manservant, thy maidservant, levite [is] within thy gates: thou shalt rejoice lord thy god thou puttest thine hands unto. take heed thyself thou forsake levite long thou livest upon earth. lord thy god shall enlarge thy border, hath promised thee, thou shalt say, eat flesh, thy soul longeth eat flesh; thou mayest eat flesh, whatsoever thy soul lusteth after. place lord thy god hath chosen put name far thee, thou shalt kill thy herd thy flock, lord hath given thee, commanded thee, thou shalt eat thy gates whatsoever thy soul lusteth after. even roebuck hart eaten, thou shalt eat them: unclean clean shall eat [of] alike. sure thou eat blood: blood [is] life; thou mayest eat life flesh. thou shalt eat it; thou shalt pour upon earth water. thou shalt eat it; may go well thee, thy children thee, thou shalt [that is] right sight lord. thy holy things thou hast, thy vows, thou shalt take, go unto place lord shall choose: thou shalt offer thy burnt offerings, flesh blood, upon altar lord thy god: blood thy sacrifices shall poured upon altarpage 111 deuteronomy lord thy god, thou shalt eat flesh. observe hear words command thee, may go well thee, thy children thee ever, thou doest [that is] good right sight lord thy god. lord thy god shall cut nations thee, whither thou goest possess them, thou succeedest them, dwellest land; even sons daughters burnt fire gods. thing soever command you, observe it: thou shalt add thereto, diminish it. arise among prophet, dreamer dreams, giveth thee sign wonder, sign wonder come pass, whereof spake unto thee, saying, let us go gods, thou hast known, let us serve them; hath spoken turn [you] away lord god, brought land egypt, redeemed house bondage, thrust thee way lord thy god commanded thee walk in. shalt thou put evil away midst thee. thy brother, son thy mother, thy son, thy daughter, wife thy bosom, thy friend, [is] thine soul, entice thee secretly, saying, let us go serve gods, thou hast known, thou, thy fathers; [namely,] gods people [are] round you, nigh unto thee, far thee, [one] end earth even unto [other] end earth; thou shalt consent unto him, hearken unto him; neither shall thine eye pity him, neither shalt thou spare, neither shalt thou conceal him: thou shalt surely kill him; thine hand shall first upon put death, afterwards hand people. thou shalt stone stones, die; hath sought thrust thee away lord thy god, brought thee land egypt, house bondage. israel shall hear, fear, shall wickedness among you. thou shalt hear [say] one thy cities, lord thy god hath given thee dwell there, saying, [certain] men, children belial, gone among you, withdrawn inhabitants city, saying, let us go serve gods, ye known; shalt thou enquire, make search, ask diligently; and, behold, [if be] truth, [and] thing certain, [that] abomination wrought among you; thou shalt surely smite inhabitants city edge sword, destroying utterly, [is] therein, cattle thereof, edgeof sword. thou shalt gather spoil midst street thereof, shalt burn fire city, spoil thereof every whit, lord thy god: shall heap ever; shall built again. shall cleave nought cursed thing thine hand: lord may turn fierceness anger, shew thee mercy, compassion upon thee, multiply thee, hath sworn unto thy fathers; thou shalt hearken voice lord thy god, keep commandments command thee day, [that is] right eyes lord thy god. ye [are] children lord god: ye shall cut yourselves, make baldness eyes dead. thou [art] holy people unto lord thy god, lord hath chosen thee peculiar people unto himself, nations [are] upon earth. [are] beasts ye shall eat: ox, sheep, goat, hart, roebuck, fallow deer, wild goat, pygarg, wild ox, chamois. every beast parteth hoof, cleaveth cleft two claws, [and] cheweth cud among beasts, ye shall eat. nevertheless ye shall eat chew cud, divide cloven hoof; [as] camel, hare, coney: chew cud, divide hoof; [therefore] [are] unclean unto you. swine, divideth hoof, yet cheweth cud, unclean unto you: ye shall eat flesh, touch dead carcase. ye shall eat [are] waters: fins scales shall ye eat: whatsoever hath fins scales ye may eat; [is] unclean unto you. [are they] ye shall eat: eagle, ossifrage, ospray, glede, kite, vulture kind, every raven kind, owl, night hawk, cuckow, hawk kind, little owl, great owl, swan, pelican, gier eagle, cormorant, stork, heron kind, lapwing, bat. every creeping thing flieth [is] unclean unto you: shall eaten. [but of] clean fowls ye may eat. ye shall eat [of] thing dieth itself: thou shalt give unto stranger [is] thy gates, may eat it; thou mayest sell unto alien: thou [art] holy people unto lord thy god. thou shalt seethe kid mother's milk. thou shalt truly tithe increase thy seed, field bringeth forth year year. thou shalt eat lord thy god, place shall choose place name there, tithe thy corn, thy wine, thine oil, firstlings thy herds thy flocks; thou mayest learn fear lord thy god always. way long thee, thou art able carry it; [or] place far thee, lord thy god shall choose set name there, lord thy god hath blessed thee: shalt thou turn [it] money, bind moneydeuteronomy page 112 thine hand, shalt go unto place lord thy god shall choose: thou shalt bestow money whatsoever thy soul lusteth after, oxen, sheep, wine, strong drink, whatsoever thy soul desireth: thou shalt eat lord thy god, thou shalt rejoice, thou, thine household, levite [is] within thy gates; thou shalt forsake him; hath part inheritance thee. end three years thou shalt bring forth tithe thine increase year, shalt lay [it] within thy gates: levite, (because hath part inheritance thee,) stranger, fatherless, widow, [are] within thy gates, shall come, shall eat satisfied; lord thy god may bless thee work thine hand thou doest. end [every] seven years thou shalt make release. [is] manner release: every creditor lendeth [ought] unto neighbour shall release [it;] shall exact [it] neighbour, brother; called lord's release. foreigner thou mayest exact [it again:] [that] thine thy brother thine hand shall release; save shall poor among you; lord shall greatly bless thee land lord thy god giveth thee [for] inheritance possess it: thou carefully hearken unto voice lord thy god, observe commandments command thee day. lord thy god blesseth thee, promised thee: thou shalt lend unto many nations, thou shalt borrow; thou shalt reign many nations,but shall reign thee. among poor man one thy brethren within thy gates thy land lord thy god giveth thee, thou shalt harden thine heart, shut thine hand thy poor brother: thou shalt open thine hand wide unto him, shalt surely lend sufficient need, [in that] wanteth. beware thought thy wicked heart, saying, seventh year, year release, hand; thine eye evil thy poor brother, thou givest nought; cry unto lord thee, sin unto thee. thou shalt surely give him, thine heart shall grieved thou givest unto him: thing lord thy god shall bless thee thy works, thou puttest thine hand unto. poor shall never cease land: therefore command thee, saying, thou shalt open thine hand wide unto thy brother, thy poor, thy needy, thy land. [and] thy brother, hebrew man, hebrew woman, sold unto thee, serve thee six years; seventh year thou shalt let go free thee. thou sendest free thee, thou shalt let go away empty: thou shalt furnish liberally thy flock, thy floor, thy winepress: [of that] wherewith lord thy god hath blessed thee thou shalt give unto him. thou shalt remember thou wast bondman land egypt, lord thy god redeemed thee: therefore command thee thing day. shall be, say unto thee, go away thee; loveth thee thine house, well thee; thou shalt take aul, thrust[it] ear unto door, shall thy servant ever. also unto thy maidservant thou shalt likewise. shall seem hard unto thee, thou sendest away free thee; hath worth double hired servant [to thee,] serving thee six years: lord thy god shall bless thee thou doest. firstling males come thy herd thy flock thou shalt sanctify unto lord thy god: thou shalt work firstling thy bullock, shear firstling thy sheep. thou shalt eat [it] lord thy god year year place lord shall choose, thou thy household. [any] blemish therein, [as be] lame, blind, [or have] ill blemish, thou shalt sacrifice unto lord thy god. thou shalt eat within thy gates: unclean clean [person shall eat it] alike, roebuck, hart. thou shalt eat blood thereof; thou shalt pour upon ground water. observe month abib, keep passover unto lord thy god: month abib lord thy god brought thee forth egypt night. thou shalt therefore sacrifice passover unto lord thy god, flock herd, place lord shall choose place name there. thou shalt eat leavened bread it; seven days shalt thou eat unleavened bread therewith, [even] bread affliction; thou camest forth land egypt haste: thou mayest remember day thou camest forth land egypt days thy life. shall leavened bread seen thee thy coast seven days; neither shall [any thing] flesh, thou sacrificedst first day even, remain night morning. thou mayest sacrifice passover within thy gates, lord thy god giveth thee: place lord thy god shall choose place name in, thou shalt sacrifice passover even, going sun, season thou camest forth egypt. thou shalt roast eat [it] place lord thy god shall choose: thou shalt turn morning, go unto thy tents. six days thou shalt eat unleavened bread: seventh day [shall be] solemn assembly lord thy god: thou shalt work [therein. ] seven weeks shalt thou number unto thee: begin number seven weeks [such time as] thou beginnest [to put] sickle corn. thou shalt keep feast weeks unto lord thy god tribute freewill offering thine hand, thou shalt give [unto lord thy god,] according lord thy god hath blessed thee: thou shalt rejoice lord thy god, thou, thy son, thy daughter, thy manservant, thy maidservant, levite [is] within thy gates, stranger, fatherless, widow, [are] among you, place lord thy god hath chosen place name there. thou shalt remember thou wast bondman egypt: thou shalt observe statutes. thou shalt observe feast tabernacles seven days, thou hast gathered thy corn thy wine: thou shalt rejoice thy feast, thou, thy son, thy daughter, thy manservant, thypage 113 deuteronomy maidservant, levite, stranger, fatherless, widow, [are] within thy gates. seven days shalt thou keep solemn feast unto lord thy god place lord shall choose: lord thy god shall bless thee thine increase, works thine hands, therefore thou shalt surely rejoice. three times year shall thy males appear lord thy god place shall choose; feast unleavened bread, feast weeks, feast tabernacles: shall appear lord empty: every man [shall give] able, according blessing lord thy god hath given thee. judges officers shalt thou make thee thy gates, lord thy god giveth thee, throughout thy tribes: shall judge people judgment. thou shalt wrest judgment; thou shalt respect persons, neither take gift: gift doth blind eyes wise, pervert words righteous. altogether shalt thou follow, thou mayest live, inherit land lord thy god giveth thee. thou shalt plant thee grove trees near unto altar lord thy god, thou shalt make thee. neither shalt thou set thee [any] image; lord thy god hateth. thou shalt sacrifice unto lord thy god [any] bullock, sheep, wherein blemish, [or] evilfavouredness: [is] abomination unto lord thy god. found among you, within thy gates lord thy god giveth thee, man woman, hath wrought wickedness sight lord thy god, transgressing covenant, hath gone served gods, worshipped them, either sun, moon, host heaven, commanded; told thee, thou hast heard [of it,] enquired diligently, and, behold, [it be] true, [and] thing certain, [that] abomination wrought israel: shalt thou bring forth man woman, committed wicked thing, unto thy gates, [even] man woman, shalt stone stones, till die. mouth two witnesses, three witnesses, shall worthy death put death; [but] mouth one witness shall put death. hands witnesses shall first upon put death, afterward hands people. thou shalt put evil away among you. arise matter hard thee judgment, blood blood, plea plea, stroke stroke, [being] matters controversy within thy gates: shalt thou arise, get thee place lord thy god shall choose; thou shalt come unto priests levites, unto judge shall days, enquire; shall shew thee sentence judgment: thou shalt according sentence, place lord shall choose shall shew thee; thou shalt observe according inform thee: according sentence law shall teach thee, according judgmentwhich shall tell thee, thou shalt do: thou shalt decline sentence shall shew thee, [to] right hand, [to] left. man presumptuously, hearken unto priest standeth minister lord thy god, unto judge, even man shall die: thou shalt put away evil israel. people shall hear, fear, presumptuously. thou art come unto land lord thy god giveth thee, shalt possess it, shalt dwell therein, shalt say, set king me, like nations [are] me; thou shalt wise set [him] king thee, lord thy god shall choose: [one] among thy brethren shalt thou set king thee: thou mayest set stranger thee, [is] thy brother. shall multiply horses himself, cause people return egypt, end multiply horses: forasmuch lord hath said unto you, ye shall henceforth return way. neither shall multiply wives himself, heart turn away: neither shall greatly multiply silver gold. shall be, sitteth upon throne kingdom, shall write copy law book [that is] priests levites: shall him, shall read therein days life: may learn fear lord god, keep words law statutes, them: heart lifted brethren, turn aside commandment, [to] right hand, [to] left: end may prolong [his] days kingdom, he, children, midst israel. priests levites, [and] tribe levi, shall part inheritance israel: shall eat offerings lord made fire, inheritance. therefore shall inheritance among brethren: lord [is] inheritance, hath said unto them. shall priest's due people, offer sacrifice, whether [it be] ox sheep; shall give unto priest shoulder, two cheeks, maw. firstfruit [also] thy corn, thy wine, thine oil, first fleece thy sheep, shalt thou give him. lord thy god hath chosen thy tribes, stand minister name lord, sons ever. levite come thy gates israel, sojourned, come desire mind unto place lord shall choose; shall minister name lord god, brethren levites [do,] stand lord. shall like portions eat, beside cometh sale patrimony. thou art come land lord thy god giveth thee, thou shalt learn abominations nations. shall found among [any one] maketh son daughter pass fire, useth divination, [or] observer times, enchanter, witch, charmer, consulter familiar spirits, wizard, necromancer. things [are] abomination unto lord: abominations lord thy god doth drivedeuteronomy page 114 thee. thou shalt perfect lord thy god. nations, thou shalt possess, hearkened unto observers times, unto diviners: thee, lord thy god hath suffered thee [to do. ] lord thy god raise unto thee prophet midst thee, thy brethren, like unto me; unto ye shall hearken; according thou desiredst lord thy god horeb day assembly, saying, let hear voice lord god, neither let see great fire more, die not. lord said unto me, well [spoken that] spoken. raise prophet among brethren, like unto thee, put words mouth; shall speak unto shall command him. shall come pass, [that] whosoever hearken unto words shall speak name, require [it] him. prophet, shall presume speak word name, commanded speak, shall speak name gods, even prophet shall die. thou say thine heart, shall know word lord hath spoken? prophet speaketh name lord, thing follow not, come pass, [is] thing lord hath spoken, [but] prophet hath spoken presumptuously: thou shalt afraid him. lord thy god hath cut nations, whose land lord thy god giveth thee, thou succeedest them, dwellest cities, houses; thou shalt separate three cities thee midst thy land, lord thy god giveth thee possess it. thou shalt prepare thee way, divide coasts thy land, lord thy god giveth thee inherit, three parts, every slayer may flee thither. [is] case slayer, shall flee thither, may live: whoso killeth neighbour ignorantly, hated time past; man goeth wood neighbour hew wood, hand fetcheth stroke axe cut tree, head slippeth helve, lighteth upon neighbour, die; shall flee unto one cities, live: lest avenger blood pursue slayer, heart hot, overtake him, way long, slay him; whereas [was] worthy death, inasmuch hated time past. wherefore command thee, saying, thou shalt separate three cities thee. lord thy god enlarge thy coast, hath sworn unto thy fathers, give thee land promised give unto thy fathers; thou shalt keep commandments them, command thee day, love lord thy god, walk ever ways; shalt thou add three cities thee, beside three: innocent blood shed thy land, lord thy god giveth thee [for] inheritance, [so] blood upon thee. man hate neighbour, lie wait him, rise him, smite mortally die, fleeth one cities: elders city shall send fetch thence, deliver hand avenger blood, hemay die. thine eye shall pity him, thou shalt put away [the guilt of] innocent blood israel, may go well thee. thou shalt remove thy neighbour's landmark, old time set thine inheritance, thou shalt inherit land lord thy god giveth thee possess it. one witness shall rise man iniquity, sin, sin sinneth: mouth two witnesses, mouth three witnesses, shall matter established. false witness rise man testify [that is] wrong; men, controversy [is,] shall stand lord, priests judges, shall days; judges shall make diligent inquisition: and, behold, [if] witness [be] false witness, [and] hath testified falsely brother; shall ye unto him, thought done unto brother: shalt thou put evil away among you. remain shall hear, fear, shall henceforth commit evil among you. thine eye shall pity; [but] life [shall go] life, eye eye, tooth tooth, hand hand, foot foot. thou goest battle thine enemies, seest horses, chariots, [and] people thou, afraid them: lord thy god [is] thee, brought thee land egypt. shall be, ye come nigh unto battle, priest shall approach speak unto people, shall say unto them, hear, israel, ye approach day unto battle enemies: let hearts faint, fear not, tremble, neither ye terrified them; lord god [is] goeth you, fight enemies, save you. officers shall speak unto people, saying, man [is there] hath built new house, hath dedicated it? let go return house, lest die battle, another man dedicate it. man [is he] hath planted vineyard, hath [yet] eaten it? let [also] go return unto house, lest die battle, another man eat it. man [is there] hath betrothed wife, hath taken her? let go return unto house, lest die battle, another man take her. officers shall speak unto people, shall say, man [is is] fearful fainthearted? let go return unto house, lest brethren's heart faint well heart. shall be, officers made end speaking unto people, shall make captains armies lead people. thou comest nigh unto city fight it, proclaim peace unto it. shall be, make thee answer peace, open unto thee, shall be, [that] people [that is] found therein shall tributaries unto thee, shall serve thee. make peace thee, make war thee, thou shalt besiege it: lord thy god hath delivered thine hands, thou shalt smite every male thereof edge sword: women, little ones, cattle,page 115 deuteronomy city, [even] spoil thereof, shalt thou take unto thyself; thou shalt eat spoil thine enemies, lord thy god hath given thee. thus shalt thou unto cities [which are] far thee, [are] cities nations. cities people, lord thy god doth give thee [for] inheritance, thou shalt save alive nothing breatheth: thou shalt utterly destroy them; [namely,] hittites, amorites, canaanites, perizzites, hivites, jebusites; lord thy god hath commanded thee: teach abominations, done unto gods; ye sin lord god. thou shalt besiege city long time, making war take it, thou shalt destroy trees thereof forcing axe them: thou mayest eat them, thou shalt cut (for tree field [is] man's [life]) employ [them] siege: trees thou knowest [be] trees meat, thou shalt destroy cut down; thou shalt build bulwarks city maketh war thee, subdued. [one] found slain land lord thy god giveth thee possess it, lying field, [and] known hath slain him: thy elders thy judges shall come forth, shall measure unto cities [are] round slain: shall be, [that] city [which is] next unto slain man, even elders city shall take heifer, hath wrought with, [and] hath drawn yoke; elders city shall bring heifer unto rough valley, neither eared sown, shall strike heifer's neck valley: priests sons levi shall come near; lord thy god hath chosen minister unto him, bless name lord; word shall every controversy every stroke [tried: ] elders city, [that are] next unto slain [man,] shall wash hands heifer beheaded valley: shall answer say, hands shed blood, neither eyes seen [it. ] merciful, lord, unto thy people israel, thou hast redeemed, lay innocent blood unto thy people israel's charge. blood shall forgiven them. shalt thou put away [guilt of] innocent blood among you, thou shalt [that is] right sight lord. thou goest forth war thine enemies, lord thy god hath delivered thine hands, thou hast taken captive, seest among captives beautiful woman, hast desire unto her, thou wouldest thy wife; thou shalt bring home thine house; shall shave head, pare nails; shall put raiment captivity her, shall remain thine house, bewail father mother full month: thou shalt go unto her, husband, shall thy wife. shall be, thou delight her, thou shalt let go whither will; thou shalt sell money, thou shalt make merchandise her, thou hast humbled her. man two wives, one beloved, another hated, born children, [both] thebeloved hated; firstborn son hated: shall be, maketh sons inherit [that] hath, [that] may make son beloved firstborn son hated, [which indeed] firstborn: shall acknowledge son hated [for] firstborn, giving double portion hath: [is] beginning strength; right firstborn [is] his. man stubborn rebellious son, obey voice father, voice mother, [that,] chastened him, hearken unto them: shall father mother lay hold him, bring unto elders city, unto gate place; shall say unto elders city, son [is] stubborn rebellious, obey voice; [he is] glutton, drunkard. men city shall stone stones, die: shalt thou put evil away among you; israel shall hear, fear. man committed sin worthy death, put death, thou hang tree: body shall remain night upon tree, thou shalt wise bury day; (for hanged [is] accursed god;) thy land defiled, lord thy god giveth thee [for] inheritance. thou shalt see brother's ox sheep go astray, hide thyself them: thou shalt case bring unto thy brother. thy brother [be] nigh unto thee, thou know not, thou shalt bring unto thine house, shall thee thy brother seek it, thou shalt restore again. like manner shalt thou ass; shalt thou raiment; lost things thy brother's, hath lost, thou hast found, shalt thou likewise: thou mayest hide thyself. thou shalt see thy brother's ass ox fall way, hide thyself them: thou shalt surely help lift [them] again. woman shall wear pertaineth unto man, neither shall man put woman's garment: [are] abomination unto lord thy god. bird's nest chance thee way tree, ground, [whether be] young ones, eggs, dam sitting upon young, upon eggs, thou shalt take dam young: [but] thou shalt wise let dam go, take young thee; may well thee, [that] thou mayest prolong [thy] days. thou buildest new house, thou shalt make battlement thy roof, thou bring blood upon thine house, man fall thence. thou shalt sow thy vineyard divers seeds: lest fruit thy seed thou hast sown, fruit thy vineyard, defiled. thou shalt plow ox ass together.deuteronomy page 116 thou shalt wear garment divers sorts, [as] woollen linen together. thou shalt make thee fringes upon four quarters thy vesture, wherewith thou coverest [thyself. ] man take wife, go unto her, hate her, give occasions speech her, bring evil name upon her, say, took woman, came her, found maid: shall father damsel, mother, take bring forth [the tokens of] damsel's virginity unto elders city gate: damsel's father shall say unto elders, gave daughter unto man wife, hateth her; and, lo, hath given occasions speech [against her,] saying, found thy daughter maid; yet [are tokens of] daughter's virginity. shall spread cloth elders city. elders city shall take man chastise him; ye shall bring unto gate city, ye shall stone stones die; damsel, cried not, [being] city; man, hath humbled neighbour's wife: thou shalt put away evil among you. man find betrothed damsel field, man force her, lie her: man lay shall die: unto damsel thou shalt nothing; [there is] damsel sin [worthy] death: man riseth neighbour, slayeth him, even [is] matter: found field, [and] betrothed damsel cried, [there was] none save her. man find damsel [that is] virgin, betrothed, lay hold her, lie her, found; man lay shall give unto damsel's father fifty [shekels] silver, shall wife; hath humbled her, may put away days. man shall take father's wife, discover father's skirt. wounded stones, hath privy member cut off, shall enter congregation lord. bastard shall enter congregation lord; [is] thy brother: thou shalt abhor egyptian; thou wast stranger land. children begotten shall enter congregation lord third generation. host goeth forth thine enemies, keep thee every wicked thing. among man, clean reason uncleanness chanceth night, shall go abroad camp, shall come within camp: shall be, evening cometh on, shall wash [himself] water: sun down, shall come camp [again. ] thou shalt place also without camp, whither thou shalt go forth abroad: thou shalt paddle upon thy weapon; shall be, thou wilt ease thyself abroad, thou shalt dig therewith, shalt turn back cover cometh thee: lord thy god walketh midst thy camp, deliver thee, give thine enemies thee; therefore shall thy camp holy: see unclean thing thee, turn away thee. thou shalt deliver unto master servant escaped master unto thee: shall dwell thee, [even] among you, place shall choose one thy gates, liketh best: thou shalt oppress him. shall whore daughters israel, sodomite sons israel. thou shalt bring hire whore, price dog, house lord thy god vow: even [are] abomination unto lord thy god. thou shalt lend upon usury thy brother; usury money, usury victuals, usury thing lent upon usury: unto stranger thou mayest lend upon usury; unto thy brother thou shalt lend upon usury: lord thy god may bless thee thou settest thine hand land whither thou goest possess it. thou shalt vow vow unto lord thy god, thou shalt slack pay it: lord thy god surely require thee; would sin thee. thou shalt forbear vow, shall sin thee. gone thy lips thou shalt keep perform; [even] freewill offering, according thou hast vowed unto lord thy god, thou hast promised thy mouth. thou comest thy neighbour's vineyard, thou mayest eat grapes thy fill thine pleasure;page 117 deuteronomy thou shalt put [any] thy vessel. thou comest standing corn thy neighbour, thou mayest pluck ears thine hand; thou shalt move sickle unto thy neighbour's standing corn. man hath taken wife, married her, come pass find favour eyes, hath found uncleanness her: let write bill divorcement, give [it] hand, send house. departed house, may go another man's [wife. ] [if] latter husband hate her, write bill divorcement, giveth [it] hand, sendeth house; latter husband die, took [be] wife; former husband, sent away, may take wife, defiled; [is] abomination lord: thou shalt cause land sin, lord thy god giveth thee [for] inheritance. man hath taken new wife, shall go war, neither shall charged business: [but] shall free home one year, shall cheer wife hath taken. man shall take nether upper millstone pledge: taketh [a man's] life pledge. man found stealing brethren children israel, maketh merchandise him, selleth him; thief shall die; thou shalt put evil away among you. take heed plague leprosy, thou observe diligently, according priests levites shall teach you: commanded them, ye shall observe do. remember lord thy god unto miriam way, ye come forth egypt. thou dost lend thy brother thing, thou shalt go house fetch pledge. thou shalt stand abroad, man thou dost lend shall bring pledge abroad unto thee. man [be] poor, thou shalt sleep pledge: case thou shalt deliver pledge sun goeth down, may sleep raiment, bless thee: shall righteousness unto thee lord thy god. thou shalt oppress hired servant [that is] poor needy, [whether be] thy brethren, thy strangers [are] thy land within thy gates: day thou shalt give [him] hire, neither shall sun go upon it; [is] poor, setteth heart upon it: lest cry thee unto lord, sin unto thee. fathers shall put death children, neither shall children put death fathers: every man shall put death sin. thou shalt pervert judgment stranger, [nor] fatherless; take widow's raiment pledge: thou shalt remember thou wast bondman egypt, lord thy god redeemed thee thence: therefore command thee thing. thou cuttest thine harvest thy field, hast forgot sheaf field, thou shalt go fetch it: shall stranger, thefatherless, widow: lord thy god may bless thee work thine hands. thou beatest thine olive tree, thou shalt go boughs again: shall stranger, fatherless, widow. thou gatherest grapes thy vineyard, thou shalt glean [it] afterward: shall stranger, fatherless, widow. thou shalt remember thou wast bondman land egypt: therefore command thee thing. controversy men, come unto judgment, [the judges] may judge them; shall justify righteous, condemn wicked. shall be, wicked man [be] worthy beaten, judge shall cause lie down, beaten face, according fault, certain number. forty stripes may give him, [and] exceed: lest, [if] exceed, beat many stripes, thy brother seem vile unto thee. thou shalt muzzle ox treadeth [the corn. ] brethren dwell together, one die, child, wife dead shall marry without unto stranger: husband's brother shall go unto her, take wife, perform duty husband's brother unto her. shall be, [that] firstborn beareth shall succeed name brother [which is] dead, name put israel. man like take brother's wife, let brother's wife go gate unto elders, say, husband's brother refuseth raise unto brother name israel, perform duty husband's brother. elders city shall call him, speak unto him: [if] stand [to it,] say, like take her; lord god thy fathers hath promised thee. therefore shall ye gone jordan, [that] ye shall set stones, command day, mount ebal, thou shalt plaister plaister. shalt thou build altar unto lord thy god, altar stones: thou shalt lift [any] iron [tool] upon them. thou shalt build altar lord thy god whole stones: thou shalt offer burnt offerings thereon unto lord thy god: thou shalt offer peace offerings, shalt eat there, rejoice lord thy god. thou shalt write upon stones words law plainly. moses priests levites spake unto israel, saying, take heed, hearken, israel; day thou art become people lord thy god. thou shalt therefore obey voice lord thy god, commandments statutes, command thee day. moses charged people day, saying, shall stand upon mount gerizim bless people, ye come jordan; simeon, levi, judah, issachar, joseph, benjamin: shall stand upon mount ebal curse; reuben, gad, asher, zebulun, dan, naphtali. levites shall speak, say unto men israel loud voice, cursed [be] man maketh [any] graven molten image, abomination unto lord, work hands craftsman, putteth [it] [a] secret [place.] people shall answer say, amen. cursed [be] setteth light father mother. people shall say, amen. cursed [be] removeth neighbour's landmark. people shall say, amen. cursed [be] maketh blind wander way. people shall say, amen. cursed [be] perverteth judgment stranger, fatherless, widow. people shall say, amen. cursed [be] lieth father's wife; uncovereth father's skirt. people shall say, amen. cursed [be] lieth manner beast. people shall say, amen. cursed [be] lieth sister, daughter father, daughter mother. people shall say, amen. cursed [be] lieth mother law. people shall say, amen. cursed [be] smiteth neighbour secretly. people shall say, amen. cursed [be] taketh reward slay innocent person. people shall say, amen. cursed [be] confirmeth [all] words law them. people shall say, amen.page 119 deuteronomy shall come pass, thou shalt hearken diligently unto voice lord thy god, observe [and] commandments command thee day, lord thy god set thee high nations earth: blessings shall come thee, overtake thee, thou shalt hearken unto voice lord thy god. blessed [shalt] thou [be] city, blessed [shalt] thou [be] field. blessed [shall be] fruit thy body, fruit thy ground, fruit thy cattle, increase thy kine, flocks thy sheep. blessed [shall be] thy basket thy store. blessed [shalt] thou [be] thou comest in, blessed [shalt] thou [be] thou goest out. lord shall cause thine enemies rise thee smitten thy face: shall come thee one way, flee thee seven ways. lord shall command blessing upon thee thy storehouses, thou settest thine hand unto; shall bless thee land lord thy god giveth thee. lord shall establish thee holy people unto himself, hath sworn unto thee, thou shalt keep commandments lord thy god, walk ways. people earth shall see thou art called name lord; shall afraid thee. lord shall make thee plenteous goods, fruit thy body, fruit thy cattle, fruit thy ground, land lord sware unto thy fathers give thee. lord shall open unto thee good treasure, heaven give rain unto thy land season, bless work thine hand: thou shalt lend unto many nations, thou shalt borrow. lord shall make thee head, tail; thou shalt only, thou shalt beneath; thou hearken unto commandments lord thy god, command thee day, observe [them: ] thou shalt go aside words command thee day, right hand, [to] left, go gods serve them. shall come pass, thou wilt hearken unto voice lord thy god, observe commandments statutes command thee day; curses shall come upon thee, overtake thee: cursed [shalt] thou [be] city, cursed [shalt] thou [be] field. cursed [shall be] thy basket thy store. cursed [shall be] fruit thy body, fruit thy land, increase thy kine, flocks thy sheep. cursed [shalt] thou [be] thou comest in, cursed [shalt] thou [be] thou goest out. lord shall send upon thee cursing, vexation, rebuke, thou settest thine hand unto do, thou destroyed, thou perish quickly; wickedness thy doings, whereby thou hast forsaken me. lord shall make pestilence cleave unto thee, consumed thee land, whither thou goest possess it. lord shall smite thee consumption, fever, inflammation, extreme burning, sword, blasting, mildew; shall pursue thee thou perish. thy heaven [is] thy head shall brass, earth thee [shall be] iron. lord shall make rain thy land powder dust: heaven shall come upon thee, thou destroyed. lord shall cause thee smitten thine enemies: thou shalt go one way them, flee seven waysbefore them: shalt removed kingdoms earth. thy carcase shall meat unto fowls air, unto beasts earth, man shall fray [them] away. lord smite thee botch egypt, emerods, scab, itch, whereof thou canst healed. lord shall smite thee madness, blindness, astonishment heart: thou shalt grope noonday, blind gropeth darkness, thou shalt prosper thy ways: thou shalt oppressed spoiled evermore, man shall save [thee. ] thou shalt betroth wife, another man shall lie her: thou shalt build house, thou shalt dwell therein: thou shalt plant vineyard, shalt gather grapes thereof. thine ox [shall be] slain thine eyes, thou shalt eat thereof: thine ass [shall be] violently taken away thy face, shall restored thee: thy sheep [shall be] given unto thine enemies, thou shalt none rescue [them. ] thy sons thy daughters [shall be] given unto another people, thine eyes shall look, fail [with longing] day long: [there shall be] might thine hand. fruit thy land, thy labours, shall nation thou knowest eat up; thou shalt oppressed crushed alway: thou shalt mad sight thine eyes thou shalt see. lord shall smite thee knees, legs, sore botch cannot healed, sole thy foot unto top thy head. lord shall bring thee, thy king thou shalt set thee, unto nation neither thou thy fathers known; shalt thou serve gods, wood stone. thou shalt become astonishment, proverb, byword, among nations whither lord shall lead thee. thou shalt carry much seed field, shalt gather [but] little in; locust shall consume it. thou shalt plant vineyards, dress [them,] shalt neither drink [of] wine, gather [the grapes;] worms shall eat them. thou shalt olive trees throughout thy coasts, thou shalt anoint [thyself] oil; thine olive shall cast [his fruit. ] thou shalt beget sons daughters, thou shalt enjoy them; shall go captivity. thy trees fruit thy land shall locust consume. stranger [is] within thee shall get thee high; thou shalt come low. shall lend thee, thou shalt lend him: shall head, thou shalt tail. moreover curses shall come upon thee, shall pursue thee, overtake thee, till thou destroyed; thou hearkenedst unto voice lord thy god, keep commandments statutes commanded thee: shall upon thee sign wonder, upon thy seed ever. thou servedst lord thy god joyfulness, gladness heart, abundance [things; ] therefore shalt thou serve thine enemies lord shall send thee, hunger, thirst, nakedness, want [things:] shall put yoke iron upon thy neck, destroyed thee. lord shall bring nation thee far, end earth, [as swift] eagle flieth; nation whose tongue thou shalt understand; nation fierce countenance, shall regard person old, shew favour young: shall eat fruit thy cattle, fruit thy land, thou destroyed: [also] shall leave thee [either] corn, wine, oil, [or] increase thy kine, flocks thydeuteronomy page 120 sheep, destroyed thee. shall besiege thee thy gates, thy high fenced walls come down, wherein thou trustedst, throughout thy land: shall besiege thee thy gates throughout thy land, lord thy god hath given thee. thou shalt eat fruit thine body, flesh thy sons thy daughters, lord thy god hath given thee, siege, straitness, wherewith thine enemies shall distress thee: [so that] man [that is] tender among you, delicate, eye shall evil toward brother, toward wife bosom, toward remnant children shall leave: give flesh children shall eat: hath nothing left siege, straitness, wherewith thine enemies shall distress thee thy gates. tender delicate woman among you, would adventure set sole foot upon ground delicateness tenderness, eye shall evil toward husband bosom, toward son, toward daughter, toward young one cometh feet, toward children shall bear: shall eat want [things] secretly siege straitness, wherewith thine enemy shall distress thee thy gates. thou wilt observe words law written book, thou mayest fear glorious fearful name, lord thy god; lord make thy plagues wonderful, plagues thy seed, [even] great plagues, long continuance, sore sicknesses, long continuance. moreover bring upon thee diseases egypt, thou wast afraid of; shall cleave unto thee. also every sickness, every plague, [is] written book law, lord bring upon thee, thou destroyed. ye shall left number, whereas ye stars heaven multitude; thou wouldest obey voice lord thy god. shall come pass, [that] lord rejoiced good, multiply you; lord rejoice destroy you, bring nought; ye shall plucked land whither thou goest possess it. lord shall scatter thee among people, one end earth even unto other; thou shalt serve gods, neither thou thy fathers known, [even] wood stone. among nations shalt thou find ease, neither shall sole thy foot rest: lord shall give thee trembling heart, failing eyes, sorrow mind: thy life shall hang doubt thee; thou shalt fear day night, shalt none assurance thy life: morning thou shalt say, would god even! even thou shalt say, would god morning! fear thine heart wherewith thou shalt fear, sight thine eyes thou shalt see. lord shall bring thee egypt ships, way whereof spake unto thee, thou shalt see again: ye shall sold unto enemies bondmen bondwomen, man shall buy [you. ] [are] words covenant, lord commanded moses make children israel land moab, beside covenant made horeb. moses called unto israel, said unto them, ye seen lord eyesin land egypt unto pharaoh, unto servants, unto land;
