hide three days, pursuers returned: afterward may ye go way. men said unto her, [will be] blameless thine oath thou hast made us swear. behold, [when] come land, thou shalt bind line scarlet thread window thou didst let us by: thou shalt bring thy father, thy mother, thy brethren, thy father's household, home unto thee. shall be, [that] whosoever shall go doors thy house street, blood [shall be] upon head, [will be] guiltless: whosoever shall thee house, blood [shall be] head, [any] hand upon him. thou utter business, quit thine oath thou hast made us swear. said, according unto words, [be] it. sent away, departed: bound scarlet line window. went, came unto mountain, abode three days, pursuers returned: pursuers sought [them] throughout way, found [them] not. two men returned, descended mountain, passed over, came joshua son nun, told [things] befell them: said unto joshua, truly lord hath delivered hands land; even inhabitants country faint us.joshua page 126 joshua rose early morning; removed shittim, came jordan, children israel, lodged passed over. came pass three days, officers went host; commanded people, saying, ye see ark covenant lord god, priests levites bearing it, ye shall remove place, go it. yet shall space it, two thousand cubits measure: come near unto it, ye may know way ye must go: ye passed [way] heretofore. joshua said unto people, sanctify yourselves: morrow lord wonders among you. joshua spake unto priests, saying, take ark covenant, pass people. took ark covenant, went people. lord said unto joshua, day begin magnify thee sight israel, may know that, moses, thee. thou shalt command priests bear ark covenant, saying, ye come brink water jordan, ye shall stand still jordan. joshua said unto children israel, come hither, hear words lord god. joshua said, hereby ye shall know living god [is] among you, [that] without fail drive canaanites, hittites, hivites, perizzites, girgashites, amorites, jebusites. behold, ark covenant lord earth passeth jordan. therefore take twelve men tribes israel, every tribe man. shall come pass, soon soles feet priests bear ark lord, lord earth, shall rest waters jordan, [that] waters jordan shall cut [from] waters come above; shall stand upon heap. came pass, people removed tents, pass jordan, priests bearing ark covenant people; bare ark come unto jordan, feet priests bare ark dipped brim water, (for jordan overfloweth banks time harvest,) waters came stood [and] rose upon heap far city adam, [is] beside zaretan: came toward sea plain, [even] salt sea, failed, [and] cut off: people passed right jericho. priests bare ark covenant lord stood firm dry ground midst jordan, israelites passed dry ground, people passed clean jordan. came pass, people clean passed jordan, lord spake unto joshua, saying, take twelve men people, every tribe man, command ye them, saying, take hence midst jordan, place priests' feet stood firm, twelve stones, ye shall carry you, leave lodging place, ye shall lodge night. joshua called twelve men, prepared children israel, every tribe man: joshua said unto them, pass ark lord god midst jordan, take ye upevery man stone upon shoulder, according unto number tribes children israel: may sign among you, [that] children ask [their fathers] time come, saying, [mean] ye stones? ye shall answer them, waters jordan cut ark covenant lord; feared him, feared moses, days life. lord spake unto joshua, saying, command priests bear ark testimony, come jordan. joshua therefore commanded priests, saying, come ye jordan. came pass, priests bare ark covenant lord come midst jordan, [and] soles priests' feet lifted unto dry land, waters jordan returned unto place, flowed banks, [they did] before. people came jordan tenth [day] first month, encamped gilgal, east border jericho. twelve stones, took jordan, joshua pitch gilgal. spake unto children israel, saying, children shall ask fathers time come, saying, [mean] stones? ye shall let children know, saying, israel came jordan dry land. lord god dried waters jordan you, ye passed over, lord god red sea, dried us, gone over: people earth might know hand lord, [is] mighty: ye might fear lord god ever. came pass, kings amorites, [were] side jordan westward, kings canaanites, [were] sea, heard lord dried waters jordan children israel, passed over, heart melted, neither spirit more, children israel.page 127 joshua time lord said unto joshua, make thee sharp knives, circumcise children israel second time. joshua made sharp knives, circumcised children israel hill foreskins. [is] cause joshua circumcise: people came egypt, [that were] males, [even] men war, died wilderness way, came egypt. people came circumcised: people [that were] born wilderness way came forth egypt, [them] circumcised. children israel walked forty years wilderness, till people [that were] men war, came egypt, consumed, obeyed voice lord: unto lord sware would shew land, lord sware unto fathers would give us, land floweth milk honey. children, [whom] raised stead, joshua circumcised: uncircumcised, circumcised way. came pass, done circumcising people, abode places camp, till whole. lord said unto joshua, day rolled away reproach egypt you. wherefore name place called gilgal unto day. children israel encamped gilgal, kept passover fourteenth day month even plains jericho. eat old corn land morrow passover, unleavened cakes, parched [corn] selfsame day. manna ceased morrow eaten old corn land; [as] captain host lord come. joshua fell face earth, worship, said unto him, saith lord unto servant? captain lord's host said unto joshua, loose thy shoe thy foot; place whereon thou standest [is] holy. joshua so. jericho straitly shut children israel: none went out, none came in. lord said unto joshua, see, given thine hand jericho, king thereof, [and] mighty men valour. ye shall compass city, [ye] men war, [and] go round city once. thus shalt thou six days. seven priests shall bear ark seven trumpets rams horns: seventh day ye shall compass city seven times, priests shall blow trumpets. shall come pass, make long [blast] ram's horn, [and] ye hear sound trumpet, people shall shout great shout; heshbon unto ramath- mizpeh, betonim; mahanaim unto border debir; valley, beth-aram, beth- nimrah, succoth, zaphon, rest kingdom sihon king heshbon, jordan [his] border, [even] unto edge sea chinnereth side jordan eastward. [is] inheritance children gad families, cities, villages. moses gave [inheritance] unto half tribe manasseh: [this] [the possession] half tribe children manasseh families. coast mahanaim, bashan, kingdom og king bashan, towns jair, bashan, threescore cities: half gilead, ashtaroth, edrei, cities kingdom og bashan, [were pertaining] unto children machir son manasseh, even one half children machir families. [are countries] moses distribute inheritance plains moab, side jordan, jericho, eastward. unto tribe levi moses gave [any] inheritance: lord god israel [was] inheritance, said unto them. [are countries] children israel inherited land canaan, eleazar priest, joshua son nun, heads fathers tribes children israel, distributed inheritance them. lot [was] inheritance, lord commanded hand moses, nine tribes, [for] half tribe. moses given inheritance two tribes half tribe side jordan: unto levites gave none inheritance among them. children joseph two tribes, manasseh ephraim: therefore gave part unto levites land, save cities dwell [in,] suburbs cattle substance. lord commanded moses, children israel did, divided land. children judah came unto joshua gilgal: caleb son jephunneh kenezite said unto him, thou knowest thing lord said unto moses man god concerning thee kadesh- barnea. forty years old [was] mosespage 133 joshua servant lord sent kadesh-barnea espy land; brought word [it was] mine heart. nevertheless brethren went made heart people melt: wholly followed lord god. moses sware day, saying, surely land whereon thy feet trodden shall thine inheritance, thy children's ever, thou hast wholly followed lord god. now, behold, lord hath kept alive, said, forty five years, even since lord spake word unto moses, [the children of] israel wandered wilderness: now, lo, [am] day fourscore five years old. yet [am as] strong day [i was] day moses sent me: strength [was] then, even [is] strength now, war, go out, come in. therefore give mountain, whereof lord spake day; thou heardest day anakims [were] there, [that] cities [were] great [and] fenced: lord [will be] me, shall able drive out, lord said. joshua blessed him, gave unto caleb son jephunneh hebron inheritance. hebron therefore became inheritance caleb son jephunneh kenezite unto day, wholly followed lord god israel. name hebron [was] kirjath-arba; [which arba was] great man among anakims. land rest war. [this] lot tribe children judah families; [even] border edom wilderness zin southward [was] uttermost part south coast. south border shore salt sea, bay looketh southward: went south side maaleh- acrabbim, passed along zin, ascended south side unto kadesh-barnea, passed along hezron, went adar, fetched compass karkaa: [from thence] passed toward azmon, went unto river egypt; goings coast sea: shall south coast. east border [was] salt sea, [even] unto end jordan. [their] border north quarter [was] bay sea uttermost part jordan: border went beth-hogla, passed along north beth-arabah; border went stone bohan son reuben: border went toward debir valley achor, northward, looking toward gilgal, [that is] going adummim, [is] south side river: border passed toward waters en-shemesh, goings thereof en-rogel: border went valley son hinnom unto south side jebusite; [is] jerusalem: border went top mountain [lieth] valley hinnom westward, [is] end valley giants northward: border drawn top hill unto fountain water nephtoah, went cities mount ephron; border drawn baalah, [is] kirjath- jearim: border compassed baalah westward unto mount seir, passed along unto side mount jearim, [is] chesalon, north side, went beth- shemesh, passed timnah: border went unto side ekron northward: border drawn shicron, passed along mount baalah, went unto jabneel; goings border sea. west border [was] great sea, coast [thereof.]this [is] coast children judah round according families. unto caleb son jephunneh gave part among children judah, according commandment lord joshua, [even] city arba father anak, [city is] hebron. caleb drove thence three sons anak, sheshai, ahiman, talmai, children anak. went thence inhabitants debir: name debir [was] kirjath- sepher. caleb said, smiteth kirjath-sepher, taketh it, give achsah daughter wife. othniel son kenaz, brother caleb, took it: gave achsah daughter wife. came pass, came [unto him,] moved ask father field: lighted [her] ass; caleb said unto her, wouldest thou? answered, give blessing; thou hast given south land; give also springs water. gave upper springs, nether springs. [is] inheritance tribe children judah according families. uttermost cities tribe children judah toward coast edom southward kabzeel, eder, jagur, kinah, dimonah, adadah, kedesh, hazor, ithnan, hazor, hadattah, kerioth, [and] hezron, [is] hazor, hazar-gaddah, heshmon, beth-palet, hazar-shual, beer- sheba, bizjothjah, baalah, iim, azem, eltolad, chesil, hormah, ziklag, madmannah, sansannah, lebaoth, shilhim, ain, rimmon: cities [are] twenty nine, villages: [and] valley, eshtaol, zoreah, ashnah, zanoah, en- gannim, tappuah, enam, jarmuth, adullam, socoh, azekah, sharaim, adithaim, gederah, gederothaim; [is] inheritance tribe children ephraim families. separate cities children ephraim [were] among inheritance children manasseh, cities villages. drave canaanites dwelt gezer: canaanites dwell among ephraimites unto day, serve tribute. also lot tribe manasseh; [was] firstborn joseph; [to wit,] machir firstborn manasseh, father gilead: man war, therefore gilead bashan. also [a lot] rest children manasseh families; children abiezer, children helek, children asriel, children shechem, children hepher, children shemida: [were] male children manasseh son joseph families. zelophehad, son hepher, son gilead, son machir, son manasseh, sons, daughters: [are] names daughters, mahlah, noah, hoglah, milcah, tirzah. came near eleazar priest, joshua son nun, princes, saying, lord commanded moses give us inheritance among brethren. therefore according commandment lord gave inheritance among brethren father. fell ten portions manasseh, beside land gilead bashan, [were] side jordan; daughters manasseh inheritance among sons: rest manasseh's sons land gilead. coast manasseh asher michmethah, [lieth] shechem; border went along right hand unto inhabitants en- tappuah. [now] manasseh land tappuah: tappuah border manasseh [belonged] children ephraim; coast descended untothe river kanah, southward river: cities ephraim [are] among cities manasseh: coast manasseh also [was] north side river, outgoings sea: southward [it was] ephraim's, northward [it was] manasseh's, sea border; met together asher north, issachar east. manasseh issachar asher beth-shean towns, ibleam towns, inhabitants dor towns, inhabitants endor towns, inhabitants taanach towns, inhabitants megiddo towns, [even] three countries. yet children manasseh could drive [the inhabitants of] cities; canaanites would dwell land. yet came pass, children israel waxen strong, put canaanites tribute; utterly drive out. children joseph spake unto joshua, saying, hast thou given [but] one lot one portion inherit, seeing [am] great people, forasmuch lord hath blessed hitherto? joshua answered them, thou [be] great people, [then] get thee wood [country,] cut thyself land perizzites giants, mount ephraim narrow thee. children joseph said, hill enough us: canaanites dwell land valley chariots iron, [both they] [are] beth-shean towns, [they] [are] valley jezreel. joshua spake unto house joseph, [even] ephraim manasseh, saying, thou [art] great people, hast great power: thou shalt one lot [only: ] mountain shall thine; [is] wood, thou shalt cut down: outgoings shall thine: thou shalt drive canaanites, though iron chariots, [and] though [be] strong. whole congregation children israel assembled together shiloh, set tabernacle congregation there. land subdued them. remained among children israel seven tribes, yet received inheritance. joshua said unto children israel, long [are] ye slack go possess land, lord god fathers hath given you? give among three men [each] tribe: send them, shall rise, go land, describe according inheritance them; shall come [again] me. shall divide seven parts: judah shall abide coast south, house joseph shall abide coasts north. ye shall therefore describe land [into] seven parts, bring [the description] hither me, may cast lots lord god. levites part among you; priesthood lord inheritance: gad, reuben, half tribe manasseh, received inheritance beyond jordan east, moses servant lord gave them. men arose, went away: joshua charged went describe land, saying, go walk land, describe it, come me, may cast lots lord shiloh. men went passed land, described cities seven parts book, came [again] joshua host shiloh. joshua cast lots shilohpage 135 joshua lord: joshua divided land unto children israel according divisions. lot tribe children benjamin came according families: coast lot came forth children judah children joseph. border north side jordan; border went side jericho north side, went mountains westward; goings thereof wilderness beth-aven. border went thence toward luz, side luz, bethel, southward; border descended ataroth-adar, near hill [lieth] south side nether beth- horon. border drawn [thence,] compassed corner sea southward, hill [lieth] beth- horon southward; goings thereof kirjath-baal, [is] kirjath- jearim, city children judah: [was] west quarter. south quarter [was] end kirjath-jearim, border went west, went well waters nephtoah: border came end mountain [lieth] valley son hinnom, [and] [is] valley giants north, descended valley hinnom, side jebusi south, descended en-rogel, drawn north, went forth en-shemesh, went forth toward geliloth, [is] going adummim, descended stone bohan son reuben, passed along toward side arabah northward, went unto arabah: border passed along side beth-hoglah northward: outgoings border north bay salt sea south end jordan: [was] south coast. jordan border east side. [one] half tribe manasseh moses given [possession] bashan: unto [other] half thereof gave joshua among brethren side jordan westward. joshua sent away also unto tents, blessed them, spake unto them, saying, return much riches unto tents, much cattle, silver, gold, brass, iron, much raiment: divide spoil enemies brethren. children reuben children gad half tribe manasseh returned, departed children israel shiloh, [is] land canaan, go unto country gilead, land possession, whereof possessed, according word lord hand moses. came unto borders jordan,that [are] land canaan, children reuben children gad half tribe manasseh built altar jordan, great altar see to. children israel heard say, behold, children reuben children gad half tribe manasseh built altar land canaan, borders jordan, passage children israel. children israel heard [of it,] whole congregation children israel gathered together shiloh, go war them. children israel sent unto children reuben, children gad, half tribe manasseh, land gilead, phinehas son eleazar priest, ten princes, chief house prince throughout tribes israel; one [was] head house fathers among thousands israel. came unto children reuben, children gad, half tribe manasseh, unto land gilead, spake them, saying, thus saith whole congregation lord, trespass [is] ye committed god israel, turn away day following lord, ye builded altar, ye might rebel day lord? [is] iniquity peor little us, cleansed day, although plague congregation lord, ye must turn away day following lord? be, [seeing] ye rebel day lord, morrow wroth whole congregation israel. notwithstanding, land possession [be] unclean, [then] pass ye unto land possession lord, wherein lord's tabernacle dwelleth, take possession among us: rebel lord, rebel us, building altar beside altar lord god. achan son zerah commit trespass accursed thing, wrath fell congregation israel? man perished alone iniquity. children reuben children gad half tribe manasseh answered, said unto heads thousands israel, lord god gods, lord god gods, knoweth, israel shall know; [it be] rebellion, transgression lord, (save us day,) built us altar turn following lord, offer thereon burnt offering meat offering, offer peace offerings thereon, let lord require it; [rather] done fear [this] thing, saying, time come children might speak unto children, saying, ye lord god israel? lord hath made jordan border us you, ye children reuben children gad; ye part lord: shall children make children cease fearing lord. therefore said, let us prepare build us altar, burnt offering, sacrifice: [that] [may be] witness us, you, generations us, might service lord burnt offerings, sacrifices, peace offerings; children may say children time come, ye part lord. therefore said we, shall be, say us generations time come,joshua page 138 may say [again,] behold pattern altar lord, fathers made, burnt offerings, sacrifices; [is] witness us you. god forbid rebel lord, turn day following lord, build altar burnt offerings, meat offerings, sacrifices, beside altar lord god [is] tabernacle. phinehas priest, princes congregation heads thousands israel [were] him, heard words children reuben children gad children manasseh spake, pleased them. phinehas son eleazar priest said unto children reuben, children gad, children manasseh, day perceive lord [is] among us, ye committed trespass lord: ye delivered children israel hand lord. phinehas son eleazar priest, princes, returned children reuben, children gad, land gilead, unto land canaan, children israel, brought word again. thing pleased children israel; children israel blessed god, intend go battle, destroy land wherein children reuben gad dwelt. children reuben children gad called altar [ed:] [shall be] witness us lord [is] god. came pass long time lord given rest unto israel enemies round about, joshua waxed old [and] stricken age. joshua called israel, [and] elders, heads, judges, officers, said unto them, old [and] stricken age: ye seen lord god hath done unto nations you; lord god [is] hath fought you. behold, divided unto lot nations remain, inheritance tribes, jordan, nations cut off, even unto great sea westward. lord god, shall expel you, drive sight; ye shall possess land, lord god hath promised unto you. ye therefore courageous keep written book law moses, ye turn aside therefrom [to] right hand [to] left; ye come among nations, remain among you; neither make mention names gods, cause swear [by them,] neither serve them, bow unto them: cleave unto lord god, ye done unto day. lord hath driven great nations strong: [as for] you, man hath able stand unto day. one man shall chase thousand: lord god, [it is] fighteth you, hath promised you. take good heed therefore unto yourselves, ye love lord god. else ye wise go back, cleave unto remnant nations, [even] remain among you, shall make marriages them, go unto them, you: know certainty lord god drive [any of] nations you; shall snares traps unto you, andscourges sides, thorns eyes, ye perish good land lord god hath given you. and, behold, day [am] going way earth: ye know hearts souls, one thing hath failed good things lord god spake concerning you; come pass unto you, [and] one thing hath failed thereof. therefore shall come pass, [that] good things come upon you, lord god promised you; shall lord bring upon evil things, destroyed good land lord god hath given you. ye transgressed covenant lord god, commanded you, gone served gods, bowed them; shall anger lord kindled you, ye shall perish quickly good land hath given unto you. joshua gathered tribes israel shechem, called elders israel, heads, judges, officers; presented god. joshua said unto people, thus saith lord god israel, fathers dwelt side flood old time, [even] terah, father abraham, father nachor: served gods. took father abraham side flood, led throughout land canaan, multiplied seed, gave isaac. gave unto isaac jacob esau: gave unto esau mount seir, possess it; jacob children went egypt. sent moses also aaron, plagued egypt, according among them: afterward brought out. brought fathers egypt: ye came unto sea; egyptians pursued fathers chariots horsemen unto red sea. cried unto lord, put darkness egyptians, brought sea upon them, covered them; eyes seen done egypt: ye dwelt wilderness long season. brought land amorites, dwelt side jordan; fought you: gave hand, ye might possess land; destroyed you. balak son zippor, king moab, arose warred israel, sent called balaam son beor curse you: would hearken unto balaam; therefore blessed still: delivered hand. ye went jordan, came unto jericho: men jericho fought you, amorites, perizzites, canaanites, hittites, girgashites, hivites, jebusites; delivered hand. sent hornet you, drave you, [even] two kings amorites; [but] thy sword, thy bow. given land ye labour, cities ye built not, ye dwell them; vineyards oliveyards ye planted ye eat. therefore fear lord, serve sincerity truth: put away gods fathers served side flood, egypt; serve ye lord. seem evil unto serve lord, choose day ye serve; whether gods fathers served [were] side flood, godspage 139 joshua amorites, whose land ye dwell: house, serve lord. people answered said, god forbid forsake lord, serve gods; lord god, [it is] brought us fathers land egypt, house bondage, great signs sight, preserved us way wherein went, among people passed: lord drave us people, even amorites dwelt land: [therefore] also serve lord; [is] god. joshua said unto people, ye cannot serve lord: [is] holy god; [is] jealous god; forgive transgressions sins. ye forsake lord, serve strange gods, turn hurt, consume you, hath done good. people said unto joshua, nay; serve lord. joshua said unto people, ye [are] witnesses ye chosen lord, serve him. said, [we are] witnesses. therefore put away, [said he,] strange gods [are] among you, incline heart unto lord god israel. people said unto joshua, lord god serve, voice obey. joshua made covenant people day, set statute ordinance shechem. joshua wrote words book law god, took great stone, set oak, [was] sanctuary lord. joshua said unto people, behold, stone shall witness unto us; hath heard words lord spake unto us: shall therefore witness unto you, lest ye deny god. joshua let people depart, every man unto inheritance. came pass things, joshua son nun, servant lord, died, [being] hundred ten years old. buried border inheritance timnath-serah, [is] mount ephraim, north side hill gaash. israel served lord days joshua, days elders overlived joshua, known works lord, done israel. bones joseph, children israel brought egypt, buried shechem, parcel ground jacob bought sons hamor father shechem hundred pieces silver: became inheritance children joseph. eleazar son aaron died; buried hill [that pertained to] phinehas son, given mount ephraim.page 141 judges book judges death joshua came pass, children israel asked lord, saying, shall go us canaanites first, fight them? lord said, judah shall go up: behold, delivered land hand. judah said unto simeon brother, come lot, may fight canaanites; likewise go thee thy lot. simeon went him. judah went up; lord delivered canaanites perizzites hand: slew bezek ten thousand men. found adoni- bezek bezek: fought him, slew canaanites perizzites. adoni-bezek fled; pursued him, caught him, cut thumbs great toes. adoni-bezek said, threescore ten kings, thumbs great toes cut off, gathered [their meat] table: done, god hath requited me. brought jerusalem, died. children judah fought jerusalem, taken it, smitten edge sword, set city fire. afterward children judah went fight canaanites, dwelt mountain, south, valley. judah went canaanites dwelt hebron: (now name hebron [was] kirjath- arba:) slew sheshai, ahiman, talmai. thence went inhabitants debir: name debir [was] kirjath-sepher: caleb said, smiteth kirjath-sepher, taketh it, give achsah daughter wife. othniel son kenaz, caleb's younger brother, took it: gave achsah daughter wife. came pass, came [to him,] moved ask father field: lighted [her] ass; caleb said unto her, wilt thou? said unto him, give blessing: thou hast given south land; give also springs water. caleb gave upper springs nether springs. children kenite, moses' father law, went city palm trees children judah wilderness judah, [lieth] south arad; went dwelt among people. judah went simeon brother, slew canaanites inhabited zephath, utterly destroyed it. name city called hormah. also judah took gaza coast thereof, askelon coast thereof, ekron coast thereof. lord judah; drave inhabitants mountain; could drive [the inhabitants of] valley, chariots iron. gave hebron unto caleb, moses said: expelled thence three sons anak. children benjamin drive jebusites inhabited jerusalem; jebusites dwell children benjamin jerusalem unto day. house joseph, also went bethel: lord [was] them. house joseph sent descry bethel. (now name city [was] luz.) spies saw mancome forth city, said unto him, shew us, pray thee, entrance city, shew thee mercy. shewed entrance city, smote city edge sword; let go man family. man went land hittites, built city, called name thereof luz: [is] name thereof unto day. neither manasseh drive [the inhabitants of] beth-shean towns, taanach towns, inhabitants dor towns, inhabitants ibleam towns, inhabitants megiddo towns: canaanites would dwell land. came pass, israel strong, put canaanites tribute, utterly drive out. neither ephraim drive canaanites dwelt gezer; canaanites dwelt gezer among them. neither zebulun drive inhabitants kitron, inhabitants nahalol; canaanites dwelt among them, became tributaries. neither asher drive inhabitants accho, inhabitants zidon, ahlab, achzib, helbah, aphik, rehob: asherites dwelt among canaanites, inhabitants land: drive out. neither naphtali drive inhabitants beth-shemesh, inhabitants beth-anath; dwelt among canaanites, inhabitants land: nevertheless inhabitants beth-shemesh beth- anath became tributaries unto them. amorites forced children dan mountain: would suffer come valley: amorites would dwell mount heres aijalon, shaalbim: yet hand house joseph prevailed, became tributaries. coast amorites [was] going akrabbim, rock, upward. angel lord came gilgal bochim, said, made go egypt, brought unto land sware unto fathers; said, never break covenant you. ye shall make league inhabitants land; ye shall throw altars: ye obeyed voice: ye done this? wherefore also said, drive you; shall [as thorns] sides, gods shall snare unto you. came pass, angel lord spake words unto children israel, people lifted voice, wept. called name place bochim: sacrificed unto lord. joshua let people go, children israel went every man unto inheritance possess land. people served lord days joshua, days elders outlived joshua, seen great works lord, israel. joshua son nun, servant lord, died, [being] hundred ten years old. buried border inheritance timnath-heres, mount ephraim, northjudges page 142 side hill gaash. also generation gathered unto fathers: arose another generation them, knew lord, yet works done israel. children israel evil sight lord, served baalim: forsook lord god fathers, brought land egypt, followed gods, gods people [were] round them, bowed unto them, provoked lord anger. forsook lord, served baal ashtaroth. anger lord hot israel, delivered hands spoilers spoiled them, sold hands enemies round about, could longer stand enemies. whithersoever went out, hand lord evil, lord said, lord sworn unto them: greatly distressed. nevertheless lord raised judges, delivered hand spoiled them. yet would hearken unto judges, went whoring gods, bowed unto them: turned quickly way fathers walked in, obeying commandments lord; [but] so. lord raised judges, lord judge, delivered hand enemies days judge: repented lord groanings reason oppressed vexed them. came pass, judge dead, [that] returned, corrupted [themselves] fathers, following gods serve them, bow unto them; ceased doings, stubborn way. anger lord hot israel; said, people hath transgressed covenant commanded fathers, hearkened unto voice; also henceforth drive nations joshua left died: may prove israel, whether keep way lord walk therein, fathers keep [it,] not. therefore lord left nations, without driving hastily; neither delivered hand joshua. [are] nations lord left, prove israel them, [even] many [of israel] known wars canaan; generations children israel might know, teach war, least knew nothing thereof; [namely,] five lords philistines, canaanites, sidonians, hivites dwelt mount lebanon, mount baal-hermon unto entering hamath. prove israel them, know whether would hearken unto commandments lord, commanded fathers hand moses. children israel dwelt among canaanites, hittites, amorites, perizzites, hivites, jebusites: took daughters wives, gave daughters sons, andserved gods. children israel evil sight lord, forgat lord god, served baalim groves. therefore anger lord hot israel, sold hand chushan- rishathaim king mesopotamia: children israel served chushan-rishathaim eight years. children israel cried unto lord, lord raised deliverer children israel, delivered them, [even] othniel son kenaz, caleb's younger brother. spirit lord came upon him, judged israel, went war: lord delivered chushan- rishathaim king mesopotamia hand; hand prevailed chushan- rishathaim. land rest forty years. othniel son kenaz died. children israel evil sight lord: lord strengthened eglon king moab israel, done evil sight lord. gathered unto children ammon amalek, went smote israel, possessed city palm trees. children israel served eglon king moab eighteen years. children israel cried unto lord, lord raised deliverer, ehud son gera, benjamite, man lefthanded: children israel sent present unto eglon king moab. ehud made dagger two edges, cubit length; gird raiment upon right thigh. brought present unto eglon king moab: eglon [was] fat man. made end offer present, sent away people bare present. turned quarries [were] gilgal, said, secret errand unto thee, king: said, keep silence. stood went him. ehud came unto him; sitting summer parlour, alone. ehud said, message god unto thee. arose [his] seat. ehud put forth left hand, took dagger right thigh, thrust belly: haft also went blade; fat closed upon blade, could draw dagger belly; dirt came out. ehud went forth porch, shut doors parlour upon him, locked them. gone out, servants came; saw that, behold, doors parlour [were] locked, said, surely covereth feet summer chamber. tarried till ashamed: and, behold, opened doors parlour; therefore took key, opened [them:] and, behold, lord [was] fallen dead earth. ehud escaped tarried, passed beyond quarries, escaped unto seirath. came pass, come, blew trumpet mountain ephraim, children israel went mount, them. said unto them, follow me: lord hath delivered enemies moabites hand. went him, took fords jordan toward moab, suffered man pass over. slew moab time ten thousand men, lusty, men valour; escaped man. moab subdued day hand israel. land rest fourscore years.page 143 judges shamgar son anath, slew philistines six hundred men ox goad: also delivered israel. children israel evil sight lord, ehud dead. lord sold hand jabin king canaan, reigned hazor; captain whose host [was] sisera, dwelt harosheth gentiles. children israel cried unto lord: nine hundred chariots iron; twenty years mightily oppressed children israel. deborah, prophetess, wife lapidoth, judged israel time. dwelt palm tree deborah ramah bethel mount ephraim: children israel came judgment. sent called barak son abinoam kedesh-naphtali, said unto him, hath lord god israel commanded, [saying,] go draw toward mount tabor, take thee ten thousand men children naphtali children zebulun? draw unto thee river kishon sisera, captain jabin's army, chariots multitude; deliver thine hand. barak said unto her, thou wilt go me, go: thou wilt go me, [then] go. said, surely go thee: notwithstanding journey thou takest shall thine honour; lord shall sell sisera hand woman. deborah arose, went barak kedesh. barak called zebulun naphtali kedesh; went ten thousand men feet: deborah went him. heber kenite, [which was] children hobab father law moses, severed kenites, pitched tent unto plain zaanaim, [is] kedesh. shewed sisera barak son abinoam gone mount tabor. sisera gathered together chariots, [even] nine hundred chariots iron, people [were] him, harosheth gentiles unto river kishon. deborah said unto barak, up; [is] day lord hath delivered sisera thine hand: lord gone thee? barak went mount tabor, ten thousand men him. lord discomfited sisera, [his] chariots, [his] host, edge sword barak; sisera lighted [his] chariot, fled away feet. barak pursued chariots, host, unto harosheth gentiles: host sisera fell upon edge sword; [and] man left. howbeit sisera fled away feet tent jael wife heber kenite: [there was] peace jabin king hazor house heber kenite. jael went meet sisera, said unto him, turn in, lord, turn me; fear not. turned unto tent, covered mantle. said unto her, give me, pray thee, little water drink; thirsty. opened bottle milk, gave drink, covered him. said unto her, stand door tent, shall be, man doth come enquire thee, say, man here? thou shalt say, no. jael heber's wife took nail tent, took anhammer hand, went softly unto him, smote nail temples, fastened ground: fast asleep weary. died. and, behold, barak pursued sisera, jael came meet him, said unto him, come, shew thee man thou seekest. came [tent,] behold, sisera lay dead, nail [was] temples. god subdued day jabin king canaan children israel. hand children israel prospered, prevailed jabin king canaan, destroyed jabin king canaan. sang deborah barak son abinoam day, saying, praise ye lord avenging israel, people willingly offered themselves. hear, ye kings; give ear, ye princes; i, [even] i, sing unto lord; sing [praise] lord god israel. lord, thou wentest seir, thou marchedst field edom, earth trembled, heavens dropped, clouds also dropped water. mountains melted lord, [even] sinai lord god israel. days shamgar son anath, days jael, highways unoccupied, travelers walked byways. [the inhabitants of] villages ceased, ceased israel, deborah arose, arose mother israel. chose new gods; [was] war gates: shield spear seen among forty thousand israel? heart [is] toward governors israel, offered willingly among people. bless ye lord. speak, ye ride white asses, ye sit judgment, walk way. [they delivered] noise archers places drawing water, shall rehearse righteous acts lord, [even] righteous acts [toward inhabitants] villages israel: shall people lord go gates. awake, awake, deborah: awake, awake, utter song: arise, barak, lead thy captivity captive, thou son abinoam. made remaineth dominion nobles among people: lord made dominion mighty. ephraim [was there] root amalek; thee, benjamin, among thy people; machir came governors, zebulun handle pen writer. princes issachar [were] deborah; even issachar, also barak: sent foot valley. divisions reuben [there were] great thoughts heart. abodest thou among sheepfolds, hear bleatings flocks? divisions reuben [there were] great searchings heart. gilead abode beyond jordan: dan remain ships? asher continued sea shore, abode breaches. zebulun naphtali [were] people [that] jeoparded lives unto death high places field. kings came [and] fought, fought kings canaan taanach waters megiddo; took gain money. fought heaven; stars courses fought sisera. river kishon swept away, ancient river, river kishon. soul, thou hast trodden strength. horsehoofs broken means pransings, pransings mighty ones. curse ye meroz, said angel lord, curse ye bitterly inhabitants thereof; came help lord, help lord mighty. blessed women shall jael wifejudges page 144 heber kenite be, blessed shall women tent. asked water, [and] gave [him] milk; brought forth butter lordly dish. put hand nail, right hand workmen's hammer; hammer smote sisera, smote head, pierced stricken temples. feet bowed, fell, lay down: feet bowed, fell: bowed, fell dead. mother sisera looked window, cried lattice, chariot [so] long coming? tarry wheels chariots? wise ladies answered her, yea, returned answer herself, sped? [not] divided prey; every man damsel [or] two; sisera prey divers colours, prey divers colours needlework, divers colours needlework sides, [meet] necks [them take] spoil? let thine enemies perish, lord: [let] love [be] sun goeth forth might. land rest forty years. children israel evil sight lord: lord delivered hand midian seven years. hand midian prevailed israel: [and] midianites children israel made dens [are] mountains, caves, strong holds. [so] was, israel sown, midianites came up, amalekites, children east, even came them; encamped them, destroyed increase earth, till thou come unto gaza, left sustenance israel, neither sheep, ox, ass. came cattle tents, came grasshoppers multitude; [for] camels without number: entered land destroy it. israel greatly impoverished midianites; children israel cried unto lord. came pass, children israel cried unto lord midianites, lord sent prophet unto children israel, said unto them, thus saith lord god israel, brought egypt, brought forth house bondage; delivered hand egyptians, hand oppressed you, drave you, gave land; said unto you, [am] lord god; fear gods amorites, whose land ye dwell: ye obeyed voice. came angel lord, sat oak [was] ophrah, [pertained] unto joash abi-ezrite: son gideon threshed wheat winepress, hide [it] midianites. angel lord appeared unto him, said unto him, lord [is] thee, thou mighty man valour. gideon said unto him, oh lord, lord us, befallen us? [be] miracles fathers told us of, saying, lord bring us egypt? lord hath forsaken us, delivered us hands midianites. lord looked upon him, said, go thy might, thou shalt save israel hand midianites: sent thee? said unto him, oh lord, wherewith shall save israel? behold, family poor manasseh, [am] least father's house. lord said unto him, surely thee, thou shaltsmite midianites one man. said unto him, found grace thy sight, shew sign thou talkest me. depart hence, pray thee, come unto thee, bring forth present, set [it] thee. said, tarry thou come again. gideon went in, made ready kid, unleavened cakes ephah flour: flesh put basket, put broth pot, brought [it] unto oak, presented [it. ] angel god said unto him, take flesh unleavened cakes, lay [them] upon rock, pour broth. so. angel lord put forth end staff [was] hand, touched flesh unleavened cakes; rose fire rock, consumed flesh unleavened cakes. angel lord departed sight. gideon perceived [was] angel lord, gideon said, alas, lord god! seen angel lord face face. lord said unto him, peace [be] unto thee; fear not: thou shalt die. gideon built altar unto lord, called jehovah-shalom: unto day yet ophrah abi-ezrites. came pass night, lord said unto him, take thy father's young bullock, even second bullock seven years old, throw altar baal thy father hath, cut grove [is] it: build altar unto lord thy god upon top rock, ordered place, take second bullock, offer burnt sacrifice wood grove thou shalt cut down. gideon took ten men servants, lord said unto him: [so] was, feared father's household, men city, could [it] day, [it] night. men city arose early morning, behold, altar baal cast down, grove cut [was] it, second bullock offered upon altar [that was] built. said one another, hath done thing? enquired asked, said, gideon son joash hath done thing. men city said unto joash, bring thy son, may die: hath cast altar baal, hath cut grove [was] it. joash said unto stood him, ye plead baal? ye save him? plead him, let put death whilst [it yet] morning: [be] god, let plead himself, [one] hath cast altar. therefore day called jerubbaal, saying, let baal plead him, hath thrown altar. midianites amalekites children east gathered together, went over, pitched valley jezreel. spirit lord came upon gideon, blew trumpet; abi-ezer gathered him. sent messengers throughout manasseh; also gathered him: sent messengers unto asher, unto zebulun, unto naphtali; came meet them.page 145 judges gideon said unto god, thou wilt save israel mine hand, thou hast said, behold, put fleece wool floor; [and] dew fleece only, [it be] dry upon earth [beside,] shall know thou wilt save israel mine hand, thou hast said. so: rose early morrow, thrust fleece together, wringed dew fleece, bowl full water. gideon said unto god, let thine anger hot me, speak once: let prove, pray thee, fleece; let dry upon fleece, upon ground let dew. god night: dry upon fleece only, dew ground. jerubbaal, [is] gideon, people [were] him, rose early, pitched beside well harod: host midianites north side them, hill moreh, valley. lord said unto gideon, people [are] thee [are] many give midianites hands, lest israel vaunt me, saying, mine hand hath saved me. therefore go to, proclaim ears people, saying, whosoever [is] fearful afraid, let return depart early mount gilead. returned people twenty two thousand; remained ten thousand. lord said unto gideon, people [are] yet [too] many; bring unto water, try thee there: shall be, [that] say unto thee, shall go thee, shall go thee; whomsoever say unto thee, shall go thee, shall go. brought people unto water: lord said unto gideon, every one lappeth water tongue, dog lappeth, shalt thou set himself; likewise every one boweth upon knees drink. number lapped, [putting] hand mouth, three hundred men: rest people bowed upon knees drink water. lord said unto gideon, three hundred men lapped save you, deliver midianites thine hand: let [other] people go every man unto place. people took victuals hand, trumpets: sent [the rest of] israel every man unto tent, retained three hundred men: host midian beneath valley. came pass night, lord said unto him, arise, get thee unto host; delivered thine hand. thou fear go down, go thou phurah thy servant host: thou shalt hear say; afterward shall thine hands strengthened go unto host. went phurah servant unto outside armed men [were] host. midianites amalekites children east lay along valley like grasshoppers multitude; camels [were] without number, sand sea side multitude. gideon come, behold, [there was] man told dream unto fellow, said, behold, dreamed dream, and, lo, cake barley bread tumbled host midian, came unto tent, smote fell, overturned it, tent lay along. fellow answered said, [is] nothing else save sword gideon son joash, man israel: [for] hand hath god delivered midian, host. [so,] gideon heard telling dream, interpretation thereof, worshipped, returned host israel, said, arise; lord hath delivered hand host midian. divided three hundred men [into] three companies, put trumpet every man's hand, empty pitchers, lamps within pitchers. said unto them, look me, likewise: and, behold, come outside camp, shall [that,] do, shall ye do. blow trumpet, [are] me, blow ye trumpets also every side camp, say, [the sword] lord, gideon. gideon, hundred men [were] him, came unto outside camp beginning middle watch; newly set watch: blew trumpets, brake pitchers [were] hands. three companies blew trumpets, brake pitchers, held lamps left hands, trumpets right hands blow [withal:] cried, sword lord, gideon. stood every man place round camp: host ran, cried, fled. three hundred blew trumpets, lord set every man's sword fellow, even throughout host: host fled beth-shittah zererath, [and] border abel- meholah, unto tabbath. men israel gathered together naphtali, asher, manasseh, pursued midianites. gideon sent messengers throughout mount ephraim, saying, come midianites, take waters unto beth-barah jordan. men ephraim gathered together, took waters unto beth-barah jordan. took two princes midianites, oreb zeeb; slew oreb upon rock oreb, zeeb slew winepress zeeb, pursued midian, brought heads oreb zeeb gideon side jordan. men ephraim said unto him, hast thou served us thus, thou calledst us not, thou wentest fight midianites? chide sharply. said unto them, done comparison you? [is] gleaning grapes ephraim better vintage abi-ezer? god hath delivered hands princes midian, oreb zeeb: able comparison you? anger abated toward him, said that. gideon came jordan, [and] passed over, he, three hundred men [were] him, faint, yet pursuing [them. ] said unto men succoth, give, pray you, loaves bread unto people follow me; [be] faint, pursuing zebah zalmunna, kings midian. princes succoth said, [are] hands zebah zalmunna thine hand, give bread unto thine army? gideon said, therefore lord hath delivered zebah zalmunna mine hand, tear flesh thorns wilderness briers. went thence penuel, spake untojudges page 146 likewise: men penuel answered men succoth answered [him. ] spake also unto men penuel, saying, come peace, break tower. zebah zalmunna [were] karkor, hosts them, fifteen thousand [men,] left hosts children east: fell hundred twenty thousand men drew sword. gideon went way dwelt tents east nobah jogbehah, smote host: host secure. zebah zalmunna fled, pursued them, took two kings midian, zebah zalmunna, discomfited host. gideon son joash returned battle sun [was up, ] caught young man men succoth, enquired him: described unto princes succoth, elders thereof, [even] threescore seventeen men. came unto men succoth, said, behold zebah zalmunna, ye upbraid me, saying, [are] hands zebah zalmunna thine hand, give bread unto thy men [that are] weary? took elders city, thorns wilderness briers, taught men succoth. beat tower penuel, slew men city. said unto zebah zalmunna, manner men [were they] ye slew tabor? answered, thou [art,] [were] they; one resembled children king. said, [were] brethren, [even] sons mother: [as] lord liveth, ye saved alive, would slay you. said unto jether firstborn, up, [and] slay them. youth drew sword: feared, [was] yet youth. zebah zalmunna said, rise thou, fall upon us: man [is, is] strength. gideon arose, slew zebah zalmunna, took away ornaments [were] camels' necks. men israel said unto gideon, rule thou us, thou, thy son, thy son's son also: thou hast delivered us hand midian. gideon said unto them, rule you, neither shall son rule you: lord shall rule you. gideon said unto them, would desire request you, ye would give every man earrings prey. (for golden earrings, [were] ishmaelites.) answered, willingly give [them.] spread garment, cast therein every man earrings prey. weight golden earrings requested thousand seven hundred [shekels] gold; beside ornaments, collars, purple raiment [was] kings midian, beside chains [were] camels' necks. gideon made ephod thereof, put city, [even] ophrah: israel went thither whoring it: thing became snare unto gideon, house. thus midian subdued children israel, lifted heads more. country quietness forty years days gideon. jerubbaal son joash went dwelt house. gideon threescore ten sons body begotten: many wives. concubine [was] shechem, also bare son, whose name called abimelech. gideon son joash died good old age, buried sepulchre joash father, ophrah abi-ezrites. came pass, soon gideon dead, children israel turned again, went whoring baalim, made baal- berith god. children israel remembered lord god, delivered hands enemies every side: neither shewed kindness house jerubbaal, [namely,] gideon, according goodness shewed unto israel. abimelech son jerubbaal went shechem unto mother's brethren, communed them, family house mother's father, saying, speak, pray you, ears men shechem, whether better you, either sons jerubbaal, [which are] threescore ten persons, reign you, one reign you? remember also [am] bone flesh. mother's brethren spake ears men shechem words: hearts inclined follow abimelech; said, [is] brother. gave threescore ten [pieces] silver house baal-berith, wherewith abimelech hired vain light persons, followed him. went unto father's house ophrah, slew brethren sons jerubbaal, [being] threescore ten persons, upon one stone: notwithstanding yet jotham youngest son jerubbaal left; hid himself. men shechem gathered together, house millo, went, made abimelech king, plain pillar [was] shechem. told [it] jotham, went stood top mount gerizim, lifted voice, cried, said unto them, hearken unto me, ye men shechem, god may hearken unto you. trees went forth [on time] anoint king them; said unto olive tree, reign thou us. olive tree said unto them, leave fatness, wherewith honour god man, go promoted trees? trees said fig tree, come thou, [and] reign us. fig tree said unto them, forsake sweetness, good fruit, go promoted trees? said trees unto vine, come thou, [and] reign us. vine said unto them, leave wine, cheereth god man, go promoted trees? said trees unto bramble, come thou, [and] reign us. bramble said unto trees, truth ye anoint king you, [then] come [and] put trust shadow: not, let fire come bramble, devour cedars lebanon. therefore, ye done truly sincerely, ye made abimelech king, ye dealt well jerubbaal house, done unto according deserving hands; (for father fought you, adventured life far, delivered hand midian: ye risen father's house day, slain sons, threescore ten persons, upon one stone, made abimelech, sonpage 147 judges maidservant, king men shechem, [is] brother;) ye dealt truly sincerely jerubbaal house day, [then] rejoice ye abimelech, let also rejoice you: not, let fire come abimelech, devour men shechem, house millo; let fire come men shechem, house millo, devour abimelech. jotham ran away, fled, went beer, dwelt there, fear abimelech brother. abimelech reigned three years israel, god sent evil spirit abimelech men shechem; men shechem dealt treacherously abimelech: cruelty [done] threescore ten sons jerubbaal might come, blood laid upon abimelech brother, slew them; upon men shechem, aided killing brethren. men shechem set liers wait top mountains, robbed came along way them: told abimelech. gaal son ebed came brethren, went shechem: men shechem put confidence him. went fields, gathered vineyards, trode [the grapes,] made merry, went house god, eat drink, cursed abimelech. gaal son ebed said, [is] abimelech, [is] shechem, serve him? [is] [he] son jerubbaal? zebul officer? serve men hamor father shechem: serve him? would god people hand! would remove abimelech. said abimelech, increase thine army, come out. zebul ruler city heard words gaal son ebed, anger kindled. sent messengers unto abimelech privily, saying, behold, gaal son ebed brethren come shechem; and, behold, fortify city thee. therefore night, thou people [is] thee, lie wait field: shall be, [that] morning, soon sun up, thou shalt rise early, set upon city: and, behold, [when] people [is] come thee, mayest thou thou shalt find occasion. abimelech rose up, people [were] him, night, laid wait shechem four companies. gaal son ebed went out, stood entering gate city: abimelech rose up, people [were] him, lying wait. gaal saw people, said zebul, behold, come people top mountains. zebul said unto him, thou seest shadow mountains [if were] men. gaal spake said, see come people middle land, another company come along plain meonenim. said zebul unto him, [is] thy mouth, wherewith thou saidst, [is] abimelech, serve him? [is] people thou hast despised? go out, pray now, fight them. gaal went men shechem, fought abimelech. abimelech chased him, fled him, many overthrown [and] wounded, [even] unto entering gate. abimelech dwelt arumah: zebul thrust gaal hisbrethren, dwell shechem. came pass morrow, people went field; told abimelech. took people, divided three companies, laid wait field, looked, and, behold, people [were] come forth city; rose them, smote them. abimelech, company [was] him, rushed forward, stood entering gate city: two [other] companies ran upon [the people] [were] fields, slew them. abimelech fought city day; took city, slew people [was] therein, beat city, sowed salt. men tower shechem heard [that,] entered hold house god berith. told abimelech, men tower shechem gathered together. abimelech gat mount zalmon, people [were] him; abimelech took axe hand, cut bough trees, took it, laid [it] shoulder, said unto people [were] him, ye seen do, make haste, [and] [have done. ] people likewise cut every man bough, followed abimelech, put [them] hold, set hold fire upon them; men tower shechem died also, thousand men women. went abimelech thebez, encamped thebez, took it. strong tower within city, thither fled men women, city, shut [it] them, gat top tower. abimelech came unto tower, fought it, went hard unto door tower burn fire. certain woman cast piece millstone upon abimelech's head, brake skull. called hastily unto young man armourbearer, said unto him, draw thy sword, slay me, men say me, woman slew him. young man thrust through, died. men israel saw abimelech dead, departed every man unto place. thus god rendered wickedness abimelech, unto father, slaying seventy brethren: evil men shechem god render upon heads: upon came curse jotham son jerubbaal. abimelech arose defend israel tola son puah, son dodo, man issachar; dwelt shamir mount ephraim. judged israel twenty three years, died, buried shamir. arose jair, gileadite, judged israel twenty two years. thirty sons rode thirty ass colts, thirty cities, called havoth-jair unto day, [are] land gilead. jair died, buried camon. children israel evil sight lord, served baalim, ashtaroth, gods syria, gods zidon, gods moab, gods children ammon, gods philistines, forsook lord, served him. anger lord hotjudges page 148 israel, sold hands philistines, hands children ammon. year vexed oppressed children israel: eighteen years, children israel [were] side jordan land amorites, [is] gilead. moreover children ammon passed jordan fight also judah, benjamin, house ephraim; israel sore distressed. children israel cried unto lord, saying, sinned thee, forsaken god, also served baalim. lord said unto children israel, [did] [i deliver you] egyptians, amorites, children ammon, philistines? zidonians also, amalekites, maonites, oppress you; ye cried me, delivered hand. yet ye forsaken me, served gods: wherefore deliver more. go cry unto gods ye chosen; let deliver time tribulation. children israel said unto lord, sinned: thou unto us whatsoever seemeth good unto thee; deliver us only, pray thee, day. put away strange gods among them, served lord: soul grieved misery israel. children ammon gathered together, encamped gilead. children israel assembled together, encamped mizpeh. people [and] princes gilead said one another, man [is he] begin fight children ammon? shall head inhabitants gilead. jephthah gileadite mighty man valour, [was] son harlot: gilead begat jephthah. gilead's wife bare sons; wife's sons grew up, thrust jephthah, said unto him, thou shalt inherit father's house; thou [art] son strange woman. jephthah fled brethren, dwelt land tob: gathered vain men jephthah, went him. came pass process time, children ammon made war israel. so, children ammon made war israel, elders gilead went fetch jephthah land tob: said unto jephthah, come, captain, may fight children ammon. jephthah said unto elders gilead, ye hate me, expel father's house? ye come unto ye distress? elders gilead said unto jephthah, therefore turn thee now, thou mayest go us, fight children ammon, head inhabitants gilead. jephthah said unto elders gilead, ye bring home fight children ammon, lord deliver me, shall head? elders gilead said unto jephthah, lord witness us, according thy words. jephthah went elders gilead, people made head captain them: jephthah uttered words lord mizpeh. jephthah sent messengers unto king children ammon, saying, hast thou me, thou art come fight land? king children ammon answered unto messengers jephthah, israel took away land, came egypt, arnon even unto jabbok, unto jordan: therefore restore [lands] peaceably. jephthah sent messengers unto king children ammon: said unto him, thus saith jephthah, israel took away land moab, land children ammon: israel came egypt, walked wilderness unto red sea, came kadesh; israel sent messengers unto king edom, saying, let me, pray thee, pass thy land: king edom would hearken [thereto.] like manner sent unto king moab: would [consent:] israel abode kadesh. went along wilderness, compassed land edom, land moab, came east side land moab, pitched side arnon, came within border moab: arnon [was] border moab. israel sent messengers unto sihon king amorites, king heshbon; israel said unto him, let us pass, pray thee, thy land place. sihon trusted israel pass coast: sihon gathered people together, pitched jahaz, fought israel. lord god israel delivered sihon people hand israel, smote them: israel possessed land amorites, inhabitants country. possessed coasts amorites, arnon even unto jabbok, wilderness even unto jordan. lord god israel hath dispossessed amorites people israel, shouldest thou possess it? wilt thou possess chemosh thy god giveth thee possess? whomsoever lord god shall drive us, possess. [art] thou thing better balak son zippor, king moab? ever strive israel, ever fight them, israel dwelt heshbon towns, aroer towns, cities [be] along coasts arnon, three hundred years? therefore ye recover [them] within time? wherefore sinned thee, thou doest wrong war me: lord judge judge day children israel children ammon. howbeit king children ammon hearkened unto words jephthah sent him. spirit lord came upon jephthah, passed gilead, manasseh, passed mizpeh gilead, mizpeh gilead passed [unto] children ammon. jephthah vowed vow unto lord, said, thou shalt without fail deliver children ammon mine hands, shall be, whatsoever cometh forth doors house meet me, return peace children ammon, shall surely lord's, offer burnt offering. jephthah passed unto children ammon fight them; lord delivered hands. smote aroer, even till thou come minnith, [even] twenty cities, unto plain vineyards, greatpage 149 judges slaughter. thus children ammon subdued children israel. jephthah came mizpeh unto house, and, behold, daughter came meet timbrels dances: [was his] child; beside neither son daughter. came pass, saw her, rent clothes, said, alas, daughter! thou hast brought low, thou art one trouble me: opened mouth unto lord, cannot go back. said unto him, father, [if] thou hast opened thy mouth unto lord, according hath proceeded thy mouth; forasmuch lord hath taken vengeance thee thine enemies, [even] children ammon. said unto father, let thing done me: let alone two months, may go upon mountains, bewail virginity, fellows. said, go. sent away [for] two months: went companions, bewailed virginity upon mountains. came pass end two months, returned unto father, [according] vow vowed: knew man. custom israel, [that] daughters israel went yearly lament daughter jephthah gileadite four days year. men ephraim gathered together, went northward, said unto jephthah, wherefore passedst thou fight children ammon, didst call us go thee? burn thine house upon thee fire. jephthah said unto them, people great strife children ammon; called you, ye delivered hands. saw ye delivered [me] not, put life hands, passed children ammon, lord delivered hand: wherefore ye come unto day, fight me? jephthah gathered together men gilead, fought ephraim: men gilead smote ephraim, said, ye gileadites [are] fugitives ephraim among ephraimites, [and] among manassites. gileadites took passages jordan ephraimites: [so,] ephraimites escaped said, let go over; men gilead said unto him, [art] thou ephraimite? said, nay; said unto him, say shibboleth: said sibboleth: could frame pronounce [it] right. took him, slew passages jordan: fell time ephraimites forty two thousand. jephthah judged israel six years. died jephthah gileadite, buried [one of] cities gilead. ibzan bethlehem judged israel. thirty sons, thirty daughters, [whom] sent abroad, took thirty daughters abroad sons. judged israel seven years. died ibzan, buried bethlehem. elon, zebulonite, judged israel; judged israel ten years. elon zebulonite died, buried aijalon country zebulun. abdon son hillel, pirathonite, judged israel. forty sonsand thirty nephews, rode threescore ten ass colts: judged israel eight years. abdon son hillel pirathonite died, buried pirathon land ephraim, mount amalekites. children israel evil sight lord; lord delivered hand philistines forty years. certain man zorah, family danites, whose name [was] manoah; wife [was] barren, bare not. angel lord appeared unto woman, said unto her, behold now, thou [art] barren, bearest not: thou shalt conceive, bear son. therefore beware, pray thee, drink wine strong drink, eat unclean [thing: ] for, lo, thou shalt conceive, bear son; razor shall come head: child shall nazarite unto god womb: shall begin deliver israel hand philistines. woman came told husband, saying, man god came unto me, countenance [was] like countenance angel god, terrible: asked whence [was,] neither told name: said unto me, behold, thou shalt conceive, bear son; drink wine strong drink, neither eat unclean [thing:] child shall nazarite god womb day death. manoah intreated lord, said, lord, let man god thou didst send come unto us, teach us shall unto child shall born. god hearkened voice manoah; angel god came unto woman sat field: manoah husband [was] her. woman made haste, ran, shewed husband, said unto him, behold, man hath appeared unto me, came unto [other] day. manoah arose, went wife, came man, said unto him, art thou man spakest unto woman? said, [am. ] manoah said, let thy words come pass. shall order child, [how] shall unto him? angel lord said unto manoah, said unto woman let beware. may eat [thing] cometh vine, neither let drink wine strong drink, eat unclean [thing:] commanded let observe. manoah said unto angel lord, pray thee, let us detain thee, shall made ready kid thee. angel lord said unto manoah, though thou detain me, eat thy bread: thou wilt offer burnt offering, thou must offer unto lord. manoah knew [was] angel lord. manoah said unto angel lord, [is] thy name, thy sayings come pass may thee honour? samson said unto father, get me; pleaseth well. father mother knew [was] lord, sought occasion philistines: time philistines dominion israel. went samson down, father mother, timnath, came vineyards timnath: and, behold, young lion roared him. spirit lord came mightily upon him, rent would rent kid, [he had] nothing hand: told father mother done. went down, talked woman; pleased samson well. time returned take her, turned aside see carcase lion: and, behold, [there was] swarm bees honey carcase lion. took thereof hands, went eating, came father mother, gave them, eat: told taken honey carcase lion. father went unto woman: samson made feast; used young men do. came pass, saw him, brought thirty companions him. samson said unto them, put forth riddle unto you: ye certainly declare within seven days feast, find [it] out, give thirty sheets thirty change garments: ye cannot declare [it] me, shall ye give thirty sheets thirty change garments. said unto him, put forth thy riddle, may hear it. said unto them, eater came forth meat, strong came forth sweetness. could three days expound riddle. came pass seventh day, said unto samson's wife, entice thy husband, may declare unto us riddle, lest burn thee thy father's house fire: ye called us take have? [is it] [so? ] samson's wife wept him, said, thou dost hate me, lovest not: thou hast put forth riddle unto children people, hast told [it] me. said unto her, behold, told [it] father mother, shall tell [it] thee? wept himthe seven days, feast lasted: came pass seventh day, told her, lay sore upon him: told riddle children people. men city said unto seventh day sun went down, [is] sweeter honey? [is] stronger lion? said unto them, ye plowed heifer, ye found riddle. spirit lord came upon him, went ashkelon, slew thirty men them, took spoil, gave change garments unto expounded riddle. anger kindled, went father's house. samson's wife [given] companion, used friend. came pass within after, time wheat harvest, samson visited wife kid; said, go wife chamber. father would suffer go in. father said, verily thought thou hadst utterly hated her; therefore gave thy companion: [is] younger sister fairer she? take her, pray thee, instead her. samson said concerning them, shall blameless philistines, though displeasure. samson went caught three hundred foxes, took firebrands, turned tail tail, put firebrand midst two tails. set brands fire, [let] go standing corn philistines, burnt shocks, also standing corn, vineyards [and] olives. philistines said, hath done this? answered, samson, son law timnite, taken wife, given companion. philistines came up, burnt father fire. samson said unto them, though ye done this, yet avenged you, cease. smote hip thigh great slaughter: went dwelt top rock etam. philistines went up, pitched judah, spread lehi. men judah said, ye come us? answered, bind samson come up, hath done us. three thousand men judah went top rock etam, said samson, knowest thou philistines [are] rulers us? [is] [that] thou hast done unto us? said unto them, unto me, done unto them. said unto him, come bind thee, may deliver thee hand philistines. samson said unto them, swear unto me, ye fall upon yourselves. spake unto him, saying, no; bind thee fast, deliver thee hand: surely kill thee. bound two new cords, brought rock. [and] came unto lehi, philistines shouted him: spirit lord came mightily upon him, cords [were] upon arms became flax burnt fire, bandspage 151 judges loosed hands. found new jawbone ass, put forth hand, took it, slew thousand men therewith. samson said, jawbone ass, heaps upon heaps, jaw ass slain thousand men. came pass, made end speaking, cast away jawbone hand, called place ramath-lehi. sore athirst, called lord, said, thou hast given great deliverance hand thy servant: shall die thirst, fall hand uncircumcised? god clave hollow place [was] jaw, came water thereout; drunk, spirit came again, revived: wherefore called name thereof en- hakkore, [is] lehi unto day. judged israel days philistines twenty years. went samson gaza, saw harlot, went unto her. [and told] gazites, saying, samson come hither. compassed [him] in, laid wait night gate city, quiet night, saying, morning, day, shall kill him. samson lay till midnight, arose midnight, took doors gate city, two posts, went away them, bar all, put [them] upon shoulders, carried top hill hebron. came pass afterward, loved woman valley sorek, whose name [was] delilah. lords philistines came unto her, said unto her, entice him, see wherein great strength [lieth,] [means] may prevail him, may bind afflict him: give thee every one us eleven hundred [pieces] silver. delilah said samson, tell me, pray thee, wherein thy great strength [lieth,] wherewith thou mightest bound afflict thee. samson said unto her, bind seven green withs never dried, shall weak, another man. lords philistines brought seven green withs dried, bound them. [were] house micah, knew voice young man levite: turned thither, said unto him, brought thee hither? makest thou [place?] hast thou here? said unto them, thus thus dealeth micah me, hath hired me, priest. said unto him, ask counsel, pray thee, god, may know whether way go shall prosperous. priest said unto them, go peace: lord way wherein ye go. five men departed, came laish, saw people [were] therein, dwelt careless, manner zidonians, quiet secure; [there was] magistrate land, might put [them] shame [any] thing; [were] far zidonians, business [any] man. came unto brethren zorah eshtaol: brethren said unto them, [say] ye?
