[and] [were] jebus, day far spent; servant said unto master, come, pray thee, let us turn city jebusites, lodge it. master said unto him, turn aside hither city stranger, [is] children israel; pass gibeah. said unto servant, come, let us draw near one places lodge night, gibeah, ramah. passed went way; sun went upon [when were] gibeah, [belongeth] benjamin. turned aside thither, go [and] lodge gibeah: went in, sat street city: [there was] man took house lodging. and, behold, came old man work field even, [was] also mount ephraim; sojourned gibeah: men place [were] benjamites. lifted eyes, saw wayfaring man street city: old man said, whither goest thou? whence comest thou? said unto him, [are] passing bethlehemjudah toward side mount ephraim; thence [am] i: went bethlehemjudah, [am now] going house lord; [is] man receiveth house. yet straw provender asses; bread wine also me, thy handmaid, young man [which is] thy servants: [there is] want thing. old man said, peace [be] thee; howsoever [let] thy wants [lie] upon me; lodge street. brought house, gave provender unto asses: washed feet, eat drink. [now] making hearts merry, behold, men city, certain sons belial, beset house round about, [and] beat door, spake master house, old man, saying, bring forth man came thine house, may know him. man, master house, went unto them, said unto them, nay, brethren, [nay,] pray you, [so] wickedly; seeing man come mine house, folly. behold, [here is] daughter maiden, concubine; bring now, humble ye them, seemeth good unto you: unto man vile thing. men would hearken him: man took concubine, brought forth unto them; knew her, abused night morning: day began spring, let go. came woman dawning day, fell door man's house lord [was,] till light. lord rose morning, opened doors house, went go way: and, behold, woman concubine fallen [at] door house, hands [were] upon threshold. said unto her, up, let us going. none answered. man took [up] upon ass, man rose up, gat unto place. come house, took knife, laid hold concubine, divided her, [together] bones, twelve pieces, sent coasts israel. so, saw said, deed done seen day children israel came land egypt unto day: consider it, take advice, speak [your minds. ] children israel went out, congregation gathered together one man, dan even beer-sheba, land gilead, unto lord mizpeh. chief people, [even] tribes israel, presented assembly people god, four hundred thousand footmen drew sword. (now children benjamin heard children israel gone mizpeh.) said children israel, tell [us,] wickedness? levite, husband woman slain, answered said, came gibeah [belongeth] benjamin, concubine, lodge. men gibeah rose me, beset house round upon night, [and] thought slain me: concubine forced, dead. took concubine, cut pieces, sent throughout country inheritance israel: committed lewdness folly israel. behold, ye [are] children israel; give advice counsel. people arose one man, saying, [of us] go tent, neither [of us] turn house. [shall be] thing gibeah; [we go up] lot it; take ten men hundred throughout tribes israel, hundred thousand, thousand ten thousand, fetch victual people, may do, come gibeah benjamin, according follyjudges page 154 wrought israel. men israel gathered city, knit together one man. tribes israel sent men tribe benjamin, saying, wickedness [is] done among you? therefore deliver [us] men, children belial, [are] gibeah, may put death, put away evil israel. children benjamin would hearken voice brethren children israel: children benjamin gathered together cities unto gibeah, go battle children israel. children benjamin numbered time cities twenty six thousand men drew sword, beside inhabitants gibeah, numbered seven hundred chosen men. among people [there were] seven hundred chosen men lefthanded; every one could sling stones hair [breadth,] miss. men israel, beside benjamin, numbered four hundred thousand men drew sword: [were] men war. children israel arose, went house god, asked counsel god, said, us shall go first battle children benjamin? lord said, judah [shall go up] first. children israel rose morning, encamped gibeah. men israel went battle benjamin; men israel put array fight gibeah. children benjamin came forth gibeah, destroyed ground israelites day twenty two thousand men. people men israel encouraged themselves, set battle array place put array first day. (and children israel went wept lord even, asked counsel lord, saying, shall go battle children benjamin brother? lord said, go him.) children israel came near children benjamin second day. benjamin went forth gibeah second day, destroyed ground children israel eighteen thousand men; drew sword. children israel, people, went up, came unto house god, wept, sat lord, fasted day even, offered burnt offerings peace offerings lord. children israel enquired lord, (for ark covenant god [was] days, phinehas, son eleazar, son aaron, stood days,) saying, shall yet go battle children benjamin brother, shall cease? lord said, go up; morrow deliver thine hand. israel set liers wait round gibeah. children israel went children benjamin third day, put array gibeah, times. children benjamin went people, [and] drawn away city; began smite people, [and] kill, times, highways, one goeth house god, gibeah field, thirty men israel. children benjamin said, [are] smitten us, first. children israel said, let us flee, anddraw city unto highways. men israel rose place, put array baal-tamar: liers wait israel came forth places, [even] meadows gibeah. came gibeah ten thousand chosen men israel, battle sore: knew evil [was] near them. lord smote benjamin israel: children israel destroyed benjamites day twenty five thousand hundred men: drew sword. children benjamin saw smitten: men israel gave place benjamites, trusted unto liers wait set beside gibeah. liers wait hasted, rushed upon gibeah; liers wait drew [themselves] along, smote city edge sword. appointed sign men israel liers wait, make great flame smoke rise city. men israel retired battle, benjamin began smite [and] kill men israel thirty persons: said, surely smitten us, [in] first battle. flame began arise city pillar smoke, benjamites looked behind them, and, behold, flame city ascended heaven. men israel turned again, men benjamin amazed: saw evil come upon them. therefore turned [their backs] men israel unto way wilderness; battle overtook them; [came] cities destroyed midst them. [thus] inclosed benjamites round about, [and] chased them, [and] trode ease gibeah toward sunrising. fell benjamin eighteen thousand men; [were] men valour. turned fled toward wilderness unto rock rimmon: gleaned highways five thousand men; pursued hard unto gidom, slew two thousand men them. fell day benjamin twenty five thousand men drew sword; [were] men valour. six hundred men turned fled wilderness unto rock rimmon, abode rock rimmon four months. men israel turned upon children benjamin, smote edge sword, well men [every] city, beast, came hand: also set fire cities came to. men israel sworn mizpeh, saying, shall us give daughter unto benjamin wife. people came house god, abode till even god, lifted voices, wept sore; said, lord god israel, come pass israel, day one tribe lacking israel? came pass morrow, people rose early, built altar, offered burnt offerings peace offerings. children israel said, [is there] among tribes israel came congregation unto lord? made great oath concerning came lord mizpeh, saying, shall surely put death. children israel repented benjamin brother, said, one tribe cut israel day. shall wives remain, seeing sworn lord give daughters wives?page 155 judges said, one [is there] tribes israel came mizpeh lord? and, behold, came none camp jabesh-gilead assembly. people numbered, and, behold, [there were] none inhabitants jabesh- gilead there. congregation sent thither twelve thousand men valiantest, commanded them, saying, go smite inhabitants jabesh-gilead edge sword, women children. [is] thing ye shall do, ye shall utterly destroy every male, every woman hath lain man. found among inhabitants jabesh-gilead four hundred young virgins, known man lying male: brought unto camp shiloh, land canaan. whole congregation sent [some] speak children benjamin [were] rock rimmon, call peaceably unto them. benjamin came time; gave wives saved alive women jabesh- gilead: yet sufficed not. people repented benjamin, lord made breach tribes israel. elders congregation said, shall wives remain, seeing women destroyed benjamin? said, [there must be] inheritance escaped benjamin, tribe destroyed israel. howbeit may give wives daughters: children israel sworn, saying, cursed [be] giveth wife benjamin. said, behold, [there is] feast lord shiloh yearly [in place] [is] north side bethel, east side highway goeth bethel shechem, south lebonah. therefore commanded children benjamin, saying, go lie wait vineyards; see, and, behold, daughters shiloh come dance dances, come ye vineyards, catch every man wife daughters shiloh, go land benjamin. shall be, fathers brethren come unto us complain, say unto them, favourable unto sakes: reserved man wife war: ye give unto time, [that] ye guilty. children benjamin so, took [them] wives, according number, danced, caught: went returned unto inheritance, repaired cities, dwelt them. children israel departed thence time, every man tribe family, went thence every man inheritance. days [there was] king israel: every man [that was] right eyes.page 157 ruth book ruth came pass days judges ruled, famine land. certain man bethlehemjudah went sojourn country moab, he, wife, two sons. name man [was] elimelech, name wife naomi, name two sons mahlon chilion, ephrathites bethlehemjudah. came country moab, continued there. elimelech naomi's husband died; left, two sons. took wives women moab; name one [was] orpah, name ruth: dwelled ten years. mahlon chilion died also them; woman left two sons husband. arose daughters law, might return country moab: heard country moab lord visited people giving bread. wherefore went forth place was, two daughters law her; went way return unto land judah. naomi said unto two daughters law, go, return mother's house: lord deal kindly you, ye dealt dead, me. lord grant ye may find rest, [of you] house husband. kissed them; lifted voice, wept. said unto her, surely return thee unto thy people. naomi said, turn again, daughters: ye go me? [are] yet [any more] sons womb, may husbands? turn again, daughters, go [your way;] old husband. say, hope, [if] husband also night, also bear sons; would ye tarry till grown? would ye stay husbands? nay, daughters; grieveth much sakes hand lord gone me. lifted voice, wept again: orpah kissed mother law; ruth clave unto her. said, behold, thy sister law gone back unto people, unto gods: return thou thy sister law. ruth said, intreat leave thee, [or] return following thee: whither thou goest, go; thou lodgest, lodge: thy people [shall be] people, thy god god: thou diest, die, buried: lord me, also, [if ought] death part thee me. saw stedfastly minded go her, left speaking unto her. two went came bethlehem. came pass, come bethlehem, city moved them, said, [is] naomi? said unto them, call naomi, call mara: almighty hath dealt bitterly me. went full, lord hath brought home empty: [then] call ye naomi, seeing lord hath testified me, almighty hath afflicted me? naomi returned, ruth moabitess, daughter law, her, returned country moab: came bethlehem beginning barley harvest. naomi kinsman husband's, amighty man wealth, family elimelech; name [was] boaz. ruth moabitess said unto naomi, let go field, glean ears corn [him] whose sight shall find grace. said unto her, go, daughter. went, came, gleaned field reapers: hap light part field [belonging] unto boaz, [was] kindred elimelech. behold, boaz came bethlehem, said unto reapers, lord [be] you. answered him, lord bless thee. said boaz unto servant set reapers, whose damsel [is] this? servant set reapers answered said, [is] moabitish damsel came back naomi country moab: said, pray you, let glean gather reapers among sheaves: came, hath continued even morning now, tarried little house. said boaz unto ruth, hearest thou not, daughter? go glean another field, neither go hence, abide fast maidens: [let] thine eyes [be] field reap, go thou them: charged young men shall touch thee? thou art athirst, go unto vessels, drink [that] young men drawn. fell face, bowed ground, said unto him, found grace thine eyes, thou shouldest take knowledge me, seeing [am] stranger? boaz answered said unto her, hath fully shewed me, thou hast done unto thy mother law since death thine husband: [how] thou hast left thy father thy mother, land thy nativity, art come unto people thou knewest heretofore. lord recompense thy work, full reward given thee lord god israel, whose wings thou art come trust. said, let find favour thy sight, lord; thou hast comforted me, thou hast spoken friendly unto thine handmaid, though like unto one thine handmaidens. boaz said unto her, mealtime come thou hither, eat bread, dip thy morsel vinegar. sat beside reapers: reached parched [corn,] eat, sufficed, left. risen glean, boaz commanded young men, saying, let glean even among sheaves, reproach not: let fall also [some] handfuls purpose her, leave [them,] may glean [them,] rebuke not. gleaned field even, beat gleaned: ephah barley. took [it] up, went city: mother law saw gleaned: brought forth, gave reserved sufficed. mother law said unto her, hast thou gleaned day? wroughtest thou? blessed take knowledge thee. shewed mother law wrought, said, man's name wrought day [is] boaz. naomi said unto daughter law, blessed [be] lord, hath left kindness living dead. naomi said unto her, man [is] near kin unto us, one next kinsmen. ruth moabitess said, said unto also, thou shalt keep fast young men, ended harvest. naomi said unto ruth daughter law, [it is] good, daughter,ruth page 158 thou go maidens, meet thee field. kept fast maidens boaz glean unto end barley harvest wheat harvest; dwelt mother law. naomi mother law said unto her, daughter, shall seek rest thee, may well thee? [is] boaz kindred, whose maidens thou wast? behold, winnoweth barley night threshingfloor. wash thyself therefore, anoint thee, put thy raiment upon thee, get thee floor: [but] make thyself known unto man, shall done eating drinking. shall be, lieth down, thou shalt mark place shall lie, thou shalt go in, uncover feet, lay thee down; tell thee thou shalt do. said unto her, thou sayest unto do. went unto floor, according mother law bade her. boaz eaten drunk, heart merry, went lie end heap corn: came softly, uncovered feet, laid down. came pass midnight, man afraid, turned himself: and, behold, woman lay feet. said, [art] thou? answered, [am] ruth thine handmaid: spread therefore thy skirt thine handmaid; thou [art] near kinsman. said, blessed [be] thou lord, daughter: [for] thou hast shewed kindness latter end beginning, inasmuch thou followedst young men, whether poor rich. now, daughter, fear not; thee thou requirest: city people doth know thou [art] virtuous woman. true [am thy] near kinsman: howbeit kinsman nearer i. tarry night, shall morning, [that] perform unto thee part kinsman, well; let kinsman's part: part kinsman thee, part kinsman thee, [as] lord liveth: lie morning. lay feet morning: rose one could know another. said, let known woman came floor. also said, bring vail [thou hast] upon thee, hold it. held it, measured six [measures] barley, laid [it] her: went city. came mother law, said, [art] thou, daughter? told man done her. said, six [measures] barley gave me; said me, go empty unto thy mother law. said she, sit still, daughter, thou know matter fall: man rest, finished thing day. went boaz gate, sat there: and, behold, kinsman boaz spake came by; unto said, ho, one! turn aside, sit here. turned aside, sat down. took ten men elders city, said, sit ye here. sat down. said unto kinsman, naomi, come country moab, selleth parcel land, [was] brother elimelech's: thought advertise thee, saying, buy [it] inhabitants, elders mypeople. thou wilt redeem [it,] redeem [it:] thou wilt redeem [it, then] tell me, may know: [there is] none redeem [it] beside thee; [am] thee. said, redeem [it. ] said boaz, day thou buyest field hand naomi, thou must buy [it] also ruth moabitess, wife dead, raise name dead upon inheritance. kinsman said, cannot redeem [it] myself, lest mar mine inheritance: redeem thou right thyself; cannot redeem it. [was manner] former time israel concerning redeeming concerning changing, confirm things; man plucked shoe, gave [it] neighbour: [was] testimony israel. therefore kinsman said unto boaz, buy [it] thee. drew shoe. boaz said unto elders, [unto] people, ye [are] witnesses day, bought [was] elimelech's, [was] chilion's mahlon's, hand naomi. moreover ruth moabitess, wife mahlon, purchased wife, raise name dead upon inheritance, name dead cut among brethren, gate place: ye [are] witnesses day. people [were] gate, elders, said, [we are] witnesses. lord make woman come thine house like rachel like leah, two build house israel: thou worthily ephratah, famous bethlehem: let thy house like house pharez, tamar bare unto judah, seed lord shall give thee young woman. boaz took ruth, wife: went unto her, lord gave conception, bare son. women said unto naomi, blessed [be] lord, hath left thee day without kinsman, name may famous israel. shall unto thee restorer [thy] life, nourisher thine old age: thy daughter law, loveth thee, better thee seven sons, hath born him. naomi took child, laid bosom, became nurse unto it. women neighbours gave name, saying, son born naomi; called name obed: [is] father jesse, father david. [are] generations pharez: pharez begat hezron, hezron begat ram, ram begat amminadab, amminadab begat nahshon, nahshon begat salmon, salmon begat boaz, boaz begat obed, obed begat jesse, jesse begat david.page 159 1 samuel first book samuel otherwise called first book kings certain man ramathaim- zophim, mount ephraim, name elkanah, son jeroham, son elihu, son tohu, son zuph, ephrathite: two wives; name one [was] hannah, name peninnah: peninnah children, hannah children. man went city yearly worship sacrifice unto lord hosts shiloh. two sons eli, hophni phinehas, priests lord, [were] there. time elkanah offered, gave peninnah wife, sons daughters, portions: unto hannah gave worthy portion; loved hannah: lord shut womb. adversary also provoked sore, make fret, lord shut womb. [as] year year, went house lord, provoked her; therefore wept, eat. said elkanah husband her, hannah, weepest thou? eatest thou not? thy heart grieved? [am] better thee ten sons? hannah rose eaten shiloh, drunk. eli priest sat upon seat post temple lord. [was] bitterness soul, prayed unto lord, wept sore. vowed vow, said, lord hosts, thou wilt indeed look affliction thine handmaid, remember me, forget thine handmaid, wilt give unto thine handmaid man child, give unto lord days life, shall razor come upon head. came pass, continued praying lord, eli marked mouth. hannah, spake heart; lips moved, voice heard: therefore eli thought drunken. eli said unto her, long wilt thou drunken? put away thy wine thee. hannah answered said, no, lord, [am] woman sorrowful spirit: drunken neither wine strong drink, poured soul lord. count thine handmaid daughter belial: abundance complaint grief spoken hitherto. eli answered said, go peace: god israel grant [thee] thy petition thou hast asked him. said, let thine handmaid find grace thy sight. woman went way, eat, countenance [sad.] rose morning early, worshipped lord, returned, came house ramah: elkanah knew hannah wife; lord remembered her. wherefore came pass, time come hannah conceived, bare son, called name samuel, [saying,] asked lord. man elkanah, house, went offer unto lord yearly sacrifice, vow. hannah went up; said unto husband, [i go up] child weaned, [then] bring him, may appear lord, abide ever. elkanah husband said untoher, seemeth thee good; tarry thou weaned him; lord establish word. woman abode, gave son suck weaned him. weaned him, took her, three bullocks, one ephah flour, bottle wine, brought unto house lord shiloh: child [was] young. slew bullock, brought child eli. said, oh lord, [as] thy soul liveth, lord, [am] woman stood thee here, praying unto lord. child prayed; lord hath given petition asked him: therefore also lent lord; long liveth shall lent lord. worshipped lord there. hannah prayed, said, heart rejoiceth lord, mine horn exalted lord: mouth enlarged mine enemies; rejoice thy salvation. [there is] none holy lord: [there is] none beside thee: neither [is there] rock like god. talk exceeding proudly; let [not] arrogancy come mouth: lord god knowledge, actions weighed. bows mighty men [are] broken, stumbled girded strength. [they were] full hired bread; [they were] hungry ceased: barren hath born seven; hath many children waxed feeble. lord killeth, maketh alive: bringeth grave, bringeth up. lord maketh poor, maketh rich: bringeth low, lifteth up. raiseth poor dust, [and] lifteth beggar dunghill, set [them] among princes, make inherit throne glory: pillars earth [are] lord's, hath set world upon them. keep feet saints, wicked shall silent darkness; strength shall man prevail. adversaries lord shall broken pieces; heaven shall thunder upon them: lord shall judge ends earth; shall give strength unto king, exalt horn anointed. elkanah went ramah house. child minister unto lord eli priest. sons eli [were] sons belial; knew lord. priest's custom people [was, that,] man offered sacrifice, priest's servant came, flesh seething, fleshhook three teeth hand; struck [it] pan, kettle, caldron, pot; fleshhook brought priest took himself. shiloh unto israelites came thither. also burnt fat, priest's servant came, said man sacrificed, give flesh roast priest; sodden flesh thee, raw. [if] man said unto him, let fail burn fat presently, [then] take [as much] thy soul desireth; would answer him, [nay;] thou shalt give [it me] now: not, take [it] force. wherefore sin young men great lord: men abhorred offering lord. samuel ministered lord, [being] child, girded linen ephod. moreover mother made little coat, brought [it] year year, came husband offer1 samuel page 160 yearly sacrifice. eli blessed elkanah wife, said, lord give thee seed woman loan lent lord. went unto home. lord visited hannah, conceived, bare three sons two daughters. child samuel grew lord. eli old, heard sons unto israel; lay women assembled [at] door tabernacle congregation. said unto them, ye things? hear evil dealings people. nay, sons; [it is] good report hear: ye make lord's people transgress. one man sin another, judge shall judge him: man sin lord, shall intreat him? notwithstanding hearkened unto voice father, lord would slay them. child samuel grew on, favour lord, also men. came man god unto eli, said unto him, thus saith lord, plainly appear unto house thy father, egypt pharaoh's house? choose tribes israel [to be] priest, offer upon mine altar, burn incense, wear ephod me? give unto house thy father offerings made fire children israel? wherefore kick ye sacrifice mine offering, commanded [in my] habitation; honourest thy sons me, make fat chiefest offerings israel people? wherefore lord god israel saith, said indeed [that] thy house, house thy father, walk ever: lord saith, far me; honour honour, despise shall lightly esteemed. behold, days come, cut thine arm, arm thy father's house, shall old man thine house. thou shalt see enemy [in my] habitation, [the wealth] [god] shall give israel: shall old man thine house ever. man thine, [whom] shall cut mine altar, [shall be] consume thine eyes, grieve thine heart: increase thine house shall die flower age. [shall be] sign unto thee, shall come upon thy two sons, hophni phinehas; one day shall die them. raise faithful priest, [that] shall according [that] [is] mine heart mind: build sure house; shall walk mine anointed ever. shall come pass, [that] every one left thine house shall come [and] crouch piece silver morsel bread, shall say, put me, pray thee, one priests' offices, may eat piece bread. child samuel ministered unto lord eli. word lord precious days; [there was] open vision. came pass time, eli [was] laid place, eyes began wax dim, [that] could see; ere lamp god went temple lord, ark god [was,] samuel laid [to sleep; ] lord called samuel: answered, [am] i. ran unto eli, andsaid, [am] i; thou calledst me. said, called not; lie again. went lay down. lord called yet again, samuel. samuel arose went eli, said, [am] i; thou didst call me. answered, called not, son; lie again. samuel yet know lord, neither word lord yet revealed unto him. lord called samuel third time. arose went eli, said, [am] i; thou didst call me. eli perceived lord called child. therefore eli said unto samuel, go, lie down: shall be, call thee, thou shalt say, speak, lord; thy servant heareth. samuel went lay place. lord came, stood, called times, samuel, samuel. samuel answered, speak; thy servant heareth. lord said samuel, behold, thing israel, ears every one heareth shall tingle. day perform eli [things] spoken concerning house: begin, also make end. told judge house ever iniquity knoweth; sons made vile, restrained not. therefore sworn unto house eli, iniquity eli's house shall purged sacrifice offering ever. samuel lay morning, opened doors house lord. samuel feared shew eli vision. eli called samuel, said, samuel, son. answered, [am] i. said, [is] thing [the lord] hath said unto thee? pray thee hide [it] me: god thee, also, thou hide [any] thing things said unto thee. samuel told every whit, hid nothing him. said, [is] lord: let seemeth good. samuel grew, lord him, let none words fall ground. israel dan even beer-sheba knew samuel [was] established [to be] prophet lord. lord appeared shiloh: lord revealed samuel shiloh word lord. word samuel came israel. israel went philistines battle, pitched beside eben-ezer: philistines pitched aphek. philistines put array israel: joined battle, israel smitten philistines: slew army field four thousand men. people come camp, elders israel said, wherefore hath lord smitten us day philistines? man came hastily, told eli. eli ninety eight years old; eyes dim, could see. man said unto eli, [am] came army, fled day army. said, done, son? messenger answered said, israel fled philistines, hath also great slaughter among people, thy two sons also, hophni phinehas, dead, ark god taken. came pass, made mention ark god, fell seat backward side gate, neck brake, died: old man, heavy. judged israel forty years. daughter law, phinehas' wife, child, [near] delivered: heard tidings ark god taken, father law husband dead, bowed travailed; pains came upon her. time death women stood said unto her, fear not; thou hast born son. answered not, neither regard [it. ] named child i-chabod, saying, glory departed israel: ark god taken, father law husband. said, glory departed israel: ark god taken. philistines took ark god, brought eben-ezer unto ashdod. philistines took ark god, brought house dagon, set dagon. ashdod arose early morrow, behold, dagon [was] fallen upon face earth ark lord. took dagon, set place again. arose early morrow morning, behold, dagon [was] fallen upon face ground ark lord; head dagon palms hands [were] cut upon threshold; [the stump of] dagon left him. therefore neither priests dagon,nor come dagon's house, tread threshold dagon ashdod unto day. hand lord heavy upon ashdod, destroyed them, smote emerods, [even] ashdod coasts thereof. men ashdod saw [it was] so, said, ark god israel shall abide us: hand sore upon us, upon dagon god. sent therefore gathered lords philistines unto them, said, shall ark god israel? answered, let ark god israel carried unto gath. carried ark god israel [thither. ] [so,] that, carried about, hand lord city great destruction: smote men city, small great, emerods secret parts. therefore sent ark god ekron. came pass, ark god came ekron, ekronites cried out, saying, brought ark god israel us, slay us people. sent gathered together lords philistines, said, send away ark god israel, let go place, slay us not, people: deadly destruction throughout city; hand god heavy there. men died smitten emerods: cry city went heaven. ark lord country philistines seven months. philistines called priests diviners, saying, shall ark lord? tell us wherewith shall send place. said, ye send away ark god israel, send empty; wise return trespass offering: ye shall healed, shall known hand removed you. said they, [shall be] trespass offering shall return him? answered, five golden emerods, five golden mice, [according to] number lords philistines: one plague all, lords. wherefore ye shall make images emerods, images mice mar land; ye shall give glory unto god israel: peradventure lighten hand you, gods, land. wherefore ye harden hearts, egyptians pharaoh hardened hearts? wrought wonderfully among them, let people go, departed? therefore make new cart, take two milch kine, hath come yoke, tie kine cart, bring calves home them: take ark lord, lay upon cart; put jewels gold, ye return [for] trespass offering, coffer side thereof; send away, may go. see, goeth way coast beth-shemesh, [then] hath done us great evil: not, shall know [it is] hand [that] smote us; [was] chance [that] happened us. men so; took two milch kine, tied cart, shut calves home: laid ark lord upon cart, coffer mice gold images emerods. kine took straight way way beth-shemesh, [and] went along highway, lowing went, turned aside [to] right hand [to] left; lords philistines went1 samuel page 162 unto border beth-shemesh. [they of] beth-shemesh [were] reaping wheat harvest valley: lifted eyes, saw ark, rejoiced see [it. ] cart came field joshua, beth-shemite, stood there, [there was] great stone: clave wood cart, offered kine burnt offering unto lord. levites took ark lord, coffer [was] it, wherein jewels gold [were,] put [them] great stone: men beth- shemesh offered burnt offerings sacrificed sacrifices day unto lord. five lords philistines seen [it,] returned ekron day. [are] golden emerods philistines returned [for] trespass offering unto lord; ashdod one, gaza one, askelon one, gath one, ekron one; golden mice, [according to] number cities philistines [belonging] five lords, [both] fenced cities, country villages, even unto great [stone] abel, whereon set ark lord: [which stone remaineth] unto day field joshua, beth- shemite. smote men beth-shemesh, looked ark lord, even smote people fifty thousand threescore ten men: people lamented, lord smitten [many] people great slaughter. men beth-shemesh said, able stand holy lord god? shall go us? sent messengers inhabitants kirjath-jearim, saying, philistines brought ark lord; come ye down, [and] fetch you. men kirjath-jearim came, brought ark lord, brought house abinadab hill, sanctified eleazar son keep ark lord. came pass, ark abode kirjath-jearim, time long; twenty years: house israel lamented lord. samuel spake unto house israel, saying, ye return unto lord hearts, [then] put away strange gods ashtaroth among you, prepare hearts unto lord, serve only: deliver hand philistines. children israel put away baalim ashtaroth, served lord only. samuel said, gather israel mizpeh, pray unto lord. gathered together mizpeh, drew water, poured [it] lord, fasted day, said there, sinned lord. samuel judged children israel mizpeh. philistines heard children israel gathered together mizpeh, lords philistines went israel. children israel heard [it,] afraid philistines. children israel said samuel, cease cry unto lord god us, save us hand philistines. samuel took sucking lamb, offered [it for] burnt offering wholly unto lord: samuel cried unto lord israel; lord heard him. samuel offering burnt offering,the philistines drew near battle israel: lord thundered great thunder day upon philistines, discomfited them; smitten israel. men israel went mizpeh, pursued philistines, smote them, [they came] beth-car. samuel took stone, set [it] mizpeh shen, called name eben-ezer, saying, hitherto hath lord helped us. philistines subdued, came coast israel: hand lord philistines days samuel. cities philistines taken israel restored israel, ekron even unto gath; coasts thereof israel deliver hands philistines. peace israel amorites. samuel judged israel days life. went year year circuit bethel, gilgal, mizpeh, judged israel places. return [was] ramah; [was] house; judged israel; built altar unto lord. came pass, samuel old, made sons judges israel. name firstborn joel; name second, abiah: [they were] judges beer-sheba. sons walked ways, turned aside lucre, took bribes, perverted judgment. elders israel gathered together, came samuel unto ramah, said unto him, behold, thou art old, thy sons walk thy ways: make us king judge us like nations. thing displeased samuel, said, give us king judge us. samuel prayed unto lord. lord said unto samuel, hearken unto voice people say unto thee: rejected thee, rejected me, reign them. according works done since day brought egypt even unto day, wherewith forsaken me, served gods, also unto thee. therefore hearken unto voice: howbeit yet protest solemnly unto them, shew manner king shall reign them. samuel told words lord unto people asked king. said, manner king shall reign you: take sons, appoint [them] himself, chariots, horsemen; [some] shall run chariots. appoint captains thousands, captains fifties; [will set them] ear ground, reap harvest, make instruments war, instruments chariots. take daughters [to be] confectionaries, [to be] cooks, [to be] bakers. take fields, vineyards, oliveyards, [even] best [of them,] give [them] servants. take tenth seed, vineyards, give officers, servants. take menservants, maidservants, goodliest young men, asses, put [them] work. take tenth sheep: ye shall servants. ye shall cry day king ye shall chosen you;page 163 1 samuel lord hear day. nevertheless people refused obey voice samuel; said, nay; king us; also may like nations; king may judge us, go us, fight battles. samuel heard words people, rehearsed ears lord. lord said samuel, hearken unto voice, make king. samuel said unto men israel, go ye every man unto city. man benjamin, whose name [was] kish, son abiel, son zeror, son bechorath, son aphiah, benjamite, mighty man power. son, whose name [was] saul, choice young man, goodly: [there was] among children israel goodlier person he: shoulders upward [he was] higher people. asses kish saul's father lost. kish said saul son, take one servants thee, arise, go seek asses. passed mount ephraim, passed land shalisha, found [them] not: passed land shalim, [there were] not: passed land benjamites, found [them] not. [and] come land zuph, saul said servant [was] him, come, let us return; lest father leave [caring] asses, take thought us. said unto him, behold now, [there is] city man god, [he is] honourable man; saith cometh surely pass: let us go thither; peradventure shew us way go. said saul servant, but, behold, [if] go, shall bring man? bread spent vessels, [there is] present bring man god: we? servant answered saul again, said, behold, hand fourth part shekel silver: [that] give man god, tell us way. (beforetime israel, man went enquire god, thus spake, come, let us go seer: [he is] [called] prophet beforetime called seer.) said saul servant, well said; come, let us go. went unto city man god [was. ] [and] went hill city, found young maidens going draw water, said unto them, seer here? answered them, said, is; behold, [he is] you: make haste now, came day city; [there is] sacrifice people day high place: soon ye come city, ye shall straightway find him, go high place eat: people eat come, doth bless sacrifice; [and] afterwards eat bidden. therefore get up; time ye shall find him. went city: [and] come city, behold, samuel came them, go high place. lord told samuel ear day saul came, saying, morrow time send thee man land benjamin, thou shalt anoint [to be] captain people israel, may save people hand philistines: looked upon people, cry come unto me. samuel saw saul, lord said unto him, behold man spake tothee of! shall reign people. saul drew near samuel gate, said, tell me, pray thee, seer's house [is. ] samuel answered saul, said, [am] seer: go unto high place; ye shall eat day, morrow let thee go, tell thee [is] thine heart. thine asses lost three days ago, set thy mind them; found. [is] desire israel? [is it] thee, thy father's house? saul answered said, [am] benjamite, smallest tribes israel? family least families tribe benjamin? wherefore speakest thou me? samuel took saul servant, brought parlour, made sit chiefest place among bidden, [were] thirty persons. samuel said unto cook, bring portion gave thee, said unto thee, set thee. cook took shoulder, [that] [was] upon it, set [it] saul. [samuel] said, behold left! set [it] thee, [and] eat: unto time hath kept thee since said, invited people. saul eat samuel day. come high place city, [samuel] communed saul upon top house. arose early: came pass spring day, samuel called saul top house, saying, up, may send thee away. saul arose, went them, samuel, abroad. [and] going end city, samuel said saul, bid servant pass us, (and passed on,) stand thou still while, may shew thee word god. samuel took vial oil, poured [it] upon head, kissed him, said, [is it] lord hath anointed thee [to be] captain inheritance? thou art departed day, thou shalt find two men rachel's sepulchre border benjamin zelzah; say unto thee, asses thou wentest seek found: and, lo, thy father hath left care asses, sorroweth you, saying, shall son? shalt thou go forward thence, thou shalt come plain tabor, shall meet thee three men going god bethel, one carrying three kids, another carrying three loaves bread, another carrying bottle wine: salute thee, give thee two [loaves] bread; thou shalt receive hands. thou shalt come hill god, [is] garrison philistines: shall come pass, thou art come thither city, thou shalt meet company prophets coming high place psaltery, tabret, pipe, harp, them; shall prophesy: spirit lord come upon thee, thou shalt prophesy them, shalt turned another man. let be, signs come unto thee, [that] thou occasion serve thee; god [is] thee. thou shalt go gilgal; and, behold, come unto thee, offer burnt offerings, [and] sacrifice sacrifices peace offerings: seven days shalt thou tarry, till come thee, shew thee thou shalt do. [so,] turned back go samuel, god gave another heart: signs came pass day.1 samuel page 164 came thither hill, behold, company prophets met him; spirit god came upon him, prophesied among them. came pass, knew beforetime saw that, behold, prophesied among prophets, people said one another, [is] [that] come unto son kish? [is] saul also among prophets? one place answered said, [is] father? therefore became proverb, [is] saul also among prophets? made end prophesying, came high place. saul's uncle said unto servant, whither went ye? said, seek asses: saw [they were] where, came samuel. saul's uncle said, tell me, pray thee, samuel said unto you. saul said unto uncle, told us plainly asses found. matter kingdom, whereof samuel spake, told not. samuel called people together unto lord mizpeh; said unto children israel, thus saith lord god israel, brought israel egypt, delivered hand egyptians, hand kingdoms, [and] oppressed you: ye day rejected god, saved adversities tribulations; ye said unto him, [nay,] set king us. therefore present lord tribes, thousands. samuel caused tribes israel come near, tribe benjamin taken. caused tribe benjamin come near families, family matri taken, saul son kish taken: sought him, could found. therefore enquired lord further, man yet come thither. lord answered, behold, hath hid among stuff. ran fetched thence: stood among people, higher people shoulders upward. samuel said people, see ye lord hath chosen, [there is] none like among people? people shouted, said, god save king. samuel told people manner kingdom, wrote [it] book, laid [it ]up lord. samuel sent people away, every man house. saul also went home gibeah; went band men, whose hearts god touched. children belial said, shall man save us? despised him, brought presents. held peace. nahash ammonite came up, encamped jabesh-gilead: men jabesh said unto nahash, make covenant us, serve thee. nahash ammonite answered them, [condition] make [a covenant] you, may thrust right eyes, lay [for] reproach upon israel. elders jabesh said unto him, give us seven days respite, may send messengers unto coasts israel: then, [there be] man save us, come thee. came messengers gibeah saul, told tidings ears people: people lifted voices, wept. and, behold, saulcame herd field; saul said, [aileth] people weep? told tidings men jabesh. spirit god came upon saul heard tidings, anger kindled greatly. took yoke oxen, hewed pieces, sent [them] throughout coasts israel hands messengers, saying, whosoever cometh forth saul samuel, shall done unto oxen. fear lord fell people, came one consent. numbered bezek, children israel three hundred thousand, men judah thirty thousand. said unto messengers came, thus shall ye say unto men jabesh-gilead, morrow, [that time] sun hot, ye shall help. messengers came shewed [it] men jabesh; glad. therefore men jabesh said, morrow come unto you, ye shall us seemeth good unto you. [so] morrow, saul put people three companies; came midst host morning watch, slew ammonites heat day: came pass, remained scattered, two left together. people said unto samuel, [is] said, shall saul reign us? bring men, may put death. saul said, shall man put death day: day lord hath wrought salvation israel. said samuel people, come, let us go gilgal, renew kingdom there. people went gilgal; made saul king lord gilgal; sacrificed sacrifices peace offerings lord; saul men israel rejoiced greatly. samuel said unto israel, behold, hearkened unto voice ye said unto me, made king you. now, behold, king walketh you: old grayheaded; and, behold, sons [are] you: walked childhood unto day. behold, [am:] witness lord, anointed: whose ox taken? whose ass taken? defrauded? oppressed? whose hand received [any] bribe blind mine eyes therewith? restore you. said, thou hast defrauded us, oppressed us, neither hast thou taken ought man's hand. said unto them, lord [is] witness you, anointed [is] witness day, ye found ought hand. answered, [he is] witness. samuel said unto people, [it is] lord advanced moses aaron, brought fathers land egypt. therefore stand still, may reason lord righteous acts lord, fathers. jacob come egypt, fathers cried unto lord, lord sent moses aaron, brought forth fathers egypt, made dwell place. forgat lord god, sold hand sisera, captain host hazor, hand philistines, hand king moab, fought them. cried unto lord, said, sinned, forsaken lord, served baalim ashtaroth:page 165 1 samuel deliver us hand enemies, serve thee. lord sent jerubbaal, bedan, jephthah, samuel, delivered hand enemies every side, ye dwelled safe. ye saw nahash king children ammon came you, ye said unto me, nay; king shall reign us: lord god [was] king. therefore behold king ye chosen, [and] ye desired! and, behold, lord hath set king you. ye fear lord, serve him, obey voice, rebel commandment lord, shall ye also king reigneth continue following lord god: ye obey voice lord, rebel commandment lord, shall hand lord you, [it was] fathers. therefore stand see great thing, lord eyes. [is it] wheat harvest day? call unto lord, shall send thunder rain; ye may perceive see wickedness [is] great, ye done sight lord, asking king. samuel called unto lord; lord sent thunder rain day: people greatly feared lord samuel. people said unto samuel, pray thy servants unto lord thy god, die not: added unto sins [this] evil, ask us king. samuel said unto people, fear not: ye done wickedness: yet turn aside following lord, serve lord heart; turn ye aside: [then ye go] vain [things,] cannot profit deliver; [are] vain. lord forsake people great name's sake: hath pleased lord make people. moreover me, god forbid sin lord ceasing pray you: teach good right way: fear lord, serve truth heart: consider great [things] hath done you. ye shall still wickedly, ye shall consumed, ye king. saul reigned one year; reigned two years israel, saul chose three thousand [men] israel; [whereof] two thousand saul michmash mount bethel, thousand jonathan gibeah benjamin: rest people sent every man tent. jonathan smote garrison philistines [was] geba, philistines heard [of it.] saul blew trumpet throughout land, saying, let hebrews hear. israel heard say [that] saul smitten garrison philistines, [that] israel also abomination philistines. people called together saul gilgal. philistines gathered together fight israel, thirty thousand chariots, six thousand horsemen, people sand [is] sea shore multitude: came up, pitched michmash, eastward beth- aven. men israel saw strait, (for people distressed,) people hide caves, thickets, rocks, high places, pits. [some of] hebrews went jordanto land gad gilead. saul, [was] yet gilgal, people followed trembling. tarried seven days, according set time samuel [had appointed:] samuel came gilgal; people scattered him. saul said, bring hither burnt offering me, peace offerings. offered burnt offering. came pass, soon made end offering burnt offering, behold, samuel came; saul went meet him, might salute him. samuel said, hast thou done? saul said, saw people scattered me, [that] thou camest within days appointed, [that] philistines gathered together michmash; therefore said i, philistines come upon gilgal, made supplication unto lord: forced therefore, offered burnt offering. samuel said saul, thou hast done foolishly: thou hast kept commandment lord thy god, commanded thee: would lord established thy kingdom upon israel ever. thy kingdom shall continue: lord hath sought man heart, lord hath commanded [to be] captain people, thou hast kept [that] lord commanded thee. samuel arose, gat gilgal unto gibeah benjamin. saul numbered people [that were] present him, six hundred men. saul, jonathan son, people [that were] present them, abode gibeah benjamin: philistines encamped michmash. spoilers came camp philistines three companies: one company turned unto way [that leadeth to] ophrah, unto land shual: another company turned way [to] beth- horon: another company turned [to] way border looketh valley zeboim toward wilderness. smith found throughout land israel: philistines said, lest hebrews make [them] swords spears: israelites went philistines, sharpen every man share, coulter, axe, mattock. yet file mattocks, coulters, forks, axes, sharpen goads. came pass day battle, neither sword spear found hand people [were] saul jonathan: saul jonathan son found. garrison philistines went passage michmash. came pass upon day, jonathan son saul said unto young man bare armour, come, let us go philistines' garrison, [is] side. told father. saul tarried uttermost part gibeah pomegranate tree migron: people [were] [were] six hundred men; ahiah, son ahitub, i-chabod's brother, son phinehas, son eli, lord's priest shiloh, wearing ephod. people knew jonathan gone.1 samuel page 166 passages, jonathan sought go unto philistines' garrison, [there was] sharp rock one side sharp rock side: name one [was] bozez, name seneh. forefront one [was] situate northward michmash, southward gibeah. jonathan said young man bare armour, come, let us go unto garrison uncircumcised: may lord work us: [there is] restraint lord save many few. armourbearer said unto him, [is] thine heart: turn thee; behold, [am] thee according thy heart. said jonathan, behold, pass unto [these] men, discover unto them. say thus unto us, tarry come you; stand still place, go unto them. say thus, come unto us; go up: lord hath delivered hand: [shall be] sign unto us. discovered unto garrison philistines: philistines said, behold, hebrews come forth holes hid themselves. men garrison answered jonathan armourbearer, said, come us, shew thing. jonathan said unto armourbearer, come me: lord hath delivered hand israel. jonathan climbed upon hands upon feet, armourbearer him: fell jonathan; armourbearer slew him. first slaughter, jonathan armourbearer made, twenty men, within half acre land, [which] yoke [of oxen might plow. ] trembling host, field, among people: garrison, spoilers, also trembled, earth quaked: great trembling. watchmen saul gibeah benjamin looked; and, behold, multitude melted away, went beating [one another. ] said saul unto people [were] him, number now, see gone us. numbered, behold, jonathan armourbearer [were] [there. ] saul said unto ahiah, bring hither ark god. ark god time children israel. came pass, saul talked unto priest, noise [was] host philistines went increased: saul said unto priest, withdraw thine hand. saul people [were] assembled themselves, came battle: and, behold, every man's sword fellow, [and was] great discomfiture. moreover hebrews [that] philistines time, went camp [from country] round about, even also [turned] israelites [were] saul jonathan. likewise men israel hid mount ephraim, [when] heard philistines fled, even also followed hard battle. lord saved israel day: battle passed unto beth-aven. men israel distressed day: saul adjured people, saying, cursed [be] man eateth [any] food evening, may avenged mine enemies. none people tasted [any] food. [they of] land came wood; honey upon ground. andwhen people come wood, behold, honey dropped; man put hand mouth: people feared oath. jonathan heard father charged people oath: wherefore put forth end rod [was] hand, dipped honeycomb, put hand mouth; eyes enlightened. answered one people, said, thy father straitly charged people oath, saying, cursed [be] man eateth [any] food day. people faint. said jonathan, father hath troubled land: see, pray you, mine eyes enlightened, tasted little honey. much more, haply people eaten freely day spoil enemies found? much greater slaughter among philistines? smote philistines day michmash aijalon: people faint. people flew upon spoil, took sheep, oxen, calves, slew [them] ground: people eat [them] blood. told saul, saying, behold, people sin lord, eat blood. said, ye transgressed: roll great stone unto day. saul said, disperse among people, say unto them, bring hither every man ox, every man sheep, slay [them] here, eat; sin lord eating blood. people brought every man ox night, slew [them] there. saul built altar unto lord: first altar built unto lord. saul said, let us go philistines night, spoil morning light, let us leave man them. said, whatsoever seemeth good unto thee. said priest, let us draw near hither unto god. saul asked counsel god, shall go philistines? wilt thou deliver hand israel? answered day. saul said, draw ye near hither, chief people: know see wherein sin hath day. for, [as] lord liveth, saveth israel, though jonathan son, shall surely die. [there was] man among people [that] answered him. said unto israel, ye one side, jonathan son side. people said unto saul, seemeth good unto thee. therefore saul said unto lord god israel, give perfect [lot.] saul jonathan taken: people escaped. saul said, cast [lots] jonathan son. jonathan taken. saul said jonathan, tell thou hast done. jonathan told him, said, taste little honey end rod [was] mine hand, [and,] lo, must die. saul answered, god also: thou shalt surely die, jonathan. people said unto saul, shall jonathan die, hath wrought great salvation israel? god forbid: [as] lord liveth, shall one hair head fall ground; hath wrought god day. people rescued jonathan, died not. saul went following philistines: philistines went place. saul took kingdom israel, fought enemies every side, moab, children ammon, edom,page 167 1 samuel kings zobah, philistines: whithersoever turned himself, vexed [them. ] gathered host, smote amalekites, delivered israel hands spoiled them. sons saul jonathan, ishui, melchi-shua: names two daughters [were these;] name firstborn merab, name younger michal: name saul's wife [was] ahinoam, daughter ahimaaz: name captain host [was] abner, son ner, saul's uncle. kish [was] father saul; ner father abner [was] son abiel. sore war philistines days saul: saul saw strong man, valiant man, took unto him. samuel also said unto saul, lord sent anoint thee [to be] king people, israel: therefore hearken thou unto voice words lord. thus saith lord hosts, remember [that] amalek israel, laid [wait] way, came egypt. go smite amalek, utterly destroy have, spare not; slay man woman, infant suckling, ox sheep, camel ass. saul gathered people together, numbered telaim, two hundred thousand footmen, ten thousand men judah. saul came city amalek, laid wait valley. saul said unto kenites, go, depart, get among amalekites, lest destroy them: ye shewed kindness children israel, came egypt. kenites departed among amalekites. saul smote amalekites havilah [until] thou comest shur, [is] egypt. took agag king amalekites alive, utterly destroyed people edge sword. saul people spared agag, best sheep, oxen, fatlings, lambs, [that was] good, would utterly destroy them: every thing [that was] vile refuse, destroyed utterly. came word lord unto samuel, saying, repenteth set saul [to be] king: turned back following me, hath performed commandments. grieved samuel; cried unto lord night. samuel rose early meet saul morning, told samuel, saying, saul came carmel, and, behold, set place, gone about, passed on, gone gilgal. samuel came saul: saul said unto him, blessed [be] thou lord: performed commandment lord. samuel said, [meaneth] bleating sheep mine ears, lowing oxen hear? saul said, brought amalekites: people spared best sheep oxen, sacrifice unto lord thy god; rest utterly destroyed. samuel said unto saul, stay, tell thee lord hath said night. said unto him, say on. samuel said, thou [wast] little thine sight, [wast] thou [made] head tribes israel, lord anointed thee king israel? lord sent thee journey, said, go utterly destroy sinners amalekites, fight consumed. wherefore didst thounot obey voice lord, didst fly upon spoil, didst evil sight lord? saul said unto samuel, yea, obeyed voice lord, gone way lord sent me, brought agag king amalek, utterly destroyed amalekites. people took spoil, sheep oxen, chief things utterly destroyed, sacrifice unto lord thy god gilgal. samuel said, hath lord [as great] delight burnt offerings sacrifices, obeying voice lord? behold, obey [is] better sacrifice, [and] hearken fat rams. rebellion [is as] sin witchcraft, stubbornness [is as] iniquity idolatry. thou hast rejected word lord, hath also rejected thee [being] king. saul said unto samuel, sinned: transgressed commandment lord, thy words: feared people, obeyed voice. therefore, pray thee, pardon sin, turn me, may worship lord. samuel said unto saul, return thee: thou hast rejected word lord, lord hath rejected thee king israel. samuel turned go away, laid hold upon skirt mantle, rent. samuel said unto him, lord hath rent kingdom israel thee day, hath given neighbour thine, [that is] better thou. also strength israel lie repent: [is] man, repent. said, sinned: [yet] honour now, pray thee, elders people, israel, turn me, may worship lord thy god. samuel turned saul; saul worshipped lord. said samuel, bring ye hither agag king amalekites. agag came unto delicately. agag said, surely bitterness death past. samuel said, thy sword hath made women childless, shall thy mother childless among women. samuel hewed agag pieces lord gilgal. samuel went ramah; saul went house gibeah saul. samuel came see saul day death: nevertheless samuel mourned saul: lord repented made saul king israel. lord said unto samuel, long wilt thou mourn saul, seeing rejected reigning israel? fill thine horn oil, go, send thee jesse bethlehemite: provided king among sons. samuel said, go? saul hear [it,] kill me. lord said, take heifer thee, say, come sacrifice lord. call jesse sacrifice, shew thee thou shalt do: thou shalt anoint unto [him] name unto thee. samuel lord spake, came bethlehem. elders town trembled coming, said, comest thou peaceably? said, peaceably: come sacrifice unto lord: sanctify yourselves, come sacrifice. sanctified jesse sons, called sacrifice. came pass, come,1 samuel page 168 looked eliab, said, surely lord's anointed [is] him. lord said unto samuel, look countenance, height stature; refused him: [the lord seeth] man seeth; man looketh outward appearance, lord looketh heart. jesse called abinadab, made pass samuel. said, neither hath lord chosen this. jesse made shammah pass by. said, neither hath lord chosen this. again, jesse made seven sons pass samuel. samuel said unto jesse, lord hath chosen these. samuel said unto jesse, [thy] children? said, remaineth yet youngest, and, behold, keepeth sheep. samuel said unto jesse, send fetch him: sit till come hither. sent, brought in. [was] ruddy, [and] withal beautiful countenance, goodly look to. lord said, arise, anoint him: [is] he. samuel took horn oil, anointed midst brethren: spirit lord came upon david day forward. samuel rose up, went ramah. spirit lord departed saul, evil spirit lord troubled him. saul's servants said unto him, behold now, evil spirit god troubleth thee. let lord command thy servants, [which are] thee, seek man, [who is] cunning player harp: shall come pass, evil spirit god upon thee, shall play hand, thou shalt well. saul said unto servants, provide man play well, bring [him] me. answered one servants, said, behold, seen son jesse bethlehemite, [that is] cunning playing, mighty valiant man, man war, prudent matters, comely person, lord [is] him. wherefore saul sent messengers unto jesse, said, send david thy son, [is] sheep. jesse took ass [laden] bread, bottle wine, kid, sent [them] david son unto saul. david came saul, stood him: loved greatly; became armourbearer. saul sent jesse, saying, let david, pray thee, stand me; hath found favour sight. came pass, [evil] spirit god upon saul, david took harp, played hand: saul refreshed, well, evil spirit departed him. philistines gathered together armies battle, gathered together shochoh, [belongeth] judah, pitched shochoh azekah, ephes-dammim. saul men israel gathered together, pitched valley elah, set battle array philistines. philistines stood mountain one side, israel stood mountain side: [there was] valley them. went champion camp philistines, named goliath, gath, whose height [was] six cubits span. [he had] helmet brass upon head, [was] armed coat mail; weight coat [was] five thousand shekels brass. staff spear [was] like weaver's beam; spear's head [weighed] six hundred shekels iron: one bearing shield went him. stood cried unto armies israel, said unto them, ye come set [your] battle array? [am] philistine, ye servants saul? choose man you, let come me. able fight me, kill me, servants: prevail him, kill him, shall ye servants, serve us. philistine said, defy armies israel day; give man, may fight together. saul israel heard words philistine, dismayed, greatly afraid. david [was] son ephrathite bethlehemjudah, whose name [was] jesse; eight sons: man went among men [for] old man days saul. three eldest sons jesse went [and] followed saul battle: names three sons went battle [were] eliab first born, next unto abinadab, third shammah. david [was] youngest: three eldest followed saul. david went returned saul feed father's sheep bethlehem. philistine drew near morning evening, presented forty days. jesse said unto david son, take thy brethren ephah parched [corn,] ten loaves, run camp thy brethren; carry ten cheeses unto captain [their] thousand, look thy brethren fare, take pledge. saul, they, men israel, [were] valley elah, fighting philistines. david rose early morning, left sheep keeper, took, went, jesse commanded him; came trench, host going forth fight, shouted battle. israel philistines put battle array, army army. david left carriage hand keeper carriage, ran army, came saluted brethren. talked them, behold, came champion, philistine gath, goliath name, armies philistines, spake according words: david heard [them. ] men israel, saw man, fled him, sore afraid. men israel said, ye seen man come up? surely defy israel come up: shall be, [that] man killeth him, king enrich great riches, give daughter, make father's house free israel. david spake men stood him, saying, shall done man killeth philistine, taketh away reproach israel? [is] uncircumcised philistine, defy armies living god? people answered manner, saying, shall done man killeth him. eliab eldest brother heard spake unto men; eliab's anger kindled david, said, camest thou hither? hast thou left sheep wilderness? know thy pride, naughtiness thine heart; thou art come thou mightest see battle. david said, done? [is there] cause?page 169 1 samuel turned toward another, spake manner: people answered former manner. words heard david spake, rehearsed [them] saul: sent him. david said saul, let man's heart fail him; thy servant go fight philistine. saul said david, thou art able go philistine fight him: thou [art but] youth, man war youth. david said unto saul, thy servant kept father's sheep, came lion, bear, took lamb flock: went him, smote him, delivered [it] mouth: arose me, caught [him] beard, smote him, slew him. thy servant slew lion bear: uncircumcised philistine shall one them, seeing hath defied armies living god. david said moreover, lord delivered paw lion, paw bear, deliver hand philistine. saul said unto david, go, lord thee. saul armed david armour, put helmet brass upon head; also armed coat mail. david girded sword upon armour, assayed go; proved [it.] david said unto saul, cannot go these; proved [them.] david put him. took staff hand, chose five smooth stones brook, put shepherd's bag had, even scrip; sling [was] hand: drew near philistine. philistine came drew near unto david; man bare shield [went] him. philistine looked about, saw david, disdained him: [but] youth, ruddy, fair countenance. philistine said unto david, [am] dog, thou comest staves? philistine cursed david gods. philistine said david, come me, give thy flesh unto fowls air, beasts field. said david philistine, thou comest sword, spear, shield: come thee name lord hosts, god armies israel, thou hast defied. day lord deliver thee mine hand; smite thee, take thine head thee; give carcases host philistines day unto fowls air, wild beasts earth; earth may know god israel. assembly shall know lord saveth sword spear: battle [is] lord's, give hands. came pass, philistine arose, came drew nigh meet david, david hasted, ran toward army meet philistine. david put hand bag, took thence stone, slang [it,] smote philistine forehead, stone sunk forehead; fell upon face earth. david prevailed philistine sling stone, smote philistine, slew him; [there was] sword hand david. therefore david ran, stood upon philistine, took sword, drew sheath thereof, slew him, cut head therewith. philistines saw champion dead, fled. men israel judah arose, shouted, pursued philistines, thou come valley, gates ekron. wounded philistines fell way shaaraim, even unto gath, unto ekron. children israel returned chasing philistines, spoiled tents. david took head philistine, brought jerusalem; put armour tent. saul saw david go forth philistine, said unto abner, captain host, abner, whose son [is] youth? abner said, [as] thy soul liveth, king, cannot tell. king said, enquire thou whose son stripling [is. ] david returned slaughter philistine, abner took him, brought saul head philistine hand. saul said him, whose son [art] thou, [thou] young man? david answered, [i am] son thy servant jesse bethlehemite. came pass, made end speaking unto saul, soul jonathan knit soul david, jonathan loved soul. saul took day, would let go home father's house. jonathan david made covenant, loved soul. jonathan stripped robe [was] upon him, gave david, garments, even sword, bow, girdle. david went whithersoever saul sent him, [and] behaved wisely: saul set men war, accepted sight people, also sight saul's servants. came pass came, david returned slaughter philistine, women came cities israel, singing dancing, meet king saul, tabrets, joy, instruments musick. women answered [one another] played, said, saul hath slain thousands, david ten thousands. saul wroth, saying displeased him; said, ascribed unto david ten thousands, ascribed [but] thousands: [what] kingdom? saul eyed david day forward. came pass morrow, evil spirit god came upon saul, prophesied midst house: david played hand, times: [there was] javelin saul's hand. saul cast javelin; said, smite david even wall [with it.] david avoided presence twice. saul afraid david, lord him, departed saul. therefore saul removed him, made captain thousand; went came people. david behaved wisely ways; lord [was] him. wherefore saul saw behaved wisely, afraid him. israel judah loved david, went came them. saul said david, behold elder daughter merab, give thee wife: thou valiant me, fight lord's battles. saul said, let mine hand upon him, let hand philistines upon him. david said unto saul,1 samuel page 170 [am] i? [is] life, [or] father's family israel, son law king? came pass time merab saul's daughter given david, given unto adriel meholathite wife. michal saul's daughter loved david: told saul, thing pleased him. saul said, give her, may snare him, hand philistines may him. wherefore saul said david, thou shalt day son law [the one of] twain. saul commanded servants, [saying,] commune david secretly, say, behold, king hath delight thee, servants love thee: therefore king's son law. saul's servants spake words ears david. david said, seemeth [a] light [thing] king's son law, seeing [am] poor man, lightly esteemed? servants saul told him, saying, manner spake david. saul said, thus shall ye say david, king desireth dowry, hundred foreskins philistines, avenged king's enemies. saul thought make david fall hand philistines. servants told david words, pleased david well king's son law: days expired. wherefore david arose went, men, slew philistines two hundred men; david brought foreskins, gave full tale king, might king's son law. saul gave michal daughter wife. saul saw knew lord [was] david, [that] michal saul's daughter loved him. saul yet afraid david; saul became david's enemy continually. princes philistines went forth: came pass, went forth, [that] david behaved wisely servants saul; name much set by. saul spake jonathan son, servants, kill david. jonathan saul's son delighted much david: jonathan told david, saying, saul father seeketh kill thee: therefore, pray thee, take heed thyself morning, abide secret [place,] hide thyself: go stand beside father field thou [art,] commune father thee; see, tell thee. jonathan spake good david unto saul father, said unto him, let king sin servant, david; hath sinned thee, works [have been] thee-ward good: put life hand, slew philistine, lord wrought great salvation israel: thou sawest [it,] didst rejoice: wherefore wilt thou sin innocent blood, slay david without cause? saul hearkened unto voice jonathan: saul sware, [as] lord liveth, shall slain. jonathan called david, jonathan shewed things. jonathan brought david saul, presence, times past. war again: david went out, fought philistines, slew greatslaughter; fled him. evil spirit lord upon saul, sat house javelin hand: david played [his] hand. saul sought smite david even wall javelin; slipped away saul's presence, smote javelin wall: david fled, escaped night. saul also sent messengers unto david's house, watch him, slay morning: michal david's wife told him, saying, thou save thy life night, morrow thou shalt slain. michal let david window: went, fled, escaped. michal took image, laid [it] bed, put pillow goats [hair] bolster, covered [it] cloth. saul sent messengers take david, said, [is] sick. saul sent messengers [again] see david, saying, bring bed, may slay him. messengers come in, behold, [there was] image bed, pillow goats' [hair] bolster. saul said unto michal, hast thou deceived so, sent away mine enemy, escaped? michal answered saul, said unto me, let go; kill thee? david fled, escaped, came samuel ramah, told saul done him. samuel went dwelt naioth. told saul, saying, behold, david [is] naioth ramah. saul sent messengers take david: saw company prophets prophesying, samuel standing [as] appointed them, spirit god upon messengers saul, also prophesied. told saul, sent messengers, prophesied likewise. saul sent messengers third time, prophesied also. went also ramah, came great well [is] sechu: asked said, [are] samuel david? [one] said, behold, [they be] naioth ramah. went thither naioth ramah: spirit god upon also, went on, prophesied, came naioth ramah. stript clothes also, prophesied samuel like manner, lay naked day night. wherefore say, [is] saul also among prophets? david fled naioth ramah, came said jonathan, done? [is] mine iniquity? [is] sin thy father, seeketh life? said unto him, god forbid; thou shalt die: behold, father nothing either great small, shew me: father hide thing me? [is] [so. ] david sware moreover, said, thy father certainly knoweth found grace thine eyes; saith, let jonathan know this, lest grieved: truly [as] lord liveth, [as] thy soul liveth, [there is] step death. said jonathan unto david, whatsoever thy soul desireth, even [it] thee. david said unto jonathan, behold, morrow [is] new moon, fail sit king meat: let go, may hide field unto third [day] even. thy father miss me, say, david earnestly asked [leave] might run bethlehem city: [there is] yearly sacrifice family. say thus, [it is] well; thy servant shall peace: wroth,page 171 1 samuel [then] sure evil determined him. therefore thou shalt deal kindly thy servant; thou hast brought thy servant covenant lord thee: notwithstanding, iniquity, slay thyself; shouldest thou bring thy father? jonathan said, far thee: knew certainly evil determined father come upon thee, would tell thee? said david jonathan, shall tell me? [if] thy father answer thee roughly? jonathan said unto david, come, let us go field. went field. jonathan said unto david, lord god israel, sounded father morrow time, [or] third [day,] and, behold, [if be] good toward david, send unto thee, shew thee; lord much jonathan: please father [to do] thee evil, shew thee, send thee away, thou mayest go peace: lord thee, hath father. thou shalt yet live shew kindness lord, die not: [also] thou shalt cut thy kindness house ever: no, lord hath cut enemies david every one face earth. jonathan made [a covenant] house david, [saying,] let lord even require [it] hand david's enemies. jonathan caused david swear again, loved him: loved loved soul. jonathan said david, morrow [is] new moon: thou shalt missed, thy seat empty. [when] thou hast stayed three days, [then] thou shalt go quickly, come place thou didst hide thyself business [in hand,] shalt remain stone ezel. shoot three arrows side [thereof,] though shot mark. and, behold, send lad, [saying,] go, find arrows. expressly say unto lad, behold, arrows side thee, take them; come thou: [there is] peace thee, hurt; [as] lord liveth. say thus unto young man, behold, arrows [are] beyond thee; go thy way: lord hath sent thee away. [as touching] matter thou spoken of, behold, lord [be] thee ever. david hid field: new moon come, king sat eat meat. king sat upon seat, times, [even] upon seat wall: jonathan arose, abner sat saul's side, david's place empty. nevertheless saul spake thing day: thought, something hath befallen him, clean; surely [is] clean. came pass morrow, [which was] second [day] month, david's place empty: saul said unto jonathan son, wherefore cometh son jesse meat, neither yesterday, day? jonathan answered saul, david earnestly asked [leave] [to go] bethlehem: said, let go, pray thee; family hath sacrifice city; brother, hath commanded [to there:] now, found favour thine eyes, let get away, pray thee, see brethren. therefore cometh unto king's table. saul's anger kindled jonathan, said unto him, thou son perverse rebellious [woman,] know thou hast chosen son ofjesse thine confusion, unto confusion thy mother's nakedness? long son jesse liveth upon ground, thou shalt established, thy kingdom. wherefore send fetch unto me, shall surely die. jonathan answered saul father, said unto him, wherefore shall slain? hath done? saul cast javelin smite him: whereby jonathan knew determined father slay david. jonathan arose table fierce anger, eat meat second day month: grieved david, father done shame. came pass morning, jonathan went field time appointed david, little lad him. said unto lad, run, find arrows shoot. [and] lad ran, shot arrow beyond him. lad come place arrow jonathan shot, jonathan cried lad, said, [is] arrow beyond thee? jonathan cried lad, make speed, haste, stay not. jonathan's lad gathered arrows, came master. lad knew thing: jonathan david knew matter. jonathan gave artillery unto lad, said unto him, go, carry [them] city. [and] soon lad gone, david arose [a place] toward south, fell face ground, bowed three times: kissed one another, wept one another, david exceeded. jonathan said david, go peace, forasmuch sworn us name lord, saying, lord thee, seed thy seed ever. arose departed: jonathan went city. came david nob ahimelech priest: ahimelech afraid meeting david, said unto him, [art] thou alone, man thee? david said unto ahimelech priest, king hath commanded business, hath said unto me, let man know thing business whereabout send thee, commanded thee: appointed [my] servants place. therefore thine hand? give [me] five [loaves of] bread mine hand, present. priest answered david, said, [there is] common bread mine hand, hallowed bread; young men kept least women. david answered priest, said unto him, truth women [have been] kept us three days, since came out, vessels young men holy, [the bread is] manner common, yea, though sanctified day vessel. priest gave hallowed [bread:] bread shewbread, taken lord, put hot bread day taken away. certain man servants saul [was] day, detained lord; name [was] doeg, edomite, chiefest herdmen [belonged] saul. david said unto ahimelech, thine hand spear sword? neither brought sword weapons me, king's business required haste. priest said, sword goliath philistine, thou slewest valley elah, behold, [is here] wrapped cloth1 samuel page 172 behind ephod: thou wilt take that, take [it:] [there is] save here. david said, [there is] none like that; give me. david arose, fled day fear saul, went achish king gath. servants achish said unto him, [is] david king land? sing one another dances, saying, saul hath slain thousands, david ten thousands? david laid words heart, sore afraid achish king gath. changed behaviour them, feigned mad hands, scrabbled doors gate, let spittle fall upon beard. said achish unto servants, lo, ye see man mad: wherefore [then] ye brought me? need mad men, ye brought [fellow] play mad man presence? shall [fellow] come house? david therefore departed thence, escaped cave adullam: brethren father's house heard it, went thither him. every one [that was] distress, every one [was] debt, every one [that was] discontented, gathered unto him; became captain them: four hundred men. david went thence mizpeh moab: said unto king moab, let father mother, pray thee, come forth, [and be] you, till know god me. brought king moab: dwelt david hold. prophet gad said unto david, abide hold; depart, get thee land judah. david departed, came forest hareth. saul heard david discovered, men [were] him, (now saul abode gibeah tree ramah, spear hand, servants [were] standing him;) saul said unto servants stood him, hear now, ye benjamites; son jesse give every one fields vineyards, [and] make captains thousands, captains hundreds; conspired me, [there is] none sheweth son hath made league son jesse, [there is] none sorry me, sheweth unto son hath stirred servant me, lie wait, day? answered doeg edomite, set servants saul, said, saw son jesse coming nob, ahimelech son ahitub. enquired lord him, gave victuals, gave sword goliath philistine. king sent call ahimelech priest, son ahitub, father's house, priests [were] nob: came king. saul said, hear now, thou son ahitub. answered, [am,] lord. saul said unto him, ye conspired me, thou son jesse, thou hast given bread, sword, hast enquired god him, rise me, lie wait, day? ahimelech answered king, said, [is so] faithful among thy servants david, king's son law, andgoeth thy bidding, honourable thine house? begin enquire god him? far me: let king impute [any] thing unto servant, [nor] house father: thy servant knew nothing this, less more. king said, thou shalt surely die, ahimelech, thou, thy father's house. king said unto footmen stood him, turn, slay priests lord; hand also [is] david, knew fled, shew me. servants king would put forth hand fall upon priests lord. king said doeg, turn thou, fall upon priests. doeg edomite turned, fell upon priests, slew day fourscore five persons wear linen ephod. nob, city priests, smote edge sword, men women, children sucklings, oxen, asses, sheep, edge sword. one sons ahimelech son ahitub, named abiathar, escaped, fled david. abiathar shewed david saul slain lord's priests. david said unto abiathar, knew [it] day, doeg edomite [was] there, would surely tell saul: occasioned [the death] persons thy father's house. abide thou me, fear not: seeketh life seeketh thy life: thou [shalt be] safeguard. told david, saying, behold, philistines fight keilah, rob threshingfloors. therefore david enquired lord, saying, shall go smite philistines? lord said unto david, go, smite philistines, save keilah. david's men said unto him, behold, afraid judah: much come keilah armies philistines? david enquired lord yet again. lord answered said, arise, go keilah; deliver philistines thine hand. david men went keilah, fought philistines, brought away cattle, smote great slaughter. david saved inhabitants keilah. came pass, abiathar son ahimelech fled david keilah, [that] came [with] ephod hand. told saul david come keilah. saul said, god hath delivered mine hand; shut in, entering town hath gates bars. saul called people together war, go keilah, besiege david men. david knew saul secretly practised mischief him; said abiathar priest, bring hither ephod. said david, lord god israel, thy servant hath certainly heard saul seeketh come keilah, destroy city sake. men keilah deliver hand? saul come down, thy servant hath heard? lord god israel, beseech thee, tell thy servant. lord said, come down. said david, men keilah deliver men hand saul? lord said, deliver [thee] up.page 173 1 samuel david men, [which were] six hundred, arose departed keilah, went whithersoever could go. told saul david escaped keilah; forbare go forth. david abode wilderness strong holds, remained mountain wilderness ziph. saul sought every day, god delivered hand. david saw saul come seek life: david [was] wilderness ziph wood. jonathan saul's son arose, went david wood, strengthened hand god. said unto him, fear not: hand saul father shall find thee; thou shalt king israel, shall next unto thee; also saul father knoweth. two made covenant lord: david abode wood, jonathan went house. came ziphites saul gibeah, saying, doth david hide us strong holds wood, hill hachilah, [is] south jeshimon?
