also born giant. defied israel, jonathan son shimeah brother david slew him. four born giant gath, fell hand david, hand servants. david spake unto lord words song day [that] lord delivered hand enemies, hand saul: said, lord [is] rock, fortress, deliverer; god rock; trust: [he is] shield, horn salvation, high tower, refuge, saviour; thou savest violence. call lord, [who is] worthy praised: shall saved mine enemies. waves death compassed me, floods ungodly men made afraid; sorrows hell compassed about; snares death prevented me; distress called upon lord, cried god: hear voice temple, cry [did enter] ears. earth shook trembled; foundations heaven moved shook, wroth. went smoke nostrils, fire mouth devoured: coals kindled it. bowed heavens also, came down; darkness [was] feet. rode upon cherub, fly: seen upon wings wind. made darkness pavilions round him, dark waters, [and] thick clouds skies. brightness coals fire kindled. lord thundered heaven, high uttered voice. sent arrows, scattered them; lightning, discomfited them. channels sea appeared, foundations world discovered, rebuking lord, blast breath nostrils. sent above, took me; drew many waters; delivered strong enemy, [and] hated me: strong me. prevented day calamity: lord stay. brought forth also large place: delivered me, delighted me. lord rewarded according righteousness: according cleanness hands hath recompensed me. kept ways lord, wickedly departed god. judgments [were] me: [as for] statutes, depart them. also upright him, kept mine iniquity. therefore lord hath recompensed according righteousness; according cleanness eye sight. merciful thou wilt shew thyself merciful, [and] upright man thou wilt shew thyself upright. pure thou wilt shew thyself pure; froward thou wilt shew thyself unsavoury. afflicted people thou wilt save: thine eyes [are] upon haughty, [that] thou mayest bring [them] down. thou [art] lamp, lord: lord lighten darkness. thee run troop: god leaped wall. [as for] god, way [is] perfect; word lord [is] tried: [is] buckler trust him. [is] god, save lord? [is] rock, save god? god [is] strength [and] power: maketh way perfect. maketh feet like hinds [feet:] setteth upon high places. teacheth hands war;page 193 2 samuel bow steel broken mine arms. thou hast also given shield thy salvation: thy gentleness hath made great. thou hast enlarged steps me; feet slip. pursued mine enemies, destroyed them; turned consumed them. consumed them, wounded them, could arise: yea, fallen feet. thou hast girded strength battle: rose hast thou subdued me. thou hast also given necks mine enemies, might destroy hate me. looked, [there was] none save; [even] unto lord, answered not. beat small dust earth, stamp mire street, [and] spread abroad. thou also hast delivered strivings people, thou hast kept [to be] head heathen: people [which] knew shall serve me. strangers shall submit unto me: soon hear, shall obedient unto me. strangers shall fade away, shall afraid close places. lord liveth; blessed [be] rock; exalted god rock salvation. [is] god avengeth me, bringeth people me, bringeth forth mine enemies: thou also hast lifted high rose me: thou hast delivered violent man. therefore give thanks unto thee, lord, among heathen, sing praises unto thy name. [he is] tower salvation king: sheweth mercy anointed, unto david, seed evermore. [be] last words david. david son jesse said, man [who was] raised high, anointed god jacob, sweet psalmist israel, said, spirit lord spake me, word [was] tongue. god israel said, rock israel spake me, ruleth men [must be] just, ruling fear god. notwithstanding king's word prevailed joab, captains host. joab captains host went presence king, number people israel.2 samuel page 194 passed jordan, pitched aroer, right side city [lieth] midst river gad, toward jazer: came gilead, land tahtim-hodshi; came dan-jaan, zidon, came strong hold tyre, cities hivites, canaanites: went south judah, [even] beer-sheba. gone land, came jerusalem end nine months twenty days. joab gave sum number people unto king: israel eight hundred thousand valiant men drew sword; men judah [were] five hundred thousand men. david's heart smote numbered people. david said unto lord, sinned greatly done: now, beseech thee, lord, take away iniquity thy servant; done foolishly. david morning, word lord came unto prophet gad, david's seer, saying, go say unto david, thus saith lord, offer thee three [things;] choose thee one them, may [do it] unto thee. gad came david, told him, said unto him, shall seven years famine come unto thee thy land? wilt thou flee three months thine enemies, pursue thee? three days' pestilence thy land? advise, see answer shall return sent me. david said unto gad, great strait: let us fall hand lord; mercies [are] great: let fall hand man. lord sent pestilence upon israel morning even time appointed: died people dan even beer-sheba seventy thousand men. angel stretched hand upon jerusalem destroy it, lord repented evil, said angel destroyed people, enough: stay thine hand. angel lord threshingplace araunah jebusite. david spake unto lord saw angel smote people, said, lo, sinned, done wickedly: sheep, done? [these] things araunah, [as] king, give unto king. araunah said unto king, lord thy god accept thee. king said unto araunah, nay; surely buy [it] thee price: neither offer burnt offerings unto lord god doth cost nothing. david bought threshingfloor theoxen fifty shekels silver. david built altar unto lord, offered burnt offerings peace offerings. lord intreated land, plague stayed israel.page 195 1 kings first book kings commonly called third book kings king david old [and] stricken years; covered clothes, gat heat. wherefore servants said unto him, let sought lord king young virgin: let stand king, let cherish him, let lie thy bosom, lord king may get heat. sought fair damsel throughout coasts israel, found abishag shunammite, brought king. damsel [was] fair, cherished king, ministered him: king knew not. adonijah son haggith exalted himself, saying, king: prepared chariots horsemen, fifty men run him. father displeased time saying, hast thou done so? therefore come, let me, pray thee, give thee counsel, thou mayest save thine life, life thy son solomon. go get thee unto king david, say unto him, didst thou, lord, king, swear unto thine handmaid, saying, assuredly solomon thy son shall reign me, shall sit upon throne? doth adonijah reign? behold, thou yet talkest king, also come thee, confirm thy words. bath-sheba went unto king chamber: king old; abishag shunammite ministered unto king. bath- sheba bowed, obeisance unto king. king said, wouldest thou? said unto him, lord, thou swarest lord thy god unto thine handmaid, [saying,] assuredly solomon thy son shall reign me, shall sit upon throne. now, behold, adonijah reigneth; now, lord king, thou knowest [it] not: hath slain oxen fat cattle sheep abundance, hath called sons king, abiathar priest, joab captain host: solomon thy servant hath called. thou, lord, king, eyes israel [are] upon thee, thou shouldest tell shall sit throne lord king him. otherwise shall come pass, lord king shall sleep fathers, son solomon shall counted offenders. and, lo, yet talked king, nathan prophet also came in. told king,saying, behold nathan prophet. come king, bowed king face ground. nathan said, lord, king, hast thou said, adonijah shall reign me, shall sit upon throne? king david answered said, call bath- sheba. came king's presence, stood king. king sware, said, [as] lord liveth, hath redeemed soul distress, even sware unto thee lord god israel, saying, assuredly solomon thy son shall reign me, shall sit upon throne stead; even certainly day. bath-sheba bowed [her] face earth, reverence king, said, let lord king david live ever. king david said, call zadok priest, nathan prophet, benaiah son jehoiada. came king. king also said unto them, take servants lord, cause solomon son ride upon mine mule, bring gihon: let zadok priest nathan prophet anoint king israel: blow ye trumpet, say, god save king solomon. ye shall come him, may come sit upon throne; shall king stead: appointed ruler israel judah. benaiah son jehoiada answered king, said, amen: lord god lord king say [too. ] lord hath lord king, even solomon, make throne greater throne lord king david. zadok priest, nathan prophet, benaiah son jehoiada, cherethites, pelethites, went down, caused solomon ride upon king david's mule, brought gihon. zadok priest took horn oil tabernacle, anointed solomon. blew trumpet; people said, god save king solomon. people came him, people piped pipes, rejoiced great joy, earth rent sound them. adonijah guests [were] heard [it] made end eating. joab heard sound trumpet, said, wherefore [is this] noise city uproar? yet spake, behold, jonathan son abiathar priest came: adonijah said unto him, come in; thou [art] valiant man, bringest good tidings. jonathan answered said adonijah, verily lord king david hath made solomon king. king hath sent zadok priest, nathan prophet, benaiah son jehoiada, cherethites, pelethites, caused ride upon king's mule: zadok priest nathan prophet anointed king gihon: come thence rejoicing, city rang1 kings page 196 again. [is] noise ye heard. also solomon sitteth throne kingdom. moreover king's servants came bless lord king david, saying, god make name solomon better thy name, make throne greater thy throne. king bowed upon bed. also thus said king, blessed [be] lord god israel, hath given [one] sit throne day, mine eyes even seeing [it. ] guests [were] adonijah afraid, rose up, went every man way. adonijah feared solomon, arose, went, caught hold horns altar. told solomon, saying, behold, adonijah feareth king solomon: for, lo, hath caught hold horns altar, saying, let king solomon swear unto day slay servant sword. solomon said, shew worthy man, shall hair fall earth: wickedness shall found him, shall die. king solomon sent, brought altar. came bowed king solomon: solomon said unto him, go thine house. days david drew nigh die; charged solomon son, saying, go way earth: thou strong therefore, shew thyself man; keep charge lord thy god, walk ways, keep statutes, commandments, judgments, testimonies, written law moses, thou mayest prosper thou doest, whithersoever thou turnest thyself: lord may continue word spake concerning me, saying, thy children take heed way, walk truth heart soul, shall fail thee (said he) man throne israel. moreover thou knowest also joab son zeruiah me, [and] two captains hosts israel, unto abner son ner, unto amasa son jether, slew, shed blood war peace, put blood war upon girdle [was] loins, shoes [were] feet. therefore according thy wisdom, let hoar head go grave peace. shew kindness unto sons barzillai gileadite, let eat thy table: came fled absalom thy brother. and, behold, [thou hast] thee shimei son gera, benjamite bahurim, cursed grievous curse day went mahanaim: came meet jordan, sware lord, saying, put thee death sword. therefore hold guiltless: thou [art] wise man, knowest thou oughtest unto him; hoar head bring thou grave blood. david slept fathers, buried city david. days david reigned israel [were] forty years: seven years reigned hebron, thirty three years reigned jerusalem. sat solomon upon throne david father; kingdom established greatly. adonijah son haggith came bath- sheba mother solomon. said, comest thou peaceably? said, peaceably. said moreover, somewhat say unto thee. said,say on. said, thou knowest kingdom mine, [that] israel set faces me, reign: howbeit kingdom turned about, become brother's: lord. ask one petition thee, deny not. said unto him, say on. said, speak, pray thee, unto solomon king, (for say thee nay,) give abishag shunammite wife. bath-sheba said, well; speak thee unto king. bath-sheba therefore went unto king solomon, speak unto adonijah. king rose meet her, bowed unto her, sat throne, caused seat set king's mother; sat right hand. said, desire one small petition thee; [i pray thee,] say nay. king said unto her, ask on, mother: say thee nay. said, let abishag shunammite given adonijah thy brother wife. king solomon answered said unto mother, dost thou ask abishag shunammite adonijah? ask kingdom also; [is] mine elder brother; even him, abiathar priest, joab son zeruiah. king solomon sware lord, saying, god me, also, adonijah spoken word life. therefore, [as] lord liveth, hath established me, set throne david father, hath made house, promised, adonijah shall put death day. king solomon sent hand benaiah son jehoiada; fell upon died. unto abiathar priest said king, get thee anathoth, unto thine fields; thou [art] worthy death: time put thee death, thou barest ark lord god david father, thou hast afflicted wherein father afflicted. solomon thrust abiathar priest unto lord; might fulfil word lord, spake concerning house eli shiloh. tidings came joab: joab turned adonijah, though turned absalom. joab fled unto tabernacle lord, caught hold horns altar. told king solomon joab fled unto tabernacle lord; and, behold, [he is] altar. solomon sent benaiah son jehoiada, saying, go, fall upon him. benaiah came tabernacle lord, said unto him, thus saith king, come forth. said, nay; die here. benaiah brought king word again, saying, thus said joab, thus answered me. king said unto him, hath said, fall upon him, bury him; thou mayest take away innocent blood, joab shed, me, house father. lord shall return blood upon head, fell upon two men righteous better he, slew sword, father david knowing [thereof, wit,] abner son ner, captain host israel, amasa son jether, captain host judah. blood shall therefore return upon head joab, upon head seed ever: upon david, upon seed, upon house, upon throne, shall peace ever lord. benaiah son jehoiada went up, fell upon him,page 197 1 kings slew him: buried house wilderness. king put benaiah son jehoiada room host: zadok priest king put room abiathar. king sent called shimei, said unto him, build thee house jerusalem, dwell there, go forth thence whither. shall be, [that] day thou goest out, passest brook kidron, thou shalt know certain thou shalt surely die: thy blood shall upon thine head. shimei said unto king, saying [is] good: lord king hath said, thy servant do. shimei dwelt jerusalem many days. came pass end three years, two servants shimei ran away unto achish son maachah king gath. told shimei, saying, behold, thy servants [be] gath. shimei arose, saddled ass, went gath achish seek servants: shimei went, brought servants gath. told solomon shimei gone jerusalem gath, come again. king sent called shimei, said unto him, make thee swear lord, protested unto thee, saying, know certain, day thou goest out, walkest abroad whither, thou shalt surely die? thou saidst unto me, word [that] heard [is] good. hast thou kept oath lord, commandment charged thee with? king said moreover shimei, thou knowest wickedness thine heart privy to, thou didst david father: therefore lord shall return thy wickedness upon thine head; king solomon [shall be] blessed, throne david shall established lord ever. king commanded benaiah son jehoiada; went out, fell upon him, died. kingdom established hand solomon. solomon made affinity pharaoh king egypt, took pharaoh's daughter, brought city david, made end building house, house lord, wall jerusalem round about. people sacrificed high places, house built unto name lord, days. solomon loved lord, walking statutes david father: sacrificed burnt incense high places. king went gibeon sacrifice there; [was] great high place: thousand burnt offerings solomon offer upon altar. gibeon lord appeared solomon dream night: god said, ask shall give thee. solomon said, thou hast shewed unto thy servant david father great mercy, according walked thee truth, righteousness, uprightness heart thee; thou hast kept great kindness, thou hast given son sit throne, [it is] day. now, lord god, thou hast made thy servant king instead david father: [am but] little child: know [how] go come in. thy servant [is] midst thy people thou hast chosen, great people, cannot numbered counted multitude. give therefore thy servant understanding heart judge thy people, may discern good bad: isable judge thy great people? speech pleased lord, solomon asked thing. god said unto him, thou hast asked thing, hast asked thyself long life; neither hast asked riches thyself, hast asked life thine enemies; hast asked thyself understanding discern judgment; behold, done according thy words: lo, given thee wise understanding heart; none like thee thee, neither thee shall arise like unto thee. also given thee thou hast asked, riches, honour: shall among kings like unto thee thy days. thou wilt walk ways, keep statutes commandments, thy father david walk, lengthen thy days. solomon awoke; and, behold, [it was] dream. came jerusalem, stood ark covenant lord, offered burnt offerings, offered peace offerings, made feast servants. came two women, [that were] harlots, unto king, stood him. one woman said, lord, woman dwell one house; delivered child house. came pass third day delivered, woman delivered also: [were] together; [there was] stranger us house, save two house. woman's child died night; overlaid it. arose midnight, took son beside me, thine handmaid slept, laid bosom, laid dead child bosom. rose morning give child suck, behold, dead: considered morning, behold, son, bear. woman said, nay; living [is] son, dead [is] thy son. said, no; dead [is] thy son, living [is] son. thus spake king. said king, one saith, [is] son liveth, thy son [is] dead: saith, nay; thy son [is] dead, son [is] living. king said, bring sword. brought sword king. king said, divide living child two, give half one, half other. spake woman whose living child [was] unto king, bowels yearned upon son, said, lord, give living child, wise slay it. said, let neither mine thine, [but] divide [it. ] king answered said, give living child, wise slay it: [is] mother thereof. israel heard judgment king judged; feared king: saw wisdom god [was] him, judgment. [were] princes had; azariah son zadok priest, elihoreph ahiah, sons shisha, scribes; jehoshaphat son ahilud, recorder. benaiah son jehoiada [was] host: zadok abiathar [were] priests: azariah son nathan [was] officers: zabud son nathan [was] principal officer, [and] king's friend: ahishar [was] household: adoniram son abda [was] tribute. solomon twelve officers israel, provided victuals king household: man month year made provision. [he was] officer [was] land. judah israel [were] many, sand [is] sea multitude, eating drinking, making merry. solomon reigned kingdoms river unto land philistines, unto border egypt: brought presents, served solomon days life. solomon's provision one day thirty measures fine flour, threescore measures meal, ten fat oxen, twenty oxen pastures, hundred sheep, beside harts, roebucks, fallowdeer, fatted fowl. dominion [the region] side river, tiphsah even azzah, kings side river: peace sides round him. judah israel dwelt safely, every man vine fig tree, dan even beer-sheba, days solomon. solomon forty thousand stalls horses chariots, twelve thousand horsemen. officers provided victual king solomon, came unto king solomon's table, every man month: lacked nothing. barley also straw horses dromedaries brought unto place [the officers] were, every man according charge. god gave solomon wisdom understanding exceeding much, largeness heart, even sand [is] sea shore. solomon's wisdom excelled wisdom children east country, wisdom egypt. wiser men; ethan ezrahite, heman, chalcol, darda, sons mahol: fame nations round about. spake three thousand proverbs: songs thousand five. spake trees, cedar tree [is] lebanon even unto hyssop springeth wall: spake also beasts, fowl, creeping things, fishes. came people hear wisdom solomon, kings earth, heard wisdom. hiram king tyre sent servants unto solomon; heard anointed kingin room father: hiram ever lover david. thou knowest david father could build house unto name lord god wars every side, lord put soles feet. lord god hath given rest every side, [so is] neither adversary evil occurrent. and, behold, purpose build house unto name lord god, lord spake unto david father, saying, thy son, set upon thy throne thy room, shall build house unto name. therefore command thou hew cedar trees lebanon; servants shall thy servants: unto thee give hire thy servants according thou shalt appoint: thou knowest [there is] among us skill hew timber like unto sidonians. came pass, hiram heard words solomon, rejoiced greatly, said, blessed [be] lord day, hath given unto david wise son great people. hiram sent solomon, saying, considered things thou sentest for: [and] thy desire concerning timber cedar, concerning timber fir. servants shall bring [them] lebanon unto sea: convey sea floats unto place thou shalt appoint me, cause discharged there, thou shalt receive [them:] thou shalt accomplish desire, giving food household. hiram gave solomon cedar trees fir trees [according to] desire. solomon gave hiram twenty thousand measures wheat [for] food household, twenty measures pure oil: thus gave solomon hiram year year. lord gave solomon wisdom, promised him: peace hiram solomon; two made league together. king solomon raised levy israel; levy thirty thousand men. sent lebanon ten thousand month courses: month lebanon, [and] two months home: adoniram [was] levy. solomon threescore ten thousand bare burdens, fourscore thousand hewers mountains; [was] hand breadth thick, brim thereof wrought like brim cup, flowers lilies: contained two thousand baths. made ten bases brass; four cubits [was] length one base, four cubits breadth thereof, three cubits height it. work bases [was] [manner:] borders, borders [were] ledges: borders [were] ledges [were] lions, oxen, cherubims: upon ledges [there was] base above: beneath lions oxen [were] certain additions made thin work. every base four brasen wheels, plates brass: four corners thereof undersetters: laver [were] undersetters molten, side every addition. mouth within chapiter [was] cubit: mouth thereof [was] round [after] work base, cubit half: also upon mouth [were] gravings borders, foursquare, round. borders [were] four wheels; axletrees wheels [were joined] base: height wheel [was] cubit half cubit. work wheels like work chariot wheel: axletrees, naves, felloes, spokes, [were] molten. [there was] nothing ark save two tables stone, moses put horeb, lord made [a covenant] children israel, came land egypt. camepage 201 1 kings pass, priests come holy [place,] cloud filled house lord, priests could stand minister cloud: glory lord filled house lord. spake solomon, lord said would dwell thick darkness. surely built thee house dwell in, settled place thee abide ever. king turned face about, blessed congregation israel: (and congregation israel stood;) said, blessed [be] lord god israel, spake mouth unto david father, hath hand fulfilled [it,] saying, since day brought forth people israel egypt, chose city tribes israel build house, name might therein; chose david people israel. heart david father build house name lord god israel. lord said unto david father, whereas thine heart build house unto name, thou didst well thine heart. nevertheless thou shalt build house; thy son shall come forth thy loins, shall build house unto name. lord hath performed word spake, risen room david father, sit throne israel, lord promised, built house name lord god israel. set place ark, wherein [is] covenant lord, made fathers, brought land egypt. solomon stood altar lord presence congregation israel, spread forth hands toward heaven: said, lord god israel, [there is] god like thee, heaven above, earth beneath, keepest covenant mercy thy servants walk thee heart: hast kept thy servant david father thou promisedst him: thou spakest also thy mouth, hast fulfilled [it] thine hand, [it is] day. therefore now, lord god israel, keep thy servant david father thou promisedst him, saying, shall fail thee man sight sit throne israel; thy children take heed way, walk thou hast walked me. now, god israel, let thy word, pray thee, verified, thou spakest unto thy servant david father. god indeed dwell earth? behold, heaven heaven heavens cannot contain thee; much less house builded? yet thou respect unto prayer thy servant, supplication, lord god, hearken unto cry prayer, thy servant prayeth thee day: thine eyes may open toward house night day, [even] toward place thou hast said, name shall there: thou mayest hearken unto prayer thy servant shall make toward place. hearken thou supplication thy servant, thy people israel, shall pray toward place: hear thou heaven thy dwelling place: thou hearest, forgive. man trespass neighbour, oath laid upon cause swear, oath come thine altar house: hear thou heaven, do, judge thy servants, condemning wicked, bring way upon head; justifying righteous, give according righteousness. thy people israel smitten enemy, sinned thee, shall turn thee, confess thy name, pray, make supplication unto thee house: hear thou heaven, forgive sin thy people israel, bring unto land thou gavest unto fathers. heaven shut up, rain, sinned thee; pray toward place, confess thy name, turn sin, thou afflictest them: hear thou heaven, forgive sin thy servants, thy people israel, thou teach good way wherein walk, give rain upon thy land, thou hast given thy people inheritance. land famine, pestilence, blasting, mildew, locust, [or] caterpiller; enemy besiege land cities; whatsoever plague, whatsoever sickness [there be; ] prayer supplication soever [made] man, [or] thy people israel, shall know every man plague heart, spread forth hands toward house: hear thou heaven thy dwelling place, forgive, do, give every man according ways, whose heart thou knowest; (for thou, [even] thou only, knowest hearts children men;) may fear thee days live land thou gavest unto fathers. moreover concerning stranger, [is] thy people israel, cometh far country thy name's sake; (for shall hear thy great name, thy strong hand, thy stretched arm;) shall come pray toward house; hear thou heaven thy dwelling place, according stranger calleth thee for: people earth may know thy name, fear thee, [do] thy people israel; may know house, builded, called thy name. thy people go battle enemy, whithersoever thou shalt send them, shall pray unto lord toward city thou hast chosen, [toward] house built thy name: hear thou heaven prayer supplication, maintain cause. sin thee, (for [there is] man sinneth not,) thou angry them, deliver enemy, carry away captives unto land enemy, far near; [yet] shall bethink land whither carried captives, repent, make supplication unto thee land carried captives, saying, sinned, done perversely, committed wickedness; [so] return unto thee heart, soul, land enemies, led away captive, pray unto thee toward land, thou gavest unto fathers, city thou hast chosen, house built thy name: hear thou prayer supplication heaven thy dwelling place, maintain cause, forgive thy people sinned thee transgressions wherein transgressed thee, give compassion carried captive, may compassion them: [be] thy people, thine inheritance, thou broughtest forth egypt, midst furnace iron: thine eyes may open unto1 kings page 202 supplication thy servant, unto supplication thy people israel, hearken unto call unto thee. thou didst separate among people earth, [to be] thine inheritance, thou spakest hand moses thy servant, thou broughtest fathers egypt, lord god. [so,] solomon made end praying prayer supplication unto lord, arose altar lord, kneeling knees hands spread heaven. stood, blessed congregation israel loud voice, saying, blessed [be] lord, hath given rest unto people israel, according promised: hath failed one word good promise, promised hand moses servant. lord god us, fathers: let leave us, forsake us: may incline hearts unto him, walk ways, keep commandments, statutes, judgments, commanded fathers. let words, wherewith made supplication lord, nigh unto lord god day night, maintain cause servant, cause people israel times, matter shall require: people earth may know lord [is] god, [and is] none else. let heart therefore perfect lord god, walk statutes, keep commandments, day. king, israel him, offered sacrifice lord. solomon offered sacrifice peace offerings, offered unto lord, two twenty thousand oxen, hundred twenty thousand sheep. king children israel dedicated house lord. day king hallow middle court [was] house lord: offered burnt offerings, meat offerings, fat peace offerings: brasen altar [was] lord [was] little receive burnt offerings, meat offerings, fat peace offerings. time solomon held feast, israel him, great congregation, entering hamath unto river egypt, lord god, seven days seven days, [even] fourteen days. eighth day sent people away: blessed king, went unto tents joyful glad heart goodness lord done david servant, israel people. came pass, solomon finished building house lord, king's house, solomon's desire pleased do, lord appeared solomon second time, appeared unto gibeon. lord said unto him, heard thy prayer thy supplication, thou hast made me: hallowed house, thou hast built, put name ever; mine eyes mine heart shall perpetually. thou wilt walk me, david thy father walked, integrity heart, uprightness, according commanded thee, [and] wilt keep statutes judgments: establish throne thy kingdom upon israel ever, promised david thy father, saying, shall fail thee man upon throne israel. [but] ye shall turn following me, ye children, keep commandments [and] mystatutes set you, go serve gods, worship them: cut israel land given them; house, hallowed name, cast sight; israel shall proverb byword among people: house, [which] high, every one passeth shall astonished, shall hiss; shall say, hath lord done thus unto land, house? shall answer, forsook lord god, brought forth fathers land egypt, taken hold upon gods, worshipped them, served them: therefore hath lord brought upon evil. came pass end twenty years, solomon built two houses, house lord, king's house, ([now] hiram king tyre furnished solomon cedar trees fir trees, gold, according desire,) king solomon gave hiram twenty cities land galilee. hiram came tyre see cities solomon given him; pleased not. said, cities [are] thou hast given me, brother? called land cabul unto day. hiram sent king sixscore talents gold. [is] reason levy king solomon raised; build house lord, house, millo, wall jerusalem, hazor, megiddo, gezer. [for] pharaoh king egypt gone up, taken gezer, burnt fire, slain canaanites dwelt city, given [for] present unto daughter, solomon's wife. solomon built gezer, beth-horon nether, baalath, tadmor wilderness, land, cities store solomon had, cities chariots, cities horsemen, solomon desired build jerusalem, lebanon, land dominion. [and] people [that were] left amorites, hittites, perizzites, hivites, jebusites, [were] children israel, children left land, children israel also able utterly destroy, upon solomon levy tribute bondservice unto day. children israel solomon make bondmen: [were] men war, servants, princes, captains, rulers chariots, horsemen. [were] chief officers [were] solomon's work, five hundred fifty, bare rule people wrought work. pharaoh's daughter came city david unto house [solomon] built her: build millo. three times year solomon offer burnt offerings peace offerings upon altar built unto lord, burnt incense upon altar [was] lord. finished house. king solomon made navy ships ezion- geber, beside eloth, shore red sea, land edom. hiram sent navy servants, shipmen knowledge sea, servants solomon. came ophir, fetched thence gold, four hundred twenty talents, brought [it] king solomon.page 203 1 kings queen sheba heard fame solomon concerning name lord, came prove hard questions. came jerusalem great train, camels bare spices, much gold, precious stones: come solomon, communed heart. solomon told questions: [any] thing hid king, told not. queen sheba seen solomon's wisdom, house built, meat table, sitting servants, attendance ministers, apparel, cupbearers, ascent went unto house lord; spirit her. said king, true report heard mine land thy acts thy wisdom. howbeit believed words, came, mine eyes seen [it:] and, behold, half told me: thy wisdom prosperity exceedeth fame heard. happy [are] thy men, happy [are] thy servants, stand continually thee, [and] hear thy wisdom. blessed lord thy god, delighted thee, set thee throne israel: lord loved israel ever, therefore made thee king, judgment justice. gave king hundred twenty talents gold, spices great store, precious stones: came abundance spices queen sheba gave king solomon. navy also hiram, brought gold ophir, brought ophir great plenty almug trees, precious stones. king made almug trees pillars house lord, king's house, harps also psalteries singers: came almug trees, seen unto day. king solomon gave unto queen sheba desire, whatsoever asked, beside [that] solomon gave royal bounty. turned went country, servants. weight gold came solomon one year six hundred threescore six talents gold. beside [that had] merchantmen, traffick spice merchants, kings arabia, governors country. king solomon made two hundred targets beaten gold: six hundred [shekels] gold went one target. made three hundred shields beaten gold; three pound gold went one shield: king put house forest lebanon. moreover king made great throne ivory, overlaid best gold. throne six steps, top throne [was] round behind: [there were] stays either side place seat, two lions stood beside stays. twelve lions stood one side upon six steps: like made kingdom. king solomon's drinking vessels [were of] gold, vessels house forest lebanon [were of] pure gold; none [were of] silver: nothing accounted days solomon. king sea navy tharshish navy hiram: three years came navy tharshish, bringing gold, silver, ivory, apes, peacocks. king solomon exceeded kings earth riches wisdom. earth sought solomon, hear wisdom, god put heart. brought every man present, vessels silver, vessels gold, garments, armour, spices, horses, mules, rate year year. solomon gathered together chariots horsemen: thousand four hundred chariots, twelve thousand horsemen, bestowed cities chariots, king jerusalem. king made silver [to be] jerusalem stones, cedars made [to be] sycomore trees [are] vale, abundance. solomon horses brought egypt, linen yarn: king's merchants received linen yarn price. chariot came went egypt six hundred [shekels] silver, horse hundred fifty: kings hittites, kings syria, bring [them] means. king solomon loved many strange women, together daughter pharaoh, women moabites, ammonites, edomites, zidonians, [and] hittites; nations [concerning] lord said unto children israel, ye shall go them, neither shall come unto you: [for] surely turn away heart gods: solomon clave unto love. seven hundred wives, princesses, three hundred concubines: wives turned away heart. came pass, solomon old, [that] wives turned away heart gods: heart perfect lord god, [was] heart david father. solomon went ashtoreth goddess zidonians, milcom abomination ammonites. solomon evil sight lord, went fully lord, [did] david father. solomon build high place chemosh, abomination moab, hill [is] jerusalem, molech, abomination children ammon. likewise strange wives, burnt incense sacrificed unto gods. lord angry solomon, heart turned lord god israel, appeared unto twice, commanded concerning thing, go gods: kept lord commanded. wherefore lord said unto solomon, forasmuch done thee, thou hast kept covenant statutes, commanded thee, surely rend kingdom thee, give thy servant. notwithstanding thy days david thy father's sake: [but] rend hand thy son. howbeit rend away kingdom; [but] give one tribe thy son david servant's sake, jerusalem's sake chosen. lord stirred adversary unto solomon, hadad edomite: [was] king's seed edom. came pass, david edom, joab captain host gone bury slain, smitten every male edom; (for six months joab remain israel, cut every male edom:) hadad fled, certain edomites father's servants him, go egypt; hadad [being] yet little child.1 kings page 204 arose midian, came paran: took men paran, came egypt, unto pharaoh king egypt; gave house, appointed victuals, gave land. hadad found great favour sight pharaoh, gave wife sister wife, sister tahpenes queen. sister tahpenes bare genubath son, tahpenes weaned pharaoh's house: genubath pharaoh's household among sons pharaoh. hadad heard egypt david slept fathers, joab captain host dead, hadad said pharaoh, let depart, may go mine country. pharaoh said unto him, hast thou lacked me, that, behold, thou seekest go thine country? answered, nothing: howbeit let go wise. god stirred [another] adversary, rezon son eliadah, fled lord hadadezer king zobah: gathered men unto him, became captain band, david slew [of zobah:] went damascus, dwelt therein, reigned damascus. adversary israel days solomon, beside mischief hadad [did:] abhorred israel, reigned syria. jeroboam son nebat, ephrathite zereda, solomon's servant, whose mother's name [was] zeruah, widow woman, even lifted [his] hand king. [was] cause lifted [his] hand king: solomon built millo, [and] repaired breaches city david father. man jeroboam [was] mighty man valour: solomon seeing young man industrious, made ruler charge house joseph. came pass time jeroboam went jerusalem, prophet ahijah shilonite found way; clad new garment; two [were] alone field: ahijah caught new garment [was] him, rent [in] twelve pieces: said jeroboam, take thee ten pieces: thus saith lord, god israel, behold, rend kingdom hand solomon, give ten tribes thee: (but shall one tribe servant david's sake, jerusalem's sake, city chosen tribes israel:) forsaken me, worshipped ashtoreth goddess zidonians, chemosh god moabites, milcom god children ammon, walked ways, [that is] right mine eyes, [to keep] statutes judgments, [did] david father. howbeit take whole kingdom hand: make prince days life david servant's sake, chose, kept commandments statutes: take kingdom son's hand, give unto thee, [even] ten tribes. unto son give one tribe, david servant may light alway jerusalem, city chosen put name there. take thee, thou shalt reign according thy soul desireth, shalt king israel. shall be, thou wilt hearken unto command thee, wilt walk ways, [that is] right sight, keep statutes commandments, david servant did; withthee, build thee sure house, built david, give israel unto thee. afflict seed david, ever. solomon sought therefore kill jeroboam. jeroboam arose, fled egypt, unto shishak king egypt, egypt death solomon. rest acts solomon, did, wisdom, [are] written book acts solomon? time solomon reigned jerusalem israel [was] forty years. solomon slept fathers, buried city david father: rehoboam son reigned stead. rehoboam went shechem: israel come shechem make king. came pass, jeroboam son nebat, yet egypt, heard [of it,] (for fled presence king solomon, jeroboam dwelt egypt;) sent called him. jeroboam congregation israel came, spake unto rehoboam, saying, thy father made yoke grievous: therefore make thou grievous service thy father, heavy yoke put upon us, lighter, serve thee. said unto them, depart yet [for] three days, come me. people departed. king rehoboam consulted old men, stood solomon father yet lived, said, ye advise may answer people? spake unto him, saying, thou wilt servant unto people day, wilt serve them, answer them, speak good words them, thy servants ever. forsook counsel old men, given him, consulted young men grown him, [and] stood him: said unto them, counsel give ye may answer people, spoken me, saying, make yoke thy father put upon us lighter? young men grown spake unto him, saying, thus shalt thou speak unto people spake unto thee, saying, thy father made yoke heavy, make thou [it] lighter unto us; thus shalt thou say unto them, little [finger] shall thicker father's loins. whereas father lade heavy yoke, add yoke: father hath chastised whips, chastise scorpions. jeroboam people came rehoboam third day, king appointed, saying, come third day. king answered people roughly, forsook old men's counsel gave him; spake counsel young men, saying, father made yoke heavy, add yoke: father [also] chastised whips, chastise scorpions. wherefore king hearkened unto people; cause lord, might perform saying, lord spake ahijah shilonite unto jeroboam son nebat. israel saw king hearkened unto them, people answered king, saying, portion david? neither [have we] inheritance son jesse: tents, israel: see thine house, david. israel departed unto tents. [as for] children israel dweltpage 205 1 kings cities judah, rehoboam reigned them. king rehoboam sent adoram, [was] tribute; israel stoned stones, died. therefore king rehoboam made speed get chariot, flee jerusalem. israel rebelled house david unto day. came pass, israel heard jeroboam come again, sent called unto congregation, made king israel: none followed house david, tribe judah only. rehoboam come jerusalem, assembled house judah, tribe benjamin, hundred fourscore thousand chosen men, warriors, fight house israel, bring kingdom rehoboam son solomon. word god came unto shemaiah man god, saying, speak unto rehoboam, son solomon, king judah, unto house judah benjamin, remnant people, saying, thus saith lord, ye shall go up, fight brethren children israel: return every man house; thing me. hearkened therefore word lord, returned depart, according word lord. jeroboam built shechem mount ephraim, dwelt therein; went thence, built penuel. jeroboam said heart, shall kingdom return house david: people go sacrifice house lord jerusalem, shall heart people turn unto lord, [even] unto rehoboam king judah, shall kill me, go rehoboam king judah. whereupon king took counsel, made two calves [of] gold, said unto them, much go jerusalem: behold thy gods, israel, brought thee land egypt. set one bethel, put dan. thing became sin: people went [to worship] one, [even] unto dan. made house high places, made priests lowest people, sons levi. jeroboam ordained feast eighth month, fifteenth day month, like unto feast [is] judah, offered upon altar. bethel, sacrificing unto calves made: placed bethel priests high places made. offered upon altar made bethel fifteenth day eighth month, [even] month devised heart; behold, altar shall rent, ashes [are] upon shall poured out. came pass, king jeroboam heard saying man god, cried altar bethel, put forth hand altar, saying, lay hold him. hand, put forthagainst him, dried up, could pull him. altar also rent, ashes poured altar, according sign man god given word lord. king answered said unto man god, intreat face lord thy god, pray me, hand may restored again. man god besought lord, king's hand restored again, became [it was] before. king said unto man god, come home me, refresh thyself, give thee reward. man god said unto king, thou wilt give half thine house, go thee, neither eat bread drink water place: charged word lord, saying, eat bread, drink water, turn way thou camest. went another way, returned way came bethel. dwelt old prophet bethel; sons came told works man god done day bethel: words spoken unto king, told also father. father said unto them, way went he? sons seen way man god went, came judah. said unto sons, saddle ass. saddled ass: rode thereon, went man god, found sitting oak: said unto him, [art] thou man god camest judah? said, [am. ] said unto him, come home me, eat bread. said, may return thee, go thee: neither eat bread drink water thee place: said word lord, thou shalt eat bread drink water there, turn go way thou camest. said unto him, [am] prophet also thou [art;] angel spake unto word lord, saying, bring back thee thine house, may eat bread drink water. [but] lied unto him. went back him, eat bread house, drank water. came pass, sat table, word lord came unto prophet brought back: cried unto man god came judah, saying, thus saith lord, forasmuch thou hast disobeyed mouth lord, hast kept commandment lord thy god commanded thee, camest back, hast eaten bread drunk water place, [the lord] say thee, eat bread, drink water; thy carcase shall come unto sepulchre thy fathers. came pass, eaten bread, drunk, saddled ass, [to wit,] prophet brought back. gone, lion met way, slew him: carcase cast way, ass stood it, lion also stood carcase. and, behold, men passed by, saw carcase cast way, lion standing carcase: came told city old prophet dwelt. prophet brought back way heard [thereof,] said, [is] man god, disobedient unto word lord: therefore lord hath delivered unto lion, hath torn him, slain him, according word lord, spake unto him. spake sons,1 kings page 206 saying, saddle ass. saddled [him. ] went found carcase cast way, ass lion standing carcase: lion eaten carcase, torn ass. prophet took carcase man god, laid upon ass, brought back: old prophet came city, mourn bury him. laid carcase grave; mourned him, [saying,] alas, brother! came pass, buried him, spake sons, saying, dead, bury sepulchre wherein man god [is] buried; lay bones beside bones: saying cried word lord altar bethel, houses high places [are] cities samaria, shall surely come pass. thing jeroboam returned evil way, made lowest people priests high places: whosoever would, consecrated him, became [one] priests high places. thing became sin unto house jeroboam, even cut [it] off, destroy [it] face earth. time abijah son jeroboam fell sick. jeroboam said wife, arise, pray thee, disguise thyself, thou known wife jeroboam; get thee shiloh: behold, [is] ahijah prophet, told [i be] king people. take thee ten loaves, cracknels, cruse honey, go him: shall tell thee shall become child. jeroboam's wife so, arose, went shiloh, came house ahijah. ahijah could see; eyes set reason age. lord said unto ahijah, behold, wife jeroboam cometh ask thing thee son; sick: thus thus shalt thou say unto her: shall be, cometh in, shall feign [to be] another [woman. ] [so,] ahijah heard sound feet came door, said, come in, thou wife jeroboam; feignest thou thyself [to be] another? [am] sent thee [with] heavy [tidings. ] go, tell jeroboam, thus saith lord god israel, forasmuch exalted thee among people, made thee prince people israel, rent kingdom away house david, gave thee: yet thou hast servant david, kept commandments, followed heart, [that] [which was] right mine eyes; hast done evil thee: thou hast gone made thee gods, molten images, provoke anger, hast cast behind thy back: therefore, behold, bring evil upon house jeroboam, cut jeroboam pisseth wall, [and] shut left israel, take away remnant house jeroboam, man taketh away dung, till gone. dieth jeroboam city shall dogs eat; dieth field shall fowls air eat: lord hath spoken it. arise thou therefore, get thee thine house: [and] thy feet enter city, child shall die. israel shall mourn him, bury him: jeroboam shall come grave, found [some] good thing toward lord god israel house jeroboam. moreover thelord shall raise king israel, shall cut house jeroboam day: what? even now. lord shall smite israel, reed shaken water, shall root israel good land, gave fathers, shall scatter beyond river, made groves, provoking lord anger. shall give israel sins jeroboam, sin, made israel sin. jeroboam's wife arose, departed, came tirzah: [and] came threshold door, child died; buried him; israel mourned him, according word lord, spake hand servant ahijah prophet. rest acts jeroboam, warred, reigned, behold, [are] written book chronicles kings israel. days jeroboam reigned [were] two twenty years: slept fathers, nadab son reigned stead. rehoboam son solomon reigned judah. rehoboam [was] forty one years old began reign, reigned seventeen years jerusalem, city lord choose tribes israel, put name there. mother's name [was] naamah ammonitess. judah evil sight lord, provoked jealousy sins committed, fathers done. also built high places, images, groves, every high hill, every green tree. also sodomites land: [and] according abominations nations lord cast children israel. came pass fifth year king rehoboam, [that] shishak king egypt came jerusalem: took away treasures house lord, treasures king's house; even took away all: took away shields gold solomon made. king rehoboam made stead brasen shields, committed [them] unto hands chief guard, kept door king's house. [so,] king went house lord, guard bare them, brought back guard chamber. rest acts rehoboam, did, [are] written book chronicles kings judah? war rehoboam jeroboam [their] days. rehoboam slept fathers, buried fathers city david. mother's name [was] naamah ammonitess. abijam son reigned stead. eighteenth year king jeroboam son nebat reigned abijam judah. three years reigned jerusalem. mother's name [was] maachah, daughter abishalom. walked sins father, done him: heart perfect lord god, heart david father. nevertheless david's sake lord god give lamp jerusalem, set son him, establish jerusalem: david [thatpage 207 1 kings was] right eyes lord, turned aside [thing] commanded days life, save matter uriah hittite. war rehoboam jeroboam days life. rest acts abijam, did, [are] written book chronicles kings judah? war abijam jeroboam. abijam slept fathers; buried city david: asa son reigned stead. twentieth year jeroboam king israel reigned asa judah. forty one years reigned jerusalem. mother's name [was] maachah, daughter abishalom. asa [that was] right eyes lord, [did] david father. took away sodomites land, removed idols fathers made. also maachah mother, even removed [being] queen, made idol grove; asa destroyed idol, burnt [it] brook kidron. high places removed: nevertheless asa's heart perfect lord days. brought things father dedicated, things dedicated, house lord, silver, gold, vessels. war asa baasha king israel days. baasha king israel went judah, built ramah, might suffer go come asa king judah. asa took silver gold [that were] left treasures house lord, treasures king's house, delivered hand servants: king asa sent ben- hadad, son tabrimon, son hezion, king syria, dwelt damascus, saying, [there is] league thee, [and] father thy father: behold, sent unto thee present silver gold; come break thy league baasha king israel, may depart me. ben- hadad hearkened unto king asa, sent captains hosts cities israel, smote ijon, dan, abel-beth-maachah, cinneroth, land naphtali. came pass, baasha heard [thereof,] left building ramah, dwelt tirzah. king asa made proclamation throughout judah; none [was] exempted: took away stones ramah, timber thereof, wherewith baasha builded; king asa built geba benjamin, mizpah. rest acts asa, might, did, cities built, [are] written book chronicles kings judah?
