war asa baasha king israel days. third year asa king judah began baasha son ahijah reign israel tirzah, twenty four years. evil sight lord, walked way jeroboam, sin wherewith made israel sin. word lord came jehu son hanani baasha, saying, forasmuch exalted thee dust, made thee prince people israel; thou hast walked way jeroboam, hast made people israel sin, provoke anger sins; behold, take away posterity baasha, posterity house; make thy house like house jeroboam son nebat. dieth baasha city shall dogs eat; dieth fields shall fowls air eat. rest acts baasha, did, might, [are] written book chronicles kings israel? baasha slept fathers, buried tirzah: elah son reigned stead. also hand prophet jehu son hanani came word lord baasha, house, even evil sight lord, provoking anger work hands, like house jeroboam; killed him. twenty sixth year asa king judah began elah son baasha reign israel tirzah, two years. servant zimri, captain half [his] chariots, conspired him, tirzah, drinking drunk house arza steward [his] house tirzah. zimri went smote him, killed him, twenty seventh year asa king judah, reigned stead. came pass, began reign, soon sat throne, [that] slew house baasha: left one pisseth wall, neither kinsfolks, friends. thus zimri destroy house baasha, according word lord, spake baasha jehu prophet, sins baasha, sins elah son, sinned, made israel sin, provoking lord god israel anger vanities. rest acts elah, did, [are] written book chronicles kings israel? twenty seventh year asa king judah zimri reign seven days tirzah. people [were] encamped gibbethon, [belonged] philistines. people [that were]1 kings page 208 encamped heard say, zimri hath conspired, hath also slain king: wherefore israel made omri, captain host, king israel day camp. omri went gibbethon, israel him, besieged tirzah. came pass, zimri saw city taken, went palace king's house, burnt king's house fire, died, sins sinned evil sight lord, walking way jeroboam, sin did, make israel sin. rest acts zimri, treason wrought, [are] written book chronicles kings israel? people israel divided two parts: half people followed tibni son ginath, make king; half followed omri. people followed omri prevailed people followed tibni son ginath: tibni died, omri reigned. thirty first year asa king judah began omri reign israel, twelve years: six years reigned tirzah. bought hill samaria shemer two talents silver, built hill, called name city built, name shemer, owner hill, samaria. omri wrought evil eyes lord, worse [were] him. walked way jeroboam son nebat, sin wherewith made israel sin, provoke lord god israel anger vanities. rest acts omri did, might shewed, [are] written book chronicles kings israel? omri slept fathers, buried samaria: ahab son reigned stead. thirty eighth year asa king judah began ahab son omri reign israel: ahab son omri reigned israel samaria twenty two years. ahab son omri evil sight lord [were] him. came pass, light thing walk sins jeroboam son nebat, took wife jezebel daughter ethbaal king zidonians, went served baal, worshipped him. reared altar baal house baal, built samaria. ahab made grove; ahab provoke lord god israel anger kings israel him. days hiel bethelite build jericho: laid foundation thereof abiram firstborn, set gates thereof youngest [son] segub, according word lord, spake joshua son nun. elijah tishbite, [who was] inhabitants gilead, said unto ahab, [as] lord god israel liveth, stand, shall dew rain years, according word. word lord came unto him, saying, get thee hence, turn thee eastward, hide thyself brook cherith, [is] jordan. shall be, [that] thou shalt drink brook; commanded ravens feed thee there. hewent according unto word lord: went dwelt brook cherith, [is] jordan. ravens brought bread flesh morning, bread flesh evening; drank brook. came pass while, brook dried up, rain land. word lord came unto him, saying, arise, get thee zarephath, [belongeth] zidon, dwell there: behold, commanded widow woman sustain thee. arose went zarephath. came gate city, behold, widow woman [was] gathering sticks: called her, said, fetch me, pray thee, little water vessel, may drink. going fetch [it,] called her, said, bring me, pray thee, morsel bread thine hand. said, [as] lord thy god liveth, cake, handful meal barrel, little oil cruse: and, behold, [am] gathering two sticks, may go dress son, may eat it, die. elijah said unto her, fear not; go [and] thou hast said: make thereof little cake first, bring [it] unto me, make thee thy son. thus saith lord god israel, barrel meal shall waste, neither shall cruse oil fail, day [that] lord sendeth rain upon earth. went according saying elijah: she, he, house, eat [many] days. [and] barrel meal wasted not, neither cruse oil fail, according word lord, spake elijah. came pass things, [that] son woman, mistress house, fell sick; sickness sore, breath left him. said unto elijah, thee, thou man god? art thou come unto call sin remembrance, slay son? said unto her, give thy son. took bosom, carried loft, abode, laid upon bed. cried unto lord, said, lord god, hast thou also brought evil upon widow sojourn, slaying son? stretched upon child three times, cried unto lord, said, lord god, pray thee, let child's soul come again. lord heard voice elijah; soul child came again, revived. elijah took child, brought chamber house, delivered unto mother: elijah said, see, thy son liveth. woman said elijah, know thou [art] man god, [and] word lord thy mouth [is] truth. came pass [after] many days, word lord came elijah third year, saying, go, shew thyself unto ahab; send rain upon earth. elijah went shew unto ahab. [there was] sore famine samaria. ahab called obadiah, [was] governor [his] house. (now obadiah feared lord greatly: [so,] jezebel cut prophets lord, obadiah took hundred prophets, hid fifty cave, fed bread water.) ahab said unto obadiah, go land, untopage 209 1 kings fountains water, unto brooks: peradventure may find grass save horses mules alive, lose beasts. divided land pass throughout it: ahab went one way himself, obadiah went another way himself. obadiah way, behold, elijah met him: knew him, fell face, said, [art] thou lord elijah? answered him, [am:] go, tell thy lord, behold, elijah [is here. ] said, sinned, thou wouldest deliver thy servant hand ahab, slay me? [as] lord thy god liveth, nation kingdom, whither lord hath sent seek thee: said, [he is] [there;] took oath kingdom nation, found thee not. thou sayest, go, tell thy lord, behold, elijah [is here. ] shall come pass, [as soon as] gone thee, spirit lord shall carry thee whither know not; come tell ahab, cannot find thee, shall slay me: thy servant fear lord youth. told lord jezebel slew prophets lord, hid hundred men lord's prophets fifty cave, fed bread water? thou sayest, go, tell thy lord, behold, elijah [is here:] shall slay me. elijah said, [as] lord hosts liveth, stand, surely shew unto day. obadiah went meet ahab, told him: ahab went meet elijah. came pass, ahab saw elijah, ahab said unto him, [art] thou troubleth israel? answered, troubled israel; thou, thy father's house, ye forsaken commandments lord, thou hast followed baalim. therefore send, [and] gather israel unto mount carmel, prophets baal four hundred fifty, prophets groves four hundred, eat jezebel's table. ahab sent unto children israel, gathered prophets together unto mount carmel. elijah came unto people, said, long halt ye two opinions? lord [be] god, follow him: baal, [then] follow him. people answered word. said elijah unto people, i, [even] only, remain prophet lord; baal's prophets [are] four hundred fifty men. let therefore give us two bullocks; let choose one bullock themselves, cut pieces, lay [it] wood, put fire [under:] dress bullock, lay [it] wood, put fire [under: ] call ye name gods, call name lord: god answereth fire, let god. people answered said, well spoken. elijah said unto prophets baal, choose one bullock yourselves, dress [it] first; ye [are] many; call name gods, put fire [under. ] took bullock given them, dressed [it,] called name baal morning even noon, saying, baal, hear us. [there was] voice, answered. leaped upon altar made. came pass noon, elijah mocked them, said, cry aloud: [is] god; either talking, pursuing, journey, [or] peradventure sleepeth, must awaked. cried aloud, cut mannerwith knives lancets, till blood gushed upon them. came pass, midday past, prophesied [time] offering [evening] sacrifice, [there was] neither voice, answer, regarded. elijah said unto people, come near unto me. people came near unto him. repaired altar lord [that was] broken down. elijah took twelve stones, according number tribes sons jacob, unto word lord came, saying, israel shall thy name: stones built altar name lord: made trench altar, great would contain two measures seed. put wood order, cut bullock pieces, laid [him] wood, said, fill four barrels water, pour [it] burnt sacrifice, wood. said, [it] second time. [it] second time. said, [it] third time. [it] third time. water ran round altar; filled trench also water. came pass [the time of] offering [evening] sacrifice, elijah prophet came near, said, lord god abraham, isaac, israel, let known day thou art god israel, [that] [am] thy servant, [that] done things thy word. hear me, lord, hear me, people may know thou [art] lord god, [that] thou hast turned heart back again. fire lord fell, consumed burnt sacrifice, wood, stones, dust, licked water [was] trench. people saw [it,] fell faces: said, lord, [is] god; lord, [is] god. elijah said unto them, take prophets baal; let one escape. took them: elijah brought brook kishon, slew there. elijah said unto ahab, get thee up, eat drink; [there is] sound abundance rain. ahab went eat drink. elijah went top carmel; cast upon earth, put face knees, said servant, go now, look toward sea. went up, looked, said, [there is] nothing. said, go seven times. came pass seventh time, said, behold, ariseth little cloud sea, like man's hand. said, go up, say unto ahab, prepare [thy chariot,] get thee down, rain stop thee not. came pass mean while, heaven black clouds wind, great rain. ahab rode, went jezreel. hand lord elijah; girded loins, ran ahab entrance jezreel. ahab told jezebel elijah done, withal slain prophets sword. jezebel sent messenger unto elijah, saying, let gods [to me,] also, make thy life life one morrow time. saw [that,] arose, went life, came beer-sheba, [belongeth] judah, left servant there. went day's journey wilderness, came sat juniper tree: requested might die; said, enough; now, lord, take away life; [am]1 kings page 210 better fathers. lay slept juniper tree, behold, angel touched him, said unto him, arise [and] eat. looked, and, behold, [there was] cake baken coals, cruse water head. eat drink, laid again. angel lord came second time, touched him, said, arise [and] eat; journey [is] great thee. arose, eat drink, went strength meat forty days forty nights unto horeb mount god. came thither unto cave, lodged there; and, behold, word lord [came] him, said unto him, doest thou here, elijah? said, jealous lord god hosts: children israel forsaken thy covenant, thrown thine altars, slain thy prophets sword; i, [even] only, left; seek life, take away. said, go forth, stand upon mount lord. and, behold, lord passed by, great strong wind rent mountains, brake pieces rocks lord; [but] lord [was] wind: wind earthquake; [but] lord [was] earthquake: earthquake fire; [but] lord [was] fire: fire still small voice. [so,] elijah heard [it,] wrapped face mantle, went out, stood entering cave. and, behold, [there came] voice unto him, said, doest thou here, elijah? said, jealous lord god hosts: children israel forsaken thy covenant, thrown thine altars, slain thy prophets sword; i, [even] only, left; seek life, take away. lord said unto him, go, return thy way wilderness damascus: thou comest, anoint hazael [to be] king syria: jehu son nimshi shalt thou anoint [to be] king israel: elisha son shaphat abel-meholah shalt thou anoint [to be] prophet thy room. shall come pass, [that] escapeth sword hazael shall jehu slay: escapeth sword jehu shall elisha slay. yet left [me] seven thousand israel, knees bowed unto baal, every mouth hath kissed him. departed thence, found elisha son shaphat, [was] plowing [with] twelve yoke [of oxen] him, twelfth: elijah passed him, cast mantle upon him. left oxen, ran elijah, said, let me, pray thee, kiss father mother, [then] follow thee. said unto him, go back again: done thee? returned back him, took yoke oxen, slew them, boiled flesh instruments oxen, gave unto people, eat. arose, went elijah, ministered unto him. ben-hadad king syria gathered host together: [there were] thirty two kings him, horses, chariots: went besieged samaria, warred it. sent messengers ahab king israel city, said unto him, thus saith ben-hadad, thy silver thy gold [is] mine; thy wives also thy children, [even] goodliest, [are] mine. king israelanswered said, lord, king, according thy saying, [am] thine, have. messengers came again, said, thus speaketh ben- hadad, saying, although sent unto thee, saying, thou shalt deliver thy silver, thy gold, thy wives, thy children; yet send servants unto thee morrow time, shall search thine house, houses thy servants; shall be, [that] whatsoever pleasant thine eyes, shall put [it] hand, take [it] away. king israel called elders land, said, mark, pray you, see [man] seeketh mischief: sent unto wives, children, silver, gold; denied not. elders people said unto him, hearken [unto him,] consent. wherefore said unto messengers ben-hadad, tell lord king, thou didst send thy servant first do: thing may do. messengers departed, brought word again. ben-hadad sent unto him, said, gods unto me, also, dust samaria shall suffice handfuls people follow me. king israel answered said, tell [him,] let girdeth [his harness] boast putteth off. came pass, [ben-hadad] heard message, [was] drinking, kings pavilions,that said unto servants, set [yourselves array.] set [themselves array] city. and, behold, came prophet unto ahab king israel, saying, thus saith lord, hast thou seen great multitude? behold, deliver thine hand day; thou shalt know [am] lord. ahab said, whom? said, thus saith lord, [even] young men princes provinces. said, shall order battle? answered, thou. numbered young men princes provinces, two hundred thirty two: numbered people, [even] children israel, [being] seven thousand. went noon. ben-hadad [was] drinking drunk pavilions, kings, thirty two kings helped him. young men princes provinces went first; ben-hadad sent out, told him, saying, men come samaria. said, whether come peace, take alive; whether come war, take alive. young men princes provinces came city, army followed them. slew every one man: syrians fled; israel pursued them: ben-hadad king syria escaped horse horsemen. king israel went out, smote horses chariots, slew syrians great slaughter. prophet came king israel, said unto him, go, strengthen thyself, mark, see thou doest: return year king syria come thee. servants king syria said unto him, gods [are] gods hills; therefore stronger we; let us fight plain, surely shall stronger they. thing, take kings away, every man place, put captains rooms: number thee army, like army thou hast lost, horse horse, chariot chariot: fight plain, [and]page 211 1 kings surely shall stronger they. hearkened unto voice, so. came pass return year, ben-hadad numbered syrians, went aphek, fight israel. children israel numbered, present, went them: children israel pitched like two little flocks kids; syrians filled country. came man god, spake unto king israel, said, thus saith lord, syrians said, lord [is] god hills, [is] god valleys, therefore deliver great multitude thine hand, ye shall know [am] lord. pitched one seven days. was, seventh day battle joined: children israel slew syrians hundred thousand footmen one day. rest fled aphek, city; [there] wall fell upon twenty seven thousand men [that were] left. ben-hadad fled, came city, inner chamber. servants said unto him, behold now, heard kings house israel [are] merciful kings: let us, pray thee, put sackcloth loins, ropes upon heads, go king israel: peradventure save thy life. girded sackcloth loins, [put] ropes heads, came king israel, said, thy servant ben-hadad saith, pray thee, let live. said, [is] yet alive? brother. men diligently observe whether [any thing would come] him, hastily catch [it:] said, thy brother ben-hadad. said, go ye, bring him. ben- hadad came forth him; caused come chariot. [ben-hadad] said unto him, cities, father took thy father, restore; thou shalt make streets thee damascus, father made samaria. [said ahab,] send thee away covenant. made covenant him, sent away. certain man sons prophets said unto neighbour word lord, smite me, pray thee. man refused smite him. said unto him, thou hast obeyed voice lord, behold, soon thou art departed me, lion shall slay thee. soon departed him, lion found him, slew him. found another man, said, smite me, pray thee. man smote him, smiting wounded [him. ] prophet departed, waited king way, disguised ashes upon face. king passed by, cried unto king: said, thy servant went midst battle; and, behold, man turned aside, brought man unto me, said, keep man: means missing, shall thy life life, else thou shalt pay talent silver. thy servant busy there, gone. king israel said unto him, [shall] thy judgment [be;] thyself hast decided [it. ] hasted, took ashes away face; king israel discerned [was] prophets. said unto him, thus saith lord, thou hast let go [thy] hand man appointed utter destruction, therefore thy life shall go life, thy people people. king israel went house heavy displeased, came samaria. came pass things, [that] naboth jezreelite vineyard, [was] jezreel, hard palace ahab king samaria. ahab spake unto naboth, saying, give thy vineyard, may garden herbs, [is] near unto house: give thee better vineyard it; [or,] seem good thee, give thee worth money. naboth said ahab, lord forbid me, give inheritance fathers unto thee. ahab came house heavy displeased word naboth jezreelite spoken him: said, give thee inheritance fathers. laid upon bed, turned away face, would eat bread. jezebel wife came him, said unto him, thy spirit sad, thou eatest bread? said unto her, spake unto naboth jezreelite, said unto him, give thy vineyard money; else, please thee, give thee [another] vineyard it: answered, give thee vineyard. jezebel wife said unto him, dost thou govern kingdom israel? arise, [and] eat bread, let thine heart merry: give thee vineyard naboth jezreelite. wrote letters ahab's name, sealed [them] seal, sent letters unto elders nobles [were] city, dwelling naboth. wrote letters, saying, proclaim fast, set naboth high among people: set two men, sons belial, him, bear witness him, saying, thou didst blaspheme god king. [then] carry out, stone him, may die. men city, [even] elders nobles inhabitants city, jezebel sent unto them, [and] [was] written letters sent unto them. proclaimed fast, set naboth high among people. came two men, children belial, sat him: men belial witnessed him, [even] naboth, presence people, saying, naboth blaspheme god king. carried forth city, stoned stones, died. sent jezebel, saying, naboth stoned, dead. came pass, jezebel heard naboth stoned, dead, jezebel said ahab, arise, take possession vineyard naboth jezreelite, refused give thee money: naboth alive, dead. came pass, ahab heard naboth dead, ahab rose go vineyard naboth jezreelite, take possession it. word lord came elijah tishbite, saying, arise, go meet ahab king israel, [is] samaria: behold, [he is] vineyard naboth, whither gone possess it. thou shalt speak unto him, saying, thus saith lord, hast thou killed, also taken possession? thou shalt speak unto him, saying, thus saith lord, place dogs licked blood naboth shall dogs lick thy blood, even thine. ahab said elijah, hast thou found me, mine enemy? answered, found [thee:] thou hast sold thyself work evil sight lord. behold, bring evil upon thee, take away thy posterity, cut ahab pisseth1 kings page 212 wall, shut left israel, make thine house like house jeroboam son nebat, like house baasha son ahijah, provocation wherewith thou hast provoked [me] anger, made israel sin. jezebel also spake lord, saying, dogs shall eat jezebel wall jezreel. dieth ahab city dogs shall eat; dieth field shall fowls air eat. none like unto ahab, sell work wickedness sight lord, jezebel wife stirred up. abominably following idols, according [things] amorites, lord cast children israel. came pass, ahab heard words, rent clothes, put sackcloth upon flesh, fasted, lay sackcloth, went softly. word lord came elijah tishbite, saying, seest thou ahab humbleth me? humbleth me, bring evil days: [but] son's days bring evil upon house. continued three years without war syria israel. came pass third year, jehoshaphat king judah came king israel. king israel said unto servants, know ye ramoth gilead [is] ours, [be] still, [and] take hand king syria? said unto jehoshaphat, wilt thou go battle ramoth- gilead? jehoshaphat said king israel, [am] thou [art,] people thy people, horses thy horses. jehoshaphat said unto king israel, enquire, pray thee, word lord day. king israel gathered prophets together, four hundred men, said unto them, shall go ramoth-gilead battle, shall forbear? said, go up; lord shall deliver [it] hand king. jehoshaphat said, [is there] prophet lord besides, might enquire him? king israel said unto jehoshaphat, [there is] yet one man, micaiah son imlah, may enquire lord: hate him; doth prophesy good concerning me, evil. jehoshaphat said, let king say so. king israel called officer, said, hasten [hither] micaiah son imlah. king israel jehoshaphat king judah sat throne, put robes, void place entrance gate samaria; prophets prophesied them. zedekiah son chenaanah made horns iron: said, thus saith lord, shalt thou push syrians, thou consumed them. prophets prophesied so, saying, go ramoth- gilead, prosper: lord shall deliver [it] king's hand. messenger gone call micaiah spake unto him, saying, behold now, words prophets [declare] good unto king one mouth: let thy word, pray thee, like word one them, speak [that is] good. micaiah said, [as] lord liveth, lord saith unto me, speak. came king. king said unto him, micaiah, shall go ramoth-gilead battle, shall forbear? answered him, go, prosper: lord shall deliver [it] hand king. king said unto him, many times shall adjure thee thou tell nothing [that is] true name lord? said, saw israel scattered upon hills, sheep shepherd: lord said, master: let return every man house peace. king israel said unto jehoshaphat, tell thee would prophesy good concerning me, evil? said, hear thou therefore word lord: saw lord sitting throne, host heaven standing right hand left. lord said, shall persuade ahab, may go fall ramoth-gilead? one said manner, another said manner. came forth spirit, stood lord, said, persuade him. lord said unto him, wherewith? said, go forth, lying spirit mouth prophets. said, thou shalt persuade [him,] prevail also: go forth, so. therefore, behold, lord hath put lying spirit mouth thy prophets, lord hath spoken evil concerning thee. zedekiah son chenaanah went near, smote micaiah cheek, said, way went spirit lord speak unto thee? micaiah said, behold, thou shalt see day, thou shalt go inner chamber hide thyself. king israel said, take micaiah, carry back unto amon governor city, joash king's son; say, thus saith king, put [fellow] prison, feed bread affliction water affliction, come peace. micaiah said, thou return peace, lord hath spoken me. said, hearken, people, every one you. king israel jehoshaphat king judah went ramoth-gilead. king israel said unto jehoshaphat, disguise myself, enter battle; put thou thy robes. king israel disguised himself, went battle. king syria commanded thirty two captains rule chariots, saying, fight neither small great, save king israel. came pass, captains chariots saw jehoshaphat, said, surely [is] king israel. turned aside fight him: jehoshaphat cried out. came pass, captains chariots perceived [was] king israel, turned back pursuing him. [certain] man drew bow venture, smote king israel joints harness: wherefore said unto driver chariot, turn thine hand, carry host; wounded. battle increased day: king stayed chariot syrians, died even: blood ran wound midst chariot. went proclamation throughout host going sun, saying, every man city, every man country. king died, brought samaria; buried king samaria. [one] washed chariot pool samaria; dogs licked blood; washed armour; according unto word lord spake. rest acts ahab, did, ivory house made, cities built, [are] written book chronicles kingspage 213 1 kings israel? ahab slept fathers; ahaziah son reigned stead. jehoshaphat son asa began reign judah fourth year ahab king israel. jehoshaphat [was] thirty five years old began reign; reigned twenty five years jerusalem. mother's name [was] azubah daughter shilhi. walked ways asa father; turned aside it, [that was] right eyes lord: nevertheless high places taken away; [for] people offered burnt incense yet high places. jehoshaphat made peace king israel. rest acts jehoshaphat, might shewed, warred, [are] written book chronicles kings judah? remnant sodomites, remained days father asa, took land. [there was] king edom: deputy [was] king. jehoshaphat made ships tharshish go ophir gold: went not; ships broken ezion- geber. said ahaziah son ahab unto jehoshaphat, let servants go thy servants ships. jehoshaphat would not. jehoshaphat slept fathers, buried fathers city david father: jehoram son reigned stead. ahaziah son ahab began reign israel samaria seventeenth year jehoshaphat king judah, reigned two years israel. evil sight lord, walked way father, way mother, way jeroboam son nebat, made israel sin: served baal, worshipped him, provoked anger lord god israel, according father done.page 215 2 kings second book kings commonly called fourth book kings moab rebelled israel death ahab. ahaziah fell lattice upper chamber [was] samaria, sick: sent messengers, said unto them, go, enquire baal- zebub god ekron whether shall recover disease. angel lord said elijah tishbite, arise, go meet messengers king samaria, say unto them, [is it] [there is] god israel, [that] ye go enquire baal-zebub god ekron? therefore thus saith lord, thou shalt come bed thou art gone up, shalt surely die. elijah departed. messengers turned back unto him, said unto them, ye turned back? said unto him, came man meet us, said unto us, go, turn unto king sent you, say unto him, thus saith lord, [is it] [there is] god israel, [that] thou sendest enquire baal-zebub god ekron? therefore thou shalt come bed thou art gone up, shalt surely die. said unto them, manner man [was he] came meet you, told words? answered him, [he was] hairy man, girt girdle leather loins. said, [is] elijah tishbite. king sent unto captain fifty fifty. went him: and, behold, sat top hill. spake unto him, thou man god, king hath said, come down. elijah answered said captain fifty, [be] man god, let fire come heaven, consume thee thy fifty. came fire heaven, consumed fifty. also sent unto another captain fifty fifty. answered said unto him, man god, thus hath king said, come quickly. elijah answered said unto them, [be] man god, let fire come heaven, consume thee thy fifty. fire god came heaven, consumed fifty. sent captain third fifty fifty. third captain fifty went up, came fell knees elijah, besought him, said unto him, man god, pray thee, let life, life fifty thy servants, precious thy sight. behold, came fire heaven, burnt two captains former fifties fifties: therefore let life precious thy sight. angel lord said unto elijah, go him: afraid him. arose, went unto king. said unto him, thus saith lord, forasmuch thou hast sent messengers enquire baal-zebub god ekron, [is it] [there is] god israel enquire word? therefore thou shalt come bed thou art gone up, shalt surely die. died according word lord elijah spoken. jehoram reigned stead second year jehoram son jehoshaphat king judah; son. rest acts ahaziah did, [are] written book chronicles kings israel? came pass, lord would take elijah heaven whirlwind, elijah went elisha gilgal. elijah said unto elisha, tarry here, pray thee; lord hath sent bethel. elisha said [unto him, as] lord liveth, thy soul liveth, leave thee. went bethel. sons prophets [were] bethel came forth elisha, said unto him, knowest thou lord take away thy master thy head day? said, yea, know [it;] hold ye peace. elijah said unto him, elisha, tarry here, pray thee; lord hath sent jericho. said, [as] lord liveth, [as] thy soul liveth, leave thee. came jericho. sons prophets [were] jericho came elisha, said unto him, knowest thou lord take away thy master thy head day? answered, yea, know [it;] hold ye peace. elijah said unto him, tarry, pray thee, here; lord hath sent jordan. said, [as] lord liveth, [as] thy soul liveth, leave thee. two went on. fifty men sons prophets went, stood view afar off: two stood jordan. elijah took mantle, wrapped [it] together, smote waters, divided hither thither, two went dry ground. came pass, gone over, elijah said unto elisha, ask shall thee, taken away thee. elisha said, pray thee, let double portion thy spirit upon me. said, thou hast asked hard thing: [nevertheless,] thou see [when am] taken thee, shall unto thee; not, shall so. came pass, still went on, talked, that, behold, [there appeared] chariot fire, horses fire, parted asunder; elijah went whirlwind heaven. elisha saw [it,] cried, father, father, chariot israel, horsemen thereof. saw more: took hold clothes, rent two pieces. took also mantle elijah fell him, went back, stood bank jordan; took mantle elijah fell him, smote waters, said, [is] lord god elijah? also smitten waters, parted hither thither: elisha went over. sons prophets [were] view jericho saw him, said, spirit elijah doth rest elisha. came meet him, bowed ground him. said unto him, behold now, thy servants fifty strong men; let go, pray thee, seek thy master: lest peradventure spirit lord hath taken up, cast upon mountain, valley. said, ye shall send. urged till ashamed, said, send. sent therefore fifty men; sought three days, found not. came him, (for tarried jericho,) said unto them, say unto you, go not? men city said unto elisha, behold, pray thee, situation city [is] pleasant, lord seeth: water [is] naught, ground barren. said, bring new cruse, put salt therein. bring [it] him. went forth unto spring waters, cast salt there,2 kings page 216 said, thus saith lord, healed waters; shall thence death barren [land. ] waters healed unto day, according saying elisha spake. went thence unto bethel: going way, came forth little children city, mocked him, said unto him, go up, thou bald head; go up, thou bald head. turned back, looked them, cursed name lord. came forth two bears wood, tare forty two children them. went thence mount carmel, thence returned samaria. jehoram son ahab began reign israel samaria eighteenth year jehoshaphat king judah, reigned twelve years. wrought evil sight lord; like father, like mother: put away image baal father made. nevertheless cleaved unto sins jeroboam son nebat, made israel sin; departed therefrom. mesha king moab sheepmaster, rendered unto king israel hundred thousand lambs, hundred thousand rams, wool. came pass, ahab dead, king moab rebelled king israel. king jehoram went samaria time, numbered israel. went sent jehoshaphat king judah, saying, king moab hath rebelled me: wilt thou go moab battle? said, go up: [am] thou [art,] people thy people, [and] horses thy horses. said, way shall go up? answered, way wilderness edom. king israel went, king judah, king edom: fetched compass seven days' journey: water host, cattle followed them. king israel said, alas! lord hath called three kings together, deliver hand moab! jehoshaphat said, [is there] prophet lord, may enquire lord him? one king israel's servants answered said, [is] elisha son shaphat, poured water hands elijah. jehoshaphat said, word lord him. king israel jehoshaphat king edom went him. elisha said unto king israel, thee? get thee prophets thy father, prophets thy mother. king israel said unto him, nay: lord hath called three kings together, deliver hand moab. elisha said, [as] lord hosts liveth, stand, surely, regard presence jehoshaphat king judah, would look toward thee, see thee. bring minstrel. came pass, minstrel played, hand lord came upon him. said, thus saith lord, make valley full ditches. thus saith lord, ye shall see wind, neither shall ye see rain; yet valley shall filled water, ye may drink, ye, cattle, beasts. [but] light thing sight lord: deliver moabites also hand. ye shall smite every fenced city, every choice city, shall fell everygood tree, stop wells water, mar every good piece land stones. came pass morning, meat offering offered, that, behold, came water way edom, country filled water. moabites heard kings come fight them, gathered able put armour, upward, stood border. rose early morning, sun shone upon water, moabites saw water side [as] red blood: said, [is] blood: kings surely slain, smitten one another: therefore, moab, spoil. came camp israel, israelites rose smote moabites, fled them: went forward smiting moabites, even [their] country. beat cities, every good piece land cast every man stone, filled it; stopped wells water, felled good trees: kir-haraseth left stones thereof; howbeit slingers went [it,] smote it. king moab saw battle sore him, took seven hundred men drew swords, break [even] unto king edom: could not. took eldest son reigned stead, offered [for] burnt offering upon wall. great indignation israel: departed him, returned [their own] land. cried certain woman wives sons prophets unto elisha, saying, thy servant husband dead; thou knowest thy servant fear lord: creditor come take unto two sons bondmen. elisha said unto her, shall thee? tell me, hast thou house? said, thine handmaid hath thing house, save pot oil. said, go, borrow thee vessels abroad thy neighbours, [even] empty vessels; borrow few. thou art come in, thou shalt shut door upon thee upon thy sons, shalt pour vessels, thou shalt set aside full. went him, shut door upon upon sons, brought [the vessels] her; poured out. came pass, vessels full, said unto son, bring yet vessel. said unto her, [there is] vessel more. oil stayed. came told man god. said, go, sell oil, pay thy debt, live thou thy children rest. fell day, elisha passed shunem, [was] great woman; constrained eat bread. was, [that] oft passed by, turned thither eat bread. said unto husband, behold now, perceive [is] holy man god, passeth us continually. let us make little chamber, pray thee, wall; let us set bed, table, stool, candlestick: shall be, cometh us, shall turn thither. fell day, came thither, turned chamber, lay there. said gehazi servant, call shunammite. called her, stood him. said unto him, say unto her, behold, thou hast careful us care; [is] done thee?page 217 2 kings wouldest thou spoken king, captain host? answered, dwell among mine people. said, [is] done her? gehazi answered, verily hath child, husband old. said, call her. called her, stood door. said, season, according time life, thou shalt embrace son. said, nay, lord, [thou] man god, lie unto thine handmaid. woman conceived, bare son season elisha said unto her, according time life. child grown, fell day, went father reapers. said unto father, head, head. said lad, carry mother. taken him, brought mother, sat knees till noon, [then] died. went up, laid bed man god, shut [the door] upon him, went out. called unto husband, said, send me, pray thee, one young men, one asses, may run man god, come again. said, wherefore wilt thou go day? [it is] neither new moon, sabbath. said, [it shall be] well. saddled ass, said servant, drive, go forward; slack [thy] riding me, except bid thee. went came unto man god mount carmel. came pass, man god saw afar off, said gehazi servant, behold, [yonder is] shunammite: run now, pray thee, meet her, say unto her, [is it] well thee? [is it] well thy husband? [is it] well child? answered, [it is] well. came man god hill, caught feet: gehazi came near thrust away. man god said, let alone; soul [is] vexed within her: lord hath hid [it] me, hath told me. said, desire son lord? say, deceive me? said gehazi, gird thy loins, take staff thine hand, go thy way: thou meet man, salute not; salute thee, answer again: lay staff upon face child. mother child said, [as] lord liveth, [as] thy soul liveth, leave thee. arose, followed her. gehazi passed them, laid staff upon face child; [there was] neither voice, hearing. wherefore went meet him, told him, saying, child awaked. elisha come house, behold, child dead, [and] laid upon bed. went therefore, shut door upon twain, prayed unto lord. went up, lay upon child, put mouth upon mouth, eyes upon eyes, hands upon hands: stretched upon child; flesh child waxed warm. returned, walked house fro; went up, stretched upon him: child sneezed seven times, child opened eyes. called gehazi, said, call shunammite. called her. come unto him, said, take thy son. went in, fell feet, bowed ground, took son, went out. elisha came gilgal: [there was] dearth land; sons prophets [were] sitting him: said unto servant, set thegreat pot, seethe pottage sons prophets. one went field gather herbs, found wild vine, gathered thereof wild gourds lap full, came shred [them] pot pottage: knew [them] not. poured men eat. came pass, eating pottage, cried out, said, [thou] man god, [there is] death pot. could eat [thereof. ] said, bring meal. cast [it] pot; said, pour people, may eat. harm pot. came man baal-shalisha, brought man god bread firstfruits, twenty loaves barley, full ears corn husk thereof. said, give unto people, may eat. servitor said, what, set hundred men? said again, give people, may eat: thus saith lord, shall eat, shall leave [thereof. ] set [it] them, eat, left [thereof,] according word lord. naaman, captain host king syria, great man master, honourable, lord given deliverance unto syria: also mighty man valour, [but was] leper. syrians gone companies, brought away captive land israel little maid; waited naaman's wife. said unto mistress, would god lord [were] prophet [is] samaria! would recover leprosy. [one] went in, told lord, saying, thus thus said maid [is] land israel. king syria said, go to, go, send letter unto king israel. departed, took ten talents silver, six thousand [pieces] gold, ten changes raiment. brought letter king israel, saying, letter come unto thee, behold, [therewith] sent naaman servant thee, thou mayest recover leprosy. came pass, king israel read letter, rent clothes, said, [am] god, kill make alive, man doth send unto recover man leprosy? wherefore consider, pray you, see seeketh quarrel me. [so,] elisha man god heard king israel rent clothes, sent king, saying, wherefore hast thou rent thy clothes? let come me, shall know prophet israel. naaman came horses chariot, stood door house elisha. elisha sent messenger unto him, saying, go wash jordan seven times, thy flesh shall come thee, thou shalt clean. naaman wroth, went away, said, behold, thought, surely come me, stand, call name lord god, strike hand place, recover leper. [are] abana pharpar, rivers damascus, better waters israel? may wash them, clean? turned went away rage. servants came near, spake unto him, said, father, [if] prophet bid thee [do some] great thing, wouldest thou done [it?] much rather then, saith thee, wash, clean? went down, dipped seven times jordan, according2 kings page 218 saying man god: flesh came like unto flesh little child, clean. returned man god, company, came, stood him: said, behold, know [there is] god earth, israel: therefore, pray thee, take blessing thy servant. said, [as] lord liveth, stand, receive none. urged take [it;] refused. naaman said, shall then, pray thee, given thy servant two mules' burden earth? thy servant henceforth offer neither burnt offering sacrifice unto gods, unto lord. thing lord pardon thy servant, [that] master goeth house rimmon worship there, leaneth hand, bow house rimmon: bow house rimmon, lord pardon thy servant thing. said unto him, go peace. departed little way. gehazi, servant elisha man god, said, behold, master hath spared naaman syrian, receiving hands brought: but, [as] lord liveth, run him, take somewhat him. gehazi followed naaman. naaman saw [him] running him, lighted chariot meet him, said, [is] well? said, [is] well. master hath sent me, saying, behold, even come mount ephraim two young men sons prophets: give them, pray thee, talent silver, two changes garments. naaman said, content, take two talents. urged him, bound two talents silver two bags, two changes garments, laid [them] upon two servants; bare [them] him. came tower, took [them] hand, bestowed [them] house: let men go, departed. went in, stood master. elisha said unto him, whence [comest thou,] gehazi? said, thy servant went whither. said unto him, went mine heart [with thee,] man turned chariot meet thee? [is it] time receive money, receive garments, oliveyards, vineyards, sheep, oxen, menservants, maidservants? leprosy therefore naaman shall cleave unto thee, unto thy seed ever. went presence leper [as white] snow. sons prophets said unto elisha, behold now, place dwell thee strait us. let us go, pray thee, unto jordan, take thence every man beam, let us make us place there, may dwell. answered, go ye. one said, content, pray thee, go thy servants. answered, go. went them. came jordan, cut wood. one felling beam, axe head fell water: cried, said, alas, master! borrowed. man god said, fell it? shewed place. cut stick, cast [it] thither; iron swim. therefore said he, take [it] thee. put hand, took it. king syria warred israel, took counsel servants, saying, place [shall be] camp. man god sentunto king israel, saying, beware thou pass place; thither syrians come down. king israel sent place man god told warned of, saved there, twice. therefore heart king syria sore troubled thing; called servants, said unto them, ye shew us [is] king israel? one servants said, none, lord, king: elisha, prophet [is] israel, telleth king israel words thou speakest thy bedchamber. said, go spy [is,] may send fetch him. told him, saying, behold, [he is] dothan. therefore sent thither horses, chariots, great host: came night, compassed city about. servant man god risen early, gone forth, behold, host compassed city horses chariots. servant said unto him, alas, master! shall do? answered, fear not: [be] us [are] [be] them. elisha prayed, said, lord, pray thee, open eyes, may see. lord opened eyes young man; saw: and, behold, mountain [was] full horses chariots fire round elisha. came him, elisha prayed unto lord, said, smite people, pray thee, blindness. smote blindness according word elisha. elisha said unto them, [is] way, neither [is] city: follow me, bring man ye seek. led samaria. came pass, come samaria, elisha said, lord, open eyes [men,] may see. lord opened eyes, saw; and, behold, [they were] midst samaria. king israel said unto elisha, saw them, father, shall smite [them?] shall smite [them? ] answered, thou shalt smite [them:] wouldest thou smite thou hast taken captive thy sword thy bow? set bread water them, may eat drink, go master. prepared great provision them: eaten drunk, sent away, went master. bands syria came land israel. came pass this, ben-hadad king syria gathered host, went up, besieged samaria. great famine samaria: and, behold, besieged it, ass's head [sold] fourscore [pieces] silver, fourth part cab dove's dung five [pieces] silver. king israel passing upon wall, cried woman unto him, saying, help, lord, king. said, lord help thee, whence shall help thee? barnfloor, winepress? king said unto her, aileth thee? answered, woman said unto me, give thy son, may eat day, eat son morrow. boiled son, eat him: said unto next day, give thy son, may eat him: hath hid son. came pass, king heard words woman, rent clothes; passed upon wall, people looked, and, behold, [hepage 219 2 kings had] sackcloth within upon flesh. said, god also me, head elisha son shaphat shall stand day. elisha sat house, elders sat him; [the king] sent man him: ere messenger came him, said elders, see ye son murderer hath sent take away mine head? look, messenger cometh, shut door, hold fast door: [is] sound master's feet behind him? yet talked them, behold, messenger came unto him: said, behold, evil [is] lord; wait lord longer? elisha said, hear ye word lord; thus saith lord, morrow time [shall] measure fine flour [be sold] shekel, two measures barley shekel, gate samaria. lord whose hand king leaned answered man god, said, behold, [if] lord would make windows heaven, might thing be? said, behold, thou shalt see [it] thine eyes, shalt eat thereof. four leprous men entering gate: said one another, sit die? say, enter city, famine [is] city, shall die there: sit still here, die also. therefore come, let us fall unto host syrians: save us alive, shall live; kill us, shall die. rose twilight, go unto camp syrians: come uttermost part camp syria, behold, [there was] man there. lord made host syrians hear noise chariots, noise horses, [even] noise great host: said one another, lo, king israel hath hired us kings hittites, kings egyptians, come upon us. wherefore arose fled twilight, left tents, horses, asses, even camp [was,] fled life. lepers came uttermost part camp, went one tent, eat drink, carried thence silver, gold, raiment, went hid [it;] came again, entered another tent, carried thence [also,] went hid [it. ] said one another, well: day [is] day good tidings, hold peace: tarry till morning light, mischief come upon us: therefore come, may go tell king's household. came called unto porter city: told them, saying, came camp syrians, and, behold, [there was] man there, neither voice man, horses tied, asses tied, tents [were. ] called porters; told [it] king's house within. king arose night, said unto servants, shew syrians done us. know [be] hungry; therefore gone camp hide field, saying, come city, shall catch alive, get city. one servants answered said, let [some] take, pray thee, five horses remain, left city, (behold, [are] multitude israel left it: behold, [i say,] [are] even multitude israelites consumed:) let us send see. took therefore two chariot horses; king sent thehost syrians, saying, go see. went unto jordan: and, lo, way [was] full garments vessels, syrians cast away haste. messengers returned, told king. people went out, spoiled tents syrians. measure fine flour [sold] shekel, two measures barley shekel, according word lord. king appointed lord whose hand leaned charge gate: people trode upon gate, died, man god said, spake king came him. came pass man god spoken king, saying, two measures barley shekel, measure fine flour shekel, shall morrow time gate samaria: lord answered man god, said, now, behold, [if] lord make windows heaven, might thing be? said, behold, thou shalt see thine eyes, shalt eat thereof. fell unto him: people trode upon gate, died. spake elisha unto woman, whose son restored life, saying, arise, go thou thine household, sojourn wheresoever thou canst sojourn: lord hath called famine; shall also come upon land seven years. woman arose, saying man god: went household, sojourned land philistines seven years. came pass seven years' end, woman returned land philistines: went forth cry unto king house land. king talked gehazi servant man god, saying, tell me, pray thee, great things elisha hath done. came pass, telling king restored dead body life, that, behold, woman, whose son restored life, cried king house land. gehazi said, lord, king, [is] woman, [is] son, elisha restored life. king asked woman, told him. king appointed unto certain officer, saying, restore [was] hers, fruits field since day left land, even now. elisha came damascus; ben-hadad king syria sick; told him, saying, man god come hither. king said unto hazael, take present thine hand, go, meet man god, enquire lord him, saying, shall recover disease? hazael went meet him, took present him, even every good thing damascus, forty camels' burden, came stood him, said, thy son ben-hadad king syria hath sent thee, saying, shall recover disease? elisha said unto him, go, say unto him, thou mayest certainly recover: howbeit lord hath shewed shall surely die. settled countenance stedfastly, ashamed: man god wept. hazael said, weepeth lord? answered, know evil thou wilt unto children israel: strong holds wilt thou set fire, young men wilt thou slay sword, wilt dash children, rip women child. hazael said, what, [is] thy servant dog, great thing? elisha answered, lord hath shewed thou [shalt be] king syria. departed elisha, came master;2 kings page 220 said him, said elisha thee? answered, told [that ]thou shouldest surely recover. came pass morrow, took thick cloth, dipped [it] water, spread [it] face, died: hazael reigned stead. fifth year joram son ahab king israel, jehoshaphat [being] king judah, jehoram son jehoshaphat king judah began reign. thirty two years old began reign; reigned eight years jerusalem. walked way kings israel, house ahab: daughter ahab wife: evil sight lord. yet lord would destroy judah david servant's sake, promised give alway light, [and] children. days edom revolted hand judah, made king themselves. joram went zair, chariots him: rose night, smote edomites compassed about, captains chariots: people fled tents. yet edom revolted hand judah unto day. libnah revolted time. rest acts joram, did, [are] written book chronicles kings judah? joram slept fathers, buried fathers city david: ahaziah son reigned stead. twelfth year joram son ahab king israel ahaziah son jehoram king judah begin reign. two twenty years old [was] ahaziah began reign; (now joram kept ramoth-gilead, israel, hazael king syria. king joram returned healed jezreel wounds syrians given him, fought hazael king syria.) jehu said, minds, [then] let none go forth [nor] escape city go tell [it] jezreel. jehu rode chariot, went jezreel; joram lay there. ahaziah king judah come see joram. stood watchman tower jezreel, spied company jehu came, said, see company. joram said, take horseman, send meet them, let say, [is it] peace? went one horseback meet him, said, thus saith king, [is it] peace? jehu said, hast thou peace? turn thee behind me. watchman told, saying, messenger came them, cometh again. sent second horseback, came them, said, thus saith king, [is it] peace? jehu answered, hast thou peace? turn thee behind me. watchman told, saying, came even unto them, cometh again: driving like driving jehu son nimshi; driveth furiously. joram said, make ready. chariot made ready. joram king israel ahaziah king judah went out, chariot, went jehu, met portion naboth jezreelite. came pass, joram saw jehu, said, [is it] peace, jehu? answered, peace, long whoredoms thy mother jezebel witchcrafts [are so] many? joram turned hands, fled, said ahaziah, [there is] treachery, ahaziah. jehu drew bow full strength, smote jehoram arms, arrow went heart, sunk chariot. said [jehu] bidkar captain, take up, [and] cast portion field naboth jezreelite: remember that, thou rode together ahab father, lord laid burden upon him; surely seen yesterday blood naboth, blood sons, saith lord; requite thee plat, saith lord. therefore take [and] cast plat [of ground,] according word lord. ahaziah king judah saw [this,] fled way garden house. jehu followedpage 221 2 kings him, said, smite also chariot. [and so] going gur, [is] ibleam. fled megiddo, died there. servants carried chariot jerusalem, buried sepulchre fathers city david. eleventh year joram son ahab began ahaziah reign judah. jehu come jezreel, jezebel heard [of it;] painted face, tired head, looked window. jehu entered gate, said, [had] zimri peace, slew master? lifted face window, said, [is] side? who? looked two [or] three eunuchs. said, throw down. threw down: [some] blood sprinkled wall, horses: trode foot. come in, eat drink, said, go, see cursed [woman,] bury her: [is] king's daughter. went bury her: found skull, feet, palms [her] hands. wherefore came again, told him. said, [is] word lord, spake servant elijah tishbite, saying, portion jezreel shall dogs eat flesh jezebel: carcase jezebel shall dung upon face field portion jezreel; [so] shall say, [is] jezebel. ahab seventy sons samaria. jehu wrote letters, sent samaria, unto rulers jezreel, elders, brought ahab's [children,] saying, soon letter cometh you, seeing master's sons [are] you, [there are] chariots horses, fenced city also, armour; look even best meetest master's sons, set [him] father's throne, fight master's house. exceedingly afraid, said, behold, two kings stood him: shall stand? [was] house, [was] city, elders also, bringers [of children,] sent jehu, saying, thy servants, thou shalt bid us; make king: thou [that is] good thine eyes. wrote letter second time them, saying, ye [be] mine, [if] ye hearken unto voice, take ye heads men master's sons, come jezreel morrow time. king's sons, [being] seventy persons, [were] great men city, brought up. came pass, letter came them, took king's sons, slew seventy persons, put heads baskets, sent [them] jezreel. came messenger, told him, saying, brought heads king's sons. said, lay ye two heaps entering gate morning. came pass morning, went out, stood, said people, ye [be] righteous: behold, conspired master, slew him: slew these? know shall fall unto earth nothing word lord, lord spake concerning house ahab: lord hath done [that] spake servant elijah. jehu slew remained house ahab jezreel, great men, kinsfolks, priests, left none remaining. arose departed, came samaria. [and] [was] shearing house way, jehu met brethren ahaziah king judah, said, [are] ye? answered, [are] brethren ahaziah; go salute children king children queen. said, take alive. took alive, slew pit shearing house, [even] two forty men; neither left them. departed thence, lighted jehonadab son rechab [coming] meet him: saluted him, said him, thine heart right, heart [is] thy heart? jehonadab answered, is. be, give [me] thine hand. gave [him] hand; took chariot. said, come me, see zeal lord. made ride chariot. came samaria, slew remained unto ahab samaria, till destroyed him, according saying lord, spake elijah. jehu gathered people together, said unto them, ahab served baal little; [but] jehu shall serve much. therefore call unto prophets baal, servants, priests; let none wanting: great sacrifice [to do] baal; whosoever shall wanting, shall live. jehu [it] subtilty, intent might destroy worshippers baal. jehu said, proclaim solemn assembly baal. proclaimed [it. ] jehu sent israel: worshippers baal came, man left came not. came house baal; house baal full one end another. said unto [was] vestry, bring forth vestments worshippers baal. brought forth vestments. jehu went, jehonadab son rechab, house baal, said unto worshippers baal, search, look none servants lord, worshippers baal only. went offer sacrifices burnt offerings, jehu appointed fourscore men without, said, [if] men brought hands escape, [he letteth go,] life [shall be] life him. came pass, soon made end offering burnt offering, jehu said guard captains, go in, [and] slay them; let none come forth. smote edge sword; guard captains cast [them] out, went city house baal. brought forth images house baal, burned them. brake image baal, brake house baal, made draught house unto day. thus jehu destroyed baal israel. howbeit [from] sins jeroboam son nebat, made israel sin, jehu departed them, [to wit,] golden calves [were] bethel, [were] dan. lord said unto jehu, thou hast done well executing [that is] right mine eyes, [and] hast done unto house ahab according [was] mine heart, thy children fourth [generation] shall sit throne israel. jehu took heed walk law lord god israel heart: departed sins jeroboam, made israel sin.2 kings page 222 days lord began cut israel short: hazael smote coasts israel; hid him, [even] nurse, bedchamber athaliah, slain. hid house lord six years. athaliah reign land. seventh year jehoiada sent fetched rulers hundreds, captains guard, brought house lord, made covenant them, took oath house lord, shewed king's son. commanded them, saying, thing ye shall do; third part enter sabbath shall even keepers watch king's house; third part [shall be] gate sur; third part gate behind guard: shall ye keep watch house, broken down. two parts go forth sabbath, even shall keep watch house lord king. ye shall compass king round about, every man weapons hand: cometh within ranges, let slain: ye king goeth cometh in. captains hundreds according [things] jehoiada priest commanded: took every man men come sabbath, go sabbath, came jehoiada priest. captains hundreds priest give king david's spears shields, [were] temple lord. guard stood, every man weapons hand, round king, right corner temple left corner temple, [along] altar temple. brought forth king's son, put crown upon him, [gave him] testimony; went way horses came king's house: slain. jehoiada made covenant lord king people lord's people; king also people. people land went house baal, brake down; altars images brake pieces thoroughly, slew mattan priest baal altars. priest appointed officers house lord. took rulers hundreds, captains, guard, people land; brought king house lord, came way gate guard king's house. sat throne kings. people land rejoiced, city quiet: slew athaliah sword [beside] king's house. seven years old [was] jehoash began reign. seventh year jehu jehoash began reign; forty years reigned jerusalem. mother's name [was] zibiah beer-sheba. jehoash [that was] right sight lord days wherein jehoiada priest instructed him. high places taken away: people still sacrificed burnt incense high places. jehoash said priests, money dedicated things brought house lord, [even] money every one passeth [the account,] money every man set at, [and] money cometh man's heart bring house lord, let priests take [it] them, every man acquaintance: let repair breaches house, wheresoever breach shall found. [so, that] three twentieth year king jehoash priests repaired breaches house. king jehoash called jehoiada priest, [other] priests, said unto them, repair ye breaches house? therefore receive [more] money acquaintance, deliver breaches house. priests consented receive [more] money people, neither repair breaches house. jehoiada priest took chest, bored hole lid it, set beside altar, right side one cometh house lord: priests kept door put therein money [that was] brought house lord. [so,] saw [there was] much money chest, king's scribe high priest came up, put bags, told money found house lord. gave money, told, hands work, oversight house lord: laid carpenters builders, wrought upon house lord, masons, hewers stone, buy timber hewed stone repair breaches house lord, laid house repair [it. ] howbeit made house lord bowls silver, snuffers, basons, trumpets, vessels gold, vessels silver, money [that was] brought house lord: gave workmen, repaired therewith house lord. moreover reckoned men, whose hand delivered money bestowed workmen: dealt faithfully. trespass money sin money brought house lord: priests'. hazael king syria went up, foughtpage 223 2 kings gath, took it: hazael set face go jerusalem. jehoash king judah took hallowed things jehoshaphat, jehoram, ahaziah, fathers, kings judah, dedicated, hallowed things, gold [that was] found treasures house lord, king's house, sent [it] hazael king syria: went away jerusalem. rest acts joash, did, [are] written book chronicles kings judah? servants arose, made conspiracy, slew joash house millo, goeth silla. jozachar son shimeath, jehozabad son shomer, servants, smote him, died; buried fathers city david: amaziah son reigned stead. three twentieth year joash son ahaziah king judah jehoahaz son jehu began reign israel samaria, [and reigned] seventeen years. [that was] evil sight lord, followed sins jeroboam son nebat, made israel sin; departed therefrom. anger lord kindled israel, delivered hand hazael king syria, hand ben-hadad son hazael, [their] days. jehoahaz besought lord, lord hearkened unto him: saw oppression israel, king syria oppressed them. (and lord gave israel saviour, went hand syrians: children israel dwelt tents, beforetime. nevertheless departed sins house jeroboam, made israel sin, [but] walked therein: remained grove also samaria.) neither leave people jehoahaz fifty horsemen, ten chariots, ten thousand footmen; king syria destroyed them, made like dust threshing. rest acts jehoahaz, did, might, [are] written book chronicles kings israel? jehoahaz slept fathers; buried samaria: joash son reigned stead. thirty seventh year joash king judah began jehoash son jehoahaz reign israel samaria, [and reigned] sixteen years. [that was] evil sight lord; departed sins jeroboam son nebat, made israel sin: [but] walked therein. rest acts joash, did, might wherewith fought amaziah king judah, [are] written book chronicles kings israel? joash slept fathers; jeroboam sat upon throne: joash buried samaria kings israel. elisha fallen sick sickness whereof died. joash king israel came unto him, wept face, said, father, father, chariot israel, horsemen thereof. elisha said unto him, take bow arrows. took unto bow arrows. said king israel, put thine hand upon bow. heput hand [upon it:] elisha put hands upon king's hands. said, open window eastward. opened [it.] elisha said, shoot. shot. said, arrow lord's deliverance, arrow deliverance syria: thou shalt smite syrians aphek, till thou consumed [them. ] said, take arrows. took [them.] said unto king israel, smite upon ground. smote thrice, stayed. man god wroth him, said, thou shouldest smitten five six times; hadst thou smitten syria till thou hadst consumed [it:] whereas thou shalt smite syria [but] thrice. elisha died, buried him. bands moabites invaded land coming year. came pass, burying man, that, behold, spied band [of men;] cast man sepulchre elisha: man let down, touched bones elisha, revived, stood feet. hazael king syria oppressed israel days jehoahaz. lord gracious unto them, compassion them, respect unto them, covenant abraham, isaac, jacob, would destroy them, neither cast presence yet. hazael king syria died; ben- hadad son reigned stead. jehoash son jehoahaz took hand ben-hadad son hazael cities, taken hand jehoahaz father war. three times joash beat him, recovered cities israel. second year joash son jehoahaz king israel reigned amaziah son joash king judah. twenty five years old began reign, reigned twenty nine years jerusalem. mother's name [was] jehoaddan jerusalem. [that was] right sight lord, yet like david father: according things joash father did. howbeit high places taken away: yet people sacrifice burnt incense high places. came pass, soon kingdom confirmed hand, slew servants slain king father. children murderers slew not: according unto written book law moses, wherein lord commanded, saying, fathers shall put death children, children put death fathers; every man shall put death sin. slew edom valley salt ten thousand, took selah war, called name joktheel unto day. amaziah sent messengers jehoash, son jehoahaz son jehu, king israel, saying, come, let us look one another face. jehoash king israel sent amaziah king judah, saying, thistle [was] lebanon sent cedar [was] lebanon, saying, give thy daughter son wife: passed wild beast [was] lebanon, trode thistle. thou hast indeed smitten edom, thine heart hath lifted thee up: glory [of this,] tarry home: shouldest thou meddle [thy] hurt, thou shouldest fall, [even] thou, judah thee? amaziah would hear. therefore2 kings page 224 jehoash king israel went up; amaziah king judah looked one another face beth-shemesh, [belongeth] judah. judah put worse israel; fled every man tents. jehoash king israel took amaziah king judah, son jehoash son ahaziah, beth- shemesh, came jerusalem, brake wall jerusalem gate ephraim unto corner gate, four hundred cubits. took gold silver, vessels found house lord, treasures king's house, hostages, returned samaria. rest acts jehoash did, might, fought amaziah king judah, [are] written book chronicles kings israel?
