[that was] evil sight lord, kings israel him. came shalmaneser king assyria; hoshea became servant, gave presents. king assyria found conspiracy hoshea: sent messengers king egypt, brought present king assyria, [he done] year year: therefore king assyria shut up, bound prison. king assyria came throughout land, went samaria, besieged three years. ninth year hoshea king assyria took samaria, carried israel away assyria, placed halah habor [by] river gozan, cities medes. [so] was, children israel sinned lord god, brought land egypt, hand pharaoh king egypt, feared gods, walked statutes heathen, lord cast children israel, kings israel, made. children israel secretly [those] things [were] right lord god,2 kings page 226 built high places cities, tower watchmen fenced city. set images groves every high hill, every green tree: burnt incense high places, [did] heathen lord carried away them; wrought wicked things provoke lord anger: served idols, whereof lord said unto them, ye shall thing. yet lord testified israel, judah, prophets, [and by] seers, saying, turn ye evil ways, keep commandments [and] statutes, according law commanded fathers, sent servants prophets. notwithstanding would hear, hardened necks, like neck fathers, believe lord god. rejected statutes, covenant made fathers, testimonies testified them; followed vanity, became vain, went heathen [were] round them, [concerning] lord charged them, like them. left commandments lord god, made molten images, [even] two calves, made grove, worshipped host heaven, served baal. caused sons daughters pass fire, used divination enchantments, sold evil sight lord, provoke anger. therefore lord angry israel, removed sight: none left tribe judah only. also judah kept commandments lord god, walked statutes israel made. lord rejected seed israel, afflicted them, delivered hand spoilers, cast sight. rent israel house david; made jeroboam son nebat king: jeroboam drave israel following lord, made sin great sin. children israel walked sins jeroboam did; departed them; lord removed israel sight, said servants prophets. israel carried away land assyria unto day. king assyria brought [men] babylon, cuthah, ava, hamath, sepharvaim, placed [them] cities samaria instead children israel: possessed samaria, dwelt cities thereof. [so] beginning dwelling there, [that] feared lord: therefore lord sent lions among them, slew [some] them. wherefore spake king assyria, saying, nations thou hast removed, placed cities samaria, know manner god land: therefore hath sent lions among them, and, behold, slay them, know manner god land. king assyria commanded, saying, carry thither one priests ye brought thence; let go dwell there, let teach manner god land. one priests carried away samaria came dwelt bethel, taught fear lord. howbeit every nation made gods own, put [them] houses high places samaritans made, every nation cities wherein dwelt. men babylon made succoth-benoth, men cuth madenergal, men hamath made ashima, avites made nibhaz tartak, sepharvites burnt children fire adrammelech anammelech, gods sepharvaim. feared lord, made unto lowest priests high places, sacrificed houses high places. feared lord, served gods, manner nations carried away thence. unto day former manners: fear lord, neither statutes, ordinances, law commandment lord commanded children jacob, named israel; lord made covenant, charged saying, ye shall fear gods, bow them, serve them, sacrifice them: lord, brought land egypt great power stretched arm, shall ye fear, shall ye worship, shall ye sacrifice. statutes, ordinances, law, commandment, wrote you, ye shall observe evermore; ye shall fear gods. covenant made ye shall forget; neither shall ye fear gods. lord god ye shall fear; shall deliver hand enemies. howbeit hearken, former manner. nations feared lord, served graven images, children, children's children: fathers, unto day. came pass third year hoshea son elah king israel, [that] hezekiah son ahaz king judah began reign. twenty five years old began reign; reigned twenty nine years jerusalem. mother's name also [was] abi, daughter zachariah. [that was] right sight lord, according david father did. removed high places, brake images, cut groves, brake pieces brasen serpent moses made: unto days children israel burn incense it: called nehushtan. trusted lord god israel; none like among kings judah, [any] him. clave lord, [and] departed following him, kept commandments, lord commanded moses. lord him; [and] prospered whithersoever went forth: rebelled king assyria, served not. smote philistines, [even] unto gaza, borders thereof, tower watchmen fenced city. came pass fourth year king hezekiah, [was] seventh year hoshea son elah king israel, [that] shalmaneser king assyria came samaria, besieged it. end three years took it: [even] sixth year hezekiah, [is] ninth year hoshea king israel, samaria taken. king assyria carry away israel unto assyria, put halah habor [by] river gozan, cities medes: obeyed voice lord god, transgressed covenant, [and] moses servant lord commanded, would hear [them,] [them. ]page 227 2 kings fourteenth year king hezekiah sennacherib king assyria come fenced cities judah, took them. hezekiah king judah sent king assyria lachish, saying, offended; return me: thou puttest bear. king assyria appointed unto hezekiah king judah three hundred talents silver thirty talents gold. hezekiah gave [him] silver found house lord, treasures king's house. time hezekiah cut [the gold from] doors temple lord, [from] pillars hezekiah king judah overlaid, gave king assyria. king assyria sent tartan rabsaris rab-shakeh lachish king hezekiah great host jerusalem. went came jerusalem. come up, came stood conduit upper pool, highway fuller's field. called king, came eliakim son hilkiah, [was] household, shebna scribe, joah son asaph recorder. rab- shakeh said unto them, speak ye hezekiah, thus saith great king, king assyria, confidence wherein thou trustest? thou sayest, (but [they but] vain words,) [i have] counsel strength war. dost thou trust, thou rebellest me? now, behold, thou trustest upon staff bruised reed, [even] upon egypt, man lean, go hand, pierce it: pharaoh king egypt unto trust him. ye say unto me, trust lord god: [is] he, whose high places whose altars hezekiah hath taken away, hath said judah jerusalem, ye shall worship altar jerusalem? therefore, pray thee, give pledges lord king assyria, deliver thee two thousand horses, thou able thy part set riders upon them. wilt thou turn away face one captain least master's servants, put thy trust egypt chariots horsemen? come without lord place destroy it? lord said me, go land, destroy it. said eliakim son hilkiah, shebna, joah, unto rab-shakeh, speak, pray thee, thy servants syrian language; understand [it:] talk us jews' language ears people [are] wall. rab-shakeh said unto them, hath master sent thy master, thee, speak words? [hath he] [sent me] men sit wall, may eat dung, drink piss you. rab-shakeh stood cried loud voice jews language, spake, saying, hear word great king, king assyria: thus saith king, let hezekiah deceive you: shall able deliver hand: neither let hezekiah make trust lord, saying, lord surely deliver us, city shall delivered hand king assyria. hearken hezekiah: thus saith king assyria, make [an agreement] present, come me, [then] eat ye every man vine, every one fig tree, drink ye every one waters cistern: come take away land like land, land corn wine, land bread vineyards, land oil olive honey, ye may live, die: hearken unto hezekiah, persuadethyou, saying, lord deliver us. hath gods nations delivered land hand king assyria? [are] gods hamath, arpad? [are] gods sepharvaim, hena, ivah? delivered samaria mine hand? [are] among gods countries, delivered country mine hand, lord deliver jerusalem mine hand? people held peace, answered word: king's commandment was, saying, answer not. came eliakim son hilkiah, [was] household, shebna scribe, joah son asaph recorder, hezekiah [their] clothes rent, told words rab-shakeh. came pass, king hezekiah heard [it,] rent clothes, covered sackcloth, went house lord. sent eliakim, [was] household, shebna scribe, elders priests, covered sackcloth, isaiah prophet son amoz. said unto him, thus saith hezekiah, day [is] day trouble, rebuke, blasphemy: children come birth, [there is] strength bring forth. may lord thy god hear words rab-shakeh, king assyria master hath sent reproach living god; reprove words lord thy god hath heard: wherefore lift [thy] prayer remnant left. servants king hezekiah came isaiah. isaiah said unto them, thus shall ye say master, thus saith lord, afraid words thou hast heard, servants king assyria blasphemed me. behold, send blast upon him, shall hear rumour, shall return land; cause fall sword land. rab-shakeh returned, found king assyria warring libnah: heard departed lachish. heard say tirhakah king ethiopia, behold, come fight thee: sent messengers unto hezekiah, saying, thus shall ye speak hezekiah king judah, saying, let thy god thou trustest deceive thee, saying, jerusalem shall delivered hand king assyria. behold, thou hast heard kings assyria done lands, destroying utterly: shalt thou delivered? gods nations delivered fathers destroyed; [as] gozan, haran, rezeph, children eden [were] thelasar? [is] king hamath, king arpad, king city sepharvaim, hena, ivah? hezekiah received letter hand messengers, read it: hezekiah went house lord, spread lord. hezekiah prayed lord, said, lord god israel, dwellest [between] cherubims, thou art god, [even] thou alone, kingdoms earth: thou hast made heaven earth. lord, bow thine ear, hear: open, lord, thine eyes, see: hear words sennacherib, hath sent reproach living god. truth, lord, kings assyria2 kings page 228 destroyed nations lands, cast gods fire: [were] gods, work men's hands, wood stone: therefore destroyed them. therefore, lord god, beseech thee, save thou us hand, kingdoms earth may know thou [art] lord god, [even] thou only. isaiah son amoz sent hezekiah, saying, thus saith lord god israel, [that] thou hast prayed sennacherib king assyria heard. [is] word lord hath spoken concerning him; virgin daughter zion hath despised thee, [and] laughed thee scorn; daughter jerusalem hath shaken head thee. hast thou reproached blasphemed? hast thou exalted [thy] voice, lifted thine eyes high? [even] holy [one] israel. messengers thou hast reproached lord, hast said, multitude chariots come height mountains, sides lebanon, cut tall cedar trees thereof, [and] choice fir trees thereof: enter lodgings borders, [and into] forest carmel. digged drunk strange waters, sole feet dried rivers besieged places. hast thou heard long ago [how] done it, [and] ancient times formed it? brought pass, thou shouldest lay waste fenced cities [into] ruinous heaps. therefore inhabitants small power, dismayed confounded; [as] grass field, [as] green herb, [as] grass house tops, [as corn] blasted grown up. know thy abode, thy going out, thy coming in, thy rage me. thy rage thy tumult come mine ears, therefore put hook thy nose, bridle thy lips, turn thee back way thou camest. [shall be] sign unto thee, ye shall eat year things grow themselves, second year springeth same; third year sow ye, reap, plant vineyards, eat fruits thereof. remnant escaped house judah shall yet take root downward, bear fruit upward. jerusalem shall go forth remnant, escape mount zion: zeal lord [of hosts] shall this. therefore thus saith lord concerning king assyria, shall come city, shoot arrow there, come shield, cast bank it. way came, shall return, shall come city, saith lord. defend city, save it, mine sake, servant david's sake. came pass night, angel lord went out, smote camp assyrians hundred fourscore five thousand: arose early morning, behold, [were] dead corpses. sennacherib king assyria departed, went returned, dwelt nineveh. came pass, worshipping house nisroch god, adrammelech sharezer sons smote sword: escaped land armenia. esar- haddon son reigned stead. days hezekiah sick unto death. prophet isaiah son amoz came him, saidunto him, thus saith lord, set thine house order; thou shalt die, live. turned face wall, prayed unto lord, saying, beseech thee, lord, remember walked thee truth perfect heart, done [that is] good thy sight. hezekiah wept sore. came pass, afore isaiah gone middle court, word lord came him, saying, turn again, tell hezekiah captain people, thus saith lord, god david thy father, heard thy prayer, seen thy tears: behold, heal thee: third day thou shalt go unto house lord. add unto thy days fifteen years; deliver thee city hand king assyria; defend city mine sake, servant david's sake. isaiah said, take lump figs. took laid [it] boil, recovered. hezekiah said unto isaiah, [shall be] sign lord heal me, shall go house lord third day? isaiah said, sign shalt thou lord, lord thing hath spoken: shall shadow go forward ten degrees, go back ten degrees? hezekiah answered, light thing shadow go ten degrees: nay, let shadow return backward ten degrees. isaiah prophet cried unto lord: brought shadow ten degrees backward, gone dial ahaz. time berodach-baladan, son baladan, king babylon, sent letters present unto hezekiah: heard hezekiah sick. hezekiah hearkened unto them, shewed house precious things, silver, gold, spices, precious ointment, [all] house armour, found treasures: nothing house, dominion, hezekiah shewed not. came isaiah prophet unto king hezekiah, said unto him, said men? whence came unto thee? hezekiah said, come far country, [even] babylon. said, seen thine house? hezekiah answered, [the things] [are] mine house seen: nothing among treasures shewed them. isaiah said unto hezekiah, hear word lord. behold, days come, [is] thine house,and thy fathers laid store unto day, shall carried babylon: nothing shall left, saith lord. thy sons shall issue thee, thou shalt beget, shall take away; shall eunuchs palace king babylon. said hezekiah unto isaiah, good word lord thou hast spoken. said, [is it] [good,] peace truth days? rest acts hezekiah, might, made pool, conduit, brought water city, [are] written book chronicles kings judah? hezekiah slept fathers: manasseh son reigned stead. manasseh [was] twelve years old began reign, reigned fifty five years jerusalem.page 229 2 kings mother's name [was] hephzi-bah. [that was] evil sight lord, abominations heathen, lord cast children israel. built high places hezekiah father destroyed; reared altars baal, made grove, ahab king israel; worshipped host heaven, served them. built altars house lord, lord said, jerusalem put name. built altars host heaven two courts house lord. made son pass fire, observed times, used enchantments, dealt familiar spirits wizards: wrought much wickedness sight lord, provoke [him] anger. set graven image grove made house, lord said david, solomon son, house, jerusalem, chosen tribes israel, put name ever: neither make feet israel move land gave fathers; observe according commanded them, according law servant moses commanded them. hearkened not: manasseh seduced evil nations lord destroyed children israel. lord spake servants prophets, saying, manasseh king judah hath done abominations, [and] hath done wickedly amorites did, [were] him, hath made judah also sin idols: therefore thus saith lord god israel, behold, [am] bringing [such] evil upon jerusalem judah, whosoever heareth it, ears shall tingle. stretch jerusalem line samaria, plummet house ahab: wipe jerusalem [a man] wipeth dish, wiping [it,] turning [it] upside down. forsake remnant mine inheritance, deliver hand enemies; shall become prey spoil enemies; done [that was] evil sight,and provoked anger, since day fathers came forth egypt, even unto day. moreover manasseh shed innocent blood much, till filled jerusalem one end another; beside sin wherewith made judah sin, [that was] evil sight lord. rest acts manasseh, did, sin sinned, [are] written book chronicles kings judah? manasseh slept fathers, buried garden house, garden uzza: amon son reigned stead. amon [was] twenty two years old began reign, reigned two years jerusalem. mother's name [was] meshullemeth, daughter haruz jotbah. [that was] evil sight lord, father manasseh did. walked way father walked in, served idols father served, worshipped them: forsook lord god fathers, walked way lord. servants amon conspired him, slew king house. people land slew conspired kingamon; people land made josiah son king stead. rest acts amon did, [are] written book chronicles kings judah? buried sepulchre garden uzza: josiah son reigned stead. josiah [was] eight years old began reign, reigned thirty one years jerusalem. mother's name [was] jedidah, daughter adaiah boscath. [that was] right sight lord, walked way david father, turned aside right hand left. came pass eighteenth year king josiah, [that] king sent shaphan son azaliah, son meshullam, scribe, house lord, saying, go hilkiah high priest, may sum silver brought house lord, keepers door gathered people: let deliver hand doers work, oversight house lord: let give doers work [is] house lord, repair breaches house, unto carpenters, builders, masons, buy timber hewn stone repair house. howbeit reckoning made money delivered hand, dealt faithfully. hilkiah high priest said unto shaphan scribe, found book law house lord. hilkiah gave book shaphan, read it. shaphan scribe came king, brought king word again, said, thy servants gathered money found house, delivered hand work, oversight house lord. shaphan scribe shewed king, saying, hilkiah priest hath delivered book. shaphan read king. came pass, king heard words book law, rent clothes. king commanded hilkiah priest, ahikam son shaphan, achbor son michaiah, shaphan scribe, asahiah servant king's, saying, go ye, enquire lord me, people, judah, concerning words book found: great wrath lord kindled us, fathers hearkened unto words book, according unto written concerning us. hilkiah priest, ahikam, achbor, shaphan, asahiah, went unto huldah prophetess, wife shallum son tikvah, son harhas, keeper wardrobe; (now dwelt jerusalem college;) communed her. said unto them, thus saith lord god israel, tell man sent me, thus saith lord, behold, bring evil upon place, upon inhabitants thereof, [even] words book king judah hath read: forsaken me, burned incense unto gods, might provoke anger works hands; therefore wrath shall kindled place, shall quenched. king judah sent enquire lord, thus shall ye say him, thus saith lord god israel, [as touching] words thou2 kings page 230 hast heard; thine heart tender, thou hast humbled thyself lord, thou heardest spake place, inhabitants thereof, become desolation curse, hast rent thy clothes, wept me; also heard [thee,] saith lord. behold therefore, gather thee unto thy fathers, thou shalt gathered thy grave peace; thine eyes shall see evil bring upon place. brought king word again. king sent, gathered unto elders judah jerusalem. king went house lord, men judah inhabitants jerusalem him, priests, prophets, people, small great: read ears words book covenant found house lord. king stood pillar, made covenant lord, walk lord, keep commandments testimonies statutes [their] heart [their] soul, perform words covenant written book. people stood covenant. king commanded hilkiah high priest, priests second order, keepers door, bring forth temple lord vessels made baal, grove, host heaven: burned without jerusalem fields kidron, carried ashes unto bethel. put idolatrous priests, kings judah ordained burn incense high places cities judah, places round jerusalem; also burned incense unto baal, sun, moon, planets, host heaven. brought grove house lord, without jerusalem, unto brook kidron, burned brook kidron, stamped [it] small powder, cast powder thereof upon graves children people. brake houses sodomites, [were] house lord, women wove hangings grove. brought priests cities judah, defiled high places priests burned incense, geba beer-sheba, brake high places gates [were] entering gate joshua governor city, [were] man's left hand gate city. nevertheless priests high places came altar lord jerusalem, eat unleavened bread among brethren. defiled topheth, [is] valley children hinnom, man might make son daughter pass fire molech. took away horses kings judah given sun, entering house lord, chamber nathan- melech chamberlain, [was] suburbs, burned chariots sun fire. altars [were] top upper chamber ahaz, kings judah made, altars manasseh made two courts house lord, king beat down, brake [them] thence, cast dust brook kidron. high places [were] jerusalem, [were] right hand mount corruption, solomon king israel builded ashtoreth abomination zidonians, chemosh abomination moabites, formilcom abomination children ammon, king defile. brake pieces images, cut groves, filled places bones men. moreover altar [was] bethel, [and] high place jeroboam son nebat, made israel sin, made, altar high place brake down, burned high place, [and] stamped [it] small powder, burned grove. josiah turned himself, spied sepulchres [were] mount, sent, took bones sepulchres, burned [them] upon altar, polluted it, according word lord man god proclaimed, proclaimed words. said, title [is] see? men city told him, [it is] sepulchre man god, came judah, proclaimed things thou hast done altar bethel. said, let alone; let man move bones. let bones alone, bones prophet came samaria. houses also high places [were] cities samaria, kings israel made provoke [the lord] anger, josiah took away, according acts done bethel. slew priests high places [were] upon altars, burned men's bones upon them, returned jerusalem. king commanded people, saying, keep passover unto lord god, [it is] written book covenant. surely holden passover days judges judged israel, days kings israel, kings judah; eighteenth year king josiah, [wherein] passover holden lord jerusalem. moreover [workers with] familiar spirits, wizards, images, idols, abominations spied land judah jerusalem, josiah put away, might perform words law written book hilkiah priest found house lord. like unto king him, turned lord heart, soul, might, according law moses; neither arose [any] like him. notwithstanding lord turned fierceness great wrath, wherewith anger kindled judah, provocations manasseh provoked withal. lord said, remove judah also sight, removed israel, cast city jerusalem chosen, house said, name shall there. rest acts josiah, did, [are] written book chronicles kings judah? days pharaoh-nechoh king egypt went king assyria river euphrates: king josiah went him; slew megiddo, seen him. servants carried chariot dead megiddo, brought jerusalem, buried sepulchre. people land took jehoahaz son josiah, anointed him, made king father's stead.page 231 2 kings jehoahaz [was] twenty three years old began reign; reigned three months jerusalem. mother's name [was] hamutal, daughter jeremiah libnah. [that was] evil sight lord, according fathers done. pharaoh-nechoh put bands riblah land hamath, might reign jerusalem; put land tribute hundred talents silver, talent gold. pharaoh- nechoh made eliakim son josiah king room josiah father, turned name jehoiakim, took jehoahaz away: came egypt, died there. jehoiakim gave silver gold pharaoh; taxed land give money according commandment pharaoh: exacted silver gold people land, every one according taxation, give [it] unto pharaoh-nechoh. jehoiakim [was] twenty five years old began reign; reigned eleven years jerusalem. mother's name [was] zebudah, daughter pedaiah rumah. [that was] evil sight lord, according fathers done. days nebuchadnezzar king babylon came up, jehoiakim became servant three years: turned rebelled him. lord sent bands chaldees, bands syrians, bands moabites, bands children ammon, sent judah destroy it, according word lord, spake servants prophets. surely commandment lord came [this] upon judah, remove [them] sight, sins manasseh, according did; also innocent blood shed: filled jerusalem innocent blood; lord would pardon. rest acts jehoiakim, did, [are] written book chronicles kings judah? jehoiakim slept fathers: jehoiachin son reigned stead. king egypt came land: king babylon taken river egypt unto river euphrates pertained king egypt. jehoiachin [was] eighteen years old began reign, reigned jerusalem three months. mother's name [was] nehushta, daughter elnathan jerusalem. [that was] evil sight lord, according father done. time servants nebuchadnezzar king babylon came jerusalem, city besieged. nebuchadnezzar king babylon came city, servants besiege it. jehoiachin king judah went king babylon, he, mother, servants, princes, officers: king babylon took eighth year reign. carried thence treasures house lord, treasures king's house, cut pieces vessels gold solomon king israel made temple lord, lord said. carried away jerusalem, princes, mighty men valour, [even] ten thousand captives,and craftsmen smiths: none remained, save poorest sort people land. carried away jehoiachin babylon, king's mother, king's wives, officers, mighty land, [those] carried captivity jerusalem babylon. men might, [even] seven thousand, craftsmen smiths thousand, [that were] strong [and] apt war, even king babylon brought captive babylon. king babylon made mattaniah father's brother king stead, changed name zedekiah. zedekiah [was] twenty one years old began reign, reigned eleven years jerusalem. mother's name [was] hamutal, daughter jeremiah libnah. [that was] evil sight lord, according jehoiakim done. anger lord came pass jerusalem judah, cast presence, zedekiah rebelled king babylon. came pass ninth year reign, tenth month, tenth [day] month, [that] nebuchadnezzar king babylon came, he, host, jerusalem, pitched it; built forts round about. city besieged unto eleventh year king zedekiah. ninth [day] [fourth] month famine prevailed city, bread people land. city broken up, men war [fled] night way gate two walls, [is] king's garden: (now chaldees [were] city round about:) [the king] went way toward plain. army chaldees pursued king, overtook plains jericho: army scattered him. took king, brought king babylon riblah; gave judgment upon him. slew sons zedekiah eyes, put eyes zedekiah, bound fetters brass, carried babylon. fifth month, seventh [day] month, [is] nineteenth year king nebuchadnezzar king babylon, came nebuzar-adan, captain guard, servant king babylon, unto jerusalem: burnt house lord, king's house, houses jerusalem, every great [man's] house burnt fire. army chaldees, [were with] captain guard, brake walls jerusalem round about. rest people [that were] left city, fugitives fell away king babylon, remnant multitude, nebuzar-adan captain guard carry away. captain guard left poor land [to be] vinedressers husbandmen. pillars brass [were] house lord, bases, brasen sea [was] house lord, chaldees break pieces, carried brass babylon. pots, shovels, snuffers, spoons, vessels brass wherewith ministered, took away. firepans, bowls, [and] things [were] gold, [in] gold, silver, [in] silver, captain guard took away. two pillars, one sea, bases solomon made house lord;2 kings page 232 brass vessels without weight. height one pillar [was] eighteen cubits, chapiter upon [was] brass: height chapiter three cubits; wreathen work, pomegranates upon chapiter round about, brass: like unto second pillar wreathen work. captain guard took seraiah chief priest, zephaniah second priest, three keepers door: city took officer set men war, five men king's presence, found city, principal scribe host, mustered people land, threescore men people land [that were] found city: nebuzar- adan captain guard took these, brought king babylon riblah: king babylon smote them, slew riblah land hamath. judah carried away land. [as for] people remained land judah, nebuchadnezzar king babylon left, even made gedaliah son ahikam, son shaphan, ruler. captains armies, men, heard king babylon made gedaliah governor, came gedaliah mizpah, even ishmael son nethaniah, johanan son careah, seraiah son tanhumeth netophathite, jaazaniah son maachathite, men. gedaliah sware them, men, said unto them, fear servants chaldees: dwell land, serve king babylon; shall well you. came pass seventh month, ishmael son nethaniah, son elishama, seed royal, came, ten men him, smote gedaliah, died, jews chaldees mizpah. people, small great, captains armies, arose, came egypt: afraid chaldees. came pass seven thirtieth year captivity jehoiachin king judah, twelfth month, seven twentieth [day] month, [that] evil-merodach king babylon year began reign lift head jehoiachin king judah prison; spake kindly him, set throne throne kings [were] babylon; changed prison garments: eat bread continually days life. allowance [was] continual allowance given king, daily rate every day, days life.page 233 1 chronicles first book chronicles kenan, mahalaleel, jered, noah, shem, ham, japheth. sons japheth; [were] habitations, genealogy. meshobab, jamlech, joshah son amaziah, joel, jehu son josibiah, son seraiah, son asiel, elioenai, jaakobah, jeshohaiah, asaiah, adiel, jesimiel, benaiah, ziza son shiphi, son allon, son jedaiah, son shimri, son shemaiah; mentioned [their] names [were] princes families: house fathers increased greatly. went entrance gedor, [even] unto east side valley, seek pasture flocks. found fat pasture good, land [was] wide, quiet, peaceable; [they] ham dwelt old. written name came days hezekiah king judah, smote tents, habitations found there, destroyed utterly unto day, dwelt rooms: [there was] pasture flocks. [some] them, [even] sons simeon, five hundred men, went mount seir, captains pelatiah, neariah, rephaiah, uzziel, sons ishi. smote rest amalekites escaped, dwelt unto day. sons reuben firstborn israel, (for [was] firstborn; but, forasmuch defiled father's bed, birthright given unto sons ofjoseph son israel: genealogy reckoned birthright. judah prevailed brethren, [came] chief ruler; birthright [was] joseph's:) sons, [i say,] reuben firstborn israel [were,] hanoch, pallu, hezron, carmi. sons joel; shemaiah son, gog son, shimei son, micah son, reaia son, baal son, beerah son, tilgath-pilneser king assyria carried away [captive:] [was] prince reubenites. brethren families, genealogy generations reckoned, [were] chief, jeiel, zechariah, bela son azaz, son shema, son joel, dwelt aroer, even unto nebo baal-meon: eastward inhabited unto entering wilderness river euphrates: cattle multiplied [land] gilead. days saul made war hagarites, fell hand: dwelt tents throughout east land gilead. children gad dwelt them, land bashan unto salchah: joel chief, shapham next, jaanai, shaphat bashan. brethren house fathers [were,] michael, meshullam, sheba, jorai, jachan, zia, heber, seven. [are] children abihail son huri, son jaroah, son gilead, son michael, son jeshishai, son jahdo, son buz; ahi son abdiel, son guni, chief house fathers. dwelt gilead bashan, towns, suburbs sharon, upon borders. reckoned genealogies days jotham king judah, days jeroboam king israel. sons reuben, gadites, half tribe manasseh, valiant men, men able bear buckler sword, shoot bow, skilful war, [were] four forty thousand seven hundred threescore, went war. made war hagarites, jetur, nephish, nodab. helped them, hagarites delivered hand, [were] them: cried god battle, intreated them; put trust him. took away cattle; camels fifty thousand, sheep two hundred fifty thousand, asses two thousand, men hundred thousand. fell many slain, war [was] god. dwelt steads captivity. children half tribe manasseh dwelt land: increased bashan unto baal- hermon senir, unto mount hermon. [were] heads house fathers, even epher, ishi, eliel, azriel, jeremiah, hodaviah, jahdiel, mighty men valour, famous men, [and] heads house fathers. transgressed god fathers, went whoring gods people land, god destroyed them. god israel stirred spirit pul king assyria, spirit tilgath-pilneser king assyria, carried away, even reubenites, gadites, half tribe manasseh, brought unto halah, habor, hara, river gozan, unto day.1 chronicles page 236 sons levi; gershon, kohath, merari. sons kohath; amram, izhar, hebron, uzziel. children amram; aaron, moses, miriam. sons also aaron; nadab, abihu, eleazar, ithamar. eleazar begat phinehas, phinehas begat abishua, abishua begat bukki, bukki begat uzzi, uzzi begat zerahiah, zerahiah begat meraioth, meraioth begat amariah, amariah begat ahitub, ahitub begat zadok, zadok begat ahimaaz, ahimaaz begat azariah, azariah begat johanan, johanan begat azariah, (he [it is] executed priest's office temple solomon built jerusalem:) azariah begat amariah, amariah begat ahitub, ahitub begat zadok, zadok begat shallum, shallum begat hilkiah, hilkiah begat azariah, azariah begat seraiah, seraiah begat jehozadak, jehozadak went [into captivity,] lord carried away judah jerusalem hand nebuchadnezzar. sons levi; gershom, kohath, merari. [be] names sons gershom; libni, shimei. sons kohath [were,] amram, izhar, hebron, uzziel. sons merari; mahli, mushi. [are] families levites according fathers. gershom; libni son, jahath son, zimmah son, joah son, iddo son, zerah son, jeaterai son. sons kohath; amminadab son, korah son, assir son, elkanah son, ebiasaph son, assir son, tahath son, uriel son, uzziah son, shaul son. sons elkanah; amasai, ahimoth. [are] waited children. sons kohathites: heman singer, son joel, son shemuel, son elkanah, son jeroham, son eliel, son toah, son zuph, son elkanah, son mahath, son amasai, son elkanah, son joel, son azariah, son zephaniah, son tahath, son assir, son ebiasaph, son korah, son izhar, son kohath, son levi, son israel. brother asaph, stood right hand, [even] asaph son berachiah, son shimea, son michael, son baaseiah, son malchiah, son ethni, son zerah, son adaiah, son ethan, son zimmah, son shimei, son jahath, son gershom, son levi. brethren sons merari [stood] left hand: ethan son kishi, son abdi, son malluch, son hashabiah, son amaziah, son hilkiah, son amzi, son bani, son shamer, brethren also levites [were] appointed unto manner service tabernacle house god. aaron sons offered upon altar burnt offering, altar incense, [and appointed] work [place] holy, make atonement israel, according moses servant god commanded. [are] sons aaron; eleazar son, phinehas son, abishua son, bukki son, uzzi son, zerahiah son, meraioth son, amariah son, ahitub son, zadok son, ahimaaz son. [are] dwelling places throughout castles coasts, sons aaron, families kohathites: lot. gave hebron land judah, suburbs thereof round it. fields city, villages thereof, gave caleb son jephunneh. sons aaron gave cities judah, [namely,] hebron, [the city] refuge, libnah suburbs, jattir, eshtemoa, suburbs, hilen suburbs, debir suburbs, ashan suburbs, beth-shemesh suburbs: tribe benjamin; geba suburbs, alemeth suburbs, anathoth suburbs. cities throughout families [were] thirteen cities. unto sons kohath, [which were] left family tribe, [were cities given] half tribe, [namely, of] half [tribe] manasseh, lot, ten cities. sons gershom throughout families tribe issachar, tribe asher, tribe naphtali, tribe manasseh bashan, thirteen cities. unto sons merari [were given] lot, throughout families, tribe reuben, tribe gad, tribe zebulun, twelve cities. children israel gave levites [these] cities suburbs. gave lot tribe children judah, tribe children simeon, tribe children benjamin, cities, called [their] names. [the residue] families sons kohath cities coasts tribe ephraim. gave unto them, [of] cities refuge, shechem mount ephraim suburbs; [they gave] also gezer suburbs, jokmeam suburbs, beth- horon suburbs, aijalon suburbs, gath- rimmon suburbs: half tribe manasseh; aner suburbs, bileam suburbs, family remnant sons kohath. unto sons gershom [were given] family half tribe manasseh, golan bashan suburbs, ashtaroth suburbs: tribe issachar; kedesh suburbs, daberath suburbs, ramoth suburbs, anem suburbs: tribe asher; mashal suburbs, abdon suburbs, hukok suburbs, rehob suburbs: tribe naphtali; kedesh galilee suburbs, hammon suburbs, kirjathaim suburbs. unto rest children merari [were given] tribe zebulun. rimmon suburbs, tabor suburbs: side jordan jericho, east side jordan, [were given them] tribe reuben, bezerpage 237 1 chronicles wilderness suburbs, jahzah suburbs, kedemoth also suburbs, mephaath suburbs: tribe gad; ramoth gilead suburbs, mahanaim suburbs, heshbon suburbs, jazer suburbs. sons issachar [were,] tola, puah, jashub, shimrom, four. sons tola; uzzi, rephaiah, jeriel, jahmai, jibsam, shemuel, heads father's house, [to wit,] tola: [they were] valiant men might generations; whose number [was] days david two twenty thousand six hundred. sons uzzi; izrahiah: sons izrahiah; michael, obadiah, joel, ishiah, five: chief men. them, generations, house fathers, [were] bands soldiers war, six thirty thousand [men:] many wives sons. brethren among families issachar [were] valiant men might, reckoned genealogies fourscore seven thousand. (and daughter [was] sherah, built beth-horon nether, upper, uzzen-sherah.) rephah [was] son, also resheph, telah son, tahan son, laadan son, ammihud son, elishama son, non son, jehoshuah son. possessions habitations [were,] bethel towns thereof, eastward naaran, westward gezer, towns thereof; shechem also towns thereof, unto gaza towns thereof: borders children manasseh, beth-shean towns, taanach towns, megiddo towns, dor towns. dwelt children joseph son israel. sons asher; imnah, isuah, ishuai, beriah, serah sister. sons beriah; heber, malchiel, [is] father birzavith. heber begat japhlet, shomer, hotham, shua sister. sons japhlet; pasach, bimhal, ashvath. [are] children japhlet. sons shamer; ahi, rohgah, jehubbah, aram. sons brother helem; zophah, imna, shelesh, amal. sons zophah; suah, harnepher, shual, beri, imrah, bezer, hod, shamma shilshah, ithran, beera. sons jether; jephunneh, pispah, ara. sons ulla; arah, haniel, rezia. [are] sons benjamin. israel reckoned genealogies; and, behold, [were] written book kings israel judah, [who] carried away babylon transgression. first inhabitants [dwelt] possessions cities [were,] israelites, priests, levites, nethinims. jerusalem dwelt children judah, children benjamin, children ephraim, manasseh; uthai son ammihud, son omri, son imri, son bani, children pharez son judah. shilonites; asaiah firstborn, sons. sons zerah; jeuel, brethren, six hundred ninety. sons benjamin; sallu son meshullam, son hodaviah, son hasenuah, ibneiah son jeroham, elah son uzzi, son michri, meshullam son shephatiah, son reuel, son ibnijah; brethren, according generations, nine hundred fifty six. men [were] chief fathers house fathers. priests; jedaiah, jehoiarib, jachin, azariah son hilkiah, son meshullam, son zadok, son meraioth, son ahitub, ruler house god; adaiah son jeroham, son pashur, son malchijah, maasiai son adiel, son jahzerah, son meshullam, son meshillemith, son immer; brethren, heads house fathers, thousand seven hundred threescore; able men work service house god. levites; shemaiah son hasshub, son azrikam, son hashabiah, sons merari; bakbakkar, heresh, galal, mattaniah son micah, son zichri, son asaph; obadiah son shemaiah, son galal, son jeduthun, berechiah son asa, son elkanah, dwelt inthe villages netophathites. porters [were,] shallum, akkub, talmon, ahiman, brethren: shallum [was] chief; hitherto [waited] king's gate eastward: porters companies children levi. shallum son kore, son ebiasaph, son korah, brethren, house father, korahites, [were] work service, keepers gates tabernacle: fathers, [being] host lord, [were] keepers entry. phinehas son eleazar ruler time past, [and] lord [was] him. [and] zechariah son meshelemiah [was] porter door tabernacle congregation. [which were] chosen porters gates two hundred twelve. reckoned genealogy villages, david samuel seer ordain set office. children [had] oversight gates house lord, [namely,] house tabernacle, wards. four quarters porters, toward east, west, north, south. brethren, [which were] villages, [were] come seven days time time them. levites, four chief porters, [their] set office, chambers treasuries house god. lodged round house god, charge [was] upon them, opening thereof every morning [pertained] them. [certain] charge ministering vessels, bring tale. [some] also [were] appointed oversee vessels, instruments sanctuary, fine flour, wine, oil, frankincense, spices. [some] sons priests made ointment spices. mattithiah, [one] levites, [was] firstborn shallum korahite, set office things made pans. [other] brethren, sons kohathites, [were] shewbread, prepare [it] every sabbath. [are] singers, chief fathers levites, [who remaining] chambers [were] free: employed work day night. chief fathers levites [were] chief throughout generations; dwelt jerusalem. gibeon dwelt father gibeon, jehiel, whose wife's name [was] maachah: firstborn son abdon, zur, kish, baal, ner, nadab, gedor, ahio, zechariah, mikloth. mikloth begat shimeam. also dwelt brethren jerusalem, brethren. ner begat kish; jarah begat alemeth, azmaveth, zimri; zimri begat moza; moza begat binea; rephaiah son, eleasah son, azel son. azel six sons, whose names [are] these, azrikam, bocheru, ishmael, sheariah, obadiah, hanan: [were] sons azel. philistines fought israel; men israel fled philistines, fell slain mount gilboa. philistines followedpage 239 1 chronicles hard saul, sons; philistines slew jonathan, abinadab, malchi-shua, sons saul. battle went sore saul, archers hit him, wounded archers. said saul armourbearer, draw thy sword, thrust therewith; lest uncircumcised come abuse me. armourbearer would not; sore afraid. saul took sword, fell upon it. armourbearer saw saul dead, fell likewise sword, died. saul died, three sons, house died together. men israel [were] valley saw fled, saul sons dead, forsook cities, fled: philistines came dwelt them. came pass morrow, philistines came strip slain, found saul sons fallen mount gilboa. stripped him, took head, armour, sent land philistines round about, carry tidings unto idols, people. put armour house gods, fastened head temple dagon. jabesh-gilead heard philistines done saul, arose, valiant men, took away body saul, bodies sons, brought jabesh, buried bones oak jabesh, fasted seven days. saul died transgression committed lord, [even] word lord, kept not, also asking [counsel] [one had] familiar spirit, enquire [of it; ] enquired lord: therefore slew him, turned kingdom unto david son jesse. israel gathered david unto hebron, saying, behold, [are] thy bone thy flesh. moreover time past, even saul king, thou [wast] leddest broughtest israel: lord thy god said unto thee, thou shalt feed people israel, thou shalt ruler people israel, thou shalt ruler people israel. therefore came elders israel king hebron; david made covenant hebron lord; anointed david king israel, according word lord samuel. david israel went jerusalem, [is] jebus; jebusites [were,] inhabitants land. inhabitants jebus said david, thou shalt come hither. nevertheless david took castle zion, [is] city david. david said, whosoever smiteth jebusites first shall chief captain. joab son zeruiah went first up, chief. david dwelt castle; therefore called city david. built city round about, even millo round about: joab repaired rest city. david waxed greater greater: lord hosts [was] him. also [are] chief mighty men david had, strengthened kingdom, [and] israel, make king, according word lord concerning israel. [is] number mighty men david had; jashobeam, hachmonite, chief thecaptains: lifted spear three hundred slain [by him] one time. [was] eleazar son dodo, ahohite, [was one] three mighties. david pas-dammim, philistines gathered together battle, parcel ground full barley; people fled philistines. set midst [that] parcel, delivered it, slew philistines; lord saved [them] great deliverance. three thirty captains went rock david, cave adullam; host philistines encamped valley rephaim. david [was] hold, philistines' garrison [was] bethlehem. david longed, said, oh one would give drink water well bethlehem, [is] gate! three brake host philistines, drew water well bethlehem, [was] gate, took [it,] brought [it] david: david would drink [of] it, poured lord, said, god forbid me, thing: shall drink blood men put lives jeopardy? [the jeopardy of] lives brought it. therefore would drink it. things three mightiest. abishai brother joab, chief three: lifting spear three hundred, slew [them,] name among three. three, honourable two; captain: howbeit attained [first] three. benaiah son jehoiada, son valiant man kabzeel, done many acts; slew two lionlike men moab: also went slew lion pit snowy day. slew egyptian, man [great] stature, five cubits high; egyptian's hand [was] spear like weaver's beam; went staff, plucked spear egyptian's hand, slew spear. [things] benaiah son jehoiada, name among three mighties. behold, honourable among thirty, attained [first] three: david set guard. also valiant men armies [were,] asahel brother joab, elhanan son dodo bethlehem, shammoth harorite, helez pelonite, ira son ikkesh tekoite, abi-ezer antothite, sibbecai hushathite, ilai ahohite, maharai netophathite, heled son baanah netophathite, ithai son ribai gibeah, [that pertained] children benjamin, benaiah pirathonite, hurai brooks gaash, abiel arbathite, azmaveth baharumite, eliahba shaalbonite, sons hashem gizonite, jonathan son shage hararite, ahiam son sacar hararite, eliphal son ur, hepher mecherathite, ahijah pelonite, hezro carmelite, naarai son ezbai, joel brother nathan, mibhar son haggeri, zelek ammonite, naharai berothite, armourbearer joab son zeruiah, uriah hittite, zabad son ahlai, adina son shiza reubenite, captain reubenites, thirty him, hanan son maachah, joshaphat mithnite, uzzia ashterathite,1 chronicles page 240 shama jehiel sons hothan aroerite, jediael son shimri, joha brother, tizite, eliel mahavite, jeribai, joshaviah, sons elnaam, ithmah moabite, eliel, obed, jasiel mesobaite. [are] came david ziklag, yet kept close saul son kish: [were] among mighty men, helpers war. [they were] armed bows, could use right hand left [hurling] stones [shooting] arrows bow, [even] saul's brethren benjamin. chief [was] ahiezer, joash, sons shemaah gibeathite; jeziel, pelet, sons azmaveth; berachah, jehu antothite, ismaiah gibeonite, mighty man among thirty, thirty; jeremiah, jahaziel, johanan, josabad gederathite, eluzai, jerimoth, bealiah, shemariah, shephatiah haruphite, elkanah, jesiah, azareel, joezer, jashobeam, korhites, joelah, zebadiah, sons jeroham gedor. gadites separated unto david hold wilderness men might, [and] men war [fit] battle, could handle shield buckler, whose faces [were like] faces lions, [were] swift roes upon mountains; ezer first, obadiah second, eliab third, mishmannah fourth, jeremiah fifth, attai sixth, eliel seventh, jeremiah tenth, machbanai eleventh. [were] sons gad, captains host: one least [was] hundred, greatest thousand. [are] went jordan first month, overflown banks; put flight [them] valleys, [both] toward east, toward west. came children benjamin judah hold unto david. david went meet them, answered said unto them, ye come peaceably unto help me, mine heart shall knit unto you: [ye come] betray mine enemies, seeing [there is] wrong mine hands, god fathers look [thereon,] rebuke [it. ] spirit came upon amasai, [who was] chief captains, [and said,] thine [are we,] david, thy side, thou son jesse: peace, peace [be] unto thee, peace [be] thine helpers; thy god helpeth thee. david received them, made captains band. fell [some] manasseh david, came philistines saul battle: helped not: lords philistines upon advisement sent away, saying, fall master saul [the jeopardy of] heads. went ziklag, fell manasseh, adnah, jozabad, jediael, michael, jozabad, elihu, zilthai, captains thousands [were] manasseh. helped david band [of rovers:] [were] mighty men valour, captains host. [that] time day day came david help him, [it was] great host, like host god. [are] numbers bands [that were] ready armed war, [and] came david hebron, turn kingdom saul him, according word lord. children judah bare shield spear [were] six thousand eight hundred, ready armed war. children ofsimeon, mighty men valour war, seven thousand one hundred. children levi four thousand six hundred. jehoiada [was] leader aaronites, [were] three thousand seven hundred; zadok, young man mighty valour, father's house twenty two captains. children benjamin, kindred saul, three thousand: hitherto greatest part kept ward house saul. children ephraim twenty thousand eight hundred, mighty men valour, famous throughout house fathers. half tribe manasseh eighteen thousand, expressed name, come make david king. children issachar, [which men] understanding times, know israel ought do; heads [were] two hundred; brethren [were] commandment. zebulun, went forth battle, expert war, instruments war, fifty thousand, could keep rank: [they were] double heart. naphtali thousand captains, shield spear thirty seven thousand. danites expert war twenty eight thousand six hundred. asher, went forth battle, expert war, forty thousand. side jordan, reubenites, gadites, half tribe manasseh, manner instruments war battle, hundred twenty thousand. men war, could keep rank, came perfect heart hebron, make david king israel: rest also israel [were] one heart make david king. david three days, eating drinking: brethren prepared them. moreover nigh them, [even] unto issachar zebulun naphtali, brought bread asses, camels, mules, oxen, [and] meat, meal, cakes figs, bunches raisins, wine, oil, oxen, sheep abundantly: [there was] joy israel. david consulted captains thousands hundreds, [and] every leader. david said unto congregation israel, [it seem] good unto you, [that be] lord god, let us send abroad unto brethren every where, [that are] left land israel, [also] priests levites [which are] cities [and] suburbs, may gather unto us: let us bring ark god us: enquired days saul. congregation said would so: thing right eyes people. david gathered israel together, shihor egypt even unto entering hemath, bring ark god kirjath-jearim. david went up, israel, baalah, [that is,] kirjath- jearim, [belonged] judah, bring thence ark god lord, dwelleth [between] cherubims, whose name called [on it. ] carried ark god new cart house abinadab: uzza ahio drave cart. david israel played god [their] might, singing, harps, psalteries, timbrels, cymbals, trumpets. came unto threshingfloor chidon, uzza put forth hand hold ark; oxen stumbled. anger lord kindled uzza, smote him, putpage 241 1 chronicles hand ark: died god. david displeased, lord made breach upon uzza: wherefore place called perez-uzza day. david afraid god day, saying, shall bring ark god [home] me? david brought ark [home] city david, carried aside house obed- edom gittite. ark god remained family obed-edom house three months. lord blessed house obed-edom, had. hiram king tyre sent messengers david, timber cedars, masons carpenters, build house. david perceived lord confirmed king israel, kingdom lifted high, people israel. david took wives jerusalem: david begat sons daughters. [are] names [his] children jerusalem; shammua, shobab, nathan, solomon, ibhar, elishua, elpalet, nogah, nepheg, japhia, elishama, beeliada, eliphalet. philistines heard david anointed king israel, philistines went seek david. david heard [of it,] went them. philistines came spread valley rephaim. david enquired god, saying, shall go philistines? wilt thou deliver mine hand? lord said unto him, go up; deliver thine hand. came baal-perazim; david smote there. david said, god hath broken upon mine enemies mine hand like breaking forth waters: therefore called name place baal- perazim. left gods there, david gave commandment, burned fire. philistines yet spread abroad valley. therefore david enquired god; god said unto him, go them; turn away them, come upon mulberry trees. shall be, thou shalt hear sound going tops mulberry trees, [that] thou shalt go battle: god gone forth thee smite host philistines. david therefore god commanded him: smote host philistines gibeon even gazer. fame david went lands; lord brought fear upon nations. [david] made houses city david, prepared place ark god, pitched tent. david said, none ought carry ark god levites: hath lord chosen carry ark god, minister unto ever. david gathered israel together jerusalem, bring ark lord unto place, prepared it. david assembled children aaron, levites: sons kohath; uriel chief, brethren hundred twenty: sons merari; asaiah chief, brethren two hundred twenty: sons gershom; joel chief, brethren hundred thirty: sons elizaphan; shemaiah chief, brethren two hundred: sons hebron; eliel chief, brethren fourscore: sons uzziel; amminadab chief, brethren hundred twelve. david called zadok abiathar priests, levites, uriel, asaiah, joel, shemaiah, eliel, amminadab, said unto them, ye [are] chief fathers levites: sanctify yourselves, [both] ye brethren, ye may bring ark lord god israel unto [the place that] prepared it. ye [did it] first, lord god made breach upon us, sought due order. priests levites sanctified bring ark lord god israel. children levites bare ark god upon shoulders staves thereon, moses commanded according word lord. david spake chief levites appoint brethren [to be] singers instruments musick, psalteries harps cymbals, sounding, lifting voice joy. levites appointed heman son joel; brethren, asaph son berechiah; sons merari brethren, ethan son kushaiah; brethren second [degree,] zechariah, ben, jaaziel, shemiramoth, jehiel, unni, eliab, benaiah, maaseiah, mattithiah, elipheleh, mikneiah, obed-edom, jeiel, porters. singers, heman, asaph, ethan, [were appointed] sound cymbals brass; zechariah, aziel, shemiramoth, jehiel, unni, eliab, maaseiah, benaiah, psalteries alamoth; mattithiah, elipheleh, mikneiah, obed-edom, jeiel, azaziah, harps sheminith excel. chenaniah, chief levites, [was] song: instructed song, [was] skilful. berechiah elkanah [were] doorkeepers ark. shebaniah, jehoshaphat, nethaneel, amasai, zechariah, benaiah, eliezer, priests, blow trumpets ark god: obed- edom jehiah [were] doorkeepers ark. david, elders israel, captains thousands, went bring ark covenant lord house obed-edom joy. came pass, god helped levites bare ark covenant lord, offered seven bullocks seven rams. david [was] clothed robe fine linen, levites bare ark, singers, chenaniah master song singers: david also [had] upon ephod linen. thus israel brought ark covenant lord shouting, sound cornet, trumpets, cymbals, making noise psalteries harps. came pass, [as] ark covenant lord came city david, michal daughter saul looking window saw king david dancing playing: despised heart. brought ark god, set midst tent david pitched it: offered burnt sacrifices peace offerings god. david made end offering burnt offerings peace offerings, blessed people name lord. dealt every one israel, man woman, every one loaf bread, good piece flesh, flagon [of1 chronicles page 242 wine. ] appointed [certain] levites minister ark lord, record, thank praise lord god israel: asaph chief, next zechariah, jeiel, shemiramoth, jehiel, mattithiah, eliab, benaiah, obed-edom: jeiel psalteries harps; asaph made sound cymbals; benaiah also jahaziel priests trumpets continually ark covenant god. day david delivered first [this psalm] thank lord hand asaph brethren. give thanks unto lord, call upon name, make known deeds among people. sing unto him, sing psalms unto him, talk ye wondrous works. glory ye holy name: let heart rejoice seek lord. seek lord strength, seek face continually. remember marvellous works hath done, wonders, judgments mouth; ye seed israel servant, ye children jacob, chosen ones. [is] lord god; judgments [are] earth. ye mindful always covenant; word [which] commanded thousand generations; [even covenant] made abraham, oath unto isaac; hath confirmed jacob law, [and] israel [for] everlasting covenant, saying, unto thee give land canaan, lot inheritance; ye few, even few, strangers it. [when] went nation nation, [one] kingdom another people; suffered man wrong: yea, reproved kings sakes, [saying,] touch mine anointed, prophets harm. sing unto lord, earth; shew forth day day salvation. declare glory among heathen; marvellous works among nations. great [is] lord, greatly praised: also [is] feared gods. gods people [are] idols: lord made heavens. glory honour [are] presence; strength gladness [are] place. give unto lord, ye kindreds people, give unto lord glory strength. give unto lord glory [due] unto name: bring offering, come him: worship lord beauty holiness. fear him, earth: world also shall stable, moved. let heavens glad, let earth rejoice: let [men] say among nations, lord reigneth. let sea roar, fulness thereof: let fields rejoice, [is] therein. shall trees wood sing presence lord, cometh judge earth. give thanks unto lord; [he is] good; mercy [endureth] ever. say ye, save us, god salvation, gather us together, deliver us heathen, may give thanks thy holy name, [and] glory thy praise. blessed [be] lord god israel ever ever. people said, amen, praised lord. left ark covenant lord asaph brethren, minister ark continually, every day's work required: obed- edom brethren, threescore eight; obed- edom also son jeduthun hosah [to be] porters: zadok priest, brethren priests, tabernacle lord high place [was] gibeon, offer burnt offerings unto lord upon altar burnt offering continually morning evening, [to do] according written law lord, commanded israel; heman jeduthun, rest chosen, expressed name, give thanks lord, mercy [endureth] ever; heman jeduthun trumpets cymbals make sound, musical instruments god. sons jeduthun [were] porters. people departed every man house: david returned bless house. came pass, david sat house, david said nathan prophet, lo, dwell house cedars, ark covenant lord [remaineth] curtains. nathan said unto david, thine heart; god [is] thee. came pass night, word god came nathan, saying, go tell david servant, thus saith lord, thou shalt build house dwell in: dwelt house since day brought israel unto day; gone tent tent, [one] tabernacle [to another. ] wheresoever walked israel, spake word judges israel, commanded feed people, saying, ye built house cedars? therefore thus shalt thou say unto servant david, thus saith lord hosts, took thee sheepcote, [even] following sheep, thou shouldest ruler people israel: thee whithersoever thou hast walked, cut thine enemies thee, made thee name like name great men [are] earth. also ordain place people israel, plant them, shall dwell place, shall moved more; neither shall children wickedness waste more, beginning, since time commanded judges [to be] people israel. moreover subdue thine enemies. furthermore tell thee lord build thee house. shall come pass, thy days expired thou must go [to be] thy fathers, raise thy seed thee, shall thy sons; establish kingdom. shall build house, stablish throne ever. father, shall son: take mercy away him, took [it] [him] thee: settle mine house kingdom ever: throne shall established evermore. according words, according vision, nathan speak unto david. david king came sat lord, said, [am] i, lord god, [is] mine house, thou hast brought hitherto? [yet] small thing thine eyes, god; thou hast [also] spoken thy servant's house great come, hast regarded according estate man high degree, lord god. david [speak] thee honour thy servant? thou knowest thy servant. lord, thypage 243 1 chronicles servant's sake, according thine heart, hast thou done greatness, making known great things. lord, [there is] none like thee, neither [is any] god beside thee, according heard ears. one nation earth [is] like thy people israel, god went redeem [to be] people, make thee name greatness terribleness, driving nations thy people, thou hast redeemed egypt? thy people israel didst thou make thine people ever; thou, lord, becamest god. therefore now, lord, let thing thou hast spoken concerning thy servant concerning house established ever, thou hast said. let even established, thy name may magnified ever, saying, lord hosts [is] god israel, [even] god israel: [let] house david thy servant [be] established thee. thou, god, hast told thy servant thou wilt build house: therefore thy servant hath found [in heart] pray thee. now, lord, thou art god, hast promised goodness unto thy servant: therefore let please thee bless house thy servant, may thee ever: thou blessest, lord, [it shall be] blessed ever. came pass, david smote philistines, subdued them, took gath towns hand philistines. smote moab; moabites became david's servants, [and] brought gifts. david smote hadarezer king zobah unto hamath, went stablish dominion river euphrates. david took thousand chariots, seven thousand horsemen, twenty thousand footmen: david also houghed chariot [horses,] reserved hundred chariots. syrians damascus came help hadarezer king zobah, david slew syrians two twenty thousand men. david put [garrisons] syria- damascus; syrians became david's servants, [and] brought gifts. thus lord preserved david whithersoever went. david took shields gold servants hadarezer, brought jerusalem. likewise tibhath, chun, cities hadarezer, brought david much brass, wherewith solomon made brasen sea, pillars, vessels brass. tou king hamath heard david smitten host hadarezer king zobah; sent hadoram son king david, enquire welfare, congratulate him, fought hadarezer, smitten him; (for hadarezer war tou;) [with him] manner vessels gold silver brass. also king david dedicated unto lord, silver gold brought [these] nations; edom, moab, children ammon, philistines, amalek. moreover abishai son zeruiah slew edomites valley salt eighteen thousand. put garrisons edom; edomites became david's servants. thus lord preserved david whithersoever went. david reigned israel, executed judgment justice among people. joab son zeruiah host; jehoshaphat son ahilud, recorder. zadok son ahitub, abimelech son abiathar, [were] priests; shavsha scribe; benaiah son jehoiada [was] cherethites pelethites; sons david [were] chief king. came pass this, nahash king children ammon died, son reigned stead. david said, shew kindness unto hanun son nahash, father shewed kindness me. david sent messengers comfort concerning father. servants david came land children ammon hanun, comfort him. princes children ammon said hanun, thinkest thou david doth honour thy father, hath sent comforters unto thee? servants come unto thee search, overthrow, spy land? wherefore hanun took david's servants, shaved them, cut garments midst hard buttocks, sent away. went [certain,] told david men served. sent meet them: men greatly ashamed. king said, tarry jericho beards grown, [then] return. children ammon saw made odious david, hanun children ammon sent thousand talents silver hire chariots horsemen mesopotamia, syria-maachah, zobah. hired thirty two thousand chariots, king maachah people; came pitched medeba. children ammon gathered together cities, came battle. david heard [of it,] sent joab, host mighty men. children ammon came out, put battle array gate city: kings come [were] field. joab saw battle set behind, chose choice israel, put [them] array syrians. rest people delivered unto hand abishai brother, set [themselves] array children ammon. said, syrians strong me, thou shalt help me: children ammon strong thee, help thee. good courage, let us behave valiantly people, cities god: let lord [that is] good sight. joab people [were] drew nigh syrians unto battle; fled him. children ammon saw syrians fled, likewise fled abishai brother, entered city. joab came jerusalem. syrians saw put worse israel, sent messengers, drew forth syrians [were] beyond river: shophach captain host hadarezer [went] them. told david; gathered israel, passed jordan, came upon them, set [the battle] array them. david put battle array syrians, fought him. syrians fled israel; david slew syrians seven thousand [men fought in]1 chronicles page 244 chariots, forty thousand footmen, killed shophach captain host. servants hadarezer saw put worse israel, made peace david, became servants: neither would syrians help children ammon more. came pass, year expired, time kings go [to battle,] joab led forth power army, wasted country children ammon, came besieged rabbah. david tarried jerusalem. joab smote rabbah, destroyed it. david took crown king head, found weigh talent gold, [there were] precious stones it; set upon david's head: brought also exceeding much spoil city. brought people [were] it, cut [them] saws, harrows iron, axes. even dealt david cities children ammon. david people returned jerusalem. came pass this, arose war gezer philistines; time sibbechai hushathite slew sippai, [that was] children giant: subdued. war philistines; elhanan son jair slew lahmi brother goliath gittite, whose spear staff [was] like weaver's beam. yet war gath, man [great] stature, whose fingers toes [were] four twenty, six [on hand,] six [on foot:] also son giant. defied israel, jonathan son shimea david's brother slew him. born unto giant gath; fell hand david, hand servants. satan stood israel, provoked david number israel. david said joab rulers people, go, number israel beer- sheba even dan; bring number me, may know [it. ] joab answered, lord make people hundred times many [be:] but, lord king, [are] lord's servants? doth lord require thing? cause trespass israel? nevertheless king's word prevailed joab. wherefore joab departed, went throughout israel, came jerusalem. joab gave sum number people unto david. [they of] israel thousand thousand hundred thousand men drew sword: judah [was] four hundred threescore ten thousand men drew sword. levi benjamin counted among them: king's word abominable joab. god displeased thing; therefore smote israel. david said unto god, sinned greatly, done thing: now, beseech thee, away iniquity thy servant; done foolishly. lord spake unto gad, david's seer, saying, go tell david, saying, thus saith lord, offer thee three [things:] choose thee one them, may [it] unto thee. gad came david, said unto him, thus saith lord, choose thee either three years' famine; three months destroyed thy foes, sword thineenemies overtaketh [thee;] else three days sword lord, even pestilence, land, angel lord destroying throughout coasts israel. therefore advise thyself word shall bring sent me. david said unto gad, great strait: let fall hand lord; great [are] mercies: let fall hand man. lord sent pestilence upon israel: fell israel seventy thousand men. god sent angel unto jerusalem destroy it: destroying, lord beheld, repented evil, said angel destroyed, enough, stay thine hand. angel lord stood threshingfloor ornan jebusite. david lifted eyes, saw angel lord stand earth heaven, drawn sword hand stretched jerusalem. david elders [of israel, were] clothed sackcloth, fell upon faces. david said unto god, [is it] [that] commanded people numbered? even sinned done evil indeed; [as for] sheep, done? let thine hand, pray thee, lord god, me, father's house; thy people, plagued. angel lord commanded gad say david, david go up, set altar unto lord threshingfloor ornan jebusite. david went saying gad, spake name lord. ornan turned back, saw angel; four sons hid themselves. ornan threshing wheat. david came ornan, ornan looked saw david, went threshingfloor, bowed david [his] face ground. david said ornan, grant place [this] threshingfloor, may build altar therein unto lord: thou shalt grant full price: plague may stayed people. ornan said unto david, take [it] thee, let lord king [that is] good eyes: lo,i give [thee] oxen [also] burnt offerings, threshing instruments wood, wheat meat offering; give all. king david said ornan, nay; verily buy full price: take [that] [is] thine lord, offer burnt offerings without cost. david gave ornan place six hundred shekels gold weight. david built altar unto lord, offered burnt offerings peace offerings, called upon lord; answered heaven fire upon altar burnt offering. lord commanded angel; put sword sheath thereof. time david saw lord answered threshingfloor ornan jebusite, sacrificed there. tabernacle lord, moses made wilderness, altar burnt offering, [were] season high place gibeon. david could go enquire god: afraid sword angel lord. david said, [is] house lord god, [is] altar burnt offering israel. david commanded gather together strangers [were] land israel; set masonspage 245 1 chronicles hew wrought stones build house god. david prepared iron abundance nails doors gates, joinings; brass abundance without weight; also cedar trees abundance: zidonians tyre brought much cedar wood david. david said, solomon son [is] young tender, house [that is] builded lord [must be] exceeding magnifical, fame glory throughout countries: [therefore] make preparation it. david prepared abundantly death. called solomon son, charged build house lord god israel. david said solomon, son, me, mind build house unto name lord god: word lord came me, saying, thou hast shed blood abundantly, hast made great wars: thou shalt build house unto name, thou hast shed much blood upon earth sight. behold, son shall born thee, shall man rest; give rest enemies round about: name shall solomon, give peace quietness unto israel days. shall build house name; shall son, [will be] father; establish throne kingdom israel ever. now, son, lord thee; prosper thou, build house lord thy god, hath said thee. lord give thee wisdom understanding, give thee charge concerning israel, thou mayest keep law lord thy god. shalt thou prosper, thou takest heed fulfil statutes judgments lord charged moses concerning israel: strong, good courage; dread not, dismayed. now, behold, trouble prepared house lord hundred thousand talents gold, thousand thousand talents silver; brass iron without weight; abundance: timber also stone prepared; thou mayest add thereto. moreover [there are] workmen thee abundance, hewers workers stone timber, manner cunning men every manner work. gold, silver, brass, iron, [there is] number. arise [therefore,] doing, lord thee. david also commanded princes israel help solomon son, [saying, ] [is] lord god you? hath [not] given rest every side? hath given inhabitants land mine hand; land subdued lord, people. set heart soul seek lord god; arise therefore, build ye sanctuary lord god, bring ark covenant lord, holy vessels god, house built name lord. david old full days, made solomon son king israel. gathered together princes israel, priests levites. levites numbered age thirty years upward: number polls, man man, thirty eight thousand. which, twenty four thousand [were] set forward work house lord; six thousand [were] officers judges: moreover four thousand [were] porters; four thousandpraised lord instruments made, [said david,] praise [therewith. ] david divided courses among sons levi, [namely,] gershon, kohath, merari. gershonites [were,] laadan, shimei. sons laadan; chief [was] jehiel, zetham, joel, three. sons shimei; shelomith, haziel, haran, three. [were] chief fathers laadan. sons shimei [were,] jahath, zina, jeush, beriah. four [were] sons shimei. jahath chief, zizah second: jeush beriah many sons; therefore one reckoning, according [their] father's house. sons kohath; amram, izhar, hebron, uzziel, four. sons amram; aaron moses: aaron separated, sanctify holy things, sons ever, burn incense lord, minister unto him, bless name ever. [concerning] moses man god, sons named tribe levi. sons moses [were,] gershom, eliezer. sons gershom, shebuel [was] chief. sons eliezer [were,] rehabiah chief. eliezer none sons; sons rehabiah many. sons izhar; shelomith chief. sons hebron; jeriah first, amariah second, jahaziel third, jekameam fourth. sons uzziel; micah first, jesiah second. sons merari; mahli, mushi. sons mahli; eleazar, kish. eleazar died, sons, daughters: brethren sons kish took them. sons mushi; mahli, eder, jeremoth, three. [were] sons levi house fathers; [even] chief fathers, counted number names polls, work service house lord, age twenty years upward. david said, lord god israel hath given rest unto people, may dwell jerusalem ever: also unto levites; shall [more] carry tabernacle, vessels service thereof. last words david levites [were] numbered twenty years old above: office [was] wait sons aaron service house lord, courts, chambers, purifying holy things, work service house god; shewbread, fine flour meat offering, unleavened cakes, [that baked in] pan, fried, manner measure size; stand every morning thank praise lord, likewise even; offer burnt sacrifices unto lord sabbaths, new moons, set feasts, number, according order commanded unto them, continually lord: keep charge tabernacle congregation, charge holy [place,] charge sons aaron brethren, service house lord. [these are] divisions sons aaron.1 chronicles page 246 sons aaron; nadab, abihu, eleazar, ithamar. nadab abihu died father, children: therefore eleazar ithamar executed priest's office. david distributed them, zadok sons eleazar, ahimelech sons ithamar, according offices service. chief men found sons eleazar sons ithamar; [thus] divided. among sons eleazar [there were] sixteen chief men house [their] fathers, eight among sons ithamar according house fathers. thus divided lot, one sort another; governors sanctuary, governors [of house] god, sons eleazar, sons ithamar. shemaiah son nethaneel scribe, [one] levites, wrote king, princes, zadok priest, ahimelech son abiathar, [before] chief fathers priests levites: one principal household taken eleazar, [one] taken ithamar. first lot came forth jehoiarib, second jedaiah, third harim, fourth seorim, seventh hakkoz, eighth abijah, ninth jeshua, tenth shecaniah, eleventh eliashib, twelfth jakim, thirteenth huppah, fourteenth jeshebeab, fifteenth bilgah, sixteenth immer, seventeenth hezir, eighteenth aphses, nineteenth pethahiah, twentieth jehezekel, one twentieth jachin, two twentieth gamul, three twentieth delaiah, four twentieth maaziah. [were] princes tribes israel. david took number twenty years old under: lord said would increase israel like stars heavens. joab son zeruiah began number, finished not, fell wrath israel; neither number put account chronicles king david. king's treasures [was] azmaveth son adiel: storehouses fields, cities, villages, castles, [was] jehonathan son uzziah: work field tillage ground [was] ezri1 chronicles page 248 son chelub: vineyards shimei ramathite: increase vineyards wine cellars [was] zabdi shiphmite: olive trees sycomore trees [were] low plains [was] baal-hanan gederite: cellars oil [was] joash: herds fed sharon [was] shitrai sharonite: herds [that were] valleys [was] shaphat son adlai: camels also obil ishmaelite: asses [was] jehdeiah meronothite: flocks [was] jaziz hagerite. [were] rulers substance [was] king david's. also jonathan david's uncle counsellor, wise man, scribe: jehiel son hachmoni [was] king's sons: ahithophel [was] king's counsellor: hushai archite [was] king's companion: ahithophel [was] jehoiada son benaiah, abiathar: general king's army [was] joab. david assembled princes israel, princes tribes, captains companies ministered king course, captains thousands, captains hundreds, stewards substance possession king, sons, officers, mighty men, valiant men, unto jerusalem. david king stood upon feet, said, hear me, brethren, people: [as me,] [had] mine heart build house rest ark covenant lord, footstool god, made ready building: god said unto me, thou shalt build house name, thou [hast been] man war, hast shed blood. howbeit lord god israel chose house father king israel ever: hath chosen judah [to be] ruler; house judah, house father; among sons father liked make [me] king israel: sons, (for lord hath given many sons,) hath chosen solomon son sit upon throne kingdom lord israel. said unto me, solomon thy son, shall build house courts: chosen [to be] son, father. moreover establish kingdom ever, constant commandments judgments, day. therefore sight israel congregation lord, audience god, keep seek commandments lord god: ye may possess good land, leave [it] inheritance children ever. thou, solomon son, know thou god thy father, serve perfect heart willing mind: lord searcheth hearts, understandeth imaginations thoughts: thou seek him, found thee; thou forsake him, cast thee ever. take heed now; lord hath chosen thee build house sanctuary: strong, [it. ] david gave solomon son pattern porch, houses thereof, treasuries thereof, upper chambers thereof, inner parlours thereof, place mercy seat, pattern spirit, courts house lord, chambers round about, treasuries house god, treasuries dedicated things: also thecourses priests levites, work service house lord, vessels service house lord. [he gave] gold weight [things] gold, instruments manner service; [silver also] instruments silver weight, instruments every kind service: even weight candlesticks gold, lamps gold, weight every candlestick, lamps thereof: candlesticks silver weight, [both] candlestick, [also] lamps thereof, according use every candlestick. weight [he gave] gold tables shewbread, every table; [likewise] silver tables silver: also pure gold fleshhooks, bowls, cups: golden basons [he gave gold] weight every bason; [likewise silver] weight every bason silver: altar incense refined gold weight; gold pattern chariot cherubims, spread [their wings,] covered ark covenant lord. [this, said david,] lord made understand writing [his] hand upon me, [even] works pattern. david said solomon son, strong good courage, [it:] fear not, dismayed: lord god, [even] god, [will be] thee; fail thee, forsake thee, thou hast finished work service house lord. and, behold, courses priests levites, [even shall thee] service house god: [there shall be] thee manner workmanship every willing skilful man, manner service: also princes people [will be] wholly thy commandment. furthermore david king said unto congregation, solomon son, alone god hath chosen, [is yet] young tender, work [is] great: palace [is] man, lord god. prepared might house god gold [things made] gold, silver [things] silver, brass [things] brass, iron [things] iron, wood [things] wood; onyx stones, [stones] set, glistering stones, divers colours, manner precious stones, marble stones abundance. moreover, set affection house god, mine proper good, gold silver, [which] given house god, prepared holy house, [even] three thousand talents gold, gold ophir, seven thousand talents refined silver, overlay walls houses [withal: ] gold [things] gold, silver [things] silver, manner work [to made] hands artificers.
