[precious] stones found gave [them] treasure house lord, hand jehiel gershonite. people rejoiced, offered willingly, perfect heart offered willingly lord: davidpage 249 1 chronicles king also rejoiced great joy. wherefore david blessed lord congregation: david said, blessed [be] thou, lord god israel father, ever ever. thine, lord, [is] greatness, power, glory, victory, majesty: [that is] heaven earth [is thine;] thine [is] kingdom, lord, thou art exalted head all. riches honour [come] thee, thou reignest all; thine hand [is] power might; thine hand [it is] make great, give strength unto all. therefore, god, thank thee, praise thy glorious name. [am] i, [is] people, able offer willingly sort? things [come] thee, thine given thee. [are] strangers thee, sojourners, [were] fathers: days earth [are] shadow, [there is] none abiding. lord god, store prepared build thee house thine holy name [cometh] thine hand, [is] thine own. know also, god, thou triest heart, hast pleasure uprightness. me, uprightness mine heart willingly offered things: seen joy thy people, present here, offer willingly unto thee. lord god abraham, isaac, israel, fathers, keep ever imagination thoughts heart thy people, prepare heart unto thee: give unto solomon son perfect heart, keep thy commandments, thy testimonies, thy statutes, [these things,] build palace, made provision. david said congregation, bless lord god. congregation blessed lord god fathers, bowed heads, worshipped lord, king. sacrificed sacrifices unto lord, offered burnt offerings unto lord, morrow day, [even] thousand bullocks, thousand rams, [and] thousand lambs, drink offerings, sacrifices abundance israel: eat drink lord day great gladness. made solomon son david king second time, anointed [him] unto lord [to be] chief governor, zadok [to be] priest. solomon sat throne lord king instead david father, prospered; israel obeyed him. princes, mighty men, sons likewise king david, submitted unto solomon king. lord magnified solomon exceedingly sight israel, bestowed upon [such] royal majesty king israel. thus david son jesse reigned israel. time reigned israel [was] forty years; seven years reigned hebron, thirty three [years] reigned jerusalem. died good old age, full days, riches, honour: solomon son reigned stead. acts david king, first last, behold, [are] written book samuel seer, book nathan prophet, book gad seer, reign might, times went him, israel, kingdoms countries.page 251 2 chronicles second book chronicles solomon son david strengthened kingdom, lord god [was] him, magnified exceedingly. solomon spake unto israel, captains thousands hundreds, judges, every governor israel, chief fathers. solomon, congregation him, went high place [was] gibeon; tabernacle congregation god, moses servant lord made wilderness. ark god david brought kirjath-jearim [the place which] david prepared it: pitched tent jerusalem. moreover brasen altar, bezaleel son uri, son hur, made, put tabernacle lord: solomon congregation sought unto it. solomon went thither brasen altar lord, [was] tabernacle congregation, offered thousand burnt offerings upon it. night god appear unto solomon, said unto him, ask shall give thee. solomon said unto god, thou hast shewed great mercy unto david father, hast made reign stead. now, lord god, let thy promise unto david father established: thou hast made king people like dust earth multitude. give wisdom knowledge, may go come people: judge thy people, [that so] great? god said solomon, thine heart, thou hast asked riches, wealth, honour, life thine enemies, neither yet hast asked long life; hast asked wisdom knowledge thyself, thou mayest judge people, made thee king: wisdom knowledge [is] granted unto thee; give thee riches, wealth, honour, none kings [have been] thee, neither shall thee like. solomon came [from journey] high place [was] gibeon jerusalem, tabernacle congregation, reigned israel. solomon gathered chariots horsemen: thousand four hundred chariots, twelve thousand horsemen, placed chariot cities, king jerusalem. king made silver gold jerusalem [as plenteous] stones, cedar trees made sycomore trees [are] vale abundance. solomon horses brought egypt, linen yarn: king's merchants received linen yarn price. fetched up, brought forth egypt chariot six hundred [shekels] silver, horse hundred fifty: brought [horses] kings hittites, kings syria, means. solomon determined build house name lord, house kingdom. solomon told threescore ten thousand men bear burdens, fourscore thousand hew mountain, three thousand six hundred oversee them. solomon sent huram king tyre, saying, thou didst deal david father, didstsend cedars build house dwell therein, [even deal me. ] behold, build house name lord god, dedicate [it] him, [and] burn sweet incense, continual shewbread, burnt offerings morning evening, sabbaths, new moons, solemn feasts lord god. [is ordinance] ever israel. house build [is] great: great [is] god gods. able build house, seeing heaven heaven heavens cannot contain him? [am] then, build house, save burn sacrifice him? send therefore man cunning work gold, silver, brass, iron, purple, crimson, blue, skill grave cunning men [are] judah jerusalem, david father provide. send also cedar trees, fir trees, algum trees, lebanon: know thy servants skill cut timber lebanon; and, behold, servants [shall be] thy servants, even prepare timber abundance: house build [shall be] wonderful great. and, behold, give thy servants, hewers cut timber, twenty thousand measures beaten wheat, twenty thousand measures barley, twenty thousand baths wine, twenty thousand baths oil. huram king tyre answered writing, sent solomon, lord hath loved people, hath made thee king them. huram said moreover, blessed [be] lord god israel, made heaven earth, hath given david king wise son, endued prudence understanding, might build house lord, house kingdom. sent cunning man, endued understanding, huram father's, son woman daughters dan, father [was] man tyre, skilful work gold, silver, brass, iron, stone, timber, purple, blue, fine linen, crimson; also grave manner graving, find every device shall put him, thy cunning men, cunning men lord david thy father. therefore wheat, barley, oil, wine, lord hath spoken of, let send unto servants: cut wood lebanon, much thou shalt need: bring thee flotes sea joppa; thou shall carry jerusalem. solomon numbered strangers [were] land israel, numbering wherewith david father numbered them; found hundred fifty thousand three thousand six hundred. set threescore ten thousand [to be] bearers burdens, fourscore thousand [to be] hewers mountain, three thousand six hundred overseers set people work. solomon began build house lord jerusalem mount moriah, [the lord] appeared unto david father, place david prepared threshingfloor ornan jebusite. began build second [day] second month, fourth year reign. hearken unto prayer thy servant prayeth toward place. hearken therefore unto supplications thy servant, thy people israel, shall make toward place: hear thou thy dwelling place, [even] heaven; thou hearest, forgive. man sin neighbour, oath laid upon make swear, oath come thine altar house; send rain upon thy land, thou hast given unto thy people inheritance. dearth land, pestilence, blasting, mildew, locusts, caterpillers; enemies besiege cities land; whatsoever sore whatsoever sickness [there be: ] [then] prayer [or] supplication soever shall made man, thy people israel, every one shall know sore grief, shall spread forth hands house: hear thou heaven thy dwelling place, forgive, render unto every man according unto ways, whose heart thou knowest; (for thou knowest hearts children men:) may fear thee, walk thy ways, long live land thou gavest unto fathers. moreover concerning stranger, thy people israel, come far country thy great name's sake, thy mighty hand, thy stretched arm; people, called name, shall humble themselves, pray, seek face, turn wicked ways; hear heaven, forgive sin, heal land. mine eyes shall open, mine ears attent unto prayer [that made] place. chosen sanctified house, name may ever: mine eyes mine heart shall perpetually. thee, thou wilt walk me, david thy father walked, according commanded thee, shalt observe statutes judgments; stablish throne thy kingdom, according covenanted david thy father, saying, shall fail thee man [to be] ruler israel. ye turn away, forsake statutes commandments, set you, shall go serve gods, worship them; pluck roots land given them; house, sanctified name, cast sight, make [to be] proverb byword among nations. house, high, shall astonishment every one passeth it; shall say, hath lord done thus unto land, unto house? shall answered, forsook lord god fathers, brought forth land egypt, laid hold gods, worshipped them, served them: therefore hath brought evil upon them. came pass end twenty years, wherein solomon built house lord, house, cities huram restored solomon, solomon built them, caused children israel dwell there. solomon went hamath- zobah, prevailed it. built tadmor wilderness, store cities, built hamath. also built beth- horon upper, beth-horon nether, fenced cities, walls, gates, bars; [were] chief king solomon's officers, [even] two hundred fifty, bare rule people. solomon brought daughter pharaoh city david unto house built her: said, wife shall dwell house david king israel, [the places are] holy, whereunto ark lord hath come. solomon offered burnt offerings unto lord altar lord, built porch, even certain rate every day,page 255 2 chronicles offering according commandment moses, sabbaths, new moons, solemn feasts, three times year, [even] feast unleavened bread, feast weeks, feast tabernacles. appointed, according order david father, courses priests service, levites charges, praise minister priests, duty every day required: porters also courses every gate: david man god commanded. departed commandment king unto priests levites concerning matter, concerning treasures. work solomon prepared unto day foundation house lord, finished. house lord perfected. went solomon ezion-geber, eloth, sea side land edom. huram sent hands servants ships, servants knowledge sea; went servants solomon ophir, took thence four hundred fifty talents gold, brought [them] king solomon. queen sheba heard fame solomon, came prove solomon hard questions jerusalem, great company, camels bare spices, gold abundance, precious stones: come solomon, communed heart. solomon told questions: nothing hid solomon told not. queen sheba seen wisdom solomon, house built, meat table, sitting servants, attendance ministers, apparel; cupbearers also, apparel; ascent went house lord; spirit her. said king, [it was] true report heard mine land thine acts, thy wisdom: howbeit believed words, came, mine eyes seen [it:] and, behold, one half greatness thy wisdom told me: [for] thou exceedest fame heard. happy [are] thy men, happy [are] thy servants, stand continually thee, hear thy wisdom. blessed lord thy god, delighted thee set thee throne, [to be] king lord thy god: thy god loved israel, establish ever, therefore made thee king them, judgment justice. gave king hundred twenty talents gold, spices great abundance, precious stones: neither spice queen sheba gave king solomon. servants also huram, servants solomon, brought gold ophir, brought algum trees precious stones. king made [of] algum trees terraces house lord, king's palace, harps psalteries singers: none seen land judah. king solomon gave queen sheba desire, whatsoever asked, beside [that] brought unto king. turned, went away land, servants. weight gold came solomon one year six hundred threescore six talents gold; beside [that which] chapmen merchants brought. kings arabia governors thecountry brought gold silver solomon. king solomon made two hundred targets beaten gold: six hundred [shekels] beaten gold went one target. three hundred shields [made of] beaten gold: three hundred [shekels] gold went one shield. king put house forest lebanon. moreover king made great throne ivory, overlaid pure gold. [there were] six steps throne, footstool gold, [which were] fastened throne, stays side sitting place, two lions standing stays: twelve lions stood one side upon six steps. like made kingdom. drinking vessels king solomon [were of] gold, vessels house forest lebanon [were of] pure gold: none [were of] silver; [not] thing accounted days solomon. king's ships went tarshish servants huram: every three years came ships tarshish bringing gold, silver, ivory, apes, peacocks. king solomon passed kings earth riches wisdom. kings earth sought presence solomon, hear wisdom, god put heart. brought every man present, vessels silver, vessels gold, raiment, harness, spices, horses, mules, rate year year. solomon four thousand stalls horses chariots, twelve thousand horsemen; bestowed chariot cities, king jerusalem. reigned kings river even unto land philistines, border egypt. king made silver jerusalem stones, cedar trees made sycomore trees [are] low plains abundance. brought unto solomon horses egypt, lands. rest acts solomon, first last, [are] written book nathan prophet, prophecy ahijah shilonite, visions iddo seer jeroboam son nebat? solomon reigned jerusalem israel forty years. solomon slept fathers, buried city david father: rehoboam son reigned stead. rehoboam went shechem: shechem israel come make king. came pass, jeroboam son nebat, [was] egypt, whither fled presence solomon king, heard [it,] jeroboam returned egypt. sent called him. jeroboam israel came spake rehoboam, saying, thy father made yoke grievous: therefore ease thou somewhat grievous servitude thy father, heavy yoke put upon us, serve thee. said unto them, come unto three days. people departed. king rehoboam took counsel old men stood solomon father yet2 chronicles page 256 lived, saying, counsel give ye [me] return answer people? spake unto him, saying, thou kind people, please them, speak good words them, thy servants ever. forsook counsel old men gave him, took counsel young men brought him, stood him. said unto them, advice give ye may return answer people, spoken me, saying, ease somewhat yoke thy father put upon us? young men brought spake unto him, saying, thus shalt thou answer people spake unto thee, saying, thy father made yoke heavy, make thou [it] somewhat lighter us; thus shalt thou say unto them, little [finger] shall thicker father's loins. whereas father put heavy yoke upon you, put yoke: father chastised whips, [will chastise you] scorpions. jeroboam people came rehoboam third day, king bade, saying, come third day. king answered roughly; king rehoboam forsook counsel old men, answered advice young men, saying, father made yoke heavy, add thereto: father chastised whips, [will chastise you] scorpions. king hearkened unto people: cause god, lord might perform word, spake hand ahijah shilonite jeroboam son nebat. israel [saw] king would hearken unto them, people answered king, saying, portion david? [we have] none inheritance son jesse: every man tents, israel: [and] now, david, see thine house. israel went tents. [as for] children israel dwelt cities judah, rehoboam reigned them. king rehoboam sent hadoram [was] tribute; children israel stoned stones, died. king rehoboam made speed get [his] chariot, flee jerusalem. israel rebelled house david unto day. rehoboam come jerusalem, gathered house judah benjamin hundred fourscore thousand chosen [men,] warriors, fight israel, might bring kingdom rehoboam. word lord came shemaiah man god, saying, speak unto rehoboam son solomon, king judah, israel judah benjamin, saying, thus saith lord, ye shall go up, fight brethren: return every man house: thing done me. obeyed words lord, returned going jeroboam. rehoboam dwelt jerusalem, built cities defence judah. built even bethlehem, etam, tekoa, beth-zur, shoco, adullam, gath, mareshah, ziph, zorah, aijalon, hebron, [are] judah benjamin fenced cities. fortified strong holds, put captains them, store victual, oil wine. every several city [he put] shields spears, made exceeding strong, judah benjamin side. priests levites [were] israel resorted coasts. levites left suburbs possession, came judah jerusalem: jeroboam sons cast executing priest's office unto lord: ordained priests high places, devils, calves made. tribes israel set hearts seek lord god israel came jerusalem, sacrifice unto lord god fathers. strengthened kingdom judah, made rehoboam son solomon strong, three years: three years walked way david solomon. rehoboam took mahalath daughter jerimoth son david wife, [and] abihail daughter eliab son jesse; bare children; jeush, shamariah, zaham. took maachah daughter absalom; bare abijah, attai, ziza, shelomith. rehoboam loved maachah daughter absalom wives concubines: (for took eighteen wives, threescore concubines; begat twenty eight sons, threescore daughters.) rehoboam made abijah son maachah chief, ruler among brethren: [he thought] make king. dealt wisely, dispersed children throughout countries judah benjamin, unto every fenced city: gave victual abundance. desired many wives. came pass, rehoboam established kingdom, strengthened himself, forsook law lord, israel him. came pass, [that] fifth year king rehoboam shishak king egypt came jerusalem, transgressed lord, twelve hundred chariots, threescore thousand horsemen: people [were] without number came egypt; lubim, sukkiims, ethiopians. took fenced cities [pertained] judah, came jerusalem. came shemaiah prophet rehoboam, [to] princes judah, gathered together jerusalem shishak, said unto them, thus saith lord, ye forsaken me, therefore also left hand shishak. whereupon princes israel king humbled themselves; said, lord [is] righteous. lord saw humbled themselves, word lord came shemaiah, saying, humbled themselves; [therefore] destroy them, grant deliverance; wrath shall poured upon jerusalem hand shishak. nevertheless shall servants; may know service, service kingdoms countries. shishak king egypt came jerusalem, took away treasures house lord, treasures king's house; took all: carried away also shields gold solomon made. instead king rehoboam made shields brass, committed [them] hands chief guard, kept entrance king's house. king entered house lord, guard came fetched them, brought guard chamber. humbled himself, wrath lord turnedpage 257 2 chronicles would destroy [him] altogether: also judah things went well. king rehoboam strengthened jerusalem, reigned: rehoboam [was] one forty years old began reign, reigned seventeen years jerusalem, city lord chosen tribes israel, put name there. mother's name [was] naamah ammonitess. evil, prepared heart seek lord. acts rehoboam, first last, [are] written book shemaiah prophet, iddo seer concerning genealogies? [there were] wars rehoboam jeroboam continually. rehoboam slept fathers, buried city david: abijah son reigned stead. eighteenth year king jeroboam began abijah reign judah. reigned three years jerusalem. mother's name also [was] michaiah daughter uriel gibeah. war abijah jeroboam. abijah set battle array army valiant men war, [even] four hundred thousand chosen men: jeroboam also set battle array eight hundred thousand chosen men, [being] mighty men valour. abijah stood upon mount zemaraim, [is] mount ephraim, said, hear me, thou jeroboam, israel; ought ye know lord god israel gave kingdom israel david ever, [even] sons covenant salt? yet jeroboam son nebat, servant solomon son david, risen up, hath rebelled lord. gathered unto vain men, children belial, strengthened rehoboam son solomon, rehoboam young tenderhearted, could withstand them. ye think withstand kingdom lord hand sons david; ye [be] great multitude, [there are] golden calves, jeroboam made gods. ye cast priests lord, sons aaron, levites, made priests manner nations [other] lands? whosoever cometh consecrate young bullock seven rams, [the same] may priest [them are] gods. us, lord [is] god, forsaken him; priests, minister unto lord, [are] sons aaron, levites [wait] upon [their] business: burn unto lord every morning every evening burnt sacrifices sweet incense: shewbread also [set order] upon pure table; candlestick gold lamps thereof, burn every evening: keep charge lord god; ye forsaken him. and, behold, god us [our] captain, priests sounding trumpets cry alarm you. children israel, fight ye lord god fathers; ye shall prosper. jeroboam caused ambushment come behind them: judah, ambushment [was] behind them. judah looked back, behold, battle [was] behind: cried unto lord, priests sounded trumpets. men judah gave shout: men judah shouted, came pass, godsmote jeroboam israel abijah judah. children israel fled judah: god delivered hand. abijah people slew great slaughter: fell slain israel five hundred thousand chosen men. thus children israel brought time, children judah prevailed, relied upon lord god fathers. abijah pursued jeroboam, took cities him, bethel towns thereof, jeshanah towns thereof, ephrain towns thereof. neither jeroboam recover strength days abijah: lord struck him, died. abijah waxed mighty, married fourteen wives, begat twenty two sons, sixteen daughters. rest acts abijah, ways, sayings, [are] written story prophet iddo. abijah slept fathers, buried city david: asa son reigned stead. days land quiet ten years. asa [that was] good right eyes lord god: took away altars strange [gods,] high places, brake images, cut groves: commanded judah seek lord god fathers, law commandment. also took away cities judah high places images: kingdom quiet him. built fenced cities judah: land rest, war years; lord given rest. therefore said unto judah, let us build cities, make [them] walls, towers, gates, bars, [while] land [is] yet us; sought lord god, sought [him,] hath given us rest every side. built prospered. asa army [of men] bare targets spears, judah three hundred thousand; benjamin, bare shields drew bows, two hundred fourscore thousand: [were] mighty men valour. came zerah ethiopian host thousand thousand, three hundred chariots; came unto mareshah. asa went him, set battle array valley zephathah mareshah. asa cried unto lord god, said, lord, [it is] nothing thee help, whether many, power: help us, lord god; rest thee, thy name go multitude. lord, thou [art] god; let man prevail thee. lord smote ethiopians asa judah; ethiopians fled. asa people [were] pursued unto gerar: ethiopians overthrown, could recover themselves; destroyed lord, host; carried away much spoil. smote cities round gerar; fear lord came upon them: spoiled cities; exceeding much spoil them. smote also tents cattle, carried away sheep camels abundance, returned jerusalem. spirit god came upon azariah son2 chronicles page 258 oded: went meet asa, said unto him, hear ye me, asa, judah benjamin; lord [is] you, ye him; ye seek him, found you; ye forsake him, forsake you. long season israel [hath been] without true god, without teaching priest, without law. trouble turn unto lord god israel, sought him, found them. times [there was] peace went out, came in, great vexations [were] upon inhabitants countries. nation destroyed nation, city city: god vex adversity. ye strong therefore, let hands weak: work shall rewarded. asa heard words, prophecy oded prophet, took courage, put away abominable idols land judah benjamin, cities taken mount ephraim, renewed altar lord, [was] porch lord. gathered judah benjamin, strangers ephraim manasseh, simeon: fell israel abundance, saw lord god [was] him. gathered together jerusalem third month, fifteenth year reign asa. offered unto lord time, spoil [which] brought, seven hundred oxen seven thousand sheep. entered covenant seek lord god fathers heart soul; whosoever would seek lord god israel put death, whether small great, whether man woman. sware unto lord loud voice, shouting, trumpets, cornets. judah rejoiced oath: sworn heart, sought whole desire; found them: lord gave rest round about. also [concerning] maachah mother asa king, removed [being] queen, made idol grove: asa cut idol, stamped [it,] burnt [it] brook kidron. high places taken away israel: nevertheless heart asa perfect days. brought house god things father dedicated, dedicated, silver, gold, vessels. [more] war unto five thirtieth year reign asa. six thirtieth year reign asa baasha king israel came judah, built ramah, intent might let none go come asa king judah. asa brought silver gold treasures house lord king's house, sent ben-hadad king syria, dwelt damascus, saying, [there is] league thee, [there was] father thy father: behold, sent thee silver gold; go, break thy league baasha king israel, may depart me. ben- hadad hearkened unto king asa, sent captains armies cities israel; smote ijon, dan, abel- maim, store cities naphtali. came pass, baasha heard [it,] left building ramah, let work cease. asathe king took judah; carried away stones ramah, timber thereof, wherewith baasha building; built therewith geba mizpah. time hanani seer came asa king judah, said unto him, thou hast relied king syria, relied lord thy god, therefore host king syria escaped thine hand. ethiopians lubims huge host, many chariots horsemen? yet, thou didst rely lord, delivered thine hand. eyes lord run fro throughout whole earth, shew strong behalf [them] whose heart [is] perfect toward him. herein thou hast done foolishly: therefore henceforth thou shalt wars. asa wroth seer, put prison house; [he was] rage [thing.] asa oppressed [some] people time. and, behold, acts asa, first last, lo, [are] written book kings judah israel. asa thirty ninth year reign diseased feet, disease [was] exceeding [great:] yet disease sought lord, physicians. asa slept fathers, died one fortieth year reign. buried sepulchres, made city david, laid bed filled sweet odours divers kinds [of spices] prepared apothecaries' art: made great burning him. jehoshaphat son reigned stead, strengthened israel. placed forces fenced cities judah, set garrisons land judah, cities ephraim, asa father taken. lord jehoshaphat, walked first ways father david, sought unto baalim; sought [lord] god father, walked commandments, doings israel. therefore lord stablished kingdom hand; judah brought jehoshaphat presents; riches honour abundance. heart lifted ways lord: moreover took away high places groves judah. also third year reign sent princes, [even] ben-hail, obadiah, zechariah, nethaneel, michaiah, teach cities judah. [he sent] levites, [even] shemaiah, nethaniah, zebadiah, asahel, shemiramoth, jehonathan, adonijah, tobijah, tob-adonijah, levites; elishama jehoram, priests. taught judah, [had] book law lord them, went throughout cities judah, taught people. fear lord fell upon kingdoms lands [were] round judah, made war jehoshaphat. also [some] philistines brought jehoshaphat presents, tribute silver; arabians brought flocks, seven thousand seven hundred rams, seven thousand seven hundred goats.page 259 2 chronicles jehoshaphat waxed great exceedingly; built judah castles, cities store. much business cities judah: men war, mighty men valour, [were] jerusalem. [are] numbers according house fathers: judah, captains thousands; adnah chief, mighty men valour three hundred thousand. next [was] jehohanan captain, two hundred fourscore thousand. next [was] amasiah son zichri, willingly offered unto lord; two hundred thousand mighty men valour. benjamin; eliada mighty man valour, armed men bow shield two hundred thousand. next [was] jehozabad, hundred fourscore thousand ready prepared war. waited king, beside [those] king put fenced cities throughout judah. jehoshaphat riches honour abundance, joined affinity ahab. [certain] years went ahab samaria. ahab killed sheep oxen abundance, people [he had] him, persuaded go [with him] ramoth-gilead. ahab king israel said unto jehoshaphat king judah, wilt thou go ramoth-gilead? answered him, [am] thou [art,] people thy people; [we be] thee war. jehoshaphat said unto king israel, enquire, pray thee, word lord day. therefore king israel gathered together prophets four hundred men, said unto them, shall go ramoth-gilead battle, shall forbear? said, go up; god deliver [it] king's hand. jehoshaphat said, [is there] prophet lord besides, might enquire him? king israel said unto jehoshaphat, [there is] yet one man, may enquire lord: hate him; never prophesied good unto me, always evil: micaiah son imla. jehoshaphat said, let king say so. king israel called one [of his] officers, said, fetch quickly micaiah son imla. king israel jehoshaphat king judah sat either throne, clothed [their] robes, sat void place entering gate samaria; prophets prophesied them. zedekiah son chenaanah made horns iron, said, thus saith lord, thou shalt push syria consumed. prophets prophesied so, saying, go ramoth-gilead, prosper: lord shall deliver [it] hand king. messenger went call micaiah spake him, saying, behold, words prophets [declare] good king one assent; let thy word therefore, pray thee, like one theirs, speak thou good. micaiah said, [as] lord liveth, even god saith, speak. come king, king said unto him, micaiah, shall go ramoth-gilead battle, shall forbear? said, go ye up, prosper, shall delivered hand. king said him, many times shall adjure thee thou say nothing truth name lord? said, see israel scattered upon mountains, sheep shepherd: lord said, master; let return [therefore] every man house peace. king israel said jehoshaphat, tell thee [that] would prophesy good unto me, evil? said, therefore hear word lord; saw lord sitting upon throne, host heaven standing right hand [on] left. lord said, shall entice ahab king israel, may go fall ramoth-gilead? one spake saying manner, another saying manner. came spirit, stood lord, said, entice him. lord said unto him, wherewith? said, go out, lying spirit mouth prophets. [the lord] said, thou shalt entice [him,] thou shalt also prevail: go out, [even] so. therefore, behold, lord hath put lying spirit mouth thy prophets, lord hath spoken evil thee. zedekiah son chenaanah came near, smote micaiah upon cheek, said, way went spirit lord speak unto thee? micaiah said, behold, thou shalt see day thou shalt go inner chamber hide thyself. king israel said, take ye micaiah, carry back amon governor city, joash king's son; say, thus saith king, put [fellow] prison, feed bread affliction water affliction, return peace. micaiah said, thou certainly return peace, [then] hath lord spoken me. said, hearken, ye people. king israel jehoshaphat king judah went ramoth-gilead. king israel said unto jehoshaphat, disguise myself, go battle; put thou thy robes. king israel disguised himself; went battle. king syria commanded captains chariots [were] him, saying, fight ye small great, save king israel. came pass, captains chariots saw jehoshaphat, said, [is] king israel. therefore compassed fight: jehoshaphat cried out, lord helped him; god moved [to depart] him. came pass, that, captains chariots perceived king israel, turned back pursuing him. [certain] man drew bow venture, smote king israel joints harness: therefore said chariot man, turn thine hand, thou mayest carry host; wounded. battle increased day: howbeit king israel stayed [himself] [his] chariot syrians even: time sun going died. jehoshaphat king judah returned house peace jerusalem. jehu son hanani seer went meet him, said king jehoshaphat, shouldest thou help ungodly, love hate lord? therefore wrath upon thee lord. nevertheless good things found thee, thou hast taken away groves land, hast prepared thine heart seek god. jehoshaphat dwelt jerusalem: went people beer-sheba mount ephraim, brought back unto lord god fathers. set judges land throughout fenced cities judah, city city, said judges, take heed ye do: ye judge man,2 chronicles page 260 lord, judgment. wherefore let fear lord upon you; take heed [it:] [there is] iniquity lord god, respect persons, taking gifts. moreover jerusalem jehoshaphat set levites, [of] priests, chief fathers israel, judgment lord, controversies, returned jerusalem. charged them, saying, thus shall ye fear lord, faithfully, perfect heart. cause soever shall come brethren dwell cities, blood blood, law commandment, statutes judgments, ye shall even warn trespass lord, wrath come upon you, upon brethren: do, ye shall trespass. and, behold, amariah chief priest matters lord; zebadiah son ishmael, ruler house judah, king's matters: also levites [shall be] officers you. deal courageously, lord shall good. came pass also, [that] children moab, children ammon, [other] beside ammonites, came jehoshaphat battle. came told jehoshaphat, saying, cometh great multitude thee beyond sea side syria; and, behold, [be] hazazon- tamar, [is] en-gedi. jehoshaphat feared, set seek lord, proclaimed fast throughout judah. judah gathered together, ask [help] lord: even cities judah came seek lord. jehoshaphat stood congregation judah jerusalem, house lord, new court, said, lord god fathers, [art] thou god heaven? rulest [not] thou kingdoms heathen? thine hand [is not] power might, none able withstand thee? [art] thou god, [who] didst drive inhabitants land thy people israel, gavest seed abraham thy friend ever? dwelt therein, built thee sanctuary therein thy name, saying, if, [when] evil cometh upon us, [as] sword, judgment, pestilence, famine, stand house, thy presence, (for thy name [is] house,) cry unto thee affliction, thou wilt hear help. now, behold, children ammon moab mount seir, thou chief fathers israel, came jerusalem.2 chronicles page 262 congregation made covenant king house god. said unto them, behold, king's son shall reign, lord hath said sons david. [is] thing ye shall do; third part entering sabbath, priests levites, [shall be] porters doors; third part [shall be] king's house; third part gate foundation: people [shall be] courts house lord. let none come house lord, save priests, minister levites; shall go in, [are] holy: people shall keep watch lord. levites shall compass king round about, every man weapons hand; whosoever [else] cometh house, shall put death: ye king cometh in, goeth out. levites judah according things jehoiada priest commanded, took every man men come sabbath, go [out] sabbath: jehoiada priest dismissed courses. moreover jehoiada priest delivered captains hundreds spears, bucklers, shields, [had been] king david's, [were] house god. set people, every man weapon hand, right side temple left side temple, along altar temple, king round about. brought king's son, put upon crown, [gave him] testimony, made king. jehoiada sons anointed him, said, god save king. athaliah heard noise people running praising king, came people house lord: looked, and, behold, king stood pillar entering in, princes trumpets king: people land rejoiced, sounded trumpets, also singers instruments musick, taught sing praise. athaliah rent clothes, said, treason, treason. jehoiada priest brought captains hundreds set host, said unto them, forth ranges: whoso followeth her, let slain sword. priest said, slay house lord. laid hands her; come entering horse gate king's house, slew there. jehoiada made covenant him, people, king, lord's people. people went house baal, brake down, brake altars images pieces, slew mattan priest baal altars. also jehoiada appointed offices house lord hand priests levites, david distributed house lord, offer burnt offerings lord, [it is] written law moses, rejoicing singing, [as ordained] david. set porters gates house lord, none [which was] unclean thing enter in. took captains hundreds, nobles, governors people, people land, brought king house lord: came high gate king's house, set king upon throne kingdom. people land rejoiced: city quiet, slainathaliah sword. joash [was] seven years old began reign, reigned forty years jerusalem. mother's name also [was] zibiah beer-sheba. joash [that was] right sight lord days jehoiada priest. jehoiada took two wives; begat sons daughters. came pass this, [that] joash minded repair house lord. gathered together priests levites, said them, go unto cities judah, gather israel money repair house god year year, see ye hasten matter. howbeit levites hastened not. king called jehoiada chief, said unto him, hast thou required levites bring judah jerusalem collection, [according commandment] moses servant lord, congregation israel, tabernacle witness? sons athaliah, wicked woman, broken house god; also dedicated things house lord bestow upon baalim. king's commandment made chest, set without gate house lord. made proclamation judah jerusalem, bring lord collection [that] moses servant god [laid] upon israel wilderness. princes people rejoiced, brought in, cast chest, made end. came pass, time chest brought unto king's office hand levites, saw [there was] much money, king's scribe high priest's officer came emptied chest, took it, carried place again. thus day day, gathered money abundance. king jehoiada gave work service house lord, hired masons carpenters repair house lord, also wrought iron brass mend house lord. workmen wrought, work perfected them, set house god state, strengthened it. finished [it,] brought rest money king jehoiada, whereof made vessels house lord, [even] vessels minister, offer [withal,] spoons, vessels gold silver. offered burnt offerings house lord continually days jehoiada. jehoiada waxed old, full days died; hundred thirty years old [was he] died. buried city david among kings, done good israel, toward god, toward house. death jehoiada came princes judah, made obeisance king. king hearkened unto them. left house lord god fathers, served groves idols: wrath came upon judah jerusalem trespass. yet sent prophets them, bring unto lord; testified them: would give ear. spirit god came upon zechariah son jehoiada priest, stood people, said unto them, thus saith god, transgress ye commandments lord, ye cannot prosper? ye forsaken lord, hath also forsaken you. conspired him, stonedpage 263 2 chronicles stones commandment king court house lord. thus joash king remembered kindness jehoiada father done him, slew son. died, said, lord look upon [it,] require [it. ] came pass end year, [that] host syria came him: came judah jerusalem, destroyed princes people among people, sent spoil unto king damascus. army syrians came small company men, lord delivered great host hand, forsaken lord god fathers. executed judgment joash. departed him, (for left great diseases,) servants conspired blood sons jehoiada priest, slew bed, died: buried city david, buried sepulchres kings. conspired him; zabad son shimeath ammonitess, jehozabad son shimrith moabitess. [concerning] sons, greatness burdens [laid] upon him, repairing house god, behold, [are] written story book kings. amaziah son reigned stead. amaziah [was] twenty five years old [when] began reign, reigned twenty nine years jerusalem. mother's name [was] jehoaddan jerusalem. [that was] right sight lord, perfect heart. came pass, kingdom established him, slew servants killed king father. slew children, [did] [it is] written law book moses, lord commanded, saying, fathers shall die children, neither shall children die fathers, every man shall die sin. moreover amaziah gathered judah together, made captains thousands, captains hundreds, according houses [their] fathers, throughout judah benjamin: numbered twenty years old above, found three hundred thousand choice [men, able] go forth war, could handle spear shield. hired also hundred thousand mighty men valour israel hundred talents silver. came man god him, saying, king, let army israel go thee; lord [is] israel, [to wit, with] children ephraim. thou wilt go, [it,] strong battle: god shall make thee fall enemy: god hath power help, cast down. amaziah said man god, shall hundred talents given army israel? man god answered, lord able give thee much this. amaziah separated them, [to wit,] army come ephraim, go home again: wherefore anger greatly kindled judah, returned home great anger. amaziah strengthened himself, led forth people, went valley salt, smote children seir ten thousand. [other] tenthousand [left] alive children judah carry away captive, brought unto top rock, cast top rock, broken pieces. soldiers army amaziah sent back, go battle, fell upon cities judah, samaria even unto beth-horon, smote three thousand them, took much spoil. came pass, amaziah come slaughter edomites, brought gods children seir, set [to be] gods, bowed them, burned incense unto them. wherefore anger lord kindled amaziah, sent unto prophet, said unto him, hast thou sought gods people, could deliver people thine hand? came pass, talked him, [the king] said unto him, art thou made king's counsel? forbear; shouldest thou smitten? prophet forbare, said, know god hath determined destroy thee, thou hast done this, hast hearkened unto counsel. amaziah king judah took advice, sent joash, son jehoahaz, son jehu, king israel, saying, come, let us see one another face. joash king israel sent amaziah king judah, saying, thistle [was] lebanon sent cedar [was] lebanon, saying, give thy daughter son wife: passed wild beast [was] lebanon, trode thistle. thou sayest, lo, thou hast smitten edomites; thine heart lifteth thee boast: abide home; shouldest thou meddle [thine] hurt, thou shouldest fall, [even] thou, judah thee? amaziah would hear; [came] god, might deliver hand [of enemies,] sought gods edom. joash king israel went up; saw one another face, [both] amaziah king judah, beth- shemesh, [belongeth] judah. judah put worse israel, fled every man tent. joash king israel took amaziah king judah, son joash, son jehoahaz, beth- shemesh, brought jerusalem, brake wall jerusalem gate ephraim corner gate, four hundred cubits. [he took] gold silver, vessels found house god obed-edom, treasures king's house, hostages also, returned samaria. amaziah son joash king judah lived death joash son jehoahaz king israel fifteen years. rest acts amaziah, first last, behold, [are] written book kings judah israel? time amaziah turn away following lord made conspiracy jerusalem; fled lachish: sent lachish him, slew there. brought upon horses, buried fathers city judah. people judah took uzziah, [was] sixteen years old, made king room father amaziah. built eloth, restored2 chronicles page 264 judah, king slept fathers. sixteen years old [was] uzziah began reign, reigned fifty two years jerusalem. mother's name also jecoliah jerusalem. [that was] right sight lord, according father amaziah did. sought god days zechariah, understanding visions god: long sought lord, god made prosper. went forth warred philistines, brake wall gath, wall jabneh, wall ashdod, built cities ashdod, among philistines. god helped philistines, arabians dwelt gur-baal, mehunims. ammonites gave gifts uzziah: name spread abroad [even] entering egypt; strengthened [himself] exceedingly. moreover uzziah built towers jerusalem corner gate, valley gate, turning [of wall,] fortified them. also built towers desert, digged many wells: much cattle, low country, plains: husbandmen [also,] vine dressers mountains, carmel: loved husbandry. moreover uzziah host fighting men, went war bands, according number account hand jeiel scribe maaseiah ruler, hand hananiah, [one] king's captains. whole number chief fathers mighty men valour [were] two thousand six hundred. hand [was] army, three hundred thousand seven thousand five hundred, made war mighty power, help king enemy. uzziah prepared throughout host shields, spears, helmets, habergeons, bows, slings [to cast] stones. made jerusalem engines, invented cunning men, towers upon bulwarks, shoot arrows great stones withal. name spread far abroad; marvellously helped, till strong. strong, heart lifted [his] destruction: transgressed lord god, went temple lord burn incense upon altar incense. azariah priest went him, fourscore priests lord, [that were] valiant men: withstood uzziah king, said unto him, [it appertaineth] unto thee, uzziah, burn incense unto lord, priests sons aaron, consecrated burn incense: go sanctuary; thou hast trespassed; neither [shall be] thine honour lord god. uzziah wroth, [had] censer hand burn incense: wroth priests, leprosy even rose forehead priests house lord, beside incense altar. azariah chief priest, priests, looked upon him, and, behold, [was] leprous forehead, thrust thence; yea, hasted also go out, lord smitten him. uzziah king leper unto day death, dwelt several house, [being] leper; cut house lord: jotham son [was] king's house, judging people land. rest acts uzziah, first last, isaiah prophet, son amoz, write. uzziah slept fathers, buried fathers field burial [belonged] thekings; said, [is] leper: jotham son reigned stead. jotham [was] twenty five years old began reign, reigned sixteen years jerusalem. mother's name also [was] jerushah, daughter zadok. [that was] right sight lord, according father uzziah did: howbeit entered temple lord. people yet corruptly. built high gate house lord, wall ophel built much. moreover built cities mountains judah, forests built castles towers. fought also king ammonites, prevailed them. children ammon gave year hundred talents silver, ten thousand measures wheat, ten thousand barley. much children ammon pay unto him, second year, third. jotham became mighty, prepared ways lord god. rest acts jotham, wars, ways, lo, [are] written book kings israel judah. five twenty years old began reign, reigned sixteen years jerusalem. jotham slept fathers, buried city david: ahaz son reigned stead. ahaz [was] twenty years old began reign, reigned sixteen years jerusalem: [that was] right sight lord, like david father: walked ways kings israel, made also molten images baalim. moreover burnt incense valley son hinnom, burnt children fire, abominations heathen lord cast children israel. sacrificed also burnt incense high places, hills, every green tree. wherefore lord god delivered hand king syria; smote him, carried away great multitude captives, brought [them] damascus. also delivered hand king israel, smote great slaughter. pekah son remaliah slew judah hundred twenty thousand one day, [which were] valiant men; forsaken lord god fathers. zichri, mighty man ephraim, slew maaseiah king's son, azrikam governor house, elkanah [that was] next king. children israel carried away captive brethren two hundred thousand, women, sons, daughters, took also away much spoil them, brought spoil samaria. prophet lord there, whose name [was] oded: went host came samaria, said unto them, behold, lord god fathers wroth judah, hath delivered hand, ye slain rage [that] reacheth unto heaven. ye purpose keep children judah jerusalem bondmen bondwomen unto you: [but there] you, even you, sinspage 265 2 chronicles lord god? hear therefore, deliver captives again, ye taken captive brethren: fierce wrath lord [is] upon you. certain heads children ephraim, azariah son johanan, berechiah son meshillemoth, jehizkiah son shallum, amasa son hadlai, stood came war, said unto them, ye shall bring captives hither: whereas offended lord [already,] ye intend add [more] sins trespass: trespass great, [there is] fierce wrath israel. armed men left captives spoil princes congregation. men expressed name rose up, took captives, spoil clothed naked among them, arrayed them, shod them, gave eat drink, anointed them, carried feeble upon asses, brought jericho, city palm trees, brethren: returned samaria. time king ahaz send unto kings assyria help him. edomites come smitten judah, carried away captives. philistines also invaded cities low country, south judah, taken beth- shemesh, ajalon, gederoth, shocho villages thereof, timnah villages thereof, gimzo also villages thereof: dwelt there. lord brought judah low ahaz king israel; made judah naked, transgressed sore lord. tilgath- pilneser king assyria came unto him, distressed him, strengthened not. ahaz took away portion [out] house lord, [out] house king, princes, gave [it] unto king assyria: helped not. time distress trespass yet lord: [is that] king ahaz. sacrificed unto gods damascus, smote him: said, gods kings syria help them, [therefore] sacrifice them, may help me. ruin him, israel. ahaz gathered together vessels house god, cut pieces vessels house god, shut doors house lord, made altars every corner jerusalem. every several city judah made high places burn incense unto gods, provoked anger lord god fathers. rest acts ways, first last, behold, [are] written book kings judah israel. ahaz slept fathers, buried city, [even] jerusalem: brought sepulchres kings israel: hezekiah son reigned stead. hezekiah began reign [when was] five twenty years old, reigned nine twenty years jerusalem. mother's name [was] abijah, daughter zechariah. [that was] right sight lord, according david father done. first year reign, first month, opened doors house lord, repairedthem. brought priests levites, gathered together east street, said unto them, hear me, ye levites, sanctify yourselves, sanctify house lord god fathers, carry forth filthiness holy [place. ] fathers trespassed, done [that was] evil eyes lord god, forsaken him, turned away faces habitation lord, turned [their] backs. also shut doors porch, put lamps, burned incense offered burnt offerings holy [place] unto god israel. wherefore wrath lord upon judah jerusalem, hath delivered trouble, astonishment, hissing, ye see eyes. for, lo, fathers fallen sword, sons daughters wives captivity this. [he appointed] also king's portion substance burnt offerings, [to wit,] morning evening burnt offerings, burnt offerings sabbaths, new moons, set feasts, [it is] written law lord. moreover commanded people dwelt jerusalem give portion priests levites, might encouraged law lord. soon commandment came abroad, children israel brought abundance firstfruits corn, wine, oil, honey, increase field; tithe [things] brought abundantly. [concerning] children israel judah, dwelt cities judah, also brought tithe oxen sheep, tithe holy things consecrated unto lord god, laid [them] heaps. third month began lay foundation heaps, finished [them] seventh month. hezekiah princes came saw heaps, blessed lord, people israel. hezekiah questioned priests levites concerning heaps. azariah chief priest house zadok answered him, said, since [the people] began bring offerings house lord, enough eat, left plenty: lord hath blessed people; left [is] great store. hezekiah commanded prepare chambers house lord; prepared [them, ] brought offerings tithes dedicated [things] faithfully: cononiah levite [was] ruler, shimei brother [was] next. jehiel, azaziah, nahath, asahel, jerimoth, jozabad, eliel, ismachiah, mahath, benaiah, [were] overseers hand cononiah shimei brother, commandment hezekiah king, azariah ruler house god. kore son imnah levite, porter toward east, [was] freewill offerings god, distribute oblations lord, holy things. next [were] eden, miniamin, jeshua, shemaiah, amariah, shecaniah, cities priests, [their] set office, give brethren courses, well great small: beside genealogy males, three years old upward, [even] unto every one entereth house lord, daily portion service charges according courses; genealogy priests house fathers, levites twenty years old upward, charges courses; genealogy little ones, wives, sons, daughters, congregation: set office sanctified holiness: also sons aaron priests, [which were] fields suburbs cities, every several city, men expressed name, give portions males among priests, reckoned genealogies among levites. thus hezekiah throughout judah, wrought [that was] good right truth lord god. every work began service house god, law, commandments, seek god, [it] heart, prospered. things, establishment thereof, sennacherib king assyria came, entered judah, encamped fenced cities, thought win himself. hezekiah saw sennacherib come, purposed fight jerusalem, took counsel princes mighty men stop waters fountains [were] without city: help him. gathered much people together, stopped fountains, brook ran midst land, saying, kings assyria come, find much water? also strengthened himself, built wall broken, raised [it] towers, another wall without, repaired millo [in] city david, made darts shields abundance. set captains war people, gathered together street gate city, spake comfortably them, saying, strong courageous, afraid dismayed king assyria, multitude [is] him: [there be] us him: [is] arm flesh; us [is] lord god help us, fight battles. people rested upon words hezekiah king judah. sennacherib king assyria send servants jerusalem, (but [himself laid siege] lachish, power him,) unto hezekiah king judah, unto judah [were] jerusalem, saying, thus saith sennacherib king assyria, whereon ye trust, ye abide siege jerusalem? doth hezekiah persuade give die famine thirst, saying, lord god shall deliver us hand king assyria? hath hezekiah taken away high places altars, commanded judah jerusalem, saying, ye shall worship one altar, burn incense upon it? know ye fathers done unto people [other] lands? gods nations lands ways able deliver lands mine hand? [was there] among gods nations fathers utterly destroyed, could deliver people mine hand, god able deliver mine hand? therefore let hezekiah deceive you, persuade manner, neither yet believe him: god nation kingdom able deliver people mine hand, hand fathers: much less shall god deliver mine hand? servants spake yet [more] lord god, servant hezekiah. wrote also letters rail lord god israel, speak him, saying, gods nations [other] lands delivered people mine hand, shall god hezekiah deliver people2 chronicles page 268 mine hand. cried loud voice jews' speech unto people jerusalem [were] wall, affright them, trouble them; might take city. spake god jerusalem, gods people earth, [which were] work hands man. [cause] hezekiah king, prophet isaiah son amoz, prayed cried heaven. lord sent angel, cut mighty men valour, leaders captains camp king assyria. returned shame face land. come house god, came forth bowels slew sword. thus lord saved hezekiah inhabitants jerusalem hand sennacherib king assyria, hand [other,] guided every side. many brought gifts unto lord jerusalem, presents hezekiah king judah: magnified sight nations thenceforth. days hezekiah sick death, prayed unto lord: spake unto him, gave sign. hezekiah rendered according benefit [done] unto him; heart lifted up: therefore wrath upon him, upon judah jerusalem. notwithstanding hezekiah humbled pride heart, [both] inhabitants jerusalem, wrath lord came upon days hezekiah. hezekiah exceeding much riches honour: made treasuries silver, gold, precious stones, spices, shields, manner pleasant jewels; storehouses also increase corn, wine, oil; stalls manner beasts, cotes flocks. moreover provided cities, possessions flocks herds abundance: god given substance much. hezekiah also stopped upper watercourse gihon, brought straight west side city david. hezekiah prospered works. howbeit [the business of] ambassadors princes babylon, sent unto enquire wonder [done] land, god left him, try him, might know [that was] heart. rest acts hezekiah, goodness, behold, [are] written vision isaiah prophet, son amoz, [and] book kings judah israel. hezekiah slept fathers, buried chiefest sepulchres sons david: judah inhabitants jerusalem honour death. manasseh son reigned stead. manasseh [was] twelve years old began reign, reigned fifty five years jerusalem: [that was] evil sight lord, like unto abominations heathen, lord cast children israel. built high places hezekiah father broken down, reared altars baalim, made groves, worshipped host ofheaven, served them. also built altars house lord, whereof lord said, jerusalem shall name ever. built altars host heaven two courts house lord. caused children pass fire valley son hinnom: also observed times, used enchantments, used witchcraft, dealt familiar spirit, wizards: wrought much evil sight lord, provoke anger. set carved image, idol made, house god, god said david solomon son, house, jerusalem, chosen tribes israel, put name ever: neither remove foot israel land appointed fathers; take heed commanded them, according whole law statutes ordinances hand moses. manasseh made judah inhabitants jerusalem err, [and] worse heathen, lord destroyed children israel. lord spake manasseh, people: would hearken. wherefore lord brought upon captains host king assyria, took manasseh among thorns, bound fetters, carried babylon. affliction, besought lord god, humbled greatly god fathers, prayed unto him: intreated him, heard supplication, brought jerusalem kingdom. manasseh knew lord [was] god. built wall without city david, west side gihon, valley, even entering fish gate, compassed ophel, raised great height, put captains war fenced cities judah. took away strange gods, idol house lord, altars built mount house lord, jerusalem, cast [them] city. repaired altar lord, sacrificed thereon peace offerings thank offerings, commanded judah serve lord god israel. nevertheless people sacrifice still high places, yet unto lord god only. rest acts manasseh, prayer unto god, words seers spake name lord god israel, behold, [are written] book kings israel. prayer also, [how god] intreated him, sin, trespass, places wherein built high places, set groves graven images, humbled: behold, [are] written among sayings seers. manasseh slept fathers, buried house: amon son reigned stead. amon [was] two twenty years old began reign, reigned two years jerusalem. [that was] evil sight lord, manasseh father: amon sacrificed unto carved images manasseh father made, served them; humbled lord, manasseh father humbled himself; amon trespassed more. servantspage 269 2 chronicles conspired him, slew house. people land slew conspired king amon; people land made josiah son king stead. josiah [was] eight years old began reign, reigned jerusalem one thirty years. [that was] right sight lord, walked ways david father, declined [neither] right hand, left. eighth year reign, yet young, began seek god david father: twelfth year began purge judah jerusalem high places, groves, carved images, molten images. brake altars baalim presence; images, [were] high them, cut down; groves, carved images, molten images, brake pieces, made dust [of them,] strowed [it] upon graves sacrificed unto them. burnt bones priests upon altars, cleansed judah jerusalem. [so he] cities manasseh, ephraim, simeon, even unto naphtali, mattocks round about. broken altars groves, beaten graven images powder, cut idols throughout land israel, returned jerusalem. eighteenth year reign, purged land, house, sent shaphan son azaliah, maaseiah governor city, joah son joahaz recorder, repair house lord god. came hilkiah high priest, delivered money brought house god, levites kept doors gathered hand manasseh ephraim, remnant israel, judah benjamin; returned jerusalem. put [it] hand workmen oversight house lord, gave workmen wrought house lord, repair amend house: even artificers builders gave [it,] buy hewn stone, timber couplings, floor houses kings judah destroyed. men work faithfully: overseers [were] jahath obadiah, levites, sons merari; zechariah meshullam, sons kohathites, set [it] forward; [other of] levites, could skill instruments musick. also [they were] bearers burdens, [were] overseers wrought work manner service: levites [there were] scribes, officers, porters. brought money brought house lord, hilkiah priest found book law lord [given] moses. hilkiah answered said shaphan scribe, found book law house lord. hilkiah delivered book shaphan. shaphan carried book king, brought king word back again, saying, committed thy servants, [it. ] gathered together money found house lord, delivered hand overseers, hand workmen. shaphan scribe told king, saying, hilkiah priest hath given book. shaphan read king. came pass, king heard words law, rent clothes. king commanded hilkiah, ahikam son shaphan, abdon son micah, shaphan scribe, asaiah servant king's, saying, go, enquire lord me, left israel judah, concerning words book found: great [is] wrath lord poured upon us, fathers kept word lord, written book. hilkiah, [they] king [had appointed,] went huldah prophetess, wife shallum son tikvath, son hasrah, keeper wardrobe; (now dwelt jerusalem college:) spake [effect. ] answered them, thus saith lord god israel, tell ye man sent me, thus saith lord, behold, bring evil upon place, upon inhabitants thereof, [even] curses written book read king judah: forsaken me, burned incense unto gods, might provoke anger works hands; therefore wrath shall poured upon place, shall quenched. king judah, sent enquire lord, shall ye say unto him, thus saith lord god israel [concerning] words thou hast heard; thine heart tender, thou didst humble thyself god, thou heardest words place, inhabitants thereof, humbledst thyself me, didst rend thy clothes, weep me; even heard [thee] also, saith lord. behold, gather thee thy fathers, thou shalt gathered thy grave peace, neither shall thine eyes see evil bring upon place, upon inhabitants same. brought king word again. king sent gathered together elders judah jerusalem. king went house lord, men judah, inhabitants jerusalem, priests, levites, people, great small: read ears words book covenant found house lord. king stood place, made covenant lord, walk lord, keep commandments, testimonies, statutes, heart, soul, perform words covenant written book. caused present jerusalem benjamin stand [to it.] inhabitants jerusalem according covenant god, god fathers. josiah took away abominations countries [pertained] children israel, made present israel serve, [even] serve lord god. [and] days departed following lord, god fathers. moreover josiah kept passover unto lord jerusalem: killed passover fourteenth [day] first month. set priests charges, encouraged service house lord, said unto levites taught israel, holy unto lord, put2 chronicles page 270 holy ark house solomon son david king israel build; [it shall] [be] burden upon [your] shoulders: serve lord god, people israel, prepare [yourselves] houses fathers, courses, according writing david king israel, according writing solomon son. stand holy [place] according divisions families fathers brethren people, [after] division families levites. kill passover, sanctify yourselves, prepare brethren, [they] may according word lord hand moses. josiah gave people, flock, lambs kids, passover offerings, present, number thirty thousand, three thousand bullocks: [were] king's substance. princes gave willingly unto people, priests, levites: hilkiah zechariah jehiel, rulers house god, gave unto priests passover offerings two thousand six hundred [small cattle,] three hundred oxen. conaniah also, shemaiah nethaneel, brethren, hashabiah jeiel jozabad, chief levites, gave unto levites passover offerings five thousand [small cattle,] five hundred oxen. service prepared, priests stood place, levites courses, according king's commandment. killed passover, priests sprinkled [the blood] hands, levites flayed [them. ] removed burnt offerings, might give according divisions families people, offer unto lord, [it is] written book moses. [did they] oxen. roasted passover fire according ordinance: [other] holy [offerings] sod pots, caldrons, pans, divided [them] speedily among people. afterward made ready themselves, priests: priests sons aaron [were busied] offering burnt offerings fat night; therefore levites prepared themselves, priests sons aaron. singers sons asaph [were] place, according commandment david, asaph, heman, jeduthun king's seer; porters [waited] every gate; might depart service; brethren levites prepared them. service lord prepared day, keep passover, offer burnt offerings upon altar lord, according commandment king josiah. children israel present kept passover time, feast unleavened bread seven days. passover like kept israel days samuel prophet; neither kings israel keep passover josiah kept, priests, levites, judah israel present, inhabitants jerusalem. eighteenth year reign josiah passover kept. this, josiah prepared temple, necho king egypt came fight charchemish euphrates: josiah went him. sent ambassadors him, saying, thee, thou king judah? [i come] thee day, house wherewith war: god commanded make haste: forbear thee [meddling with] god, [is] me, destroy thee not. nevertheless josiah would notturn face him, disguised himself, might fight him, hearkened unto words necho mouth god, came fight valley megiddo. archers shot king josiah; king said servants, away; sore wounded. servants therefore took chariot, put second chariot had; brought jerusalem, died, buried [one of] sepulchres fathers. judah jerusalem mourned josiah. jeremiah lamented josiah: singing men singing women spake josiah lamentations day, made ordinance israel: and, behold, [are] written lamentations. rest acts josiah, goodness, according [that was] written law lord, deeds, first last, behold, [are] written book kings israel judah. people land took jehoahaz son josiah, made king father's stead jerusalem. jehoahaz [was] twenty three years old began reign, reigned three months jerusalem. king egypt put jerusalem, condemned land hundred talents silver talent gold. king egypt made eliakim brother king judah jerusalem, turned name jehoiakim. necho took jehoahaz brother, carried egypt. jehoiakim [was] twenty five years old began reign, reigned eleven years jerusalem: [that was] evil sight lord god. came nebuchadnezzar king babylon, bound fetters, carry babylon. nebuchadnezzar also carried vessels house lord babylon, put temple babylon. rest acts jehoiakim, abominations did, found him, behold, [are] written book kings israel judah: jehoiachin son reigned stead. jehoiachin [was] eight years old began reign, reigned three months ten days jerusalem: [that was] evil sight lord. year expired, king nebuchadnezzar sent, brought babylon, goodly vessels house lord, made zedekiah brother king judah jerusalem. zedekiah [was] one twenty years old began reign, reigned eleven years jerusalem. [that was] evil sight lord god, [and] humbled jeremiah prophet [speaking] mouth lord. also rebelled king nebuchadnezzar, made swear god: stiffened neck, hardened heart turning unto lord god israel. moreover chief priests, people, transgressed much abominations heathen; polluted house lord hallowed jerusalem. lord god fathers sent messengers, rising betimes, sending; compassion people, dwelling place:page 271 2 chronicles mocked messengers god, despised words, misused prophets, wrath lord arose people, till [there was] remedy. therefore brought upon king chaldees, slew young men sword house sanctuary, compassion upon young man maiden, old man, stooped age: gave [them] hand. vessels house god, great small, treasures house lord, treasures king, princes; [these] brought babylon. burnt house god, brake wall jerusalem, burnt palaces thereof fire, destroyed goodly vessels thereof. escaped sword carried away babylon; servants sons reign kingdom persia: fulfil word lord mouth jeremiah, land enjoyed sabbaths: [for] long lay desolate kept sabbath, fulfil threescore ten years. first year cyrus king persia, word lord [spoken] mouth jeremiah might accomplished, lord stirred spirit cyrus king persia, made proclamation throughout kingdom, [put it] also writing, saying, thus saith cyrus king persia, kingdoms earth hath lord god heaven given me; hath charged build house jerusalem, [is] judah. [is there] among people? lord god [be] him, let go up.page 273 ezra ezra first year cyrus king persia, word lord mouth jeremiah might fulfilled, lord stirred spirit cyrus king persia, made proclamation throughout kingdom, [put it] also writing, saying, thus saith cyrus king persia, lord god heaven hath given kingdoms earth; hath charged build house jerusalem, [is] judah. [therefore,] tatnai, governor beyond river, shethar-boznai, companions apharsachites, [are] beyond river, ye far thence: let work house god alone; let governor jews elders jews build house god place. moreover make decree ye shall elders jews building house god: king's goods, [even] tribute beyond river, forthwith expences given unto men, hindered. need of, young bullocks, rams, lambs, burnt offerings god heaven, wheat, salt, wine, oil, according appointment priests [are] jerusalem, let given day day without fail: may offer sacrifices sweet savours unto god heaven, pray life king, sons. also made decree, whosoever shall alter word, let timber pulled house, set up, let hanged thereon; let house made dunghill this. god hath caused name dwell destroy kings people, shall put hand alter [and] destroy house god jerusalem. darius made decree; let done speed. tatnai, governor side river, shethar-boznai, companions, according darius king sent, speedily. elders jews builded, prosperedezra page 276 prophesying haggai prophet zechariah son iddo. builded, finished [it,] according commandment god israel, according commandment cyrus, darius, artaxerxes king persia. house finished third day month adar, sixth year reign darius king. children israel, priests, levites, rest children captivity, kept dedication house god joy, offered dedication house god hundred bullocks, two hundred rams, four hundred lambs; [is] copy letter king artaxerxes gave unto ezra priest, scribe, [even] scribe words commandments lord, statutes israel. artaxerxes, king kings, unto ezra priest, scribe law god heaven, perfect [peace,] time. make decree, people israel, [of] priests levites, realm, minded freewill go jerusalem, go thee. forasmuch thou art sent king, seven counsellors, enquire concerning judah jerusalem, according law thy god [is] thine hand; carry silver gold, king andhis counsellors freely offered unto god israel, whose habitation [is] jerusalem, silver gold thou canst find province babylon, freewill offering people, priests, offering willingly house god [is] jerusalem: thou mayest buy speedily money bullocks, rams, lambs, meat offerings drink offerings, offer upon altar house god [is] jerusalem. whatsoever shall seem good thee, thy brethren, rest silver gold, god. vessels also given thee service house thy god, [those] deliver thou god jerusalem. whatsoever shall needful house thy god, thou shalt occasion bestow, bestow [it] king's treasure house. i, [even] artaxerxes king, make decree treasurers [are] beyond river, whatsoever ezra priest, scribe law god heaven, shall require you, done speedily, unto hundred talents silver, hundred measures wheat, hundred baths wine, hundred baths oil, salt without prescribing [how much. ] whatsoever commanded god heaven, let diligently done house god heaven: wrath realm king sons? also certify you, touching priests levites, singers, porters, nethinims, ministers house god, shall lawful impose toll, tribute, custom, upon them. thou, ezra, wisdom thy god, [is] thine hand, set magistrates judges, may judge people [are] beyond river, know laws thy god; teach ye know [them] not. whosoever law thy god, law king, let judgment executed speedily upon him, whether [it be] unto death, banishment, confiscation goods, imprisonment. blessed [be] lord god fathers, hath put [such thing] king's heart, beautify house lord [is] jerusalem: hath extended mercy unto king, counsellors, king's mighty princes. strengthened hand lord god [was] upon me, gathered together israel chief men go me. [are] chief fathers, [this is] genealogy went babylon, reign artaxerxes king. sons phinehas; gershom: sons ithamar; daniel: sons david; hattush. sons shechaniah, sons pharosh; zechariah: reckoned genealogy males hundred fifty. sons pahath- moab;
