abode tents three days: viewed people, priests, found none sons levi. sent eliezer, ariel, shemaiah, elnathan, jarib, elnathan, nathan, zechariah, meshullam, chief men; also joiarib, elnathan, men understanding. sent commandment unto iddo chief place casiphia, told say unto iddo, [and] brethren nethinims, place casiphia, bring unto us ministers house god. good hand god upon us brought us man understanding, sons mahli, son levi, son israel; sherebiah, sons brethren, eighteen; hashabiah, jeshaiah sons merari, brethren sons, twenty; also nethinims, david princes appointed service levites, two hundred twenty nethinims: expressed name. proclaimed fast there, river ahava, might afflict god, seek right way us, little ones, substance. ashamed require king band soldiers horsemen help us enemy way: spoken unto king, saying, hand god [is] upon good seek him; power wrath [is] forsake him. fasted besought god this: intreated us. separated twelve chief priests, sherebiah, hashabiah, ten brethren them, weighed unto silver, gold, vessels, [even] offering house god, king, counsellors, lords, israel [there] present, offered: even weighed unto hand six hundred fifty talents silver, silver vessels hundred talents, [and] gold hundred talents; also twenty basons gold, thousand drams; two vessels fine copper, precious gold. said unto them, ye [are] holy unto lord; vessels [are] holy also; silver gold [are] freewill offering unto lord god fathers. watch ye, keep [them,] ye weigh [them] chief priests levites, chief fathers israel, jerusalem, chambers house lord. took priests levites weight silver, gold, vessels, bring [them] jerusalem unto house god. departed river ahava twelfth [day] first month, go unto jerusalem: hand god upon us, delivered us hand enemy, lay wait way. came jerusalem, abode three days. fourth day silver gold vessels weighed house god thehand meremoth son uriah priest; [was] eleazar son phinehas; [was] jozabad son jeshua, noadiah son binnui, levites; number [and] weight every one: weight written time. [also] children carried away, come captivity, offered burnt offerings unto god israel, twelve bullocks israel, ninety six rams, seventy seven lambs, twelve goats [for] sin offering: [this was] burnt offering unto lord. delivered king's commissions unto king's lieutenants, governors side river: furthered people, house god. things done, princes came me, saying, people israel, priests, levites, separated people lands, [doing] according abominations, [even] canaanites, hittites, perizzites, jebusites, ammonites, moabites, egyptians, amorites. taken daughters themselves, sons: holy seed mingled people [those] lands: yea, hand princes rulers hath chief trespass. heard thing, rent garment mantle, plucked hair head beard, sat astonied. assembled unto every one trembled words god israel, transgression carried away; sat astonied evening sacrifice. evening sacrifice arose heaviness; rent garment mantle, fell upon knees, spread hands unto lord god. said, god, ashamed blush lift face thee, god: iniquities increased [our] head, trespass grown unto heavens. since days fathers [have] [been] great trespass unto day; iniquities we, kings, [our] priests, delivered hand kings lands, sword, captivity, spoil, confusion face, [it is] day. little space grace hath [shewed] lord god, leave us remnant escape, give us nail holy place, god may lighten eyes, give us little reviving bondage. [were] bondmen; yet god hath forsaken us bondage, hath extended mercy unto us sight kings persia, give us reviving, set house god, repair desolations thereof, give us wall judah jerusalem. now, god, shall say this? forsaken thy commandments, thou hast commanded thy servants prophets, saying, land, unto ye go possess it, unclean land filthiness people lands, abominations, filled one end another uncleanness. therefore give daughters unto sons, neither take daughters unto sons, seek peace wealth ever: ye may strong, eat good land, leave [it] inheritance children ever. come upon us evil deeds, great trespass, seeing thou god hast punished us less iniquities [deserve,] hast given us [such] deliverance this; break thy commandments, join affinity people abominations? wouldestezra page 278 thou angry us till thou hadst consumed [us,] [there be] remnant escaping? lord god israel, thou [art] righteous: remain yet escaped, [it is] day: behold, [are] thee trespasses: cannot stand thee this. ezra prayed, confessed, weeping casting house god, assembled unto israel great congregation men women children: people wept sore. shechaniah son jehiel, [one] sons elam, answered said unto ezra, trespassed god, taken strange wives people land: yet hope israel concerning thing. therefore let us make covenant god put away wives, born them, according counsel lord, tremble commandment god; let done according law. arise; [this] matter [belongeth] unto thee: also [will be] thee: good courage, [it. ] arose ezra, made chief priests, levites, israel, swear according word. sware. ezra rose house god, went chamber johanan son eliashib: [when] came thither, eat bread, drink water: mourned transgression carried away. made proclamation throughout judah jerusalem unto children captivity, gather together unto jerusalem; whosoever would come within three days, according counsel princes elders, substance forfeited, separated congregation carried away. men judah benjamin gathered together unto jerusalem within three days. [was] ninth month, twentieth [day] month; people sat street house god, trembling [this] matter, great rain. ezra priest stood up, said unto them, ye transgressed, taken strange wives, increase trespass israel. therefore make confession unto lord god fathers, pleasure: separate people land, strange wives. congregation answered said loud voice, thou hast said, must do. people [are] many, [it is] time much rain, able stand without, neither [is this] work one day two: many transgressed thing. let rulers congregation stand, let taken strange wives cities come appointed times, elders every city, judges thereof, fierce wrath god matter turned us. jonathan son asahel jahaziah son tikvah employed [matter:] meshullam shabbethai levite helped them. children captivity so. ezra priest, [with] certain chief fathers, house fathers, [their] names, separated, sat first day tenth month examine matter. made end menthat taken strange wives first day first month. among sons priests found taken strange wives: [namely,] sons jeshua son jozadak, brethren; maaseiah, eliezer, jarib, gedaliah. gave hands would put away wives; [being] guilty, [they offered] ram flock trespass. sons immer; hanani, zebadiah. sons harim; maaseiah, elijah, shemaiah, jehiel, uzziah. sons pashur; elioenai, maaseiah, ishmael, nethaneel, jozabad, elasah. also levites; jozabad, shimei, kelaiah, (the [is] kelita,) pethahiah, judah, eliezer. singers also; eliashib: porters; shallum, telem, uri. moreover israel: sons parosh; ramiah, jeziah, malchiah, miamin, eleazar, malchijah, benaiah. sons elam; mattaniah, zechariah, jehiel, abdi, jeremoth, eliah. sons zattu; elioenai, eliashib, mattaniah, jeremoth, zabad, aziza. sons also bebai; jehohanan, hananiah, zabbai, [and] athlai. sons bani; meshullam, malluch, adaiah, jashub, sheal, ramoth. sons pahath- moab; adna, chelal, benaiah, maaseiah, mattaniah, bezaleel, binnui, manasseh. [of] sons harim; eliezer, ishijah, malchiah, shemaiah, shimeon, benjamin, malluch, [and] shemariah. sons hashum; mattenai, mattathah, zabad, eliphelet, jeremai, manasseh, [and] shimei. sons bani; maadai, amram, uel, benaiah, bedeiah, chelluh, vaniah, meremoth, eliashib, bani, binnui, shimei, shelemiah, nathan, adaiah, machnadebai, shashai, sharai, azareel, shelemiah, shemariah, sons nebo; jeiel, mattithiah, zabad, zebina, jadau, joel, benaiah. taken strange wives: [some] wives children.page 279 nehemiah book nehemiah words nehemiah son hachaliah. came pass month chisleu, twentieth year, shushan palace, hanani, one brethren, came, [certain] men judah; asked concerning jews escaped, left captivity, concerning jerusalem. said unto me, remnant left captivity province [are] great affliction reproach: wall jerusalem also [is] broken down, gates thereof burned fire. came pass, heard words, sat wept, mourned [certain] days, fasted, prayed god heaven, said, beseech thee, lord god heaven, great terrible god, keepeth covenant mercy love observe commandments: let thine ear attentive, thine eyes open, thou mayest hear prayer thy servant, pray thee now, day night, children israel thy servants, confess sins children israel, sinned thee: father's house sinned. dealt corruptly thee, kept commandments, statutes, judgments, thou commandedst thy servant moses. remember, beseech thee, word thou commandedst thy servant moses, saying, [if] ye transgress, scatter abroad among nations: [if] ye turn unto me, keep commandments, them; though cast unto uttermost part heaven, [yet] gather thence, bring unto place chosen set name there. [are] thy servants thy people, thou hast redeemed thy great power, thy strong hand. lord, beseech thee, let thine ear attentive prayer thy servant, prayer thy servants, desire fear thy name: prosper, pray thee, thy servant day, grant mercy sight man. king's cupbearer. came pass month nisan, twentieth year artaxerxes king, [that] wine [was] him: took wine, gave [it] unto king. [beforetime] sad presence. wherefore king said unto me, [is] thy countenance sad, seeing thou [art] sick? [is] nothing [else] sorrow heart. sore afraid, said unto king, let king live ever: countenance sad, city, place fathers' sepulchres, [lieth] waste, gates thereof consumed fire? king said unto me, dost thou make request? prayed god heaven. said unto king, please king, thy servant found favour thy sight, thou wouldest send unto judah, unto city fathers' sepulchres, may build it. king said unto me, (the queen also sitting him,) long shall thy journey be? wilt thou return? pleased king send me; set time. moreover said unto king, please king, let letters given governors beyond river, may convey till come judah; letter unto asaph keeper king's forest, may give timber make beams gates thepalace [appertained] house, wall city, house shall enter into. king granted me, according good hand god upon me. came governors beyond river, gave king's letters. king sent captains army horsemen me. sanballat horonite, tobiah servant, ammonite, heard [of it,] grieved exceedingly come man seek welfare children israel. came jerusalem, three days. arose night, men me; neither told [any] man god put heart jerusalem: neither [was any] beast me, save beast rode upon. went night gate valley, even dragon well, dung port, viewed walls jerusalem, broken down, gates thereof consumed fire. went gate fountain, king's pool: [there was] place beast [that was] pass. went night brook, viewed wall, turned back, entered gate valley, [so] returned. rulers knew whither went, did; neither yet told [it] jews, priests, nobles, rulers, rest work. said unto them, ye see distress [are] in, jerusalem [lieth] waste, gates thereof burned fire: come, let us build wall jerusalem, reproach. told hand god good upon me; also king's words spoken unto me. said, let us rise build. strengthened hands [this] good [work. ] sanballat horonite, tobiah servant, ammonite, geshem arabian, heard [it,] laughed us scorn, despised us, said, [is] thing ye do? ye rebel king? answered them, said unto them, god heaven, prosper us; therefore servants arise build: ye portion, right, memorial, jerusalem. eliashib high priest rose brethren priests, builded sheep gate; sanctified it, set doors it; even unto tower meah sanctified it, unto tower hananeel. next unto builded men jericho. next builded zaccur son imri. fish gate sons hassenaah build, [also] laid beams thereof, set doors thereof, locks thereof, bars thereof. next unto repaired meremoth son urijah, son koz. next unto repaired meshullam son berechiah, son meshezabeel. next unto repaired zadok son baana. next unto tekoites repaired; despised: turn reproach upon head, give prey land captivity: cover iniquity, let sin blotted thee: provoked [thee] anger builders. built wall; wall joined together unto half thereof: people mind work. came pass, [that] sanballat, tobiah, arabians, ammonites, ashdodites, heard walls jerusalem made up, [and] breaches began stopped, wroth, conspired together come [and] fight jerusalem, hinder it. nevertheless made prayer unto god, set watch day night, them. judah said, strength bearers burdens decayed, [there is] much rubbish; able build wall. adversaries said, shall know, neither see, till come midst among them, slay them, cause work cease. came pass, jews dwelt came, said unto us ten times, places whence ye shall return unto us [they upon you. ] therefore set lower places behind wall, [and] higher places, even set people families swords, spears, bows. looked, rose up, said unto nobles, rulers, rest people, ye afraid them: remember lord, [which is] great terrible, fight brethren, sons, daughters, wives, houses. came pass, enemies heard known unto us, god brought counsel nought, returned us wall, every one unto work. came pass time forth, [that] half servants wrought work, half held spears, shields, bows, habergeons; rulers [were] behind house judah. builded wall, bare burdens, laded, [every one] one hands wrought work, [hand] held weapon. builders, every one sword girded side, [so] builded. sounded trumpet [was] me. said unto nobles, rulers, rest people, work [is] great large, separated upon wall, one far another. place [therefore] ye hear sound trumpet, resort ye thither unto us: god shall fight us. laboured work: half held spears rising morning till stars appeared. likewise time said unto people, let every one servant lodge within jerusalem, night may guard us, labour day. neither i, brethren, servants, men guard followed me, none us putpage 281 nehemiah clothes, [saving that] every one put washing. great cry people wives brethren jews. said, we, sons, daughters, [are] many: therefore take corn [for them,] may eat, live. [some] also said, mortgaged lands, vineyards, houses, might buy corn, dearth. also said, borrowed money king's tribute, [and upon] lands vineyards. yet flesh [is] flesh brethren, children children: and, lo, bring bondage sons daughters servants, [some] daughters brought unto bondage [already:] neither [is it] power [to redeem them;] men lands vineyards. angry heard cry words. consulted myself, rebuked nobles, rulers, said unto them, ye exact usury, every one brother. set great assembly them. said unto them, ability redeemed brethren jews, sold unto heathen; ye even sell brethren? shall sold unto us? held peace, found nothing [to answer. ] also said, [is] good ye do: ought ye walk fear god reproach heathen enemies? likewise, [and] brethren, servants, might exact money corn: pray you, let us leave usury. restore, pray you, them, even day, lands, vineyards, oliveyards, houses, also hundredth [part] money, corn, wine, oil, ye exact them. said they, restore [them,] require nothing them; thou sayest. called priests, took oath them, according promise. also shook lap, said, god shake every man house, labour, performeth promise, even thus shaken out, emptied. congregation said, amen, praised lord. people according promise. moreover time appointed governor land judah, twentieth year even unto two thirtieth year artaxerxes king, [that is,] twelve years, brethren eaten bread governor. former governors [had been] chargeable unto people, taken bread wine, beside forty shekels silver; yea, even servants bare rule people: i, fear god. yea, also continued work wall, neither bought land: servants [were] gathered thither unto work. moreover [there were] table hundred fifty jews rulers, beside came unto us among heathen [are] us. [that] prepared [for me] daily [was] one ox [and] six choice sheep; also fowls prepared me, ten days store sorts wine: yet required bread governor, bondage heavy upon people. think upon me, god, good, [according] done people. came pass, sanballat, tobiah, geshem arabian, rest enemies, heardthat builded wall, [that] breach left therein; (though time set doors upon gates;) sanballat geshem sent unto me, saying, come, let us meet together [some one of] villages plain ono. thought mischief. sent messengers unto them, saying, [am] great work, cannot come down: work cease, whilst leave it, come you? yet sent unto four times sort; answered manner. sent sanballat servant unto like manner fifth time open letter hand; wherein [was] written, reported among heathen, gashmu saith [it, that] thou jews think rebel: cause thou buildest wall, thou mayest king, according words. thou hast also appointed prophets preach thee jerusalem, saying, [there is] king judah: shall reported king according words. come therefore, let us take counsel together. sent unto him, saying, things done thou sayest, thou feignest thine heart. made us afraid, saying, hands shall weakened work, done. therefore, [o god,] strengthen hands. afterward came unto house shemaiah son delaiah son mehetabeel, [was] shut up; said, let us meet together house god, within temple, let us shut doors temple: come slay thee; yea, night come slay thee. said, man flee? [is there,] that, [being] [am,] would go temple save life? go in. and, lo, perceived god sent him; pronounced prophecy me: tobiah sanballat hired him. therefore [was] hired, afraid, so, sin, [that] might [matter] evil report, might reproach me. god, think thou upon tobiah sanballat according works, prophetess noadiah, rest prophets, would put fear. wall finished twenty fifth [day] [the month] elul, fifty two days. came pass, enemies heard [thereof,] heathen [were] us saw [these things,] much cast eyes: perceived work wrought god. moreover days nobles judah sent many letters unto tobiah, [the letters] tobiah came unto them. seventh month came, children israel [were] cities. people gathered together one man street [was] water gate; spake unto ezra scribe bring book law moses, lord commanded israel.page 283 nehemiah ezra priest brought law congregation men women, could hear understanding, upon first day seventh month. read therein street [was] water gate morning midday, men women, could understand; ears people [were attentive] unto book law. ezra scribe stood upon pulpit wood, made purpose; beside stood mattithiah, shema, anaiah, urijah, hilkiah, maaseiah, right hand; left hand, pedaiah, mishael, malchiah, hashum, hashbadana, zechariah, [and] meshullam. ezra opened book sight people; (for people;) opened it, people stood up: ezra blessed lord, great god. people answered, amen, amen, lifting hands: bowed heads, worshipped lord [their] faces ground. also jeshua, bani, sherebiah, jamin, akkub, shabbethai, hodijah, maaseiah, kelita, azariah, jozabad, hanan, pelaiah, levites, caused people understand law: people [stood] place. read book law god distinctly, gave sense, caused [them] understand reading. nehemiah, [is] tirshatha, ezra priest scribe, levites taught people, said unto people, day [is] holy unto lord god; mourn not, weep. people wept, heard words law. said unto them, go way, eat fat, drink sweet, send portions unto nothing prepared: [this] day [is] holy unto lord: neither ye sorry; joy lord strength. levites stilled people, saying, hold peace, day [is] holy; neither ye grieved. people went way eat, drink, send portions, make great mirth, understood words declared unto them. second day gathered together chief fathers people, priests, levites, unto ezra scribe, even understand words law. found written law lord commanded moses, children israel dwell booths feast seventh month: publish proclaim cities, jerusalem, saying, go forth unto mount, fetch olive branches, pine branches, myrtle branches, palm branches, branches thick trees, make booths, [it is] written. people went forth, brought [them,] made booths, every one upon roof house, courts, courts house god, street water gate, street gate ephraim. congregation come captivity made booths, sat booths: since days jeshua son nun unto day children israel done so. great gladness. also day day, first day unto last day, read book law god. kept feast seven days; eighth day [was] solemn assembly, according unto manner. twenty fourth day month thechildren israel assembled fasting, sackclothes, earth upon them. seed israel separated strangers, stood confessed sins, iniquities fathers. stood place, read book law lord god [one] fourth part day; [another] fourth part confessed, worshipped lord god. stood upon stairs, levites, jeshua, bani, kadmiel, shebaniah, bunni, sherebiah, bani, [and] chenani, cried loud voice unto lord god. levites, jeshua, kadmiel, bani, hashabniah, sherebiah, hodijah, shebaniah, [and] pethahiah, said, stand [and] bless lord god ever ever: blessed thy glorious name, exalted blessing praise. thou, [even] thou, [art] lord alone; thou hast made heaven, heaven heavens, host, earth, [things] [are] therein, seas, [is] therein, thou preservest all; host heaven worshippeth thee. thou [art] lord god, didst choose abram, broughtest forth ur chaldees, gavest name abraham; foundest heart faithful thee, madest covenant give land canaanites, hittites, amorites, perizzites, jebusites, girgashites, give [it, say,] seed, hast performed thy words; thou [art] righteous: didst see affliction fathers egypt, heardest cry red sea; shewedst signs wonders upon pharaoh, servants, people land: thou knewest dealt proudly them. didst thou get thee name, [it is] day. thou didst divide sea them, went midst sea dry land; persecutors thou threwest deeps, stone mighty waters. moreover thou leddest day cloudy pillar; night pillar fire, give light way wherein go. thou camest also upon mount sinai, spakest heaven, gavest right judgments, true laws, good statutes commandments: madest known unto thy holy sabbath, commandedst precepts, statutes, laws, hand moses thy servant: gavest bread heaven hunger, broughtest forth water rock thirst, promisedst go possess land thou hadst sworn give them. fathers dealt proudly, hardened necks, hearkened thy commandments, refused obey, neither mindful thy wonders thou didst among them; hardened necks, rebellion appointed captain return bondage: thou [art] god ready pardon, gracious merciful, slow anger, great kindness, forsookest not. yea, made molten calf, said, [is] thy god brought thee egypt, wrought great provocations; yet thou thy manifold mercies forsookest wilderness: pillar cloud departed day, lead way; neither pillar fire night, shew light, way wherein go. thou gavest also thy good spirit instruct them, withheldest thy manna mouth, gavest water thirst. yea, forty years didst thou sustain wilderness, [so that] lacked nothing; clothes waxed old, feet swellednehemiah page 284 not. moreover thou gavest kingdoms nations, didst divide corners: possessed land sihon, land king heshbon, land og king bashan. children also multipliedst thou stars heaven, broughtest land, concerning thou hadst promised fathers, go possess [it. ] children went possessed land, thou subduedst inhabitants land, canaanites, gavest hands, kings, people land, might would. took strong cities, fat land, possessed houses full goods, wells digged, vineyards, oliveyards, fruit trees abundance: eat, filled, became fat, delighted thy great goodness. nevertheless disobedient, rebelled thee, cast thy law behind backs, slew thy prophets testified turn thee, wrought great provocations. therefore thou deliveredst hand enemies, vexed them: time trouble, cried unto thee, thou heardest [them] heaven; according thy manifold mercies thou gavest saviours, saved hand enemies. rest, evil thee: therefore leftest thou hand enemies, dominion them: yet returned, cried unto thee, thou heardest [them] heaven; many times didst thou deliver according thy mercies; testifiedst them, thou mightest bring unto thy law: yet dealt proudly, hearkened unto thy commandments, sinned thy judgments, (which man do, shall live them;) withdrew shoulder, hardened neck, would hear. yet many years didst thou forbear them, testifiedst thy spirit thy prophets: yet would give ear: therefore gavest thou hand people lands. nevertheless thy great mercies' sake thou didst utterly consume them, forsake them; thou [art] gracious merciful god. therefore, god, great, mighty, terrible god, keepest covenant mercy, let trouble seem little thee, hath come upon us, kings, princes, priests, prophets, fathers, thy people, since time kings assyria unto day. howbeit thou [art] brought upon us; thou hast done right, done wickedly: neither kings, princes, priests, fathers, kept thy law, hearkened unto thy commandments thy testimonies, wherewith thou didst testify them. served thee kingdom, thy great goodness thou gavest them, large fat land thou gavest them, neither turned wicked works. behold, [are] servants day, [for] land thou gavest unto fathers eat fruit thereof good thereof, behold, [are] servants it: yieldeth much increase unto kings thou hast set us sins: also dominion bodies, cattle, pleasure, [are] great distress. make sure [covenant,] write [it;] princes, levites, [and] priests, seal [unto it. ] sealed [were,] nehemiah, tirshatha, son hachaliah, zidkijah, seraiah, azariah, jeremiah, harim, meremoth, obadiah, daniel, ginnethon, baruch, maaziah, bilgai, shemaiah: [were] priests. levites: jeshua son azaniah, binnui sons henadad, kadmiel; brethren, shebaniah, hodijah, kelita, pelaiah, hanan, micha, rehob, hashabiah, zaccur, sherebiah, shebaniah, chief people; parosh, pahath-moab, elam, zatthu, bani, bunni, azgad, bebai, adonijah, bigvai, adin, hodijah, hashum, bezai, magpiash, meshullam, hezir, meshezabeel, zadok, jaddua, hoshea, hananiah, hashub, hallohesh, pileha, shobek, ahijah, hanan, anan, malluch, harim, baanah. rest people, priests, levites, porters, singers, nethinims, separated people lands unto law god, wives, sons, daughters, every one knowledge, understanding; clave brethren, nobles, entered curse, oath, walk god's law, given moses servant god, observe commandments lord lord, judgments statutes; would give daughters unto people land, take daughters sons: [if] people land bring ware victuals sabbath day sell, [that] would buy sabbath, holy day: [that] would leave seventh year, exaction every debt. also made ordinances us, charge yearly third part shekel service house god; [time] jerusalem: two thirtieth year artaxerxes king babylon came unto king, certain days obtained leave king: came jerusalem, understood evil eliashib tobiah, preparing chamber courts house god. grieved sore: therefore cast forth household stuff tobiah chamber. commanded, cleansed chambers: thither brought vessels house god, meat offering frankincense. perceived portions levites given [them:] levites singers, work, fled every one field. contended rulers, said, house god forsaken? fathers thus, god bring evil upon us, upon city? yet ye bring wrath upon israel profaning sabbath. came pass, gates jerusalem began dark sabbath, commanded gates shut, charged opened till sabbath: [some] servants set gates, [that] burden brought sabbath day. merchants sellers kind ware lodged without jerusalem twice. testified them, said unto them, lodge ye wall? ye again, lay hands you. time forth came [more] sabbath. commanded levites cleanse themselves, [that] come [and] keep gates, sanctify sabbath day. remember me, god, [concerning] also, spare according greatness thy mercy. days also saw jews [that] married wives ashdod, ammon, [and] moab: children spake half speech ashdod, could speak jews' language, according language people. contended them, cursed them, smote certain them, plucked hair, made swear god, [saying,] ye shall give daughters unto sons,page 287 nehemiah take daughters unto sons, yourselves. solomon king israel sin things? yet among many nations king like him, beloved god, god made king israel: nevertheless even outlandish women cause sin. shall hearken unto great evil, transgress god marrying strange wives? wood offering, times appointed, firstfruits. remember me, god, good.page 289 esther book esther came pass days ahasuerus, (this [is] ahasuerus reigned, india even unto ethiopia, [over] hundred seven twenty provinces:) [that] days, king ahasuerus sat throne kingdom, [was] shushan palace, third year reign, made feast unto princes servants; power persia media, nobles princes provinces, [being] him: shewed riches glorious kingdom honour excellent majesty many days, [even] hundred fourscore days. days expired, king made feast unto people present shushan palace, unto great small, seven days, court garden king's palace; [where were] white, green, blue, [hangings,] fastened cords fine linen purple silver rings pillars marble: beds [were of] gold silver, upon pavement red, blue, white, black, marble. gave [them] drink vessels gold, (the vessels diverse one another,) royal wine abundance, according state king. drinking [was] according law; none compel: king appointed officers house, according every man's pleasure. also vashti queen made feast women [in] royal house [belonged] king ahasuerus. seventh day, heart king merry wine, commanded mehuman, biztha, harbona, bigtha, abagtha, zethar, carcas, seven chamberlains served presence ahasuerus king, bring vashti queen king crown royal, shew people princes beauty: [was] fair look on. queen vashti refused come king's commandment [his] chamberlains: therefore king wroth, anger burned him. king said wise men, knew times, (for [was] king's manner toward knew law judgment: next unto [was] carshena, shethar, admatha, tarshish, meres, marsena, [and] memucan, seven princes persia media, saw king's face, [and] sat first kingdom;) shall unto queen vashti according law, hath performed commandment king ahasuerus chamberlains? memucan answered king princes, vashti queen hath done wrong king only, also princes, people [are] provinces king ahasuerus. [this] deed queen shall come abroad unto women, shall despise husbands eyes, shall reported, king ahasuerus commanded vashti queen brought him, came not. [likewise] shall ladies persia media say day unto king's princes, heard deed queen. thus [shall arise] much contempt wrath. please king, let go royal commandment him, let written among laws persians medes, altered, vashti come king ahasuerus; let king give royal estate unto another better she. king's decree whichhe shall make shall published throughout empire, (for great,) wives shall give husbands honour, great small. saying pleased king princes; king according word memucan: sent letters king's provinces, every province according writing thereof, every people language, every man bear rule house, [it] published according language every people. things, wrath king ahasuerus appeased, remembered vashti, done, decreed her. said king's servants ministered unto him, let fair young virgins sought king: let king appoint officers provinces kingdom, may gather together fair young virgins unto shushan palace, house women unto custody hege king's chamberlain, keeper women; let things purification given [them: ] let maiden pleaseth king queen instead vashti. thing pleased king; so. [now] shushan palace certain jew, whose name [was] mordecai, son jair, son shimei, son kish, benjamite; carried away jerusalem captivity carried away jeconiah king judah, nebuchadnezzar king babylon carried away. brought hadassah, [is,] esther, uncle's daughter: neither father mother, maid [was] fair beautiful; mordecai, father mother dead, took daughter. came pass, king's commandment decree heard, many maidens gathered together unto shushan palace, custody hegai, esther brought also unto king's house, custody hegai, keeper women. maiden pleased him, obtained kindness him; speedily gave things purification, things belonged her, seven maidens, [which were] meet given her, king's house: preferred maids unto best [place] house women. esther shewed people kindred: mordecai charged shew [it. ] mordecai walked every day court women's house, know esther did, become her. every maid's turn come go king ahasuerus, twelve months, according manner women, (for days purifications accomplished, [to wit,] six months oil myrrh, six months sweet odours, [other] things purifying women;) thus came [every] maiden unto king; whatsoever desired given go house women unto king's house. evening went, morrow returned second house women, custody shaashgaz, king's chamberlain, kept concubines: came unto king more, except king delighted her, called name. turn esther, daughter abihail uncle mordecai, takenesther page 290 daughter, come go unto king, required nothing hegai king's chamberlain, keeper women, appointed. esther obtained favour sight looked upon her. esther taken unto king ahasuerus house royal tenth month, [is] month tebeth, seventh year reign. king loved esther women, obtained grace favour sight virgins; set royal crown upon head, made queen instead vashti. king made great feast unto princes servants, [even] esther's feast; made release provinces, gave gifts, according state king. virgins gathered together second time, mordecai sat king's gate. esther [yet] shewed kindred people; mordecai charged her: esther commandment mordecai, like brought him. days, mordecai sat king's gate, two king's chamberlains, bigthan teresh, kept door, wroth, sought lay hand king ahasuerus. thing known mordecai, told unto esther queen; esther certified king [thereof] mordecai's name. inquisition made matter, found out; therefore hanged tree: written book chronicles king. things king ahasuerus promote haman son hammedatha agagite, advanced him, set seat princes [were] him. king's servants, [were] king's gate, bowed, reverenced haman: king commanded concerning him. mordecai bowed not, [him] reverence. king's servants, [were] king's gate, said unto mordecai, transgressest thou king's commandment? came pass, spake daily unto him, hearkened unto them, told haman, see whether mordecai's matters would stand: told [was] jew. haman saw mordecai bowed not, reverence, haman full wrath. thought scorn lay hands mordecai alone; shewed people mordecai: wherefore haman sought destroy jews [were] throughout whole kingdom ahasuerus, [even] people mordecai. first month, [is,] month nisan, twelfth year king ahasuerus, cast pur, [is,] lot, haman day day, month month, [to] twelfth [month,] [is,] month adar. haman said unto king ahasuerus, certain people scattered abroad dispersed among people provinces thy kingdom; laws [are] diverse people; neither keep king's laws: therefore [is] king's profit suffer them. please king, let written may destroyed: pay ten thousand talents silver hands charge business, bring [it] king's treasuries. king took ring hand, gave unto haman son hammedatha agagite, jews' enemy. king said unto haman, silver [is] given thee, people also, seemeth good thee. king's scribes called thirteenth day first month, written according allthat haman commanded unto king's lieutenants, governors [were] every province, rulers every people every province according writing thereof, [to] every people language; name king ahasuerus written, sealed king's ring. letters sent posts king's provinces, destroy, kill, cause perish, jews, young old, little children women, one day, [even] upon thirteenth [day] twelfth month, [is] month adar, [to take] spoil prey. copy writing commandment given every province published unto people, ready day. posts went out, hastened king's commandment, decree given shushan palace. king haman sat drink; city shushan perplexed. mordecai perceived done, mordecai rent clothes, put sackcloth ashes, went midst city, cried loud bitter cry; came even king's gate: none [might] enter king's gate clothed sackcloth. every province, whithersoever king's commandment decree came, [there was] great mourning among jews, fasting, weeping, wailing; many lay sackcloth ashes. esther's maids chamberlains came told [it] her. queen exceedingly grieved; sent raiment clothe mordecai, take away sackcloth him: received [it] not. called esther hatach, [one] king's chamberlains, appointed attend upon her, gave commandment mordecai, know [was,] [was. ] hatach went forth mordecai unto street city, [was] king's gate. mordecai told happened unto him, sum money haman promised pay king's treasuries jews, destroy them. also gave copy writing decree given shushan destroy them, shew [it] unto esther, declare [it] unto her, charge go unto king, make supplication unto him, make request people. hatach came told esther words mordecai. esther spake unto hatach, gave commandment unto mordecai; king's servants, people king's provinces, know, whosoever, whether man woman, shall come unto king inner court, called, [there is] one law put [him] death, except king shall hold golden sceptre, may live: called come unto king thirty days. told mordecai esther's words. mordecai commanded answer esther, think thyself thou shalt escape king's house, jews. thou altogether holdest thy peace time, [then] shall enlargement deliverance arise jews another place; thou thy father's house shall destroyed: knoweth whether thou art come kingdom [such] time this? esther bade [them] return mordecai [this answer, ] go, gather together jews present shushan, fast ye me, neither eatpage 291 esther drink three days, night day: also maidens fast likewise; [is] thy request? shall even given thee half kingdom. esther answered, [it seem] good unto king, let king haman come day unto banquet prepared him. king said, cause haman make haste, may esther hath said. king haman came banquet esther prepared. king said unto esther banquet wine, [is] thy petition? shall granted thee: [is] thy request? even half kingdom shall performed. answered esther, said, petition request [is; ] found favour sight king, please king grant petition, perform request, let king haman come banquet shall prepare them, morrow king hath said. went haman forth day joyful glad heart: haman saw mordecai king's gate, stood up, moved him, full indignation mordecai. nevertheless haman refrained himself: came home, sent called friends, zeresh wife. haman told glory riches, multitude children, [the things] wherein king promoted him, advanced princes servants king. haman said moreover, yea, esther queen let man come king unto banquet prepared myself; morrow invited unto also king. yet availeth nothing, long see mordecai jew sitting king's gate. said zeresh wife friends unto him, let gallows made fifty cubits high, morrow speak thou unto king mordecai may hanged thereon: go thou merrily king unto banquet. thing pleased haman; caused gallows made. night could king sleep, commanded bring book records chronicles; read king. found written, mordecai told bigthana teresh, two king's chamberlains, keepers door, sought lay hand king ahasuerus. king said, honour dignity hath done mordecai this? said king's servants ministered unto him, nothing done him. king said, [is] court? haman come outward court king'shouse, speak unto king hang mordecai gallows prepared him. king's servants said unto him, behold, haman standeth court. king said, let come in. haman came in. king said unto him, shall done unto man king delighteth honour? haman thought heart, would king delight honour myself? haman answered king, man king delighteth honour, let royal apparel brought king [useth] wear, horse king rideth upon, crown royal set upon head: let apparel horse delivered hand one king's noble princes, may array man [withal] king delighteth honour, bring horseback street city, proclaim him, thus shall done man king delighteth honour. king said haman, make haste, [and] take apparel horse, thou hast said, even mordecai jew, sitteth king's gate: let nothing fail thou hast spoken. took haman apparel horse, arrayed mordecai, brought horseback street city, proclaimed him, thus shall done unto man king delighteth honour. mordecai came king's gate. haman hasted house mourning, head covered. haman told zeresh wife friends every [thing] befallen him. said wise men zeresh wife unto him, mordecai [be] seed jews, thou hast begun fall, thou shalt prevail him, shalt surely fall him. [were] yet talking him, came king's chamberlains, hasted bring haman unto banquet esther prepared. king haman came banquet esther queen. king said unto esther second day banquet wine, [is] thy petition, queen esther? shall granted thee: [is] thy request? shall performed, [even] half kingdom. esther queen answered said, found favour thy sight, king, please king, let life given petition, people request: sold, people, destroyed, slain, perish. sold bondmen bondwomen, held tongue, although enemy could countervail king's damage. king ahasuerus answered said unto esther queen, he, he, durst presume heart so? esther said, adversary enemy [is] wicked haman. haman afraid king queen. king arising banquet wine wrath [went] palace garden: haman stood make request life esther queen; saw evil determined king. king returned palace garden place banquet wine; haman fallen upon bed whereon esther [was.] said king, force queen also house? word went king's mouth, covered haman's face. harbonah, one chamberlains, said king, behold also, gallows fifty cubits high,esther page 292 haman made mordecai, spoken good king, standeth house haman. king said, hang thereon. hanged haman gallows prepared mordecai. king's wrath pacified. day king ahasuerus give house haman jews' enemy unto esther queen. mordecai came king; esther told [was] unto her. king took ring, taken haman, gave unto mordecai. esther set mordecai house haman. esther spake yet king, fell feet, besought tears put away mischief haman agagite, device devised jews. king held golden sceptre toward esther. esther arose, stood king, said, please king, found favour sight, thing [seem] right king, [be] pleasing eyes, let written reverse letters devised haman son hammedatha agagite, wrote destroy jews [are] king's provinces: endure see evil shall come unto people? endure see destruction kindred? king ahasuerus said unto esther queen mordecai jew, behold, given esther house haman, hanged upon gallows, laid hand upon jews. write ye also jews, liketh you, king's name, seal [it] king's ring: writing written king's name, sealed king's ring, may man reverse. king's scribes called time third month, [is,] month sivan, three twentieth [day] thereof; written according mordecai commanded unto jews, lieutenants, deputies rulers provinces [are] india unto ethiopia, hundred twenty seven provinces, unto every province according writing thereof, unto every people language, jews according writing, according language. wrote king ahasuerus' name, sealed king's ring, sent letters posts horseback, [and] riders mules, camels, [and] young dromedaries: wherein king granted jews [were] every city gather together, stand life, destroy, slay, cause perish, power people province would assault them, [both] little ones women, [to take] spoil prey, upon one day provinces king ahasuerus, [namely,] upon thirteenth [day] twelfth month, [is] month adar. copy writing commandment given every province [was] published unto people, jews ready day avenge enemies. [so] posts rode upon mules [and] camels went out, hastened pressed king's commandment. decree given shushan palace. mordecai went presence king royal apparel blue white, great crown gold, garment fine linen purple: city shushan rejoiced glad. jews light, gladness, joy, honour. every province, every city, whithersoever theking's commandment decree came, jews joy gladness, feast good day. many people land became jews; fear jews fell upon them. twelfth month, [is,] month adar, thirteenth day same, king's commandment decree drew near put execution, day enemies jews hoped power them, (though turned contrary, jews rule hated them;) jews gathered together cities throughout provinces king ahasuerus, lay hand sought hurt: man could withstand them; fear fell upon people. rulers provinces, lieutenants, deputies, officers king, helped jews; fear mordecai fell upon them. mordecai [was] great king's house, fame went throughout provinces: man mordecai waxed greater greater. thus jews smote enemies stroke sword, slaughter, destruction, would unto hated them. shushan palace jews slew destroyed five hundred men. parshandatha, dalphon, aspatha, poratha, adalia, aridatha, parmashta, arisai, aridai, vajezatha, ten sons haman son hammedatha, enemy jews, slew they; spoil laid hand. day number slain shushan palace brought king. king said unto esther queen, jews slain destroyed five hundred men shushan palace, ten sons haman; done rest king's provinces? [is] thy petition? shall granted thee: [is] thy request further? shall done. said esther, please king, let granted jews [are] shushan morrow also according unto day's decree, let haman's ten sons hanged upon gallows. king commanded done: decree given shushan; hanged haman's ten sons. jews [were] shushan gathered together fourteenth day also month adar, slew three hundred men shushan; prey laid hand. jews [were] king's provinces gathered together, stood lives, rest enemies, slew foes seventy five thousand, laid hands prey, thirteenth day month adar; fourteenth day rested they, made day feasting gladness. jews [were] shushan assembled together thirteenth [day] thereof; fourteenth thereof; fifteenth [day] rested, made day feasting gladness. therefore jews villages, dwelt unwalled towns, made fourteenth day month adar [a day of] gladness feasting, good day, sending portions one another. mordecai wrote things, sent letters unto jews [were] provinces king ahasuerus, [both] nigh far, stablish [this] among them, keep fourteenth day month adar, fifteenth day same, yearly, days wherein jews restedpage 293 esther enemies, month turned unto sorrow joy, mourning good day: make days feasting joy, sending portions one another, gifts poor. jews undertook begun, mordecai written unto them; haman son hammedatha, agagite, enemy jews, devised jews destroy them, cast pur, [is,] lot, consume them, destroy them; [esther] came king, commanded letters wicked device, devised jews, return upon head, sons hanged gallows. wherefore called days purim name pur. therefore words letter, [of that] seen concerning matter, come unto them, jews ordained, took upon them, upon seed, upon joined unto them, fail, would keep two days according writing, according [appointed] time every year; [that] days [should be] remembered kept throughout every generation, every family, every province, every city; [that] days purim fail among jews, memorial perish seed. esther queen, daughter abihail, mordecai jew, wrote authority, confirm second letter purim. sent letters unto jews, hundred twenty seven provinces kingdom ahasuerus, [with] words peace truth, confirm days purim times [appointed,] according mordecai jew esther queen enjoined them, decreed seed, matters fastings cry. decree esther confirmed matters purim; written book. king ahasuerus laid tribute upon land, [upon] isles sea. acts power might, declaration greatness mordecai, whereunto king advanced him, [are] written book chronicles kings media persia? mordecai jew [was] next unto king ahasuerus, great among jews, accepted multitude brethren, seeking wealth people, speaking peace seed.page 295 job book job man land uz, whose name [was] job; man perfect upright, one feared god, eschewed evil. born unto seven sons three daughters. substance also seven thousand sheep, three thousand camels, five hundred yoke oxen, five hundred asses, great household; man greatest men east. sons went feasted [in their] houses, every one day; sent called three sisters eat drink them. so, days [their] feasting gone about, job sent sanctified them, rose early morning, offered burnt offerings [according] number all: job said, may sons sinned, cursed god hearts. thus job continually. day sons god came present lord, satan came also among them. lord said unto satan, whence comest thou? satan answered lord, said, going fro earth, walking it. lord said unto satan, hast thou considered servant job, [there is] none like earth, perfect upright man, one feareth god, escheweth evil? satan answered lord, said, doth job fear god nought? hast thou made hedge him, house, hath every side? thou hast blessed work hands, substance increased land. put forth thine hand now, touch hath, curse thee thy face. lord said unto satan, behold, hath [is] thy power; upon put forth thine hand. satan went forth presence lord. day sons daughters [were] eating drinking wine eldest brother's house: came messenger unto job, said, oxen plowing, asses feeding beside them: sabeans fell [upon them,] took away; yea, slain servants edge sword; escaped alone tell thee. [was] yet speaking, came also another, said, fire god fallen heaven, hath burned sheep, servants, consumed them; escaped alone tell thee. [was] yet speaking, came also another, said, chaldeans made three bands, fell upon camels, carried away, yea, slain servants edge sword; escaped alone tell thee. [was] yet speaking, came also another, said, thy sons thy daughters [were] eating drinking wine eldest brother's house: and, behold, came great wind wilderness, smote four corners house, fell upon young men, dead; escaped alone tell thee. job arose, rent mantle, shaved head, fell upon ground, worshipped, said, naked came mother's womb, naked shall return thither: lord gave, lord hath taken away; blessed name lord. job sinned not, charged god foolishly. day sons god came present lord, satan came also among present lord. lord said unto satan, whence comest thou? satan answered lord, said, going fro earth, walking it. lord said unto satan, hast thou considered servant job, [there is] none like earth, perfect upright man, one feareth god, escheweth evil? still holdeth fast integrity, although thou movedst him, destroy without cause. satan answered lord, said, skin skin, yea, man hath give life. put forth thine hand now, touch bone flesh, curse thee thy face. lord said unto satan, behold, [is] thine hand; save life. went satan forth presence lord, smote job sore boils sole foot unto crown. took potsherd scrape withal; sat among ashes. said wife unto him, dost thou still retain thine integrity? curse god, die. said unto her, thou speakest one foolish women speaketh. what? shall receive good hand god, shall receive evil? job sin lips. job's three friends heard evil come upon him, came every one place; eliphaz temanite, bildad shuhite, zophar naamathite: made appointment together come mourn comfort him. lifted eyes afar off, knew not, lifted voice, wept; rent every one mantle, sprinkled dust upon heads toward heaven. sat upon ground seven days seven nights, none spake word unto him: saw [his] grief great. opened job mouth, cursed day. let day perish wherein born, night [in which] said, man child conceived. let day darkness; let god regard above, neither let light shine upon it. let darkness shadow death stain it; let cloud dwell upon it; let blackness day terrify it. [for] night, let darkness seize upon it; let joined unto days year, let come number months. lo, let night solitary, let joyful voice come therein. let curse curse day, ready raise mourning. let stars twilight thereof dark; let look light, [have] none; neither let see dawning day: shut doors [mother's] womb, hid sorrow mine eyes. died womb? [why] [not] give ghost came belly? knees prevent me? breasts suck? lain still quiet, slept: rest, kings counsellors earth, built desolate places themselves; princes gold, filled houses silver: hidden untimely birth been; infants [which] never saw light. wicked cease [from] troubling; weary rest. [there]job page 296 prisoners rest together; hear voice oppressor. small great there; servant [is] free master. wherefore light given misery, life unto bitter [in] soul; long death, [cometh] not; dig hid treasures; rejoice exceedingly, [and] glad, find grave? [why light given] man whose way hid, god hath hedged in? sighing cometh eat, roarings poured like waters. thing greatly feared come upon me, afraid come unto me. safety, neither rest, neither quiet; yet trouble came. eliphaz temanite answered said, [if] assay commune thee, wilt thou grieved? withhold speaking? behold, thou hast instructed many, thou hast strengthened weak hands. thy words upholden falling, thou hast strengthened feeble knees. come upon thee, thou faintest; toucheth thee, thou art troubled. [is] [this] thy fear, thy confidence, thy hope, uprightness thy ways? remember, pray thee, [ever] perished, innocent? righteous cut off? even seen, plow iniquity, sow wickedness, reap same. blast god perish, breath nostrils consumed. roaring lion, voice fierce lion, teeth young lions, broken. old lion perisheth lack prey, stout lion's whelps scattered abroad. thing secretly brought me, mine ear received little thereof. thoughts visions night, deep sleep falleth men, fear came upon me, trembling, made bones shake. spirit passed face; hair flesh stood up: stood still, could discern form thereof: image [was] mine eyes, [there was] silence, heard voice, [saying, ] shall mortal man god? shall man pure maker? behold, put trust servants; angels charged folly: much less [in] dwell houses clay, whose foundation [is] dust, [which] crushed moth? destroyed morning evening: perish ever without regarding [it. ] doth excellency [which is] go away? die, even without wisdom. call now, answer thee; saints wilt thou turn? wrath killeth foolish man, envy slayeth silly one. seen foolish taking root: suddenly cursed habitation. children far safety, crushed gate, neither [is there] deliver [them. ] whose harvest hungry eateth up, taketh even thorns, robber swalloweth substance. although affliction cometh forth dust, neither doth trouble spring ground; yet man born unto trouble, sparks fly upward. would seek unto god, unto god would commit cause: doeth great things unsearchable; marvellous things without number: giveth rain upon earth, sendeth waters upon fields: set high low; mourn may exalted safety. disappointeth devices crafty, handscannot perform [their] enterprise. taketh wise craftiness: counsel froward carried headlong. meet darkness daytime, grope noonday night. saveth poor sword, mouth, hand mighty. poor hath hope, iniquity stoppeth mouth. behold, happy [is] man god correcteth: therefore despise thou chastening almighty: maketh sore, bindeth up: woundeth, hands make whole. shall deliver thee six troubles: yea, seven shall evil touch thee. famine shall redeem thee death: war power sword. thou shalt hid scourge tongue: neither shalt thou afraid destruction cometh. destruction famine thou shalt laugh: neither shalt thou afraid beasts earth. thou shalt league stones field: beasts field shall peace thee. thou shalt know thy tabernacle [shall be] peace; thou shalt visit thy habitation, shalt sin. thou shalt know also thy seed [shall be] great, thine offspring grass earth. thou shalt come [thy] grave full age, like shock corn cometh season. lo this, searched it, [is;] hear it, know thou [it] thy good. grief throughly weighed, calamity laid balances together! would heavier sand sea: therefore words swallowed up. arrows almighty [are] within me, poison whereof drinketh spirit: terrors god set array me. doth wild ass bray hath grass? [any] taste white egg? things [that] soul refused touch [are] sorrowful meat. oh might request; god would grant [me] thing long for! even would please god destroy me; would let loose hand, cut off! yet comfort; yea, would harden sorrow: let spare; concealed words holy one. [is] strength, hope? [is] mine end, prolong life? [is] strength strength stones? [is] flesh brass? [is] help me? wisdom driven quite me? afflicted pity [should shewed] friend; forsaketh fear almighty. brethren dealt deceitfully brook, [and] stream brooks pass away; blackish reason ice, [and] wherein snow hid: time wax warm, vanish: hot, consumed place. paths way turned aside; go nothing, perish. troops tema looked, companies sheba waited them. confounded hoped; came thither, ashamed. ye thing; ye see [my] casting down, afraid. say, bring unto me? or, give reward substance? or, deliver enemy's hand? or, redeem hand mighty? teach me, hold tongue: cause understand wherein erred. forcible right words! doth arguing reprove? ye imagine reprove words, speeches one desperate, [which are] wind?page 297 job yea, ye overwhelm fatherless, ye dig [a pit] friend. therefore content, look upon me; [it is] evident unto lie. return, pray you, let iniquity; yea, return again, righteousness [is] it. iniquity tongue? cannot taste discern perverse things? [is there] appointed time man upon earth? [are not] days also like days hireling? servant earnestly desireth shadow, hireling looketh [the reward of] work: made possess months vanity, wearisome nights appointed me. lie down, say, shall arise, night gone? full tossings fro unto dawning day. flesh clothed worms clods dust; skin broken, become loathsome. days swifter weaver's shuttle, spent without hope. remember life wind: mine eye shall see good. eye hath seen shall see [more:] thine eyes [are] upon me, [am] not. [as] cloud consumed vanisheth away: goeth grave shall come [more. ] shall return house, neither shall place know more. therefore refrain mouth; speak anguish spirit; complain bitterness soul. [am] sea, whale, thou settest watch me? say, bed shall comfort me, couch shall ease complaint; thou scarest dreams, terrifiest visions: soul chooseth strangling, [and] death rather life. loathe [it;] would live alway: let alone; days [are] vanity. [is] man, thou shouldest magnify him? thou shouldest set thine heart upon him? [that] thou shouldest visit every morning, [and] try every moment? long wilt thou depart me, let alone till swallow spittle? sinned; shall unto thee, thou preserver men? hast thou set mark thee, burden myself? dost thou pardon transgression, take away mine iniquity? shall sleep dust; thou shalt seek morning, [shall] [be. ] long wilt thou speak [things?] [how long shall] words thy mouth like strong wind? doth god pervert judgment? doth almighty pervert justice? thy children sinned him, cast away transgression; thou wouldest seek unto god betimes, make thy supplication almighty; thou [wert] pure upright; surely would awake thee, make habitation thy righteousness prosperous. though thy beginning small, yet thy latter end greatly increase. enquire, pray thee, former age, prepare thyself search fathers: (for [are of] yesterday, know nothing, days upon earth [are] shadow:) shall teach thee, [and] tell thee, utter words heart? rush grow without mire? flag grow without water? whilst [is] yet greenness, [and] cut down, withereth [other] herb. [are] paths forget god; hypocrite's hope shall perish: whose hope shall cut off, whose trust [shall be] spider's web. shall lean upon house, shall stand: shall hold fast, shall endure. he[is] green sun, branch shooteth forth garden. roots wrapped heap, [and] seeth place stones. destroy place, [it] shall deny him, [saying,] seen thee. behold, [is] joy way, earth shall others grow. behold, god cast away perfect [man,] neither help evil doers: till fill thy mouth laughing, thy lips rejoicing. hate thee shall clothed shame; dwelling place wicked shall come nought. know [it is] truth: man god? contend him, cannot answer one thousand. [he is] wise heart, mighty strength: hath hardened [himself] him, hath prospered? removeth mountains, know not: overturneth anger. shaketh earth place, pillars thereof tremble. commandeth sun, riseth not; sealeth stars. alone spreadeth heavens, treadeth upon waves sea. maketh arcturus, orion, pleiades, chambers south. doeth great things past finding out; yea, wonders without number. lo, goeth me, see [him] not: passeth also, perceive not. behold, taketh away, hinder him? say unto him, doest thou? [if] god withdraw anger, proud helpers stoop him. much less shall answer him, [and] choose words [to reason] him? whom, though righteous, [yet] would answer, [but] would make supplication judge. called, answered me; [yet] would believe hearkened unto voice. breaketh tempest, multiplieth wounds without cause. suffer take breath, filleth bitterness. [is] one [thing,] therefore said [it,] destroyeth perfect wicked. scourge slay suddenly, laugh trial innocent. earth given hand wicked: covereth faces judges thereof; not, where, [and] [is] he? days swifter post: flee away, see good. passed away swift ships: eagle [that] hasteth prey. say, forget complaint, leave heaviness, comfort [myself: ] afraid sorrows, know thou wilt hold innocent. [are] thy years man's days, thou enquirest mine iniquity, searchest sin? thou knowest wicked; [there is] none deliver thine hand. thine hands made fashioned together round about; yet thou dost destroy me. remember, beseech thee, thou hast made clay; wilt thou bring dust again? hast thou poured milk, curdled like cheese? thou hast clothed skin flesh, hast fenced bones sinews. thou hast granted life favour, thy visitation hath preserved spirit. [things] hast thou hid thine heart: know [is] thee. sin, thou markest me, thou wilt acquit mine iniquity. wicked, woe unto me; [if] righteous, [yet] lift head. [i am] full confusion; therefore see thou mine affliction; increaseth. thou huntest fierce lion: thou shewest thyself marvellous upon me. thou renewest thy witnesses me, increasest thine indignation upon me; changes war [are] me. wherefore hast thou brought forth womb? oh given ghost, eye seen me! though been; carried womb grave. [are] days few? cease [then, and] let alone, may take comfort little, go [whence] shall return, [even] land darkness shadow death; land darkness, darkness [itself; and] shadow death, without order, [where] light [is] darkness. answered zophar naamathite, said, multitude words answered? man full talk justified? thy lies make men hold peace? thou mockest, shall man make thee ashamed? thou hast said, doctrine [is] pure, clean thine eyes. oh god would speak, open lips thee; would shew thee secrets wisdom, [they are] double is! know therefore god exacteth thee [less] thine iniquity [deserveth. ] canst thou searching find god? canst thou find almighty unto perfection? [it is] high heaven; canst thou do? deeper hell; canst thou know? measure thereof [is] longer earth, broader sea. cut off, shut up, gather together, hinder him? knoweth vain men: seeth wickedness also; consider [it? ] vain man would wise, though man born [like] wild ass's colt. thou prepare thine heart, stretch thine hands toward him; iniquity [be] thine hand, put far away, let wickedness dwell thy tabernacles. shalt thou lift thy face without spot; yea, thou shalt stedfast, shalt fear: thou shalt forget [thy] misery, [and] remember [it] waters [that] pass away: [thine] age shall clearer noonday; thou shalt shine forth, thou shalt morning. thou shalt secure, hope; yea, thou shalt dig [about thee, and] thou shalt take thy rest safety. also thou shalt lie down, none shall make [thee] afraid; yea, many shall make suit unto thee. eyes wicked shall fail, shall escape, hope [shall as] giving ghost. doubt ye [are] people, wisdom shall die you. understanding well you; [am] inferior you: yea, knoweth things these? [as] one mocked neighbour, calleth upon god, answereth him: upright [man is] laughed scorn. ready slip [his] feet [is as] lamp despised thought ease. tabernacles robbers prosper, provoke god secure; whose hand god bringeth [abundantly. ] ask beasts, shall teach thee; fowls air, shall tell thee: speak earth, shall teach thee: fishes sea shall declare unto thee. knoweth hand lord hath wrought this? whose hand [is] soul every living thing, breath mankind. doth ear try words? mouth taste meat? ancient [is] wisdom; length days understanding. [is] wisdom strength, hath counsel understanding. behold, breaketh down, cannot built again: shutteth man, opening. behold, withholdeth waters, dry up: also sendeth out, overturn earth. [is] strength wisdom: deceived deceiver [are] his. leadeth counsellors away spoiled, maketh judges fools. looseth bond kings, girdeth loins girdle. leadeth princes away spoiled, overthroweth mighty. removeth away speech trusty, taketh away understanding aged. poureth contempt upon princes, weakeneth strength mighty. discovereth deep things darkness, bringeth light shadow death. increaseth nations, destroyeth them: enlargeth nations, straiteneth [again. ] taketh away heart chief people earth, causeth wander wilderness [where is] way. grope dark without light, maketh stagger like [a] drunken [man. ] lo, mine eye hath seen [this,] mine ear hath heard understood it. ye know, [the same] know also: [am] inferior unto you. surely would speak almighty, desire reason god. ye [are] forgers lies, ye [are] physicians value. oh ye would altogether hold peace! wisdom. hear reasoning, hearken pleadings lips. ye speak wickedly god? talk deceitfully him? ye accept person? ye contend god? good search out? one man mocketh another, ye [so] mock him? surely reprove you, ye secretly accept persons. shall excellency make afraid? dread fall upon you? remembrances [are] like unto ashes, bodies bodies clay. hold peace, let alone, may speak, let come [will. ] wherefore take flesh teeth, put life mine hand? though slay me, yet trust him: maintain mine ways him. also [shall be] salvation: hypocrite shall comepage 299 job him. hear diligently speech, declaration ears. behold now, ordered [my] cause; know shall justified. [is] [that] plead me? now, hold tongue, shall give ghost. two [things] unto me: hide thee. withdraw thine hand far me: let thy dread make afraid. call thou, answer: let speak, answer thou me. many [are] mine iniquities sins? make know transgression sin. wherefore hidest thou thy face, holdest thine enemy? wilt thou break leaf driven fro? wilt thou pursue dry stubble? thou writest bitter things me, makest possess iniquities youth. thou puttest feet also stocks, lookest narrowly unto paths; thou settest print upon heels feet. he, rotten thing, consumeth, garment moth eaten. man [that is] born woman [is] days, full trouble. cometh forth like flower, cut down: fleeth also shadow, continueth not. dost thou open thine eyes upon one, bringest judgment thee? bring clean [thing] unclean? one. seeing days [are] determined, number months [are] thee, thou hast appointed bounds cannot pass; turn him, may rest, till shall accomplish, hireling, day. hope tree, cut down, sprout again, tender branch thereof cease. though root thereof wax old earth, stock thereof die ground; [yet] scent water bud, bring forth boughs like plant. man dieth, wasteth away: yea, man giveth ghost, [is] he? [as] waters fail sea, flood decayeth drieth up: man lieth down, riseth not: till heavens [be] more, shall awake, raised sleep. oh thou wouldest hide grave, thou wouldest keep secret, thy wrath past, thou wouldest appoint set time, remember me! man die, shall live [again?] days appointed time wait, till change come. thou shalt call, answer thee: thou wilt desire work thine hands. thou numberest steps: dost thou watch sin? transgression [is] sealed bag, thou sewest mine iniquity. surely mountain falling cometh nought, rock removed place. waters wear stones: thou washest away things grow [out] dust earth; thou destroyest hope man. thou prevailest ever him, passeth: thou changest countenance, sendest away. sons come honour, knoweth [it] not; brought low, perceiveth [it] them. flesh upon shall pain, soul within shall mourn. answered eliphaz temanite, said, wise man utter vain knowledge, fill belly east wind? reason unprofitable talk? speeches wherewith good? yea, thou castest fear, restrainest prayer god. thy mouth uttereth thine iniquity, thou choosest tongue crafty. thine mouth condemneth thee, i: yea, thineown lips testify thee. [art] thou first man [that] born? wast thou made hills? hast thou heard secret god? dost thou restrain wisdom thyself? knowest thou, know not? [what] understandest thou, [is] us? us [are] grayheaded aged men, much elder thy father. [are] consolations god small thee? secret thing thee? doth thine heart carry thee away? thy eyes wink at, thou turnest thy spirit god, lettest [such] words go thy mouth? [is] man, clean?
