[but] would strengthen mouth, moving lips asswage [your grief. ] though speak, grief asswaged: [though] forbear, eased? hath made weary: thou hast made desolate company. thou hast filled wrinkles, [which] witness [against me:] leanness rising beareth witness face. teareth [me] wrath, hateth me: gnasheth upon teeth; mine enemy sharpeneth eyes upon me. gaped upon mouth; smitten upon cheek reproachfully; gathered togetherjob page 300 me. god hath delivered ungodly, turned hands wicked. ease, hath broken asunder: hath also taken [me] neck, shaken pieces, set mark. archers compass round about, cleaveth reins asunder, doth spare; poureth gall upon ground. breaketh breach upon breach, runneth upon like giant. sewed sackcloth upon skin, defiled horn dust. face foul weeping, eyelids shadow death; [any] injustice mine hands: also prayer [is] pure. earth, cover thou blood, let cry place. also now, behold, witness [is] heaven, record [is] high. friends scorn me: [but] mine eye poureth [tears] unto god. oh one might plead man god, man [pleadeth] neighbour! years come, shall go way [whence] shall return. breath corrupt, days extinct, graves [are ready] me. [are there] mockers me? doth mine eye continue provocation? lay now, put surety thee; [is] [that] strike hands me? thou hast hid heart understanding: therefore shalt thou exalt [them. ] speaketh flattery [his] friends, even eyes children shall fail. hath made also byword people; aforetime tabret. mine eye also dim reason sorrow, members [are] shadow. upright [men] shall astonied this, innocent shall stir hypocrite. righteous also shall hold way, hath clean hands shall stronger stronger. all, ye return, come now: cannot find [one] wise [man] among you. days past, purposes broken off, [even] thoughts heart. change night day: light [is] short darkness. wait, grave [is] mine house: made bed darkness. said corruption, thou [art] father: worm, [thou art] mother, sister. [is] hope? hope, shall see it? shall go bars pit, [our] rest together [is] dust. answered bildad shuhite, said, long [will ere] ye make end words? mark, afterwards speak. wherefore counted beasts, [and] reputed vile sight? teareth anger: shall earth forsaken thee? shall rock removed place? yea, light wicked shall put out, spark fire shall shine. light shall dark tabernacle, candle shall put him. steps strength shall straitened, counsel shall cast down. cast net feet, walketh upon snare. gin shall take [him] heel, [and] robber shall prevail him. snare [is] laid ground, trap way. terrors shall make afraid every side, shall drive feet. strength shall hungerbitten, destruction [shall be] ready side. shall devour strength skin: [even] firstborn death shall devour strength. confidence shall rooted tabernacle, shallbring king terrors. shall dwell tabernacle, [it is] none his: brimstone shall scattered upon habitation. roots shall dried beneath, shall branch cut off. remembrance shall perish earth, shall name street. shall driven light darkness, chased world. shall neither son nephew among people, remaining dwellings. come [him] shall astonied day, went affrighted. surely [are] dwellings wicked, [is] place [of that] knoweth god. long ye vex soul, break pieces words? ten times ye reproached me: ye ashamed [that] ye make strange me. indeed [that] erred, mine error remaineth myself. indeed ye magnify [yourselves] me, plead reproach: know god hath overthrown me, hath compassed net. behold, cry wrong, heard: cry aloud, [there is] judgment. hath fenced way cannot pass, hath set darkness paths. hath stripped glory, taken crown [from] head. hath destroyed every side, gone: mine hope hath removed like tree. hath also kindled wrath me, counteth unto [one of] enemies. troops come together, raise way me, encamp round tabernacle. hath put brethren far me, mine acquaintance verily estranged me. kinsfolk failed, familiar friends forgotten me. dwell mine house, maids, count stranger: alien sight. called servant, gave [me] answer; intreated mouth. breath strange wife, though intreated children's [sake] mine body. yea, young children despised me; arose, spake me. inward friends abhorred me: loved turned me. bone cleaveth skin flesh, escaped skin teeth. pity upon me, pity upon me, ye friends; hand god hath touched me. ye persecute god, satisfied flesh? oh words written! oh printed book! graven iron pen lead rock ever! know [that] redeemer liveth, [that] shall stand latter [day] upon earth: [though] skin [worms] destroy [body,] yet flesh shall see god: shall see myself, mine eyes shall behold, another; [though] reins consumed within me. ye say, persecute him, seeing root matter found me? ye afraid sword: wrath [bringeth] punishments sword, ye may know [there is] judgment. answered zophar naamathite, said, therefore thoughts cause answer, [this] make haste. heard check reproach, spirit understanding causeth answer. knowest thou [not] old, since man placed upon earth, triumphingpage 301 job wicked [is] short, joy hypocrite [but] moment? though excellency mount heavens, head reach unto clouds; [yet] shall perish ever like dung: seen shall say, [is] he? shall fly away dream, shall found: yea, shall chased away vision night. eye also [which] saw shall [see him] more; neither shall place behold him. children shall seek please poor, hands shall restore goods. bones full [of sin] youth, shall lie dust. though wickedness sweet mouth, [though] hide tongue; [though] spare it, forsake not; keep still within mouth: [yet] meat bowels turned, [it is] gall asps within him. hath swallowed riches, shall vomit again: god shall cast belly. shall suck poison asps: viper's tongue shall slay him. shall see rivers, floods, brooks honey butter. laboured shall restore, shall swallow [it] down: according [his] substance [shall] restitution [be,] shall rejoice [therein. ] hath oppressed [and] hath forsaken poor; [because] hath violently taken away house builded not; surely shall feel quietness belly, shall save desired. shall none meat left; therefore shall man look goods. fulness sufficiency shall straits: every hand wicked shall come upon him. [when] fill belly, [god] shall cast fury wrath upon him, shall rain [it] upon eating. shall flee iron weapon, [and] bow steel shall strike through. drawn, cometh body; yea, glittering sword cometh gall: terrors [are] upon him. darkness [shall be] hid secret places: fire blown shall consume him; shall go ill left tabernacle. heaven shall reveal iniquity; earth shall rise him. increase house shall depart, [and goods] shall flow away day wrath. [is] portion wicked man god, heritage appointed unto god. hear diligently speech, let consolations. suffer may speak; spoken, mock on. me, [is] complaint man? [it so,] spirit troubled? mark me, astonished, lay [your] hand upon [your] mouth. even remember afraid, trembling taketh hold flesh. wherefore wicked live, become old, yea, mighty power? seed established sight them, offspring eyes. houses [are] safe fear, neither [is] rod god upon them. bull gendereth, faileth not; cow calveth, casteth calf. send forth little ones like flock, children dance. take timbrel harp, rejoice sound organ. spend days wealth, moment go grave. therefore say unto god, depart us; desire knowledge thy ways. [is] almighty, serve him? profit have, pray unto him? lo, good [is] hand: counsel wicked far me. oft candle ofthe wicked put out! [how oft] cometh destruction upon them! [god] distributeth sorrows anger. stubble wind, chaff storm carrieth away. god layeth iniquity children: rewardeth him, shall know [it. ] eyes shall see destruction, shall drink wrath almighty. pleasure [hath] house him, number months cut midst? shall [any] teach god knowledge? seeing judgeth high. one dieth full strength, wholly ease quiet. breasts full milk, bones moistened marrow. another dieth bitterness soul, never eateth pleasure. shall lie alike dust, worms shall cover them. behold, know thoughts, devices [which] ye wrongfully imagine me. ye say, [is] house prince? [are] dwelling places wicked? ye asked go way? ye know tokens, wicked reserved day destruction? shall brought forth day wrath. shall declare way face? shall repay [what] hath done? yet shall brought grave, shall remain tomb. clods valley shall sweet unto him, every man shall draw him, [there are] innumerable him. comfort ye vain, seeing answers remaineth falsehood? eliphaz temanite answered said, man profitable unto god, wise may profitable unto himself? [is it] pleasure almighty, thou art righteous? [is it] gain [to him] thou makest thy ways perfect? reprove thee fear thee? enter thee judgment? [is] thy wickedness great? thine iniquities infinite? thou hast taken pledge thy brother nought, stripped naked clothing. thou hast given water weary drink, thou hast withholden bread hungry. [as for] mighty man, earth; honourable man dwelt it. thou hast sent widows away empty, arms fatherless broken. therefore snares [are] round thee, sudden fear troubleth thee; darkness, [that] thou canst see; abundance waters cover thee. [is] god height heaven? behold height stars, high are! thou sayest, doth god know? judge dark cloud? thick clouds [are] covering him, seeth not; walketh circuit heaven. hast thou marked old way wicked men trodden? cut time, whose foundation overflown flood: said unto god, depart us: almighty them? yet filled houses good [things:] counsel wicked far me. righteous see [it,] glad: innocent laugh scorn. whereas substance cut down, remnant fire consumeth. acquaint thyself him, peace: thereby good shall come unto thee. receive, pray thee, law mouth, lay words thine heart. thou return almighty, thou shalt built up, thou shalt put away iniquity far thy tabernacles. shalt thou lay gold dust, [gold] ophir stonesjob page 302 brooks. yea, almighty shall thy defence, thou shalt plenty silver. shalt thou thy delight almighty, shalt lift thy face unto god. thou shalt make thy prayer unto him, shall hear thee, thou shalt pay thy vows. thou shalt also decree thing, shall established unto thee: light shall shine upon thy ways. [men] cast down, thou shalt say, [there is] lifting up; shall save humble person. shall deliver island innocent: delivered pureness thine hands. even day [is] complaint bitter: stroke heavier groaning. oh knew might find him! [that] might come [even] seat! would order [my] cause him, fill mouth arguments. would know words [which] would answer me, understand would say unto me. plead [his] great power? no; would put [strength] me. righteous might dispute him; delivered ever judge. behold, go forward, [is] [there;] backward, cannot perceive him: left hand, doth work, cannot behold [him:] hideth right hand, cannot see [him: ] knoweth way take: [when] hath tried me, shall come forth gold. foot hath held steps, way kept, declined. neither gone back commandment lips; esteemed words mouth necessary [food. ] [is] one [mind,] turn him? [what] soul desireth, even [that] doeth. performeth [the thing is] appointed me: many [things are] him. therefore troubled presence: consider, afraid him. god maketh heart soft, almighty troubleth me: cut darkness, [neither] hath covered darkness face. why, seeing times hidden almighty, know see days? [some] remove landmarks; violently take away flocks, feed [thereof. ] drive away ass fatherless, take widow's ox pledge. turn needy way: poor earth hide together. behold, [as] wild asses desert, go forth work; rising betimes prey: wilderness [yieldeth] food [and] [their] children. reap [every one] corn field: gather vintage wicked. cause naked lodge without clothing, [they have] covering cold. wet showers mountains, embrace rock want shelter. pluck fatherless breast, take pledge poor. cause [him] go naked without clothing, take away sheaf [from] hungry; [which] make oil within walls, [and] tread [their] winepresses, suffer thirst. men groan city, soul wounded crieth out: yet god layeth folly [to them. ] rebel light; know ways thereof, abide paths thereof. murderer rising light killeth poor needy, night thief. eye also adulterer waiteth twilight, saying, eye shall see me: disguiseth [his] face. dark dig houses, [which] markedfor daytime: know light. morning [is] even shadow death: [one] know [them, in] terrors shadow death. [is] swift waters; portion cursed earth: beholdeth way vineyards. drought heat consume snow waters: [so doth] grave [those which] sinned. womb shall forget him; worm shall feed sweetly him; shall remembered; wickedness shall broken tree. evil entreateth barren [beareth] not: doeth good widow. draweth also mighty power: riseth up, [man] sure life. [though] given [to be] safety, whereon resteth; yet eyes [are] upon ways. exalted little while, gone brought low; taken way [other,] cut tops ears corn. [it be] [so] now, make liar, make speech nothing worth? answered bildad shuhite, said, dominion fear [are] him, maketh peace high places. number armies? upon doth light arise? man justified god? clean [that is] born woman? behold even moon, shineth not; yea, stars pure sight. much less man, [that is] worm? son man, [which is] worm? hast thou helped [him is] without power? [how] savest thou arm [that hath] strength? hast thou counseled [him hath] wisdom? [how] hast thou plentifully declared thing is? hast thou uttered words? whose spirit came thee? dead [things] formed waters, inhabitants thereof. hell [is] naked him, destruction hath covering. stretcheth north empty place, [and] hangeth earth upon nothing. bindeth waters thick clouds; cloud rent them. holdeth back face throne, [and] spreadeth cloud upon it. hath compassed waters bounds, day night come end. pillars heaven tremble astonished reproof. divideth sea power, understanding smiteth proud. spirit hath garnished heavens; hand hath formed crooked serpent. lo, [are] parts ways: little portion heard him? thunder power understand? moreover job continued parable, said, [as] god liveth, [who] hath taken away judgment; almighty, [who] hath vexed soul; breath [is] me, spirit god [is] nostrils; lips shall speak wickedness, tongue utter deceit. god forbid justify you: till die remove mine integrity me. righteousness hold fast, let go: heart shall reproach [me] long live. let mine enemy wicked, riseth unrighteous. [is] hope hypocrite, though hath gained, god taketh away soul? god hear cry trouble cometh upon him? delight almighty? always call upon god?page 303 job teach hand god: [that] [is] almighty conceal. behold, ye seen [it;] ye thus altogether vain? [is] portion wicked man god, heritage oppressors, [which] shall receive almighty. children multiplied, [it is] sword: offspring shall satisfied bread. remain shall buried death: widows shall weep. though heap silver dust, prepare raiment clay; may prepare [it,] shall put [it] on, innocent shall divide silver. buildeth house moth, booth [that] keeper maketh. rich man shall lie down, shall gathered: openeth eyes, [is] not. terrors take hold waters, tempest stealeth away night. east wind carrieth away, departeth: storm hurleth place. [god] shall cast upon him, spare: would fain flee hand. [men] shall clap hands him, shall hiss place. surely vein silver, place gold [where] fine [it. ] iron taken earth, brass [is] molten [out of] stone. setteth end darkness, searcheth perfection: stones darkness, shadow death. flood breaketh inhabitant; [even waters] forgotten foot: dried up, gone away men. [as for] earth, cometh bread: turned fire. stones [are] place sapphires: hath dust gold. [there is] path fowl knoweth, vulture's eye hath seen: lion's whelps trodden it, fierce lion passed it. putteth forth hand upon rock; overturneth mountains roots. cutteth rivers among rocks; eye seeth every precious thing. bindeth floods overflowing; [the thing is] hid bringeth forth light. shall wisdom found? [is] place understanding? man knoweth price thereof; neither found land living. depth saith, [is] me: sea saith, [it is] me. cannot gotten gold, neither shall silver weighed [for] price thereof. cannot valued gold ophir, precious onyx, sapphire. gold crystal cannot equal it: exchange [shall for] jewels fine gold. mention shall made coral, pearls: price wisdom [is] rubies. topaz ethiopia shall equal it, neither shall valued pure gold. whence cometh wisdom? [is] place understanding? seeing hid eyes living, kept close fowls air. destruction death say, heard fame thereof ears. god understandeth way thereof, knoweth place thereof. looketh ends earth, [and] seeth whole heaven; make weight winds; weigheth waters measure. made decree rain, way lightning thunder: see it, declare it; prepared it, yea, searched out. unto man said, behold, fear lord, [is] wisdom; depart evil [is] understanding. moreover job continued parable, said, oh [in] months past, [in] days [when] god preserved me; candle shined upon head, [and when] light walked [through] darkness; days youth, secret god [was] upon tabernacle; almighty [was] yet me, [when] children [were] me; washed steps butter, rock poured rivers oil; went gate city, [when] prepared seat street! young men saw me, hid themselves: aged arose, [and] stood up. princes refrained talking, laid [their] hand mouth. nobles held peace, tongue cleaved roof mouth. ear heard [me,] blessed me; eye saw [me,] gave witness me: delivered poor cried, fatherless, [him had] none help him. blessing ready perish came upon me: caused widow's heart sing joy. put righteousness, clothed me: judgment [was] robe diadem. eyes blind, feet [was] lame. [was] father poor: cause [which] knew searched out. brake jaws wicked, plucked spoil teeth. said, shall die nest, shall multiply [my] days sand. root [was] spread waters, dew lay night upon branch. glory [was] fresh me, bow renewed hand. unto [men] gave ear, waited, kept silence counsel. words spake again; speech dropped upon them. waited rain; opened mouth wide [as] latter rain. [if] laughed them, believed [it] not; light countenance cast down. chose way, sat chief, dwelt king army, one [that] comforteth mourners. [they are] younger derision, whose fathers would disdained set dogs flock. yea, whereto [might] strength hands [profit] me, old age perished? want famine [they were] solitary; fleeing wilderness former time desolate waste. cut mallows bushes, juniper roots [for] meat. driven forth among [men,] (they cried [after] thief;) dwell cliffs valleys, [in] caves earth, [in] rocks. among bushes brayed; nettles gathered together. [they were] children fools, yea, children base men: viler earth. song, yea, byword. abhor me, flee far me, spare spit face. hath loosed cord, afflicted me, also let loose bridle me. upon [my] right [hand] rise youth; push away feet, raise ways destruction. mar path, set forward calamity, helper. came [upon me] wide breaking [of waters:] desolation rolled [upon me. ] terrors turned upon me: pursue soul wind: welfare passeth away cloud. soul poured upon me; days affliction taken hold upon me. bones pierced night season: sinews take rest. great force [ofjob page 304 disease] garment changed: bindeth collar coat. hath cast mire, become like dust ashes. cry unto thee, thou dost hear me: stand up, thou regardest [not. ] thou art become cruel me: thy strong hand thou opposest thyself me. thou liftest wind; thou causest ride [upon it,] dissolvest substance. know [that] thou wilt bring [to] death, [to] house appointed living. howbeit stretch [his] hand grave, though cry destruction. weep trouble? [not] soul grieved poor? looked good, evil came [unto me:] waited light, came darkness. bowels boiled, rested not: days affliction prevented me. went mourning without sun: stood up, [and] cried congregation. brother dragons, companion owls. skin black upon me, bones burned heat. harp also [turned] mourning, organ voice weep. made covenant mine eyes; think upon maid? portion god [is there] above? [what] inheritance almighty high? [is] destruction wicked? strange [punishment] workers iniquity? doth see ways, count steps? walked vanity, foot hath hasted deceit; let weighed even balance, god may know mine integrity. step hath turned way, mine heart walked mine eyes, blot hath cleaved mine hands; [then] let sow, let another eat; yea, let offspring rooted out. mine heart deceived woman, [if] laid wait neighbour's door; [then] let wife grind unto another, let others bow upon her. [is] heinous crime; yea, [is] iniquity [to punished by] judges. [is] fire [that] consumeth destruction, would root mine increase. despise cause manservant maidservant, contended me; shall god riseth up? visiteth, shall answer him? made womb make him? one fashion us womb? withheld poor [their] desire, caused eyes widow fail; eaten morsel alone, fatherless hath eaten thereof; (for youth brought me, [with] father, guided mother's womb;) seen perish want clothing, poor without covering; loins blessed me, [if] [not] warmed fleece sheep; lifted hand fatherless, saw help gate: [then] let mine arm fall shoulder blade, mine arm broken bone. destruction [from] god [was] terror me, reason highness could endure. made gold hope, said fine gold, [thou art] confidence; rejoiced wealth [was] great, mine hand gotten much; beheld sun shined, moon walking [in] brightness; heart hath secretly enticed, mouth hath kissed hand: also [were] iniquity [to punished by] judge: denied god[that is] above. rejoiced destruction hated me, lifted evil found him: neither suffered mouth sin wishing curse soul. men tabernacle said not, oh flesh! cannot satisfied. stranger lodge street: [but] opened doors traveller. covered transgressions adam, hiding mine iniquity bosom: fear great multitude, contempt families terrify me, kept silence, [and] went door? oh one would hear me! behold, desire [is, that] almighty would answer me, [that] mine adversary written book. surely would take upon shoulder, [and] bind [as] crown me. would declare unto number steps; prince would go near unto him. land cry me, furrows likewise thereof complain; eaten fruits thereof without money, caused owners thereof lose life: let thistles grow instead wheat, cockle instead barley. words job ended. three men ceased answer job, [was] righteous eyes. kindled wrath elihu son barachel buzite, kindred ram: job wrath kindled, justified rather god. also three friends wrath kindled, found answer, yet condemned job. elihu waited till job spoken, elder he. elihu saw [there was] answer mouth [these] three men, wrath kindled. elihu son barachel buzite answered said, [am] young, ye [are] old; wherefore afraid, durst shew mine opinion. said, days speak, multitude years teach wisdom. [there is] spirit man: inspiration almighty giveth understanding. great men [always] wise: neither aged understand judgment. therefore said, hearken me; also shew mine opinion. behold, waited words; gave ear reasons, whilst ye searched say. yea, attended unto you, and, behold, [there was] none convinced job, answered words: lest ye say, found wisdom: god thrusteth down, man. hath directed [his] words me: neither answer speeches. amazed, answered more: left speaking. waited, (for spake not, stood still, [and] answered more;) [i said,] answer also part, also shew mine opinion. full matter, spirit within constraineth me. behold, belly [is] wine [which] hath vent; ready burst like new bottles. speak, may refreshed: open lips answer. let not, pray you, accept man's person, neither let give flattering titles unto man. know give flattering titles; [in doing] maker would soon take away. wherefore, job, pray thee, hear speeches, hearken words. behold, opened mouth, tongue hath spoken mouth. words [shall of] uprightness heart: lips shall utter knowledge clearly. spirit god hath made me, breath almighty hath given life. thou canst answer me, set [thy words] orderpage 305 job me, stand up. behold, [am] according thy wish god's stead: also formed clay. behold, terror shall make thee afraid, neither shall hand heavy upon thee. surely thou hast spoken mine hearing, heard voice [thy] words, [saying, ] clean without transgression, [am] innocent; neither [is there] iniquity me. behold, findeth occasions me, counteth enemy, putteth feet stocks, marketh paths. behold, [in] thou art just: answer thee, god greater man. dost thou strive him? giveth account matters. god speaketh once, yea twice, [yet man] perceiveth not. dream, vision night, deep sleep falleth upon men, slumberings upon bed; openeth ears men, sealeth instruction, may withdraw man [from his] purpose, hide pride man. keepeth back soul pit, life perishing sword. chastened also pain upon bed, multitude bones strong [pain: ] life abhorreth bread, soul dainty meat. flesh consumed away, cannot seen; bones [that] seen stick out. yea, soul draweth near unto grave, life destroyers. messenger him, interpreter, one among thousand, shew unto man uprightness: gracious unto him, saith, deliver going pit: found ransom. flesh shall fresher child's: shall return days youth: shall pray unto god, favourable unto him: shall see face joy: render unto man righteousness. looketh upon men, [if any] say, sinned, perverted [that was] right, profited not; deliver soul going pit, life shall see light. lo, [things] worketh god oftentimes man, bring back soul pit, enlightened light living. mark well, job, hearken unto me: hold thy peace, speak. thou hast thing say, answer me: speak, desire justify thee. not, hearken unto me: hold thy peace, shall teach thee wisdom. hear words, ye wise [men;] give ear unto me, ye knowledge. ear trieth words, mouth tasteth meat. let us choose us judgment: let us know among [is] good. job hath said, righteous: god hath taken away judgment. lie right? wound [is] incurable without transgression. man [is] like job, [who] drinketh scorning like water? goeth company workers iniquity, walketh wicked men. hath said, profiteth man nothing delight god. therefore hearken unto me, ye men understanding: far god, [that do] wickedness; [from] almighty, [that commit] iniquity. work man shall render unto him, cause every man find according [his] ways. yea, surely god wickedly, neither almighty pervert judgment. hath given charge earth? hath disposed whole world? set heart upon man, [if] gather unto spirit breath; [thou hast] understanding, hear this: hearken voice words. shall even hateth right govern? wilt thou condemn just? [is fit] say king, [thou art] wicked? [and] princes, [ye are] ungodly? [how much less him] accepteth persons princes, regardeth rich poor? [are] work hands. moment shall die, people shall troubled midnight, pass away: mighty shall taken away without hand. eyes [are] upon ways man, seeth goings. [there is] darkness, shadow death, workers iniquity may hide themselves. lay upon man [than right;] enter judgment god. shall break pieces mighty men without number, set others stead. therefore knoweth works, overturneth [them] night, destroyed. striketh wicked men open sight others; turned back him, would consider ways: cause cry poor come unto him, heareth cry afflicted. giveth quietness, make trouble? hideth [his] face, behold him? whether [it done] nation, man only: hypocrite reign not, lest people ensnared. surely meet said unto god, borne [chastisement,] offend [any more: ] [that which] see teach thou me: done iniquity, more. [should be] according thy mind? recompense it, whether thou refuse, whether thou choose; i: therefore speak thou knowest. let men understanding tell me, let wise man hearken unto me. job hath spoken without knowledge, words [were] without wisdom. desire [is that] job may tried unto end [his] answers wicked men. addeth rebellion unto sin, clappeth [his hands] among us, multiplieth words god. thinkest thou right, [that] thou saidst, righteousness [is] god's? thou saidst, advantage unto thee? [and,] profit shall have, [if cleansed] sin? answer thee, thy companions thee. look unto heavens, see; behold clouds [which] higher thou. thou sinnest, doest thou him? [if] thy transgressions multiplied, doest thou unto him? thou righteous, givest thou him? receiveth thine hand? thy wickedness [may hurt] man thou [art;] thy righteousness [may profit] son man. reason multitude oppressions make [the oppressed] cry: cry reason arm mighty. none saith, [is] god maker, giveth songs night; teacheth us beasts earth, maketh us wiser fowls heaven? cry, none giveth answer, pride evil men. surely god hear vanity, neither almighty regard it. although thou sayest thou shalt see him, [yet] judgment [is] him; therefore trust thou him. now, [it is] [so,] hath visited anger; yet knoweth [it] great extremity: therefore doth job open mouth vain; multiplieth words without knowledge.job page 306 suffer little, shew thee [i have] yet speak god's behalf. fetch knowledge afar, ascribe righteousness maker. truly words [shall] [be] false: perfect knowledge [is] thee. behold, god [is] mighty, despiseth [any: is] mighty strength [and] wisdom. preserveth life wicked: giveth right poor. withdraweth eyes righteous: kings [are they] throne; yea, doth establish ever, exalted. [they be] bound fetters, [and] holden cords affliction; sheweth work, transgressions exceeded. openeth also ear discipline, commandeth return iniquity. obey serve [him,] shall spend days prosperity, years pleasures. obey not, shall perish sword, shall die without knowledge. hypocrites heart heap wrath: cry bindeth them. die youth, life [is] among unclean. delivereth poor affliction, openeth ears oppression. even would removed thee strait [into] broad place, [there is] straitness; [should be] set thy table full fatness. thou hast fulfilled judgment wicked: judgment justice take hold [on thee. ] [there is] wrath, [beware] lest take thee away [his] stroke: great ransom cannot deliver thee. esteem thy riches? [no,] gold, forces strength. desire night, people cut place. take heed, regard iniquity: hast thou chosen rather affliction. behold, god exalteth power: teacheth like him? hath enjoined way? say, thou hast wrought iniquity? remember thou magnify work, men behold. every man may see it; man may behold [it] afar off. behold, god [is] great, know [him] not, neither number years searched out. maketh small drops water: pour rain according vapour thereof: clouds drop [and] distil upon man abundantly. also [any] understand spreadings clouds, [or] noise tabernacle? behold, spreadeth light upon it, covereth bottom sea. judgeth people; giveth meat abundance. clouds covereth light; commandeth [not shine] [the cloud] cometh betwixt. noise thereof sheweth concerning it, cattle also concerning vapour. also heart trembleth, moved place. hear attentively noise voice, sound [that] goeth mouth. directeth whole heaven, lightning unto ends earth. voice roareth: thundereth voice excellency; stay voice heard. god thundereth marvellously voice; great things doeth he, cannot comprehend. saith snow, thou [on] earth; likewise small rain, great rain strength. sealeth hand every man; men may know work. beasts go dens, remain places. south cometh whirlwind: cold north. breath god frost given: breadth waters straitened. also bywatering wearieth thick cloud: scattereth bright cloud: turned round counsels: may whatsoever commandeth upon face world earth. causeth come, whether correction, land, mercy. hearken unto this, job: stand still, consider wondrous works god. dost thou know god disposed them, caused light cloud shine? dost thou know balancings clouds, wondrous works perfect knowledge? thy garments [are] warm, quieteth earth south [wind? ] hast thou spread sky, [which is] strong, [and] molten looking glass? teach us shall say unto him; [for] cannot order [our speech] reason darkness. shall told speak? man speak, surely shall swallowed up. [men] see bright light clouds: wind passeth, cleanseth them. fair weather cometh north: god terrible majesty. [touching] almighty, cannot find out: [he is] excellent power, judgment, plenty justice: afflict. men therefore fear him: respecteth [that are] wise heart. lord answered job whirlwind, said, [is] darkeneth counsel words without knowledge? gird thy loins like man; demand thee, answer thou me. wast thou laid foundations earth? declare, thou hast understanding. hath laid measures thereof, thou knowest? hath stretched line upon it? whereupon foundations thereof fastened? laid corner stone thereof; morning stars sang together, sons god shouted joy? [who] shut sea doors, brake forth, [as if] issued womb? made cloud garment thereof, thick darkness swaddlingband it, brake decreed [place,] set bars doors, said, hitherto shalt thou come, further: shall thy proud waves stayed? hast thou commanded morning since thy days; [and] caused dayspring know place; might take hold ends earth, wicked might shaken it? turned clay [to] seal; stand garment. wicked light withholden, high arm shall broken. hast thou entered springs sea? hast thou walked search depth? gates death opened unto thee? hast thou seen doors shadow death? hast thou perceived breadth earth? declare thou knowest all. [is] way [where] light dwelleth? [as for] darkness, [is] place thereof, thou shouldest take bound thereof, thou shouldest know paths [to] house thereof? knowest thou [it,] thou wast born? [because] number thy days [is] great? hast thou entered treasures snow? hast thou seen treasures hail, reserved time trouble, day battle war? way light parted, [which] scattereth east wind upon earth? hath divided watercourse overflowing waters, way lightning thunder; cause rain earth, [where] man [is; on] wilderness, wherein [there is] man; satisfy desolate waste [ground;] causepage 307 job bud tender herb spring forth? hath rain father? hath begotten drops dew? whose womb came ice? hoary frost heaven, hath gendered it? waters hid [with] stone, face deep frozen. canst thou bind sweet influences pleiades, loose bands orion? canst thou bring forth mazzaroth season? canst thou guide arcturus sons? knowest thou ordinances heaven? canst thou set dominion thereof earth? canst thou lift thy voice clouds, abundance waters may cover thee? canst thou send lightnings, may go, say unto thee, [are? ] hath put wisdom inward parts? hath given understanding heart? number clouds wisdom? stay bottles heaven, dust groweth hardness, clods cleave fast together? wilt thou hunt prey lion? fill appetite young lions, couch [their] dens, [and] abide covert lie wait? provideth raven food? young ones cry unto god, wander lack meat. knowest thou time wild goats rock bring forth? [or] canst thou mark hinds calve? canst thou number months [that] fulfil? knowest thou time bring forth? bow themselves, bring forth young ones, cast sorrows. young ones good liking, grow corn; go forth, return unto them. hath sent wild ass free? hath loosed bands wild ass? whose house made wilderness, barren land dwellings. scorneth multitude city, neither regardeth crying driver. range mountains [is] pasture, searcheth every green thing. unicorn willing serve thee, abide thy crib? canst thou bind unicorn band furrow? harrow valleys thee? wilt thou trust him, strength [is] great? wilt thou leave thy labour him? wilt thou believe him, bring home thy seed, gather [it into] thy barn? [gavest thou] goodly wings unto peacocks? wings feathers unto ostrich? leaveth eggs earth, warmeth dust, forgetteth foot may crush them, wild beast may break them. hardened young ones, though [they were] hers: labour vain without fear; god hath deprived wisdom, neither hath imparted understanding. time lifteth high, scorneth horse rider. hath thou given horse strength? hast thou clothed neck thunder? canst thou make afraid grasshopper? glory nostrils [is] terrible. paweth valley, rejoiceth [his] strength: goeth meet armed men. mocketh fear, affrighted; neither turneth back sword. quiver rattleth him, glittering spear shield. swalloweth ground fierceness rage: neither believeth [it is] sound trumpet. saith among trumpets, ha, ha; smelleth battle afar off, thunder captains, shouting. doth hawk fly thy wisdom, [and] stretch wings toward south? doth eagle mount thy command, make nest high? thence seeketh prey, [and] eyes behold afar off. young ones also suck blood: slain [are,] [is] she. moreover lord answered job, said, shall contendeth almighty instruct [him?] reproveth god, let answer it. behold, vile; shall answer thee? lay mine hand upon mouth. spoken; answer: yea, twice; proceed further. answered lord unto job whirlwind, said, gird thy loins like man: demand thee, declare thou unto me. wilt thou also disannul judgment? wilt thou condemn me, thou mayest righteous? hast thou arm like god? canst thou thunder voice like him? deck thyself [with] majesty excellency; array thyself glory beauty. cast abroad rage thy wrath: behold every one [that is] proud, abase him. look every one [that is] proud, [and] bring low; tread wicked place. hide dust together; [and] bind faces secret. also confess unto thee thine right hand save thee. behold behemoth, made thee; eateth grass ox. lo now, strength [is] loins, force [is] navel belly. moveth tail like cedar: sinews stones wrapped together. bones [are as] strong pieces brass; bones [are] like bars iron. [is] chief ways god: made make sword approach [unto him. ] surely mountains bring forth food, beasts field play. lieth shady trees, covert reed, fens. shady trees cover [with] shadow; willows brook compass about. behold, drinketh river, [and] hasteth not: trusteth draw jordan mouth. taketh eyes: [his] nose pierceth snares. canst thou draw leviathan hook? tongue cord [which] thou lettest down? canst thou put hook nose? bore jaw thorn? make many supplications unto thee? speak soft [words] unto thee? make covenant thee? wilt thou take servant ever? wilt thou play [with] bird? wilt thou bind thy maidens? shall companions make banquet him? shall part among merchants? canst thou fill skin barbed irons? head fish spears? lay thine hand upon him, remember battle, more. behold, hope vain: shall [one] cast even sight him? none [is so] fierce dare stir up: able stand me? hath prevented me, repay [him? whatsoever is] whole heaven mine. conceal parts, power, comely proportion. discover face garment? [or] come [to him] double bridle? open doors face? teeth [are] terrible round about. [his] scales [arejob page 308 his] pride, shut together [as with] close seal. one near another, air come them. joined one another, stick together, cannot sundered. neesings light doth shine, eyes [are] like eyelids morning. mouth go burning lamps, [and] sparks fire leap out. nostrils goeth smoke, [out] seething pot caldron. breath kindleth coals, flame goeth mouth. neck remaineth strength, sorrow turned joy him. flakes flesh joined together: firm themselves; cannot moved. heart firm stone; yea, hard piece nether [millstone. ] raiseth himself, mighty afraid: reason breakings purify themselves. sword layeth cannot hold: spear, dart, habergeon. esteemeth iron straw, [and] brass rotten wood. arrow cannot make flee: slingstones turned stubble. darts counted stubble: laugheth shaking spear. sharp stones [are] him: spreadeth sharp pointed things upon mire. maketh deep boil like pot: maketh sea like pot ointment. maketh path shine him; [one] would think deep [to be] hoary. upon earth like, made without fear. beholdeth high [things:] [is] king children pride. know thou canst every [thing,] [that] thought withholden thee. [is] hideth counsel without knowledge? therefore uttered understood not; things wonderful me, knew not. hear, beseech thee, speak: demand thee, declare thou unto me. heard thee hearing ear: mine eye seeth thee. wherefore abhor [myself,] repent dust ashes. [so,] lord spoken words unto job, lord said eliphaz temanite, wrath kindled thee, thy two friends: ye spoken [the thing is] right, servant job [hath. ] therefore take unto seven bullocks seven rams, go servant job, offer burnt offering; servant job shall pray you: accept: lest deal [after your] folly, ye spoken [the thing is] right, like servant job. eliphaz temanite bildad shuhite [and] zophar naamathite went, according lord commanded them: lord also accepted job. lord turned captivity job, prayed friends: also lord gave job twice much before. came unto brethren, sisters, acquaintance before, eat bread house: bemoaned him, comforted evil lord brought upon him: every man also gave piece money, every one earring gold. lord blessed latter end job beginning: fourteen thousand sheep, six thousand camels, thousand yoke oxen, thousand asses. also seven sons three daughters. called name first, jemima; name second, kezia; name third, keren-happuch. allthe land women found [so] fair daughters job: father gave inheritance among brethren. lived job hundred forty years, saw sons, sons' sons, [even] four generations. job died, [being] old full days.page 309 psalms book psalms psalm 1 book blessed [is] man walketh counsel ungodly, standeth way sinners, sitteth seat scornful. delight [is] law lord; law doth meditate day night. shall like tree planted rivers water, bringeth forth fruit season; leaf also shall wither; whatsoever doeth shall prosper. ungodly [are] so: [are] like chaff wind driveth away. therefore ungodly shall stand judgment, sinners congregation righteous. lord knoweth way righteous: way ungodly shall perish. psalm 2 heathen rage, people imagine vain thing? kings earth set themselves, rulers take counsel together, lord, anointed, [saying, ] let us break bands asunder, cast away cords us. sitteth heavens shall laugh: lord shall derision. shall speak unto wrath, vex sore displeasure. yet set king upon holy hill zion. declare decree: lord hath said unto me, thou [art] son; day begotten thee. ask me, shall give [thee] heathen [for] thine inheritance, uttermost parts earth [for] thy possession. thou shalt break rod iron; thou shalt dash pieces like potter's vessel. wise therefore, ye kings: instructed, ye judges earth. serve lord fear, rejoice trembling. kiss son, lest angry, ye perish [from] way, wrath kindled little. blessed [are] put trust him. psalm 3 psalm david, fled absalom son. lord, increased trouble me! many [are] rise me. many [there be] say soul, [there is] help god. selah. thou, lord, [art] shield me; glory, lifter mine head. cried unto lord voice, heard holy hill. selah.psalms page 310 laid slept; awaked; lord sustained me. afraid ten thousands people, set [themselves] round about. arise, lord; save me, god: thou hast smitten mine enemies [upon] cheek bone; thou hast broken teeth ungodly. salvation [belongeth] unto lord: thy blessing [is] upon thy people. selah. psalm 4 chief musician neginoth, psalm david. hear call, god righteousness: thou hast enlarged [when was] distress; mercy upon me, hear prayer. ye sons men, long [will ye turn] glory shame? [is] king glory? lord strong mighty, lord mighty battle. lift heads, ye gates; even lift [them] up, ye everlasting doors; king glory shall come in. king glory? lord hosts, [is] king glory. selah. psalm 25 [psalm] david. unto thee, lord, lift soul. god, trust thee: let ashamed, let mine enemies triumph me. yea, let none wait thee ashamed: let ashamed transgress without cause. shew thy ways, lord; teach thy paths. lead thy truth, teach me: thou [art] god salvation; thee wait day. remember, lord, thy tender mercies thy lovingkindnesses; [have been] ever old. remember sins youth, transgressions: according thy mercy remember thou thy goodness' sake, lord. good upright [is] lord: therefore teach sinners way. meek guide judgment: meek teach way. paths lord [are] mercy truth unto keep covenant testimonies. thy name's sake, lord, pardon mine iniquity; [is] great. man [is] feareth lord? none [of them] means redeem brother, give god ransom him: (for redemption soul [is] precious, ceaseth ever:) still live ever, [and] see corruption. seeth [that] wise men die, likewise fool brutish person perish, leave wealth others. inward thought [is, that] houses [shall continue] ever, [and] dwelling places generations; made covenant sacrifice. heavens shall declare righteousness: god [is] judge himself. selah. hear, people, speak; israel, testify thee: [am] god, [even] thy god. reprove thee thy sacrifices thy burnt offerings, [to been] continually me. take bullock thy house, [nor] goats thy folds. every beast forest [is] mine, [and] cattle upon thousand hills. know fowls mountains: wild beasts field [are] mine. hungry, would tell thee: world [is] mine, fulness thereof. eat flesh bulls, drink blood goats? offer unto god thanksgiving; pay thy vows unto high: call upon day trouble: deliver thee, thou shalt glorify me. unto wicked god saith, hast thou declare statutes, [that] thou shouldest take covenant thy mouth? seeing thou hatest instruction, castest words behind thee. thou sawest thief, thou consentedst him, hast partaker adulterers. thou givest thy mouth evil, thy tongue frameth deceit. thou sittest [and] speakest thy brother; thou slanderest thine mother's son. [things] hast thou done, kept silence; thou thoughtest altogether [such one] thyself: [but] reprove thee, set [them] order thine eyes. consider this, ye forget god, lest tear [you] pieces, [there be] none deliver. whoso offereth praise glorifieth me: ordereth [his] conversation [aright] shew salvation god. psalm 51 chief musician, psalm david, nathan prophet came unto him, gone bathsheba. mercy upon me, god, according thy lovingkindness: according unto multitude thy tender mercies blotpsalms page 336 transgressions. wash throughly mine iniquity, cleanse sin. acknowledge transgressions: sin [is] ever me. thee, thee only, sinned, done [this] evil thy sight: thou mightest justified thou speakest, [and] clear thou judgest. behold, shapen iniquity; sin mother conceive me. behold, thou desirest truth inward parts: hidden [part] thou shalt make know wisdom. purge hyssop, shall clean: wash me, shall whiter snow. make hear joy gladness; [that] bones [which] thou hast broken may rejoice. hide thy face sins, blot mine iniquities. create clean heart, god; renew right spirit within me. cast away thy presence; take thy holy spirit me. restore unto joy thy salvation; uphold [with thy] free spirit. gave ear unto me. day trouble sought lord: sore ran night, ceased not: soul refused comforted. remembered god, troubled: complained, spirit overwhelmed. selah. thou holdest mine eyes waking: troubled cannot speak. considered days old, years ancient times. call remembrance song night: commune mine heart: spirit made diligent search. lord cast ever? favourable more? mercy clean gone ever? doth [his] promise fail evermore? hath god forgotten gracious? hath anger shut tender mercies? selah. said, [is] infirmity: [but remember] years right hand high. remember works lord: surely remember thy wonders old. meditate also thy work, talk thy doings. thy way, god, [is] sanctuary: [is so] great god [our] god? thou [art] god doest wonders: thou hast declared thy strength among people. thou hast [thine] arm redeemed thy people, sons jacob joseph. selah. waters saw thee, god, waters saw thee; afraid: depths also troubled. clouds poured water: skies sent sound: thine arrows also went abroad. voice thy thunder [was] heaven: lightnings lightened world: earth trembled shook.page 351 psalms thy way [is] sea, thy path great waters, thy footsteps known. thou leddest thy people like flock hand moses aaron. psalm 78 maschil asaph. give ear, people, [to] law: incline ears words mouth. open mouth parable: utter dark sayings old: heard known, fathers told us. hide [them] children, shewing generation come praises lord, strength, wonderful works hath done. established testimony jacob, appointed law israel, commanded fathers, make known children: generation come might know [them, even] children [which] born; [who] arise declare [them] children: might set hope god, forget works god, keep commandments: might fathers, stubborn rebellious generation; generation [that] set heart aright, whose spirit stedfast god. children ephraim, [being] armed, [and] carrying bows, turned back day battle. kept covenant god, refused walk law; forgat works, wonders shewed them. marvellous things sight fathers, land egypt, [in] field zoan. divided sea, caused pass through; made waters stand heap. daytime also led cloud, night light fire. clave rocks wilderness, gave [them] drink [out of] great depths. brought streams also rock, caused waters run like rivers. sinned yet provoking high wilderness. tempted god heart asking meat lust. yea, spake god; said, god furnish table wilderness? behold, smote rock, waters gushed out, streams overflowed; give bread also? provide flesh people? therefore lord heard [this,] wroth: fire kindled jacob, anger also came israel; believed god, trusted salvation: though commanded clouds above, opened doors heaven, rained manna upon eat, given corn heaven. man eat angels' food: sent meat full. caused east wind blow heaven: power brought south wind. rained flesh also upon dust, feathered fowls like sand sea: let [it] fall midst camp, round habitations. eat, well filled: gavepsalms page 352 desire; estranged lust. meat [was] yet mouths, wrath god came upon them, slew fattest them, smote chosen [men] israel. sinned still, believed wondrous works. therefore days consume vanity, years trouble. slew them, sought him: returned enquired early god. remembered god [was] rock, high god redeemer. nevertheless flatter mouth, lied unto tongues. heart right him, neither stedfast covenant. he, [being] full compassion, forgave [their] iniquity, destroyed [them] not: yea, many time turned anger away, stir wrath. remembered [were but] flesh; wind passeth away, cometh again. oft provoke wilderness, [and] grieve desert! yea, turned back tempted god, limited holy one israel. remembered hand, [nor] day delivered enemy. wrought signs egypt, wonders field zoan: turned rivers blood; floods, could drink. sent divers sorts flies among them, devoured them; frogs, destroyed them. gave also increase unto caterpiller, labour unto locust. destroyed vines hail, sycomore trees frost. gave cattle also hail, flocks hot thunderbolts. cast upon fierceness anger, wrath, indignation, trouble, sending evil angels [among them. ] made way anger; spared soul death, gave life pestilence; smote firstborn egypt; chief [their] strength tabernacles ham: made people go forth like sheep, guided wilderness like flock. led safely, feared not: sea overwhelmed enemies. brought border sanctuary, [even to] mountain, [which] right hand purchased. cast heathen also them, divided inheritance line, made tribes israel dwell tents. yet tempted provoked high god, kept testimonies: turned back, dealt unfaithfully like fathers: turned aside like deceitful bow. provoked anger high places, moved jealousy graven images. god heard [this,] wroth, greatly abhorred israel: forsook tabernacle shiloh, tent [which] placed among men; delivered strength captivity, glory enemy's hand. gave people also unto sword; wroth inheritance.page 353 psalms fire consumed young men; maidens given marriage. priests fell sword; widows made lamentation. lord awaked one sleep, [and] like mighty man shouteth reason wine. smote enemies hinder parts: put perpetual reproach. moreover refused tabernacle joseph, chose tribe ephraim: chose tribe judah, mount zion loved. built sanctuary like high [palaces,] like earth hath established ever. chose david also servant, took sheepfolds: following ewes great young brought feed jacob people, israel inheritance. fed according integrity heart; guided skilfulness hands. psalm 79 psalm asaph. god, heathen come thine inheritance; thy holy temple defiled; laid jerusalem heaps. dead bodies thy servants given [to be] meat unto fowls heaven, flesh thy saints unto beasts earth. blood shed like water round jerusalem; [there was] none bury [them. ] become reproach neighbours, scorn derision round us. long, lord? wilt thou angry ever? shall thy jealousy burn like fire? pour thy wrath upon heathen known thee, upon kingdoms called upon thy name. devoured jacob, laid waste dwelling place. remember us former iniquities: let thy tender mercies speedily prevent us: brought low. help us, god salvation, glory thy name: deliver us, purge away sins, thy name's sake. wherefore heathen say, [is] god? let known among heathen sight [by] revenging blood thy servants [which is] shed. let sighing prisoner come thee; rewarded us according iniquities. heaven high earth, [so] great mercy toward fear him. far east west, [so] far hath removed transgressions us. like father pitieth [his] children, [so] lord pitieth fear him. knoweth frame; [as for] man, days [are] grass: flower field, flourisheth. wind passeth it, gone; place thereof shall know more. mercy lord [is] everlasting everlasting upon fear him, righteousness unto children's children; keep covenant, remember commandments them. lord hath prepared throne heavens; kingdom ruleth all. bless lord, ye angels, excel strength, commandments, hearkening unto voice word. bless ye lord, [ye] hosts; [ye] ministers his, pleasure. bless lord, works places dominion: bless lord, soul. psalm 104 bless lord, soul. lord god, thou art great; thou art clothed honour majesty. coverest [thyself] light [with] garment: stretchest heavens like curtain: layeth beams chambers waters: maketh clouds chariot: walketh upon wings wind: maketh angels spirits; ministers flaming fire: [who] laid foundations earth, [that] removed ever. thou coveredst deep [with] garment: waters stood mountains. thy rebuke fled; voice thy thunder hasted away. go mountains; go valleys unto place thou hast founded them. thou hast set bound may pass over; turn cover earth. sendeth springs valleys, [which] run among hills. give drink every beast field: wild asses quench thirst. shall fowls heaven habitation, [which] sing among branches. watereth hills chambers: earth satisfied fruit thy works. causeth grass grow cattle, herb service man: may bring forth food earth; wine [that] maketh glad heart man, [and] oil make [his] face shine, bread [which] strengtheneth man's heart. trees lord full [of sap;] cedars lebanon, hath planted; birds make nests: [as for] stork, fir trees [are] house.page 367 psalms high hills [are] refuge wild goats; [and] rocks conies. appointed moon seasons: sun knoweth going down. thou makest darkness, night: wherein beasts forest creep [forth. ] young lions roar prey, seek meat god. sun ariseth, gather together, lay dens. man goeth forth unto work labour evening. lord, manifold thy works! wisdom hast thou made all: earth full thy riches. [so is] great wide sea, wherein [are] things creeping innumerable, small great beasts. go ships: [there is] leviathan, [whom] thou hast made play therein. wait upon thee; thou mayest give [them] meat due season. [that] thou givest gather: thou openest thine hand, filled good. thou hidest thy face, troubled: thou takest away breath, die, return dust. thou sendest forth thy spirit, created: thou renewest face earth. glory lord shall endure ever: lord shall rejoice works. looketh earth, trembleth: toucheth hills, smoke. sing unto lord long live: sing praise god being. meditation shall sweet: glad lord. let sinners consumed earth, let wicked more. bless thou lord, soul. praise ye lord. psalm 105 give thanks unto lord; call upon name: make known deeds among people. sing unto him, sing psalms unto him: talk ye wondrous works. glory ye holy name: let heart rejoice seek lord. seek lord, strength: seek face evermore. remember marvellous works hath done; wonders, judgments mouth; ye seed abraham servant, ye children jacob chosen. [is] lord god: judgments [are] earth. hath remembered covenant ever, word [which] commanded thousand generations. [covenant] made abraham, oath unto isaac; confirmed unto jacob law, [and] israel [for] everlasting covenant: saying, unto thee give land canaan, lot inheritance: [but] men number; yea, few, strangers it. went one nation another, [one] kingdom another people; suffered man wrong: yea, reproved kings sakes; [saying,] touch mine anointed, prophets harm. moreover called famine upon land: brake whole staff bread.psalms page 368 sent man them, [even] joseph, [who] sold servant: whose feet hurt fetters: laid iron: time word came: word lord tried him. king sent loosed him; [even] ruler people, let go free. made lord house, ruler substance: bind princes pleasure; teach senators wisdom. israel also came egypt; jacob sojourned land ham. increased people greatly; made stronger enemies. turned heart hate people, deal subtilly servants. sent moses servant; [and] aaron chosen. shewed signs among them, wonders land ham. sent darkness, made dark; rebelled word. turned waters blood, slew fish. land brought forth frogs abundance, chambers kings. spake, came divers sorts flies, [and] lice coasts. gave hail rain, [and] flaming fire land. smote vines also fig trees; brake trees coasts. spake, locusts came, caterpillers, without number, eat herbs land, devoured fruit ground. smote also firstborn land, chief strength. brought forth also silver gold: [there was] one feeble [person] among tribes. egypt glad departed: fear fell upon them. spread cloud covering; fire give light night. [the people] asked, brought quails, satisfied bread heaven. opened rock, waters gushed out; ran dry places [like] river. remembered holy promise, [and] abraham servant. brought forth people joy, [and] chosen gladness: gave lands heathen: inherited labour people; might observe statutes, keep laws. praise ye lord. psalm 106 praise ye lord. give thanks unto lord; [he is] good: mercy [endureth] ever. utter mighty acts lord? [am for] peace: speak, [are] war. psalm 121 song degrees. lift mine eyes unto hills, whence cometh help. help [cometh] lord, made heaven earth. suffer thy foot moved: keepeth thee slumber. behold, keepeth israel shall neither slumber sleep. lord [is] thy keeper: lord [is] thy shade upon thy right hand. sun shall smite thee day, moon night. lord shall preserve thee evil: shall preserve thy soul. lord shall preserve thy going thy coming time forth, even evermore. psalm 122 song degrees david. glad said unto me, let us go house lord. feet shall stand within thy gates, jerusalem. jerusalem builded city compact together: whither tribes go up, tribes lord, unto testimony israel, give thanks unto name lord. set thrones judgment, thrones house david. pray peace jerusalem: shall prosper love thee. peace within thy walls, [and] prosperity within thy palaces. brethren companions' sakes, say, peace [be] within thee. house lord god seek thy good. psalm 123 song degrees. unto thee lift mine eyes, thou dwellest heavens. behold, eyes servants [look] unto hand masters, [and] eyes maiden unto hand mistress; eyes [wait] upon lord god, mercy upon us. mercy upon us, lord, mercy upon us:page 383 psalms exceedingly filled contempt. soul exceedingly filled scorning ease, [and] contempt proud. psalm 124 song degrees david. [it is] vain rise early, sit late, eat bread sorrows: [for] giveth beloved sleep.psalms page 384 lo, children [are] heritage lord: [and] fruit womb [is his] reward. arrows [are] hand mighty man; [are] children youth. happy [is] man hath quiver full them: shall ashamed, shall speak enemies gate. psalm 128 song degrees. blessed [is] every one feareth lord; walketh ways. thou shalt eat labour thine hands: happy [shalt] thou [be,] [it shall be] well thee. thy wife [shall be] fruitful vine sides thine house: thy children like olive plants round thy table. behold, thus shall man blessed feareth lord. lord shall bless thee zion: thou shalt see good jerusalem days thy life. yea, thou shalt see thy children's children, [and] peace upon israel. psalm 129 song degrees. many time afflicted youth, may israel say: many time afflicted youth: yet prevailed me. plowers plowed upon back: made long furrows. lord [is] righteous: hath cut asunder cords wicked. let confounded turned back hate zion. let grass [upon] housetops, withereth afore groweth up: wherewith mower filleth hand; bindeth sheaves bosom. neither go say, blessing lord [be] upon you: bless name lord. psalm 130 song degrees. depths cried unto thee, lord. lord, hear voice: let thine ears attentive voice supplications. thou, lord, shouldest mark iniquities, lord, shall stand? [there is] word tongue, [but,] lo, lord, thou knowest altogether. thou hast beset behind before, laid thine hand upon me. [such] knowledge [is] wonderful me; high, cannot [attain] unto it. whither shall go thy spirit? whither shall flee thy presence? ascend heaven, thou [art] there: make bed hell, behold, thou [art there. ] [if] take wings morning, [and] dwell uttermost parts sea; even shall thy hand lead me, thy right hand shall hold me. say, surely darkness shall cover me; even night shall light me. yea, darkness hideth thee; night shineth day: darkness light [are] alike [to thee. ] thou hast possessed reins: thou hast covered mother's womb. praise thee; fearfully [and] wonderfully made: marvellous [are] thy works; [that] soul knoweth right well. substance hid thee, made secret, [and] curiously wrought lowest parts earth. thine eyes see substance, yet unperfect; thy book [my members] written, [which] continuance fashioned, [as yet was] none them. precious also thy thoughts unto me, god! great sum them!
