[this] shall burning [and] fuel fire. unto us child born, unto us son given: government shall upon shoulder: name shall called wonderful, counsellor, mighty god, everlasting father, prince peace. increase [his] government peace [there shall be] end, upon throne david, upon kingdom, order it, establish judgment justice henceforth even ever. zeal lord hosts perform this. lord sent word jacob, hath lighted upon israel. people shall know, [even] ephraim inhabitant samaria, say pride stoutness heart, bricks fallen down, build hewn stones: sycomores cut down, change [them into] cedars. therefore lord shall set adversaries rezin him, join enemies together; syrians before, philistines behind; shall devour israel open mouth. anger turned away, hand [is] stretched still. people turneth unto smiteth them, neither seek lord hosts. therefore lord cut israel head tail, branch rush, one day. ancient honourable, [is] head; prophet teacheth lies, [is] tail. leaders people cause [them] err; [they are] led [are] destroyed. therefore lord shall joy young men, neither shall mercy fatherless widows: every one hypocrite evildoer, every mouth speaketh folly. anger turned away, hand [is] stretched still. wickedness burneth fire: shall devour briers thorns, shall kindle thickets forest, shall mount [like] lifting smoke. wrath lord hosts land darkened, people shall fuel fire: man shall spare brother. shall snatch right hand, hungry; shall eat left hand, shall satisfied: shall eat every man flesh arm: manasseh, ephraim; ephraim, manasseh: [and] together [shall be] judah. anger turned away, hand [is] stretched still.page 421 isaiah woe unto decree unrighteous decrees, write grievousness [which] prescribed; turn aside needy judgment, take away right poor people, widows may prey, [that] may rob fatherless! ye day visitation, desolation [which] shall come far? ye flee help? ye leave glory? without shall bow prisoners, shall fall slain. anger turned away, hand [is] stretched still. assyrian, rod mine anger, staff hand mine indignation. send hypocritical nation, people wrath give charge, take spoil, take prey, tread like mire streets. howbeit meaneth so, neither doth heart think so; [it is] heart destroy cut nations few. saith, [are] princes altogether kings? [is] calno carchemish? [is] hamath arpad? [is] samaria damascus? hand hath found kingdoms idols, whose graven images excel jerusalem samaria; shall not, done unto samaria idols, jerusalem idols? wherefore shall come pass, [that] lord hath performed whole work upon mount zion jerusalem, punish fruit stout heart king assyria, glory high looks. saith, strength hand done [it,] wisdom; prudent: removed bounds people, robbed treasures, put inhabitants like valiant [man: ] hand hath found nest riches people: one gathereth eggs [that are] left, gathered earth; none moved wing, opened mouth, peeped. shall axe boast heweth therewith? [or] shall saw magnify shaketh it? rod shake [itself] lift up, [or] staff lift [itself, were] wood. therefore shall lord, lord hosts, send among fat ones leanness; glory shall kindle burning like burning fire. light israel shall fire, holy one flame: shall burn devour thorns briers one day; shall consume glory forest, fruitful field, soul body: shall standardbearer fainteth. rest trees forest shall few, child may write them. shall come pass day, [that] remnant israel, escaped house jacob, shall stay upon smote them; shall stay upon lord, holy one israel, truth. remnant shall return, [even] remnant jacob, unto mighty god. though thy people israel sand sea, [yet] remnant shall return: consumption decreed shall overflow righteousness. lord god hosts shall make consumption, even determined, midst land. therefore thus saith lord god hosts, people dwellest zion, afraid assyrian: shall smite thee rod, shall lift staff thee, manner egypt. foryet little while, indignation shall cease, mine anger destruction. lord hosts shall stir scourge according slaughter midian rock oreb: [as] rod [was] upon sea, shall lift manner egypt. shall come pass day, [that] burden shall taken away thy shoulder, yoke thy neck, yoke shall destroyed anointing. come aiath, passed migron; michmash hath laid carriages: gone passage: taken lodging geba; ramah afraid; gibeah saul fled. lift thy voice, daughter gallim: cause heard unto laish, poor anathoth. madmenah removed; inhabitants gebim gather flee. yet shall remain nob day: shall shake hand [against] mount daughter zion, hill jerusalem. behold, lord, lord hosts, shall lop bough terror: high ones stature [shall be] hewn down, haughty shall humbled. shall cut thickets forest iron, lebanon shall fall mighty one. shall come forth rod stem jesse, branch shall grow roots: spirit lord shall rest upon him, spirit wisdom understanding, spirit counsel might, spirit knowledge fear lord; shall make quick understanding fear lord: shall judge sight eyes, neither reprove hearing ears: righteousness shall judge poor, reprove equity meek earth: shall smite earth rod mouth, breath lips shall slay wicked. righteousness shall girdle loins, faithfulness girdle reins. wolf also shall dwell lamb, leopard shall lie kid; calf young lion fatling together; little child shall lead them. cow bear shall feed; young ones shall lie together: lion shall eat straw like ox. sucking child shall play hole asp, weaned child shall put hand cockatrice' den. shall hurt destroy holy mountain: earth shall full knowledge lord, waters cover sea. day shall root jesse, shall stand ensign people; shall gentiles seek: rest shall glorious. shall come pass day, [that] lord shall set hand second time recover remnant people, shall left, assyria, egypt, pathros, cush, elam, shinar, hamath, islands sea. shall set ensign nations, shall assemble outcasts israel, gather together dispersed judah four corners earth. envy also ephraim shall depart, adversaries judah shall cut off: ephraim shall envy judah, judah shall vex ephraim. shall fly upon shoulders philistines toward west; shall spoil east together: shall lay hand upon edom moab; children ammon shall obey them. lord shall utterly destroy tongue egyptian sea; mighty wind shall shake hand river, shall smite seven streams, make [men] goisaiah page 422 dryshod. shall highway remnant people, shall left, assyria; like israel day came land egypt. day thou shalt say, lord, praise thee: though thou wast angry me, thine anger turned away, thou comfortedst me. behold, god [is] salvation; trust, afraid: lord jehovah [is] strength [my] song; also become salvation. therefore joy shall ye draw water wells salvation. day shall ye say, praise lord, call upon name, declare doings among people, make mention name exalted. sing unto lord; hath done excellent things: [is] known earth. cry shout, thou inhabitant zion: great [is] holy one israel midst thee. burden babylon, isaiah son amoz see. lift ye banner upon high mountain, exalt voice unto them, shake hand, may go gates nobles. commanded sanctified ones, also called mighty ones mine anger, [even] rejoice highness. noise multitude mountains, like great people; tumultuous noise kingdoms nations gathered together: lord hosts mustereth host battle. come far country, end heaven, [even] lord, weapons indignation, destroy whole land. howl ye; day lord [is] hand; shall come destruction almighty. therefore shall hands faint, every man's heart shall melt: shall afraid: pangs sorrows shall take hold them; shall pain woman travaileth: shall amazed one another; faces [shall as] flames. behold, day lord cometh, cruel wrath fierce anger, lay land desolate: shall destroy sinners thereof it. stars heaven constellations thereof shall give light: sun shall darkened going forth, moon shall cause light shine. punish world [their] evil, wicked iniquity; cause arrogancy proud cease, lay low haughtiness terrible. make man precious fine gold; even man golden wedge ophir. therefore shake heavens, earth shall remove place, wrath lord hosts, day fierce anger. shall chased roe, sheep man taketh up: shall every man turn people, flee every one land. every one found shall thrust through; every one joined [unto them] shall fall sword. children also shall dashed pieces eyes; houses shall spoiled, wives ravished. behold, stir medes them, shall regard silver; [as for] gold, shall delight it. [their] bows also shall dash young men pieces; shall pity fruit womb; eye shall spare children. babylon, glory kingdoms, beauty chaldees' excellency, shall god overthrew sodom gomorrah. shall never inhabited, neither shall dwelt generation togeneration: neither shall arabian pitch tent there; neither shall shepherds make fold there. wild beasts desert shall lie there; houses shall full doleful creatures; owls shall dwell there, satyrs shall dance there. wild beasts islands shall cry desolate houses, dragons [their] pleasant palaces: time [is] near come, days shall prolonged. lord mercy jacob, yet choose israel, set land: strangers shall joined them, shall cleave house jacob. people shall take them, bring place: house israel shall possess land lord servants handmaids: shall take captives, whose captives were; shall rule oppressors. shall come pass day lord shall give thee rest thy sorrow, thy fear, hard bondage wherein thou wast made serve, thou shalt take proverb king babylon, say, hath oppressor ceased! golden city ceased! lord hath broken staff wicked, [and] sceptre rulers. smote people wrath continual stroke, ruled nations anger, persecuted, [and] none hindereth. whole earth rest, [and] quiet: break forth singing. yea, fir trees rejoice thee, [and] cedars lebanon, [saying,] since thou art laid down, feller come us. hell beneath moved thee meet [thee] thy coming: stirreth dead thee, [even] chief ones earth; hath raised thrones kings nations. shall speak say unto thee, art thou also become weak we? art thou become like unto us? thy pomp brought grave, [and] noise thy viols: worm spread thee, worms cover thee. art thou fallen heaven, lucifer, son morning! [how] art thou cut ground, didst weaken nations! thou hast said thine heart, ascend heaven, exalt throne stars god: sit also upon mount congregation, sides north: ascend heights clouds; like high. yet thou shalt brought hell, sides pit. see thee shall narrowly look upon thee, [and] consider thee, [saying, is] man made earth tremble, shake kingdoms; [that] made world wilderness, destroyed cities thereof; [that] opened house prisoners? kings nations, [even] them, lie glory, every one house. thou art cast thy grave like abominable branch, [and as] raiment slain, thrust sword, go stones pit; carcase trodden feet. thou shalt joined burial, thou hast destroyed thy land, [and] slain thy people: seed evildoers shall never renowned. prepare slaughter children iniquity fathers; rise, possess land, fill face world cities. rise them, saith lord hosts, cut babylon name, remnant, son, nephew, saith lord. also make possession bittern, pools water: sweep besom destruction, saith lord hosts.page 423 isaiah lord hosts hath sworn, saying, surely thought, shall come pass; purposed, [so] shall stand: break assyrian land, upon mountains tread foot: shall yoke depart them, burden depart shoulders. [is] purpose purposed upon whole earth: [is] hand stretched upon nations. lord hosts hath purposed, shall disannul [it?] hand [is] stretched out, shall turn back? year king ahaz died burden. rejoice thou, whole palestina, rod smote thee broken: serpent's root shall come forth cockatrice, fruit [shall be] fiery flying serpent. firstborn poor shall feed, needy shall lie safety: kill thy root famine, shall slay thy remnant. howl, gate; cry, city; thou, whole palestina, [art] dissolved: shall come north smoke, none [shall be] alone appointed times. shall [one] answer messengers nation? lord hath founded zion, poor people shall trust it. burden moab. night ar moab laid waste, [and] brought silence; night kir moab laid waste, [and] brought silence; gone bajith, dibon, high places, weep: moab shall howl nebo, medeba: heads [shall be] baldness, [and] every beard cut off. streets shall gird sackcloth: tops houses, streets, every one shall howl, weeping abundantly. heshbon shall cry, elealeh: voice shall heard [even] unto jahaz: therefore armed soldiers moab shall cry out; life shall grievous unto him. heart shall cry moab; fugitives [shall flee] unto zoar, heifer three years old: mounting luhith weeping shall go up; way horonaim shall raise cry destruction. waters nimrim shall desolate: hay withered away, grass faileth, green thing. therefore abundance gotten, laid up, shall carry away brook willows. cry gone round borders moab; howling thereof unto eglaim, howling thereof unto beer- elim. waters dimon shall full blood: bring upon dimon, lions upon escapeth moab, upon remnant land. send ye lamb ruler land sela wilderness, unto mount daughter zion. shall be, [that,] wandering bird cast nest, daughters moab shall fords arnon. take counsel, execute judgment; make thy shadow night midst noonday; hide outcasts; bewray wandereth. let mine outcasts dwell thee, moab; thou covert face spoiler: extortioner end, spoiler ceaseth, oppressors consumed land. mercy shall throne established: shall sit upon truth tabernacle david, judging, seeking judgment, hasting righteousness. heard pride moab; [he is] proud: [even] haughtiness, pride, hiswrath: [but] lies [shall] [be] so. therefore shall moab howl moab, every one shall howl: foundations kir-hareseth shall ye mourn; surely [they are] stricken. fields heshbon languish, [and] vine sibmah: lords heathen broken principal plants thereof, come [even] unto jazer, wandered [through] wilderness: branches stretched out, gone sea. therefore bewail weeping jazer vine sibmah: water thee tears, heshbon, elealeh: shouting thy summer fruits thy harvest fallen. gladness taken away, joy plentiful field; vineyards shall singing, neither shall shouting: treaders shall tread wine [their] presses; made [their vintage] shouting cease. wherefore bowels shall sound like harp moab, mine inward parts kir-haresh. shall come pass, seen moab weary high place, shall come sanctuary pray; shall prevail. [is] word lord hath spoken concerning moab since time. lord hath spoken, saying, within three years, years hireling, glory moab shall contemned, great multitude; remnant [shall be] small [and] feeble. burden damascus. behold, damascus taken away [being] city, shall ruinous heap. cities aroer [are] forsaken: shall flocks, shall lie down, none shall make [them] afraid. fortress also shall cease ephraim, kingdom damascus, remnant syria: shall glory children israel, saith lord hosts. day shall come pass, [that] glory jacob shall made thin, fatness flesh shall wax lean. shall harvestman gathereth corn, reapeth ears arm; shall gathereth ears valley rephaim. yet gleaning grapes shall left it, shaking olive tree, two [or] three berries top uppermost bough, four [or] five outmost fruitful branches thereof, saith lord god israel. day shall man look maker, eyes shall respect holy one israel. shall look altars, work hands, neither shall respect [that] fingers made, either groves, images. day shall strong cities forsaken bough, uppermost branch, left children israel: shall desolation. thou hast forgotten god thy salvation, hast mindful rock thy strength, therefore shalt thou plant pleasant plants, shalt set strange slips: day shalt thou make thy plant grow, morning shalt thou make thy seed flourish: [but] harvest [shall be] heap day grief desperate sorrow. woe multitude many people, [which] make noise like noise seas; rushing nations, [that] make rushing like rushing mighty waters! nations shall rush like rushingisaiah page 424 many waters: [god] shall rebuke them, shall flee far off, shall chased chaff mountains wind, like rolling thing whirlwind. behold eveningtide trouble; [and] morning [is] not. [is] portion spoil us, lot rob us. woe land shadowing wings, [is] beyond rivers ethiopia: sendeth ambassadors sea, even vessels bulrushes upon waters, [saying,] go, ye swift messengers, nation scattered peeled, people terrible beginning hitherto; nation meted trodden down, whose land rivers spoiled! ye inhabitants world, dwellers earth, see ye, lifteth ensign mountains; bloweth trumpet, hear ye. lord said unto me, take rest, consider dwelling place like clear heat upon herbs, [and] like cloud dew heat harvest. afore harvest, bud perfect, sour grape ripening flower, shall cut sprigs pruninghooks, take away [and] cut branches. shall left together unto fowls mountains, beasts earth: fowls shall summer upon them, beasts earth shall winter upon them. time shall present brought unto lord hosts people scattered peeled, people terrible beginning hitherto; nation meted trodden foot, whose land rivers spoiled, place name lord hosts, mount zion. burden egypt. behold, lord rideth upon swift cloud, shall come egypt: idols egypt shall moved presence, heart egypt shall melt midst it. set egyptians egyptians: shall fight every one brother, every one neighbour; city city, [and] kingdom kingdom. spirit egypt shall fail midst thereof; destroy counsel thereof: shall seek idols, charmers, familiar spirits, wizards. egyptians give hand cruel lord; fierce king shall rule them, saith lord, lord hosts. waters shall fail sea, river shall wasted dried up. shall turn rivers far away; [and] brooks defence shall emptied dried up: reeds flags shall wither. paper reeds brooks, mouth brooks, every thing sown brooks, shall wither, driven away, [more. ] fishers also shall mourn, cast angle brooks shall lament, spread nets upon waters shall languish. moreover work fine flax, weave networks, shall confounded. shall broken purposes thereof, make sluices [and] ponds fish. surely princes zoan [are] fools, counsel wise counsellors pharaoh become brutish: say ye unto pharaoh, [am] son wise, son ancient kings? [are] they? [are] thy wise [men?] let tell thee now, let know lord hosts hath purposed upon egypt. princes zoan become fools, theprinces noph deceived; also seduced egypt, [even are] stay tribes thereof. lord hath mingled perverse spirit midst thereof: caused egypt err every work thereof, drunken [man] staggereth vomit. neither shall [any] work egypt, head tail, branch rush, may do. day shall egypt like unto women: shall afraid fear shaking hand lord hosts, shaketh it. land judah shall terror unto egypt, every one maketh mention thereof shall afraid himself, counsel lord hosts, hath determined it. day shall five cities land egypt speak language canaan, swear lord hosts; one shall called, city destruction. day shall altar lord midst land egypt, pillar border thereof lord. shall sign witness unto lord hosts land egypt: shall cry unto lord oppressors, shall send saviour, great one, shall deliver them. lord shall known egypt, egyptians shall know lord day, shall sacrifice oblation; yea, shall vow vow unto lord, perform [it. ] lord shall smite egypt: shall smite heal [it:] shall return [even] lord, shall intreated them, shall heal them. day shall highway egypt assyria, assyrian shall come egypt, egyptian assyria, egyptians shall serve assyrians. day shall israel third egypt assyria, [even] blessing midst land: lord hosts shall bless, saying, blessed [be] egypt people, assyria work hands, israel mine inheritance. year tartan came unto ashdod, (when sargon king assyria sent him,) fought ashdod, took it; time spake lord isaiah son amoz, saying, go loose sackcloth thy loins, put thy shoe thy foot. so, walking naked barefoot. lord said, like servant isaiah hath walked naked barefoot three years [for] sign wonder upon egypt upon ethiopia; [so] cometh desert, terrible land. grievous vision declared unto me; treacherous dealer dealeth treacherously, spoiler spoileth. go up, elam: besiege, media; sighing thereof made cease. therefore loins filled pain: pangs taken hold upon me, pangs woman travaileth: bowed hearing [of it;] dismayed seeing [ofpage 425 isaiah it. ] heart panted, fearfulness affrighted me: night pleasure hath turned fear unto me. prepare table, watch watchtower, eat, drink: arise, ye princes, [and] anoint shield. thus hath lord said unto me, go, set watchman, let declare seeth. saw chariot [with] couple horsemen, chariot asses, [and] chariot camels; weep bitterly, labour comfort me, spoiling daughter people. [it is] day trouble, treading down, perplexity lord god hosts valley vision, breaking walls, crying mountains. elam bare quiver chariots men [and] horsemen, kir uncovered shield. shall come pass, [that] thy choicest valleys shall full chariots, horsemen shall set array gate. discovered covering judah, thou didst look day armour house forest. ye seen also breaches city david, many: ye gathered together waters lower pool. ye numbered houses jerusalem, houses ye broken fortify wall. ye made also ditch two walls water old pool: ye looked unto maker thereof, neither respect unto fashioned long ago. day lord god hosts call weeping, mourning, baldness, girding sackcloth: behold joy gladness, slaying oxen, killing sheep, eating flesh, drinking wine: let us eat anddrink; morrow shall die. revealed mine ears lord hosts, surely iniquity shall purged till ye die, saith lord god hosts. thus saith lord god hosts, go, get thee unto treasurer, [even] unto shebna, [is] house, [and say, ] hast thou here? hast thou here, thou hast hewed thee sepulchre here, [as] heweth sepulchre high, [and] graveth habitation rock? behold, lord carry thee away mighty captivity, surely cover thee. surely violently turn toss thee [like] ball large country: shalt thou die, chariots thy glory [shall be] shame thy lord's house. drive thee thy station, thy state shall pull thee down. shall come pass day, call servant eliakim son hilkiah: clothe thy robe, strengthen thy girdle, commit thy government hand: shall father inhabitants jerusalem, house judah. key house david lay upon shoulder; shall open, none shall shut; shall shut, none shall open. fasten nail sure place; shall glorious throne father's house. shall hang upon glory father's house, offspring issue, vessels small quantity, vessels cups, even vessels flagons. day, saith lord hosts, shall nail fastened sure place removed, cut down, fall; burden [was] upon shall cut off: lord hath spoken [it. ] burden tyre. howl, ye ships tarshish; laid waste, house, entering in: land chittim revealed them. still, ye inhabitants isle; thou merchants zidon, pass sea, replenished. great waters seed sihor, harvest river, [is] revenue; mart nations. thou ashamed, zidon: sea hath spoken, [even] strength sea, saying, travail not, bring forth children, neither nourish young men, [nor] bring virgins. report concerning egypt, [so] shall sorely pained report tyre. pass ye tarshish; howl, ye inhabitants isle. [is] joyous [city,] whose antiquity [is] ancient days? feet shall carry afar sojourn. hath taken counsel tyre, crowning [city,] whose merchants [are] princes, whose traffickers [are] honourable earth? lord hosts hath purposed it, stain pride glory, [and] bring contempt honourable earth. pass thy land river, daughter tarshish: [there is] strength. stretched hand sea, shook kingdoms: lord hath given commandment merchant [city,] destroy strong holds thereof. said, thou shalt rejoice, thou oppressed virgin, daughter zidon: arise, pass chittim; also shalt thou rest. behold land chaldeans; people not, [til] assyrian founded dwell wilderness: set towers thereof, raised palaces thereof; [and] brought ruin. howl, ye ships tarshish: strength laid waste.isaiah page 426 shall come pass day, tyre shall forgotten seventy years, according days one king: end seventy years shall tyre sing harlot. take harp, go city, thou harlot hast forgotten; make sweet melody, sing many songs, thou mayest remembered. shall come pass end seventy years, lord visit tyre, shall turn hire, shall commit fornication kingdoms world upon face earth. merchandise hire shall holiness lord: shall treasured laid up; merchandise shall dwell lord, eat sufficiently, durable clothing. behold, lord maketh earth empty, maketh waste, turneth upside down, scattereth abroad inhabitants thereof. shall be, people, priest; servant, master; maid, mistress; buyer, seller; lender, borrower; taker usury, giver usury him. land shall utterly emptied, utterly spoiled: lord hath spoken word. earth mourneth [and] fadeth away, world languisheth [and] fadeth away, haughty people earth languish. earth also defiled inhabitants thereof; transgressed laws, changed ordinance, broken everlasting covenant. therefore hath curse devoured earth, dwell therein desolate: therefore inhabitants earth burned, men left. new wine mourneth, vine languisheth, merryhearted sigh. mirth tabrets ceaseth, noise rejoice endeth, joy harp ceaseth. shall drink wine song; strong drink shall bitter drink it. city confusion broken down: every house shut up, man may come in. [there is] crying wine streets; joy darkened, mirth land gone. city left desolation, gate smitten destruction. thus shall midst land among people, [there shall be] shaking olive tree, [and] gleaning grapes vintage done. shall lift voice, shall sing majesty lord, shall cry aloud sea. wherefore glorify ye lord fires, [even] name lord god israel isles sea. uttermost part earth heard songs, [even] glory righteous. said, leanness, leanness, woe unto me! treacherous dealers dealt treacherously; yea, treacherous dealers dealt treacherously. fear, pit, snare, [are] upon thee, inhabitant earth. shall come pass, [that] fleeth noise fear shall fall pit; cometh midst pit shall taken snare: windows high open, foundations earth shake. earth utterly broken down, earth clean dissolved, earth moved exceedingly. earth shall reel fro like drunkard, shall removed like cottage; transgression thereof shall heavy upon it; shall fall, rise again. shall come pass day, [that] lord shall punish host high ones [that are]on high, kings earth upon earth. shall gathered together, [as] prisoners gathered pit, shall shut prison, many days shall visited. moon shall confounded, sun ashamed, lord hosts shall reign mount zion, jerusalem, ancients gloriously. lord, thou [art] god; exalt thee, praise thy name; thou hast done wonderful [things; thy] counsels old [are] faithfulness [and] truth. thou hast made city heap; [of] defenced city ruin: palace strangers city; shall never built. therefore shall strong people glorify thee, city terrible nations shall fear thee. thou hast strength poor, strength needy distress, refuge storm, shadow heat, blast terrible ones [is] storm [against] wall. thou shalt bring noise strangers, heat dry place; [even] heat shadow cloud: branch terrible ones shall brought low. mountain shall lord hosts make unto people feast fat things, feast wines lees, fat things full marrow, wines lees well refined. destroy mountain face covering cast people, vail spread nations. swallow death victory; lord god wipe away tears faces; rebuke people shall take away earth: lord hath spoken [it. ] shall said day, lo, [is] god; waited him, save us: [is] lord; waited him, glad rejoice salvation. mountain shall hand lord rest, moab shall trodden him, even straw trodden dunghill. shall spread forth hands midst them, swimmeth spreadeth forth [his hands] swim: shall bring pride together spoils hands. fortress high fort thy walls shall bring down, lay low, [and] bring ground, [even] dust. day shall song sung land judah; strong city; salvation [god] appoint [for] walls bulwarks. open ye gates, righteous nation keepeth truth may enter in. thou wilt keep [him] perfect peace, [whose] mind [is] stayed [on thee:] trusteth thee. trust ye lord ever: lord jehovah [is] everlasting strength: bringeth dwell high; lofty city, layeth low; layeth low, [even] ground; bringeth [even] dust. foot shall tread down, [even] feet poor, [and] steps needy. way [is] uprightness: thou, upright, dost weigh path just. yea, way thy judgments, lord, waited thee; desire [our] soul [is] thy name, remembrance thee. soul desired thee night; yea, spirit within seek thee early: thy judgments [are] earth, inhabitants world learn righteousness. let favour shewed wicked, [yet] learn righteousness: landpage 427 isaiah uprightness deal unjustly, behold majesty lord. lord, [when] thy hand lifted up, see: [but] shall see, ashamed [their] envy people; yea, fire thine enemies shall devour them. lord, thou wilt ordain peace us: thou also hast wrought works us. lord god, [other] lords besides thee dominion us: [but] thee make mention thy name. [they are] dead, shall live; [they are] deceased, shall rise: therefore hast thou visited destroyed them, made memory perish. thou hast increased nation, lord, thou hast increased nation: thou art glorified: thou hadst removed [it] far [unto] ends earth. lord, trouble visited thee, poured prayer [when] thy chastening [was] upon them. like woman child, [that] draweth near time delivery, pain, [and] crieth pangs; thy sight, lord. child, pain, brought forth wind; wrought deliverance earth; neither inhabitants world fallen. thy dead [men] shall live, [together with] dead body shall arise. awake sing, ye dwell dust: thy dew [is as] dew herbs, earth shall cast dead. come, people, enter thou thy chambers, shut thy doors thee: hide thyself little moment, indignation overpast. for, behold, lord cometh place punish inhabitants earth iniquity: earth also shall disclose blood, shall cover slain. day lord sore great strong sword shall punish leviathan piercing serpent, even leviathan crooked serpent; shall slay dragon [is] sea. day sing ye unto her, vineyard red wine. lord keep it; water every moment: lest [any] hurt it, keep night day. fury [is] me: would set briers [and] thorns battle? would go them, would burn together. let take hold strength, [that] may make peace me; [and] shall make peace me. shall cause come jacob take root: israel shall blossom bud, fill face world fruit. hath smitten him, smote smote him? [or] slain according slaughter slain him? measure, shooteth forth, thou wilt debate it: stayeth rough wind day east wind. therefore shall iniquity jacob purged; fruit take away sin; maketh stones altar chalkstones beaten sunder, groves images shall stand up. yet defenced city [shall be] desolate, [and] habitation forsaken, left like wilderness: shall calf feed, shall lie down, consume branches thereof. boughs thereof withered, shall broken off: women come, [and] set fire: [is] people understanding: therefore made mercy them, formed shew favour. shall come pass day, [that] thelord shall beat channel river unto stream egypt, ye shall gathered one one, ye children israel. shall come pass day, [that] great trumpet shall blown, shall come ready perish land assyria, outcasts land egypt, shall worship lord holy mount jerusalem. woe crown pride, drunkards ephraim, whose glorious beauty fading flower, [are] head fat valleys overcome wine! behold, lord hath mighty strong one, [which] tempest hail [and] destroying storm, flood mighty waters overflowing, shall cast earth hand. crown pride, drunkards ephraim, shall trodden feet: glorious beauty, head fat valley, shall fading flower, [and] hasty fruit summer; [when] looketh upon seeth, yet hand eateth up. day shall lord hosts crown glory, diadem beauty, unto residue people, spirit judgment sitteth judgment, strength turn battle gate. also erred wine, strong drink way; priest prophet erred strong drink, swallowed wine, way strong drink; err vision, stumble [in] judgment. tables full vomit [and] filthiness, [so is] place [clean. ] shall teach knowledge? shall make understand doctrine? [them are] weaned milk, [and] drawn breasts. precept [must be] upon precept, precept upon precept; line upon line, line upon line; little, [and] little: stammering lips another tongue speak people. said, [is] rest [wherewith] ye may cause weary rest; [is] refreshing: yet would hear. word lord unto precept upon precept, precept upon precept; line upon line, line upon line; little, [and] little; might go, fall backward, broken, snared, taken. wherefore hear word lord, ye scornful men, rule people [is] jerusalem. ye said, made covenant death, hell agreement; overflowing scourge shall pass through, shall come unto us: made lies refuge, falsehood hid ourselves: therefore thus saith lord god, behold, lay zion foundation stone, tried stone, precious corner [stone,] sure foundation: believeth shall make haste. judgment also lay line, righteousness plummet: hail shall sweep away refuge lies, waters shall overflow hiding place. covenant death shall disannulled, agreement hell shall stand; overflowing scourge shall pass through, ye shall trodden it. timeisaiah page 428 goeth forth shall take you: morning morning shall pass over, day night: shall vexation understand report. bed shorter [a man] stretch [on it:] covering narrower wrap [in it. ] lord shall rise [in] mount perazim, shall wroth [in] valley gibeon, may work, strange work; bring pass act, strange act. therefore ye mockers, lest bands made strong: heard lord god hosts consumption, even determined upon whole earth. give ye ear, hear voice; hearken, hear speech. doth plowman plow day sow? doth open break clods ground? hath made plain face thereof, doth cast abroad fitches, scatter cummin, cast principal wheat appointed barley rie place? god doth instruct discretion, [and] doth teach him. fitches threshed threshing instrument, neither cart wheel turned upon cummin; fitches beaten staff, cummin rod. bread [corn] bruised; ever threshing it, break [it with] wheel cart, bruise [with] horsemen. also cometh forth lord hosts, [which] wonderful counsel, [and] excellent working. woe ariel, ariel, city [where] david dwelt! add ye year year; let kill sacrifices. yet distress ariel, shall heaviness sorrow: shall unto ariel. camp thee round about, lay siege thee mount, raise forts thee. thou shalt brought down, [and] shalt speak ground, thy speech shall low dust, thy voice shall be, one hath familiar spirit, ground, thy speech shall whisper dust. moreover multitude thy strangers shall like small dust, multitude terrible ones [shall be] chaff passeth away: yea, shall instant suddenly. thou shalt visited lord hosts thunder, earthquake, great noise, storm tempest, flame devouring fire. multitude nations fight ariel, even fight munition, distress her, shall dream night vision. shall even hungry [man] dreameth, and, behold, eateth; stagger, strong drink. lord hath poured upon spirit deep sleep, hath closed eyes: prophets rulers, seers hath covered. vision become unto words book sealed, [men] deliver one learned, saying, read this, pray thee: saith, cannot; [is] sealed: book delivered learned, saying, read this, pray thee: saith, learned. wherefore lord said, forasmuch thispeople draw near [me] mouth, lips honour me, removed heart far me, fear toward taught precept men: therefore, behold, proceed marvellous work among people, [even] marvellous work wonder: wisdom wise [men] shall perish, understanding prudent [men] shall hid. woe unto seek deep hide counsel lord, works dark, say, seeth us? knoweth us? surely turning things upside shall esteemed potter's clay: shall work say made it, made not? shall thing framed say framed it, understanding? [is] yet little while, lebanon shall turned fruitful field, fruitful field shall esteemed forest? day shall deaf hear words book, eyes blind shall see obscurity, darkness. meek also shall increase [their] joy lord, poor among men shall rejoice holy one israel. terrible one brought nought, scorner consumed, watch iniquity cut off: make man offender word, lay snare reproveth gate, turn aside thing nought. therefore thus saith lord, redeemed abraham, concerning house jacob, jacob shall ashamed, neither shall face wax pale. seeth children, work mine hands, midst him, shall sanctify name, sanctify holy one jacob, shall fear god israel. also erred spirit shall come understanding, murmured shall learn doctrine. woe rebellious children, saith lord, take counsel, me; cover covering, spirit, may add sin sin: walk go egypt, asked mouth; strengthen strength pharaoh, trust shadow egypt! therefore shall strength pharaoh shame, trust shadow egypt [your] confusion. princes zoan, ambassadors came hanes. ashamed people [that] could profit them, help profit, shame, also reproach. burden beasts south: land trouble anguish, whence [come] young old lion, viper fiery flying serpent, carry riches upon shoulders young asses, treasures upon bunches camels, people [that] shall profit [them. ] egyptians shall help vain, purpose: therefore cried concerning this, strength [is] sit still. go, write table, note book, may time come ever ever: [is] rebellious people, lying children, children [that] hear law lord: say seers, see not; prophets, prophesy unto us right things, speak unto us smooth things, prophesy deceits: get way, turn aside path, cause holy one israel cease us. wherefore thus saith holy one israel, ye despise word, trust oppression perverseness, stay thereon:page 429 isaiah therefore iniquity shall breach ready fall, swelling high wall, whose breaking cometh suddenly instant. shall break breaking potters' vessel broken pieces; shall spare: shall found bursting sherd take fire hearth, take water [withal] pit. thus saith lord god, holy one israel; returning rest shall ye saved; quietness confidence shall strength: ye would not. ye said, no; flee upon horses; therefore shall ye flee: and, ride upon swift; therefore shall pursue swift. one thousand [shall flee] rebuke one; rebuke five shall ye flee: till ye left beacon upon top mountain, ensign hill. therefore lord wait, may gracious unto you, therefore exalted, may mercy upon you: lord [is] god judgment: blessed [are] wait him. people shall dwell zion jerusalem: thou shalt weep more: gracious unto thee voice thy cry; shall hear it, answer thee. [though] lord give bread adversity, water affliction, yet shall thy teachers removed corner more, thine eyes shall see thy teachers: thine ears shall hear word behind thee, saying, [is] way, walk ye it, ye turn right hand, ye turn left. ye shall defile also covering thy graven images silver, ornament thy molten images gold: thou shalt cast away menstruous cloth; thou shalt say unto it, get thee hence. shall give rain thy seed, thou shalt sow ground withal; bread increase earth, shall fat plenteous: day shall thy cattle feed large pastures. oxen likewise young asses ear ground shall eat clean provender, hath winnowed shovel fan. shall upon every high mountain, upon every high hill, rivers [and] streams waters day great slaughter, towers fall. moreover light moon shall light sun, light sun shall sevenfold, light seven days, day lord bindeth breach people, healeth stroke wound. behold, name lord cometh far, burning [with] anger, burden [thereof is] heavy: lips full indignation, tongue devouring fire: breath, overflowing stream, shall reach midst neck, sift nations sieve vanity: [there shall be] bridle jaws people, causing [them] err. ye shall song, night [when] holy solemnity kept; gladness heart, one goeth pipe come mountain lord, mighty one israel. lord shall cause glorious voice heard, shall shew lighting arm, indignation [his] anger, [with] flame devouring fire, [with] scattering, tempest, hailstones. voice lord shall assyrian beaten down, [which] smote rod. breath lord, like stream brimstone, doth kindle it. woe go egypt help; stay horses, trust chariots, [they are] many; horsemen, strong; look unto holy one israel, neither seek lord! yet also [is] wise, bring evil, call back words: arise house evildoers, help work iniquity. egyptians [are] men, god; horses flesh, spirit. lord shall stretch hand, helpeth shall fall, holpen shall fall down, shall fail together. thus hath lord spoken unto me, like lion young lion roaring prey, multitude shepherds called forth him, [he] afraid voice, abase noise them: shall lord hosts come fight mount zion, hill thereof. birds flying, lord hosts defend jerusalem; rivers water dry place, shadow great rock weary land. eyes see shall dim, ears hear shall hearken. heart also rash shall understand knowledge, tongue stammerers shall ready speak plainly. vile person shall called liberal, churl said [to be] bountiful. vile person speak villany, heart work iniquity, practise hypocrisy, utter error lord, make empty soul hungry, cause drink thirsty fail. instruments also churl [are] evil: deviseth wicked devices destroy poor lying words, even needy speaketh right. liberal deviseth liberal things; liberal things shall stand. rise up, ye women ease; hear voice, ye careless daughters; give ear unto speech. many days years shall ye troubled, ye careless women: vintage shall fail, gathering shall come. tremble, ye women ease; multitude city shall left; forts towers shall dens ever, joy wild asses, pastureisaiah page 430 flocks; spirit poured upon us high, wilderness fruitful field, fruitful field counted forest. judgment shall dwell wilderness, righteousness remain fruitful field. work righteousness shall peace; effect righteousness quietness assurance ever. people shall dwell peaceable habitation, sure dwellings, quiet resting places; shall hail, coming forest; city shall low low place. blessed [are] ye sow beside waters, send forth [thither] feet ox ass. woe thee spoilest, thou [wast] spoiled; dealest treacherously, dealt treacherously thee! thou shalt cease spoil, thou shalt spoiled; [and] thou shalt make end deal treacherously, shall deal treacherously thee. lord, gracious unto us; waited thee: thou arm every morning, salvation also time trouble. noise tumult people fled; lifting thyself nations scattered. spoil shall gathered [like] gathering caterpiller: running fro locusts shall run upon them. lord exalted; dwelleth high: hath filled zion judgment righteousness. wisdom knowledge shall stability thy times, [and] strength salvation: fear lord [is] treasure. behold, valiant ones shall cry without: ambassadors peace shall weep bitterly. highways lie waste, wayfaring man ceaseth: hath broken covenant, hath despised cities, regardeth man. earth mourneth [and] languisheth: lebanon ashamed [and] hewn down: sharon like wilderness; bashan carmel shake [their fruits. ] rise, saith lord; exalted; lift myself. ye shall conceive chaff, ye shall bring forth stubble: breath, [as] fire, shall devour you. people shall burnings lime: [as] thorns cut shall burned fire. hear, ye [that are] far off, done; and, ye [that are] near, acknowledge might. sinners zion afraid; fearfulness hath surprised hypocrites. among us shall dwell devouring fire? among us shall dwell everlasting burnings? walketh righteously, speaketh uprightly; despiseth gain oppressions, shaketh hands holding bribes, stoppeth ears hearing blood, shutteth eyes seeing evil; shall dwell high: place defence [shall be] munitions rocks: bread shall given him; waters [shall be] sure. thine eyes shall see king beauty: shall behold land far off. thine heart shall meditate terror. [is] scribe? [is] receiver? [is] counted towers? thou shalt see fierce people, people deeper speech thou canst perceive; stammering tongue, [that thou canst] understand. look upon zion, city solemnities: thine eyes shall see jerusalem quiet habitation, tabernacle [that] shall taken down; one stakes thereof shall ever removed, neither shall cords thereof broken. glorious lord [will be] unto us place broad rivers [and] streams; wherein shall go galley oars, neither shall gallant ship pass thereby. lord [is]our judge, lord [is] lawgiver, lord [is] king; save us. thy tacklings loosed; could well strengthen mast, could spread sail: prey great spoil divided; lame take prey. inhabitant shall say, sick: people dwell therein [shall be] forgiven [their] iniquity. come near, ye nations, hear; hearken, ye people: let earth hear, therein; world, things come forth it. indignation lord [is] upon nations, [his] fury upon armies: hath utterly destroyed them, hath delivered slaughter. slain also shall cast out, stink shall come carcases, mountains shall melted blood. host heaven shall dissolved, heavens shall rolled together scroll: host shall fall down, leaf falleth vine, falling [fig] fig tree. sword shall bathed heaven: behold, shall come upon idumea, upon people curse, judgment. sword lord filled blood, made fat fatness, [and] blood lambs goats, fat kidneys rams: lord hath sacrifice bozrah, great slaughter land idumea. unicorns shall come them, bullocks bulls; land shall soaked blood, dust made fat fatness. [it is] day lord's vengeance, [and] year recompences controversy zion. streams thereof shall turned pitch, dust thereof brimstone, land thereof shall become burning pitch. shall quenched night day; smoke thereof shall go ever: generation generation shall lie waste; none shall pass ever ever. cormorant bittern shall possess it; owl also raven shall dwell it: shall stretch upon line confusion, stones emptiness. shall call nobles thereof kingdom, none [shall be] there, princes shall nothing. thorns shall come palaces, nettles brambles fortresses thereof: shall habitation dragons, [and] court owls. wild beasts desert shall also meet wild beasts island, satyr shall cry fellow; screech owl also shall rest there, find place rest. shall great owl make nest, lay, hatch, gather shadow: shall vultures also gathered, every one mate. seek ye book lord, read: one shall fail, none shall want mate: mouth hath commanded, spirit hath gathered them. hath cast lot them, hand hath divided unto line: shall possess ever, generation generation shall dwell therein. wilderness solitary place shall glad them; come save you. eyes blind shall opened, ears deaf shall unstopped. shall lame [man] leap hart, tongue dumb sing: wilderness shall waters break out, streams desert. parched ground shall become pool, thirsty land springs water: habitation dragons, lay, [shall be] grass reeds rushes. highway shall there, way, shall called way holiness; unclean shall pass it; [shall be] those: wayfaring men, though fools, shall err [therein. ] lion shall there, [any] ravenous beast shall go thereon, shall found there; redeemed shall walk [there: ] ransomed lord shall return, come zion songs everlasting joy upon heads: shall obtain joy gladness, sorrow sighing shall flee away. came pass fourteenth year king hezekiah, [that] sennacherib king assyria came defenced cities judah, took them. king assyria sent rabshakeh lachish jerusalem unto king hezekiah great army. stood conduit upper pool highway fuller's field. came forth unto eliakim, hilkiah's son, house, shebna scribe, joah, asaph's son, recorder. rabshakeh said unto them, say ye hezekiah, thus saith great king, king assyria, confidence wherein thou trustest? say, [sayest thou,] (but [they but] vain words) [i have] counsel strength war: dost thou trust, thou rebellest me? lo, thou trustest staff broken reed, egypt; whereon man lean, go hand, pierce it: [is] pharaoh king egypt trust him. thou say me, trust lord god: [is it] he, whose high places whose altars hezekiah hath taken away, said judah jerusalem, ye shall worship altar? therefore give pledges, pray thee, master king assyria, give thee two thousand horses, thou able thy part set riders upon them. wilt thou turn away face one captain least master's servants, put thy trust egypt chariots horsemen? come without lord land destroy it? lord said unto me, go land, destroy it. said eliakim shebna joah unto rabshakeh, speak, pray thee, unto thy servants syrian language; understand [it:] speak us jews' language, ears people [are] wall. rabshakeh said, hath master sent thy master thee speak words? [hath he] [sent me] men sit upon wall, may eat dung, drink piss you? rabshakeh stood, cried loud voice jews' language, said, hear ye words great king, king assyria. thus saith king, let hezekiah deceive you: shall able deliver you. neither let hezekiah make trust lord, saying, lord surely deliver us: city shall delivered hand king assyria. hearken hezekiah: thus saith king assyria, make [an agreement] [by] present, come me: eat ye every one vine, every one fig tree, drink ye every one waters cistern; come take away land like land, land corn wine, land bread vineyards. [is] king hamath, king arphad, king city sepharvaim, hena, ivah? hezekiah received letter hand messengers, read it: hezekiah went unto house lord, spread lord. hezekiah prayed unto lord, saying,isaiah page 432 lord hosts, god israel, dwellest [between] cherubims, thou [art] god, [even] thou alone, kingdoms earth: thou hast made heaven earth. incline thine ear, lord, hear; open thine eyes, lord, see: hear words sennacherib, hath sent reproach living god. truth, lord, kings assyria laid waste nations, countries, cast gods fire: [were] gods, work men's hands, wood stone: therefore destroyed them. therefore, lord god, save us hand, kingdoms earth may know thou [art] lord, [even] thou only. isaiah son amoz sent unto hezekiah, saying, thus saith lord god israel, whereas thou hast prayed sennacherib king assyria: [is] word lord hath spoken concerning him; virgin, daughter zion, hath despised thee, [and] laughed thee scorn; daughter jerusalem hath shaken head thee. hast thou reproached blasphemed? hast thou exalted [thy] voice, lifted thine eyes high? [even] holy one israel. thy servants hast thou reproached lord, hast said, multitude chariots come height mountains, sides lebanon; cut tall cedars thereof, [and] choice fir trees thereof: enter height border, [and] forest carmel. digged, drunk water; sole feet dried rivers besieged places. hast thou heard long ago, [how] done it; [and] ancient times, formed it? brought pass, thou shouldest lay waste defenced cities [into] ruinous heaps. therefore inhabitants [were] small power, dismayed confounded: [as] grass field, [as] green herb, [as] grass housetops, [as corn] blasted grown up. know thy abode, thy going out, thy coming in, thy rage me. thy rage me, thy tumult, come mine ears, therefore put hook thy nose, bridle thy lips, turn thee back way thou camest. [shall be] sign unto thee, ye shall eat [this] year groweth itself; second year springeth same: third year sow ye, reap, plant vineyards, eat fruit thereof. remnant escaped house judah shall take root downward, bear fruit upward: jerusalem shall go forth remnant, escape mount zion: zeal lord hosts shall this. therefore thus saith lord concerning king assyria, shall come city, shoot arrow come shields, cast bank it. way came, shall return, shall come city, saith lord. defend city save mine sake, servant david's sake. angel lord went forth, smote camp assyrians hundred fourscore five thousand: arose early morning, behold, [were] dead corpses. sennacherib king assyria departed, went returned, dwelt nineveh. came pass, worshipping house ofnisroch god, adrammelech sharezer sons smote sword; escaped land armenia: esar-haddon son reigned stead. days hezekiah sick unto death. isaiah prophet son amoz came unto him, said unto him, thus saith lord, set thine house order: thou shalt die, live. hezekiah turned face toward wall, prayed unto lord, said, remember now, lord, beseech thee, walked thee truth perfect heart, done [that is] good thy sight. hezekiah wept sore. came word lord isaiah, saying, go, say hezekiah, thus saith lord, god david thy father, heard thy prayer, seen thy tears: behold, add unto thy days fifteen years. deliver thee city hand king assyria: defend city. [shall be] sign unto thee lord, lord thing hath spoken; behold, bring shadow degrees, gone sun dial ahaz, ten degrees backward. sun returned ten degrees, degrees gone down. writing hezekiah king judah, sick, recovered sickness: said cutting days, shall go gates grave: deprived residue years. said, shall see lord, [even] lord, land living: shall behold man inhabitants world. mine age departed, removed shepherd's tent: cut like weaver life: cut pining sickness: day [even] night wilt thou make end me. reckoned till morning, [that,] lion, break bones: day [even] night wilt thou make end me. like crane [or] swallow, chatter: mourn dove: mine eyes fail [with looking] upward: lord, oppressed; undertake me. shall say? hath spoken unto me, hath done [it:] shall go softly years bitterness soul. lord, [things men] live, [things is] life spirit: wilt thou recover me, make live. behold, peace great bitterness: thou hast love soul [delivered it] pit corruption: thou hast cast sins behind thy back. grave cannot praise thee, death [not] celebrate thee: go pit cannot hope thy truth. living, living, shall praise thee, [do] day: father children shall make known thy truth. lord [was ready] save me: therefore sing songs stringed instruments days life house lord. isaiah said, let take lump figs, lay [it] plaister upon boil, shall recover. hezekiah also said, [is] sign shall go house lord? time merodach-baladan, son baladan, king babylon, sent letters present hezekiah: heard sick, recovered. hezekiah glad them, shewed house precious things, silver, gold, spices, precious ointment, house armour, foundpage 433 isaiah treasures: nothing house, dominion, hezekiah shewed not. came isaiah prophet unto king hezekiah, said unto him, said men? whence came unto thee? hezekiah said, come far country unto me, [even] babylon. said he, seen thine house? hezekiah answered, [is] mine house seen: nothing among treasures shewed them. said isaiah hezekiah, hear word lord hosts: behold, days come, [is] thine house, [that] thy fathers laid store day, shall carried babylon: nothing shall left, saith lord. thy sons shall issue thee, thou shalt beget, shall take away; shall eunuchs palace king babylon. said hezekiah isaiah, good [is] word lord thou hast spoken. said moreover, shall peace truth days. comfort ye, comfort ye people, saith god. speak ye comfortably jerusalem, cry unto her, warfare accomplished, iniquity pardoned: hath received lord's hand double sins. voice crieth wilderness, prepare ye way lord, make straight desert highway god. every valley shall exalted, every mountain hill shall made low: crooked shall made straight, rough places plain: glory lord shall revealed, flesh shall see [it] together: mouth lord hath spoken [it. ] voice said, cry. said, shall cry? flesh [is] grass, goodliness thereof [is] flower field: grass withereth, flower fadeth: spirit lord bloweth upon it: surely people [is] grass. grass withereth, flower fadeth: word god shall stand ever. zion, bringest good tidings, get thee high mountain; jerusalem, bringest good tidings, lift thy voice strength; lift [it] up, afraid; say unto cities judah, behold god! behold, lord god come strong [hand,] arm shall rule him: behold, reward [is] him, work him. shall feed flock like shepherd: shall gather lambs arm, carry [them] bosom, [and] shall gently lead young. hath measured waters hollow hand, meted heaven span, comprehended dust earth measure, weighed mountains scales, hills balance? hath directed spirit lord, [being] counsellor hath taught him? took counsel, [who] instructed him, taught path judgment, taught knowledge, shewed way understanding? behold, nations [are] drop bucket, counted small dust balance: behold, taketh isles little thing. lebanon [is] sufficient burn, beasts thereof sufficient burnt offering. nations [are] nothing; counted less nothing, andvanity. ye liken god? likeness ye compare unto him? workman melteth graven image, goldsmith spreadeth gold, casteth silver chains. [is] impoverished hath oblation chooseth tree [that] rot; seeketh unto cunning workman prepare graven image, [that] shall moved. ye known? ye heard? hath told beginning? ye understood foundations earth? [it is] sitteth upon circle earth, inhabitants thereof [are] grasshoppers; stretcheth heavens curtain, spreadeth tent dwell in: bringeth princes nothing; maketh judges earth vanity. yea, shall planted; yea, shall sown: yea, stock shall take root earth: shall also blow upon them, shall wither, whirlwind shall take away stubble. ye liken me, shall equal? saith holy one. lift eyes high, behold hath created [things,] bringeth host number: calleth names greatness might, [he is] strong power; one faileth. sayest thou, jacob, speakest, israel, way hid lord, judgment passed god? hast thou known? hast thou heard, [that] everlasting god, lord, creator ends earth, fainteth not, neither weary? [there is] searching understanding. giveth power faint; [them have] might increaseth strength. even youths shall faint weary, young men shall utterly fall: wait upon lord shall renew [their] strength; shall mount wings eagles; shall run, weary; [and] shall walk, faint. keep silence me, islands; let people renew [their] strength: let come near; let speak: let us come near together judgment. raised righteous [man] east, called foot, gave nations him, made [him] rule kings? gave [them] dust sword, [and] driven stubble bow. pursued them, [and] passed safely; [even] way [that] gone feet. hath wrought done [it,] calling generations beginning? lord, first, last; [am] he. isles saw [it,] feared; ends earth afraid, drew near, came. helped every one neighbour; [every one] said brother, good courage. carpenter encouraged goldsmith, [and] smootheth [with] hammer smote anvil, saying, ready sodering: fastened nails, [that] moved. thou, israel, [art] servant, jacob chosen, seed abraham friend. [thou] taken ends earth, called thee chief men thereof, said unto thee, thou [art] servant; chosen thee, cast thee away. fear thou not; [am] thee: dismayed; [am] thy god: strengthen thee; yea, help thee; yea, uphold thee right hand righteousness. behold, incensed thee shall ashamed confounded:isaiah page 434 shall nothing; strive thee shall perish. thou shalt seek them, shalt find them, [even] contended thee: war thee shall nothing, thing nought. lord thy god hold thy right hand, saying unto thee, fear not; help thee. fear not, thou worm jacob, [and] ye men israel; help thee, saith lord, thy redeemer, holy one israel. behold, make thee new sharp threshing instrument teeth: thou shalt thresh mountains, beat [them] small, shalt make hills chaff. thou shalt fan them, wind shall carry away, whirlwind shall scatter them: thou shalt rejoice lord, [and] shalt glory holy one israel. [when] poor needy seek water, [there is] none, [and] tongue faileth thirst, lord hear them, [i[ god israel forsake them. open rivers high places, fountains midst valleys: make wilderness pool water, dry land springs water. plant wilderness cedar, shittah tree, myrtle, oil tree; set desert fir tree, [and] pine, box tree together: may see, know, consider, understand together, hand lord hath done this, holy one israel hath created it. produce cause, saith lord; bring forth strong [reasons,] saith king jacob. let bring [them] forth, shew us shall happen: let shew former things, [be,] may consider them, know latter end them; declare us things come. shew things come hereafter, may know ye [are] gods: yea, good, evil, may dismayed, behold [it] together. behold, ye [are] nothing, work nought: abomination [is that] chooseth you. raised [one] north, shall come: rising sun shall call upon name: shall come upon princes [upon] morter, potter treadeth clay. hath declared beginning, may know? [is] blind, servant? deaf, messenger [that] sent? [am] lord, holy one, creator israel, king. thus saith lord, maketh way sea, path mighty waters; bringeth forth chariot horse, army power; shall lie together, shall rise: extinct, quenched tow. remember ye former things, neither consider things old. behold, new thing; shall spring forth; shall ye know it? arm lord revealed? shall grow tender plant, root dry ground: hath form comeliness; shall see him, [there is] beauty desire him. despised rejected men; man sorrows, acquainted grief: hid [our] faces him; despised, esteemed not. surely hath borne griefs, carried sorrows: yet esteem stricken, smitten god, afflicted. [was] wounded transgressions, [he was] bruised iniquities: chastisement peace [was] upon him; stripes healed. like sheep gone astray; turned every one way; lord hath laid iniquity us all. oppressed, afflicted, yet opened mouth: brought lamb slaughter, sheep shearers dumb, openeth mouth. taken prison judgment: shall declare generation? cut land living: transgression people stricken. made grave wicked, rich death; done violence, neither [was any] deceit mouth. yet pleased lord bruise him; hath put [him] grief: thou shalt make soul offering sin, shall see [his] seed, shall prolong [his] days, pleasure lord shall prosper hand. shall see travail soul, [and] shall satisfied: knowledge shall righteous servant justify many; shall bear iniquities. therefore divide [a portion] great, shall divide spoil strong; hath poured soul unto death: numbered transgressors; bare sin many, made intercession transgressors. sing, barren, thou [that] didst bear; break forth singing, cry aloud, thou [that] didst travail child: [are] children desolate children married wife, saith lord. enlarge place thy tent, let stretch forth curtains thine habitations: spare not, lengthen thy cords, strengthen thy stakes; thou shalt break forth right hand left; thy seed shall inherit gentiles, make desolate cities inhabited. fear not; thou shalt ashamed: neitherisaiah page 440 thou confounded; thou shalt put shame: thou shalt forget shame thy youth, shalt remember reproach thy widowhood more. thy maker [is] thine husband; lord hosts [is] name; thy redeemer holy one israel; god whole earth shall called. lord hath called thee woman forsaken grieved spirit, wife youth, thou wast refused, saith thy god. small moment forsaken thee; great mercies gather thee. little wrath hid face thee moment; everlasting kindness mercy thee, saith lord thy redeemer. [is as] waters noah unto me: [as] sworn waters noah go earth; sworn would wroth thee, rebuke thee. mountains shall depart, hills removed; kindness shall depart thee, neither shall covenant peace removed, saith lord hath mercy thee. thou afflicted, tossed tempest, [and] comforted, behold, lay thy stones fair colors, lay thy foundations sapphires. make thy windows agates, thy gates carbuncles, thy borders pleasant stones. thy children [shall be] taught lord; great [shall be] peace thy children. righteousness shalt thou established: thou shalt far oppression; thou shalt fear: terror; shall come near thee. behold, shall surely gather together, [but] me: whosoever shall gather together thee shall fall thy sake. behold, created smith bloweth coals fire, bringeth forth instrument work; created waster destroy. weapon formed thee shall prosper; every tongue [that] shall rise thee judgment thou shalt condemn. [is] heritage servants lord, righteousness [is] me, saith lord. ho, every one thirsteth, come ye waters, hath money; come ye, buy, eat; yea, come, buy wine milk without money without price. wherefore ye spend money [that is] bread? labour [that which] satisfieth not? hearken diligently unto me, eat ye [that is] good, let soul delight fatness. incline ear, come unto me: hear, soul shall live; make everlasting covenant you, [even] sure mercies david. behold, given [for] witness people, leader commander people. behold, thou shalt call nation [that] thou knowest not, nations [that] knew thee shall run unto thee lord thy god, holy one israel; hath glorified thee. seek ye lord may found, call ye upon near: let wicked forsake way, unrighteous man thoughts: let return unto lord, mercy upon him; god, abundantly pardon. thoughts [are] thoughts, neither [are] ways ways, saith lord. [as] heavens higher earth, ways higher ways, thoughts thoughts. rain cometh down, snow heaven, returneth thither, watereth earth, maketh bring forth bud, may give seed sower, bread eater: shall word goeth forth mouth: shall return unto void, shall accomplish please, shall prosper [in thing] whereto sent it. ye shall go joy, led forth peace: mountains hills shall break forth singing, trees field shall clap [their] hands. instead thorn shall come fir tree, instead brier shall come myrtle tree: shall lord name, everlasting sign [that] shall cut off. thus saith lord, keep ye judgment, justice: salvation [is] near come, righteousness revealed. blessed [is] man [that] doeth this, son man [that] layeth hold it; keepeth sabbath polluting it, keepeth hand evil. neither let son stranger, hath joined lord, speak, saying, lord hath utterly separated people: neither let eunuch say, behold, [am] dry tree. thus saith lord unto eunuchs keep sabbaths, choose [the things] please me, take hold covenant; even unto give mine house within walls place name better sons daughters: give everlasting name, shall cut off. also sons stranger, join lord, serve him, love name lord, servants, every one keepeth sabbath polluting it, taketh hold covenant; even bring holy mountain, make joyful house prayer: burnt offerings sacrifices [shall be] accepted upon mine altar; mine house shall called house prayer people. lord god gathereth outcasts israel saith, yet gather [others] him, beside gathered unto him. ye beasts field, come devour, [yea,] ye beasts forest. watchmen [are] blind: ignorant, [are] dumb dogs, cannot bark; sleeping, lying down, loving slumber. yea, [they are] greedy dogs [which] never enough, [are] shepherds [that] cannot understand: look way, every one gain, quarter. come ye, [say they,] fetch wine, fill strong drink; morrow shall day, [and] much abundant. righteous perisheth, man layeth [it] heart: merciful men [are] taken away, none considering righteous taken away evil [to come. ] shall enter peace: shall rest beds, [each one] walking [in] uprightness. draw near hither, ye sons sorceress, seed adulterer whore. ye sport yourselves? make ye wide mouth, [and] draw tongue? [are] ye children transgression, seed falsehood, enflaming idols every green tree, slaying children valleys clifts rocks? among smooth [stones] stream [is] thy portion; they, [are] thy lot: even hast thou pouredpage 441 isaiah drink offering, thou hast offered meat offering. receive comfort these? upon lofty high mountain hast thou set thy bed: even thither wentest thou offer sacrifice. behind doors also posts hast thou set thy remembrance: thou hast discovered [thyself another] me, art gone up; thou hast enlarged thy bed, made thee [a covenant] them; thou lovedst bed thou sawest [it. ] thou wentest king ointment, didst increase thy perfumes, didst send thy messengers far off, didst debase [thyself even] unto hell. thou art wearied greatness thy way; [yet] saidst thou not, hope: thou hast found life thine hand; therefore thou wast grieved. hast thou afraid feared, thou hast lied, hast remembered me, laid [it] thy heart? held peace even old, thou fearest not? declare thy righteousness, thy works; shall profit thee. thou criest, let thy companies deliver thee; wind shall carry away; vanity shall take [them:] putteth trust shall possess land, shall inherit holy mountain; shall say, cast ye up, cast ye up, prepare way, take stumblingblock way people. thus saith high lofty one inhabiteth eternity, whose name [is] holy; dwell high holy [place,] also [that is] contrite humble spirit, revive spirit humble, revive heart contrite ones. contend ever, neither always wroth: spirit fail me, souls [which] made. iniquity covetousness wroth, smote him: hid me, wroth, went frowardly way heart. seen ways, heal him: lead also, restore comforts unto mourners. create fruit lips; peace, peace [him is] far off, [him is] near, saith lord; heal him. wicked [are] like troubled sea, cannot rest, whose waters cast mire dirt. [there is] peace, saith god, wicked. cry aloud, spare not, lift thy voice like trumpet, shew people transgression, house jacob sins. yet seek daily, delight know ways, nation righteousness, forsook ordinance god: ask ordinances justice; take delight approaching god. wherefore fasted, [say they,] thou seest not? [wherefore] afflicted soul, thou takest knowledge? behold, day fast ye find pleasure, exact labours. behold, ye fast strife debate, smite fist wickedness: ye shall fast [ye this] day, make voice heard high. fast chosen? day man afflict soul? [is it] bow head bulrush, spread sackcloth ashes [under him?] wilt thou call fast, acceptable day lord? [is] fast chosen? loose bands wickedness, undo heavy burdens, let oppressed go free, ye break every yoke? [is it] deal thy bread hungry, thou bring poor cast thy house? thou seest naked, thou cover him; thou hide thyself thine ownflesh? shall thy light break forth morning, thine health shall spring forth speedily: thy righteousness shall go thee; glory lord shall thy rereward. shalt thou call, lord shall answer; thou shalt cry, shall say, [am.] thou take away midst thee yoke, putting forth finger, speaking vanity; [if] thou draw thy soul hungry, satisfy afflicted soul; shall thy light rise obscurity, thy darkness [be] noonday: lord shall guide thee continually, satisfy thy soul drought, make fat thy bones: thou shalt like watered garden, like spring water, whose waters fail not. [they shall be] thee shall build old waste places: thou shalt raise foundations many generations; thou shalt called, repairer breach, restorer paths dwell in. thou turn away thy foot sabbath, [from] thy pleasure holy day; call sabbath delight, holy lord, honourable; shalt honour him, thine ways, finding thine pleasure, speaking [thine own] words: shalt thou delight thyself lord; cause thee ride upon high places earth, feed thee heritage jacob thy father: mouth lord hath spoken [it. ] behold, lord's hand shortened, cannot save; neither ear heavy, cannot hear: iniquities separated god, sins hid [his] face you, hear. hands defiled blood, fingers iniquity; lips spoken lies, tongue hath muttered perverseness. none calleth justice, [any] pleadeth truth: trust vanity, speak lies; conceive mischief, bring forth iniquity. hatch cockatrice' eggs, weave spider's web: eateth eggs dieth, crushed breaketh viper. webs shall become garments, neither shall cover works: works [are] works iniquity, act violence [is] hands. feet run evil, make haste shed innocent blood: thoughts [are] thoughts iniquity; wasting destruction [are] paths. way peace know not; [there is] judgment goings: made crooked paths: whosoever goeth therein shall know peace. therefore judgment far us, neither doth justice overtake us: wait light, behold obscurity; brightness, [but] walk darkness. grope wall like blind, grope [we had] eyes: stumble noonday night; [we are] desolate places dead [men. ] roar like bears, mourn sore like doves: look judgment, [there is] none; salvation, [but] far us. transgressions multiplied thee, sins testify us: transgressions [are] us; [as for] iniquities, know them; transgressing lying lord, departing away god, speaking oppression revolt, conceiving uttering heart words falsehood. judgment turned away backward, justice standeth afar off: truth fallen street, equity cannot enter. yea,isaiah page 442 truth faileth; [that] departeth evil maketh prey: lord saw [it,] displeased [there was] judgment. saw [there was] man, wondered [there was] intercessor: therefore arm brought salvation unto him; righteousness, sustained him. put righteousness breastplate, helmet salvation upon head; put garments vengeance [for] clothing, clad zeal cloke. according [their] deeds, accordingly repay, fury adversaries, recompence enemies; islands repay recompence. shall fear name lord west, glory rising sun. enemy shall come like flood, spirit lord shall lift standard him. redeemer shall come zion, unto turn transgression jacob, saith lord. me, [is] covenant them, saith lord; spirit [is] upon thee, words put thy mouth, shall depart thy mouth, mouth thy seed, mouth thy seed's seed, saith lord, henceforth ever. arise, shine; thy light come, glory lord risen upon thee. for, behold, darkness shall cover earth, gross darkness people: lord shall arise upon thee, glory shall seen upon thee. gentiles shall come thy light, kings brightness thy rising. lift thine eyes round about, see: gather together, come thee: thy sons shall come far, thy daughters shall nursed [thy] side. thou shalt see, flow together, thine heart shall fear, enlarged; shall shut day night; [men] may bring unto thee forces gentiles, [that] kings [may be] brought. nation kingdom serve thee shall perish; yea, [those] nations shall utterly wasted. glory lebanon shall come unto thee, fir tree, pine tree, box together, beautify place sanctuary; thou shalt call thy walls salvation, thy gates praise. sun shall thy light day; neither brightness shall moon give light unto thee: lord shall unto thee everlasting light, thy god thy glory. thy sun shall go down; neither shall thy moon withdraw itself: lord shall thine everlasting light, days thy mourning shall ended. thy people also [shall be] righteous: shall inherit land ever, branch planting, work hands, may glorified. little one shall become thousand, small one strong nation: lord hasten time. spirit lord god [is] upon me; [for] confusion shall rejoice portion: therefore land shall possess double: everlasting joy shall unto them. lord love judgment, hate robbery burnt offering; direct work truth, make everlasting covenant them. seed shall known among gentiles, offspring among people: see shall acknowledge them, [are] seed [which] lord hath blessed. greatly rejoice lord, soul shall joyful god; [that is] glorious apparel, travelling greatness strength? speak righteousness, mighty save. wherefore [art thou] red thine apparel, thy garments like treadeth winefat? trodden winepress alone; people [there was] none me: tread mine anger, trample fury; blood shall sprinkled upon garments, stain raiment. day vengeance [is] mine heart, year redeemed come. looked, [there was] none help; wondered [there was] none uphold: therefore mine arm brought salvation unto me; fury, upheld me. tread people mine anger, make drunk fury, bring strength earth. mention lovingkindnesses lord, [and] praises lord, according lord hath bestowed us, great goodness toward house israel, hath bestowed according mercies, according multitude lovingkindnesses. said, surely [are] people, children [that] lie: saviour. affliction afflicted, angel presence saved them: love pity redeemed them; bare them, carried days old. rebelled, vexed holy spirit: therefore turned enemy, [and] fought them. remembered days old, moses, [and] people, [saying,] [is] brought sea shepherd hisflock? [thine:] thou never barest rule them; called thy name. oh thou wouldest rend heavens, thou wouldest come down, mountains might flow thy presence, [when] melting fire burneth, fire causeth waters boil, make thy name known thine adversaries, [that] nations may tremble thy presence! thou didst terrible things [which] looked for, thou camest down, mountains flowed thy presence. since beginning world [men] heard, perceived ear, neither hath eye seen, god, beside thee, [what] hath prepared waiteth him. thou meetest rejoiceth worketh righteousness, [those that] remember thee thy ways: behold, thou art wroth; sinned: continuance, shall saved. unclean [thing,] righteousnesses [are] filthy rags; fade leaf; iniquities, like wind, taken us away. spake, ye hear; evil mine eyes, choose [that] wherein delighted not. therefore thus saith lord god, behold, servants shall eat, ye shall hungry: behold, servants shall drink, ye shall thirsty: behold, servants shall rejoice, ye shall ashamed: behold, servants shall sing joy heart, ye shall cry sorrow heart, shall howl vexation spirit. ye shall leave name curse unto chosen: lord god shall slay thee, call servants another name: blesseth earth shall bless god truth; sweareth earth shall swear god truth; former troubles forgotten, hid mine eyes. for, behold, create new heavens new earth: former shall remembered, come mind. ye glad rejoice ever [in that] create: for, behold, create jerusalem rejoicing, people joy. rejoice jerusalem, joy people: voice weeping shall heard her, voice crying. shall thence infant days, old man hath filled days: child shall die hundred years old; [things] hath mine hand made, [things] been, saith lord: [man] look, [even] [him is] poor contrite spirit, trembleth word. killeth ox [is if] slew man; sacrificeth lamb, [as if] cut dog's neck; offereth oblation, [as offered] swine's blood; burneth incense, [as if] blessed idol. yea, chosen ways, soul delighteth abominations. also choose delusions, bring fears upon them; called, none answer; spake, hear: evil mine eyes, chose [that] delighted not. hear word lord, ye tremble word; brethren hated you, cast name's sake, said, let lord glorified: shall appear joy, shall ashamed. voice noise city, voice temple, voice lord rendereth recompence enemies. travailed, brought forth; pain came, delivered man child. hath heard thing? hath seen things? shall earth made bring forth one day? thou saidst, transgress; upon every high hill every green tree thou wanderest, playing harlot. yet planted thee noble vine, wholly right seed: art thou turned degenerate plant strange vine unto me? though thou wash thee nitre, take thee much sope, [yet] thine iniquity marked me, saith lord god. canst thou say, polluted, gone baalim? see thy way valley, know thou hast done: [thou art] swift dromedary traversing ways;
