received correction: sword hath devoured prophets, like destroying lion. generation, see ye word lord. wilderness unto israel? land darkness? wherefore say people, lords; come unto thee? maid forget ornaments, [or] bride attire? yet people forgotten days without number. trimmest thou thy way seek love? therefore hast thou also taught wicked ones thy ways. also thy skirts found blood souls poor innocents: found secret search, upon these. yet thou sayest, innocent, surely anger shall turn me. behold, plead thee, thou sayest, sinned. gaddest thou much change thy way? thou also shalt ashamed egypt, thou wast ashamed assyria. yea, thou shalt go forth him, thine hands upon thine head: lord hath rejected thy confidences, thou shalt prosper them. say, man put away wife, go him, become another man's, shall return unto again? shall land greatly polluted? thou hast played harlot many lovers; yet return me, saith lord. lift thine eyes unto high places, see thou hast lien with. ways hast thou sat them, arabian wilderness; thou hast polluted land thy whoredoms thy wickedness. therefore showers withholden, hath latter rain; thou hadst whore's forehead, thou refusedst ashamed. wilt thou time cry unto me, father, thou art guide youth? reserve [his anger] ever? keep [it] end? behold, thou hast spoken done evil things thou couldest. lord said also unto days josiah king, hast thou seen [that] backsliding israel hath done? gone upon every high mountain every green tree, hath played harlot. said done [things,] turn thou unto me. returned not. treacherous sister judah saw [it. ] saw, causes whereby backsliding israel committed adultery put away, given bill divorce; yet treacherous sister judah feared not, went played harlot also. came pass lightness whoredom, defiled land, committed adultery stones stocks. yet treacherous sister judah hath turned unto whole heart, feignedly, saith lord. lord said unto me, backsliding israel hath justified treacherous judah. go proclaim words toward north, say, return, thou backsliding israel, saith lord; [and] cause mine anger fall upon you: [am] merciful, saith lord, [and] keep [anger] ever. acknowledge thine iniquity, thou hast transgressed lord thy god, hast scattered thy ways strangers every green tree,and ye obeyed voice, saith lord. turn, backsliding children, saith lord; married unto you: take one city, two family, bring zion: give pastors according mine heart, shall feed knowledge understanding. shall come pass, ye multiplied increased land, days, saith lord, shall say more, ark covenant lord: neither shall come mind: neither shall remember it; neither shall visit [it;] neither shall [that] done more. time shall call jerusalem throne lord; nations shall gathered unto it, name lord, jerusalem: neither shall walk imagination evil heart. days house judah shall walk house israel, shall come together land north land given inheritance unto fathers. said, shall put thee among children, give thee pleasant land, goodly heritage hosts nations? said, thou shalt call me, father; shalt turn away me. surely [as] wife treacherously departeth husband, ye dealt treacherously me, house israel, saith lord. voice heard upon high places, weeping [and] supplications children israel: perverted way, [and] forgotten lord god. return, ye backsliding children, [and] heal backslidings. behold, come unto thee; thou [art] lord god. truly vain [is salvation hoped for] hills, [and from] multitude mountains: truly lord god [is] salvation israel. shame hath devoured labour fathers youth; flocks herds, sons daughters. lie shame, confusion covereth us: sinned lord god, fathers, youth even unto day, obeyed voice lord god. thou wilt return, israel, saith lord, return unto me: thou wilt put away thine abominations sight, shalt thou remove. thou shalt swear, lord liveth, truth, judgment, righteousness; nations shall bless him, shall glory. thus saith lord men judah jerusalem, break fallow ground, sow among thorns. circumcise lord, take away foreskins heart, ye men judah inhabitants jerusalem: lest fury come forth like fire, burn none quench [it,] evil doings. declare ye judah, publish jerusalem; say, blow ye trumpet land: cry, gather together, say, assemble yourselves, let us go defenced cities. set standard toward zion: retire, stay not: bring evil north, great destruction. lion come thicket, destroyer gentiles way; gone forth place make thy land desolate; [and] thy cities shall laid waste, without inhabitant. gird sackcloth, lament howl: fierce anger lord turned back us. shall come pass day, saith lord, [that] heart king shall perish, heart princes; priests shall astonished, prophetspage 449 jeremiah shall wonder. said i, ah, lord god! surely thou hast greatly deceived people jerusalem, saying, ye shall peace; whereas sword reacheth unto soul. time shall said people jerusalem, dry wind high places wilderness toward daughter people, fan, cleanse, [even ]a full wind [places ]shall come unto me: also give sentence them. behold, shall come clouds, chariots [shall be] whirlwind: horses swifter eagles. woe unto us! spoiled. jerusalem, wash thine heart wickedness, thou mayest saved. long shall thy vain thoughts lodge within thee? voice declareth dan, publisheth affliction mount ephraim. make ye mention nations; behold, publish jerusalem, [that] watchers come far country, give voice cities judah. keepers field, round about; hath rebellious me, saith lord. thy way thy doings procured [things] unto thee; [is] thy wickedness, bitter, reacheth unto thine heart. bowels, bowels! pained heart; heart maketh noise me; cannot hold peace, thou hast heard, soul, sound trump, alarm war. destruction upon destruction cried; whole land spoiled: suddenly tents spoiled, [and] curtains moment. long shall see standard, [and] hear sound trumpet? people [is] foolish, known me; [are] sottish children, none understanding: [are] wise evil, good knowledge. beheld earth, and, lo, [it was] without form, void; heavens, [had] light. beheld mountains, and, lo, trembled, hills moved lightly. beheld, and, lo, [there was] man, birds heavens fled. beheld, and, lo, fruitful place [was] wilderness, cities thereof broken presence lord, [and] fierce anger. thus hath lord said, whole land shall desolate; yet make full end. shall earth mourn, heavens black: spoken [it,] purposed [it,] repent, neither turn back it. whole city shall flee noise horsemen bowmen; shall go thickets, climb upon rocks: every city [shall be] forsaken, man dwell therein. [when] thou [art] spoiled, wilt thou do? though thou clothest thyself crimson, though thou deckest thee ornaments gold, though thou rentest thy face painting, vain shalt thou make thyself fair; [thy] lovers despise thee, seek thy life. heard voice woman travail, [and] anguish bringeth forth first child, voice daughter zion, [that] bewaileth herself, [that] spreadeth hands, [saying,] woe [is] now! soul wearied murderers. run ye fro streets jerusalem, see now, know, seek broad places thereof, ye find man, [any] executeth judgment, seeketh truth; pardon it. though say, lord liveth; surely swear falsely. lord, [are] thine eyes upon truth? thou hast stricken them, grieved; thou hast consumed them, [but] refused receivecorrection: made faces harder rock; refused return. therefore said, surely [are] poor; foolish: know way lord, [nor] judgment god. get unto great men, speak unto them; known way lord, [and] judgment god: altogether broken yoke, [and] burst bonds. wherefore lion forest shall slay them, [and] wolf evenings shall spoil them, leopard shall watch cities: every one goeth thence shall torn pieces: transgressions many, [and] backslidings increased. shall pardon thee this? thy children forsaken me, sworn [them are] gods: fed full, committed adultery, assembled troops harlots' houses. [as] fed horses morning: every one neighed neighbour's wife. shall visit [things?] saith lord: shall soul avenged nation this? go ye upon walls, destroy; make full end: take away battlements; [are] lord's. house israel house judah dealt treacherously me, saith lord. belied lord, said, [it is] he; neither shall evil come upon us; neither shall see sword famine: prophets shall become wind, word [is] them: thus shall done unto them. wherefore thus saith lord god hosts, ye speak word, behold, make words thy mouth fire, people wood, shall devour them. lo, bring nation upon far, house israel, saith lord: [is] mighty nation, [is] ancient nation, nation whose language thou knowest not, neither understandest say. quiver [is] open sepulchre, [are] mighty men. shall eat thine harvest, thy bread, [which] thy sons thy daughters eat: shall eat thy flocks thine herds: shall eat thy vines thy fig trees: shall impoverish thy fenced cities, wherein thou trustedst, sword. nevertheless days, saith lord, make full end you. shall come pass, ye shall say, wherefore doeth lord god [things] unto us? shalt thou answer them, like ye forsaken me, served strange gods land, shall ye serve strangers land [that is] yours. declare house jacob, publish judah, saying, hear this, foolish people, without understanding; eyes, see not; ears, hear not: fear ye me? saith lord: ye tremble presence, placed sand [for] bound sea perpetual decree, cannot pass it: though waves thereof toss themselves, yet prevail; though roar, yet pass it? people hath revolting rebellious heart; revolted gone. neither say heart, let us fear lord god, giveth rain, former latter, season: reserveth unto us appointed weeks harvest. iniquities turned away [things,] sins withholden good [things] you. among people found wicked [men:]jeremiah page 450 lay wait, setteth snares; set trap, catch men. cage full birds, [are] houses full deceit: therefore become great, waxen rich. waxen fat, shine: yea, overpass deeds wicked: judge cause, cause fatherless, yet prosper; right needy judge. shall visit [things?] saith lord: shall soul avenged nation this? wonderful horrible thing committed land; prophets prophesy falsely, priests bear rule means; people love [to it] so: ye end thereof? ye children benjamin, gather flee midst jerusalem, blow trumpet tekoa, set sign fire beth-haccerem: evil appeareth north, great destruction. likened daughter zion comely delicate [woman. ] shepherds flocks shall come unto her; shall pitch [their] tents round about; shall feed every one place. prepare ye war her; arise, let us go noon. woe unto us! day goeth away, shadows evening stretched out. arise, let us go night, let us destroy palaces. thus hath lord hosts said, hew ye trees, cast mount jerusalem: [is] city visited; [is] wholly oppression midst her. fountain casteth waters, casteth wickedness: violence spoil heard her; continually grief wounds. thou instructed, jerusalem, lest soul depart thee; lest make thee desolate, land inhabited. thus saith lord hosts, shall throughly glean remnant israel vine: turn back thine hand grapegatherer baskets. shall speak, give warning, may hear? behold, ear [is] uncircumcised, cannot hearken: behold, word lord unto reproach; delight it. therefore full fury lord; weary holding in: pour upon children abroad, upon assembly young men together: even husband wife shall taken, aged [him is] full days. houses shall turned unto others, [with their] fields wives together: stretch hand upon inhabitants land, saith lord. least even unto greatest every one [is] given covetousness; prophet even unto priest every one dealeth falsely. healed also hurt [of daughter] people slightly, saying, peace, peace; [there is] peace. ashamed committed abomination? nay, ashamed, neither could blush: therefore shall fall among fall: time [that] visit shall cast down, saith lord. thus saith lord, stand ye ways, see, ask old paths, good way, walk therein, ye shall find rest souls. said, walk [therein. ] also set watchmen you, [saying,] hearken sound trumpet. said, hearken. therefore hear, ye nations, know, congregation, [is] among them. hear, earth:behold, bring evil upon people, [even] fruit thoughts, hearkened unto words, law, rejected it. purpose cometh incense sheba, sweet cane far country? burnt offerings [are] acceptable, sacrifices sweet unto me. therefore thus saith lord, behold, lay stumblingblocks people, fathers sons together shall fall upon them; neighbour friend shall perish. thus saith lord, behold, people cometh north country, great nation shall raised sides earth. shall lay hold bow spear; [are] cruel, mercy; voice roareth like sea; ride upon horses, set array men war thee, daughter zion. heard fame thereof: hands wax feeble: anguish hath taken hold us, [and] pain, woman travail. go forth field, walk way; sword enemy [and] fear [is] every side. daughter people, gird [thee] sackcloth, wallow thyself ashes: make thee mourning, [as for] son, bitter lamentation: spoiler shall suddenly come upon us. set thee [for] tower [and] fortress among people, thou mayest know try way. [are] grievous revolters, walking slanders: [they are] brass iron; [are] corrupters. bellows burned, lead consumed fire; founder melteth vain: wicked plucked away. reprobate silver shall [men] call them, lord hath rejected them. word came jeremiah lord, saying, stand gate lord's house, proclaim word, say, hear word lord, [ye of] judah, enter gates worship lord. thus saith lord hosts, god israel, amend ways doings, cause dwell place. trust ye lying words, saying, temple lord, temple lord, temple lord, [are] these. ye throughly amend ways doings; ye throughly execute judgment man neighbour; [if] ye oppress stranger, fatherless, widow, shed innocent blood place, neither walk gods hurt: cause dwell place, land gave fathers, ever ever. behold, ye trust lying words, cannot profit. ye steal, murder, commit adultery, swear falsely, burn incense unto baal, walk gods ye know not; come stand house, called name, say, delivered abominations? house, called name, become den robbers eyes? behold, even seen [it,] saith lord. go ye unto place [was] shiloh, set name first, see wickedness people israel. now, ye done works, saith lord, spake unto you, rising early speaking, ye heard not; called you, ye answered not; therefore unto [this] house, called name, wherein ye trust, unto place gave fathers, done shiloh. cast sight, castpage 451 jeremiah brethren, [even] whole seed ephraim. therefore pray thou people, neither lift cry prayer them, neither make intercession me: hear thee. seest thou cities judah streets jerusalem? children gather wood, fathers kindle fire, women knead [their] dough, make cakes queen heaven, pour drink offerings unto gods, may provoke anger. provoke anger? saith lord: [do they] [provoke] confusion faces? therefore thus saith lord god; behold, mine anger fury shall poured upon place, upon man, upon beast, upon trees field, upon fruit ground; shall burn, shall quenched. thus saith lord hosts, god israel; put burnt offerings unto sacrifices, eat flesh. spake unto fathers, commanded day brought land egypt, concerning burnt offerings sacrifices: thing commanded them, saying, obey voice, god, ye shall people: walk ye ways commanded you, may well unto you. hearkened not, inclined ear, walked counsels [and] imagination evil heart, went backward, forward. since day fathers came forth land egypt unto day even sent unto servants prophets, daily rising early sending [them: ] yet hearkened unto me, inclined ear, hardened neck: worse fathers. therefore thou shalt speak words unto them; [are] upright palm tree, speak not: must needs borne, cannot go. afraid them; cannot evil, neither also [is it] good. forasmuch [there is] none like unto thee, lord; thou [art] great, thy name great might. would fear thee, king nations? thee doth appertain: forasmuch among wise [men] nations, kingdoms, [there is] none like unto thee. altogether brutish foolish: stock [is] doctrine vanities. silver spread plates brought tarshish, gold uphaz, work workman, hands founder: blue purple clothing: [are] work cunning [men. ] lord [is] true god, [is] living god, everlasting king: wrath earth shall tremble, nations shall able abide indignation. thus shall ye say unto them, gods made heavens earth, [even] shall perish earth, heavens. hath made earth power, hath established world wisdom, hath stretched heavens discretion. uttereth voice, [there is] multitude waters heavens, causeth vapors ascend ends earth; maketh lightnings rain, bringeth forth wind treasures. every man brutish [his] knowledge: every founder confounded graven image: molten image falsehood, [there is] breath them. [are] vanity, [and] work errors: time visitation shall perish. portion jacob [is] like them: [is] former [things;] israel [is] rod inheritance: lord hosts [is] name. gather thy wares land, inhabitant fortress. thus saith lord, behold, sling inhabitants land once, distress them, may find [it] so. woe hurt! wound grievous: said, truly [is] grief, must bear it. tabernacle spoiled, cords broken: children gone forth me, [are] not: [there is] none stretch forth tent more, set curtains. pastors become brutish, sought lord: therefore shall prosper,page 453 jeremiah flocks shall scattered. behold, noise bruit come, great commotion north country, make cities judah desolate, [and] den dragons. lord, know way man [is] himself: [it is] man walketh direct steps. lord, correct me, judgment; thine anger, lest thou bring nothing. pour thy fury upon heathen know thee not, upon families call thy name: eaten jacob, devoured him, consumed him, made habitation desolate. word came jeremiah lord, saying, hear ye words covenant, speak unto men judah, inhabitants jerusalem; say thou unto them, thus saith lord god israel; cursed [be] man obeyeth words covenant, commanded fathers day [that] brought forth land egypt, iron furnace, saying, obey voice, them, according command you: shall ye people, god: may perform oath sworn unto fathers, give land flowing milk honey, [it is] day. answered i, said, it, lord. lord said unto me, proclaim words cities judah, streets jerusalem, saying, hear ye words covenant, them. earnestly protested unto fathers day [that] brought land egypt, [even] unto day, rising early protesting, saying, obey voice. yet obeyed not, inclined ear, walked every one imagination evil heart: therefore bring upon words covenant, commanded [them] do; [them] not. lord said unto me, conspiracy found among men judah, among inhabitants jerusalem. turned back iniquities forefathers, refused hear words; went gods serve them: house israel house judah broken covenant made fathers. therefore thus saith lord, behold, bring evil upon them, shall able escape; though shall cry unto me, hearken unto them. shall cities judah inhabitants jerusalem go, cry unto gods unto offer incense: shall save time trouble. [according to] number thy cities thy gods, judah; [according to] number streets jerusalem ye set altars [that] shameful thing, [even] altars burn incense unto baal. therefore pray thou people, neither lift cry prayer them: hear [them] time cry unto trouble. hath beloved mine house, [seeing] hath wrought lewdness many, holy flesh passed thee? thou doest evil, thou rejoicest. lord called thy name, green olive tree, fair, [and] goodly fruit: noise great tumult hath kindled fire upon it, branches broken. lord hosts, planted thee, hath pronounced evil thee, evil house israel house judah, done provoke anger offering incense unto baal. lord hath given knowledge [of it,] know [it:] thou shewedst doings. [was] like lamb [or] ox [that] brought slaughter; knew devised devices me, [saying,] let us destroy tree fruit thereof, let us cut land living, name may remembered. but, lord hosts, judgest righteously, triest reins heart, let see thy vengeance them: unto thee revealed cause. therefore thus saith lord men anathoth, seek thy life, saying, prophesy name lord, thou die hand: therefore thus saith lord hosts, behold, punish them: young men shall die sword; sons daughters shall die famine: shall remnant them: bring evil upon men anathoth, [even] year visitation. righteous [art] thou, lord, plead thee: yet let talk thee [thy] judgments: wherefore doth way wicked prosper? [wherefore] happy deal treacherously? thou hast planted them, yea, taken root: grow, yea, bring forth fruit: thou [art] near mouth, far reins. thou, lord, knowest me: thou hast seen me, tried mine heart toward thee: pull like sheep slaughter, prepare day slaughter. long shall land mourn, herbs every field wither, wickedness dwell therein? beasts consumed, birds; said, shall see last end. thou hast run footmen, wearied thee, canst thou contend horses? [if] land peace, [wherein] thou trustedst, [they wearied thee,] wilt thou swelling jordan? even thy brethren, house thy father, even dealt treacherously thee; yea, called multitude thee: believe not, though speak fair words unto thee. forsaken mine house, left mine heritage; given dearly beloved soul hand enemies. mine heritage unto lion forest; crieth me: therefore hated it. mine heritage [is] unto [as] speckled bird, birds round [are] her; come ye, assemble beasts field, come devour. many pastors destroyed vineyard, trodden portion foot, made pleasant portion desolate wilderness. made desolate, [and being] desolate mourneth unto me; [shall it] [be? ] word lord came jeremiah concerning dearth. judah mourneth, gates thereof languish; black unto ground; cry jerusalem gone up. nobles sent little ones waters: came pits, [and] found water; returned vessels empty; ashamed confounded, covered heads. ground chapt, rain earth, plowmen ashamed, covered heads. yea, hind also calved field, forsook [it,] grass. wild asses stand high places, snuffed wind like dragons; eyes fail, [there was] grass. lord, though iniquities testify us, thou [it] thy name's sake: backslidings many; sinned thee. hope israel, saviour thereof time trouble, shouldest thou stranger land, wayfaring man [that] turneth aside tarry night? shouldest thou man astonied, mighty man [that] cannot save? yet thou, lord, [art] midst us, called thy name; leave us not. thus saith lord unto people, thus loved wander, refrained feet, therefore lord doth accept them; remember iniquity, visit sins. said lord unto me, pray people [their] good. fast, hear cry; offer burnt offering oblation, accept them: consume sword, famine, pestilence. said i, ah, lord god! behold, prophets say unto them, ye shall see sword, neither shall ye famine; give assured peace place. lord said unto me, prophets prophesy lies name: sent not, neither commanded them, neither spake unto them: prophesy unto false vision divination, thing nought, deceit heart. therefore thus saith lord concerning prophets prophesy name, sent not, yet say, sword famine shall land; sword famine shall prophets consumed. people prophesy shall cast streets jerusalem famine sword; shall none bury them, them, wives, sons, daughters: pour wickedness upon them. therefore thou shalt say word unto them; letpage 455 jeremiah mine eyes run tears night day, let cease: virgin daughter people broken great breach, grievous blow. go forth field, behold slain sword! enter city, behold sick famine! yea, prophet priest go land know not. hast thou utterly rejected judah? hath thy soul lothed zion? hast thou smitten us, [there is] healing us? looked peace, [there is] good; time healing, behold trouble! acknowledge, lord, wickedness, [and] iniquity fathers: sinned thee. abhor [us,] thy name's sake, disgrace throne thy glory: remember, break thy covenant us. [any] among vanities gentiles cause rain? heavens give showers? [art] thou he, lord god? therefore wait upon thee: thou hast made [things. ] said lord unto me, though moses samuel stood me, [yet] mind [could] [be] toward people: cast [them] sight, let go forth. shall come pass, say unto thee, whither shall go forth? thou shalt tell them, thus saith lord; [are] death, death; [are] sword, sword; [are] famine, famine; [are] captivity, captivity. appoint four kinds, saith lord: sword slay, dogs tear, fowls heaven, beasts earth, devour destroy. cause removed kingdoms earth, manasseh son hezekiah king judah, [that] jerusalem. shall pity upon thee, jerusalem? shall bemoan thee? shall go aside ask thou doest? thou hast forsaken me, saith lord, thou art gone backward: therefore stretch hand thee, destroy thee; weary repenting. fan fan gates land; bereave [them] children, destroy people, [since] return ways. widows increased sand seas: brought upon mother young men spoiler noonday: caused [him] fall upon suddenly, terrors upon city. hath borne seven languisheth: hath given ghost; sun gone [it was] yet day: hath ashamed confounded: residue deliver sword enemies, saith lord. woe me, mother, thou hast borne man strife man contention whole earth! neither lent usury, men lent usury; [yet] every one doth curse me. lord said, verily shall well thy remnant; verily cause enemy entreat thee [well] time evil time affliction. shall iron break northern iron steel? thy substance thy treasures give spoil without price, [that] thy sins, even thy borders. make [thee] pass thine enemies land [which] thou knowest not: fire kindled mine anger, [which] shall burn upon you. lord, thou knowest: remember me, visit me, revenge persecutors; take away thy longsuffering: know thy sake sufferedrebuke. thy words found, eat them; thy word unto joy rejoicing mine heart: called thy name, lord god hosts. sat assembly mockers, rejoiced; sat alone thy hand: thou hast filled indignation. pain perpetual, wound incurable, [which] refuseth healed? wilt thou altogether unto liar, [and as] waters [that] fail? therefore thus saith lord, thou return, bring thee again, [and] thou shalt stand me: thou take forth precious vile, thou shalt mouth: let return unto thee; return thou unto them. make thee unto people fenced brasen wall: shall fight thee, shall prevail thee: [am] thee save thee deliver thee, saith lord. deliver thee hand wicked, redeem thee hand terrible. word lord came also unto me, saying, thou shalt take thee wife, neither shalt thou sons daughters place. thus saith lord concerning sons concerning daughters born place, concerning mothers bare them, concerning fathers begat land; shall die grievous deaths; shall lamented; neither shall buried; [but] shall dung upon face earth: shall consumed sword, famine; carcases shall meat fowls heaven, beasts earth. thus saith lord, enter house mourning, neither go lament bemoan them: taken away peace people, saith lord, [even] lovingkindness mercies. great small shall die land: shall buried, neither shall [men] lament them, cut themselves, make bald them: neither shall [men] tear [themselves] mourning, comfort dead; neither shall [men] give cup consolation drink father mother. thou shalt also go house feasting, sit eat drink. thus saith lord hosts, god israel; behold, cause cease place eyes, days, voice mirth, voice gladness, voice bridegroom, voice bride. shall come pass, thou shalt shew people words, shall say unto thee, wherefore hath lord pronounced great evil us? [is] iniquity? [is] sin committed lord god? shalt thou say unto them, fathers forsaken me, saith lord, walked gods, served them, worshipped them, forsaken me, kept law; ye done worse fathers; for, behold, ye walk every one imagination evil heart, may hearken unto me: therefore cast land land ye know not, [neither] ye fathers; shall ye serve gods day night; shew favour. therefore, behold, days come, saithjeremiah page 456 lord, shall said, lord liveth, brought children israel land egypt; but, lord liveth, brought children israel land north, lands whither driven them: bring land gave unto fathers. behold, send many fishers, saith lord, shall fish them; send many hunters, shall hunt every mountain, every hill, holes rocks. mine eyes [are] upon ways: hid face, neither iniquity hid mine eyes. first recompense iniquity sin double; defiled land, filled mine inheritance carcases detestable abominable things. lord, strength, fortress, refuge day affliction, gentiles shall come unto thee ends earth, shall say, surely fathers inherited lies, vanity, [things] wherein [there is] profit. shall man make gods unto himself, [are] gods? therefore, behold, cause know, cause know mine hand might; shall know name [is] lord. sin judah [is] written pen iron, [and] point diamond: [it is] graven upon table heart, upon horns altars; whilst children remember altars groves green trees upon high hills. mountain field, give thy substance [and] thy treasures spoil, [and] thy high places sin, throughout thy borders. thou, even thyself, shalt discontinue thine heritage gave thee; cause thee serve thine enemies land thou knowest not: ye kindled fire mine anger, [which] shall burn ever. thus saith lord; cursed man trusteth man, maketh flesh arm, whose heart departeth lord. shall like heath desert, shall see good cometh; shall inhabit parched places wilderness, [in] salt land inhabited. blessed [is] man trusteth lord, whose hope lord is. shall tree planted waters, [that] spreadeth roots river, shall see heat cometh, leaf shall green; shall careful year drought, neither shall cease yielding fruit. heart [is] deceitful [things,] desperately wicked: know it? yea, thus saith lord hosts, god israel, concerning vessels remain [in] house lord, [in] house king judah jerusalem; shall carried babylon, shall day visit them, saith lord; bring up, restore place. came pass year, beginning reign zedekiah king judah, fourth year, [and] fifth month, [that] hananiah son azur prophet, [was] gibeon, spake unto house lord, presence priests people, saying, thus speaketh lord hosts, god israel, saying, broken yoke king babylon. within two full years bring place vessels lord's house, nebuchadnezzar king babylon took away place, carried babylon: bring place jeconiah son jehoiakim king judah, captives judah, went babylon, saith lord: break yoke king babylon. prophet jeremiah said unto prophet hananiah presence priests, presence people stood house lord, even prophet jeremiah said, amen: lord so: lord perform thy words thou hast prophesied, bring vessels lord's house, carried away captive, babylon place. nevertheless hear thou word speak thine ears, ears people; prophets thee old prophesied many countries, great kingdoms, war, evil, pestilence. prophet prophesieth peace, word prophet shall come pass, [then] shall prophet known, lord hath truly sent him. hananiah prophet took yoke prophet jeremiah's neck, brake it. hananiah spake presence people, saying, thus saith lord; even break yoke nebuchadnezzar king babylon neck allnations within space two full years. prophet jeremiah went way. word lord came unto jeremiah [the prophet,] hananiah prophet broken yoke neck prophet jeremiah, saying, go tell hananiah, saying, thus saith lord; thou hast broken yokes wood; thou shalt make yokes iron. thus saith lord hosts, god israel; put yoke iron upon neck nations, may serve nebuchadnezzar king babylon; shall serve him: given beasts field also. said prophet jeremiah unto hananiah prophet, hear now, hananiah; lord hath sent thee; thou makest people trust lie. therefore thus saith lord; behold, cast thee face earth: year thou shalt die, thou hast taught rebellion lord. hananiah prophet died year seventh month. [are] words letter jeremiah prophet sent jerusalem unto residue elders carried away captives, priests, prophets, people nebuchadnezzar carried away captive jerusalem babylon; (after jeconiah king, queen, eunuchs, princes judah jerusalem, carpenters, smiths, departed jerusalem;) hand elasah son shaphan, gemariah son hilkiah, (whom zedekiah king judah sent unto babylon nebuchadnezzar king babylon) saying, thus saith lord hosts, god israel, unto carried away captives, caused carried away jerusalem unto babylon; build ye houses, dwell [in them;] plant gardens, eat fruit them; take ye wives, beget sons daughters; take wives sons, give daughters husbands, may bear sons daughters; ye may increased there, diminished. seek peace city whither caused carried away captives, pray unto lord it: peace thereof shall ye peace. thus saith lord hosts, god israel; let prophets diviners, [be] midst you, deceive you, neither hearken dreams ye cause dreamed. prophesy falsely unto name: sent them, saith lord. thus saith lord, seventy years accomplished babylon visit you, perform good word toward you, causing return place. know thoughts think toward you, saith lord, thoughts peace, evil, give expected end. shall ye call upon me, ye shall go pray unto me, hearken unto you. ye shall seek me, find [me,] ye shall search heart. found you, saith lord: turn away captivity, gather nations, places whither driven you, saith lord; bring place whence caused carried away captive.page 463 jeremiah ye said, lord hath raised us prophets babylon; [know] thus saith lord king sitteth upon throne david, people dwelleth city, [and] brethren gone forth captivity; thus saith lord hosts; behold, send upon sword, famine, pestilence, make like vile figs, cannot eaten, evil. persecute sword, famine, pestilence, deliver removed kingdoms earth, curse, astonishment, hissing, reproach, among nations whither driven them: hearkened words, saith lord, sent unto servants prophets, rising early sending [them;] ye would hear, saith lord. hear ye therefore word lord, ye captivity, sent jerusalem babylon: thus saith lord hosts, god israel, ahab son kolaiah, zedekiah son maaseiah, prophesy lie unto name; behold, deliver hand nebuchadrezzar king babylon; shall slay eyes; shall taken curse captivity judah [are] babylon, saying, lord make thee like zedekiah like ahab, king babylon roasted fire; committed villany israel, committed adultery neighbours' wives, spoken lying words name, commanded them; even know, [am] witness, saith lord. [thus] shalt thou also speak shemaiah nehelamite, saying, thus speaketh lord hosts, god israel, saying, thou hast sent letters thy name unto people [are] jerusalem, zephaniah son maaseiah priest, priests, saying, lord hath made thee priest stead jehoiada priest, ye officers house lord, every man [that is] mad, maketh prophet, thou shouldest put prison, stocks. therefore hast thou reproved jeremiah anathoth, maketh prophet you? therefore sent unto us [in] babylon, saying, [captivity is] long: build ye houses, dwell [in them;] plant gardens, eat fruit them. zephaniah priest read letter ears jeremiah prophet. came word lord unto jeremiah, saying, send captivity, saying, thus saith lord concerning shemaiah nehelamite; shemaiah hath prophesied unto you, sent not, caused trust lie: therefore thus saith lord; behold, punish shemaiah nehelamite, seed: shall man dwell among people; neither shall behold good people, saith lord; hath taught rebellion lord. word came jeremiah lord, saying, thus speaketh lord god israel, saying, write thee words spoken unto thee book. for, lo, days come, saith lord, bring captivity people israel judah, saith lord: cause return land gave fathers, shall possess it. [are] words lord spake concerning israel concerning judah. thus saith lord; heard voice trembling, fear, peace. ask ye now, see whether man doth travail child? wherefore see every man hands loins, woman travail, faces turned paleness? alas! day [is] great, none [is] like it: [is] even time jacob's trouble; shall saved it. shall come pass day, saith lord hosts, [that] break yoke thy neck, burst thy bonds, strangers shall serve him: shall serve lord god, david king, raise unto them. therefore fear thou not, servant jacob, saith lord; neither dismayed, israel: for, lo, save thee afar, thy seed land captivity; jacob shall return, shall rest, quiet, none shall make [him] afraid. [am] thee, saith lord, save thee: though make full end nations whither scattered thee, yet make full end thee: correct thee measure, leave thee altogether unpunished. thus saith lord, thy bruise [is] incurable, [and] thy wound [is] grievous. [there is] none plead thy cause, thou mayest bound up: thou hast healing medicines. thy lovers forgotten thee; seek thee not; wounded thee wound enemy, chastisement cruel one, multitude thine iniquity; [because] thy sins increased. criest thou thine affliction? thy sorrow [is] incurable multitude thine iniquity: [because] thy sins increased, done things unto thee. therefore devour thee shall devoured; thine adversaries, every one them, shall go captivity; spoil thee shall spoil, prey upon thee give prey. restore health unto thee, heal thee thy wounds, saith lord; called thee outcast, [saying,] [is] zion, man seeketh after. thus saith lord; behold, bring captivity jacob's tents, mercy dwellingplaces; city shall builded upon heap, palace shall remain manner thereof. shall proceed thanksgiving voice make merry: multiply them, shall few; also glorify them, shall small. children also shall aforetime, congregation shall established me, punish oppress them. nobles shall themselves, governor shall proceed midst them; cause draw near, shall approach unto me: [is] engaged heart approach unto me? saith lord. ye shall people, god. behold, whirlwind lord goeth forth fury, continuing whirlwind: shall fall pain upon head wicked. fierce anger lord shall return, done [it,] performed intents heart: latter days ye shall consider it. time, saith lord, god families israel, shall people. thus saith lord, people [which were] left sword found grace wilderness; [even]jeremiah page 464 israel, went cause rest. lord hath appeared old unto me, [saying,] yea, loved thee everlasting love: therefore lovingkindness drawn thee. build thee, thou shalt built, virgin israel: thou shalt adorned thy tabrets, shalt go forth dances make merry. thou shalt yet plant vines upon mountains samaria: planters shall plant, shall eat [them] common things. shall day, [that] watchmen upon mount ephraim shall cry, arise ye, let us go zion unto lord god. thus saith lord; sing gladness jacob, shout among chief nations: publish ye, praise ye, say, lord, save thy people, remnant israel. behold, bring north country, gather coasts earth, [and] blind lame, woman child travaileth child together: great company shall return thither. shall come weeping, supplications lead them: cause walk rivers waters straight way, wherein shall stumble: father israel, ephraim [is] firstborn. hear word lord, ye nations, declare [it] isles afar off, say, scattered israel gather him, keep him, shepherd [doth] flock. lord hath redeemed jacob, ransomed hand [him was] stronger he. therefore shall come sing height zion, shall flow together goodness lord, wheat, wine, oil, young flock herd: soul shall watered garden; shall sorrow all. shall virgin rejoice dance, young men old together: turn mourning joy, comfort them, make rejoice sorrow. satiate soul priests fatness, people shall satisfied goodness, saith lord. thus saith lord; voice heard ramah, lamentation, [and] bitter weeping; rahel weeping children refused comforted children, [were] not. thus saith lord; refrain thy voice weeping, thine eyes tears: thy work shall rewarded, saith lord; shall come land enemy. hope thine end, saith lord, thy children shall come border. surely heard ephraim bemoaning [thus;] thou hast chastised me, chastised, bullock unaccustomed [to yoke:] turn thou me, shall turned; thou [art] lord god. surely turned, repented; instructed, smote upon [my] thigh: ashamed, yea, even confounded, bear reproach youth. [is] ephraim dear son? [is he] pleasant child? since spake him, earnestly remember still: therefore bowels troubled him; surely mercy upon him, saith lord. set thee waymarks, make thee high heaps: set thine heart toward highway, [even] way [which] thou wentest: turn again, virgin israel, turn thy cities. long wilt thou go about, thou backsliding daughter? lord hath created new thing theearth, woman shall compass man. thus saith lord hosts, god israel; yet shall use speech land judah cities thereof, shall bring captivity; lord bless thee, habitation justice, [and] mountain holiness. shall dwell judah itself, cities thereof together, husbandmen, [that] go forth flocks. satiated weary soul, replenished every sorrowful soul. upon awaked, beheld; sleep sweet unto me. behold, days come, saith lord, sow house israel house judah seed man, seed beast. shall come pass, [that] like watched them, pluck up, break down, throw down, destroy, afflict; watch them, build, plant, saith lord. days shall say more, fathers eaten sour grape, children's teeth set edge. every one shall die iniquity: every man eateth sour grape, teeth shall set edge. behold, days come, saith lord, make new covenant house israel, house judah: according covenant made fathers day [that] took hand bring land egypt; covenant brake, although husband unto them, saith lord: [shall be] covenant make house israel; days, saith lord, put law inward parts, write hearts; god, shall people. shall teach every man neighbour, every man brother, saying, know lord: shall know me, least unto greatest them, saith lord; forgive iniquity, remember sin more. thus saith lord, giveth sun light day, [and] ordinances moon stars light night, divideth sea waves thereof roar; lord hosts [is] name: ordinances depart me, saith lord, [then] seed israel also shall cease nation ever. thus saith lord; heaven measured, foundations earth searched beneath, also cast seed israel done, saith lord. behold, days come, saith lord, city shall built lord tower hananeel unto gate corner. measuring line shall yet go forth upon hill gareb, shall compass goath. whole valley dead bodies, ashes, fields unto brook kidron, unto corner horse gate toward east, [shall be] holy unto lord; shall plucked up, thrown ever. word came jeremiah lord tenth year zedekiah king judah, [was] eighteenth year nebuchadrezzar. king babylon's army besieged jerusalem: jeremiah prophet shut court prison, [was] king judah's house. zedekiah king judah shut up, saying, wherefore dost thou prophesy, say, thus saith lord, behold,page 465 jeremiah give city hand king babylon, shall take it; zedekiah king judah shall escape hand chaldeans, shall surely delivered hand king babylon, shall speak mouth mouth, eyes shall behold eyes; shall lead zedekiah babylon, shall visit him, saith lord: though ye fight chaldeans, ye shall prosper? jeremiah said, word lord came unto me, saying, behold, hanameel son shallum thine uncle shall come unto thee, saying, buy thee field [is] anathoth: right redemption [is] thine buy [it. ] hanameel mine uncle's son came court prison according word lord, said unto me, buy field, pray thee, [is] anathoth, [is] country benjamin: right inheritance [is] thine, redemption [is] thine; buy [it] thyself. knew [was] word lord. bought field hanameel uncle's son, [was] anathoth, weighed money, [even] seventeen shekels silver. subscribed evidence, sealed [it,] took witnesses, weighed [him] money balances. took evidence purchase, [both] sealed [according] law custom, open: gave evidence purchase unto baruch son neriah, son maaseiah, sight hanameel mine uncle's [son,] presence witnesses subscribed book purchase, jews sat court prison. charged baruch them, saying, thus saith lord hosts, god israel; take evidences, evidence purchase, sealed, evidence open; put earthen vessel, may continue many days. thus saith lord hosts, god israel; houses fields vineyards shall possessed land. delivered evidence purchase unto baruch son neriah, prayed unto lord, saying, ah lord god! behold, thou hast made heaven earth thy great power stretched arm, [and] nothing hard thee: thou shewest lovingkindness unto thousands, recompensest iniquity fathers bosom children them: great, mighty god, lord hosts, [is] name, great counsel, mighty work: thine eyes [are] open upon ways sons men: give every one according ways, according fruit doings: hast set signs wonders land egypt, [even] unto day, israel, among [other] men; hast made thee name, day; hast brought forth thy people israel land egypt signs, wonders, strong hand, stretched arm, great terror; hast given land, thou didst swear fathers give them, land flowing milk honey; came in, possessed it; obeyed thy voice, neither walked thy law; done nothing thou commandedst do: therefore thou hast caused evil come upon them: behold mounts, come unto city take it; city given hand chaldeans, fight it, sword, famine, thepestilence: thou hast spoken come pass; and, behold, thou seest [it. ] thou hast said unto me, lord god, buy thee field money, take witnesses; city given hand chaldeans. came word lord unto jeremiah, saying, behold, [am] lord, god flesh: thing hard me? therefore thus saith lord; behold, give city hand chaldeans, hand nebuchadrezzar king babylon, shall take it: chaldeans, fight city, shall come set fire city, burn houses, upon whose roofs offered incense unto baal, poured drink offerings unto gods, provoke anger. children israel children judah done evil youth: children israel provoked anger work hands, saith lord. city hath [as] provocation mine anger fury day built even unto day; lord [is] name; call unto me, answer thee, shew thee great mighty things, thou knowest not. thus saith lord, god israel, concerning houses city, concerning houses kings judah, thrown mounts, sword; come fight chaldeans, [it is] fill dead bodies men, slain mine anger fury, whose wickedness hid face city. behold, bring health cure, cure them, reveal unto abundance peace truth. cause captivity judah captivity israel return, build them, first. cleanse iniquity, whereby sinned me; [this is] word came unto jeremiah lord, king zedekiah made covenant people [were] jerusalem, proclaim liberty unto them; every man let manservant, every man maidservant, [being] hebrew hebrewess, go free; none serve them, [to wit,] jew brother. princes, people, entered covenant, heard every one let manservant, every one maidservant, go free, none serve more, obeyed, let [them] go. afterward turned, caused servants handmaids, let go free, return, brought subjection servants handmaids. therefore word lord came jeremiah lord, saying, thus saith lord, god israel; shall fight it, take it, burn fire: make cities judah desolation without inhabitant. word came unto jeremiah lord days jehoiakim son josiah king judah, saying, go unto house rechabites, speak unto them, bring house lord, one chambers, give wine drink. took jaazaniah son jeremiah, son habaziniah, brethren, sons, whole house rechabites; brought house lord, chamber sons hanan, son igdaliah, man god, [was] chamber princes, [was] chamber maaseiah son shallum, keeper door: set sons house rechabites pots full wine, cups, said unto them, drink ye wine. said, drink wine: jonadab son rechab father commanded us, saying, ye shall drink wine, [neither] ye, sons ever: neither shall ye build house, sow seed, plant vineyard, [any:] days ye shall dwell tents; ye may live many days land ye [be] strangers. thus obeyed voice jonadab son rechab father hath charged us, drink wine days, we, wives, sons, daughters; build houses us dwell in: neither vineyard, field, seed: dwelt tents, obeyed, done according jonadab father commanded us. came pass, nebuchadrezzar king babylon came land, said, come, let us go jerusalem fear army chaldeans, fear army syrians: dwell jerusalem. came word lord unto jeremiah, saying, thus saith lord hosts, god israel; go tell men judah inhabitants jerusalem, ye receive instruction hearken words? saith lord. words jonadab son rechab, commanded sons drinkwine, performed; unto day drink none, obey father's commandment: notwithstanding spoken unto you, rising early speaking; people hath hearkened unto me: therefore thus saith lord god hosts, god israel; behold, bring upon judah upon inhabitants jerusalem evil pronounced them: spoken unto them, heard; called unto them, answered. jeremiah said unto house rechabites, thus saith lord hosts, god israel; may return every man evil way; may forgive iniquity sin. jeremiah called baruch son neriah: baruch wrote mouth jeremiah words lord, spoken unto him, upon roll book. jeremiah commanded baruch, saying, [am] shut up; cannot go house lord: therefore go thou, read roll, thou hast written mouth, words lord ears people lord's house upon fasting day: also thou shalt read ears judah come cities. may present supplication lord, return every one evil way: great [is] anger fury lord hath pronounced people. baruch son neriah according jeremiah prophet commanded him, reading book words lord lord's house. came pass fifth year jehoiakim son josiah king judah, ninth month, [that] proclaimed fast lord people jerusalem, people came cities judah unto jerusalem. read baruch book words jeremiah house lord, chamber gemariah son shaphan scribe, higher court, entry new gate lord's house, ears people. michaiah son gemariah, son shaphan, heard book words lord, went king's house, scribe's chamber: and, lo, princes sat there,jeremiah page 468 [even] elishama scribe, delaiah son shemaiah, elnathan son achbor, gemariah son shaphan, zedekiah son hananiah, princes. michaiah declared unto words heard, baruch read book ears people. therefore princes sent jehudi son nethaniah, son shelemiah, son cushi, unto baruch, saying, take thine hand roll wherein thou hast read ears people, come. baruch son neriah took roll hand, came unto them. said unto him, sit now, read ears. baruch read [it] ears. came pass, heard words, afraid one other, said unto baruch, surely tell king words. asked baruch, saying, tell us now, didst thou write words mouth? baruch answered them, pronounced words unto mouth, wrote [them] ink book. said princes unto baruch, go, hide thee, thou jeremiah; let man know ye be. went king court, laid roll chamber elishama scribe, told words ears king. king sent jehudi fetch roll: took elishama scribe's chamber. jehudi read ears king, ears princes stood beside king. king sat winterhouse ninth month: [there fire] hearth burning him. came pass, [that] jehudi read three four leaves, cut penknife, cast [it] fire [was] hearth, roll consumed fire [was] hearth. yet afraid, rent garments, [neither] king, servants heard words. nevertheless elnathan delaiah gemariah made intercession king would burn roll: would hear them. king commanded jerahmeel son hammelech, seraiah son azriel, shelemiah son abdeel, take baruch scribe jeremiah prophet: lord hid them. word lord came jeremiah, king burned roll, words baruch wrote mouth jeremiah, saying, take thee another roll, write former words first roll, jehoiakim king judah hath burned. thou shalt say jehoiakim king judah, thus saith lord; thou hast burned roll, saying, hast thou written therein, saying, king babylon shall certainly come destroy land, shall cause cease thence man beast? therefore thus saith lord jehoiakim king judah; shall none sit upon throne david: dead body shall cast day heat, night frost. punish seed servants iniquity; bring upon them, upon inhabitants jerusalem, upon men judah, evil pronounced them; hearkened not. took jeremiah another roll, gave baruch scribe, son neriah; wrote therein mouth jeremiah words book jehoiakim king judah burned fire: therewere added besides unto many like words. king zedekiah son josiah reigned instead coniah son jehoiakim, nebuchadrezzar king babylon made king land judah. neither he, servants, people land, hearken unto words lord, spake prophet jeremiah. zedekiah king sent jehucal son shelemiah zephaniah son maaseiah priest prophet jeremiah, saying, pray unto lord god us. jeremiah came went among people: put prison. pharaoh's army come forth egypt: chaldeans besieged jerusalem heard tidings them, departed jerusalem. came word lord unto prophet jeremiah, saying, thus saith lord, god israel; thus shall ye say king judah, sent unto enquire me; behold, pharaoh's army, come forth help you, shall return egypt land. chaldeans shall come again, fight city, take it, burn fire. thus saith lord; deceive yourselves, saying, chaldeans shall surely depart us: shall depart. though ye smitten whole army chaldeans fight you, remained [but] wounded men among them, [yet] rise every man tent, burn city fire. came pass, army chaldeans broken jerusalem fear pharaoh's army, jeremiah went forth jerusalem go land benjamin, separate thence midst people. gate benjamin, captain ward [was] there, whose name [was] irijah, son shelemiah, son hananiah; took jeremiah prophet, saying, thou fallest away chaldeans. said jeremiah, [it is] false; fall away chaldeans. hearkened him: irijah took jeremiah, brought princes. wherefore princes wroth jeremiah, smote him, put prison house jonathan scribe: made prison. jeremiah entered dungeon, cabins, jeremiah remained many days; zedekiah king sent, took out: king asked secretly house, said, [any] word lord? jeremiah said, is: for, said he, thou shalt delivered hand king babylon. moreover jeremiah said unto king zedekiah, offended thee, thy servants, people, ye put prison? [are] prophets prophesied unto you, saying, king babylon shall come you, land? therefore hear now, pray thee, lord king: let supplication, pray thee, accepted thee; thou cause return house jonathan scribe, lest die there. zedekiah king commanded commit jeremiah court prison, give daily piece bread bakers street, bread city spent. thus jeremiah remained court prison.page 469 jeremiah shephatiah son mattan, gedaliah son pashur, jucal son shelemiah, pashur son malchiah, heard words jeremiah spoken unto people, saying, thus saith lord, remaineth city shall die sword, famine, pestilence: goeth forth chaldeans shall live; shall life prey, shall live. thus saith lord, city shall surely given hand king babylon's army, shall take it. therefore princes said unto king, beseech thee, let man put death: thus weakeneth hands men war remain city, hands people, speaking words unto them: man seeketh welfare people, hurt. zedekiah king said, behold, hand: king [is] [he that] [any] thing you. took jeremiah, cast dungeon malchiah son hammelech, [was] court prison: let jeremiah cords. dungeon [there was] water, mire: jeremiah sunk mire. ebed-melech ethiopian, one eunuchs king's house, heard put jeremiah dungeon; king sitting gate benjamin; ebed-melech went forth king's house, spake king, saying, lord king, men done evil done jeremiah prophet, cast dungeon; like die hunger place is: [there is] bread city. king commanded ebed-melech ethiopian, saying, take hence thirty men thee, take jeremiah prophet dungeon, die. ebed- melech took men him, went house king treasury, took thence old cast clouts old rotten rags, let cords dungeon jeremiah. ebed-melech ethiopian said unto jeremiah, put [these] old cast clouts rotten rags thine armholes cords. jeremiah so. drew jeremiah cords, took dungeon: jeremiah remained court prison. zedekiah king sent, took jeremiah prophet unto third entry [is] house lord: king said unto jeremiah, ask thee thing; hide nothing me. jeremiah said unto zedekiah, declare [it] unto thee, wilt thou surely put death? give thee counsel, wilt thou hearken unto me? zedekiah king sware secretly unto jeremiah, saying, [as] lord liveth, made us soul, put thee death, neither give thee hand men seek thy life. said jeremiah unto zedekiah, thus saith lord, god hosts, god israel; thou wilt assuredly go forth unto king babylon's princes, thy soul shall live, city shall burned fire; thou shalt live, thine house: thou wilt go forth king babylon's princes, shall city given hand chaldeans, shall burn fire, thou shalt escape hand. zedekiah king said unto jeremiah, afraid jews fallen chaldeans, lest deliver hand, mock me. jeremiah said, shall deliver [thee.] obey, beseech thee, voice lord, speak unto thee: shall well unto thee, thy soulshall live. thou refuse go forth, [is] word lord hath shewed me: and, behold, women left king judah's house [shall be] brought forth king babylon's princes, [women] shall say, thy friends set thee on, prevailed thee: thy feet sunk mire, [and] turned away back. shall bring thy wives thy children chaldeans: thou shalt escape hand, shalt taken hand king babylon: thou shalt cause city burned fire. said zedekiah unto jeremiah, let man know words, thou shalt die. princes hear talked thee, come unto thee, say unto thee, declare unto us thou hast said unto king, hide us, put thee death; also king said unto thee: thou shalt say unto them, presented supplication king, would cause return jonathan's house, die there. came princes unto jeremiah, asked him: told according words king commanded. left speaking him; matter perceived. jeremiah abode court prison day jerusalem taken: [there] jerusalem taken. ninth year zedekiah king judah, tenth month, came nebuchadrezzar king babylon army jerusalem, besieged it. [and] eleventh year zedekiah, fourth month, ninth [day] month, city broken up. princes king babylon came in, sat middle gate, [even] nergal-sharezer, samgar-nebo, sarsechim, rab- saris, nergal-sharezer, rabmag, residue princes king babylon. came pass, [that] zedekiah king judah saw them, men war, fled, went forth city night, way king's garden, gate betwixt two walls: went way plain. chaldeans' army pursued them, overtook zedekiah plains jericho: taken him, brought nebuchadnezzar king babylon riblah land hamath, gave judgment upon him. king babylon slew sons zedekiah riblah eyes: also king babylon slew nobles judah. moreover put zedekiah's eyes, bound chains, carry babylon. chaldeans burned king's house, houses people, fire, brake walls jerusalem. nebuzar-adan captain guard carried away captive babylon remnant people remained city, fell away, fell him, rest people remained. nebuzar-adan captain guard left poor people, nothing, land judah, gave vineyards fields time. nebuchadrezzar king babylon gave charge concerning jeremiah nebuzar-adan captain guard, saying, take him, look well him, harm; unto even shall say unto thee. nebuzar-adan captainjeremiah page 470 guard sent, nebushasban, rab-saris, nergal- sharezer, rabmag, king babylon's princes; even sent, took jeremiah court prison, committed unto gedaliah son ahikam son shaphan, carry home: dwelt among people. word lord came unto jeremiah, shut court prison, saying, go speak ebed-melech ethiopian, saying, thus saith lord hosts, god israel; behold, bring words upon city evil, good; shall [accomplished] day thee. deliver thee day, saith lord: thou shalt given hand men thou [art] afraid. surely deliver thee, thou shalt fall sword, thy life shall prey unto thee: thou hast put thy trust me, saith lord. word came jeremiah lord, nebuzar-adan captain guard let go ramah, taken bound chains among carried away captive jerusalem judah, carried away captive unto babylon. captain guard took jeremiah, said unto him, lord thy god hath pronounced evil upon place. lord hath brought [it,] done according hath said: ye sinned lord, obeyed voice, therefore thing come upon you. now, behold, loose thee day chains [were] upon thine hand. seem good unto thee come babylon, come; look well unto thee: seem ill unto thee come babylon, forbear: behold, land [is] thee: whither seemeth good convenient thee go, thither go. yet gone back, [he said,] go back also gedaliah son ahikam son shaphan, king babylon hath made governor cities judah, dwell among people: go wheresoever seemeth convenient unto thee go. captain guard gave victuals reward, let go. went jeremiah unto gedaliah son ahikam mizpah; even jews returned places whither driven, came land judah, gedaliah, unto mizpah, gathered wine summer fruits much. moreover johanan son kareah, captains forces [were] fields, came gedaliah mizpah, said unto him, dost thou certainly know baalis king ammonites hath sent ishmael son nethaniah slay thee? gedaliah son ahikam believed not. johanan son kareah spake gedaliah mizpah secretly, saying, let go, pray thee, slay ishmael son nethaniah, man shall know [it:] wherefore slay thee, jews gathered unto thee scattered, remnant judah perish? gedaliah son ahikam said unto johanan son kareah, thou shalt thing: thou speakest falsely ishmael. came pass seventh month, [that] ishmael son nethaniah son elishama, seed royal, princes king, even ten men him, came unto gedaliah son ahikam mizpah; [as] live, saith king, whose name [is] lord hosts, surely tabor [is] among mountains, carmel sea, [so] shall come. thou daughter dwelling egypt, furnish thyself go captivity: noph shall waste desolate without inhabitant. egypt [is like] fair heifer, [but] destruction cometh; cometh north. also hired men [are] midst like fatted bullocks; also turned back, [and] fled away together: stand, day calamity come upon them, [and] time visitation. voice thereof shall go like serpent; shall march army, come axes, hewers wood. shall cut forest, saith lord, though cannot searched; grasshoppers, [are] innumerable. daughter egypt shall confounded; shall delivered hand people north. lord hosts, god israel, saith; behold, punish multitude no, pharaoh, egypt, gods, kings; even pharaoh, [all] trust him: andi deliver hand seek lives, hand nebuchadrezzar king babylon, hand servants: afterward shall inhabited, days old, saith lord. fear thou, servant jacob, dismayed, israel: for, behold, save thee afar off, thy seed land captivity; jacob shall return, rest ease, none shall make [him] afraid. fear thou not, jacob servant, saith lord: [am] thee; make full end nations whither driven thee: make full end thee, correct thee measure; yet leave thee wholly unpunished. word lord came jeremiah prophet philistines, pharaoh smote gaza. thus saith lord; behold, waters rise north, shall overflowing flood, shall overflow land, therein; city, dwell therein: men shall cry, inhabitants land shall howl. noise stamping hoofs strong [horses,] rushing chariots, [and at] rumbling wheels, fathers shall look back [their] children feebleness hands; day cometh spoil philistines, [and] cut tyrus zidon every helper remaineth: lord spoil philistines, remnant country caphtor. baldness come upon gaza; ashkelon cut [with] remnant valley: long wilt thou cut thyself?
