[there shall be] praise moab: heshbon devised evil it; come, let us cut [being] nation. also thou shalt cut down, madmen; sword shall pursue thee. voice crying [shall be] horonaim, spoiling great destruction. moab destroyed; little ones caused cry heard. going luhith continual weeping shall go up; going horonaim enemies heard cry destruction. flee, save lives, like heath wilderness. thou hast trusted thy works thy treasures, thou shalt also taken: chemosh shall go forth captivity [with] priests princes together. spoiler shall come upon every city, city shall escape: valley also shall perish, plain shall destroyed, lord hath spoken. give wings unto moab, may flee get away: cities thereof shall desolate, without dwell therein. cursed [be] doeth work lord deceitfully, cursed [be] keepeth back sword blood. moab hath ease youth, hath settled lees, hath emptied vessel vessel, neither hath gone captivity: therefore taste remained him, scent changed. therefore, behold, days come, saithjeremiah page 474 lord, send unto wanderers, shall cause wander, shall empty vessels, break bottles. moab shall ashamed chemosh, house israel ashamed bethel confidence. say ye, [are] mighty strong men war? moab spoiled, gone [out of] cities, chosen young men gone slaughter, saith king, whose name [is] lord hosts. calamity moab [is] near come, affliction hasteth fast. ye him, bemoan him; ye know name, say, strong staff broken, [and] beautiful rod! thou daughter dost inhabit dibon, come [thy] glory, sit thirst; spoiler moab shall come upon thee, [and] shall destroy thy strong holds. inhabitant aroer, stand way, espy; ask fleeth, escapeth, [and] say, done? moab confounded; broken down: howl cry; tell ye arnon, moab spoiled, judgment come upon plain country; upon holon, upon jahazah, upon mephaath, upon dibon, upon nebo, upon beth- diblathaim, upon kiriathaim, upon beth- gamul, upon beth-meon, upon kerioth, upon bozrah, upon cities land moab, far near. horn moab cut off, arm broken, saith lord. make ye drunken: magnified [himself] lord: moab also shall wallow vomit, also shall derision. israel derision unto thee? found among thieves? since thou spakest him, thou skippedst joy. ye dwell moab, leave cities, dwell rock, like dove [that] maketh nest sides hole's mouth. heard pride moab, (he exceeding proud) loftiness, arrogancy, pride, haughtiness heart. know wrath, saith lord; [it shall] [be] so; lies shall effect [it. ] therefore howl moab, cry moab; [mine heart] shall mourn men kir- heres. vine sibmah, weep thee weeping jazer: thy plants gone sea, reach [even] sea jazer: spoiler fallen upon thy summer fruits upon thy vintage. joy gladness taken plentiful field, land moab; caused wine fail winepresses: none shall tread shouting; [their] shouting [shall be] shouting. cry heshbon [even] unto elealeh, [and even] unto jahaz, uttered voice, zoar [even] unto horonaim, [as] heifer three years old: waters also nimrim shall desolate. moreover cause cease moab, saith lord, offereth high places, burneth incense gods. therefore mine heart shall sound moab like pipes, mine heart shall sound like pipes men kir-heres: riches [that] hath gotten perished. every head [shall be] bald, every beard clipped: upon hands [shall be] cuttings, upon loins sackcloth. [there shall be] lamentation generally upon housetops moab, streets thereof: broken moab like vessel wherein [is] pleasure, saith lord. shall howl, [saying,] broken down! hath moab turned back shame! shall moab derision dismaying themabout him. thus saith lord; behold, shall fly eagle, shall spread wings moab. kerioth taken, strong holds surprised, mighty men's hearts moab day shall heart woman pangs. moab shall destroyed [being] people, hath magnified [himself] lord. fear, pit, snare, [shall be] upon thee, inhabitant moab, saith lord. fleeth fear shall fall pit; getteth pit shall taken snare: bring upon it, [even] upon moab, year visitation, saith lord. fled stood shadow heshbon force: fire shall come forth heshbon, flame midst sihon, shall devour corner moab, crown head tumultuous ones. woe unto thee, moab! people chemosh perisheth: thy sons taken captives, thy daughters captives. yet bring captivity moab latter days, saith lord. thus far [is] judgment moab. concerning ammonites, thus saith lord; hath israel sons? hath heir? [then] doth king inherit gad, people dwell cities? therefore, behold, days come, saith lord, cause alarm war heard rabbah ammonites; shall desolate heap, daughters shall burned fire: shall israel heir unto heirs, saith lord. howl, heshbon, ai spoiled: cry, ye daughters rabbah, gird sackcloth; lament, run fro hedges; king shall go captivity, [and] priests princes together. wherefore gloriest thou valleys, thy flowing valley, backsliding daughter? trusted treasures, [saying,] shall come unto me? behold, bring fear upon thee, saith lord god hosts, thee; ye shall driven every man right forth; none shall gather wandereth. afterward bring captivity children ammon, saith lord. concerning edom, thus saith lord hosts; [is] wisdom teman? counsel perished prudent? wisdom vanished? flee ye, turn back, dwell deep, inhabitants dedan; bring calamity esau upon him, time [that] visit him. grapegatherers come thee, would leave [some] gleaning grapes? thieves night, destroy till enough. made esau bare, uncovered secret places, shall able hide himself: seed spoiled, brethren, neighbours, not. leave thy fatherless children, preserve [them] alive; let thy widows trust me. thus saith lord; behold, whose judgment [was] drink cup assuredly drunken; [art] thou [that] shall altogether go unpunished? thou shalt go unpunished, thou shalt surely drink [of it. ] sworn myself, saith lord, bozrah shall become desolation, reproach, waste, curse; cities thereof shall perpetual wastes. heard rumour lord, ambassador sent unto heathen, [saying,] gather ye together, come her, rise battle. for, lo, make thee small among heathen, [and] despised among men. thy terribleness hath deceived thee, [and] pride thine heart, thou dwellest cleftspage 475 jeremiah rock, holdest height hill: though thou shouldest make thy nest high eagle, bring thee thence, saith lord. also edom shall desolation: every one goeth shall astonished, shall hiss plagues thereof. overthrow sodom gomorrah neighbour [cities] thereof, saith lord, man shall abide there, neither shall son man dwell it. behold, shall come like lion swelling jordan habitation strong: suddenly make run away her: [is] chosen [man, that] may appoint her? [is] like me? appoint time? [is] shepherd stand me? therefore hear counsel lord, hath taken edom; purposes, hath purposed inhabitants teman: surely least flock shall draw out: surely shall make habitations desolate them. earth moved noise fall, cry noise thereof heard red sea. behold, shall come fly eagle, spread wings bozrah: day shall heart mighty men edom heart woman pangs. concerning damascus. hamath confounded, arpad: heard evil tidings: fainthearted; [there is] sorrow sea; cannot quiet. damascus waxed feeble, [and] turneth flee, fear hath seized [her:] anguish sorrows taken her, woman travail. city praise left, city joy! therefore young men shall fall streets, men war shall cut day, saith lord hosts. kindle fire wall damascus, shall consume palaces ben-hadad. concerning kedar, concerning kingdoms hazor, nebuchadrezzar king babylon shall smite, thus saith lord; arise ye, go kedar, spoil men east. tents flocks shall take away: shall take curtains, vessels, camels; shall cry unto them, fear [is] every side. flee, get far off, dwell deep, ye inhabitants hazor, saith lord; nebuchadrezzar king babylon hath taken counsel you, hath conceived purpose you. arise, get unto wealthy nation, dwelleth without care, saith lord, neither gates bars, [which] dwell alone. camels shall booty, multitude cattle spoil: scatter winds [that are] utmost corners; bring calamity sides thereof, saith lord. hazor shall dwelling dragons, [and] desolation ever: shall man abide there, [any] son man dwell it. word lord came jeremiah prophet elam beginning reign zedekiah king judah, saying, thus saith lord hosts; behold, break bow elam, chief might. upon elam bring four winds four quarters heaven, scatter toward winds; shall nation whither outcasts elam shall come. cause elam dismayed enemies, seek life: bring evilupon [even] fierce anger, saith lord; send sword them, till consumed them: set throne elam, destroy thence king princes, saith lord. shall come pass latter days, [that] bring captivity elam, saith lord. word lord spake babylon [and] land chaldeans jeremiah prophet. declare ye among nations, publish, set standard; publish, [and] conceal not: say, babylon taken, bel confounded, merodach broken pieces; idols confounded, images broken pieces. north cometh nation her, shall make land desolate, none shall dwell therein: shall remove, shall depart, man beast. days, time, saith lord, children israel shall come, children judah together, going weeping: shall go, seek lord god. shall ask way zion faces thitherward, [saying,] come, let us join lord perpetual covenant [that] shall forgotten. people hath lost sheep: shepherds caused go astray, turned away [on] mountains: gone mountain hill, forgotten restingplace. found devoured them: adversaries said, offend not, sinned lord, habitation justice, even lord, hope fathers. remove midst babylon, go forth land chaldeans, goats flocks. for, lo, raise cause come babylon assembly great nations north country: shall set array her; thence shall taken: arrows [shall be] mighty expert man; none shall return vain. chaldea shall spoil: spoil shall satisfied, saith lord. ye glad, ye rejoiced, ye destroyers mine heritage, ye grown fat heifer grass, bellow bulls; mother shall sore confounded; bare shall ashamed: behold, hindermost nations [shall be] wilderness, dry land, desert. wrath lord shall inhabited, shall wholly desolate: every one goeth babylon shall astonished, hiss plagues. put array babylon round about: ye bend bow, shoot her, spare arrows: hath sinned lord. shout round about: hath given hand: foundations fallen, walls thrown down: [is] vengeance lord: take vengeance upon her; hath done, unto her. cut sower babylon, handleth sickle time harvest: fear oppressing sword shall turn every one people, shall flee every one land. israel [is] scattered sheep; lions driven [him] away: first king assyria hath devoured him; last nebuchadrezzar king babylon hath broken bones. therefore thus saith lord hosts, god israel; behold, punish king babylon land, punished king assyria.jeremiah page 476 bring israel habitation, shall feed carmel bashan, soul shall satisfied upon mount ephraim gilead. days, time, saith lord, iniquity israel shall sought for, [there shall be] none; sins judah, shall found: pardon reserve. go land merathaim, [even] it, inhabitants pekod: waste utterly destroy them, saith lord, according commanded thee. sound battle [is] land, great destruction. hammer whole earth cut asunder broken! babylon become desolation among nations! laid snare thee, thou art also taken, babylon, thou wast aware: thou art found, also caught, thou hast striven lord. lord hath opened armoury, hath brought forth weapons indignation: [is] work lord god hosts land chaldeans. come utmost border, open storehouses: cast heaps, destroy utterly: let nothing left. slay bullocks; let go slaughter: woe unto them! day come, time visitation. voice flee escape land babylon, declare zion vengeance lord god, vengeance temple. call together archers babylon: ye bend bow, camp round about; let none thereof escape: recompense according work; according hath done, unto her: hath proud lord, holy one israel. therefore shall young men fall streets, men war shall cut day, saith lord. behold, [am] thee, [o thou] proud, saith lord god hosts: thy day come, time [that] visit thee. proud shall stumble fall, none shall raise up: kindle fire cities, shall devour round him. thus saith lord hosts; children israel children judah [were] oppressed together: took captives held fast; refused let go. redeemer [is] strong; lord hosts [is] name: shall throughly plead cause, may give rest land, disquiet inhabitants babylon. sword [is] upon chaldeans, saith lord, upon inhabitants babylon, upon princes, upon wise [men. ] sword [is] upon liars; shall dote: sword [is] upon mighty men; shall dismayed. sword [is] upon horses, upon chariots, upon mingled people [are] midst her; shall become women: sword [is] upon treasures; shall robbed. drought [is] upon waters; shall dried up: [is] land graven images, mad upon [their] idols. therefore wild beasts desert wild beasts islands shall dwell [there,] owls shall dwell therein: shall inhabited ever; neither shall dwelt generation generation. god overthrew sodom gomorrah neighbour [cities] thereof, saith lord; [so] shall man abide there, neither shall son man dwell therein. behold, people shall come north, great nation, many kings shall raised coasts earth. shall hold bow lance: [are] cruel, shew mercy: voice shall roar like sea, shall ride upon horses, [every one] put array, like man battle, thee, daughter babylon. king babylon hath heard report them, hands waxed feeble: anguish took hold him, [and] pangs woman travail. behold, shall come like lion swelling jordan unto habitation strong: make suddenly run away her: [is] chosen [man, that] may appoint her? [is] like me? appoint time? [is] shepherd stand me? therefore hear ye counsel lord, hath taken babylon; purposes, hath purposed land chaldeans: surely least flock shall draw out: surely shall make [their] habitation desolate them. noise taking babylon earth moved, cry heard among nations. thus saith lord; behold, raise babylon, dwell midst rise me, destroying wind; send unto babylon fanners, shall fan her, shall empty land: day trouble shall round about. [him that] bendeth let archer bend bow, [him that] lifteth brigandine: spare ye young men; destroy ye utterly host. thus slain shall fall land chaldeans, [they are] thrust streets. israel [hath] [been] forsaken, judah god, lord hosts; though land filled sin holy one israel. flee midst babylon, deliver every man soul: cut iniquity; [is] time lord's vengeance; render unto recompence. babylon [hath been] golden cup lord's hand, made earth drunken: nations drunken wine; therefore nations mad. babylon suddenly fallen destroyed: howl her; take balm pain, may healed. would healed babylon, healed: forsake her, let us go every one country: judgment reacheth unto heaven, lifted [even] skies. lord hath brought forth righteousness: come, let us declare zion work lord god. make bright arrows; gather shields: lord hath raised spirit kings medes: device [is] babylon, destroy it; [is] vengeance lord, vengeance temple. set standard upon walls babylon, make watch strong, set watchmen, prepare ambushes: lord hath devised done spake inhabitants babylon. thou dwellest upon many waters, abundant treasures, thine end come, [and] measure thy covetousness. lord hosts hath sworn himself, [saying,] surely fill thee men, caterpillers; shall lift shout thee. hath made earth power, hath established world wisdom, hath stretched heaven understanding. uttereth [his] voice, [there is] multitude waters heavens; causeth vapors ascend ends earth: maketh lightnings rain, bringeth forth wind treasures. everypage 477 jeremiah man brutish [his] knowledge; every founder confounded graven image: molten image [is] falsehood, [there is] breath them. [are] vanity, work errors: time visitation shall perish. portion jacob [is] like them; [is] former things: [israel is] rod inheritance: lord hosts name. thou [art] battle axe [and] weapons war: thee break pieces nations, thee destroy kingdoms; thee break pieces horse rider; thee break pieces chariot rider; thee also break pieces man woman; thee break pieces old young; thee break pieces young man maid; also break pieces thee shepherd flock; thee break pieces husbandman yoke oxen; thee break pieces captains rulers. render unto babylon inhabitants chaldea evil done zion sight, saith lord. behold, [am] thee, destroying mountain, saith lord, destroyest earth: stretch mine hand upon thee, roll thee rocks, make thee burnt mountain. shall take thee stone corner, stone foundations; thou shalt desolate ever, saith lord. set ye standard land, blow trumpet among nations, prepare nations her, call together kingdoms ararat, minni, ashchenaz; appoint captain her; cause horses come rough caterpillers. prepare nations kings medes, captains thereof, rulers thereof, land dominion. land shall tremble sorrow: every purpose lord shall performed babylon, make land babylon desolation without inhabitant. mighty men babylon forborn fight, remained [their] holds: might hath failed; became women: burned dwellingplaces; bars broken. one post shall run meet another, one messenger meet another, shew king babylon city taken [one] end, passages stopped, reeds burned fire, men war affrighted. thus saith lord hosts, god israel; daughter babylon [is] like threshingfloor, [it is] time thresh her: yet little while, time harvest shall come. nebuchadrezzar king babylon hath devoured me, hath crushed me, hath made empty vessel, hath swallowed like dragon, hath filled belly delicates, hath cast out. violence done flesh [be] upon babylon, shall inhabitant zion say; blood upon inhabitants chaldea, shall jerusalem say. therefore thus saith lord; behold, plead thy cause, take vengeance thee; dry sea, make springs dry. babylon shall become heaps, dwelling place dragons, astonishment, hissing, without inhabitant. shall roar together like lions: shall yell lions' whelps. heat make feasts, make drunken, may rejoice, sleep perpetual sleep, wake, saith lord. bring like lambs slaughter, like rams goats. sheshach taken! praise whole earth surprised! babylon become astonishment among nations! cities desolation, dry land, wilderness, land wherein man dwelleth, neither doth [any] son man pass thereby. punish bel babylon, bring forth mouth hath swallowed up: nations shall flow together unto him: yea, wall babylon shall fall. people, go ye midst her, deliver ye every man soul fierce anger lord. lest heart faint, ye fear rumour shall heard land; rumour shall come [one] year, [another] year [shall come] rumour, violence land, ruler ruler. therefore, behold, days come, judgment upon graven images babylon: whole land shall confounded, slain shall fall midst her. heaven earth, [is] therein, shall sing babylon: spoilers shall come unto north, saith lord. babylon [hath caused] slain israel fall, babylon shall fall slain earth. ye escaped sword, go away, stand still: remember lord afar off, let jerusalem come mind. confounded, heard reproach: shame hath covered faces: strangers come sanctuaries lord's house. wherefore, behold, days come, saith lord, judgment upon graven images: land wounded shall groan. though babylon mount heaven, though fortify height strength, [yet] shall spoilers come unto her, saith lord. sound cry [cometh] babylon, great destruction land chaldeans: lord hath spoiled babylon, destroyed great voice; waves roar like great waters, noise voice uttered: spoiler come upon her, [even] upon babylon, mighty men taken, every one bows broken: lord god recompences shall surely requite. make drunk princes, wise [men,] captains, rulers, mighty men: shall sleep perpetual sleep, wake, saith king, whose name [is] lord hosts. thus saith lord hosts; broad walls babylon shall utterly broken, high gates shall burned fire; people shall labour vain, folk fire, shall weary. word jeremiah prophet commanded seraiah son neriah, son maaseiah, went zedekiah king judah babylon fourth year reign. [this] seraiah quiet prince. jeremiah wrote book evil come upon babylon, [even] words written babylon. jeremiah said seraiah, thou comest babylon, shalt see, shalt read words; shalt thou say, lord, thou hast spoken place, cut off, none shall remain it, neither man beast, shall desolate ever. shall be, thou hast made end reading book, [that] thou shalt bind stone it, cast midst euphrates: thou shalt say, thus shall babylon sink, shall rise evil bring upon her: shall weary. thus far [are] words jeremiah. zedekiah one twenty years old began reign, reigned eleven years jerusalem.jeremiah page 478 mother's name [was] hamutal daughter jeremiah libnah. [that was] evil eyes lord, according jehoiakim done. anger lord came pass jerusalem judah, till cast presence, zedekiah rebelled king babylon. came pass ninth year reign, tenth month, tenth day month, [that] nebuchadrezzar king babylon came, army, jerusalem, pitched it, built forts round about. city besieged unto eleventh year king zedekiah. fourth month, ninth [day] month, famine sore city, bread people land. city broken up, men war fled, went forth city night way gate two walls, [was] king's garden; (now chaldeans [were] city round about:) went way plain. army chaldeans pursued king, overtook zedekiah plains jericho; army scattered him. took king, carried unto king babylon riblah land hamath; gave judgment upon him. king babylon slew sons zedekiah eyes: slew also princes judah riblah. put eyes zedekiah; king babylon bound chains, carried babylon, put prison till day death. fifth month, tenth [day] month, [was] nineteenth year nebuchadrezzar king babylon, came nebuzar-adan, captain guard, [which] served king babylon, jerusalem, burned house lord, king's house; houses jerusalem, houses great [men,] burned fire: army chaldeans, [were] captain guard, brake walls jerusalem round about. nebuzar-adan captain guard carried away captive [certain] poor people, residue people remained city, fell away, fell king babylon, rest multitude. nebuzar-adan captain guard left [certain] poor land vinedressers husbandmen. also pillars brass [were] house lord, bases, brasen sea [was] house lord, chaldeans brake, carried brass babylon. caldrons also, shovels, snuffers, bowls, spoons, vessels brass wherewith ministered, took away. basons, firepans, bowls, caldrons, candlesticks, spoons, cups; [that] [was] gold [in] gold, [that] [was] silver [in] silver, took captain guard away. two pillars, one sea, twelve brasen bulls [were] bases, king solomon made house lord: brass vessels without weight. [concerning] pillars, height one pillar [was] eighteen cubits; fillet twelve cubits compass it; thickness thereof [was] four fingers: [it was] hollow. chapiter brass [was] upon it; height one chapiter [was] five cubits, network pomegranates upon chapiters round about, brass.the second pillar also pomegranates [were] like unto these. ninety six pomegranates side; [and] pomegranates upon network [were] hundred round about. captain guard took seraiah chief priest, zephaniah second priest, three keepers door: took also city eunuch, charge men war; seven men near king's person, found city; principal scribe host, mustered people land; threescore men people land, found midst city. nebuzar-adan captain guard took them, brought king babylon riblah. king babylon smote them, put death riblah land hamath. thus judah carried away captive land. people nebuchadrezzar carried away captive: seventh year three thousand jews three twenty: eighteenth year nebuchadrezzar carried away captive jerusalem eight hundred thirty two persons: three twentieth year nebuchadrezzar nebuzar- adan captain guard carried away captive jews seven hundred forty five persons: persons [were] four thousand six hundred. came pass seven thirtieth year captivity jehoiachin king judah, twelfth month, five twentieth [day] month, [that] evil-merodach king babylon [first] year reign lifted head jehoiachin king judah, brought forth prison, spake kindly unto him, set throne throne kings [were] babylon, changed prison garments: continually eat bread days life. [for] diet, continual diet given king babylon, every day portion day death, days life.page 479 lamentations lamentations jeremiah doth city sit solitary, [that was] full people [how] become widow [that was] great among nations, [and] princess among provinces, [how] become tributary weepeth sore night, tears [are] cheeks: among lovers hath none comfort [her:] friends dealt treacherously her, become enemies. judah gone captivity affliction, great servitude: dwelleth among heathen, findeth rest: persecutors overtook straits. ways zion mourn, none come solemn feasts: gates desolate: priests sigh, virgins afflicted, [is] bitterness. adversaries chief, enemies prosper; lord hath afflicted multitude transgressions: children gone captivity enemy. daughter zion beauty departed: princes become like harts [that] find pasture, gone without strength pursuer. jerusalem remembered days affliction miseries pleasant things days old, people fell hand enemy, none help her: adversaries saw her, [and] mock sabbaths. jerusalem hath grievously sinned; therefore removed: honoured despise her, seen nakedness: yea, sigheth, turneth backward. filthiness [is] skirts; remembereth last end; therefore came wonderfully: comforter. lord, behold affliction: enemy hath magnified [himself. ] adversary hath spread hand upon pleasant things: hath seen [that] heathen entered sanctuary, thou didst command [that] enter thy congregation. people sigh, seek bread; given pleasant things meat relieve soul: see, lord, consider; become vile. [is it] nothing you, ye pass by? behold, see sorrow like unto sorrow, done unto me, wherewith lord hath afflicted [me] day fierce anger. hath sent fire bones, prevaileth them: hath spread net feet, hath turned back: hath made desolate [and] faint day. yoke transgressions bound hand: wreathed, [and] come upon neck: hath made strength fall, lord hath delivered [their] hands, [from whom] able rise up. lord hath trodden foot mighty [men] midst me: hath called assembly crush young men: lord hath trodden virgin, daughter judah, [as] winepress. [things] weep; mine eye, mine eye runneth water, comforter relieve soul far me: children desolate, enemy prevailed. zion spreadeth forth hands, [and is] none comfort her: lord hath commanded concerning jacob, [that] adversaries [should be] round him: jerusalem menstruous woman among them. lord righteous; rebelled commandment: hear, pray you, people, behold sorrow: virgins young men gone intocaptivity. called lovers, [but] deceived me: priests mine elders gave ghost city, sought meat relieve souls. behold, lord; [am] distress: bowels troubled; mine heart turned within me; grievously rebelled: abroad sword bereaveth, home [there is] death. heard sigh: [there is] none comfort me: mine enemies heard trouble; glad thou hast done [it:] thou wilt bring day [that] thou hast called, shall like unto me. let wickedness come thee; unto them, thou hast done unto transgressions: sighs [are] many, heart [is] faint. hath lord covered daughter zion cloud anger, [and] cast heaven unto earth beauty israel, remembered footstool day anger! lord hath swallowed habitations jacob, hath pitied: hath thrown wrath strong holds daughter judah; hath brought [them] ground: hath polluted kingdom princes thereof. hath cut [his] fierce anger horn israel: hath drawn back right hand enemy, burned jacob like flaming fire, [which] devoureth round about. hath bent bow like enemy: stood right hand adversary, slew [that were] pleasant eye tabernacle daughter zion: poured fury like fire. lord enemy: hath swallowed israel, hath swallowed palaces: hath destroyed strong holds, hath increased daughter judah mourning lamentation. hath violently taken away tabernacle, [if of] garden: hath destroyed places assembly: lord hath caused solemn feasts sabbaths forgotten zion, hath despised indignation anger king priest. lord hath cast altar, hath abhorred sanctuary, hath given hand enemy walls palaces; made noise house lord, day solemn feast. lord hath purposed destroy wall daughter zion: hath stretched line, hath withdrawn hand destroying: therefore made rampart wall lament; languished together. gates sunk ground; hath destroyed broken bars: king princes [are] among gentiles: law [is] [more;] prophets also find vision lord. elders daughter zion sit upon ground, [and] keep silence: cast dust upon heads; girded sackcloth: virgins jerusalem hang heads ground. mine eyes fail tears, bowels troubled, liver poured upon earth, destruction daughter people; children sucklings swoon streets city. say mothers, [is] corn wine? swooned wounded streets city, soul poured mothers' bosom. thing shall take witness thee? thing shall liken thee, daughter jerusalem? shall equal thee, may comfort thee, virgin daughter zion? thy breach great like sea: heal thee? thy prophets seen vain foolish things thee: discovered thine iniquity, turn away thy captivity; found, seen [it. ] lord hath done [that] devised; hath fulfilled word commanded days old: hath thrown down, hath pitied: hath caused [thine] enemy rejoice thee, hath set horn thine adversaries. heart cried unto lord, wall daughter zion, let tears run like river day night: give thyself rest; let apple thine eye cease. arise, cry night: beginning watches pour thine heart like water face lord: lift thy hands toward life thy young children, faint hunger top every street. behold, lord, consider thou hast done this. shall women eat fruit, [and] children span long? shall priest prophet slain sanctuary lord? young old lie ground streets: virgins young men fallen sword; thou hast slain [them] day thine anger; thou hast killed, [and] pitied. thou hast called solemn day terrors round about, day lord's anger none escaped remained: swaddled brought hath mine enemy consumed. [am] man [that] hath seen affliction rod wrath. hath led me, brought [me into] darkness, [into] light. surely turned; turneth hand [against me] day. flesh skin hath made old; hath broken bones. hath builded me, compassed [me] gall travail. hath set dark places, [they be] dead old. hath hedged about, cannot get out: hath made chain heavy. also cry shout, shutteth prayer. hath inclosed ways hewn stone, hath made paths crooked. [was] unto [as] bear lying wait, [and as] lion secret places. hath turned aside ways, pulled pieces: hath made desolate. hath bent bow, set mark arrow. hath caused arrows quiver enter reins. derision people; [and] song day. hath filled bitterness, hath made drunken wormwood. hath also broken teeth gravel stones, hath covered ashes. thou hast removed soul far peace: forgat prosperity. said, strength hope perished lord: remembering mine affliction misery, wormwood gall. soul hath [them] still remembrance, humbled me. recall mind, therefore hope. [it of] lord's mercies consumed, compassions fail not. [they are] new every morning: great [is] thy faithfulness. lord [is] portion, saith soul; therefore hope him. lord [is] good unto wait him, soul [that] seeketh him. [it is] good [a man] hope quietly wait salvation lord. sitteth alone keepeth silence, hath borne upon him. putteth mouth dust; may hope. giveth [his] cheek smiteth him: filled full reproach. lord cast ever: though cause grief, yet compassion according multitude mercies. doth afflict willingly grieve children men. crush feet prisoners earth, turn aside right man face high, subvert man cause, lord approveth not. [is] [that] saith, cometh pass, [when] lord commandeth [it] not? mouth high proceedeth evil good? wherefore doth living man complain, man punishment sins? let us search try ways, turn lord. let us lift heart [our] hands unto god heavens. transgressed rebelled: thou hast pardoned. thou hast covered anger, persecuted us: thou hast slain, thou hast pitied. thou hast covered thyself cloud, [our] prayer pass through. thou hast made us [as] offscouring refuse midst people. enemies opened mouths us. fear snare come upon us, desolation destruction. mine eye runneth rivers water destruction daughter people. mine eye trickleth down, ceaseth not, without intermission, till lord look down, behold heaven. mine eye affecteth mine heart daughters city. mine enemies chased sore, like bird, without cause. cut life dungeon, cast stone upon me. waters flowed mine head; [then] said, cut off. called upon thy name, lord, low dungeon. thou hast heard voice: hide thine ear breathing, cry. thou drewest near day [that] called upon thee: thou saidst, fear not. lord, thou hast pleaded causes soul; thou hast redeemed life. lord, thou hast seen wrong: judge thou cause. thou hast seen vengeance [and] imaginations me. thou hast heard reproach, lord, [and] imaginations me; lips rose me, device day. behold sitting down, rising up; [am] musick. render unto recompence, lord, according work hands. give sorrow heart, thy curse unto them. persecute destroy anger heavens lord. gold become dim! [how] fine gold changed! stones sanctuary poured top every street. precious sons zion, comparable fine gold, esteemed earthen pitchers, work hands potter! even sea monsters draw breast, give suck young ones: daughter people [is become] cruel, like ostriches wilderness. tongue sucking child cleaveth roof mouth thirst: young children ask bread, [and] man breaketh [it] unto them. feed delicately desolate streets: brought scarlet embrace dunghills. punishment iniquity daughter people greater punishmentpage 481 lamentations sin sodom, overthrown moment, hands stayed her. nazarites purer snow, whiter milk, ruddy body rubies, polishing [was] sapphire: visage blacker coal; known streets: skin cleaveth bones; withered, become like stick. [it is] unclean; depart, depart, touch not: fled away wandered, said among heathen, shall sojourn [there. ] anger lord hath divided them; regard them: respected persons priests, favoured elders. us, eyes yet failed vain help: watching watched nation [that] could save [us. ] hunt steps, cannot go streets: end near, days fulfilled; wood sold unto us. necks [are] persecution: labour, [and] rest. given hand [to] egyptians, [and to] assyrians, satisfied bread. fathers sinned, [and are] not; borne iniquities. servants ruled us: [there is] none doth deliver [us] hand. gat bread [the peril of] lives sword wilderness. skin black like oven terrible famine. ravished women zion, [and] maids cities judah. princes hanged hand: faces elders honoured. took young men grind, children fell wood. joy heart ceased; renew days old. thou hast utterly rejected us; thou art wroth us.page 483 ezekiel book prophet ezekiel came pass thirtieth year, fourth [month,] fifth [day] month, [was] among captives river chebar, [that] heavens opened, saw visions god. fifth [day] month, [was] fifth year king jehoiachin's captivity, word lord came expressly unto ezekiel priest, son buzi, land chaldeans river chebar; hand lord upon him. looked, and, behold, whirlwind came north, great cloud, fire infolding itself, brightness [was] it, midst thereof colour amber, midst fire. also midst thereof [came] likeness four living creatures. [was] appearance; likeness man. every one four faces, every one four wings. feet [were] straight feet; sole feet [was] like sole calf's foot: sparkled like colour burnished brass. [they had] hands man wings four sides; four faces wings. wings [were] joined one another; turned went; went every one straight forward. likeness faces, four face man, face lion, right side: four face ox left side; four also face eagle. thus [were] faces: wings [were] stretched upward; two [wings] every one [were] joined one another, two covered bodies. went every one straight forward: whither spirit go, went; [and] turned went. likeness living creatures, appearance [was] like burning coals fire, [and] like appearance lamps: went among living creatures; fire bright, fire went forth lightning. living creatures ran returned appearance flash lightning. beheld living creatures, behold one wheel upon earth living creatures, four faces. appearance wheels work [was] like unto colour beryl: four one likeness: appearance work wheel middle wheel. went, went upon four sides: [and] turned went. rings, high dreadful; rings [were] full eyes round four. living creatures went, wheels went them: living creatures lifted earth, wheels lifted up. whithersoever spirit go, went, thither [was their] spirit go; wheels lifted them: spirit living creature [was] wheels. went, [these] went; stood, [these] stood; lifted earth, wheels lifted them: spirit living creature [was] wheels. likeness firmament upon heads living creature [was] colour terrible crystal, stretched forth heads above. firmament [were] wings straight, one toward other: every one two, covered side, every one two, covered side, bodies. went, iheard noise wings, like noise great waters, voice almighty, voice speech, noise host: stood, let wings. voice firmament [was] heads, stood, let wings. firmament [was] heads [was] likeness throne, appearance sapphire stone: upon likeness throne [was] likeness appearance man upon it. saw colour amber, appearance fire round within it, appearance loins even upward, appearance loins even downward, saw appearance fire, brightness round about. appearance bow cloud day rain, [was] appearance brightness round about. [was] appearance likeness glory lord. saw [it,] fell upon face, heard voice one spake. said unto me, son man, stand upon thy feet, speak unto thee. spirit entered spake unto me, set upon feet, heard spake unto me. said unto me, son man, send thee children israel, rebellious nation hath rebelled me: fathers transgressed me, [even] unto day. [they are] impudent children stiffhearted. send thee unto them; thou shalt say unto them, thus saith lord god. they, whether hear, whether forbear, (for [are] rebellious house,) yet shall know hath prophet among them. thou, son man, afraid them, neither afraid words, though briers thorns [be] thee, thou dost dwell among scorpions: afraid words, dismayed looks, though [be] rebellious house. thou shalt speak words unto them, whether hear, whether forbear: [are] rebellious. thou, son man, hear say unto thee; thou rebellious like rebellious house: open thy mouth, eat give thee. looked, behold, hand [was] sent unto me; and, lo, roll book [was] therein; spread me; [was] written within without: [there was] written therein lamentations, mourning, woe. moreover said unto me, son man, eat thou findest; eat roll, go speak unto house israel. opened mouth, caused eat roll. said unto me, son man, cause thy belly eat, fill thy bowels roll give thee. eat [it;] mouth honey sweetness. said unto me, son man, go, get thee unto house israel, speak words unto them. thou [art] sent people strange speech hard language, [but] house israel; many people strange speech hard language, whose words thou canst understand. surely, sent thee them, would hearkened unto thee. house israel hearken untoezekiel page 484 thee; hearken unto me: house israel [are] impudent hardhearted. behold, made thy face strong faces, thy forehead strong foreheads. adamant harder flint made thy forehead: fear not, neither dismayed looks, though [be] rebellious house. moreover said unto me, son man, words shall speak unto thee receive thine heart, hear thine ears. go, get thee captivity, unto children thy people, speak unto them, tell them, thus saith lord god; whether hear, whether forbear. spirit took up, heard behind voice great rushing, [saying,] blessed [be] glory lord place. [shall be] sign house israel. lie thou also upon thy left side, lay iniquity house israel upon it: [according] number days thou shalt lie upon thou shalt bear iniquity. laid upon thee years iniquity, according number days, three hundred ninety days: shalt thou bear iniquity house israel. thou hast accomplished them, lie thy right side, thou shalt bear iniquity house judah forty days: appointed thee day year. therefore thou shalt set thy face toward siege jerusalem, thine arm [shall be] uncovered, thou shalt prophesy it. and, behold, lay bands upon thee, thou shalt turn thee one side another, till thou hast ended days thy siege. take thou also unto thee wheat, barley, beans, lentiles, millet, fitches, put one vessel, make thee bread thereof, [according] number days thou shalt lie upon thy side, three hundred ninety days shalt thou eat thereof. thy meat thou shalt eat [shall be] weight, twenty shekels day: time time shalt thou eat it. thou shalt drink also water measure, sixth part hin: time time shalt thou drink. thou shalt eat [as] barley cakes, thou shalt bake dung cometh man, sight. lord said, even thus shall children israel eat defiled bread among gentiles, whither drive them. said i, ah lord god! behold, soul hath polluted: youth even till eaten dieth itself, torn pieces; therefore thus saith lord god; ye spoken vanity, seen lies, therefore, behold, [am] you, saith lord god. mine hand shall upon prophets see vanity, divine lies: shall assembly people, neither shall written writing house israel, neither shall enter land israel; ye shall know [am] lord god. because, even seduced people, saying, peace; [there was] peace; one built wall, and, lo, others daubed untempered [morter: ] say unto daub untempered [morter,] shall fall: shall overflowing shower; ye, great hailstones, shall fall; stormy wind shall rend [it. ] lo, wall fallen, shall said unto you, [is] daubing wherewith ye daubed [it? ] therefore thus saith lord god; even rend [it] stormy wind fury; shall overflowing shower mine anger, great hailstones [my] fury consume [it. ] break wall ye daubed untempered [morter,] bring ground, foundation thereof shall discovered, shall fall, ye shall consumed midst thereof: ye shall know [am] lord. thus accomplish wrath upon wall, upon daubed untempered [morter,] say unto you, wall [is] [more,] neither daubed it; [to wit,] prophets israel prophesy concerning jerusalem, see visions peace her, [there is] peace, saith lord god. likewise, thou son man, set thy face daughters thy people, prophesy heart; prophesy thou them, say, thus saith lord god; woe [women] sew pillows armholes, make kerchiefs upon head every stature hunt souls! ye hunt souls people, ye save souls alive [that come] unto you? ye pollute among people handfuls barley pieces bread, slay souls die, save souls alivepage 489 ezekiel live, lying people hear [your] lies? wherefore thus saith lord god; behold, [am] pillows, wherewith ye hunt souls make [them] fly, tear arms, let souls go, [even] souls ye hunt make [them] fly. kerchiefs also tear, deliver people hand, shall hand hunted; ye shall know [am] lord. lies ye made heart righteous sad, made sad; strengthened hands wicked, return wicked way, promising life: therefore ye shall see vanity, divine divinations: deliver people hand: ye shall know [am] lord. came certain elders israel unto me, sat me. word lord came unto me, saying, son man, men set idols heart, put stumblingblock iniquity face: enquired them? therefore speak unto them, say unto them, thus saith lord god; every man house israel setteth idols heart, putteth stumblingblock iniquity face, cometh prophet; lord answer cometh according multitude idols; may take house israel heart, estranged idols. therefore say unto house israel, thus saith lord god; repent, turn [yourselves] idols; turn away faces abominations. every one house israel, stranger sojourneth israel, separateth me, setteth idols heart, putteth stumblingblock iniquity face, cometh prophet enquire concerning me; lord answer myself: set face man, make sign proverb, cut midst people; ye shall know [am] lord. prophet deceived hath spoken thing, lord deceived prophet, stretch hand upon him, destroy midst people israel. shall bear punishment iniquity: punishment prophet shall even punishment seeketh [unto him; ] house israel may go astray me, neither polluted transgressions; may people, may god, saith lord god. word lord came me, saying, son man, land sinneth trespassing grievously, stretch mine hand upon it, break staff bread thereof, send famine upon it, cut man beast it: though three men, noah, daniel, job, it, deliver [but] souls righteousness, saith lord god. cause noisome beasts pass land, spoil it, desolate, man may pass beasts: [though] three men [were] it, [as] live, saith lord god, shall deliver neither sons daughters; shall delivered, land shall desolate. [if] bring sword upon land, say, sword, go land; cut man beast it: though three men [were] it, [as] live, saith lord god, shall deliver neither sons daughters, shall delivered themselves. [if] send pestilence land, pour fury upon blood, cut man beast: though noah, daniel, job, [were] it, [as] live, saith lord god, shall deliver neither son daughter; shall [but] deliver souls righteousness. thus saith lord god; much send four sore judgments upon jerusalem, sword, famine, noisome beast, pestilence, cut man beast? yet, behold, therein shall left remnant shall brought forth, [both] sons daughters: behold, shall come forth unto you, ye shall see way doings: ye shall comforted concerning evil brought upon jerusalem, [even] concerning brought upon it. shall comfort you, ye see ways doings: ye shall know done without cause done it, saith lord god. word lord came unto me, saying, son man, vine tree tree, [or than] branch among trees forest? shall wood taken thereof work? [men] take pin hang vessel thereon? behold, cast fire fuel; fire devoureth ends it, midst burned. meet [any] work? behold, whole, meet work: much less shall meet yet [any] work, fire hath devoured it, burned? therefore thus saith lord god; vine tree among trees forest, given fire fuel, give inhabitants jerusalem. set face them; shall go [one] fire, [another] fire shall devour them; ye shall know [am] lord, set face them. make land desolate, committed trespass, saith lord god. word lord came unto me, saying, son man, cause jerusalem know abominations, say, thus saith lord god unto jerusalem; thy birth thy nativity [is] land canaan; thy father [was] amorite, thy mother hittite. [as for] thy nativity, day thou wast born thy navel cut, neither wast thou washed water supple [thee;] thou wast salted all, swaddled all. none eye pitied thee, unto thee, compassion upon thee; thou wast cast open field, lothing thy person, day thou wast born. passed thee, saw thee polluted thine blood, said unto thee [when thou wast] thy blood, live; yea, said unto thee [when thou wast] thy blood, live. caused thee multiply bud field, thou hast increased waxen great, thou art come excellent ornaments: [thy] breasts fashioned, thine hair grown, whereas thou [wast] naked bare. passed thee,ezekiel page 490 looked upon thee, behold, thy time [was] time love; spread skirt thee, covered thy nakedness: yea, sware unto thee, entered covenant thee, saith lord god, thou becamest mine. washed thee water; yea, throughly washed away thy blood thee, anointed thee oil. clothed thee also broidered work, shod thee badgers' skin, girded thee fine linen, covered thee silk. decked thee also ornaments, put bracelets upon thy hands, chain thy neck. put jewel thy forehead, earrings thine ears, beautiful crown upon thine head. thus wast thou decked gold silver; thy raiment [was of] fine linen, silk, broidered work; thou didst eat fine flour, honey, oil: thou wast exceeding beautiful, thou didst prosper kingdom. thy renown went forth among heathen thy beauty: [was] perfect comeliness, put upon thee, saith lord god. thou didst trust thine beauty, playedst harlot thy renown, pouredst thy fornications every one passed by; was. thy garments thou didst take, deckedst thy high places divers colours, playedst harlot thereupon: [the like things] shall come, neither shall so. thou hast also taken thy fair jewels gold silver, given thee, madest thyself images men, didst commit whoredom them, tookest thy broidered garments, coveredst them: thou hast set mine oil mine incense them. meat also gave thee, fine flour, oil, honey, [wherewith] fed thee, thou hast even set sweet savour: [thus] was, saith lord god. moreover thou hast taken thy sons thy daughters, thou hast borne unto me, hast thou sacrificed unto devoured. [is this] thy whoredoms small matter, thou hast slain children, delivered cause pass [the fire] them? thine abominations thy whoredoms thou hast remembered days thy youth, thou wast naked bare, [and] wast polluted thy blood. came pass thy wickedness, (woe, woe unto thee! saith lord god;) [that] thou hast also built unto thee eminent place, hast made thee high place every street. thou hast built thy high place every head way, hast made thy beauty abhorred, hast opened thy feet every one passed by, multiplied thy whoredoms. thou hast also committed fornication egyptians thy neighbours, great flesh; hast increased thy whoredoms, provoke anger. behold, therefore stretched hand thee, diminished thine ordinary [food,] delivered thee unto hate thee, daughters philistines, ashamed thy lewd way. thou hast played whore also assyrians, thou wast unsatiable; yea, thou hast played harlot them, yet couldest satisfied. thou hast moreover multiplied thy fornication land canaan unto chaldea; yet thou wast satisfied herewith. weak thine heart, saith lord god, seeing thou doest [things,] work imperious whorish woman; thou buildest thine eminent place head every way, makest thine high place every street; hast harlot, thou scornest hire; [but as] wife committeth adultery, [which] taketh strangers instead husband! give gifts whores: thou givest thy gifts allthy lovers, hirest them, may come unto thee every side thy whoredom. contrary thee [other] women thy whoredoms, whereas none followeth thee commit whoredoms: thou givest reward, reward given unto thee, therefore thou art contrary. wherefore, harlot, hear word lord: thus saith lord god; thy filthiness poured out, thy nakedness discovered thy whoredoms thy lovers, idols thy abominations, blood thy children, thou didst give unto them; behold, therefore gather thy lovers, thou hast taken pleasure, [them] thou hast loved, [them] thou hast hated; even gather round thee, discover thy nakedness unto them, may see thy nakedness. judge thee, women break wedlock shed blood judged; give thee blood fury jealousy. also give thee hand, shall throw thine eminent place, shall break thy high places: shall strip thee also thy clothes, shall take thy fair jewels, leave thee naked bare. shall also bring company thee, shall stone thee stones, thrust thee swords. shall burn thine houses fire, execute judgments upon thee sight many women: cause thee cease playing harlot, thou also shalt give hire more. make fury toward thee rest, jealousy shall depart thee, quiet, angry. thou hast remembered days thy youth, hast fretted [things;] behold, therefore also recompense thy way upon [thine] head, saith lord god: thou shalt commit lewdness thine abominations. behold, every one useth proverbs shall use [this] proverb thee, saying, mother, [so is] daughter. thou [art] thy mother's daughter, lotheth husband children; thou [art] sister thy sisters, lothed husbands children: mother [was] hittite, father amorite. thine elder sister [is] samaria, daughters dwell thy left hand: thy younger sister, dwelleth thy right hand, [is] sodom daughters. yet hast thou walked ways, done abominations: but, [if were] little [thing,] thou wast corrupted thy ways. [as] live, saith lord god, sodom thy sister hath done, daughters, thou hast done, thou thy daughters. behold, iniquity thy sister sodom, pride, fulness bread, abundance idleness daughters, neither strengthen hand poor needy. haughty, committed abomination me: therefore took away saw [good. ] neither hath samaria committed half thy sins; thou hast multiplied thine abominations they, hast justified thy sisters thine abominations thou hast done. thou also, hast judged thy sisters, bear thine shame thy sins thou hast committed abominable they: righteous thou: yea, thou confounded also, bear thy shame, thou hast justified thy sisters. shall bring captivity, captivity sodom daughters, captivity samaria daughters,page 491 ezekiel [will bring again] captivity thy captives midst them: thou mayest bear thine shame, mayest confounded thou hast done, thou art comfort unto them. thy sisters, sodom daughters, shall return former estate, samaria daughters shall return former estate, thou thy daughters shall return former estate. thy sister sodom mentioned thy mouth day thy pride, thy wickedness discovered, time [thy] reproach daughters syria, [that are] round her, daughters philistines, despise thee round about. thou hast borne thy lewdness thine abominations, saith lord. thus saith lord god; even deal thee thou hast done, hast despised oath breaking covenant. nevertheless remember covenant thee days thy youth, establish unto thee everlasting covenant. thou shalt remember thy ways, ashamed, thou shalt receive thy sisters, thine elder thy younger: give unto thee daughters, thy covenant. establish covenant thee; thou shalt know [am] lord: thou mayest remember, confounded, never open thy mouth thy shame, pacified toward thee thou hast done, saith lord god. word lord came unto me, saying, son man, put forth riddle, speak parable unto house israel; say, thus saith lord god; great eagle great wings, longwinged, full feathers, divers colours, came unto lebanon, took highest branch cedar: cropped top young twigs, carried land traffick; set city merchants. took also seed land, planted fruitful field; placed [it] great waters, [and] set [as] willow tree. grew, became spreading vine low stature, whose branches turned toward him, roots thereof him: became vine, brought forth branches, shot forth sprigs. also another great eagle great wings many feathers: and, behold, vine bend roots toward him, shot forth branches toward him, might water furrows plantation. planted good soil great waters, might bring forth branches, might bear fruit, might goodly vine. say thou, thus saith lord god; shall prosper? shall pull roots thereof, cut fruit thereof, wither? shall wither leaves spring, even without great power many people pluck roots thereof. yea, behold, [being] planted, shall prosper? shall utterly wither, east wind toucheth it? shall wither furrows grew. moreover word lord came unto me, saying, say rebellious house, know ye [things mean?] tell [them,] behold, king babylon come jerusalem, hath taken king thereof, princes thereof, led babylon; hath taken king's seed, made covenant him, hath taken oath him: hath also taken mighty land: kingdom might base, might lift up, [but] keeping covenant might stand. buthe rebelled sending ambassadors egypt, might give horses much people. shall prosper? shall escape doeth [things?] shall break covenant, delivered? live, saith lord god, surely place [where] king [dwelleth] made king, whose oath despised, whose covenant brake, [even] midst babylon shall die. neither shall pharaoh [his] mighty army great company make war, casting mounts, building forts, cut many persons: seeing despised oath breaking covenant, when, lo, given hand, hath done [things,] shall escape. therefore thus saith lord god; [as] live, surely mine oath hath despised, covenant hath broken, even recompense upon head. spread net upon him, shall taken snare, bring babylon, plead trespass hath trespassed me. fugitives bands shall fall sword, remain shall scattered toward winds: ye shall know lord spoken [it. ] thus saith lord god; also take highest branch high cedar, set [it;] crop top young twigs tender one, plant [it] upon high mountain eminent: mountain height israel plant it: shall bring forth boughs, bear fruit, goodly cedar: shall dwell fowl every wing; shadow branches thereof shall dwell. trees field shall know lord brought high tree, exalted low tree, dried green tree, made dry tree flourish: lord brought high tree, exalted low tree, dried green tree, made dry tree flourish: lord spoken done [it. ] word lord came unto again, saying, mean ye, ye use proverb concerning land israel, saying, fathers eaten sour grapes, children's teeth set edge? [as] live, saith lord god, ye shall [occasion] use proverb israel. behold, souls mine; soul father, also soul son mine: soul sinneth, shall die. man just, lawful right, [and] hath eaten upon mountains, neither hath lifted eyes idols house israel, neither hath defiled neighbour's wife, neither hath come near menstruous woman, hath oppressed any, [but] hath restored debtor pledge, hath spoiled none violence, hath given bread hungry, hath covered naked garment; [that] hath given forth upon usury, neither hath taken increase, [that] hath withdrawn hand iniquity, hath executed true judgment man man, hath walked statutes, hath kept judgments, deal truly; [is] just, shall surely live, saith lord god. beget son [that is] robber, shedder blood, [that] doeth like [any] one [things, ] doeth [duties,] even hath eaten upon mountains, defiled neighbour's wife, hath oppressed poor needy, hathezekiel page 492 spoiled violence, hath restored pledge, hath lifted eyes idols, hath committed abomination, hath given forth upon usury, hath taken increase: shall live? shall live: hath done abominations; shall surely die; blood shall upon him. now, lo, [if] beget son, seeth father's sins hath done, considereth, doeth like, [that] hath eaten upon mountains, neither hath lifted eyes idols house israel, hath defiled neighbour's wife, neither hath oppressed any, hath withholden pledge, neither hath spoiled violence, [but] hath given bread hungry, hath covered naked garment, [that] hath taken hand poor, [that] hath received usury increase, hath executed judgments, hath walked statutes; shall die iniquity father, shall surely live. [as for] father, cruelly oppressed, spoiled brother violence, [that] [is] good among people, lo, even shall die iniquity. yet say ye, why? doth son bear iniquity father? son hath done lawful right, [and] hath kept statutes, hath done them, shall surely live. soul sinneth, shall die. son shall bear iniquity father, neither shall father bear iniquity son: righteousness righteous shall upon him, wickedness wicked shall upon him. wicked turn sins hath committed, keep statutes, lawful right, shall surely live, shall die. transgressions hath committed, shall mentioned unto him: righteousness hath done shall live. pleasure wicked die? saith lord god: [and] return ways, live? righteous turneth away righteousness, committeth iniquity, [and] doeth according abominations wicked [man] doeth, shall live? righteousness hath done shall mentioned: trespass hath trespassed, sin hath sinned, shall die. yet ye say, way lord equal. hear now, house israel; way equal? ways unequal? righteous [man] turneth away righteousness, committeth iniquity, dieth them; iniquity hath done shall die. again, wicked [man] turneth away wickedness hath committed, doeth lawful right, shall save soul alive. considereth, turneth away transgressions hath committed, shall surely live, shall die. yet saith house israel, way lord equal. house israel, ways equal? ways unequal? therefore judge you, house israel, every one according ways, saith lord god. repent, turn [yourselves] transgressions; iniquity shall ruin. cast away transgressions, whereby ye transgressed; make new heartand new spirit: ye die, house israel? pleasure death dieth, saith lord god: wherefore turn [yourselves,] live ye. moreover take thou lamentation princes israel, say, [is] thy mother? lioness: lay among lions, nourished whelps among young lions. brought one whelps: became young lion, learned catch prey; devoured men. nations also heard him; taken pit, brought chains unto land egypt. saw waited, [and] hope lost, took another whelps, [and] made young lion. went among lions, became young lion, learned catch prey, [and] devoured men. knew desolate palaces, laid waste cities; land desolate, fulness thereof, noise roaring. nations set every side provinces, spread net him: taken pit. put ward chains, brought king babylon: brought holds, voice heard upon mountains israel. thy mother [is] like vine thy blood, planted waters: fruitful full branches reason many waters. strong rods sceptres bare rule, stature exalted among thick branches, appeared height multitude branches. plucked fury, cast ground, east wind dried fruit: strong rods broken withered; fire consumed them. yea, thou shalt shew abominations. say thou, thus saith lord god, city sheddeth blood midst it, time may come, maketh idols defile herself. thou art become guilty thy blood thou hast shed; hast defiled thyself thine idols thou hast made; thou hast caused thy days draw near, art come [even] unto thy years: therefore made thee reproach unto heathen, mocking countries. [those be] near, [those be] far thee, shall mock thee, [which art] infamous [and] much vexed. behold, princes israel, every one thee power shed blood. thee set light father mother: midst thee dealt oppression stranger: thee vexed fatherless widow. thou hast despised mine holy things, hast profaned sabbaths. thee men carry tales shed blood: thee eat upon mountains: midst thee commit lewdness. thee discovered fathers' nakedness: thee humbled set apart pollution. one hath committed abomination neighbour's wife; another hath lewdly defiled daughter law; another thee hath humbled sister, father's daughter. thee taken gifts shed blood; thou hast taken usury increase, thou hast greedily gained thy neighbours extortion, hast forgotten me, saith lord god. behold, therefore smitten mine hand thy dishonest gain thou hast made, thy blood hath midst thee. thine heart endure, thine hands strong, days shall deal thee? lord spoken [it,] [it. ] scatter thee among heathen, disperse thee countries, consume thy filthiness thee. thou shalt take thine inheritance thyself sight heathen, thou shalt know [am] lord. word lord came unto me, saying, son man, house israel become dross: [are] brass, tin, iron, lead, midst furnace; [even] dross silver. therefore thus saith lord god; ye become dross, behold, therefore gather midst jerusalem. [there is] conspiracy prophets midst thereof, like roaring lion ravening prey; devoured souls; taken treasure precious things; made many widows midst thereof. priests violated law, profaned mine holy things: put difference holy profane, neither shewed [difference] unclean clean, hid eyes sabbaths, profaned among them. princes midst thereof [are] like wolves ravening prey, shed blood, [and] destroy souls, get dishonest gain. prophets daubed untempered [morter,] seeing vanity, divining lies unto them, saying, thus saith lord god, lord hath spoken. people land used oppression, exercised robbery, vexed poor needy: yea, oppressed stranger wrongfully. sought man among them, make hedge, stand gap land, destroy it: found none. therefore poured mine indignation upon them; consumed fire wrath: way recompensed upon heads, saith lord god. word lord came unto me, saying, son man, two women, daughters one mother: committed whoredoms egypt; committed whoredoms youth: breasts pressed, bruised teats virginity. names [were] aholah elder, aholibah sister: mine, bare sons daughters. thus [were] names; thou shalt know [am] lord. thus saith lord god; moab seir say, behold, house judah [is] like unto heathen; therefore, behold, open side moab cities, cities [which are] frontiers, glory country, beth-jeshimoth, baal- meon, kiriathaim, unto men east ammonites, give possession, ammonites may remembered among nations. execute judgments upon moab; shall know [am] lord. thus saith lord god; edom hath dealt house judah taking vengeance, hath greatly offended, revenged upon them; therefore thus saith lord god; also stretch mine hand upon edom, cut man beast it; make desolate teman; dedan shall fall sword. lay vengeance upon edom hand people israel: shall edom according mine anger according fury; shall know vengeance, saith lord god. thus saith lord god; philistines dealt revenge, taken vengeance despiteful heart, destroy [it] old hatred; therefore thus saith lord god; behold, stretch mine hand upon philistines, cut cherethims, destroy remnant sea coast. execute great vengeance upon furious rebukes; shall know [am] lord, shall lay vengeance upon them. came pass eleventh year, first [day] month, [that] word lord came unto me, saying, son man, tyrus hath said jerusalem, aha, broken [that was] gates people: turned unto me: shall replenished, [now] laid waste: therefore thus saith lord god; behold, [am] thee, tyrus, cause many nations come thee, sea causeth waves come up. shall destroy walls tyrus, break towers: also scrape dust her, make like top rock. shall [a place for] spreading nets midst sea: spoken [it,] saith lord god: shall become spoil nations. daughters [are] field shall slain sword; shall know [am] lord. thus saith lord god; behold, bring upon tyrus nebuchadrezzar king babylon, king kings, north, horses, chariots, horsemen, companies, much people. shall slay sword thy daughters field: shall make fort thee, cast mount thee, lift buckler thee. shall set engines war thy walls, axes shall break thy towers. reason abundance horses dust shall cover thee: thy walls shall shake noise horsemen, wheels, chariots, shall enter thy gates, men enter city wherein made breach. hoofs horses shall tread thy streets: shall slay thy people sword, thy strong garrisons shall go ground. andthey shall make spoil thy riches, make prey thy merchandise: shall break thy walls, destroy thy pleasant houses: shall lay thy stones thy timber thy dust midst water. cause noise thy songs cease; sound thy harps shall heard. make thee like top rock: thou shalt [a place] spread nets upon; thou shalt built more: lord spoken [it,] saith lord god. thus saith lord god tyrus; shall isles shake sound thy fall, wounded cry, slaughter made midst thee? princes sea shall come thrones, lay away robes, put broidered garments: shall clothe trembling; shall sit upon ground, shall tremble [every] moment, astonished thee. shall take lamentation thee, say thee, art thou destroyed, [that wast] inhabited seafaring men, renowned city, wast strong sea, inhabitants, cause terror [to be] haunt it! shall isles tremble day thy fall; yea, isles [are] sea shall troubled thy departure. thus saith lord god; shall make thee desolate city, like cities inhabited; shall bring deep upon thee, great waters shall cover thee; shall bring thee descend pit, people old time, shall set thee low parts earth, places desolate old, go pit, thou inhabited; shall set glory land living; make thee terror, thou [shalt be] [more:] though thou sought for, yet shalt thou never found again, saith lord god. word lord came unto me, saying, now, thou son man, take lamentation tyrus; say unto tyrus, thou art situate entry sea, [which art] merchant people many isles, thus saith lord god; tyrus, thou hast said, [am] perfect beauty. thy borders [are] midst seas, thy builders perfected thy beauty. made thy [ship] boards fir trees senir: taken cedars lebanon make masts thee. [of] oaks bashan made thine oars; company ashurites made thy benches [of] ivory, [brought] isles chittim. fine linen broidered work egypt thou spreadest forth thy sail; blue purple isles elishah covered thee. inhabitants zidon arvad thy mariners: thy wise [men,] tyrus, [that] thee, thy pilots. ancients gebal wise [men] thereof thee thy calkers: ships sea mariners thee occupy thy merchandise. persia lud phut thine army, thy men war: hanged shield helmet thee; set forth thy comeliness. men arvad thine army [were] upon thy walls round about, gammadims thy towers: hanged shields upon thy walls round about; made thy beauty perfect. tarshish [was] thy merchant reason multitude [kind of] riches; silver, iron, tin, lead, traded thy fairs. javan, tubal, meshech, [were] thy merchants: traded persons men vessels brass thy market. house togarmah traded thy fairs horses horsemen mules. menezekiel page 498 dedan [were] thy merchants; many isles [were] merchandise thine hand: brought thee [for] present horns ivory ebony. syria [was] thy merchant reason multitude wares thy making: occupied thy fairs emeralds, purple, broidered work, fine linen, coral, agate. judah, land israel, [were] thy merchants: traded thy market wheat minnith, pannag, honey, oil, balm. damascus [was] thy merchant multitude wares thy making, multitude riches; wine helbon, white wool. dan also javan going fro occupied thy fairs: bright iron, cassia, calamus, thy market. dedan [was] thy merchant precious clothes chariots. arabia, princes kedar, occupied thee lambs, rams, goats: [were they] thy merchants. merchants sheba raamah, [were] thy merchants: occupied thy fairs chief spices, precious stones, gold. haran, canneh, eden, merchants sheba, asshur, [and] chilmad, [were] thy merchants. [were] thy merchants sorts [of things,] blue clothes, broidered work, chests rich apparel, bound cords, made cedar, among thy merchandise. ships tarshish sing thee thy market: thou wast replenished, made glorious midst seas. thy rowers brought thee great waters: east wind hath broken thee midst seas. thy riches, thy fairs, thy merchandise, thy mariners, thy pilots, thy calkers, occupiers thy merchandise, thy men war, [are] thee, thy company [is] midst thee, shall fall midst seas day thy ruin. suburbs shall shake sound cry thy pilots. handle oar, mariners, [and] pilots sea, shall come ships, shall stand upon land; shall cause voice heard thee, shall cry bitterly, shall cast dust upon heads, shall wallow ashes: shall make utterly bald thee, gird sackcloth, shall weep thee bitterness heart [and] bitter wailing. wailing shall take lamentation thee, lament thee, [saying,] [city is] like tyrus, like destroyed midst sea? thy wares went forth seas, thou filledst many people; thou didst enrich kings earth multitude thy riches thy merchandise. time [when] thou shalt broken seas depths waters thy merchandise thy company midst thee shall fall. inhabitants isles shall astonished thee, kings shall sore afraid, shall troubled [their] countenance. merchants among people shall hiss thee; thou [shalt be] terror, never shalt more. word lord came unto me, saying, son man, say unto prince tyrus, thus saith lord god; thine heart [is] lifted up, thou hast said, [am] god, sit [in] seat god, midst seas; yet thou [art] man, god, though thou set thine heart heart god: behold, thou [art] wiser daniel; secret hide thee: thy wisdom thine understanding thou hast gotten thee riches, hast gotten gold silver thy treasures: thy great wisdom [and] thy traffick hast thou increased thyriches, thine heart lifted thy riches: therefore thus saith lord god; thou hast set thine heart heart god; behold, therefore bring strangers upon thee, terrible nations: shall draw swords beauty thy wisdom, shall defile thy brightness. shall bring thee pit, thou shalt die deaths [them are] slain midst seas. wilt thou yet say slayeth thee, [am] god? thou [shalt be] man, god, hand slayeth thee. thou shalt die deaths uncircumcised hand strangers: spoken [it,] saith lord god. moreover word lord came unto me, saying, son man, take lamentation upon king tyrus, say unto him, thus saith lord god; thou sealest sum, full wisdom, perfect beauty. thou hast eden garden god; every precious stone [was] thy covering, sardius, topaz, diamond, beryl, onyx, jasper, sapphire, emerald, carbuncle, gold: workmanship thy tabrets thy pipes prepared thee day thou wast created. thou [art] anointed cherub covereth; set thee [so:] thou wast upon holy mountain god; thou hast walked midst stones fire. thou [wast] perfect thy ways day thou wast created, till iniquity found thee. multitude thy merchandise filled midst thee violence, thou hast sinned: therefore cast thee profane mountain god: destroy thee, covering cherub, midst stones fire. thine heart lifted thy beauty, thou hast corrupted thy wisdom reason thy brightness: cast thee ground, lay thee kings, may behold thee. thou hast defiled thy sanctuaries multitude thine iniquities, iniquity thy traffick; therefore bring forth fire midst thee, shall devour thee, bring thee ashes upon earth sight behold thee. know thee among people shall astonished thee: thou shalt terror, never [shalt] thou [be] more. word lord came unto me, saying, son man, set thy face zidon, prophesy it, say, thus saith lord god; behold, [am] thee, zidon; glorified midst thee: shall know [am] lord, shall executed judgments her, shall sanctified her. send pestilence, blood street; wounded shall judged midst sword upon every side; shall know [am] lord. shall pricking brier unto house israel, [any] grieving thorn [that are] round them, despised them; shall know [am] lord god. thus saith lord god; shall gathered house israel people among scattered, shall sanctified sight heathen, shall dwell land given servant jacob. shall dwell safely therein, shall build houses, plant vineyards; yea, shall dwell confidence, executed judgments upon despise round them; shall know [am] lord god. tenth year, tenth [month,]page 499 ezekiel twelfth [day] month, word lord came unto me, saying, son man, set thy face pharaoh king egypt, prophesy him, egypt: speak, say, thus saith lord god; behold, [am] thee, pharaoh king egypt, great dragon lieth midst rivers, hath said, river [is] mine own, made [it] myself. put hooks thy jaws, cause fish thy rivers stick unto thy scales, bring thee midst thy rivers, fish thy rivers shall stick unto thy scales. leave thee [thrown] wilderness, thee fish thy rivers: thou shalt fall upon open fields; thou shalt brought together, gathered: given thee meat beasts field fowls heaven. inhabitants egypt shall know [am] lord, staff reed house israel. took hold thee thy hand, thou didst break, rend shoulder: leaned upon thee, thou brakest, madest loins stand. therefore thus saith lord god; behold, bring sword upon thee, cut man beast thee. land egypt shall desolate waste; shall know [am] lord: hath said, river [is] mine, made [it. ] behold, therefore [am] thee, thy rivers, make land egypt utterly waste [and] desolate, tower syene even unto border ethiopia. foot man shall pass it, foot beast shall pass it, neither shall inhabited forty years. make land egypt desolate midst countries [that are] desolate, cities among cities [that are] laid waste shall desolate forty years: scatter egyptians among nations, disperse countries. yet thus saith lord god; shall know [am] lord. word lord came unto me, saying, son man, prophesy say, thus saith lord god; howl ye, woe worth day day [is] near, even day lord [is] near, cloudy day; shall time heathen. sword shall come upon egypt, great pain shall ethiopia, slain shall fall egypt, shall take away multitude, foundations shall broken down. ethiopia, libya, lydia, mingled people, chub, men land league, shall fall sword. thus saith lord; shall know [am] lord. came pass eleventh year, third [month,] first [day] month, [that] word lord came unto me, saying, son man, speak unto pharaoh king egypt, multitude; art thou like thy greatness? behold, assyrian [was] cedar lebanon fair branches, shadowing shroud, high stature; top among thick boughs. waters made great, deep set high rivers running round plants, sent little rivers unto trees field. therefore height exalted trees field, boughs multiplied, branches became long multitude waters, shot forth. fowls heaven made nests boughs, branches beasts field bring forth young, shadow dwelt great nations. thus fair greatness, length branches: root great waters. cedars garden god could hide him: fir trees like boughs, chesnut trees like branches; tree garden god like unto beauty. made fair multitude branches: trees eden, [were] garden god, envied him. therefore thus saith lord god; thou hast lifted thyself height, hath shot top among thick boughs, heart lifted height; therefore delivered hand mighty one heathen; shall surely deal him: driven wickedness. strangers, terrible nations, cut off, left him: upon mountains valleys branches fallen, boughs broken rivers land; people earth gone shadow, left him. upon ruin shall fowls heaven remain, beasts field shall upon branches: end none trees waters exalt height, neither shoot top among thick boughs, neither trees stand height, drink water: delivered unto death, nether parts earth, midst children men, go pit. thus saith lord god; day went grave caused mourning: covered deep him, restrained floods thereof, great waters stayed: caused lebanon mourn him, trees field fainted him. made nations shake sound fall, cast hell descend pit: trees eden, choice best lebanon, drink water, shall comforted nether parts earth. also went hell unto [them be] slain sword; [is] pharaoh multitude, saith lord god. came pass twelfth year, twelfth month, first [day] month, [that] word lord came unto me, saying, son man, take lamentation pharaoh king egypt, say unto him, thou art like young lion nations, thou [art] whale seas: thou camest forth thy rivers, troubledst waters thy feet, fouledst rivers. thus saith lord god; therefore spread net thee company many people; shall bring thee net. leave thee upon land, cast thee forth upon open field, cause fowls heaven remain upon thee, fill beasts whole earth thee. lay thy flesh upon mountains, fill valleys thy height. also water thy blood land wherein thou swimmest, [even] mountains; rivers shall full thee. shall put thee out, cover heaven, make stars thereof dark; cover sun cloud, moon shall give light. bright lights heaven make dark thee, set darkness upon thy land, saith lord god. also vex hearts many people, shall bring thy destruction among nations, countries thou hast known. yea, make many people amazed thee, kings shall horribly afraid thee, shall brandish sword them; shall tremble [every] moment, every man life, day thy fall. thus saith lord god; sword king babylon shall come upon thee. swords mighty cause thy multitude fall, terrible nations, them: shall spoil pomp egypt, multitude thereof shall destroyed. destroy also beasts thereof beside great waters; neither shall foot man trouble more, hoofs beasts trouble them. make waters deep, cause rivers run like oil, saith lord god. shall make land egypt desolate, country shall destitute whereof full, shall smite dwell therein, shall know [am] lord. [is] lamentation wherewith shall lament her: daughters nations shall lament her: shall lament her, [even] egypt, multitude, saith lord god. came pass also twelfth year, fifteenth day month, [that] word lord came unto me, saying, son man, wail multitude egypt, cast down, [even] her, daughters famous nations, unto nether parts earth, go pit. dost thou pass beauty? go down, thou laid uncircumcised. shall fall midst [them are] slain sword: delivered sword: draw multitudes. strong among mighty shall speak midst hell help him: gone down, lie uncircumcised, slain sword. asshur [is] company: graves [are] him: slain, fallen sword: whose graves set sides pit, company roundpage 501 ezekiel grave: slain, fallen sword, caused terror land living.
