[is] meshech, tubal, multitude: graves [are] round him: uncircumcised, slain sword, though caused terror land living. shall lie mighty [that are] fallen uncircumcised, gone hell weapons war: laid swords heads, iniquities shall upon bones, though [they were] terror mighty land living. yea, thou shalt broken midst uncircumcised, shalt lie [them are] slain sword. [is] edom, kings, princes, might laid [them were] slain sword: shall lie uncircumcised, go pit. [be] princes north, them, zidonians, gone slain; terror ashamed might; lie uncircumcised [them be] slain sword, bear shame go pit. pharaoh shall see them, shall comforted multitude, [even] pharaoh army slain sword, saith lord god. caused terror land living: shall laid midst uncircumcised [them are] slain sword, [even] pharaoh multitude, saith lord god. word lord came unto me, saying, son man, speak children thy people, say unto them, bring sword upon land, people land take man coasts, set watchman: seeth sword come upon land, blow trumpet, warn people; whosoever heareth sound trumpet, taketh warning; sword come, take away, blood shall upon head. heard sound trumpet, took warning; blood shall upon him. taketh warning shall deliver soul. watchman see sword come, blow trumpet, people warned; sword come, take [any] person among them, taken away iniquity; blood require watchman's hand. thou, son man, set thee watchman unto house israel; therefore thou shalt hear word mouth, warn me. say unto wicked, wicked [man,] thou shalt surely die; thou dost speak warn wicked way, wicked [man] shall die iniquity; blood require thine hand. nevertheless, thou warn wicked way turn it; turn way, shall die iniquity; thou hast delivered thy soul. therefore, thou son man, speak unto house israel; thus ye speak, saying, transgressions sins [be] upon us, pine away them, howshould live? say unto them, [as] live, saith lord god, pleasure death wicked; wicked turn way live: turn ye, turn ye evil ways; ye die, house israel? therefore, thou son man, say unto children thy people, righteousness righteous shall deliver day transgression: wickedness wicked, shall fall thereby day turneth wickedness; neither shall righteous able live [righteousness] day sinneth. shall say righteous, [that] shall surely live; trust righteousness, commit iniquity, righteousnesses shall remembered; iniquity hath committed, shall die it. again, say unto wicked, thou shalt surely die; turn sin, lawful right; [if] wicked restore pledge, give robbed, walk statutes life, without committing iniquity; shall surely live, shall die. none sins hath committed shall mentioned unto him: hath done lawful right; shall surely live. yet children thy people say, way lord equal: them, way equal. righteous turneth righteousness, committeth iniquity, shall even die thereby. wicked turn wickedness, lawful right, shall live thereby. yet ye say, way lord equal. ye house israel, judge every one ways. came pass twelfth year captivity, tenth [month,] fifth [day] month, [that] one escaped jerusalem came unto me, saying, city smitten. hand lord upon evening, afore escaped came; opened mouth, came morning; mouth opened, dumb. word lord came unto me, saying, son man, inhabit wastes land israel speak, saying, abraham one, inherited land: [are] many; land given us inheritance. wherefore say unto them, thus saith lord god; ye eat blood, lift eyes toward idols, shed blood: shall ye possess land? ye stand upon sword, ye work abomination, ye defile every one neighbour's wife: shall ye possess land? say thou thus unto them, thus saith lord god; [as] live, surely [are] wastes shall fall sword, [is] open field give beasts devoured, forts caves shall die pestilence. lay land desolate, pomp strength shall cease; mountains israel shall desolate, none shall pass through. shall know [am] lord, laid land desolate abominations committed. also, thou son man, children thy people still talking thee walls doors houses, speak one another, every one brother, saying, come, pray you, hear word cometh forth lord. come unto thee people cometh, sitezekiel page 502 thee people, hear thy words, them: mouth shew much love, [but] heart goeth covetousness. and, lo, thou [art] unto lovely song one hath pleasant voice, play well instrument: hear thy words, not. cometh pass, (lo, come,) shall know prophet hath among them. word lord came unto me, saying, son man, prophesy shepherds israel, prophesy, say unto them, thus saith lord god unto shepherds; woe [be] shepherds israel feed themselves! shepherds feed flocks? ye eat fat, ye clothe wool, ye kill fed: [but] ye feed flock. diseased ye strengthened, neither ye healed sick, neither ye bound [that was] broken, neither ye brought driven away, neither ye sought lost; force cruelty ye ruled them. scattered, [there is] shepherd: became meat beasts field, scattered. sheep wandered mountains, upon every high hill: yea, flock scattered upon face earth, none search seek [after them. ] therefore, ye shepherds, hear word lord; [as] live, saith lord god, surely flock became prey, flock became meat every beast field, [there was] shepherd, neither shepherds search flock, shepherds fed themselves, fed flock; therefore, ye shepherds, hear word lord; thus saith lord god; behold, [am] shepherds; require flock hand, cause cease feeding flock; neither shall shepherds feed more; deliver flock mouth, may meat them. thus saith lord god; behold, i, [even] i, search sheep, seek out. shepherd seeketh flock day among sheep [that are] scattered; seek sheep, deliver places scattered cloudy dark day. bring people, gather countries, bring land, feed upon mountains israel rivers, inhabited places country. feed good pasture, upon high mountains israel shall fold be: shall lie good fold, [in] fat pasture shall feed upon mountains israel. feed flock, cause lie down, saith lord god. seek lost, bring driven away, bind [that was] broken, strengthen sick: destroy fat strong; feed judgment. [as for] you, flock, thus saith lord god; behold, judge cattle cattle, rams goats. [seemeth it] small thing unto eaten good pasture, ye must tread feet residue pastures? drunk deep waters, ye must foul residue feet? [as for] flock, eat ye trodden feet; drink ye fouled feet. therefore thus saith lord god unto them; behold, i, [even] i, judge fat cattle lean cattle. ye thrust side shoulder, pushed diseased horns, till ye scattered abroad; therefore save flock, shall prey; judge cattle cattle. set one shepherd them, shall feed them, [even] servant david; shall feed them, shall shepherd. lord god, servant david prince among them; lord spoken [it. ] make covenant peace, cause evil beasts cease land: shall dwell safely wilderness, sleep woods. make places round hill blessing; cause shower come season; shall showers blessing. tree field shall yield fruit, earth shall yield increase, shall safe land, shall know [am] lord, broken bands yoke, delivered hand served them. shall prey heathen, neither shall beast land devour them; shall dwell safely, none shall make [them] afraid. raise plant renown, shall consumed hunger land, neither bear shame heathen more. thus shall know lord god [am] them, [that] they, [even] house israel, [are] people, saith lord god. ye flock, flock pasture, [are] men, [and] [am] god, saith lord god. moreover word lord came unto me, saying, son man, set thy face mount seir, prophesy it, say unto it, thus saith lord god; behold, mount seir, [am] thee, stretch mine hand thee, make thee desolate. lay thy cities waste, thou shalt desolate, thou shalt know [am] lord. thou hast perpetual hatred, hast shed [the blood of] children israel force sword time calamity, time [that their] iniquity [had] end: therefore, [as] live, saith lord god, prepare thee unto blood, blood shall pursue thee: sith thou hast hated blood, even blood shall pursue thee. thus make mount seir desolate, cut passeth returneth. fill mountains slain [men:] thy hills, thy valleys, thy rivers, shall fall slain sword. make thee perpetual desolations, thy cities shall return: ye shall know [am] lord. thou hast said, two nations two countries shall mine, possess it; whereas lord there: therefore, live, saith lord god, even according thine anger, according thine envy thou hast used thy hatred them; make known among them, judged thee. thou shalt know [am] lord, [and that] heard thy blasphemies thou hast spoken mountains israel, saying, laid desolate, given us consume. thus mouth ye boasted me, multiplied words me: heard [them. ] thus saith lord god; whole earth rejoiceth, make thee desolate. thoupage 503 ezekiel didst rejoice inheritance house israel, desolate, unto thee: thou shalt desolate, mount seir, idumea, [even] it: shall know [am] lord. also, thou son man, prophesy unto mountains israel, say, ye mountains israel, hear word lord: thus saith lord god; enemy hath said you, aha, even ancient high places possession: therefore prophesy say, thus saith lord god; made [you] desolate, swallowed every side, ye might possession unto residue heathen, ye taken lips talkers, [are] infamy people: therefore, ye mountains israel, hear word lord god; thus saith lord god mountains, hills, rivers, valleys, desolate wastes, cities forsaken, became prey derision residue heathen [are] round about; therefore thus saith lord god; surely fire jealousy spoken residue heathen, idumea, appointed land possession joy [their] heart, despiteful minds, cast prey. prophesy therefore concerning land israel, say unto mountains, hills, rivers, valleys, thus saith lord god; behold, spoken jealousy fury, ye borne shame heathen: therefore thus saith lord god; lifted mine hand, surely heathen [are] you, shall bear shame. ye, mountains israel, ye shall shoot forth branches, yield fruit people israel; hand come. for, behold, [am] you, turn unto you, ye shall tilled sown: multiply men upon you, house israel, [even] it: cities shall inhabited, wastes shall builded: multiply upon man beast; shall increase bring fruit: settle old estates, better [unto you] beginnings: ye shall know [am] lord. yea, cause men walk upon you, [even] people israel; shall possess thee, thou shalt inheritance, thou shalt henceforth bereave [of men. ] thus saith lord god; say unto you, thou [land] devourest men, hast bereaved thy nations; therefore thou shalt devour men more, neither bereave thy nations more, saith lord god. neither cause [men] hear thee shame heathen more, neither shalt thou bear reproach people more, neither shalt thou cause thy nations fall more, saith lord god. moreover word lord came unto me, saying, son man, house israel dwelt land, defiled way doings: way uncleanness removed woman. wherefore poured fury upon blood shed upon land, idols [wherewith] polluted it: scattered among heathen, dispersed countries: according way according doings judged them. entered unto heathen, whither went, profaned holy name, said them, [are] people lord, gone forth hisland. pity mine holy name, house israel profaned among heathen, whither went. therefore say unto house israel, thus saith lord god; [this] sakes, house israel, mine holy name's sake, ye profaned among heathen, whither ye went. sanctify great name, profaned among heathen, ye profaned midst them; heathen shall know [am] lord, saith lord god, shall sanctified eyes. take among heathen, gather countries, bring land. sprinkle clean water upon you, ye shall clean: filthiness, idols, cleanse you. new heart also give you, new spirit put within you: take away stony heart flesh, give heart flesh. put spirit within you, cause walk statutes, ye shall keep judgments, [them. ] ye shall dwell land gave fathers; ye shall people, god. also save uncleannesses: call corn, increase it, lay famine upon you. multiply fruit tree, increase field, ye shall receive reproach famine among heathen. shall ye remember evil ways, doings [were] good, shall lothe sight iniquities abominations. sakes [this,] saith lord god, known unto you: ashamed confounded ways, house israel. thus saith lord god; day shall cleansed iniquities also cause [you] dwell cities, wastes shall builded. desolate land shall tilled, whereas lay desolate sight passed by. shall say, land desolate become like garden eden; waste desolate ruined cities [are become] fenced, [and] inhabited. heathen left round shall know lord build ruined [places, and] plant desolate: lord spoken [it,] [it. ] thus saith lord god; yet [for] enquired house israel, [it] them; increase men like flock. holy flock, flock jerusalem solemn feasts; shall waste cities filled flocks men: shall know [am] lord. hand lord upon me, carried spirit lord, set midst valley [was] full bones, caused pass round about: and, behold, [there were] many open valley; and, lo, [they were] dry. said unto me, son man, bones live? answered, lord god, thou knowest. said unto me, prophesy upon bones, say unto them, ye dry bones, hear word lord. thus saith lord god unto bones; behold, cause breath enter you, ye shall live: lay sinews upon you, bring flesh upon you, cover skin, put breath you, ye shall live; ye shall know [am] lord. prophesiedezekiel page 504 commanded: prophesied, noise, behold shaking, bones came together, bone bone. beheld, lo, sinews flesh came upon them, skin covered above: [there ]no breath them. said unto me, prophesy unto wind, prophesy, son man, say wind, thus saith lord god; come four winds, breath, breathe upon slain, may live. prophesied commanded me, breath came them, lived, stood upon feet, exceeding great army. said unto me, son man, bones whole house israel: behold, say, bones dried, hope lost: cut parts. therefore prophesy say unto them, thus saith lord god; behold, take children israel among heathen, whither gone, gather every side, bring land: make one nation land upon mountains israel; one king shall king all: shall two nations, neither shall divided two kingdoms all: neither shall defile idols, detestable things, transgressions: save dwellingplaces, wherein sinned, cleanse them: shall people, god. david servant [shall be] king them; behold [am] thee, gog, chief prince meshech tubal: turn thee back, put hooks thy jaws, bring thee forth, thine army, horses horsemen, clothed sorts [of armour, even] great company [with] bucklers shields, handling swords: persia, ethiopia, libya them; shield helmet: gomer, bands; house togarmah north quarters, bands: [and] many people thee. thou prepared, prepare thyself, thou, thy company assembled unto thee, thou guard unto them. many days thou shalt visited: latter years thou shalt come land [that is] brought back sword, [and is] gathered many people, mountains israel, always waste: brought forth nations, shall dwell safely them. thou shalt ascend come like storm, thou shalt like cloud cover land, thou, thy bands, many people thee. thus saith lord god; shall also come pass, [that] time shall things come thy mind, thou shalt think evil thought: thou shalt say, go land unwalled villages; go rest, dwell safely, dwelling without walls, neither bars gates, take spoil, take prey; and, behold, waters issued threshold house eastward: forefront house [stood toward] east, waters came right side house, south [side] altar. brought way gate northward, led way without unto utter gate way looketh eastward; waters [were] loins. afterward measured thousand; [and was] river could pass over: waters risen, waters swim in, river could passed over. said unto me, son man, hast thou seen [this?] brought me, caused return brink river. returned, behold, bank river [were] many trees one side other. said unto me, waters issue toward east country, go desert, go sea: [which being] brought forth sea, waters shall healed. shall come pass, [that] every thing liveth, moveth, whithersoever rivers shall come, shall live: shall great multitude fish, waters shall come thither: shall healed; every thing shall live whither river cometh. shall come pass, [that] fishers shall stand upon en- gedi even unto en-eglaim; shall [place] spread forth nets; fish shall according kinds, fish great sea, exceeding many. miry places thereof marishes thereof shall healed; shall given salt. river upon bank thereof, side side, shall grow trees meat, whose leaf shall fade, neither shall fruit thereof consumed: shall bring forth new fruit according months, waters issued sanctuary: fruit thereof shall meat, leaf thereof medicine. thus saith lord god; [shall be] border, whereby ye shall inherit land according twelve tribes israel: joseph [shall two] portions. ye shall inherit it, one well another: [concerning] lifted mine hand give unto fathers: land shall fall unto inheritance. [shall be] border land toward north side, great sea, way hethlon, men go zedad; hamath, berothah,page 511 ezekiel sibraim, [is] border damascus border hamath; hazar-hatticon, coast hauran. border sea shall hazar-enan, border damascus, north northward, border hamath. [this is] north side. east side ye shall measure hauran, damascus, gilead, land israel jordan, border unto east sea. [this is] east side. south side southward, tamar [even] waters strife [in] kadesh, river great sea. [this is] south side southward. west side also [shall be] great sea border, till man come hamath. [is] west side. shall ye divide land unto according tribes israel. shall come pass, [that] ye shall divide lot inheritance unto you, strangers sojourn among you, shall beget children among you: shall unto born country among children israel; shall inheritance among tribes israel. shall come pass, [that] tribe stranger sojourneth, shall ye give [him] inheritance, saith lord god. [are] names tribes. north end coast way hethlon, one goeth hamath, hazar-enan, border damascus northward, coast hamath; sides east [and] west; [portion for] dan. border dan, east side unto west side, [portion for] asher. border asher, east side even unto west side, [portion for] naphtali. border naphtali, east side unto west side, [portion for] manasseh. border manasseh, east side unto west side, [portion for] ephraim. border ephraim, east side even unto west side, [portion for] reuben. border reuben, east side unto west side, [portion for] judah. border judah, east side unto west side, shall offering ye shall offer five twenty thousand [reeds in] breadth, [in] length one [other] parts, east side unto west side: sanctuary shall midst it. oblation ye shall offer unto lord [shall be] five twenty thousand length, ten thousand breadth. them, [even] priests, shall [this] holy oblation; toward north five twenty thousand [in length,] toward west ten thousand breadth, toward east ten thousand breadth, toward south five twenty thousand length: sanctuary lord shall midst thereof. [it shall be] priests sanctified sons zadok; kept charge, went astray children israel went astray, levites went astray. [this] oblation land offered shall unto thing holy border levites. border priests levites [shall have] five twenty thousand length, ten thousand breadth: length [shall be] five twenty thousand, breadth ten thousand. shall sell it, neither exchange, alienate firstfruits land: [it is] holy unto lord. five thousand, left breadth five twenty thousand, shall aprofane [place] city, dwelling, suburbs: city shall midst thereof. [shall be] measures thereof; north side four thousand five hundred, south side four thousand five hundred, east side four thousand five hundred, west side four thousand five hundred. suburbs city shall toward north two hundred fifty, toward south two hundred fifty, toward east two hundred fifty, toward west two hundred fifty. residue length oblation holy [portion shall be] ten thousand eastward, ten thousand westward: shall oblation holy [portion;] increase thereof shall food unto serve city. serve city shall serve tribes israel. oblation [shall be] five twenty thousand five twenty thousand: ye shall offer holy oblation foursquare, possession city. residue [shall be] prince, one side holy oblation, possession city, five twenty thousand oblation toward east border, westward five twenty thousand toward west border, portions prince: shall holy oblation; sanctuary house [shall be] midst thereof. moreover possession levites, possession city, [being] midst [of that] prince's, border judah border benjamin, shall prince. rest tribes, east side unto west side, benjamin [shall have] [portion. ] border benjamin, east side unto west side, simeon [shall have] [portion. ] border simeon, east side unto west side, issachar [portion. ] border issachar, east side unto west side, zebulun [portion. ] border zebulun, east side unto west side, gad [portion. ] border gad, south side southward, border shall even tamar [unto] waters strife [in] kadesh, [and] river toward great sea. [is] land ye shall divide lot unto tribes israel inheritance, [are] portions, saith lord god. [are] goings city north side, four thousand five hundred measures. gates city [shall be] names tribes israel: three gates northward; one gate reuben, one gate judah, one gate levi. east side four thousand five hundred: three gates; one gate joseph, one gate benjamin, one gate dan. south side four thousand five hundred measures: three gates; one gate simeon, one gate issachar, one gate zebulun. west side four thousand five hundred, [with] three gates; one gate gad, one gate asher, one gate naphtali. [it was] round eighteen thousand [measures:] name city [that] day [shall be,] lord [is] there.page 513 daniel book daniel third year reign jehoiakim king judah came nebuchadnezzar king babylon unto jerusalem, besieged it. lord gave jehoiakim king judah hand, part vessels house god: carried land shinar house god; brought vessels treasure house god. king spake unto ashpenaz master eunuchs, bring [certain] children israel, king's seed, princes; children [was] blemish, well favoured, skilful wisdom, cunning knowledge, understanding science, [had] ability stand king's palace, might teach learning tongue chaldeans. king appointed daily provision king's meat, wine drank: nourishing three years, end thereof might stand king. among children judah, daniel, hananiah, mishael, azariah: unto prince eunuchs gave names: gave unto daniel [the name] belteshazzar; hananiah, shadrach; mishael, meshach; azariah, abed-nego. daniel purposed heart would defile portion king's meat, wine drank: therefore requested prince eunuchs might defile himself. god brought daniel favour tender love prince eunuchs. prince eunuchs said unto daniel, fear lord king, hath appointed meat drink: see faces worse liking children [are] sort? shall ye make [me] endanger head king. said daniel melzar, prince eunuchs set daniel, hananiah, mishael, azariah, prove thy servants, beseech thee, ten days; let give us pulse eat, water drink. let countenances looked upon thee, countenance children eat portion king's meat: thou seest, deal thy servants. consented matter, proved ten days. end ten days countenances appeared fairer fatter flesh children eat portion king's meat. thus melzar took away portion meat, wine drink; gave pulse. four children, god gave knowledge skill learning wisdom: daniel understanding visions dreams. end days king said bring in, prince eunuchs brought nebuchadnezzar. king communed them; among found none like daniel, hananiah, mishael, azariah: therefore stood king. matters wisdom [and] understanding, king enquired them, found ten times better magicians [and] astrologers [were] realm. daniel continued [even] unto first year king cyrus. second year reign ofnebuchadnezzar nebuchadnezzar dreamed dreams, wherewith spirit troubled, sleep brake him. king commanded call magicians, astrologers, sorcerers, chaldeans, shew king dreams. came stood king. king said unto them, dreamed dream, spirit troubled know dream. spake chaldeans king syriack, king, live ever: tell thy servants dream, shew interpretation. king answered said chaldeans, thing gone me: ye make known unto dream, interpretation thereof, ye shall cut pieces, houses shall made dunghill. ye shew dream, interpretation thereof, ye shall receive gifts rewards great honour: therefore shew dream, interpretation thereof. answered said, let king tell servants dream, shew interpretation it. king answered said, know certainty ye would gain time, ye see thing gone me. ye make known unto dream, [there but] one decree you: ye prepared lying corrupt words speak me, till time changed: therefore tell dream, shall know ye shew interpretation thereof. chaldeans answered king, said, man upon earth shew king's matter: therefore [there is] king, lord, ruler, [that] asked things magician, astrologer, chaldean. [it is] rare thing king requireth, none shew king, except gods, whose dwelling flesh. cause king angry furious, commanded destroy wise [men] babylon. decree went forth wise [men] slain; sought daniel fellows slain. daniel answered counsel wisdom arioch captain king's guard, gone forth slay wise [men] babylon: answered said arioch king's captain, [is] decree [so] hasty king? arioch made thing known daniel. daniel went in, desired king would give time, would shew king interpretation. daniel went house, made thing known hananiah, mishael, azariah, companions: would desire mercies god heaven concerning secret; daniel fellows perish rest wise [men] babylon. secret revealed unto daniel night vision. daniel blessed god heaven. daniel answered said, blessed name god ever ever: wisdom might his: changeth times seasons: removeth kings, setteth kings: giveth wisdom unto wise, knowledge know understanding: revealeth deep secret things: knoweth [is] darkness, light dwelleth him. thank thee, praise thee, thou god fathers, hast given wisdom might, hast made known unto desired thee: thou hast [now] made known unto us king's matter.daniel page 514 therefore daniel went unto arioch, king ordained destroy wise [men] babylon: went said thus unto him; destroy wise [men] babylon: bring king, shew unto king interpretation. arioch brought daniel king haste said thus unto him, found man captives judah, make known unto king interpretation. king answered said daniel, whose name [was] belteshazzar, art thou able make known unto dream seen, interpretation thereof? daniel answered presence king, said, secret king hath demanded cannot wise [men,] astrologers, magicians, soothsayers, shew unto king; god heaven revealeth secrets, maketh known king nebuchadnezzar shall latter days. thy dream, visions thy head upon thy bed, these; thee, king, thy thoughts came [into thy mind] upon thy bed, come pass hereafter: revealeth secrets maketh known thee shall come pass. me, secret revealed [any] wisdom living, [their] sakes shall make known interpretation king, thou mightest know thoughts thy heart. thou, king, sawest, behold great image. great image, whose brightness excellent, stood thee; form thereof [was] terrible. image's head [was] fine gold, breast arms silver, belly thighs brass, legs iron, feet part iron part clay. thou sawest till stone cut without hands, smote image upon feet [that were] iron clay, brake pieces. iron, clay, brass, silver, gold, broken pieces together, became like chaff summer threshingfloors; wind carried away, place found them: stone smote image became great mountain, filled whole earth. [is] dream; tell interpretation thereof king. thou, king, [art] king kings: god heaven hath given thee kingdom, power, strength, glory. wheresoever children men dwell, beasts field fowls heaven hath given thine hand, hath made thee ruler all. thou [art] head gold. thee shall arise another kingdom inferior thee, another third kingdom brass, shall bear rule earth. fourth kingdom shall strong iron: forasmuch iron breaketh pieces subdueth [things:] iron breaketh these, shall break pieces bruise. whereas thou sawest feet toes, part potters' clay, part iron, kingdom shall divided; shall strength iron, forasmuch thou sawest iron mixed miry clay. [as] toes feet [were] part iron, part clay, kingdom shall partly strong, partly broken. whereas thou sawest iron mixed miry clay, shall mingle seed men: shall cleave one another, even iron mixed clay. days kings shall god heaven set kingdom, shall never destroyed: kingdom shall left people, [but] shall break pieces consume kingdoms, shall stand ever. forasmuch thou sawest stone cut mountainwithout hands, brake pieces iron, brass, clay, silver, gold; great god hath made known king shall come pass hereafter: dream certain, interpretation thereof sure. king nebuchadnezzar fell upon face, worshipped daniel, commanded offer oblation sweet odours unto him. king answered unto daniel, said, truth [it is,] god god gods, lord kings, revealer secrets, seeing thou couldst reveal secret. king made daniel great man, gave many great gifts, made ruler whole province babylon, chief governors wise [men] babylon. daniel requested king, set shadrach, meshach, abed-nego, affairs province babylon: daniel [sat] gate king. nebuchadnezzar king made image gold, whose height [was] threescore cubits, [and] breadth thereof six cubits: set plain dura, province babylon. nebuchadnezzar king sent gather together princes, governors, captains, judges, treasurers, counsellors, sheriffs, rulers provinces, come dedication image nebuchadnezzar king set up. princes, governors, captains, judges, treasurers, counsellors, sheriffs, rulers provinces, gathered together unto dedication image nebuchadnezzar king set up; stood image nebuchadnezzar set up. herald cried aloud, commanded, people, nations, languages, [that] time ye hear sound cornet, flute, harp, sackbut, psaltery, dulcimer, kinds musick, ye fall worship golden image nebuchadnezzar king hath set up: whoso falleth worshippeth shall hour cast midst burning fiery furnace. therefore time, people heard sound cornet, flute, harp, sackbut, psaltery, kinds musick, people, nations, languages, fell [and] worshipped golden image nebuchadnezzar king set up. wherefore time certain chaldeans came near, accused jews. spake said king nebuchadnezzar, king, live ever. thou, king, hast made decree, every man shall hear sound cornet, flute, harp, sackbut, psaltery, dulcimer, kinds musick, shall fall worship golden image: whoso falleth worshippeth, [that] cast midst burning fiery furnace. certain jews thou hast set affairs province babylon, shadrach, meshach, abed-nego; men, king, regarded thee: serve thy gods, worship golden image thou hast set up. nebuchadnezzar [his] rage fury commanded bring shadrach, meshach, abed-nego. brought men king. nebuchadnezzar spake said unto them, [is it] true, shadrach, meshach, abed-nego, ye serve gods, worship golden image set up? ye ready time ye hear sound cornet, flute, harp, sackbut, psaltery, dulcimer, kinds musick, ye fall worshippage 515 daniel image made; [well:] ye worship not, ye shall cast hour midst burning fiery furnace; [is] god shall deliver hands? shadrach, meshach, abed- nego, answered said king, nebuchadnezzar, [are] careful answer thee matter. [so,] god serve able deliver us burning fiery furnace, deliver [us] thine hand, king. not, known unto thee, king, serve thy gods, worship golden image thou hast set up. nebuchadnezzar full fury, form visage changed shadrach, meshach, abed-nego: [therefore] spake, commanded heat furnace one seven times wont heated. commanded mighty men [were] army bind shadrach, meshach, abed-nego, [and] cast [them] burning fiery furnace. men bound coats, hosen, hats, [other] garments, cast midst burning fiery furnace. therefore king's commandment urgent, furnace exceeding hot, flame fire slew men took shadrach, meshach, abed- nego. three men, shadrach, meshach, abed-nego, fell bound midst burning fiery furnace. nebuchadnezzar king astonied, rose haste, [and] spake, said unto counsellors, cast three men bound midst fire? answered said unto king, true, king. answered said, lo, see four men loose, walking midst fire, hurt; form fourth like son god. nebuchadnezzar came near mouth burning fiery furnace, [and] spake, said, shadrach, meshach, abed-nego, ye servants high god, come forth, come [hither.] shadrach, meshach, abed-nego, came forth midst fire. princes, governors, captains, king's counsellors, gathered together, saw men, upon whose bodies fire power, hair head singed, neither coats changed, smell fire passed them. [then] nebuchadnezzar spake, said, blessed [be] god shadrach, meshach, abed-nego, hath sent angel, delivered servants trusted him, changed king's word, yielded bodies, might serve worship god, except god. therefore make decree, every people, nation, language, speak thing amiss god shadrach, meshach, abed-nego, shall cut pieces, houses shall made dunghill: god deliver sort. king promoted shadrach, meshach, abed-nego, province babylon. nebuchadnezzar king, unto people, nations, languages, dwell earth; peace multiplied unto you. thought good shew signs wonders high god hath wrought toward me. great [are] signs! mighty [are] wonders! kingdom [is] everlasting kingdom, dominion [is] generation generation. nebuchadnezzar rest mine house, flourishing palace: saw dream mademe afraid, thoughts upon bed visions head troubled me. therefore made decree bring wise [men] babylon me, might make known unto interpretation dream. came magicians, astrologers, chaldeans, soothsayers: told dream them; make known unto interpretation thereof. last daniel came me, whose name [was] belteshazzar, according name god, spirit holy gods: told dream, [saying, ] belteshazzar, master magicians, know spirit holy gods [is] thee, secret troubleth thee, tell visions dream seen, interpretation thereof. thus [were] visions mine head bed; saw, behold tree midst earth, height thereof [was] great. tree grew, strong, height thereof reached unto heaven, sight thereof end earth: leaves thereof [were] fair, fruit thereof much, [was] meat all: beasts field shadow it, fowls heaven dwelt boughs thereof, flesh fed it. saw visions head upon bed, and, behold, watcher holy one came heaven; cried aloud, said thus, hew tree, cut branches, shake leaves, scatter fruit: let beasts get away it, fowls branches: nevertheless leave stump roots earth, even band iron brass, tender grass field; let wet dew heaven, [let] portion [be] beasts grass earth: let heart changed man's, let beast's heart given unto him; let seven times pass him. matter [is] decree watchers, demand word holy ones: intent living may know high ruleth kingdom men, giveth whomsoever will, setteth basest men. dream king nebuchadnezzar seen. thou, belteshazzar, declare interpretation thereof, forasmuch wise [men] kingdom able make known unto interpretation: thou [art] able; spirit holy gods [is] thee. daniel, whose name [was] belteshazzar, astonied one hour, thoughts troubled him. king spake, said, belteshazzar, let dream, interpretation thereof, trouble thee. belteshazzar answered said, lord, dream [be] hate thee, interpretation thereof thine enemies. tree thou sawest, grew, strong, whose height reached unto heaven, sight thereof earth; whose leaves [were] fair, fruit thereof much, [was] meat all; beasts field dwelt, upon whose branches fowls heaven habitation: [is] thou, king, art grown become strong: thy greatness grown, reacheth unto heaven, thy dominion end earth. whereas king saw watcher holy one coming heaven, saying, hew tree down, destroy it; yet leave stump roots thereof earth, even band iron brass, tender grass field; let wet dew heaven, [let] portion [be] beasts field, till seven times pass him; [is] interpretation, king, [is] decreedaniel page 516 high, come upon lord king: shall drive thee men, thy dwelling shall beasts field, shall make thee eat grass oxen, shall wet thee dew heaven, seven times shall pass thee, till thou know high ruleth kingdom men, giveth whomsoever will. whereas commanded leave stump tree roots; thy kingdom shall sure unto thee, thou shalt known heavens rule. wherefore, king, let counsel acceptable unto thee, break thy sins righteousness, thine iniquities shewing mercy poor; may lengthening thy tranquility. came upon king nebuchadnezzar. end twelve months walked palace kingdom babylon. king spake, said, great babylon, built house kingdom might power, honour majesty? word [was] king's mouth, fell voice heaven, [saying,] king nebuchadnezzar, thee spoken; kingdom departed thee. shall drive thee men, thy dwelling [shall be] beasts field: shall make thee eat grass oxen, seven times shall pass thee, thou know high ruleth kingdom men, giveth whomsoever will. hour thing fulfilled upon nebuchadnezzar: driven men, eat grass oxen, body wet dew heaven, till hairs grown like eagles [feathers,] nails like birds' [claws. ] end days nebuchadnezzar lifted mine eyes unto heaven, mine understanding returned unto me, blessed high, praised honoured liveth ever, whose dominion [is] everlasting dominion, kingdom [is] generation generation: inhabitants earth [are] reputed nothing: doeth according army heaven, [among] inhabitants earth: none stay hand, say unto him, doest thou? time reason returned unto me; glory kingdom, mine honour brightness returned unto me; counsellors lords sought unto me; established kingdom, excellent majesty added unto me. nebuchadnezzar praise extol honour king heaven, whose works [are] truth, ways judgment: walk pride able abase. belshazzar king made great feast thousand lords, drank wine thousand. belshazzar, whiles tasted wine, commanded bring golden silver vessels father nebuchadnezzar taken temple [was] jerusalem; king, princes, wives, concubines, might drink therein. brought golden vessels taken temple house god [was] jerusalem; king, princes, wives, concubines, drank them. drank wine, praised gods gold, silver, brass, iron, wood, stone. hour came forth fingers man's hand, wrote candlestick upon plaister wall king's palace: king saw part hand wrote. king's countenance changed, thoughts troubled him, sothat joints loins loosed, knees smote one another. king cried aloud bring astrologers, chaldeans, soothsayers. [and] king spake, said wise [men] babylon, whosoever shall read writing, shew interpretation thereof, shall clothed scarlet, [have] chain gold neck, shall third ruler kingdom. came king's wise [men:] could read writing, make known king interpretation thereof. king belshazzar greatly troubled, countenance changed him, lords astonied. [now] queen, reason words king lords, came banquet house: [and] queen spake said, king, live ever: let thy thoughts trouble thee, let thy countenance changed: man thy kingdom, [is] spirit holy gods; days thy father light understanding wisdom, like wisdom gods, found him; king nebuchadnezzar thy father, king, [i say,] thy father, made master magicians, astrologers, chaldeans, [and] soothsayers; forasmuch excellent spirit, knowledge, understanding, interpreting dreams, shewing hard sentences, dissolving doubts, found daniel, king named belteshazzar: let daniel called, shew interpretation. daniel brought king. [and] king spake said unto daniel, [art] thou daniel, [art] children captivity judah, king father brought jewry? even heard thee, spirit gods [is] thee, [that] light understanding excellent wisdom found thee. wise [men,] astrologers, brought me, read writing, make known unto interpretation thereof: could shew interpretation thing: heard thee, thou canst make interpretations, dissolve doubts: thou canst read writing, make known interpretation thereof, thou shalt clothed scarlet, [have] chain gold thy neck, shalt third ruler kingdom. daniel answered said king, let thy gifts thyself, give thy rewards another; yet read writing unto king, make known interpretation. thou king, high god gave nebuchadnezzar thy father kingdom, majesty, glory, honour: majesty gave him, people, nations, languages, trembled feared him: would slew; would kept alive; would set up; would put down. heart lifted up, mind hardened pride, deposed kingly throne, took glory him: driven sons men; heart made like beasts, dwelling [was] wild asses: fed grass like oxen, body wet dew heaven; till knew high god ruled kingdom men, [that] appointeth whomsoever will. thou son, belshazzar, hast humbled thine heart, though thou knewest this; hast lifted thyself lord heaven; brought vessels house thee, thou, thy lords, thy wives, thy concubines, drunk wine them; thou hast praised gods silver, gold, brass,page 517 daniel iron, wood, stone, see not, hear, know: god whose hand thy breath [is,] whose [are] thy ways, hast thou glorified: part hand sent him; writing written. [is] writing written, mene, mene, tekel, upharsin. [is] interpretation thing: mene; god hath numbered thy kingdom, finished it. tekel; thou art weighed balances, art found wanting. peres; thy kingdom divided, given medes persians. commanded belshazzar, clothed daniel scarlet, [put] chain gold neck, made proclamation concerning him, third ruler kingdom. night belshazzar king chaldeans slain. darius median took kingdom, [being] threescore two years old. pleased darius set kingdom hundred twenty princes, whole kingdom; three presidents; daniel [was] first: princes might give accounts unto them, king damage. daniel preferred presidents princes, excellent spirit [was] him; king thought set whole realm. presidents princes sought find occasion daniel concerning kingdom; could find none occasion fault; forasmuch [was] faithful, neither error fault found him. said men, shall find occasion daniel, except find [it] concerning law god. presidents princes assembled together king, said thus unto him, king darius, live ever. presidents kingdom, governors, princes, counsellors, captains, consulted together establish royal statute, make firm decree, whosoever shall ask petition god man thirty days, save thee, king, shall cast den lions. now, king, establish decree, sign writing, changed, according law medes persians, altereth not. wherefore king darius signed writing decree. daniel knew writing signed, went house; windows open chamber toward jerusalem, kneeled upon knees three times day, prayed, gave thanks god, aforetime. men assembled, found daniel praying making supplication god. came near, spake king concerning king's decree; hast thou signed decree, every man shall ask [a petition] god man within thirty days, save thee, king, shall cast den lions? king answered said, thing true, according law medes persians, altereth not. answered said king, daniel, [is] children captivity judah, regardeth thee, king, decree thou hast signed, maketh petition three times day. king, heard [these] words, sore displeased himself, set [his] heart daniel deliver him: laboured till going sun deliver him. men assembled unto king, saidunto king, know, king, law medes persians [is,] decree statute king establisheth may changed. king commanded, brought daniel, cast [him] den lions. [now] king spake said unto daniel, thy god thou servest continually, deliver thee. stone brought laid upon mouth den; king sealed signet, signet lords; purpose might changed concerning daniel. king went palace, passed night fasting: neither instruments musick brought him: sleep went him. king arose early morning, went haste unto den lions. came den, cried lamentable voice unto daniel: [and] king spake said daniel, daniel, servant living god, thy god, thou servest continually, able deliver thee lions? said daniel unto king, king, live ever. god hath sent angel, hath shut lions mouths, hurt me: forasmuch innocency found me; also thee, king, done hurt. king exceeding glad him, commanded take daniel den. daniel taken den, manner hurt found upon him, believed god. king commanded, brought men accused daniel, cast [them] den lions, them, children, wives; lions mastery them, brake bones pieces ever came bottom den. king darius wrote unto people, nations, languages, dwell earth; peace multiplied unto you. make decree, every dominion kingdom men tremble fear god daniel: living god, stedfast ever, kingdom [that] shall destroyed, dominion [shall even] unto end. delivereth rescueth, worketh signs wonders heaven earth, hath delivered daniel power lions. daniel prospered reign darius, reign cyrus persian. first year belshazzar king babylon daniel dream visions head upon bed: wrote dream, [and] told sum matters. daniel spake said, saw vision night, and, behold, four winds heaven strove upon great sea. four great beasts came sea, diverse one another. first [was] like lion, eagle's wings: beheld till wings thereof plucked, lifted earth, made stand upon feet man, man's heart given it. behold another beast, second, like bear, raised one side, [it had] three ribs mouth teeth it: said thus unto it, arise, devour much flesh. beheld, lo another, like leopard, upon back four wings fowl; beast also four heads; dominion given it. saw night visions, behold fourth beast, dreadful terrible, strong exceedingly; great iron teeth: devoured brake pieces, stamped residue feet it: [was] diverse beasts [were] it; ten horns. considered horns, and,daniel page 518 behold, came among another little horn, three first horns plucked roots: and, behold, horn [were] eyes like eyes man, mouth speaking great things. beheld till thrones cast down, ancient days sit, whose garment [was] white snow, hair head like pure wool: throne [was like] fiery flame, [and] wheels [as] burning fire. fiery stream issued came forth him: thousand thousands ministered unto him, ten thousand times ten thousand stood him: judgment set, books opened. beheld voice great words horn spake: beheld [even] till beast slain, body destroyed, given burning flame. concerning rest beasts, dominion taken away: yet lives prolonged season time. saw night visions, and, behold, [one] like son man came clouds heaven, came ancient days, brought near him. given dominion, glory, kingdom, people, nations, languages, serve him: dominion [is] everlasting dominion, shall pass away, kingdom [that] shall destroyed. daniel grieved spirit midst [my] body, visions head troubled me. came near unto one stood by, asked truth this. told me, made know interpretation things. great beasts, four, [are] four kings, [which] shall arise earth. saints high shall take kingdom, possess kingdom ever, even ever ever. would know truth fourth beast, diverse others, exceeding dreadful, whose teeth [were of] iron, nails [of] brass; [which] devoured, brake pieces, stamped residue feet; ten horns [were] head, [of] came up, three fell; even [of] horn eyes, mouth spake great things, whose look [was] stout fellows. beheld, horn made war saints, prevailed them; ancient days came, judgment given saints high; time came saints possessed kingdom. thus said, fourth beast shall fourth kingdom upon earth, shall diverse kingdoms, shall devour whole earth, shall tread down, break pieces. ten horns kingdom [are] ten kings [that] shall arise: another shall rise them; shall diverse first, shall subdue three kings. shall speak [great] words high, shall wear saints high, think change times laws: shall given hand time times dividing time. judgment shall sit, shall take away dominion, consume destroy [it] unto end. kingdom dominion, greatness kingdom whole heaven, shall given people saints high, whose kingdom [is] everlasting kingdom, dominions shall serve obey him. hitherto [is] end matter. daniel, cogitations much troubled me, countenance changed me: kept matter heart. third year reign king belshazzar vision appeared unto me, [even unto] daniel, appeared unto first. saw vision; came pass, saw, [was] shushan [in] palace, [is] province elam; saw vision, river ulai. lifted mine eyes, saw, and, behold, stood river ram [two] horns: [two] horns [were] high; one [was] higher other, higher came last. saw ram pushing westward, northward, southward; [that am] lord thy god land egypt yet make thee dwell tabernacles, days solemn feast. also spoken prophets, multiplied visions, used similitudes, ministry prophets. thy judges thou saidst, give king princes? gave thee king mine anger, took [him] away wrath. iniquity ephraim [is] bound up; sin [is] hid. sorrows travailing woman shall come upon him: [is] unwise son; stay long [the place of] breaking forth children. ransom power grave; redeem death: death, thy plagues; grave, thy destruction: repentance shall hid mine eyes. though fruitful among [his] brethren, east wind shall come, wind lord shall come wilderness, spring shall become dry, fountain shall dried up: shall spoil treasure pleasant vessels. samaria shall become desolate; hath rebelled god: shall fall sword: infants shall dashed pieces, women child shall ripped up. israel, return unto lord thy god; thou hast fallen thine iniquity. take words, turn lord: say unto him, take away iniquity, receive [us] graciously: render calves lips. asshur shall save us; ride upon horses: neither say work hands, [ye are] gods: thee fatherless findeth mercy. heal backsliding, love freely: mine anger turned away him. dew unto israel: shall grow lily, cast forth roots lebanon. branches shall spread, beauty shall olive tree, smell lebanon. dwell shadow shall return; shall revive [as] corn, grow vine: scent thereof [shall be] wine lebanon. ephraim [shall say,] idols? heard [him,] observed him: [am] like green fir tree. thy fruit found. lay, fast asleep. shipmaster came him, said unto him, meanest thou, sleeper? arise, call upon thy god, god think upon us, perish not. said every one fellow, come, let us cast lots, may know whose cause evil [is] upon us. cast lots, lot fell upon jonah. said unto him, tell us, pray thee, whose cause evil [is] upon us; god repented evil, said would unto them; [it] not. displeased jonah exceedingly, angry. prayed unto lord, said, pray thee, lord, [was] saying, yet country? therefore fled unto tarshish: knew thou [art] gracious god, merciful, slow anger, great kindness, repentest thee evil. therefore now, lord, take, beseech thee, life me; [it is] better die live. said lord, doest thou well angry? jonah went city, sat east side city, made booth, sat shadow, till might see would become city. lord god prepared gourd, made [it] come jonah, might shadow head, deliver grief. jonah exceeding glad gourd. god prepared worm morning rose next day, smote gourd withered. came pass, sun arise, god prepared vehement east wind; hearken, earth, therein is: let lord god witness you, lord holy temple. for, behold, lord cometh forth place, come down, tread upon high places earth. mountains shall molten him, valleys shall cleft, wax fire, [and] waters [that are] poured steep place. transgression jacob [is] this, sins house israel. [is] transgression jacob? [is it] samaria? [are] high places judah? [are they] jerusalem? therefore make samaria heap field, [and] plantings vineyard: pour stones thereof valley, discover foundations thereof. graven images thereof shall beaten pieces, hires thereof shall burned fire, idols thereof lay desolate: gathered [it] hire harlot, shall return hire harlot. therefore wail howl, go stripped naked: make wailing like dragons, mourning owls. wound [is] incurable; come unto judah; come unto gate people, [even] jerusalem. declare ye [it] gath, weep ye all: house aphrah roll thyself dust. pass ye away, thou inhabitant saphir, thy shame naked: inhabitant zaanan came forth mourning beth-ezel; shall receive standing. inhabitant maroth waited carefully good: evil came lord unto gate jerusalem. thou inhabitant lachish, bind chariot swift beast: [is] beginning sin daughter zion: transgressions israel found thee. therefore shalt thou give presents moresheth- gath: houses achzib [shall be] lie kings israel. yet bring heir unto thee, inhabitant mareshah: shall come unto adullam glory israel. make thee bald, poll thee thy delicate children; enlarge thy baldness eagle; gone captivity thee. woe devise iniquity, work evil upon beds! morning light, practise it, power hand. covet fields, take [them] violence; houses, take [them] away: oppress man house, even man heritage. therefore thus saith lord; behold, family devise evil, ye shall remove necks; neither shall ye go haughtily: time [is] evil. day shall [one] take parable you, lament doleful lamentation, [and] say, utterly spoiled: hath changed portion people: hath removed [it] me! turning away hath divided fields. therefore thou shalt none shall cast cord lot congregation lord. prophesy ye not, [say that] prophesy: shall prophesy them, [that] shall take shame. [thou art] named house jacob, spirit lord straitened? [are] doings? words good walketh uprightly? even late people risen enemy: ye pull robe garment pass securely men averse war. women people ye cast pleasant houses; children ye taken away glory ever. arise ye, depart; [is] [your] rest: polluted, shall destroy [you,] even sore destruction. man walking spirit falsehood lie, [saying,] prophesy unto thee wine strong drink; shall even prophet people. surely assemble, jacob, thee; surely gather remnant israel; put together sheep bozrah, flock midst fold: shall make great noise reason [the multitude of] men. breaker come them: broken up, passed gate, gone it: king shall pass them, lord head them. said, hear, pray you, heads jacob, ye princes house israel; [is it] know judgment? hate good, love evil; pluck skin them, flesh bones; also eat flesh people, flay skin them; break bones, chop pieces, pot, flesh within caldron. shall cry unto lord, hear them: even hide face time, behaved ill doings. thus saith lord concerning prophets make people err, bite teeth, cry, peace; putteth mouths, even prepare war him. therefore night [shall be] unto you, ye shall vision; shall dark unto you, ye shall divine; sun shall go prophets, day shall dark them. shall seers ashamed, diviners confounded: yea, shall cover lips; [there is] answer god. truly full power spirit lord, judgment, might, declare unto jacob transgression, israel sin. hear this, pray you, ye heads house jacob, princes house israel, abhor judgment, pervert equity. build zion blood, jerusalem iniquity. heads thereof judge reward, priests thereof teach hire, prophets thereof divine money: yet lean upon lord, say, [is] lord among us? none evil come upon us. therefore shall zion sake plowed [as] field, jerusalem shall become heaps, mountain house high places forest. last days shall come pass, [that] mountain house lord shall established top mountains, shall exalted hills; people shall flow unto it. many nations shall come, say, come, let us go mountain lord, house god jacob; teach us ways, walk paths:micah page 538 law shall go forth zion, word lord jerusalem. shall judge among many people, rebuke strong nations afar off; shall beat swords plowshares, spears pruninghooks: nation shall lift sword nation, neither shall learn war more. shall sit every man vine fig tree; none shall make [them] afraid: mouth lord hosts hath spoken [it. ] people walk every one name god, walk name lord god ever ever. day, saith lord, assemble halteth, gather driven out, afflicted; make halted remnant, cast far strong nation: lord shall reign mount zion henceforth, even ever. thou, tower flock, strong hold daughter zion, unto thee shall come, even first dominion; kingdom shall come daughter jerusalem. dost thou cry aloud? [is there] king thee? thy counsellor perished? pangs taken thee woman travail. pain, labour bring forth, daughter zion, like woman travail: shalt thou go forth city, thou shalt dwell field, thou shalt go [even] babylon; shalt thou delivered; lord shall redeem thee hand thine enemies. also many nations gathered thee, say, let defiled, let eye look upon zion. know thoughts lord, neither understand counsel: shall gather sheaves floor. arise thresh, daughter zion: make thine horn iron, make thy hoofs brass: thou shalt beat pieces many people: consecrate gain unto lord, substance unto lord whole earth. gather thyself troops, daughter troops: hath laid siege us: shall smite judge israel rod upon cheek. thou, bethlehem ephratah, [though] thou little among thousands judah, [yet] thee shall come forth unto [that is] ruler israel; whose goings forth [have been] old, everlasting. therefore give up, time [that] travaileth hath brought forth: remnant brethren shall return unto children israel. shall stand feed strength lord, majesty name lord god; shall abide: shall great unto ends earth. [man] shall peace, assyrian shall come land: shall tread palaces, shall raise seven shepherds, eight principal men. shall waste land assyria sword, land nimrod entrances thereof: thus shall deliver [us] assyrian, cometh land, treadeth within borders. remnant jacob shall midst many people dew lord, showers upon grass, tarrieth man, waiteth sons men. remnant jacob shall among gentiles midst many people lion among thebeasts forest, young lion among flocks sheep: who, go through, treadeth down, teareth pieces, none deliver. thine hand shall lifted upon thine adversaries, thine enemies shall cut off. shall come pass day, saith lord, cut thy horses midst thee, destroy thy chariots: cut cities thy land, throw thy strong holds: cut witchcrafts thine hand; thou shalt [more] soothsayers: thy graven images also cut off, thy standing images midst thee; thou shalt worship work thine hands. pluck thy groves midst thee: destroy thy cities. execute vengeance anger fury upon heathen, heard. hear ye lord saith; arise, contend thou mountains, let hills hear thy voice. hear ye, mountains, lord's controversy, ye strong foundations earth: lord hath controversy people, plead israel. people, done unto thee? wherein wearied thee? testify me. brought thee land egypt, redeemed thee house servants; sent thee moses, aaron, miriam. people, remember balak king moab consulted, balaam son beor answered shittim unto gilgal; ye may know righteousness lord. wherewith shall come lord, [and] bow high god? shall come burnt offerings, calves year old? lord pleased thousands rams, [or] ten thousands rivers oil? shall give firstborn [for] transgression, fruit body [for] sin soul? hath shewed thee, man, [is] good; doth lord require thee, justly, love mercy, walk humbly thy god? lord's voice crieth unto city, [the man of] wisdom shall see thy name: hear ye rod, hath appointed it. yet treasures wickedness house wicked, scant measure [that is] abominable? shall count [them] pure wicked balances, bag deceitful weights? [she is] mine enemy shall see [it,] shame shall cover said unto me, lord thy god? mine eyes shall behold her: shall trodden mire streets. [in] day thy walls built, [in] day shall decree far removed. [in] day [also] shall come even thee assyria, [from] fortified cities, fortress even river, sea sea, [from] mountain mountain. notwithstanding land shall desolate dwell therein, fruit doings. feed thy people thy rod, flock thine heritage, dwell solitarily [in] wood, midst carmel: let feed [in] bashan gilead, days old. according days thy coming land egypt shew unto marvellous [things. ] nations shall see confounded might: shall lay [their] hand upon [their] mouth, ears shall deaf. shall lick dust like serpent, shall move holes like worms earth: shall afraid lord god, shall fear thee. [is] god like unto thee, pardoneth iniquity, passeth transgression remnant heritage? retaineth anger ever, delighteth [in] mercy. turn again, compassion upon us; subdue iniquities; thou wilt cast sins depths sea. thou wilt perform truth jacob, [and] mercy abraham, thou hast sworn unto fathers days old.page 541 nahum nahum burden nineveh. book vision nahum elkoshite. god [is] jealous, lord revengeth; lord revengeth, [is] furious; lord take vengeance adversaries, reserveth [wrath] enemies. lord [is] slow anger, great power, acquit [the wicked:] lord hath way whirlwind storm, clouds [are] dust feet. rebuketh sea, maketh dry, drieth rivers: bashan languisheth, carmel, flower lebanon languisheth. mountains quake him, hills melt, earth burned presence, yea, world, dwell therein. stand indignation? abide fierceness anger? fury poured like fire, rocks thrown him. lord [is] good, strong hold day trouble; knoweth trust him. overrunning flood make utter end place thereof, darkness shall pursue enemies. ye imagine lord? make utter end: affliction shall rise second time. [one] come thee, imagineth evil lord, wicked counsellor. thus saith lord: though [they be] quiet, likewise many, yet thus shall cut down, shall pass through. though afflicted thee, afflict thee more. break yoke thee, burst thy bonds sunder. lord hath given commandment concerning thee, [that] thy name sown: house thy gods cut graven image molten image: make thy grave; thou art vile. behold upon mountains feet bringeth good tidings, publisheth peace! judah, keep thy solemn feasts, perform thy vows: wicked shall pass thee; utterly cut off. dasheth pieces come thy face: keep munition, watch way, make [thy] loins strong, fortify [thy] power mightily. lord hath turned away excellency jacob, excellency israel: emptiers emptied out, marred vine branches. shield mighty men made red, valiant men [are] scarlet: chariots [shall be] flaming torches day preparation, fir trees shall terribly shaken. chariots shall rage streets, shall justle one another broad ways: shall seem like torches, shall run like lightnings. shall recount worthies: shall stumble walk; shall make haste wall thereof, defence shall prepared. gates rivers shall opened, palace shall dissolved. huzzab shall led away captive, shall brought up, maids shall lead [her] voice doves, tabering upon breasts. nineveh old like pool water: yet shall flee away. stand, stand, [shall cry;] none shall look back. take ye spoil silver, take spoil gold: [there is] none end store [and] glory pleasant furniture. empty, void, waste: heart melteth, knees smite together, much pain [is] loins, faces gather blackness. where[is] dwelling lions, feeding place young lions, lion, [even] old lion, walked, [and] lion's whelp, none made [them] afraid? lion tear pieces enough whelps, strangled lionesses, filled holes prey, dens ravin. behold, [am] thee, saith lord hosts, burn chariots smoke, sword shall devour thy young lions: cut thy prey earth, voice thy messengers shall heard. woe bloody city! full lies [and] robbery; prey departeth not; noise whip, noise rattling wheels, pransing horses, jumping chariots. horseman lifteth bright sword glittering spear: [there is] multitude slain, great number carcases; [there is] none end [their] corpses; stumble upon corpses: multitude whoredoms wellfavoured harlot, mistress witchcrafts, selleth nations whoredoms, families witchcrafts. behold, [am] thee, saith lord hosts; discover thy skirts upon thy face, shew nations thy nakedness, kingdoms thy shame. cast abominable filth upon thee, make thee vile, set thee gazingstock. shall come pass, [that] look upon thee shall flee thee, say, nineveh laid waste: bemoan her?
