prophets, live ever? words statutes, commanded servants prophets, take hold fathers? returned said, like lord hosts thought unto us, according ways, according doings, hath dealt us. upon four twentieth day eleventh month, [is] month sebat, second year darius, came word lord unto zechariah, son berechiah, son iddo prophet, saying, saw night, behold man riding upon red horse, stood among myrtle trees [were] bottom; behind [were there] red horses, speckled, white. said i, lord, [are] these? angel talked said unto me, shew thee [be. ] man stood among myrtle trees answered said, [are they] lord hath sent walk fro earth. answered angel lord stood among myrtle trees, said, walked fro earth, and, behold, earth sitteth still, rest. angel lord answered said, lord hosts, long wilt thou mercy jerusalem cities judah, thou hast indignation threescore ten years? lord answered angel talked [with] good words [and] comfortable words. angel communed said unto me, cry thou, saying, thus saith lord hosts; jealous jerusalem zion great jealousy. sore displeased heathen [that are] ease: little displeased, helped forward affliction. therefore thus saith lord; returned jerusalem mercies: house shall built it, saith lord hosts, line shall stretched forth upon jerusalem. cry yet, saying, thus saith lord hosts; cities prosperity shall yet spread abroad; lord shall yet comfort zion, shall yet choose jerusalem. lifted mine eyes, saw, behold four horns. said unto angel talked me, [be] these? answered me, [are] horns scattered judah, israel, jerusalem. said i, come do? spake, saying, [are] horns scattered judah, man lift head: come fray them, cast horns gentiles, lifted [their] horn land judah scatter it. lifted mine eyes again, looked, behold man measuring line hand. said i, whither goest thou? said unto me, measure jerusalem, see [is] breadth thereof, [is] length thereof. and, behold, angel talked went forth, another angel went meet him, said unto him, run, speak young man, saying, jerusalem shall inhabited [as] towns without walls multitude men cattle therein: i, saith lord, unto wall fire round about, glory midst her. ho, ho, [come forth,] flee land north, saith lord: spread abroad four winds heaven, saith lord. deliver thyself, zion, dwellest [with] daughter babylon. thus saith lord hosts; glory hath sent unto nations spoiled you: toucheth toucheth apple eye. for, behold, shake mine hand upon them, shall spoil servants: ye shall know lord hosts hath sent me. sing rejoice, daughter zion: for, lo, come, dwell midst thee, saith lord. many nations shall joined lord day, shall people: dwell midst thee, thou shalt know lord hosts hath sent unto thee. lord shall inherit judah portion holy land, shall choose jerusalem again. silent, flesh, lord: raised holy habitation. shewed joshua high priest standing angel lord, satan standing right hand resist him. lord said unto satan, lord rebuke thee, satan; even lord hath chosen jerusalem rebuke thee: [is] brand plucked fire? joshua clothed filthy garments, stood angel. answered spake unto stood him, saying, take away filthy garments him. unto said, behold, caused thine iniquity pass thee, clothe thee change raiment. said, let set fair mitre upon head. set fair mitre upon head, clothed garments. angel lord stood by. angel lord protested unto joshua, saying, thus saith lord hosts; thou wilt walk ways, thou wilt keep charge, thou shalt also judge house, shalt also keep courts, give thee places walk among stand by. hear now, joshua high priest, thou, thy fellows sit thee: [are] men wondered at: for, behold, bring forth servant branch. behold stone laid joshua; upon one stone [shall be] seven eyes: behold, engrave graving thereof, saith lord hosts, remove iniquity land one day. day, saith lord hosts, shall ye call every man neighbour vine fig tree. angel talked came again, waked me, man wakened sleep, said unto me, seest thou? said, looked, behold candlestick [of] gold, bowl upon top it, seven lamps thereon, seven pipes seven lamps, [are] upon top thereof: two olive trees it, one upon right [side]zechariah page 550 bowl, upon left [side] thereof. answered spake angel talked me, saying, [are] these, lord? angel talked answered said unto me, knowest thou be? said, no, lord. answered spake unto me, saying, [is] word lord unto zerubbabel, saying, might, power, spirit, saith lord hosts. [art] thou, great mountain? zerubbabel [thou shalt become] plain: shall bring forth headstone [thereof with] shoutings, [crying,] grace, grace unto it. moreover word lord came unto me, saying, hands zerubbabel laid foundation house; hands shall also finish it; thou shalt know lord hosts hath sent unto you. hath despised day small things? shall rejoice, shall see plummet hand zerubbabel [with] seven; [are] eyes lord, run fro whole earth. answered i, said unto him, [are] two olive trees upon right [side] candlestick upon left [side] thereof? answered again, said unto him, [be these] two olive branches two golden pipes empty golden [oil] themselves? answered said, knowest thou [be?] said, no, lord. said he, [are] two anointed ones, stand lord whole earth. turned, lifted mine eyes, looked, behold flying roll. said unto me, seest thou? answered, see flying roll; length thereof [is] twenty cubits, breadth thereof ten cubits. said unto me, [is] curse goeth forth face whole earth: every one stealeth shall cut [as] side according it; every one sweareth shall cut [as] side according it. bring forth, saith lord hosts, shall enter house thief, house sweareth falsely name: shall remain midst house, shall consume timber thereof stones thereof. angel talked went forth, said unto me, lift thine eyes, see [is] goeth forth. said, [is] it? said, [is] ephah goeth forth. said moreover, [is] resemblance earth. and, behold, lifted talent lead: [is] woman sitteth midst ephah. said, [is] wickedness. cast midst ephah; cast weight lead upon mouth thereof. lifted mine eyes, looked, and, behold, came two women, wind [was] wings; wings like wings stork: lifted ephah earth heaven. said angel talked me, whither bear ephah? said unto me, build house land shinar: shall established, set upon base. turned, lifted mine eyes, looked, and, behold, came four chariots two mountains; mountains [were] mountains brass. first chariot [were] red horses; second chariot black horses; third chariot white horses; fourth chariot grisled bay horses. angel answered said unto me, [are] four spirits heavens, go forth standing lord earth. black horses [are] therein go forth north country; white go forth them; grisled go forth toward south country. bay went forth, sought go might walk fro earth: said, get hence, walk fro earth. walked fro earth. cried upon me, spake unto me, saying, behold, go toward north country quieted spirit north country. word lord came unto me, saying, take [them of] captivity, [even] heldai, tobijah, jedaiah, come babylon, come thou day, go house josiah son zephaniah; take silver gold, make crowns, set [them] upon head joshua son josedech, high priest; speak unto him, saying, thus speaketh lord hosts, saying, behold man whose name [is] branch; shall grow place, shall build temple lord: even shall build temple lord; shall bear glory, shall sit rule upon throne; shall priest upon throne: counsel peace shall both. crowns shall helem, tobijah, jedaiah, hen son zephaniah, memorial temple lord. [that are] far shall come build temple lord, ye shall know lord hosts hath sent unto you. [this] shall come pass, ye diligently obey voice lord god. came pass fourth year king darius, [that] word lord came unto zechariah fourth [day] ninth month, [even] chisleu; sent unto house god sherezer regem-melech, men, pray lord, [and] speak unto priests [were] house lord hosts, prophets, saying, weep fifth month, separating myself, done many years? came word lord hosts unto me, saying, speak unto people land, priests, saying, ye fasted mourned fifth seventh [month,] even seventy years, ye fast unto me, [even] me? ye eat, ye drink, ye eat [for yourselves,] drink [for yourselves? ] [should ye] [hear] words lord hath cried former prophets, jerusalem inhabited prosperity, cities thereof round her, [men] inhabited south plain? word lord came unto zechariah, saying, thus speaketh lord hosts, saying, execute true judgment, shew mercy compassions every man brother: oppress widow, fatherless, stranger, poor; let none imagine evil brother heart. refused hearken, pulled away shoulder, stopped ears, hear. yea, made hearts [as] adamant stone, lest hear law, words lord hosts hath sent spirit formerpage 551 zechariah prophets: therefore came great wrath lord hosts. therefore come pass, [that] cried, would hear; cried, would hear, saith lord hosts: scattered whirlwind among nations knew not. thus land desolate them, man passed returned: laid pleasant land desolate. word lord hosts came [to me,] saying, thus saith lord hosts; jealous zion great jealousy, jealous great fury. thus saith lord; returned unto zion, dwell midst jerusalem: jerusalem shall called city truth; mountain lord hosts holy mountain. thus saith lord hosts; shall yet old men old women dwell streets jerusalem, every man staff hand age. streets city shall full boys girls playing streets thereof. thus saith lord hosts; marvellous eyes remnant people days, also marvellous mine eyes? saith lord hosts. thus saith lord hosts; behold, save people east country, west country; bring them, shall dwell midst jerusalem: shall people, god, truth righteousness. thus saith lord hosts; let hands strong, ye hear days words mouth prophets, [were] day [that] foundation house lord hosts laid, temple might built. days hire man, hire beast; neither [was any] peace went came affliction: set men every one neighbour. [will] [be] unto residue people former days, saith lord hosts. seed [shall be] prosperous; vine shall give fruit, ground shall give increase, heavens shall give dew; cause remnant people possess [things. ] shall come pass, [that] ye curse among heathen, house judah, house israel; save you, ye shall blessing: fear not, [but] let hands strong. thus saith lord hosts; thought punish you, fathers provoked wrath, saith lord hosts, repented not: thought days well unto jerusalem house judah: fear ye not. [are] things ye shall do; speak ye every man truth neighbour; execute judgment truth peace gates: let none imagine evil hearts neighbour; love false oath: [are things] hate, saith lord. word lord hosts came unto me, saying, thus saith lord hosts; fast fourth [month,] fast fifth, fast seventh, fast tenth, shall house judah joy gladness, cheerful feasts; therefore love truth peace. thus saith lord hosts; [it shall] yet [come pass,] shall come people, inhabitants many cities: inhabitants one [city] shall go another, saying, let usgo speedily pray lord, seek lord hosts: go also. yea, many people strong nations shall come seek lord hosts jerusalem, pray lord. thus saith lord hosts; days [it shall come pass,] ten men shall take hold languages nations, even shall take hold skirt jew, saying, go you: heard [that] god [is] you. burden word lord land hadrach, damascus [shall be] rest thereof: eyes man, tribes israel, [shall be] toward lord. hamath also shall border thereby; tyrus, zidon, though wise. tyrus build strong hold, heaped silver dust, fine gold mire streets. behold, lord cast out, smite power sea; shall devoured fire. ashkelon shall see [it,] fear; gaza also [shall see it,] sorrowful, ekron; expectation shall ashamed; king shall perish gaza, ashkelon shall inhabited. bastard shall dwell ashdod, cut pride philistines. take away blood mouth, abominations teeth: remaineth, even he, [shall be] god, shall governor judah, ekron jebusite. encamp mine house army, passeth by, returneth: oppressor shall pass more: seen mine eyes. rejoice greatly, daughter zion; shout, daughter jerusalem: behold, thy king cometh unto thee: [is] just, salvation; lowly, riding upon ass, upon colt foal ass. cut chariot ephraim, horse jerusalem, battle bow shall cut off: shall speak peace unto heathen: dominion [shall be] sea [even] sea, river [even] ends earth. thee also, blood thy covenant sent forth thy prisoners pit wherein [is] water. turn strong hold, ye prisoners hope: even day declare [that] render double unto thee; bent judah me, filled bow ephraim, raised thy sons, zion, thy sons, greece, made thee sword mighty man. lord shall seen them, arrow shall go forth lightning: lord god shall blow trumpet, shall go whirlwinds south. lord hosts shall defend them; shall devour, subdue sling stones; shall drink, [and] make noise wine; shall filled like bowls, [and] corners altar. lord god shall save day flock people: [shall as] stones crown, lifted ensign upon land. great [is] goodness, great [is] beauty! corn shall make young men cheerful, new wine maids. ask ye lord rain time latter rain; [so] lord shall make bright clouds, give showers rain, every one grass field. idols spoken vanity, diviners seen lie, told false dreams; comfort vain: therefore went way flock, troubled,zechariah page 552 [there was] shepherd. mine anger kindled shepherds, punished goats: lord hosts hath visited flock house judah, hath made goodly horse battle. came forth corner, nail, battle bow, every oppressor together. shall mighty [men,] tread [their enemies] mire streets battle: shall fight, lord [is] them, riders horses shall confounded. strengthen house judah, save house joseph, bring place them; mercy upon them: shall though cast off: [am] lord god, hear them. [they of] ephraim shall like mighty [man,] heart shall rejoice wine: yea, children shall see [it,] glad; heart shall rejoice lord. hiss them, gather them; redeemed them: shall increase increased. sow among people: shall remember far countries; shall live children, turn again. bring also land egypt, gather assyria; bring land gilead lebanon; [place] shall found them. shall pass sea affliction, shall smite waves sea, deeps river shall dry up: pride assyria shall brought down, sceptre egypt shall depart away. strengthen lord; shall walk name, saith lord. open thy doors, lebanon, fire may devour thy cedars. howl, fir tree; cedar fallen; mighty spoiled: howl, ye oaks bashan; forest vintage come down. [there is] voice howling shepherds; glory spoiled: voice roaring young lions; pride jordan spoiled. thus saith lord god; feed flock slaughter; whose possessors slay them, hold guilty: sell say, blessed [be] lord; rich: shepherds pity not. pity inhabitants land, saith lord: but, lo, deliver men every one neighbour's hand, hand king: shall smite land, hand deliver [them. ] feed flock slaughter, [even] you, poor flock. took unto two staves; one called beauty, called bands; fed flock. three shepherds also cut one month; soul lothed them, soul also abhorred me. said i, feed you: dieth, let die; cut off, let cut off; let rest eat every one flesh another. took staff, [even] beauty, cut asunder, might break covenant made people. broken day: poor flock waited upon knew [was] word lord. said unto them, ye think good, give [me] price; not, forbear. weighed price thirty [pieces] silver. lord said unto me, cast unto potter: goodly price prised them. itook thirty [pieces] silver, cast potter house lord. cut asunder mine staff, [even] bands, might break brotherhood judah israel. lord said unto me, take unto thee yet instruments foolish shepherd. for, lo, raise shepherd land, [which] shall visit cut off, neither shall seek young one, heal broken, feed standeth still: shall eat flesh fat, tear claws pieces. woe idol shepherd leaveth flock! sword [shall be] upon arm, upon right eye: arm shall clean dried up, right eye shall utterly darkened. burden word lord israel, saith lord, stretcheth forth heavens, layeth foundation earth, formeth spirit man within him. behold, make jerusalem cup trembling unto people round about, shall siege judah [and] jerusalem. day make jerusalem burdensome stone people: burden shall cut pieces, though people earth gathered together it. day, saith lord, smite every horse astonishment, rider madness: open mine eyes upon house judah, smite every horse people blindness. governors judah shall say heart, inhabitants jerusalem [shall be] strength lord hosts god. day make governors judah like hearth fire among wood, like torch fire sheaf; shall devour people round about, right hand left: jerusalem shall inhabited place, [even] jerusalem. lord also shall save tents judah first, glory house david glory inhabitants jerusalem magnify [themselves] judah. day shall lord defend inhabitants jerusalem; feeble among day shall david; house david [shall be] god, angel lord them. shall come pass day, [that] seek destroy nations come jerusalem. pour upon house david, upon inhabitants jerusalem, spirit grace supplications: shall look upon pierced, shall mourn him, one mourneth [his] [son,] shall bitterness him, one bitterness [his] firstborn. day shall great mourning jerusalem, mourning hadadrimmon valley megiddon. land shall mourn, every family apart; family house david apart, wives apart; family house nathan apart, wives apart; family house levi apart, wives apart; family shimei apart, wives apart; families remain, every family apart, wives apart. day shall fountain opened house david inhabitants jerusalem sin uncleanness.page 553 zechariah shall come pass day, saith lord hosts, [that] cut names idols land, shall remembered: also cause prophets unclean spirit pass land. shall come pass, [that] shall yet prophesy, father mother begat shall say unto him, thou shalt live; thou speakest lies name lord: father mother begat shall thrust prophesieth. shall come pass day, [that] prophets shall ashamed every one vision, hath prophesied; neither shall wear rough garment deceive: shall say, [am] prophet, [am] husbandman; man taught keep cattle youth. [one] shall say unto him, [are] wounds thine hands? shall answer, [those] wounded [in] house friends. awake, sword, shepherd, man [that is] fellow, saith lord hosts: smite shepherd, sheep shall scattered: turn mine hand upon little ones. shall come pass, [that] land, saith lord, two parts therein shall cut [and] die; third shall left therein. bring third part fire, refine silver refined, try gold tried: shall call name, hear them: say, [is] people: shall say, lord [is] god. behold, day lord cometh, thy spoil shall divided midst thee. gather nations jerusalem battle; city shall taken, houses rifled, women ravished; half city shall go forth captivity, residue people shall cut city. shall lord go forth, fight nations, fought day battle. feet shall stand day upon mount olives, [is] jerusalem east, mount olives shall cleave midst thereof toward east toward west, [and shall be] great valley; half mountain shall remove toward north, half toward south. ye shall flee [to] valley mountains; valley mountains shall reach unto azal: yea, ye shall flee, like ye fled earthquake days uzziah king judah: lord god shall come, [and] saints thee. shall come pass day, [that] light shall clear, [nor] dark: shall one day shall known lord, day, night: shall come pass, [that] evening time shall light. shall day, [that] living waters shall go jerusalem; half toward former sea, half toward hinder sea: summer winter shall be. lord shall king earth: day shall one lord, name one. land shall turned plain geba rimmon south jerusalem: shall lifted up, inhabited place, benjamin's gate unto place first gate, unto corner gate, [from] tower hananeel unto king's winepresses. [men] shall dwell it, shall utter destruction; jerusalem shall safely inhabited. shall plague wherewith thelord smite people fought jerusalem; flesh shall consume away stand upon feet, eyes shall consume away holes, tongue shall consume away mouth. shall come pass day, [that] great tumult lord shall among them; shall lay hold every one hand neighbour, hand shall rise hand neighbour. judah also shall fight jerusalem; wealth heathen round shall gathered together, gold, silver, apparel, great abundance. shall plague horse, mule, camel, ass, beasts shall tents, plague. shall come pass, [that] every one left nations came jerusalem shall even go year year worship king, lord hosts, keep feast tabernacles. shall be, [that] whoso come [all] families earth unto jerusalem worship king, lord hosts, even upon shall rain. family egypt go up, come not, [have] [rain;] shall plague, wherewith lord smite heathen come keep feast tabernacles. shall punishment egypt, punishment nations come keep feast tabernacles. day shall upon bells horses, holiness unto lord; pots lord's house shall like bowls altar. yea, every pot jerusalem judah shall holiness unto lord hosts: sacrifice shall come take them, seethe therein: day shall canaanite house lord hosts.page 555 malachi malachi burden word lord israel malachi. loved you, saith lord. yet ye say, wherein hast thou loved us? [was] esau jacob's brother? saith lord: yet loved jacob, hated esau, laid mountains heritage waste dragons wilderness. whereas edom saith, impoverished, return build desolate places; thus saith lord hosts, shall build, throw down; shall call them, border wickedness, and, people lord hath indignation ever. eyes shall see, ye shall say, lord magnified border israel. son honoureth [his] father, servant master: [be] father, [is] mine honour? [be] master, [is] fear? saith lord hosts unto you, priests, despise name. ye say, wherein despised thy name? ye offer polluted bread upon mine altar; ye say, wherein polluted thee? ye say, table lord [is] contemptible. ye offer blind sacrifice, [is it] evil? ye offer lame sick, [is it] evil? offer unto thy governor; pleased thee, accept thy person? saith lord hosts. now, pray you, beseech god gracious unto us: hath means: regard persons? saith lord hosts. [is there] even among would shut doors [for nought?] neither ye kindle [fire] mine altar nought. pleasure you, saith lord hosts, neither accept offering hand. rising sun even unto going name [shall be] great among gentiles; every place incense [shall be] offered unto name, pure offering: name [shall be] great among heathen, saith lord hosts. ye profaned it, ye say, table lord [is] polluted; fruit thereof, [even] meat, [is] contemptible. ye said also, behold, weariness [is it!] ye snuffed it, saith lord hosts; ye brought [that was] torn, lame, sick; thus ye brought offering: accept hand? saith lord. cursed [be] deceiver, hath flock male, voweth, sacrificeth unto lord corrupt thing: [am] great king, saith lord hosts, name [is] dreadful among heathen. now, ye priests, commandment [is] you. ye hear, ye lay [it] heart, give glory unto name, saith lord hosts, even send curse upon you, curse blessings: yea, cursed already, ye lay [it] heart. behold, corrupt seed, spread dung upon faces, [even] dung solemn feasts; [one] shall take away it. ye shall know sent commandment unto you, covenant might levi, saith lord hosts. covenant life peace; gave [for] fear wherewith feared me, afraid name. law truth mouth, iniquity found lips: walked peace equity, turn manyaway iniquity. priest's lips keep knowledge, seek law mouth: [is] messenger lord hosts. ye departed way; ye caused many stumble law; ye corrupted covenant levi, saith lord hosts. therefore also made contemptible base people, according ye kept ways, partial law. one father? hath one god created us? deal treacherously every man brother, profaning covenant fathers? judah hath dealt treacherously, abomination committed israel jerusalem; judah hath profaned holiness lord loved, hath married daughter strange god. lord cut man doeth this, master scholar, tabernacles jacob, offereth offering unto lord hosts. ye done again, covering altar lord tears, weeping, crying out, insomuch regardeth offering more, receiveth [it] good hand. yet ye say, wherefore? lord hath witness thee wife thy youth, thou hast dealt treacherously: yet [is] thy companion, wife thy covenant. make one? yet residue spirit. wherefore one? might seek godly seed. therefore take heed spirit, let none deal treacherously wife youth. lord, god israel, saith hateth putting away: [one] covereth violence garment, saith lord hosts: therefore take heed spirit, ye deal treacherously. ye wearied lord words. yet ye say, wherein wearied [him?] ye say, every one doeth evil [is] good sight lord, delighteth them; or, [is] god judgment? behold, send messenger, shall prepare way me: lord, ye seek, shall suddenly come temple, even messenger covenant, ye delight in: behold, shall come, saith lord hosts. may abide day coming? shall stand appeareth? [is] like refiner's fire, like fullers' sope: shall sit [as] refiner purifier silver: shall purify sons levi, purge gold silver, may offer unto lord offering righteousness. shall offering judah jerusalem pleasant unto lord, days old, former years. come near judgment; swift witness sorcerers, adulterers, false swearers, oppress hireling [his] wages, widow, fatherless, turn aside stranger [from right,] fear me, saith lord hosts. [am] lord, change not; therefore ye sons jacob consumed. even days fathers ye gone away mine ordinances, kept [them.] return unto me, return unto you, saith lord hosts. ye said, wherein shall return?malachi page 556 man rob god? yet ye robbed me. ye say, wherein robbed thee? tithes offerings. ye [are] cursed curse: ye robbed me, [even] whole nation. bring ye tithes storehouse, may meat mine house, prove herewith, saith lord hosts, open windows heaven, pour blessing, [there shall] [be room] enough [to receive it. ] rebuke devourer sakes, shall destroy fruits ground; neither shall vine cast fruit time field, saith lord hosts. nations shall call blessed: ye shall delightsome land, saith lord hosts. words stout me, saith lord. yet ye say, spoken [so much] thee? ye said, [is] vain serve god: profit [is it] kept ordinance, walked mournfully lord hosts? call proud happy; yea, work wickedness set up; yea, [they that] tempt god even delivered. feared lord spake often one another: lord hearkened, heard [it,] book remembrance written feared lord, thought upon name. shall mine, saith lord hosts, day make jewels; spare them, man spareth son serveth him. shall ye return, discern righteous wicked, serveth god serveth not. for, behold, day cometh, shall burn oven; proud, yea, wickedly, shall stubble: day cometh shall burn up, saith lord hosts, shall leave neither root branch. unto fear name shall sun righteousness arise healing wings; ye shall go forth, grow calves stall. ye shall tread wicked; shall ashes soles feet day shall [this,] saith lord hosts. remember ye law moses servant, commanded unto horeb israel, [with] statutes judgments. behold, send elijah prophet coming great dreadful day lord: shall turn heart fathers children, heart children fathers, lest come smite earth curse.new testament
